Abraham tapa David, tapa Jesu Krist khan: Abraham in Isak asuang a, Isak in Jakob asuang a, tualeh Jakob in Judah leh asanggam pasalte asuang a,
Judah in Tamar tawh Perez leh Zorah asuang a, Perez in Hezrom asuang a, tualeh Hezrom in Ram asuang a,
Ram in Amminadab, asuang a, Amminadab in Nahshon asuang a, Nahshon in Salmon asuang a,
Salmon in Rahab tawh Boaz asuang a, Boaz in Ruth tawh Obed asuang a, Obed in Jessai asuang a,
tualeh Jessai in Kumpipa David asuang. Kumpipa David in Uriah zi tawh Solomon asuang,
tualeh Solomon in Rehoboam asuang a, Rehoboam in Abijah asuang a, Abijah in Asa asuang,
Asa in Jehoshaphat asuang a, Jehoashaphat in Joram asuang a, tualeh Joram in Uzziah asuang.
Uzziah in Jotham asuang a, Jotham in Ahaz asuang a, tualeh Ahaz in Hezekiah asuang,
Hezekiah in Manasseh asuang a, Manasseh in Amon asuang a, tualeh Amon in Josiah asuang hi.
Bebilon sal a puia aomlai un Josiah in Jekoniah leh a sanggam pasalte asuang hi.
Tualeh Bebilon sal a puia a omzoh nung un, Jekoniah in Shealtiel asuang a, Shealtiel in Zerubbabel asuang,
Zerubbabel in Abiud asuang a, Abiud in Eliakim asuang a, tualeh Eliakim in Azor asuang,
Azor in Zadok asuang a, Zadok in Achin asuang a, tualeh Achin in Eliud asuang,
Eliud in Eleazer asuang a, Eleazer in Mathan asuang a, tualeh Mathan in Jakob asuang,
Jakob in Krist kichi Jesu pianna Mari pasal Joseph asuang hi.
Tuachi`n suan tengteng ahihleh Abraham a pat David tan khang sawmlehli ahi; David a pan Bebilon sal a puia aom tan uh khang sawmlehli a hi a, Bebilon sal a pan Krist tan khang sawmlehli ahi.
Tualeh Jesu Krist hung piandan ahihleh hihbang ahi. Anu Mari pen Joseph tawh kikham khin ahi a, a omkhawm masang un, Khasiangthou a pat nauvop ahi chih ahung kitheikhiata hi.
Tualeh apasal Joseph pen midiktak ahi a, Mari pen mipi maiah mualphousak louin; dap tawpsan a sawmta hi.
Hinanleh hihbang silte a ngaihsut laiin, ngaiin, amang in Pasian vantungmi khat akiang ah ahung kilak a, “Joseph, David tapa, nazi Mari neihding lauken, a naupai pen Khasiangthou a kipan ahi.
Aman tapa anei ding a, amin ding in Jesu naphuak ding, Aman amite akhialhna ua pan a hutdam ding jiak in.”
Hihte tengteng Toupa`n Jawlnei kam a anagensa ahung tangtunna ding a hung om ahi,
Ngaiin, “Nungak siangthou agai ding a tapa anei ding a, amin ding in Immanuel” aphuak ding uh, (tuapen, “I kiang uah Pasian a om, chihna ahi”).
Tuachi`n Joseph ihmu hung thoukhia in, Toupa vantungmi thupiak bangin abawl a azi akiang ah apuita hi.
Hinanleh Tapa masa aneih masiah a luppih kei hi. Tuachi`n Joseph in amin Jesu a phuakta hi.
Kumpi Herod lalhun laiin Judea gam Bethlehem khua a Jesu hung pianzoh in, ngaiin, suahlam a pan mipilte Jerusalem ah a hungpai ua,
“Judahte kumpipa hungpiang amah khoisan a om ahia? Suahlam ah a aksi kamu ua, amah biading a hungpai ka hi uh,” achi uhi.
Kumpi Herod in hih a jaktakin, a lungkham mahmah a, Jerusalem a tengteng zong a lungkham chiat uhi.
Tuachi`n Herod in siampite leh laigelhmite a samkhawm a, “Krist khoisan a piang kichi ahia?” chi`n a kanchian hi.
Tuachi`n amauhte`n a kiangah, “Judea gam a Bethlehem khua ah, Jawlneite`n hihbang in a gelh uh,
‘Nang, Judea gam a Bethlehem aw,
Judah khuapite lak ah na neupen tuam kei;
Nang a kipan ukpa hung piang ding ahihjiak in
Ka mi Israelte ching ding in.’ ”
Tuachi`n hihthu ajak khit in Herod in mipilte a samdap a, bang hun a hih aksi hung kilang ahia chi`n kichiantak in adong hi.
Tuakhit in aman, Bethlehem khua ah: “Pai unla hoihtak in nausen vazongkhia unla; amah na muhkhit chiang un kei hunghilh kik un, ken zong kava biaktheihna dingin,” chi`n a sawlta hi.
Kumpi thugen ajakkhit takun, apaikhiatsan ta ua; ngaiin, aksi suahlam a amuhpen mah uh, nausen omna tung atun a akhawl masiah, amai uah anapai hi.
Aksi amuh takun a kipak ua, kipahna in adimta uhi.
Tualeh innsung a aluttak un, nausen anu Mari tawh amuta ua, khupbok in amah abiata uhi. Tuakhit in agoubawmte uh ahong ua, kipahna silpiak, Khamte, Chiimte leh Murahte apia uhi.
Herod kiang a kilehkik nawnlou ding a amang ua Pasian in taihilh ahihman in, lamtuam ah agam lam uah apaita uhi.

Tuachi`n amauhte`n apaisan nungin, ngaiin, Joseph mang in Toupa vantungmi ahung kila`k a, “Thou inla, naungek leh anu zohpih inla, Izipt gam ah taipih inla, thu kungpiak masangsiah huamun ah om un, Herod in naungek thahding in zongding ahihman in,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n amahzong a thoukhia a, aja`n aja`n in naungek leh anu a zohpih a, Izipt gam juan in ataipihta a,
Herod sih masiah huamun ah a omden ta uhi. Tuapen Toupa`n Jawlnei kam a, “Ka Tapa Izipt gam a pan ka samkhia,” chia agen a tangtun theihna ding ahi.

Tualeh Herod in mipilte`n hungkhem uh ahi chih a theihtak in, aheh mahmah a, Tuachi`n mi asawl a, Bethlehem leh akim a om pasal naupang kumnih a pat anuailam athatsak hi, tuapen mipilte adokna pan a ahun azonkhiat dungjuia asep ahi.
Tuachi`n Jawlnei Jeremiah in:
“Rama khua ah aw akija,
Lusu`nna, kah leh mauna thu.
Rachel in a tate akah;
Amau a om nawnlouh jiak un,
hehnepzoh hinawnlou ding chia agen a tangtungta hi.”
Herod a sihkhit in, ngaiin, Izipt gam a om Joseph mang in Toupa vantungmite ahung kilak a
“Thou inla, naungek leh anu zohpih inla, Israel gam ah paita in, naungek thahsawmpa a sita hi,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n amah zong a thoukhia a, naungek leh anu Mari azohpih a, Israel gam ah ahung paita uhi.
Hinanleh apa Herod tang in Arkelaus in Judea gam ah vai ahawm chih ajaktak un, huamun a pai alauta uhi. Tuachi`n Pasian in amanglam ua a taihilh mahbang in, Galili gam ninglam ahung juanta uhi.
Tuachi`n Nazareth kichi khuapi ah hungtung in, huamun ah a tengta ua, “Amahpen Nazarethmi akichi ding,” chih Jawlneite`n agen a tangtun theihna ding ahi.
Tuahunlai in baptispa Johan Judea gamdai ah, thugen in a hungpai a.
“Kisik un, Van gam anaita!” achi hi.
Amah ahi Jawlnei Isaiah in,
“Gamdai a mi kikou aw khat in,
‘Toupa lampi sial unla;
Lampi tangsak un!’ ” achi, chia anagen.
Tualeh Johan in sangawngsau mul puan in asilh a savun kawnggak tawh akawng agak a, tualeh a annek pen kauphe leh khuaiju ahi.
Tuachi`n Jerusalem khuate, Judea gamte leh Jordan luikim gam a pan mi amah kiangah a hungpai ua.
A khialhnate uh a phuangkhia ua Johan in Jordan luiah amauhte ana baptis hi.

Hinanleh aman Pharisaite leh Sadukaite tampi akiang a baptisma tang ding a hungpai amuhtak in, aman akiang uah, “Nou, gul suante aw, thangpaihna hungtung ding taisan ding a kuan hung taihilh ahia? achi hi.
Tuajiakin kisik chinna gah hungnei khia phot un.
Abraham kapa uh ahi chi`n noumauh in ngaihsutna nei kei un. Pasian in suangtang neute zong Abraham tate suaksakthei hi!
Tualeh tu mahmah in heipi singzung teng ah kikoihkhin hi; tuajiakin singkung gahhoih neilou jousiah sattan a meilak a paih ahi ding hi.

Ken na kisikna uh lahna ding in tui in kung baptis a, hinanleh ka nung a hung paidingpa ahihleh keisang a hatzaw ahi a; akhedap tawi ding a zong taklou ka hi. Aman Khasiangthou leh mei in ahung baptis ding hi.
A phikphek a khut ah a tawi a, aman a buhphual ngiltak in ajapsiang kilkel ding a tualeh anbuk sungah buhtakte a koihkhawm ding a; hinanleh buhsite pen amittheilou mei tawh ahaltum ding hi.”
Tuachi`n Jesu Johan kiang a baptisma tang ding in, Galili gam a pan Jordan luiah a hungpai hi.
Hinanleh Johan in kham sawm in, “Nang kei nung baptis ding poimoh jaw hi`ng a, Kei kiangah Nang nungpai jawsop ding maw!” achi hi.
Hinanleh Jesu`n a dawng a hichi`n a kiangah, “Tu`n hithei sak teitei in; hihbang diktatnate tengteng sep tangtun ei a ding a chinna ahi,” achi hi. Tuachi`n aman aphalsak ta hi.
Tualeh Jesu`n baptisma a tankhit, tuilak a pat ahung pawtkhiat phet in, ngaiin, amah a dingin van ahung ki hongkhia a, vak in amah a khohsuk a Pasian Khasiangthou vakhu bang a hung kumsuk amu hi.
Tuachi`n thakhat in van a pan in aw khat in, “Hih Ka Tapa it tak ahi, Ka kipahna mahmah ahi,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n Jesu setan khem a om dingin gamdai ah kha puiin ahung omta hi.
Tuachi`n amah sun sawmli leh ja`n sawmli anngawl a aomzoh nungin, agil ahung kialta hi.
Tuachi`n khemtu a kiangah a hungpaita a, aman a kiangah, “Nang Pasian Tapa nahihleh, hih suangte tanghou suaksak ding in thu pia in,” achi hi.
“Hinanleh aman adawng a, ‘Mihing tanghou guak in a hingkei ding a, hinanleh Pasian kam a thuchin pawtte in ahingjaw ding chih gelh ahi, achi hi.’ ”
Tuachi`n dawimangpa`n amah khuapi siangthou tung ah a paitouhpih a, Tempul tungvum ah akoih a,
tuachi`n a kiangah, “Nang, Pasian Tapa nahihleh, nang leh nang ki kiasuksak in,
‘Na tungthu ah aman a vantungmite thu a pia ding a;
Na keng a suang na suihkhak louhna ding in,
akhut un ahung dom nading uhi, chih gelh ahi, achi hi.’ ”
“Jesu`n a kiangah, ‘Toupa na Pasian ze-et ken chih zong gelh ahi,’ ”
achi hi.
Tuachi`n dawimangpa`n amah mual sang penpen tungah a paitoupih kik leuleu a leitung gam tengteng leh a thupina a ensak a.
Aman a kiangah, “Kamaia ku`n a nung biakleh, hih silte jousiah nang kung pia ding, achi hi.”
Tuachi`n Jesu`n a kiangah, “Setan! hihsan a kipan in paimang in, ‘Toupa na Pasian na biading a, ama nna guak nasep ding ahi, chih gelh ahi, achi hi!’”
Tuachi`n dawimangpa`n amah apaisanta a; ngaiin, thakhat in vantungmite a hungpai ua amah nna ahung sepsakta uhi.
Johan thong ah akikhum chih Jesu`n ajaktak in, Galili lam ah a kihepsanta hi.
Tuachi`n Nazareth khua nusia in Zebulun leh Naptali dil geia om, Kapernaum khua ah hungpai in atengta hi.
Tuapen Jawlnei Isaiah in anagen a tangtunna ding in,
“Tuipi geia Zebulun gam leh Naptali gam,
tuipi zotna lampi a om, Jordan kantan a,
Jentelte tenna, Galili gam a!
Miallak a tou mite`n,
va`k thupitak amu ua.
Sihna mun leh alim a toute tungah
Khua ahung vakta, achi hi.”
Tuahun a kipan in Jesu`n thugen a panta a, “Kisi`k un, van gam anaita hi!”
achi hi.
Tuachi`n Jesu Galili tuipi piau ah avak a, unau pasal nih, Peter zong kichi Simon leh, a sanggampa Andru, amauh ngamanmi ahihjiak un, tuipi a ngen khuhlai amu a.
Aman akiang uah, “Hungjui un, mihing man ding in nou kungbawl ding,” achi hi.
Amau`n zong kintakin a ngente uh nusia in anung ajuita uhi.
Hua a kipan paijel in, unau pasal dang nih, Zebedi tapa Jakob leh a sanggampa Johan, apa tawh gunkuang sunga a ngen uh bawlpha a om amuh in amau tegel a sam a,
amau`n zong gunkuang leh apa uh nusia in anung a juipaita uhi.
Tuachi`n Jesu Galili gam tengah vak kawikawi in, a kikhopna inn uah thu hilh in, gam tangthupha thu gen in mipite lak ah damlouhna chituam tuamte leh natna chituam tuamte a damsak hi.

Tuachi`n Siria gam tengah atanchin ahung thangta a, amauhte`n a kiangah achina jousiah ahung paipihta ua, natna chi tuamtuam a damloute leh gimthuakte: dawimatte, kaihveite leh jengte ahung paipih ua, aman ana damsakta hi.
Tuachi`n Galili gam a pan, Dekapolis gam a pan, Jerusalem a pan, Judea gam leh Jordan gal lam a pan mihon tampite`n anung ajuita uhi.
Mihonpi amuhtak in, mual tungah apaitou a, atou a. Anungjuite a kiangah ahungpaita ua,
tuachi`n thu agen a, hichin a nungjuite thu ahilhta hi:
“Khalam a jawngkhalte a hampha uhi;
van gam amau ua ahihman in!”
“Lungkhamte a hampha uhi;
khamuan a om ding ahihman un!”
“Mi nunnemte ahampha uhi;
leigou luah ding ahihman un!”
“Diktatna lunggulh a gilkial dangtakte ahampha uhi;
taiding ahihjiak un!”
“Zahngaitheite ahampha uhi;
zahngaihna mu ding ahihman un!”
“Lungsim a siangthoute ahampha uhi;
Pasian mu ding ahihjiak un!”
“Lemna bawlte ahampha uhi,
Pasian Tate kichi ding ahihjiak un!”
“Diktatna jiaka gawtna thuakte ahampha uhi;
van gam amauh a ahihjiak in!”
“Mi`n Kei jiaka ahung housiat ua, ahung gawt ua juau a gilou chiteng a ahunghek hun chiang un na hampha uhi.
Nuam unla nakpitak in kipak un, van ah na nuamman uh thupi ahihman in. Tuamah bangin namai ua Jawlnei omte zong ana bawlsia uhi.”
“Noute lei chi nahi uhi. Hinanleh chi in a alna mansuah taleh, bang chi`n alkikthei ding ahia, Paihkhiat a mite chilgawp ding louhngal in bangmah phattuamna anei nawnkei ding hi.
“Noute leitung va`k nahi uh. Mualtung a khuapi om pen phualdap theih ahi kei.
Kuaman a meivak de in lawh nuaiah akoih ngaikei; a tanna khuam tungah akoih a, tuachi`n ava`k in innsung teng asalhvakjaw hi.
Tuachimah bangin, na va`k uh mite maiah va`k hen, tuahileh mi`n na nasep-hoihte uh mu un chin, van a om na Pa uh min aphatthei ding uhi.
“Jawlneite leh da`nthu beisak ding a hungpai ka hih hung gingta kei un. Beisak ding a hungpai ka hikei a tangtungsak ding a hungpai ka hijaw hi.
Adiktak in na kiang uah kung hilh ahi, lei leh van aman masiah, da`nthu bu a sut vom khat hiam, laimal neunou khat zong a mangthang kei ding, aun a atangtun masiah.

Tuajiakin, kuahileh hih da`n thupiakte lak a neupen khatmai zong juilou a, tuabang bawl ding a mi hilhte pen, van gam ah mineupen a kichi ding uhi. Hinanleh kuahileh a jui a mi hilhte van gam ah milian a kichi ding hi.
Na diktatna un Laigelhmite leh Pharisaite diktatna akhupzoh keileh, van gam na lut kei ding uh, chih kung hilh ahi.
“Tanglai mite kiangah, ‘Tual na thahlouh ding uh ahi, kuahileh tualthat in thukhenni a dingin lauhhuai takin aom ding chih na jata uhi.’

Hinanleh ken noute kung hilh ahi: Ajiak beia a sanggampa tung a hehmi pen thukhenna thuak ding in alauhuai ding; tualeh a sanggampa sialphou mi pen vaihawmpawl maia dinding alauhuai ding; hinanleh a sanggampa kiang a ‘Nang mimaw!’ chi mi pen gawtmun meidil a paihding alauhuai ding hi.
Tuajiakin maitam a silpiak latding a nungtawi laitakin, na sanggampa`n na tungah banghiam khat lungkim louhna anei hi chih na theihleh,
maitam maiah na silpiak nusia inla, pai inla na sanggampa tawh kilem masaphot inla, tuakhit chiah hungpai inla na silpiak lan in.

“Na langpa tawh lampi a na pailai un kintakin kileppih in, atuachih keileh na langpa`n vaihawmmite khut ah ahung piakhia kha ding a, tualeh vaihawmmite`n mimanpa khut ah ahung piakhia kha ding a thong ah a hungkhum kha ding uhi.
Adiktak in na kiang uah kung hilh ahi, paisasan khat bek napiak masiah hua a pan-in na pawtkhia ngaikei ding hi.
“Tanglai mite kiangah, ‘Ang na kawmlouh ding ahi,’ chia kigen najata uhi.
Hinanleh Ken: kuahileh numei sualpih utna tawh enmi in a lungsim in huanu tawh ang a kawmkhinta ka chi hi.
Tualeh na mit jiatlam in ahung khialhsak ding leh, kheikhia inla na kiang a pan paikhia in! Na pumpi gawtmun meidil a paih a aom sangin na chimeng khat mansuah nang a dingin ahoihjaw hi.
Tuaban ah nakhut jiatlam in ahung khialhsak ding leh, sattan inla na kiang a pan paikhia in! Na pumpi a gawtmun meidil a paih a na om sangin na chimeng khat mansuah nang a dingin ahoihjaw hi.
“Tuaban ah, ‘Kuapeuh azi khul in, kikhulna lai a kiangah pia hen,’ zong aki chi hi.
Hinanleh Ken: kuapeuh angkawm jiak hilou a, bangjiak hiam a azi khul in, amah angkawmsak ahi; tualeh kuapeuh khulsa numei kitenpihte zong angkawm ahi, ka chi hi.
“Tanglai mite kiangah, ‘Juauthu in kichiam kenla, hinanleh Toupa kiangah na kichiamnate tangtung sakjaw in, a kichi chih zong najata uhi.’
Hinanleh Ken na kiang uah kung hilh ahi: Kichiam mawng mawng kei un. Van louin kichiam kei un, Pasian Laltouna ahihjiak in;
leitung louin zong kichiam kei un, akeng koihna ahihjiak in; Jerusalem lou in zong kichiam kei un, kumpi liantak khuapi ahihjiak in.
Na lutang louin zong kichiam kei un, ajiak samzang khat zong na kangsakthei kei a, zong na vomsakthei kei hi.
Hinanleh, ‘Ahi’ nachih uleh ahi hihenla, ‘Hilou’ nachih uh ahilou hilel hen, aka`n avalpen gitlouhna a kipan ahi.
“ ‘Mit tang in mit, ha tang in ha, aki chi chia kigen na jangaita uhi.’
Hinanleh Ken na kiang uah kung hilh ahi: migiloute dal kenla, hinanleh kuahiam in na pheta jiatlam ahung bek leh alangkhat zong dawh in.
Kuahiam khat in hung hek a na puan-ak a lakmang utleh na puantual zong lasakvet in.
Tualeh mi kuahiam in melkhat pai ding a nang ahung phutleh, amah toh melnih pai in.
Na kiang a hungngen kiangah pia inla, tualeh na kiang a leitawi nuamte a pan kihem mang ken.
“Na vengte na it ding a, ‘Na melmate na huading chia kigen na ja-ngaita uhi.’

Hinanleh Ken na kiang uah kung hilh ahi: na melmate it inla, nang hung gensiate thupha pia inla, nang hung huate kiang ah silhoih bawl inla, tualeh nang hung gawtte leh nang hung nuaisiahte thumsak jaw in,
van a om na Pa uh tate na hung hihtheihna ding un. Aman migiloute tung leh mihoihte ni suaksak a, tualeh midikte tung leh midikloute tungah guah a jusak hi.
Nou hung itte guak na it uleh, nuamman bang ahia namuh ding uh? Siah dongmite nangawn in zong tuabang in a bawljel uh hilou maw!
Tualeh na sanggamte guak na pahtak uleh, midangte sangin bang na bawltamjaw tuan a? Siah dongmite nangawn in zong tuabang in a bawljel uh hilou maw!
Tuajiakin van a om na Pa uh a hoihkim sipsip mah bangin nou zong na hoihkim sipsip ding uhi.”
Mi mai a silhoih nabawlte uh amauhte mitmuh a bawllou dingin pilvang un, atuachih keileh van a om na Pa uh a pan nuamman na mukei ding uhi.

“Tuajiakin silhoih na bawlchiang un milepchiahte`n mite maipha zong a kikhopna inn leh khualai lak a abawl bang un namai ah pengkul mut ken, adiktak in na kiangah kung hilh ahi, amauhte`n a nuamman uh amuta uhi.
Hinanleh silhoih na bawlchiang in nakhut jiatlam in abawl nakhut veilam in theihdah hen.
Na silhoih bawl pen agu`k in bawl in, tuahileh na Pa uh agu`k a mupa`n amah in langtangtak in nuamman nang a hungpia ding hi.”

“Tualeh na thumchiang un milepchiahte bang kei un! Mi muh ding deih in amauhte`n kikhopna inn ah dinsa in a thum ua, tualeh kongjing ninglak ah athum nuam sese uhi. Adiktak in kung hilh ahi, amauhte`n a nuamman uh amuta uhi.
Hinanleh nang na thumchiang in, na inndan sungah pai inla, kot nakhak zohchiah, agu`k a om na Pa kiang ah thum in. Tuahileh agu`k a hungmu na Pa in langtangtak in nuamman nang hung pia ding hi.
“Hinanleh nathum chiang in, Lawkite bangin thulimlou pouh ngen kikkik kei un, amauhte`n tamveipi genlei ingetna ja`k in a om ding chi`n a ngaihsun uhi.
Tuajiakin amauhte bang kei un. Na ngetma un na poimohte uh na Pa un a theikhin hi.
Tuajiakin hihbang in thum un:
‘Ka pa uh van a om:
Na min kizahtak hen;
Na gam hungtung hen;
Na deihlam van a akibawl bangin, leiah zong kibawl hen.
Nisial a ka nekkhop uh an hung pian.
Ka tung ua khialte ka ngaihdam bang un,
Kou khialhnate zong hung ngaidam in.
Khemna ah hung kailut kenla,
Gilou lak pan hung hunkhiajaw in.’
Gam leh sil bawltheihna leh thupina,
tangtawn a Nang a ahihjiak in. Amen. chi-in.
“Mi tatkhialhna na ngaihdam uleh, van a om na Pa un ahung ngaidam ding hi.
Hinanleh mi tatkhialhna na ngaihdam kei uleh, van a om na Pa un ahung ngaidam kei ding hi.”

Tuaban ah, “An na ngawl chiang un milepchiahte bangin dahmel puakei un. Amauhte`n anngawl ahih uh mi mitmuh a akilat theihna dingin amai uh a nguisak uhi. Adiktak in kung hilh ahi, amauhte`n a nuamman uh a mukhinta uhi.
Hinanleh nang an na ngawlchiang in, na lu sathau nuh inla, na mai phiat in,
tuachi`n na Pa agu`k a om mitmuh ah loungal midangte mitmuh in anngawl na bangkei ding a, agu`k a hungmu na Pa in alangtang in nuamman a hungpia ding hi.
“Leia leikha leh samek in a neksiat theihna leh, gutate`n a suksiat ua a guktheihna mun hih leitung ah, gou kikhol kei un.
Hinanleh, van ah leikha leh samek in aneksiat theihlouhna leh, gutate`n asuksiat ua aguk theihlouhna mun ah, Gou kikhol jaw un.
Ajiak pen nagou omna peuh uah na lungsim uh zong a om hi.
“Taksapum a dingin mit pen meiva`k ahi a, tuajiakin namit ahoih leh na taksa pumpi va`k in a pumdim ding hi;
hinanleh na mit ahoih keileh, na taksa pumpi mialna in a pumdim ding. Tuajiakin na sung a om va`kpen mialna a a pumdimleh, tua mial pen thupi tazen nan chia!
“Kuamah in tounih nna a semkop thei kei; khat hua in khat a it ding; ahihkeileh khat ah agin-om ding a, adang khat a simmoh ding hi. Pasian leh dangka nna a semkop thei kei ding.

“Tuajiakin na kiang ah kung hilh ahi: bang ahia ka nek ding bang ahia ka dawn ding chi`n na hinna thu uh leh, bang ahia ka silh ding bang ahia ka ten ding chi`n na sapum thu uah lungkham kei un. Na nek ding sang un hinna poimohjaw hilou maw? Nasilh naten ding sangun na pumpi uh poimohjaw hilou maw?
Tungleng vasate en un: amauhte`n buh atuhkei ua a atkei uh, anbuk ah a kholkhawm kei uh; hinanleh na Pa uh van a om in ava`k hi! Noute amauhte sangin manphajaw tham hilou nahi uh hiam?
Noute lak ah kuan ahia lungkham jiaka adunglam tongkhat behlap thei?
“Tuajiakin bangding a silh leh ten a lungkham na hi uh hiam? Gamlak a Lilipakte khandan ngaihsun un: nna asemkei ua, khau zong akhek kei uh.
Tualeh na kiang uah kung hilh ahi, Solomon hilhial zong athupina tengteng tawh a kizep in zong hih Lilipakte lak a khat bang a zep in a omzou kei hi.
Tuachia gamlak a hampa tunia hing a, ajingchiang a vul a meikhuk a paihmai ding bawn Pasian in huachitan a azep tazen leh! aw nou ginna tawmte silh leh ten tamjawin hungjem jawtham lou ding maw!
“Tuajiakin: ‘Bang ne in, bang idawn dia? chi-in hiam, bang isilh dia? chi-in hiam lungkham kei un.’
(Jentelte`n hihte tengteng a zong uhi.) Hihte tengteng na poimoh uhi chih van a om na Pa un athei hi.
Hinanleh Pasian gam leh adiktatna pen zong masa phot un, tuahileh hihte tengteng zong na kiang uah piakbehlap ahi ding hi.
Tuajiakin jingchiang a dingin lunghimoh kei un; ajingchiang in amah a ding aki lunghihmoh nading hi. Nikhat a dingin nikhat buai ahun hi.
“Thu khen kei un, tuahileh thu khen in na omkei ding uhi,
thukhenna nabawl bangbang in nang zong thu khensak in na om ding; tualeh tehna nazak bangbang in na kiang ah teh in na om ding hi.
Tualeh, bangding a, nangma mit a om singtun ngaihtuahlou a na sanggampa mit a om ninthem mu nahia?
Ahihkeileh bang chi`n na sanggampa kiang ah, ‘Namit a nintang pen hung lakkhiatsak ning na chithei dia,’ Tualeh en in, nangma mit ah singtun om hilou maw?
Milepchiah! nangma mit a om singtun lakhia masa in, tuahileh na sanggampa mit a kipan ninthem lakkhiat ding a om pen siangtak in namu ding hi.
“Uite kiang ah sil siangthou piakei un, vokpi maiah na tuikepsuang uh zong paikei un, amau`n akeng un atuanchil ding ua, tualeh kiheiin nou ahung balnen khading uhi.
“Ngen un, tuachi`n piakin na om ding uhi; zong un, tuachi`n na mu ding uhi; kiu-un, tuachi`n hon in na om ding uhi.
Kuapeuh a ngen taphot in a ngah ua, kuapeuh azong taphot in amu ua; tualeh kuapeuh akiu taphot honsakin a om ding uhi.
Ahihkeileh kua in ahia a tapa in tanghou ngentaleh suang pia ding?
Ahihkeileh ngasa ngentaleh gul pia ding?
Ahihleh nou migiloute`n bawn, na tate uh kiang a silhoih piak nadan natheih uleh, na Pa uh van a om in a kiang a ngente kiangah silhoih piak nadan theisiam zawsem lou ding maw!
“Tuajiakin sil bangkim mi`n na tung ua bawl ding a na deih bang uh, amauh tungah zong bawl un: tuapen da`n bangtak leh Jawlneite thu mawng ahi.
“Kong kawchi`k ah lut un, manthaina lutna kong a jaia, tualeh a lampi zong alian hi, hihlam a pai mi atam hi.
Ajiak hinna a paina kong a kawchi`k a, alampi zong aneu hi. Tualeh amute zong tawmnou khat ahi uhi.
“Jawlnei takloute a pan pilvang un; belam vun silh in na kiang uah ahung paijel ua, hinanleh asunggil uah ngia duhgawl bang ahi uhi.
Amauhte pen agah in akithei ding uhi. Mi`n lingbawk a pan grepgah a loungai uh maw, Ahihkeileh pakkung a pan thei a loungai uh maw?
Tuachimah bangin singkung hoihte agah zong ahoih a, hinanleh singkung siate agah zong asia hi.
Singkung hoih in gahhoihlou a suangngai kei a, singkung hoihlou in zong gahhoih a suangngai kei hi.
Singkung gahhoih suanglou jousiah aphuk ua, meilak ah apai uhi.
Tuajiakin, agah ua panin amauhte nathei ding uhi.
“ ‘Toupa, Toupa,’ hung chi jousiah van gam ah alut kei ding uh, hinanleh kuapeuh van a om ka Pa deihlam bawlte bek alut ding uhi.
Tuani chiangin mi tampi`n, ‘Toupa! na min in thu ka gen uh hilou maw, Na min in dawite ka hawlkhia uh hilou maw, Tualeh na min in sillamdang tampi ka bawl uh hilou maw!’ achi ding uh hi.
Tuachiang in ken, ‘Nou sil gilou bawlte aw, ka kiang a pan paimang un. Ken noute kung theingai kei!’ ka chi ding hi.
“Tuajiakin Ka thugen ja a ajui mite pen, mipil suangpi tung a innlam mite tawh kateh ding hi.
Tuachi`n guah ahung ju a, tui ahung khang a, huih ahung la`ng a tua inn ahung mutgawp a, suangpi tung a kiptak a lam ahihjiak in apuk kei hi.
“Hinanleh kuapeuh hih ka thugen ja a, juiloute pen, mimaw sehnel tung a innlam tetawh kateh kak ding hi.
Tualeh guah ahung ju a, tui ahung khang a, tualeh huih ahung la`ng a, tua inn ahung mutgawp a; apuk a, achimjan dimdem hi!”
Tualeh Jesu`n hih thute tengteng a genzoh in mipite`n a thuhilhte lamdang asa mahmah uhi.
Laigelhmite banglou a, thuneihna nei khat bangtak a amauhte thu a hilhjiak in.
Mual a kipan a amah ahung kumsuk zoh in, mipi thupitak in anung ajui uhi.
Tualeh ngaiin, miphak khat a hungpai a, Toupa nang na utleh nung siangthousak thei hi chi`n amah abia a.
Tuatakin Jesu`n akhut ajankhia a, amahpa a khoih a, “Ka ut hi, Siangthouta in!” achi a, manlangtak in aphakte ahung siangthouta hi.
Tuachi`n Jesu`n akiang ah, “Kuamah hilhlou dingin pilvang in, hinanleh pai inla siampu kiang ah vakilak inla; Mosi in sil piak ding achihte valan in, atheihchian na ding un,” achi hi.
Tualeh Jesu Kapernaum khua alut khit takin, galkap zalamkai khat hungpai in a kiangah ahung ngetsak a:
“Toupa, ka silapa jengin inn ah alum a, lauhuaitak in a thuakgim mahmah hi,” achi a,
Tualeh Jesu`n akiang ah, “Kungpai ding a kung damsak ding,” achi a,
Galkap zalamkaipa`n, “Toupa ka inn nang hungpaina ta`k ahikei, hinanleh thu tengkhat genlechin ka suakpa adam ding hi.

Kei zong, mi thuneihna nuai a om ka hi a, kanuai ah galkap a om ua, tualeh khat kiangah, ‘Paiin!’ ka chihleh amah apai a, tualeh adang khat kiangah, ‘Hungpaiin!’ kachihleh amah a hungpai a; tualeh ka silapa kiangah, ‘Hih bawlin!’ ka chihleh aman a bawljel hi,” achia, a dawng a.
Tuachia Jesu`n azaktak in lamdang asa mahmah a a nungjuite kiangah, “Adiktak in kung hilh ahi, Israelte lak ah zong hihbang a ginna thupi ka mungai naikei, achi hi.
Tualeh na kiang uah kung hilh ahi, suahlam leh tumlam a kipan mi tampi a hungpai ding ua, van gam ah: Abraham, Isak leh Jakobte tawh a toukhawm ding uhi.
Hinanleh gam tate pen pualam mial ah paihkhiat in a om ding uhi. Tua-ah kah leh hagawina aom ding,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n Jesu`n galkap zalamkaipa kiangah, “Paita in, na ginta`k bangin nang a dingin bawl ahi ding,” achi hi.
Tualeh hihhun mah in a silapa damsak in a om hi.
Tualeh Jesu Peter inn a a hunglut tak in, asungnu nattun a damloua lum amu hi.
Tualeh aman a khut atham a, tuachi`n a nattun pen adamta hi. Tuachi`n amahnu athou a, ana uh a sepsakta hi.
Tualeh nitaklam ahung hih takin, dawimat mi tampi a kiangah ahung paipih ua, tualeh aman a kam a thu tawh dawite a delhpawt a, tualeh adamlou jousiah a damsaksiang hi.
Jawlnei Isaiah in: “Amah in i hatlouhnate ala a, i natnate a puamang,” chia agenpen hung tuntheihna ding in.
Tualeh Jesu`n a kimkawt a mipi tampite amuhtak in, galkhat lam a pai dingin thu apia a.
Tuachi`n Laigelhmite khat a kiang a hungpai in, “Siapa, Na paina teng ah kungjui ding hi,” a chi a.
Tuachiah Jesu`n a kiangah, “Si-alte`n kua anei ua, tungleng vasate`n zong bu anei, hinanleh Mihing Tapa-in lu-ngaknang mun khoimah ah anei kei,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n a nungjuite lak a khat in akiang ah, “Toupa vapai ningin kapa vavui masaphot ning,” achi hi.
Hinanleh Jesu`n a kiangah, “Hungjui in, misi in a misi uh ana kivui nading uhi,” achi hi.
Tualeh gunkuang sunga a lutkhit takin, a nungjuite`n amah ajui ua.
Thakhat in tuipi tung a kipan huihpi hattakin ahung la`ng a, tuachi`n gunkuang ahung kihotsakta a. Hinanleh amah pen a ihmu lai hi.
Tuachi`n a nungjuite a kiangah a hungpai ua, “Toupa koute hung hundam in! Mangthang ding ka hita uh!” chi`n amah ahung phong ua.
Hinanleh aman akiang uah, “Nou ginna tawmte aw! Bangding a lau nahi ua?” achi a, tuazoh in amah a thoukhia a, huihpi leh tuipi a atai a, tuachi`n ahung daisiang sipsipta hi.
Tualeh mite`n lamdang asa ua, “Hih mipa, bang chibang mi ahia? Huih leh tuipi nangawn in athu aman uh!” achi ua.
Tuachi a Gadara gam langkhat lam a a hungpai takin, dawimat pasal nih han a kipan hungpawt in ahung tuak ua, ahang mahmah ua, tualeh hih lampi ah kuamah a paithei kei uhi.
Tualeh thakhat in ahung kikou khia ua, “Jesu, nang Pasian Tapa, nang leh kou bang kisaina nei ihi hiam? ahun tunma a koute bawlgenthei ding a hihteng a hungpai nahi maw?” achi uhi.
Tualeh a kiang ua kipan gamlalou ah vok-hon tampi aom ua.
Tuachi`n dawite`n, “Koute nung delhpawt ding a ahihleh vok-honte sung a lutding hung phalsak in,” chi`n a kiangah a ngen ua.

Tualeh aman a kianguah, “Pai un,” achi a; tualeh ahung pawtkhiat tak un, vok-honte sungah alutpai ua. Thakhat in vok-hon jousiah ken a kipan ahung taisuk ua, tuipi sungah atailut ua, tuilak ah a mangthangta uhi.
Tuatakin ganchingte atai ua khuapi sungah apai ua, dawimat pasal nihte tungtang a sil omdan leh sil omdan bangkim a hilhta uhi.
Tuachi`n khua a pat mipite hung pawtkhia in Jesu kiangah a hungpai ua, amah amuhtak un, agam uh paisan dingin a ngenta uhi.
Tuachi`n Jesu gunkuang khat ah alut a, agalkai a, ama khuapi ah a hungtungta hi,
tualeh ngaiin, lupna tung a lum jeng khat a kiang ah a hungpua uhi. Jesu`n a ginna uh amuhtak in a jengpa kiangah, “Tapa, kipak in om in! na khialhnate ngaihdam ahita,” achi hi.
Tualeh laigelhmi amau sung a kuahiam khat in, “Hihpa in Pasian agensia!” achi a.
Hinanleh Jesu`n a ngaihsutte uh athei a, “Bangding a na lungsim ua gilou ngaihtuah nahi ua? achi hi.
‘Na khialhna ngaihdam hihen,’ chihleh, ‘Thou inla nakeng in paiin chih khoipen agen baihlam pen dia’?
Hinanleh mihing Tapa in leitung ah khialhnate ngaihdam theihna thuneihna anei chih na theihna ding un.” Tuachi`n aman a jengpa kiangah, “Thou inla, na lupna la inla na inn ah paita in!” achi hi.
Tuachi`n amah athou a a inn ah apaita hi.
Mipite`n hih amuhtak un, lamdang asa ua, huachibang bawltheihna mihingte kiang a piapa, Pasian aphatta uhi.
Tualeh huamun a pan Jesu apaijom jel laiin, siah piakna zum a tou mikhat amin Mathai kichi amu a, aman akiang ah, “Hung juiin,” achi a.
Tuachi`n amah zong adingkhia a ajuipaita hi.
Tualeh hichi ahi a, Jesu a innsung a dohkan geia atoulai in, ngaiin, siahdong mite leh mikhialte a hungpai ua, amah leh a nungjuite kiangah a hungtou ua.
Pharisaite`n tua amuhtak un, a nungjuite kiangah, “Bangding a na siapa un siah dongmite leh mikhialte tawh an nekhawm ahia?” achi ua.
Hinanleh Jesu`n tuabang a jaktak in, aman akiang uah, “Mi chidamte`n daktor a poimoh kei ua, hinanleh damloute`n apoimoh uhi, achi hi.
Hinanleh kithoihna deihlou in zahngaihna ka deih hi, bang chihna hiam chih pai unla vazil un; ‘midikte sam ding a hungpai ka hikei a, mikhialte sam ding a hungpai ka hijaw,’ ” achi hi.
Tuachi`n Johan nungjuite a kiangah a hungpai ua, “Bangding a koute leh Pharisaite`n anngawl jel ung a, hinanleh na nungjuite`n ngawllou uh ahia?” achi ua.

Tuachi`n Jesu`n akiang uah, “Mouneipa amauh toh a omkhawm laiin alawmte`n Mouneipa a su`nngai uh maw? Hinanleh Mouneipa amauh kiangpan lakmang a aom hun a hungtung ding a, tuahun chiangin amauhte`n zong angawl ding uhi, achi hi.
“Kuaman puanlui puan thak toh aphawh ngaikei, a phawhna puanthem in ahung kaikek beh ding a, ahung keksia semsem jaw khading hi.

Kuaman uain thak savun uain thawl lui sungah a thunngai kei uh, atuachih keileh savun thawlte ahung pokkek ding a, a uainte akibua ding a, savun thawl zong ahung sia ding hi. Hinanleh amau`n uain savun thawl thak sungah uain thak athunjaw uh a, tuachi`n anih in a kemhoih tuaktuak uhi,” achi hi.
Hihthute akiang ua agen laitak in, ngaiin, vaihawmpa khat hungpaiin amah chibai ahungbuk a, “Ka tanu tutakin asi a; hungpai inla amahnu tungah nakhut hungkoih lechin ahing ding,” achi a.
Tuachi`n Jesu a dingkhia a anung ajuita a, a nungjuite`n zong ajuichiat ua.
Tualeh thakhat in, kum sawmlehnih sipawt numei khat a nungah hungpai in a puanmong ahung khoih a.
Numeinu`n, “A puan vakhoihkha maimai lengzong, kadam ding hi chi`n amah leh amah a kichi hi.”
Hinanleh Jesu akihei a, amahnu a muhtak in, “Tanu aw, kipaktak in om in! Na ginna in ahung damsakta,” achi a. Tuahun a pat in numeinu ahung damta hi.
Tualeh Jesu vaihawmpa inn ah alut a. Theile mutte leh sisu`n a mipi au vengvungte a vamuh in,
“Pawt un, numei naupangnu asi ahi kei-a ihmu ahi!” chi`n aman akiang uah achi a. Tualeh amauhte`n simmoh takin amah anuihsan ua.
Tuachia mipite a pualam a a nohkhiat khit tak un, amah asung ah alut a, akhut ah atu a, tuatak in numei naupangnu ahung thouta hi.
Tuachi`n hihthu tua gam tengteng ah ahung thangkhiata hi.
Tuachia Jesu tuamun a pat a apawtkhiat laiin, mittaw nih in, “David Tapa, ka tung uah zahngaiin!” chia kikou in anung ajui ua.
Tualeh inn a alut leh mittaw nihte a kiang ah a hungpai ua, Jesu`n akiang uah, “Hihte bawlthei dingin kei nunggingta uh hiam?” achi a. Amau`n a kiang ah,
“Hi, Toupa!” kung gingta uh! achi ua.
Tuachi`n aman amitte uh atham a, “Na gintak bang un, na tung uah tunghen!” achi a,
Tuachi`n amit uh ahung vakta a, tualeh Jesu`n akiang uah, “Kuamah theihlouh dingin pilvang un!” chi`n hahtak in a taihilh a.
Hinanleh amauh a pawtkhia ua, tuagam tengteng ah atanchin a thangsakta uhi.
A pawtkhiat laitak un, ngaiin, dawimat hamtheilou mikhat a kiangah ahung paipih ua.
Tualeh dawipen adelh khiat takin, a hamtheiloupa ahung hamtheita a, tuatak in mipite`n lamdang asa mahmah ua, “Israelte lak ah hihbang a kimu ngaikei!” achi ua.
Hinanleh Pharisaite`n, “Dawite vaihawmpa jal in ahi dawite a hawlkhiat,” achi ua.
Tuachi`n Jesu`n a kikhopna innte uah thu hilh in, van gam tangthupha gen in, damloute tengteng damsak in, natna chiteng damsak in khuapi leh khuaneute ah avak kawikawi hi.
Hinanleh mipite a muhtak in, chingding neilou belamte bang a gimthuak leh kithehthang a aom jiak un amauhte a hehpih mahmah a.
Tuachi`n aman a nungjuite kiangah, “Buh lakding lah atam mahmah a, hinanleh asemmite atawm uhi.
Tuajiakin a buh lading a semdingte sawlding in buh neipa kiangah ngen un,” achi hi.
Tualeh aman nungjui sawmlehnihte a sapkhit in, akiang uah kha-ni`nte tung a thuneihna apia a, amauhte hawlkhia ding leh damlouhna chiteng leh natna chiteng damsak ding in.
Tualeh sawltak sawmlehnihte min ahihleh hihte ahi: amasa penin, Simon, Peter zong kichi leh a sanggampa Andru; Jebedi tapa Jakob leh a sanggampa Johan;
Philip leh Bartholomai; Thoma leh siah dongpa, Mathai, Alphai tapa Jakob leh Lebbai, amin khem Thaddaite;
Kananmi Simon, leh juausan a mansakpa Juda Iskariotte.
Hih sawmlehnihte Jesu`n a sawlkhia a, tualeh hichi`n thu apia a: “Jentelte lampi ah paikei unla, Samaria mite khuapi ah lut kei un.
Hinanleh Israel nam belam mangte kiangah paijaw un, achi hi.
‘Tualeh na pailai un, van gam anaita!’ chi`n tangthupha genjel un.
Damloute damsak unla, phakte bawlsiangthou unla, misite kaithou unla, dawite hawlkhia unla, athawn a na muh uh ahi a, athawn in pia un.
Na dangka bawm kawnggak uah kham hiam, sumsan hiam, daan dangka hiam kengkei un;
na khualhawhna a dingin thungpi hiam, puan-ak nih hiam, khedap hiam, chiangkhut hiam kengkei un, nasemmi pen anek mutak ahi.
“Tualeh khuapi hi`n khua khat peuhpeuh ah nalut chiang un, nou hungtungsak theiding mi zongkhia unla, na pawtkhiat masiah uh tuamun ah om kinken un.
Tualeh innsung a nalut ding chiang un, ‘Chibai buk un.’
Inn neite khamuanna tangtak ahih uleh, na khamuanna thu uh atung uah tung hen, ahihhang in khamuanna tangtak ahihkei uleh na khamuanna thu uh noukiang ah hung kileh kik hen.
Tualeh kuapeuh nou hung vaitun nuam loua, nathu uh zong angaihnuam kei uleh, tua inn a kipan hiam, khuapi a kipan a na paichiang un, na kengphang ua leivui thingkhia un.
Adiktak in na kiang uah kung hilh ahi, thukhenni chiangin tua khuapite sangin Sodom leh Gomorrah gamte thuak ding adan a omjaw ding hi.
“Ngaiin! ngia lak a belam om bangin kung sawlkhia hi. Tuajiakin gul bangin pil unla, vakhu bangin poikhoihlou in om un.
Hinanleh mihing lak ah pilvang un, denchiah vaihawmmite maiah a hungtun kha ding ua, a kikhopna inn lak uah ahung jep kha ding uhi.
Tualeh keimah jiakin gam vaihawmtute leh kumpipate maiah Jentelte leh amauhte dikna lahna dingin nou ahung paipih ding ua.
Hinanleh tuachia nou ahung piakkhiat hun chiang un bang chiding, bang gen ding ka hia chi`n lungkham kei un; na gen ding uh ahuntak in na kiang uah piak in na om ding uhi.
A genpa pen noumah na hikei ding ua, hinanleh na Pa uh kha in noumah sung pan in agen nading hi.
“Tuin thah dingin a sanggampa`n a sanggampa amansak ding a, pa in a tate a mansak ding a, tate in anu leh apa a dou ding ua; a thatsak ding uhi.
Tualeh ka min jiakin mijousiah huat nahi ding ua, hinanleh kuapeuh atawptan a thuakjoute hundam ahi ding uhi.
Hinanleh hih khuapi a ahung gawt uleh khuapi dang ah taikhia un. Adiktak in na kiang uah kung hilh ahi, Mihing Tapa a hungpai masiah Israel khuapite na tuansuak kei ding uhi.
“Nungjui khat pen a siapa tung ah a omngai kei; sila khat zong apu tung ah a omngai kei.
Nungjui khat a siapa banga a om, tualeh sila khat zong apu banga aom ahun hi. Innneipa bawn Beelzebul chia asap uleh, a inn kuanpihte bangzah in ahahchih sem tading ua le!
“Tuajiakin amauhte laukei un. A kilanglou ding a phual bangmah a omkei a, tualeh theihlouh ding a im bangmah a omkei hi.
Mialnuai a nou kung thuhilh jousiah, va`k ah gen unla, tualeh na bilkawm ua na ja`kte uh inntung vum pan in phuangkhia un.
Tualeh taksa pumpi thatthei hinanleh kha thattheiloute laukei unla; hinanleh meidil a ataksa pumpi leh kha anih a hihmang theipa, amah laujaw un.
Vatou nih daan dangka khat in a juakjel uh hilou maw? Ahihhangin alak ua khat zong na Pa uh theihlouh in tual ah akiakei ding hi.
Hinanleh, na lutung ua samzangte nangawn simsiang ahi.
Tuajiakin lau kei un; vatou tampi sang in na manpha jaw uhi!
“Tuajiakin kuapeuh mite mai a kei hunggum jousiah, ken zong van a om ka Pa maiah amah ka gum ding hi.
Hinanleh kuapeuh mite mai a kei hung kitheihmoh bawl jousiah, ken zong van a om ka Pa maiah ka kitheihmoh bawl ding hi.
“Leitung ah lemna tunding a hungpai hungsa kei un. Lemna lengsak ding a hungpai ka hikei a, namsau lengsak ding a hungpai ka hijaw hi.
Tapa in apa, tanu in anu, mou in a inpinu dousak ding a hungpai ka hi hi;
tualeh mi agalte amah innkuanpihte lak a mi mah ahi ding.
“Kuapeuh anu hiam apa hiam kei sang a itjawte pen kami hitaklou ahi uhi. Tualeh kuapeuh atanu hiam atapa hiam kei sang a itjawte zong kami hitaklou ahi uhi.
Tualeh kuapeuh a kross pua a ka nung hungjuiloute pen kami hitaklou ahi uhi.
Kuapeuh ahinna mu in ata`n ding a, tualeh kuapeuh kei jiaka ahinna ta`n in amu ding uhi.
“Kuapeuh nou hung kipahpihte pen kei hung kipahpih ahi a, tualeh kuapeuh kei hung kipahpihte pen kei hung sawlpa kipahpih ahi uhi.
Kuapeuh Jawlneite Jawlnei ahihjiak a kipahpih in Jawlnei nuamman amu ding. Tualeh kuapeuh midiktatte midiktat ahih jiak a kipahpih in midiktat nuamman amu ding.
Tualeh kuapeuh hih mineute lak a khat kiang a nungjui ahih jiaka tuivot noukhat mai piate zong, adiktak in kung hilh ahi, a nuamman muh ding ata`n kei ding uhi.”
Tualeh hichi ahi a, Jesu`n a nungjui sawmlehnihte thu apiak zawzawh in, hua a kipan in hilhding leh a thupuak gen ding in a khuapite uah apaita hi.
Tualeh Krist nasepte Johan in thongsung pan a anajak takin, a nungjuite lak a pan mi nih sawl in,
a kiangah, “Hung paidingpa nahi hiam, ahihkeileh midang na ngaklai ding ka hi uh hiam?” achisak a.
Jesu`n a kiang uah, “Pai unla sil na muhte uleh na jakte uh Johan vahilh un:

Mittawte a mit uh avakta, kengbaite a paitheita ua, phakte zong ahung siangthouta ua, tualeh bilbingte`n zong ahung jatheita ua, misite zong kaihthoh in ahung omta ua tualeh mijawngte`n zong akiang ua tangthupha kigen asangta uhi.
Kuapeuh Ka tung a lung hihmohna neilou mi pen ahampha uhi!” chi`n ana dawng hi.
Amauhte apaikhit tak-un, Jesu`n mipite kiangah Johan thu a genta a: “Bang en ding a gamdai a paikhia nahi ua? Pumpeng huihmut ling maw?
Ahihkeileh bang en ding a paikhia nahi ua? Puannem silh mi khat maw? Ataktak in, puannem silh mite kumpipate inn ah ahi aom uh!
Ahihkeileh kua en ding a pawtkhia nahi ua? Jawlnei en ding in maw? Hitalua kungchi ahi, Jawlnei sang a thupijaw zong.
‘En in, ka tangkou na maiah ka sawl, namai a nalampi sial ding in, chih a tanchin agelh uh tua mipa ahi.’
Adiktak in na kiang uah kung hilh ahi, numei suan lak ah baptispa Johan sang a thupijaw kuamah asuakkhia kei. Hinanleh van gam a neupen khat zong amah sang in a thupijaw hi.
Tualeh baptispa Johan hun a kipan tutan in van gam in hiamngamna atuak jel a, hiamngamte`n hatthu in ala uhi.
Jawlneite jousiah leh da`nthu in Johan ahung om tanpha in ana genkholh jel uhi.
Tualeh noute`n na sangnuam ua ahihleh hihpen Elijah ahung paidingpa mah ahi.
Kuapeuh, ja`kna ding bilnei jousiahin, ja hen!
“Hinanleh, tu-khang bangtawh ka teh dia? Naupang vanjuakna mun a tou a, alawite sam a,
‘theile hung tumsak ung a, lamlou uchin a; su`n ung a, lah kaplou uchin a, chihte bang ahi uh.’
Johan hungpai a, a ne-in a dawnkei a, ‘Dawinei ahi!’ achi ua,
Mihing Tapa a hungpai a, a ne-in a dawn a, amauhte`n, ‘En un, anhaipa, uain haipa, siah dongte leh mikhialte lawm!’ achi jel ua. Hinanleh pilna pen asil bawlte`n siam atan hi, achi hi.”
Tuachi`n a kisik louh jiak un a silthupi bawlna khuapite atai a.
“Korazin, natung agik hi! Bethsaida, natung agik hi! Na kiang a silthupi kibawlte Tura leh Sidon a kibawl hileh, sawtpi a pan la-ip silh a vutlak ah touin a kisik khin tading uhi!
Hinanleh na kiang uah kung hilh ahi, thukhenni chiangin nou thuak ding sangin Tura leh Sidon thuak ding athuak nuamjaw ding hi!
Tualeh nang Kapernaum! Van tan a tawisang, misikhua ah puaksuk in na om ding! na kiang a silthupi kibawlte Sodom a kibawl hileh, tunitan in a omlai ding!
Hinanleh na kiangah kung hilh ahi, thukhenni chianga na thuak ding sangin Sodom gam thuak ding athuak nuamjaw ding hi!”
Tuahun laitak in Jesu`n adawng a, “Pa aw, leitung leh van Toupa! Nang mipilte kiang leh misiamte kiangah hih thute na im a, naupang noute kiang a na kiphuan jiakin ka kipak hi.
Ahi, Pa, tuachibang pen nang ngaih in ahoih hi.
“Ka pa`n sil bangkim ahung kemsakta. Pa loungal kuamah in Tapa athei kei, Tapa-in atheihsak utnate chihlouh ngal kuamah in Pa atheikei.
“Nou semgim leh puakgik puate aw, ka kiangah hungpai un, keiman tawldamna kung pia ding.
Ka hakkol pua unla keia pan zil un. Nunnem leh kingiamkhiat tak ka hi; tuachi`n na kha ua dingin tawldamna na mu ding uhi.
Ka hakkol anuam a, apuak zong a jang hi,” achi hi.
Tuahun in, Jesu khawlni in buhleilai kan in apai a, tualeh a nungjuite agil uh akial a, buhvuite asiktan ua aneta uhi.
Hinanleh Pharisaite`n hua amuhtak un a kiangah, “En in, na nungjuite`n khawlni a bawl ding a sianglou abawl uh!” achi ua.
Hinanleh aman a kiang uah, “David in agilkiallai ua alawite tawh abawl uh simkhalou nahi uhiam?
Tuachia Pasian inn a lut a, amah leh alawite`n nek sianglou, siampute guak neksiang tanghou koih anek thu uh.
Ahihkeileh, khawlni in tempul sung a siampu omten khawlni azahlouh ua zong siamtan in a omjel uh chih da`nthu ah simkhalou nahi uhiam?
Hinanleh hihsan ah Pasian tempul sang a thupijaw khat aom chih na kiang uah kung hilh ahi.
Ahihhang in nou, kithoihna deihlou in zahngaihna ka deih chih a omdan na theikhinta hile uchin, mawhna neiloute mawhpaihlou ding hi uchin a;
Mihing Tapa jaw khawlni Toupa ahi,” achi hi.
Tualeh huasan a pan apaikhiat khit takin, a kikhopna inn uah ava lut a,
ngaiin, huasan ah khutjeng mi khat ana om a. Amah amohmat theihna ding un, “khawlni a sukdam asiang diam?” chi`n adong ua.
Tuachi`n aman a kiang uah, “Noute lak ah kuahiam in belam khat nei unla, khawlni in kuakhuk ah kiataleh, kua ahia tu a kaikhialou ding?
Belam khat sang in mihing khat bangzahta a manphajaw ahiam! Tuajiakin, khawlni a silhoih bawl asiang hi,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n aman hua mipa kiangah, “Na khut jankhia in,” achi a.
Tuachi`n ajan a, akhut langkhat bangin a damsiangta hi.
Tuachi`n Pharisaite apawt khia ua amah a thahtheih nang dan ding uh ngaihsun in a kihou ua.
Hinanleh Jesu`n hih atheihtak in, hua a kipan in aki hemmangta a; tualeh mi tampi`n amah ajui ua, ana damsak siang a,
aman a tanchin athansak louhna ding un ataihilh hi.
Tuapen Jawlnei Isaiah in:
“En in, ka sila, katel,
ka ittak, ka lungsim in apahtat mahmah,
ka kha a tungah ka koih ding a,
tualeh aman Jentelte kiangah thudik a vaihawmna thu a phuangkhia ding.
A selkei ding a, a kikou kei ding,
khualai kongjing lak ah kuaman a aw ajakei ding.
Thudik a vaihawmna a gualzoh sak mateng,
pumpeng gaw ahihtan kei ding.
Meivak kuang leplep ahihmit kei ding,
tualeh amah ah Jentelte`n kinepna anei ding uh,
chia anagente ahung tangtun theihna ding in.”
Tuachi`n dawimat mittaw leh hamtheilou khat a kiangah ahung paipih ua, aman ana damsak a, tuachi`n mittaw leh hamtheilou mipa`n hung mutheiin ahung hamtheita hi.
Tuachi`n mipi tengteng in lamdang asa mahmah ua; “Hihpa David tapa hilou amaw?” achi ua.
Hinanleh Pharisaite`n ajaktak un, “Hihpa dawite vaihawmpa Beelzebul jiak louin dawite a hawlkhiathei kei ding,” achi uhi.
Hinanleh Jesu`n a ngaihsut uh athei a akiang uah, “Gam khatpeuh kikhen a kidou pen a kisiagawp ding a, tualeh khuapi ahihkeileh innkuan khat kikhen a kidou pen a khuasuak kei ding.
Tualeh setan in setanmah a hawlkhiat leh amah leh amah kidou asuak ding a, agam bangchi`n ading tadiai!
Tualeh Kei Beelzebul jiak a dawite hawlkhia kahihleh na tate un kuajiak a ahawlkhiat ata diai le? Tuajiakin amauhte noute tung a thukhenmite ahi ding uhi!
Hinanleh Kei Pasian kha jiak a dawite hawlkhia kahihleh, Pasian gam na kiang uah hungtung ahita hi.
“Ahihkeileh, min mihatpa ka`n masa loupi`n bangchi`n mihatpa inn a lut in avante alathei dia? Ka`n masa in tuazoh chiangin a inn asuksiat sak pan ding hi.
“Kuapeuh kei lam a pangloute, kei hungdou ahi ua, kuapeuh ahung lakkhawmpih loute athehjak ahi uhi.
Tuajiakin na kiang uah kung hilh ahi: mi akhialhna jousiah uh leh Pasian a gensiatna jousiah uh ngaihdam ahi ding a; hinanleh kha hilhial gensiatna pen ngaihdam ahikei ding.
Kuapeuh Mihing Tapa kalh a thu gen pen, ngaihdam ahi ding a; hinanleh khasiangthou kalha thu gen pen, tuin zong, hun hungtung ding ah zong ngaihdam ahikei ding hi.
“Singkung ahoih agah zong ahoih; nachih kei ding uleh, singkung asia, agah zong asia, chivanglak un, singkung agah a kithei ahihjiak in.
Nou gulsuante aw! Gilou napi`n nou bangchi`n thuhoih na genthei ding ua? Lungsim a dimlet kam in agen jel hi.
Mihoih in agoubawm hoih sung a kipan silhoihte ahung lakhia a; migilou in a goubawm hoihlou sung a kipan silhoihloute ahung lakhia jel hi.
“Hinanleh na kiang uah kung hilh ahi, mi`n akam ua thuginalou agen jousiah uh, tuathu pen vaihawmni chiangin agen ding.
Na thuin siam ahung tangsak ding a, na thu mah in siamlouh ahung tangsak ding hi.”
Tuachi`n Pharisaite leh Laigelhmite`n akiang ah adong ua, “Siapa, na kiang a pan chiamtehna kamu ut uh,” achi ua.

Hinanleh aman adawng a akiang uah, “Khangthak giloutak leh angkawm hatte`n chiamtehna azong ua, hinanleh Jawlnei Jona chiamtehna chihlouh akiang uah chiamtehna dang mawng mawng piak ahikei ding,” achi hi.
Jona nithum leh ja`nthum ngapi gilsung a aom bangin; Mihing Tapa zong nithum leh ja`nthum leigil sungah aom ding hi.
Ninevi khua mite thukhenni chiangin tulai khangthakte tawh ahung ding ding ua, siamlouh atangsak ding uh; Jona thugenna a akisiktak jiak un. Ataktak in Jona sang a lianjaw hihsan ah a om hi!

Simlam kumpinu thukhenni chiangin tulai khangthakte toh ahung thoukhawm ding ua, siamlouh atangsak ding, Solomon pilna ngaikhia dingin bawn leitawp a kipan a a hungpai jiakin. Ataktak in Solomon sang a lianjaw hihsan ah a om hi!
“Tuachi`n kha nin mihing a kipan ahung pawtdok a, omna ding zong in mun-gaw lak ah avak a, amukei hi,
Tuachi`n aman, ‘Ka pawtkhiatna ka inn mah ah ka nungkik mai ding achi a.’ Tuachia a hungpai leh ahawm, phiatsiang leh zepsa a om in amu a.

Tuachi`n apai a amah sang a hoihloujaw kha nin adang sagih avapui a, huasan ah lut in, atengta ua, tuachi`n hua mipa omdan nunung pen amasapen sang in ahung siajawta hi. Tuamah bangin tulai khangthak giloute tungah ahung om ding,” chi`n adawng hi.
Mipite lak a thu agen laiin, ngaiin, anu leh a sanggamte amah houpih sawm in inn pualam ah ading uhi.
Tuachi`n mi khat in a kiangah, “En in, nanu leh na sanggamte nang hung houpih nuam in inn pualam ah ading ding uhi,” achi hi.
Hinanleh aman akiang a vahilhpa kiangah, “Ka nu kua ahia? Ka sanggamte zong kua ahi ua?” achi a, adawng a.
Tuachi`n aman a nungjuite lam nga in akhut azankhia a, “Hihsan ah ka nu leh ka sanggamte a om uh! achi a, adawng a.
Van a om ka Pa deihlam bawlte ka sanggampa, ka sanggamnu leh ka nu ahi,” achi hi.
Tuani mah in Jesu inn a pat a pawtkhia a tuipi geiah atou a.
Tuachi`n mipi tampitak a kiangah ahung kikhawm ua, tuachi`n amah gunkuang sungah atuang a, mipite piaugei ah ading uhi.
Tuachi`n aman a kiang uah gentehna tampi agen a.
“Ngaiun, khaichi thehpa khaichi theh in a kuankhia hi.
Tualeh athehlaiin, khaichi khenkhat lamsik ah atu a, vasate hungpaiin ane siangta uhi.
Khenkhat suangsilei lak ah atu a, leitak atamlouh jiakin ahung poupai a.
Hinanleh ni ahung suah in haivul in ahung om a; thagui thuklut aneihlouh jiak un a gawsiangta uhi.
Tualeh akhen ling lak ah atu a, lingte hungkhang in amauhte a depmangta hi.
Hinanleh adangte leihoih lak ah atu a, hungkhang in gah hungnei in: akhen in zakhat, akhen in sawmguk, akhen in sawmthum bang.”
“Kuapeuh ja`kna ding bil nei jousiahin ja heh!” achi hi.
Tualeh a nungjuite hungpaiin a kiang ah, “Bang ding a amauh kiang a gentehna a thu gen nahia?” achi ua.
“Aman adawng a akiang uah, ajiak van gam thugu`k pen noute theihding a piak nahita ua, hinanleh amauhte piak ahinai kei.
Kuapeuh aneite piak behlap ahi ding a, ahau ding, hinanleh kuapeuh aneiloute, aneihsun zong amah a pan laksak ahi ding.
Tuajiakin akiang uah gentehna in thu ka gen ding ahi, munapi-in a muthei kei ua, zana pi-in a zathei kei ua, a theithei kei uh.
Tuachi`n Jawlnei Isaiah in ana genkholh atung uah ahung tangtungta hi:
‘Jak jaw naja ding ua, hinanleh na theithei kei ding uh;
tualeh muhjaw na mu ding ua, hinanleh na muthei kei ding uh,
hih mite lungtang a nguaigawpta,
abilte uh abing a,
tualeh amit asi`ngta uhi.
Atuachih keileh amit un a mukha ding ua,
abil un ajakha ding ua,
alungtang un atheisiam kha ding ua,
ahung kinungleh kha ding ua,
amauh kana damsak kha ding achia,’
ana chih pen.
“Hinanleh nou mit pen ahampha hi amuh jiak in! Nabil uh zong ahampha hi ajak jiak in.
Adiktak in kung hilh ahi, Jawlnei tampi leh midik tampi in zong na silmuhte uh muh a ut ua, hinanleh amukei uh, na silzakte uh zong jak a ut ua, hinanleh azakei uhi.
“Tuajiakin, khaichi thehpa gentehna thu ngai un.
Kuahiam khat in kumpi gam thu ajak a, tuapen a theihsiam keileh, migilou khat hungpaia a lungtang a thehsa pen ahung laksak hi. Hihpen lamsik a khaichi tute ahi uhi.
Hinanleh kuapeuh suangsilei lak a khaichi tute ahihleh, thu aja a kipaktak in apompai hi.
Hinanleh amah ah thagui thuklut aneihlouh jiakin tomnoukhat sung a om a, thu jiak a gimthuakna hiam, gawtna hiam ahung om takin apukpai hi.
Kuapeuh ling lak a khaichi tute ahihleh thu ja a, leitung awlmohna leh hauhsakna khemna in thu a dep a, gahlou in ahung omta hi.
Hinanleh kuapeuh leihoih lak a khaichi tute ahihleh thu ja a, theisiam ahi: tuachi`n gah anei takpi a, akhen zakhat bang, akhen sawmguk bang, akhen sawmthum bang a hung pungte ahi uh,” achi hi.
Gentehna dang akiang uah agen kik a: “Van gam ahihleh mi alou a khaichi hoih thehpa tawh teh ahi.
Hinanleh louneipa a ihmut kal in, agalpa hungpaiin buhtak lak ah buhkhem atheh a apaimangta hi.
Tuachi`n buh ahung pou a, ahung vuih takin buhkhem zong ahung kilang a.
Tuachi`n innneipa silate hung paiin akiang ah, ‘Pu, lou ah khaichi hoih thehlou nahi hiam; buhkhem ahung om bang chidan ahia?’ achi ua.
Aman akiang uah, ‘Melma bawl ahi,’ achi hi. A silate`n akiang ah, ‘Huate vapai a kavalak uh nungphal hiam?’ achi ua.
Hinanleh aman, ‘Phallou e, atuachih keileh buhkhem na lakna lak uah buhtak zong na bawtkhawm kha ding uh.

Buhlak hun dongin poukhawm phot uhen, buhlak hun chiangin buhlate kiangah, amasa in buhkhemte lakhawm phot masa unla, hal dingin kankhawm un, tualeh buhtakte ka buh inn ah koihkhawm un, kachi na ding achi hi.’”
Gentehna dang akiang uah a genkik a: “Van gam pen ankam tang chi mi`n alak a alou a atheh tawh kibang ahi.
Khaichi tang lak ah neupen ahi a, hinanleh ahung pousang chiangin loupa dang sang in alianjaw a, sing ahung suak a, tuachi`n tungleng vasate a hungpai ua, aba lak ah agiak uh,” achi hi.
Gentehna dang akiang uah agen kik a: “Van gam ahihleh tol numei in alak a annel tehna thum lak a atheh a, athawh masiah aphum tawh kibang ahi,” achi hi.
Hihte tengteng Jesu`n gentehna in mipite kiangah agen a; gentehna louin akiang uah bangmah agen kei hi.
Jawlnei in Gentehna in,
“Ka kam ka kak ding a,
leitung pianchil a kipan sil kisel ka genkhia ding,”
chia agen ahung tangtun theihna ding in.
Tuachi`n Jesu`n mipite khakhia in innsung ah alutta a, tualeh a nungjuite akiang ah hungpai in, “Lou a buhkhemte gentehna thu kou kiangah hung hilhchian in,” achi ua.
Aman adawng a akiang uah, “Khaichi hoih thehpa pen Mihing Tapa ahi a;
alou ahihleh leitung ahi a, khaichi hoihte ahih uleh van gam tate ahi uh a; tualeh buhkhemte pen migilou tate ahi uhi;
melma athehpa ahihleh dawi gilou ahi a, buhlak hun ahihleh huntawpni ahi a, buh atte ahihleh vantungmite ahi uhi.”
Tuajiakin buhkhemte a lakkhawm ua mei a ahal mah bang un, hun tawpni chiangin a om ding:
Mihing Tapa in vantungmite asawl ding a, a kumpi gam a kipan in siatna sil bawlte leh mikhialte tengteng a khawmkhia ding ua,
haltuina meipi lak ah amauhte apai ding hi. Tuamun ah kah leh hagawina aom ding hi.
Tuahun chiangin midiktatte ahihleh a Pa uh kumpi gam ah nisa bang in avakta ding uhi, jakna ding bilnei jousuah in ja uhen!
Gentehna dang ahihleh, “Van gam ahihleh lou a gou kiphualdap bang ahi, tuapen mi`n amuh a aphualdap a, a kipak sengseng jiakin apai a aneih jousiah a zuaksiang a tua lou alei hi.”
Tualeh van gam pen sumsinmi tuikepsuang hoih zong bang ahi kik hi,
aman tuikep suang mantam tak khat amu a, aneih jousiah azuak a aleita hi.
“Tualeh, van gam ahihleh ngen, tuipi a khuh a namchin tuamkhawm bang ahi kik hi.
Tuapen adim chiangin, apiau ah a kaikhia ua, atou ua: ahoihteng bawm sung ah akhum ua ahoihlou teng apai uhi.
Huntawpni chiangin huachi bang in aom ding, vantungmite ahung paikhia ding ua, midiktat lakpan in mikhialte a khenkhia ding ua
tualeh amauhte haltuina meidil ah apai ding uh, tuamun ah kah leh hagawina a om ding hi.”
Jesu`n akiang uah, “Hih silte jousiah na theisiam uai?” achi a. Amauhte`n akiang ah,
“Hi, Toupa,” achi ua.
Tuachi`n Jesu`n akiang uah, “Tuajiakin laigelhmi van gam hilh a om jousiah, innneipa a goubawm a kipan a sillui leh silthak hung pholhkhia bang ahi,” achi hi.
Tualeh hichi ahi a, Jesu`n hihbang gentehna thute agenzoh in tuamun a kipan in a pawtkhiata a
tuachi`n a omna khua a hungtung a, a kikhopna inn uah amauhte thu ahilh a, amauhte`n lamdang asa mahmah ua, “Hih mipa`n pilna leh hihbang sil thupi septheihna khoia akilak ahia?
Hihpa sing bawlsiampa tapa hilou amaw? Anu Mari kichi hilou amaw, tualeh a sanggamte Jakob, Joseph, Simon leh Judah hilou uh maw?
Tualeh a sanggam numeite eite tawh omkhawm hilou maw? Hihpa`n khoisan a kipan a hihte jousiah mu ahia?” achi ua.
Tuachi`n a tungah ahehta ua, hihnanleh Jesu`n akiang uah, “Jawlnei jaw ama khualam leh ama innlam ah chihlouh ngal pahtawi louh in a om kei,” achi hi.
Tualeh agintat louh jiak un tuamun ah nasep thupi dang atambawl kei hi.
Huahun laitakin Herod in, Jesu tanchin anaja a.
Tuachi`n a silate kiangah, “Hihpen baptispa Johan ahi, sihna a pan thoukik ahitave, Tuajiak a hihbang sil bawltheihna ten amah ah nasem ahi,” achi hi.
Herod in a sanggampa Philip zi Herodia jiakin Johan aman a, ahen a, thong ah akhumta hi.
Johan in a kiangah, “Amahnu naneih asiang kei!” achihsak jiak in.
Tualeh aman Johan thah utnanleh, Jawlnei a asim jiak un mipite alau hi.
Hinanleh Herod pianni aloptak un, Herodia tanu amai uah ahung lam a, Herod a kipaksak mahmah hi.
“Tuajiakin amahnu anget taphot piak dingin kichiamthu a chiamta hi!”
Tuachi`n amahnu`n anu thuhilhna bang in, “Baptispa Johan lutang kuang khat in hiah hungpia in!” achi a.
Kumpipa a lungkhamta a, hinanleh zong a thuchiamsa leh touna a atoukhawm pihte jiakin piak dingin thu apiata hi.
Tuachi`n mi asawl a, thong sung a Johan lutang ava tansakta hi.
Tuachi`n Johan lutang kuang khat tawh hungtawiin numei naupangnu kiangah apia ua, aman anu kiangah apaipihta hi.
A nungjuite hungpaiin, aluang alakhia ua, avui ua Jesu avahilhta uhi.
Jesu`n huathu ajaktak in, gamdai lam ah gunkuang in atuampaita a. Hinanleh mipite`n tua ajaktak un, khua a kipan keng in amah ajuita uhi.
Tuachia Jesu ahung paikhiat takin, mipi tampi amu a; amauhte lainatna mahmah tawh a hungpai a, adamlou uh a sukdamsak hi.

Nitaklam ahung hih in a nungjuite a hungpai ua a kiangah, “Hihteng gamgotna mun ahi a, hun azekaita hi. Khuate a pai a amauh a ding chiat nek ding a kileitheihna ding un hih mipite sawlkhiata in,” achi ua.
Hinanleh Jesu`n a kiang uah, “Amauhte paikhiat angai kei,” “Noute`n amauhte nek ding sil themkhat pia un!” achi hi.
Tualeh amau`n a kiangah, “Hiah tanghou phelnga leh ngasa nih ka nei uh,” achi ua.
Aman a kiang uah, “Hung tawi un,” achi hi.

Tuachi`n aman mipite loupa tung a tou dingin thu apia a; tanghou phelnga leh ngasa nihte ala a, vantung lam entou in gual ajawl a, abalkek a, nungjuite`n mipite kiang a ahawm ding un apia hi. Tuachi`n nungjuite`n mipite kiang ah apia uhi.
Tuachi`n aun un ane ua avahchiatta uhi. Anekval nengte uh lawh dim sawmlehnih bang aval nalai hi.
Anete numei leh naupang simlouh in piching ngen zong sangnga bang ahi uhi.
Mipite a sawlkhiat kal a, anapai a, galkhat lam na galkah masa dingin nungjuite gunkuang ah a tousak a.
Tualeh mipite a sawlmang zoh in thum dingin mualtung lam ah amahguak in apaitou a. Tualeh nitaklam ahung hih in huamun ah amahguak in a om hi.
Hinanleh gunkuang pen tuipi lai ah a omta a, huih in alehlam a asawn jiakin, tuihual in asepta hi.
Tualeh phalvak kuan in Jesu tuipi tung a keng a paiin, akiang lam uh a hungjuan a.
Tualeh nungjuite`n amah tuipi tung a keng a pai amuh tak un, abuaita ua, “Sikha hi ei!” chi`n, lau in a kikoukhia ta uhi.
Hinanleh Jesu`n amauh a houpihpai a, “Khamuangtak in om un! Keimah ka hi, laukei un!” achi hi.
Tuachi`n Peter in a dawng a akiang ah, “Toupa, nangmah nahihleh tuitung a na kiang a kungpaina ding thu hungpia in,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n aman, “Hungpai in!” achi a. Peter gunkuang a kipan kumkhia in Jesu lam juanin tuitung ah keng in ahung paita hi.
Hinanleh huihlang vengvung a muhtak in, alauta a tuachi`n tum ding in akisa a; “Toupa hung hundam in!” chi`n a kikoukhia hi.
Tuachi`n Jesu`n ajamphei paia, aman a akiang ah, “Aw nang ginna tawm! Bangding a ginglah nahia,” achi hi.
Tualeh gunkuang sung a atuankhit tak un huihpi ahung daita hi.
Tualeh gunkuang a tuangte hungpai in, “Pasian Tapa taktak nahi hi!” chi`n amah ahung bia uhi.
Galkhat lam ahung galkai uleh, Genesaret gam a hungtung ua,
tualeh huamun a mite`n amah a theihtak un, huakim a gam tengteng ah mi asawl ua, damlou jousiah a kiangah ahung paipih uhi.
Tuachi`n apuan mong khat bek thamtheih ding a ngen ngutngut ua, athamkha jousiah ahung damjel uhi.
Tuachi`n Jerusalem khua a om Pharisaite leh laigelhmite Jesu kiangah a hungpai ua,
“Bangding a na nungjuite upate thugousiah banglou tak a om uh ahia? An anek chiang un akhut uh asilngai kei uh!” achi ua.
“Hinanleh aman adawng a akiang uah, bangding a nou zong na thugousiah jiak ua, Pasian thupiak danlou bang tak a om nahi ua? achi hi.
Pasian in, ‘Na nu leh napa zaktak in, Kuapeuh anu hiam apa hiam gensiate pen si teitei heh,’ achi hi.
Hinanleh nou, kuapeuh anu hiam apa hiam kiang a, ‘Kei a kipan a phattuamna na muh ding jousiah uh Pasian kiang ah piak ahita,’ chi jousiahin, anu leh apa azah ding ahikei nachi ua,
Tuachi`n, na thugousiah jiak un Pasian thu pen bangmahlou na suaksakta uhi.
Nou lepchiahte! Isaiah in na tungtang thu uh ana genkholh dik mahmah hi!
“ ‘Hih mite`n akam un a hungnaih ua, amuk un a hungzah ua,
hinanleh a lungtang un ahung gamlat uhi.
A thuhilhna uah mihing thupiak ahilh jiak un,
ahung biak uh pannabei ahi, chi in a dawng hi!’ ”
Tuachi`n mipite asam a akiang uah, “Ja unla theisiam un!
Kam a lut mihing ninsak a pang ahikei; hinanleh, kam a pawt hua in mihing aninsakjaw,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n a nungjuite a hungpai ua a kiangah, “Pharisaite`n hua thu ajaktak un aheh uh chih nathei ei?” achi ua.
Hinanleh aman a dawnga akiang uah, “Kung tengteng van a ka Pa suanlouh jousiah bawhkhiat in aom ding,” achi hi.
“Amauhte awlmoh kei un! Amauh mittaw lak a mittaw lamkaite ahi uh: Mittaw in mittaw mah a lamkaihleh kawkhuk ah a kiakhawm ding uh, achi hi.”
Tuachi`n Peter in a dawng a akiang ah, “Hih gentehna kou kiangah hung hilhchian in,” chi`n adong a.
Tuachi`n Jesu`n, “Tutan a nou zong theihsiamna neilou a om nalai nahi uh maw.
Kam a lut jousiah gilsung ah alut a, dailenna ah paihkhiat in a om chih theinailou lai nahi uh maw?
Hinanleh kam a pawtte pen lungtang a kipan-a hungpawt ahi ua, huate mah in mihing aninsakjaw hi.
Lungtang a kipan in ngaihtuahna giloute, tualthahnate, angkawmnate; kingaihnate guktatnate, heknate, gensiatnate hungpawt veu hi.
Hihte ahi mihing ninsak, khut sillou a annek in mi a ninsakkei,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n Jesu hua a kipan in apawt a, Tura leh Sidon gam lam ah apaita hi.
Tualeh ngaiin, hua gam a kipan Kanan numei khat a hungpawt a, “Aw Toupa, David Tapa! Ka tungah zahngaiin! Ka tanu dawiin aman a agim mahmah,” chi`n a kikou hi.
Hinanleh aman kamkhat in zong a dawng kei hi. Tualeh a nungjuite hungpaiin a kiangah, “I nungah aki koukou a! Paisak maiin,” chi`n ahung ngen ua.
Hinanleh aman a dawng a, “Israel nam belam mangte kiang chihlouhngal ah sawl ka hikei,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n numeinu a hungpai a, “Toupa hung panpih in!” chi`n chibai a hungbuk hi.
Hinanleh aman a dawng a, “Tate tanghou laksak a, uinoute kiang a paih akilawm kei,” achi hi.
“Toupa, hihjaw ahia, Hilehzong uite`n apu an nekna dohkan pan a tanghou them kia anejel ve uale,” achi a.
Tuatakin Jesu`n akiang ah, “Aw numei, na ginna thupi na tazen e! Na deih bangtak in na tungah omta hen,” achi a, adawng a. Tuachi`n a tanu huahun mahmah in ahung damta hi.
Tualeh Jesu hua a pat in a paikhia a, Galili tuipi gei a hungtung a. Tualeh mual ah a paitou a, huasan ah atouta hi.

Tuachi`n mipi tamtak, kengbaite, mittawte, hamtheiloute, piangsualte leh midang tampi tonpih in a kiangah a hungpai uhi. Tualeh Jesu kengbul ah amauhte asial ua; tuachi`n aman amauhte ana damsak chiatta hi.

Tuachia hamtheiloute ahung hamtheih ua, piangsualte a hunghoih ua, kengbaite keng a pai a, mittawte`n ahung mutheita uh chih amuhtak un; mipite`n lamdang asa mahmah ua, tuachi`n Israelte Pasian a pahtawita uhi.

Tuachi`n Jesu`n a nungjuite a kiangah asam a, “Mipite tuin ka kiangah nithum a omta ua, nek ding bangmah aneihlouh jiak un ka hehpih mahmah a, amauhte anngawl in ka paisak utkei; ahuachih keileh lamkal ah abahsam kha ding uh,” achi a.
Tuachi`n a nungjuite`n a kiangah, “Mipi hih zahzah vahna khop tanghou gamdai ah khoiah ila dia?” achi ua.
Jesu`n akiang uah, “Tanghou phel bangzah nanei ua?” achi a.
Tualeh amauhte`n, “phelsagih,” leh “ngasaneu themkhat tawh,” achi uhi.
Tuachi`n aman tual a tou dingin mipite thu apia a.
Tuachi`n aman tanghou phel sagih leh ngasate ala a, kipahthu agen a, abalkek a, nungjuite apia a, tuachi`n nungjuite`n mipite kiangah apia uhi.
Tuachi`n aun un ane ua, avah chiatta ua, anekval nen uh zong lawh sagih aluak dim uhi.
Anete numei leh naupang simlouh in piching ngen zong sangli ahi uhi.
Tualeh mipite a sawlkhiat nung in gunkuang ah a hungtuang a, Magdala gam lam ah a hungpaita hi.
Tuachi`n Pharisaite leh Sadukaite a hungpai ua, amah ze-etna dingin van a kipan chiamtehna amaute ensak dingin a ngen ua.
Aman a dawnga akiang uah, “Nitaklam ahih chiangin, ‘khua apha ding a hinteh meisan hungsuak na chi uhi.’
Tualeh, jingsang chiangin, ‘Tuni khua asia ding a hinteh meisan asuak a a ngiamkai,’ na chijel uh. Lepchiahte aw, van omdan na theisiam ngel ua, hinanleh hun chiamtehnate na theisiam theikei uhi.
Khangthak gilou leh angkawmhatte`n chiamtehna azong ua, hinanleh Jona chiamtehna chihlouh chiamtehna dang mawng mawng akiang uah piak ahikei ding uh, achi a. Huachi`n amauhte anusia a, apaisanta hi.”
Tualeh a nungjuite`n galkhat lam atunkhit un, tanghou apua manghilh ua
Tuachi`n Jesu`n akiang uah, Pharisaite leh Sadukaite tol lak ah kiveng unla, pilvang un, achi hi.
Tuachiah amauhte aki ngaihtuah chiat ua, tanghou ipuakkhak louh jiak ahi, achi ua.
Hinanleh Jesu`n hua athei a akiang uah, “Nou ginna tawmte aw, bangding a tanghou na puakkhak louh jiak ua kingaihtuah nahi ua!
Mi sangnga vakna tanghou phel nga leh lawh bangzah hiam dim naluak uh chih tu nasan a theisiam nailou a, na lungsim ua zong theigige lou nahi uh maw?
Ahihkeileh, mi sangli tanghou sagih leh lawh tampi naluak uh zong?
Na kiang ua tanghou thu gen ka hikei a, Pharisaite leh Sadukaite tol lak ah pilvang un chih gen ka hijaw chih bang achia theilou nahi ua?” a chi hi.
Tuachi`n amau`n tol tanghou lak ah kiveng un chi hilou in Pharisaite leh Sadukaite thugin lak a pilvang dingin ahijaw chih a hung theita uhi.
Jesu Kaisaria Philippi gam a hungtun in, a nungjuite kiangah, “Mite`n kei, Mihing Tapa kua ahi achi ua?” chi`n a dong a.
Tuachi`n amau`n, “Khenkhat in baptispa Johan ahi ahung chi ua, khenkhat in Elijah ahi achi ua. A dangte`n Jeremiah ahihkeileh Jawlnei kuahiam khat ahi a hungchi uh,” achi ua.
Aman akiang uah, “Ahihleh nou, Kei kua ahi nung chi ua?” achi a.
Simon Peter in, “Krist, Pasian hing Tapa nahi,” achi a, adawng a.
Jesu`n a dawnga akiang ah, “Simon, Jona tapa, hampha chia! Sa leh sisan in na kiang ah hih ahung theihsak na hikei a, ka Pa van a om in ahung theihsak nahijaw hi.
Tualeh ken zong na kiangah kung hilh ahi, Nang Peter na hi: hih suangpi tung ah ka saptuam ka lam ding a, misikhua kulh kongkhakte`n hih bangmah alawhjou kei ding uhi.
Tualeh van gam chabi na kiangah kung pia ding a, leitung a nahen jousiah vantung ah zong hen ahi ding a, leitung a naphel jousiah vantung ah zong phel ahi ding,” achi hi.
Tuakhit in amah Krist Jesu ahi chih kuamah hilhlou dingin a nungjuite thu apia hi.

“Huahun a kipat in Jesu`n Jerusalem a apai ding dante, siampite leh laigelhmite pan a sil tampi athuak ding dante, thah a aom ding dante tualeh nithum ni a thoukik ding a hihdante a nungjuite ahilh panta hi.”
Tuachi`n Peter in amah atuam in apaipih a, “Toupa, hih in hung gamlat hen! tualeh hihbang sil na tungah a tungngai kei ding!” chi`n ataihilh hi.
Hinanleh amah akihei a Peter kiangah, “Setan! Ka nunglam ah om in, Kei a dingin kipalpukna nahi; Pasian silte ngaihsun louin mihing silte na ngaihsun jawk jiak in,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n Jesu`n a nungjuite kiangah, “Mi khatpeuh in ka nung ajuih-utleh amah ki manghilh in a kross pua in hungjui hen, achi hi.
Kuapeuh ahinna humbit in ata`n ding a, kuapeuh kei jiak a ahinna ta`n in amu ding hi.
Mi`n leitung pumpi nei henla, ahinna mansuah taleh, amah a ding in bang aphatuam diai? Ahihkeileh ahinna leinang in bang apiathei dia?
Mihing Tapa a Pa thupina tawh a vantungmite tawh a hungpai ding a, tuahun chiangin michih ana sepna bangbang un nuamman apia ding hi.
Adiktak in na kiang uah kung hilh ahi, hihsan a dingte mi khenkhat Mihing Tapa a kumpi lalgam a a hungpai amuh masiah uh sihna chiamlou ding aom uh,” achi hi.
Tualeh niguk nung in Jesu`n Peter, Jakob leh a sanggampa Johan tawh a zohpih a, atuam in mualsang tung khat ah apaipih touh hi.
Amai uah amel ahung lamdangta a: amai ni bang in ahung ta`ng a, a puansilh vak bang in ahung em hi.
Tualeh ngaiin, Mosi leh Elijah akiang ua hungkilak in amah tawh a kihou uhi.

Tuachi`n Peter in Jesu a houpih a a kiang ah, “Toupa, ei a dingin hihsan a om ahoih hi! Na ut leh hiah hampheng buk thum ibawl ding a, nang a ding in khat, Mosi a ding in khat, Elijah a ding in khat achi hi.”
Agen laitak in, ngaiin, meipi vam in amauh ahung khuhta a, tualeh ngaiin, hua meilak a panin aw khat in, “Hih ka Tapa ittak ahi, amah ah ka kipak mahmah hi; amah thu ngai un!” achi hi.
Nungjuite`n hihthu ajaktak un, khupbok in apuk ua, alau mahmah uhi.
Tuachi`n Jesu a hungpai a, amauh akhoih a, “Thou un, laukei un!” achi hi.
Tuachia amauh a dakkhiat uleh, Jesu guak chihlouh midang kuamah a mutakei uhi.
Tualeh mual a pat ahung kumsuk un, Jesu`n amauhte thu apia a, “Mihing Tapa misilak a pat athohkik masiah hih nasil muh uh kuamah hilh mawng mawng kei un,” achi hi.
Tuatakin a nungjuite`n a kiangah, “Ahihleh bangding a laigelhmite`n Elijah hungpai masa ding ahi, chi ahi ua?” chi`n adong ua.
Tuachi`n Jesu`n a dawng a, “Elijah pen a hungpai masa ngei ding a, sil bangkim a bawlthak ding.
Hinanleh kung hilh ahi, Elijah ahung paikhinta, amah atheikei ua, a tungah aut ut un a bawljouta uhi. Tuachimah bangin Mihing Tapa in zong alak uah athuak ding hi,” achi hi.
Tuatakin nungjuite`n baptispa Johan thu akiang ua gen ahi chih ahung theikhiata uhi.
Tualeh mipilak a hungtun un, mi kuahiam khat a kiangah a hungpai a, a maia khupdin in,
“Toupa, ka tapa tungah zahngaiin! Amah kaihvei ahi a, agim mahmah hi; khatvei teng meilak ah khatvei teng tuilak ah apukjel hi.
Tualeh na nungjuite kiangah kung paipih a, hinanleh adamsak theikei uhi,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n Jesu`n a dawng a, “Ginna neilou leh khangthak genhakte aw! Bangtan ahia kung ompih ding? Bangtan ahia kung thuakzoh ding? Amah ka kiangah hung paipih un!” achi a.
Tuachi`n Jesu`n dawi atai a, a sung a pat in ahung pawtkhiata a, hua hunsung ngeiin naupang ana damta hi.
Tuakhit in nungjuite atuam in Jesu kiangah a hungpai ua, “Bang chidan a kou hawlkhia theilou ka hi ua?” achi ua.

Tuachi`n Jesu`n akiang uah, “Na gintaklouh jiak un ahi, adiktak in kung hilh ahi, ankam tang khat bang ginna naneih uleh, hih mual kiangah, ‘hia kipan in huah kisuan in,’ nachi ding ua akisuan mai ding. Tualeh nou a dingin sil bawltheihlouh mawng mawng a omkei ding!” achi hi.
Bangteng hitaleh hichibang pen thumna leh an ngawlna loungal in a hawlkhiathei kei, achi hi.
Tuachia Galili a aomlai un, Jesu`n a kiang uah, “Mihing Tapa pen mihingte khut a matsak in a om ding
tualeh athat ding ua; a nithumni`n a thoukik ding,” achi a. Tuatakin a lungkhamta mahmah uhi.
Tualeh Kapernaum a hungtun un, tempul sum dongte Peter kiangah a hungpai ua, “Na siapa un tempul sum piajellou maw?” achi ua.
Peter in, “Piajel e,” achi hi.

Tualeh Peter innsung a avalut leh Jesu`n a kiang ah, “Simon bangchi`n na ngai a? Leia kumpipate`n siah hiam dangka neihman hiam, kuakiang ah ahia alakjel uh? A tate uh lak ah maw, mituam lak ah?” chi`n ana dong masa a.
Peter in adawng a, “Mituam lak a pat in,” achih takin Jesu`n a kiangah,
“Huachi ahihleh tate awl uh ahi vele maw.

Hilehzong, nang tuipi ah vapai inla met vakam inla, nga namat masakpen la inla, akam kaklechin dangka namu ding hi. Huapen la inla kei leh nang a dingin a kiang uah pia in, ahuachih keileh amauhte i hehsak kha ding,” achi hi.
Huahun laitak in nungjuite Jesu kiangah a hungpai ua, “Van gam ah kua alianpen dia?” achi ua.
Tuachi`n Jesu`n naupang neu khat a kiangah asam a, alak uah adingsak a,
“Adiktak in kung hilh ahi, na kikhel ua naupang neunou nungbak kei uleh, van gam ah na lut ngaikei ding uhi.
Tuajiakin kuapeuh hih naupang neunou banga ki ngaingiam, huami van gam ah alianpen ahi ding hi.
Kuapeuh ka min jiak a hichibang naupang neu khat kipahpih in keimah hung kipahpih ahi ding hi.
“Hinanleh kuapeuh kei hung gingta mineute lak a khat khialhna puksak pen, a ngawng ah buhgawina suang lianpi awhsak in tuipi thuktak sung ah kikhialeh amah a dingin ahoihjaw ding.
Puknate jiakin leitung tung agik hi! Puknate pen ahung om ding mawng ahi a, hinanleh pukna omsakpa tung agik hi!

“Tualeh na khut in hiam, na keng in hiam khialhna a ahung puksakleh, tan inla paimang in! Khut nih hiam keng nih hiam nei a tangtawn meidil a paih a na om sangin, piangsual a, ahihkeileh kengbaiin hiam hinna a lut nang a ding in ahoihjaw hi.
“Tualeh na mit in khialhna a ahung puksakleh kheikhia inla paimang in, mit langnih nei a gawtmun a lut sangin mit langkhat neia hinna a lut nang a ding in ahoihjaw hi.
“Hih mineute lak a khat zong simmoh lou dingin pilvang un, ajiak a vantungmite un van a om ka Pa mel amu gige uh chih kung hilh ahi.
Mihing Tapa ahihleh mangthangte hundam ding a hungpai ahijaw hi.
“Bang nachi ngaih ua? Mi khat in belam za nei henla, alak ua khat vakmang taleh, sawmkua leh kuate nusia in, mual ah paiin, a vakmang pen vazong lou ding maw?
Adiktak in kung hilh ahi, va mukikta henla hileh sawmkua leh kuate tungah sangin, tua belam tungah a kipakjaw ding hi.
Tuachimah bangin hih mineute lak a khat zong amanthat ding na Pa uh van a om deihlam ahikei hi.
“Tualeh na sanggampa`n na tung a sil a bawlkhialh leh nougel guak theih in a khialhna ah hilh in, nathu angaihleh na sanggam na zou ahi.
Hinanleh na thu angaih nuam keileh, ‘theihpihtu mi nih hiam thum hiam kam a hihkip a aomtheihna dingin, mi khat hiam nih hiam tonpih in.’
Tuachi a amauhte thu angaihnuam kei laileh saptuamte kiang ah tun in. Hinanleh saptuam thu zong angaihnuam kei laileh amah pen nang a ding in lawki leh siahkhonmi bang in koih in.
“Adiktak in kung hilh ahi, leitung a na hen uh khatpeuh, van ah hen ahi ding. Tualeh leitung a naphel jousiah uh van ah zong phel ahi ding hi.
“Adiktak in kung hilh kik ahi: leitung a nalak ua mi nih asilnget lam ua a kithutuak uleh ka Pa van a om bawlsak in aom ding uhi.
Mi nih hiam thum hiam ka min a akikhopna teng uah ka omjel hi,” achi hi.
Tuachiang in Peter a hungpai a akiang ah, “Toupa, ka sanggam ka tung ah khialleh bangzahvei ahia ka ngaihdam ding? Sagihvei tanin ahi diam?” achi a.
Jesu`n a kiang ah, “Sagihvei tan in kung chikei, Sagihvei mun sawmsagih tan in kung chijaw ahi.
‘Tuajiakin van gam pen kumpipa kuahiam a silate kiang a dangka thu hihchian tum tawh kibang ahi.’
Ahihchian pat takin, mikhat talent sangsawm ba akiang ah ahung paipih ua.
Hinanleh piak ding a neihlouh jiakin apu in amah tawh, a zi tawh a tate tawh tualeh aneih jousiah tawh juak a dit ding thu apia hi.
Tuachi`n silapa`n khupbok in abia a, ‘Pu aw, ka tungah zahngai tadih inla, A un in kungdin ding!’ achi a.
Tuachi`n tua silapa pu-in ahehpih mahmah a, a khahkhia a, a batteng a ngaihdamta hi.
“Hinanleh hua silapa apawt a, asila hihpih lak a khat amah dangka zakhat ba avamu a. ‘Nabat hungpian!’ chi`n a ngawng ah amek a.
Huachi`n asila hihpihpa`n akeng bulah khupbok in, ‘Ka tungah zahngai tadih lai in, aun in kungdin ding!’ chi`n angen ngutngut a.
Hinanleh amah a utkei a; abat adit zoh masiah thong ah akhumta hi.
Tuachi`n asila hihpihte`n asilbawl amuhtak un adah mahmah ua; tualeh hungpaiin asilbawl teng apu uh a hunghilhta uhi.
Tuatakin apu un amah asam a, a kiang ah, ‘Aw sila giloupa! Nung nget ngutngut jiak a na batteng hung ngaihdam ing a.
Ken nang kung hehpih bang a, nangzong na sila hihpihte na hehpih sawm ding hilou maw,’ achi a.
Tuachi`n apu ahehta a, a batteng apiakzoh masiah migawtte kiangah apiata hi.”
“Michih in na lunggiltak ua na sanggamte uh tatkhialhna na ngaihdam kei uleh, ka Pa van a om in zong tuachimah bang in natung uah abawl ding,” achi hi.
Tualeh hichi ahung hi a, Jesu`n hih thute agen khit in, Galili gam a pat apawt a, Jordan luigal a Judea gam lam ah a vapaita hi.
Mihon tampi in amah ajui ua, huamun ah ana damsakta hi.
Pharisaite zong a hungpai ua, amah ze-et nang in, “Bang jiak peuh in mi`n azi akhul asiang diam?” achi ua.
Aman adawng a akiang uah, “A tu`ng a kipan amauhte siampa`n numei leh pasal ana siam hi chih Laisiangthou simkhalou nahi uh hiam?
‘Hihjiakin pasal in anu leh pa nusia in azi atu ding, tuachi`n nih pen sapum khat ahung hita ding uh,’ achi hi, chih sim khalou nahi uh hiam?
Tuachi`n amau nih ahi nawn takei ua, sapum khat ahita uhi. Tuajiakin Pasian gawmsa mihing in khen kei hen,” achi hi.
Amau`n a kiangah, “Ahihleh bangding a Mosi in khulna lai piak a khulding ahi chia thu pia ahia?” achi ua.
Aman a kiang uah, “Mosi in na lungtang uh khauh jiak a na zite uh khul ahung phalsak ahi, hinanleh atu`ng a kipan hihbang ahi-ngai kei hi.
Kenjaw kung hilh ahi, kuapeuh midang tawh kingaihjiak hilou a, zi khul a midang tawh kiteng tuh angkawm ahi; kuapeuh khulsa tawh kiteng zong angkawm ahi,” achi hi.
A nungjuite`n a kiangah, “Pasal azi tawh tungtang thu huachi ahihleh kiten ahoih kei,” achi ua.
Hinanleh aman akiang uah, “Hih thu kigen pen akiang ua piak a om mite loungal kuaman a pomthei kei ding uhi.

Michilgeh khenkhat anu uh gilsung a kipan-a huachi bang a piang mawng a om ua; michilgeh khenkhat mihing gehthuh a om a, tualeh michilgeh van gam jiaka chilgeh a kibawl tawm zong a om uhi. Kuapeuh a pomthei in pom uheh,” achi hi.
Huahun laiin atung ua akhut nga a a thumsak dingin a kiangah naupang neute ahung paipih ua; hinanleh nungjuite`n anatai ua.
Hinanleh Jesu`n, “Naupang neute ka kiang a ahung pai ding uh phalsak un, amauhte kham kei un; van gam pen hichi bang mite a ahi,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n atung uah akhut a nga a, hua a pat in apaita hi.
Tualeh ngaiin, mikhat hung paiin a kiang ah, “Siapa hoih, tangtawn hinna ka neihtheihna dingin silhoih bang ka bawl dia?” achi a.
Tuachi`n aman a kiang ah, “Bang ding a mihoih hungchi na hia? Pasian chihlouh mihoih dang a om kei hi. Hinanleh hinna a nalut ut leh, thupiakte juiin,” achi hi.
“Aman khoipen la?” achi a,
Jesu`n adawng a, “Tual nathahlouh ding ahi; ang nakawmlouh ding ahi; naguklouh ding ahi, juauthu in mi naheklouh ding ahi;
na nu leh na pa zahtak in; chihte leh nangmah na ki it bangin na innvengte na it ding ahi,” chih, achi a.
“Tangvalpa`n hihte jousiah kaneu a pat ka juijingta hi, bang kasam nalai a?” achi a.
Jesu`n a kiang ah, “Hoihbukim a om na utleh, pai inla naneih juak inla, mijawngte kiangah pia in, tuachi`n van ah gou nanei ding; tuakhit chiang in hungpai inla hungjui in,” achi hi.
Hinanleh tangvalpa`n huathu azaktak in, lungkham takin a paimangta hi, sil tampi nei ahihjiak in.
Tuachi`n Jesu`n a nungjuite kiangah, “Adiktak in kung hilh ahi, mihausa a ding in van gam lut a haksa ahi.
Tualeh kung hilh kik ahi, mihausa Pasian gam a alut sang in, sangawngsau phinbil vang a alutpaisuak abaihlamjaw ding hi,” achi hi.
A nungjuite`n hihthu ajaktak un, lamdang asa mahmah ua. “Ahuachihleh kua hundam in a omjou dia?” achi ua.
Hinanleh Jesu`n amauh a en a akiang uah, “Hihpen mihing a dingin sil hitheilou ahi a, hinanleh Pasian a dingin sil bangkim ahithei hi,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n Peter in a kiang ah, “Ngaiin, kou bangkim nusia in kung juita ua, bang kamu ding ua le?” achi a, adong a.

Tuachi`n Jesu`n a kiang ah, “Adiktak in kung hilh ahi, gamthak ah, Mihing Tapa a thupina laltouna a atouchiang in, nou kei hungjuite, Israel nam sawmlehnihte vaihawm in laltouna sawmlehnih ah natou ding uhi.
Tualeh michih kamin jiaka a inn hiam, a sanggampa hiam, a sanggamnu hiam, apa hiam, anu hiam, azi hiam, atate hiam, gamte hiam nusia in alehja amu ding ua, tangtawn hinna atang ding uhi.
Hinanleh mi tampi masapen a omte nunung pen in aom ding ua, nunung pen a omte masapen ahi ding uhi,” achi hi.
“Van gam pen huan neipa a grep huan a nasem ding mi chial ding a jingsang baihtak a pawt bang ahi.
Aman nasemte tawh nikhat a makhai lawh ding a akihou zawh un, a grep huan ah asawlta hi.
Tualeh dak thumna ding vel in ava pawtkhia a, midang vanjuakna mun a mawkdinte amu a,
akiang uah, ‘Nou zong grep huan ah vakuan un, akilawm hun kung pia ding,’ achi a. Huachi`n amauhte apaita uhi.
Tualeh dak gukna ding leh dak kua na ding vel in a pawtkik a, tuachimah bangin ava bawl kik a.
Tualeh dak sawm leh dak sawmlehkhat ding vel in avapawt kik a, midang mawk dinte ava mu a, ‘Bangding a sunnitum a hihteng a mawk dindin nahi ua?’ achi a.
Amau`n a kiangah, ‘kuamah in ahung chiallouh jiakin ahi,’ achi ua. Aman akiang uah, ‘Nou zong grep huan ah vakuan un, akilawm bangbang namu ding uh,’ achi hi.
“Nitak ahung hih takin grep huan neipa`n asum kempa kiangah, ‘nasemte sam inla, a nunungpen a kipan in amasapen tan in a nitha uh pia in,’ achi hi.
Dak sawmna leh dak sawmlehkhat na ding vel a achialte ahung paitak un, makhai khat chiat amuta ua.
Hinanleh a masapente a hungpai un, muh tamdeuh a kinem ua, hinanleh amau`n zong makhai khat chiat mah amuta ua.
Adangka alak khit tak un, huan neipa tung ah aphunta ua.
‘Hih a nunungpen te`n dakkal khat sung mai asem ua, kou sun haksa leh khua-ul thuakte tawh kibang in nabawl a!’ chi-in.
Hinanleh aman alak ua mikhat kiang ah, ‘Lawm, na tung ah bangmah ka bawlkhial kei hi. Makhai lawh ding a kihoutuak hilou imaw?
