Nang a pen kilak inla paita in; hih anunung pente kiangah zong nang kung piakzah mah ka pia ut hi.
Ka neihsa ka ut ut a ka bawltheih hilou maw? Ka hoih jiakin na thangsia maw?’ ”
“Huachi bangin a nunungte a masa ding ua, tualeh a masate a nunung ding uhi; ajiak tampi sap ahi a, hinanleh tawmnou khat tel ahi,” achi hi.
Tualeh Jesu Jerusalem a ahawhtouh laiin nungjui sawmlehnihte lampi ah azohpih tuam a akiang uah,
“Ngai un, Jerusalem juan in ipaitou uhi, Mihing Tapa Siampite leh Laigelhmite khut ah matsak in a om ding a, tualeh amau`n siding in atung ah siamlouh atan ding uhi.
Tualeh amah chiamnuih bawlna dingin leh jep ding in tualeh kross a kilhden dingin Jentelte kiangah apia ding uhi. Tuachiah nithum ni in a thoukik ding,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n Zebedi tapate nu atate tawh a kiangah a hungpai ua, ahung bia ua, akiang a pan bang hiam silkhat a ngen a.
Aman a kiangah, “Bang ahia na deih?” achi a.
Amahnu`n a kiangah, “Na lalgam ah hih ka tapa tegel khat na jiatlam ah khat na veilam ah a toutheihna ding un thu pia in,” achi hi.

Hinanleh Jesu`n a dawng a akiang ah, “Na nget uh theilou hi uteh, ka nou dawn ding na dawnthei ding uh maw?” Ka baptisma tan ding na tangthei ding uh maw? achi a, adawng a. Amau`n a kiang ah, “Hithei e,” achi ua.

Aman akiang uah, “Ka dawn ding na dawnthei ding ua, ka baptisma tan ding zong na tangthei ngut ding uhi, hinanleh ka jiatlam leh ka veilam a tou ding pen kei piak ding ahikei, ka Pa`n aguatsakte kiang a piak ahijaw ding,” achi hi.
Tualeh sawmte`n hihthu anajak un, unau nihte tungah ahehta uhi.
Hinanleh Jesu`n amauhte a kiangah asam a, “Jentelte vaihawmtute atung uah alal mahmah ua, a miliante un atung uah thu anei mahmah uhi chih zong nathei uhi.
Hilehjong nou lak ah hichibang hikei hen, kuapeuh nalak ua milian hih ut tuh na nna uh sem in aom ding uhi.
Tualeh kuapeuh nalak ua lamkai pen a pan ut tuh na sila un apang ding hi.
Mihing Tapa hilhial zong na sepsak a om ding a hungpai ahihlouh a, nasem ding leh mi tampi tatna ding a ahinna pia ding a hungpai jawk mahbang in,” achi hi.
Tualeh Jeriko a kipat apawt un mihon tampi`n amah ajui ua.
Ngaiin, mittaw nih lamgei a tou tegel in Jesu lampi ah apai chih ajaktak un; “Aw Toupa, David Tapa! katung uah zahngaiin!” chi`n a kikou ua.
Tualeh mipite`n dai dingin atai ua; hinanleh amau`n, “Aw Toupa, David Tapa! katung uah zahngaiin!” chi`n ngaihjawsem in a kikou ua.
Tuachi`n Jesu ading a amau asam a, “Nou a dingin bang bawlleng na ut ua?” achi a.
Amau`n a kiangah, “Toupa, mitvak ka ut uh!” achi ua.
Tuachi`n Jesu`n ahehpih mahmah a, amit uh akhoih a; tuachi`n amuthei paingal ua, amah ajuita uhi.
Tualeh Jerusalem khua atun ding kuan un, Olive mual a Bethphage khua a hungtun un, Jesu`n a nungjuite nih asawl a
akiang uah: “Na mai ua khua ah vapai unla, sabiltung kikhih anou tawh na vamu ding uhi. Sut unla ka kiangah hungkai un.
Tualeh mi kuapeuhin na kiang ua banghiam agenleh, ‘Toupa`n apawimoh a ahi chi un’; tuachi`n aman ahungsawl pai ding,” achi hi.
Hihte tengteng Jawlnei kam a gensa ahung tuntheihna dingin ahi:
“En un,
na kumpipa uh ki ngiamkhiat tak in!
sabiltung tung ah,
sabiltung nou tung ah tuang in na kiang ah a hungpai chi`n zion tanu hilh in,”
achih.
Tuachi`n nungjuite avapai ua, Jesu`n akiang ua thu apiak bangbang in avabawlta ua:
Sabiltung leh anou a hungkaita ua, atung ah apuante uh aphah ua, atung ah Jesu atuang sakta ua.
Tualeh mipi lak a tamjawte`n apuante uh lampi ah aphah ua.
Tuachi`n mipi a mailam a paite leh a nunglam a paite`n, “David Tapa kiang ah, Hosanna! Toupa min a hungpaite ahampha uhi! Tungnung pen ah Hosanna!” chi`n a awng juajua uhi.
Tualeh Jerusalem khuasung alut takin, “Hihpa kua ahia?” chi`n a khuajangpi un akiling hial ua.
Tuachi`n mipite`n, “Hihpa Jawlnei Jesu Galili gam a Nazareth khua a mi ahi,” achi uhi.
Tuachi`n Jesu Pasian tempul ah avalut a, tempul sung a van juakte leh aleite jousiah a hawlkhia a, dangka khekte dohkan leh palva juakte touna a sawnpuksak hi,
aman akiang uah, “Ka inn thumna inn achi ding uh, chih gelh ahi; hinanleh nou suamhatte kulh in nabawl uh!” achi hi.
Tuachi`n Pasian tempul ah mittawte leh kengbaite a kiangah a hungpai ua, aman ana damsak hi.
Hinanleh siampite leh laigelhmite`n a sillamdang bawlte leh tempul a, “David Tapa Hosanna, chia kikoute amuhtak un aheh mahmah ua!”
A kiangah, “Hihte`n bang ahia agen uh naja ei?” achi ua,
Jesu`n akiang uah, “Jamah ing, ‘Naungekte leh nawi nelaite kam a pawt in pahtawina na hihkimta, chih simkhalou nahi uh hiam?’ ” achi hi.
Tuachi`n amauh nusia in khuapi a pat apawt a, Bethani ah apai a huasan ah agiakta hi.
Tualeh ajingni a, khuapi lama a kilehkik in, agil ahung khialta a.
Lampi gei ah theipi kung amu a, abul a avapai leh, ateh chihlouh ngal bangmah amukei a. Tuatakin theipi kung kiangah, “Kumtawn in nagah nawn kei in!” achi a. Tuatakin theipi kung avulpai hi.
Tualeh nungjuite`n hih amuhtak un, “Bang chidan ahia theipi kung avulpai in?” chi`n lamdang asa mahmah ua.

Tuachi`n Jesu`n adawng a akiang uah, “Adiktak in kung hilh ahi, ginna naneih ua naginlelh kei uleh theipi tung a bawl bang guak nabawl kei ding uh a, hinanleh hih mual kiangah zong, ‘Kisuan inla, tuipi ah kipai in chile uchin,’ na chihbang un ahung om ding hi.
Tualeh sil khatpeuh gingta tak a na thum uleh namu ding uhi,” achi hi.
Tualeh amah tempul a lut a thu ahilhlaitak in, siampute leh vantang upate a hungpai ua a kiangah, “Kua thu in ahia hihbang silte nabawl? Kuan hihbang thuneihna nang hungpia ahia?” achi ua.
Hinanleh Jesu`n a dawng a akiang uah, “Ken zong thukhat kung dong ding a; nung hilh uleh ken zong kua thu in ahia hihbang sil kabawl kung hilh ding.
Johan baptisma hih khoia hung kipan ahia: van a kipan maw, ahihkeileh mihing a kipan maw?” achi a, adong a.
Aki ngaihtuah ua, “ ‘Van a kipan,’ chileilah, ‘achihleh bangding a gingtalou?’ Hung chi ding a.
Tualeh, ‘Mihing a kipan,’ chileilah, mipite laujel hang a, mi jousiahin Johan Jawlnei a asim jiak un,” a kichi ua.
Tuachi`n amau`n Jesu kiangah, “Ka theikei uh,” chi`n adawng ua.
Tuachi`n a man akiang uah, “Ken zong hih kua thu in ahia kabawl chih kung hilh kei ding,” achi hi.
“Hinanleh, nou bang nachi ngaih ua? Mi kuahiam khat in tapa nih anei a; tualeh akhatnapa kiangah a hungpai a, ‘Tapa tuni`n ka grep huan ah nna vasem in,’ achi a.
Aman adawng a, ‘Ka utkei,’ achi a; hinanleh tomkhat zoh in alungsim akhek a, akuanta hi.
Tuazoh in anihnapa kiang ah amah a hungpai a tuachimah bangin achi a; tualeh aman adawng a, ‘Pa,’ vakuan ning achi a; hinanleh akuan kei a.
Amauhgel kuapen in apa deihlam abawl ua le?” achi a.
Amau`n a kiang ah, “Amasa pa in,” achi ua.
Jesu`n akiang uah, “Adiktak in kung hilh ahi: siah dongte leh kijuakte`n Pasian gam ahung lutsan ding uhi.

Ajiak Johan diktatna lampi kawkmuh dingin na kiang uah ahung paia, amah na gingtakei ua; hinanleh siah dongte leh kijuakte`n amah agingta uhi; tualeh noute`n hih namuh nung un zong amah na gintattheihna ding un na kisik nuam tuankei uhi.

“Gentehna dang ngaikhia un, mi kuahiam gamnei khat aom a grep-huan abawl a, dai in a umkimkual a, grep sukna khuk khat atou a, innsang alam a. Tuachi`n grep-huan bawlmite kiangah asa`n in apia a, gamtuam ah ahawhta hi.
Tualeh agah lak ahun ding kuan in agah lading in a huan ngakte kiangah asilate asawl a.
Tualeh grep-huan bawlmite`n asilate ana man ua, khat ajep ua, khat athat ua, adang suangin adeng ua.
Aman asila dang, amasate sang a tamjaw asawl kik a; amauhte tung ah zong huachimah bangin anabawl ua.
Tuachi`n atawp in, ‘Ka tapa azahtak khading uh chi`n a tapa asawl a.’
Hinanleh grep-huan bawlmite`n a tapa amuhtak un, ‘Hihpa gou luahdingpa ahi; hungpai un, ithat ding ua, a gouluah ding i kitan ding uh!’ achi ua.
Tuachi`n amah aman ua, grep huan pualam ah apai ua, athatta uhi.
“Huajiakin, grep-huan neipa a hungpai chiangin, grep-huan bawlmite bang alawh dia le?” achi hi.
Amau`n a kiangah, “Hua migiloute pen gentheitak in a hihmang ding a, a grep-huan pen huanbawltu dang, alawh hun teng a agahte akiang a piajel dingte kiangah asa`n in apia ding,” achi ua.
“Jesu`n akiang uah: Laisiangthou a,
‘Innlammite suang deihlouh pen,
hua suang penmah aning a suang poimoh pen ahung hita;
hihpen Toupa bawl ahi,
i mitmuh in alamdang hi, chih, sim kha ngailou nahi uh hiam!’ ”
“Huajiakin, Pasian gam pen na kiang ua kipan laksak ahi ding a, agahsuah ding nam dang kiang ah piak ahi ding chih kung hilh ahi.”
Tualeh kuapeuh hih suang tung a puk pen akekjak ding a; hinanleh anetkhakte jousiah aguaijan ding hi, achi hi.
Tualeh siampite leh Pharisaite`n a gentehna thute ajak un, amau tungthu gen ahi, chih a kitheita ua,
hinanleh amah mat asawm uleh mipite alau ua, Jawlneia asim jiak un.
Tualeh Jesu`n a dawng a akiang uah gentehna thu agen kik a.
“Van gam pen kuahiam kumpi khat a tapa a ding a kitenna ankuang lui tawh kibang ahi.
Tualeh kitenna ankuang luina a chialte sam dingin asilate asawl a, amauh ahung painuam kei uhi.

Aman asila dangte asawl dok kik a: ‘chialte kiang ah vapai unla, ngaiun, ka ankuang kamanta; ka bawngtalte leh ka gan vakthaute kagou a, bangkim amanta hi; kitenna ah hungpaita un!’ vachi un, achi hi.
Hinanleh amau`n ana limsak kei ua, khat alou ah, khat asum bawlna ah a paimangta ua,
tualeh midangte`n asuakte aman ua, musittak in abawl ua, athatta uhi.
Hinanleh kumpipa in huabang thu ajaktak in aheh mahmah a, a galkapte a sawl a, hua tualthatte a hihmang a, tualeh akhuapi uh zong a halsakta hi.
Tuachi`n aman asilate kiangah, ‘kitenna ankuang amanta, hinanleh ka chialte anetak ahikei uh, achi a.
Tuajiakin kongjing ah pai unla, mi namuh taphot uh anne dingin hungchial un,’ achi hi.
Tuachi`n hua silate apawt ua, kongjingte ah vapaiin amuh taphot uh misia mipha aun un a samkhawm ua; tuachi`n kitenna inndan sung michialte in ahung dimta hi.
“Hinanleh kumpipa a michialte en ding a a hunglut leh, kitenna puan silhlou mi khat amuta a.
Tuachi`n aman a kiang ah, ‘Lawm, bangchidan ahia kitenna puan silhlou a hihsan a nunglut?’ achi a. Tuatakin amah adai dide a.
Tuachi`n kumpipa`n asilate kiangah, ‘Akhut leh akengte kan unla, puakhia unla, pualam mial ah paikhia un, hua ah kahleh hagawina a om ding.’ ”
Ajiak, “Tampi sap ahi a, hinanleh tawmnou khat tel ahi uh,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n Pharisaite apai ua, athugen a mattheihna ding dan a kikum ua.

Tualeh amau`n a nungjuite uh leh Herod pawlte a kiangah asawl ua, huate`n a kiangah, “Siapa, midiktak nahi a, diktak in Pasian lam thu nahilh a, mi kuamah khawksak tuam na neikei chih ka thei uh; kuamah khentuam na neikei hi.
Huajiakin bangchi nasa a? Hung hilh in. Kaisar kiang a siah tawi asiang hiam, sianglou?” achi ua.
Hinanleh Jesu`n a lungsim uh gitlouhdan pen athei a, “Milepchiahte aw! Bangding a hung ze-et nahi ua?
Siah dangka hung ensak un!” achi a,
Tuachi`n a kiangah makhai khat a hungtawi ua,
tuateh aman akiang uah, “Hih kualim leh kua laigelh ahia?” achi a.
Amau`n a kiangah, “Kaisar a,” achi ua.
Tuachi`n aman akiang uah, “Kaisar silte Kaisar kiangah pia unla, Pasian silte Pasian kiangah pia un,” achi hi.
Hih thute ajak un lamdang asa mahmah ua, amah apaisan ua, a paimangta uhi.
Huanimah in Sadukaite thohkikna a omkei chite a kiangah a hungpai ua.
“Siapa, Mosi-in mi taneilou a asihleh a sanggampa in azi aluah ding a, asanggampa a dingin chi akhahsak ding ahi, achi hi.
Tuin, kalak uah sanggam pasal sagih a om ua, a upapen in zi anei a, asita, chi akhahlouh jiakin azi asanggampa anutsiat a.
Huachimah bangin anihna zong taneilou in asi a, athumna in aluah a, sagihna tan in aneichiat ua.
Atawp in numeinu zong ahung sita hi.
Tuajiakin, thohkikna ah amahnu pen kuazi ahita diai? A un un lah a neichiat ngal ua,” chi`n a dong ua.
Jesu`n a dawng a akiang uah, “Pasian Laisiangthou leh Pasian sil bawltheihna na theihlouh jiak un na hihkhial jel uhi!
Thohkikna ah kitenna a om nawnkei a, teng zong a kitengsak nawnkei uh, van a vanmite bang ahita uhi.
Hinanleh misi thohkikna ah: Pasian in na kiang ua agen simkha ngailou nahi uh hiam?
‘Keimah Abraham Pasian, Isak Pasian, Jakob Pasian ka hi,’ achih, chi in. Pasian jaw misi Pasian ahikei a, mihing Pasian ahi jaw,” achi hi.
Tualeh mipite`n hih ajaktak un a thuhilhdan lamdang asa mahmah uhi.
Hinanleh Jesu`n Sadukaite aseljou chih ajak un amau akikhawm ua,
tuachi`n alak ua dansiammi khat in amah ze-et in thukhat a dong a,
“Siapa, danthu ah khoipen ahia thupiak lianpen?” chi in.
Jesu`n a kiangah, “ ‘Toupa na Pasian na lungtang tengteng in, na kha tengteng in, na lungsim tengteng in na it ding ahi,’ chih.
Hih thupiak masapen leh thupiak lianpen ahi.
Tualeh anihna zong hihbang mah ahi: ‘Nangmah na ki it bangin na innvengte na it ding ahi,’ chih.
Hih thupiak nihte tungah danthu leh Jawlneite thu jousiah a kikhaikhawm siang ahi,” achi hi.
Pharisaite akikhop lai un, Jesu`n amauh thu a dong a,
“Krist hi bangchi`n na ngaihsun ua? Amah kua tapa ahia?” achi a, amau`n a kiangah,
“David Tapa,” achi ua.
Aman akiang uah, “Ahihleh,” bang chidan a “David in kha a amah, ‘Toupa’ achih?”
“ ‘Toupa`n ka Toupa kiangah:
na melmate na kengphang nuaiah kakoih masiah,
ka jiatlam ah tou in,’
chia Toupa achih ahia?
David in amah ‘Toupa’ achihleh, a tapa bang achi hihthei diai?” achi a.
Tuachi`n kuamah in amah kamkhat in zong a dawngthei takei ua, huani a kipan in kuaman thudang mawng mawng a dong ngam nawn takei uhi.
Tuachi`n Jesu`n a nungjuite kiang leh mipite kiangah thu agen a.
“Laigelhmite leh Pharisaite Mosi touna ah atou uhi.
Huajiakin juihding chia hunghilh taphot uh jui unla, bawljel un, hinanleh amauh silbawl bang bawlkei un; amau`n agen ua a bawltuan kei uhi.
Puakgik haksa taktak abawl ua mi liangkou ah asuan ua, hinanleh amau`n lah akhut meleng khat un zong a khoihnuam kei uhi.
Hinanleh a silbawl jousiah uh mi muhding in ahi, abawl uh, a silbulhte uh leh a khipte uh abawl lian ua apuan mawngte uh atualsak uhi.
Tualeh ankuang luinate ah mun sangpente, kikhopna inn ah touna hoihpente bang adeih uhi;
tualeh van juakna munte lak a mi`n chibai abuk uh bang, tualeh mi`n Rabbi Rabbi, chia asap bang aut uhi.
Hilehjong noujaw ‘Rabbi,’ chih in om kei un, ajiak Siapa khat nanei ua, Krist ahi, tualeh nouteng sanggam khat nahi uhi.
Leitung ah kuamah ‘pa,’ chikei un, Na pa uh khat mai ahi, amah van ah a om.
Tualeh, ‘Siate,’ chih in om kei un, sia khat nanei ua, amah Krist ahi.
Hinanleh nalak ua lianpenpa na sila un aom ding hi.
Tualeh kuapeuh a kiliansak tuh sukngiam ahi ding a, kuapeuh aki ngiamkhiat tuh tawisang in aom ding hi.
“Hinanleh nou laigelhmite leh Pharisai lepchiahte aw, na tung uh agik hi! van gam lampi mi dingin na khaksak ua, noulah na luttuan kei ua. Mi alut dingte lah na lutsak kei ua.
Nou laigelhmite leh Pharisai lepchiahte aw, na tung uh agik hi! Meithaite inn na negam ua, mi khemna in sawtpipi nathum ua, tuajiakin mawhna liansem natuak ding uhi.

“Nou laigelhmite leh Pharisai lepchiahte aw, na tung uh agik hi! Mi khat Juda biakna a siam ding in zong tuipi leh gam ah napai kimvel ua, tualeh na siam zoh chiang un, amah pen noute sangin alehnih in gawtmun ta in na bawljel uhi!
“Nou mittaw lamkaite! Kuapeuh Pasian tempul lou a kichiam bangmah ahikei a; ‘hinanleh kuapeuh Pasian tempul a kham lou a kichiam in a tangtunsak ding ahi, chite aw, na tung uh agik hi!’
Nou mimaw leh mittawte! Kham leh kham siangthousak Pasian tempul khoipen thupijaw ahiam?
‘Tualeh kuapeuh maitam lou a kichiam bangmah ahikei a, hinanleh kuapeuh atung a silpiak om lou a kichiam in a tangtunsak ding ahi,’ na chi uhi.
Nou mimaw leh mittaw! Silpiak leh silpiak siangthousak maitam khoipen thupijaw ahiam?
Tuajiakin kuapeuh maitam lou a kichiam tuh, maitam leh atung a om tengteng lou a kichiam ahi;
kuapeuh Pasian tempul lou a kichiam tuh, Pasian tempul leh asung a tengpa lou a kichiam ahi;
tualeh van lou a kichiam jousiah, Pasian laltouna leh atung a tou-pa lou a kichiam ahi.

“Nou laigelhmite leh Pharisai lepchiahte aw, natung uh agik hi! Lounamsiate, lengmaselte, zirate sawm a khat napia jel ua, danthu poimoh jawte, diktatnate, hehpihnate, gin-omnate na limsak kei ua; hinanleh hihte ahi nabawl ding uh, adangte zong bawllou hituanlou in.
Nou mittaw lamkaite aw! Thouvai khisiang a sangawngsau apum a valhmangte aw!
“Laigelhmite leh Pharisai lepchiahte aw! Na tung uh agik hi! Nou leh kuang pualam na silsiang ua, hinanleh asung lah nekgukna leh kisu`mlouhna in adim hi.
Nou Pharisai mittaw! Nou leh kuang sunglam silsiang masa un, apualam zong ahung sianthou theihna ding in!
“Laigelhmite leh Pharisai lepchiahte aw! Na tung uh agik hi! Han kinuhkang apualam kilawm tak a lang, asunglah misi guhte leh nin chiteng a dim bang nahi uhi.
Huachimah bangin nou zong pualam ah mihing mitmuh in diktattak in nalang ua, hinanleh na sunglam ulah lepchiahna leh gitlouhna in adim hi.
“Nou laigelhmite leh Pharisai lepchiahte aw! Na tung uh agik hi! Ajiak nou Jawlneite han nabawl ua, tualeh midiktatte han zong najem uhi;
kapu kapate uh damlaia na om hile ung, Jawlneite sisan asuahna uah panglou ding hi ung a nachi uhi.
Huajiakin Jawlneite thatte tate nahi uh chih noumauh na kitheisak uhi!
Na pu na pate uh mohna tehna dan sungdim vanglak un!
Gulte aw, gulsuante aw! Bang chi`n ahia gawtmun siamlouh tanna na pelhtheih ding uh?

Huajiakin, ngaiun, na kiang uah Jawlneite, mipilte, laigelhmite kung sawl ding; khenkhat nathat ding ua, kross ah na kilhden ding uh, tualeh khenkhatte na kikhopna inn uah najep ding ua, khuateng ah na soisa ding uhi.

Tuachi`n, midiktat Abel sisan kisuah a pat, Pasian tempul leh maitam kikal a Barakia tapa Zakariah nathah ua a sisan suah tanpha in leitung a midiktatte sisan kisuah jousiah na tung uah ahung tunlawh ding hi.
Adiktak in kung hilh ahi: hih silte jousiah tulai khangthakte tungah a hungtung ding hi!
“Aw Jerusalem, Jerusalem, Jawlneite thattu, na kiang a kisawlte suang a na denglumtu! Akpi`n anoute akhanuaia a opkhum bang a ken zong natate uh bangzah vei opkhum ka tum a, hinanleh na utkei uhi!
En un! na innte uh ahawm a taisan in a omta hi.
Kung hilh ahi, ‘Toupa min a hungpaite ahampha hi, nachih masiah uh, tuban nung munawn takei ding uhi,’ ” achi hi.
Tuachi`n Jesu tempul a pat pawtkhia in apaita a; tualeh tempul kibawldante ensak dingin a nungjuite akiang ah ahung pai ua.
Tualeh Jesu`n akiang uah, “Hih silte tengteng namu uh maw? Adiktak in kung hilh ahi: sukchip louh a suang kichiang mawng mawng hihsan ah nutsiat ahi kei ding,” achi a, adawng a.

Tualeh Olive mualtung a atoulai in, a nungjuite aguk in a kiangah a hungpai ua, “Hih silte bangchik chiangin ahung om dia, Nung paikik nang leh leitung tawpna ding chiamtehna bang ahi dia, hunghilh in,” achi ua.
Tuachi`n Jesu`n adawng a akiang uah, “Mi kuamah in ahung khemlouhna dingin pilvang un.
Mi tampi`n, ‘Krist ka hi!’ chi`n ka min in a hungpai ding ua, mi tampi akhemjou ding uhi.
Tualeh kidou leh kidou thuthang naja ding ua, na mangbat louhna ding un pilvang un, hih silte ahung om ding mawng ahi; hinanleh atawpna ahinai kei ding.
Namtuam leh namtuam, gamtuam leh gamtuam, a kidou ding ua, tualeh mun tuamtuam ah kial atung ding a; natna hi aleng ding a; mun tuamtuam ah jin aling ding.
Hihte tengteng nausuak nat bang a gentheihna kipatna ahi nalai hi.”
Huahun chiang in gimthuak dingin ahung mansak ding ua, ahung that ding uh; tualeh kamin jiakin namjousiah huat nahi ding uhi.
Huahun chiangin mi tampi apuk ding ua, a kimansak tuah ding ua, a kihua tuah ding uhi.
Tuachi`n Jawlnei taklou tampi a hungpawt ding ua, mi tampi a khemjou ding uhi.
Tualeh gitlouhna a hungpung ding jiakin mi tamjaw itna ahung dai ding.
Hinanleh kuapeuh atawp dong a thuakjoute pen hundam in aom ding.
Tualeh hih kumpi gam tangthupha nam jousiah theihsakna dingin leitung pumpi ah hilh in aom ding; tuazoh chiangin tawpna a hung om ding hi.
“Tuajiakin buahsaktu ‘kihdakhuai’ Jawlnei Daniel in anagen mun siangthou a ding na muhchiang un,” (asimkha jousiahin theisiam uhen!)
“Huachih hun chiangin Judea gam a omte mual ah tai uhen.
A inntung a omte a innsung a banghiam lading in hung kumsuk kei uhen.
Tualeh loua om zong apuante lading in hungkik kei uhen.
Tualeh huani chiangin agaite leh naungek neite tung agik hi!
Hinanleh na taimang hun ding uh phalbilai hiam nipilai hiam ahihlouhna dingin thum un!
Huahun chiangin gimthuakna thupitak ahung om ding a, hichibang gimthuakna thupi leitung pianchil a kipan tunitan in a omngai kei a; om zong a omnawn kei ding hi.
Tualeh hih nite suktom hikeileh, mihing kuamah dam in asuakta kei ding; hinanleh telte jiakin huani suktom ahi ding.”
“Huahun chiangin kuapeuhin na kiang uah, ‘En in! hiah Krist a om!’ ahihkeileh ‘Huah a om!’ achih uleh taksan kei un.
Krist taklou leh Jawlnei takloute a hungpawt ding a, mikhem nang in chiamtehna thupi leh sillamdang taktak ahung ensak ding ua, ahihtheih liai leh telte nangawn zong ahung khem ding uhi.
Ngaiun! Ama in kung hilhkholhta ahi.
“Tuajiakin, na kiang uah, ‘En un! gamdai ah a om!’ achih uleh, pawtkhia kei un; ahihkeileh, ‘En un, Inndan sung ah a om!’— achih uleh taksan kei un.
Suahlam a kipan a tunphe ahung phet a tumlam tan a asalh bangin, Mihing Tapa a hungpai chiangin zong huachimah bangding ahi.”
“Sapul omna teng ah langta zong a om ding hi.
“Hua gimthuakna nite zohzoh chiangin, ni ahung mial ding a, kha avak nawn kei ding a; van a pat in aksite a hungkia ding a, tualeh vantung silbawl theihnate a kiling ding hi.

Tuahun chiangin Mihing Tapa chiamtehna van ah a hunglang ding a, tuatak chiangin leitung a nam jousiahin asu`n ding ua, tualeh Mihing Tapa sil bawltheihna leh gualzohna thupi tawh van meipi tung a hungpai amu ding uhi.
Tualeh aman vantungmi pengkul ging ngaihtak tawh a sawlkhia ding a, amau`n atelte lei ningli a kipan, van tawp a kipan alehlam tawp tanpha in akhawm ding uhi.
“Tuin theipi kung a kipan hih gentehna jil un: aba ahung meng a, ateh a hungsel chiangin, doupi anai chih nathei uhi.
Huachimah bangin, nou zong hih silte tengteng na muhchiang un, anaita a, kotbul mahmah ah a omta chih thei un.
Adiktak in kung hilh ahi, hih silte atunkim masiah tulai khangthakte amang kei ding uhi.
Van leh lei amang ding a, hinanleh ka thu amang kei ding hi.
“Hinanleh huani leh hun ding pen van a vantungmite in zong theilou, Tapa in zong theilou, ahihhang in Pa bek in athei hi.
Hinanleh Noah damlai bangin Mihing Tapa hung paikikna zong ahi ding hi.
Tuijin tun mateng in, Noah gunkuang a alutni tan in ane un, adawn ua, zi leh pasal in akinei uhi.
Tualeh tuijin atun a, aun ua atawhmang masiah bangmah atheikei uhi. Mihing Tapa hung paikikna zong huachimah bang ahi ding hi.
Huahun chiangin lou ah pasal mi nih a om ding ua; khat lakmang in a om ding a, khat nutsiat in a om ding.
Numei nih sumphung ah ansu in a om ding ua, khat lakmang in a om ding a, khat nutsiat in a om ding hi.
Huajiakin kiging un, bang hun in ahia na Toupa uh a hungpai ding chih na theihlouh jiak un.
Hinanleh hih thei un: inn neipa`n guta hungpai hun ding theileh, aveng ding a, a inn aluhsak kei ding hi.
Tuajiakin nou zong kiging zingin om un, na gintaklouh laitak un Mihing Tapa a hungpai ding hi.
“Tualeh apu in ahunteng a atan ding uh hawmsak ding a a inkuanpihte tung a vaihawm a akoih sila muanhuai leh piltak kuapen ahita diam le?
Apu a hungpai chiang a sila huachibang a bawl ahung muh, hua silapa ahampha hi!
Adiktak in kung hilh ahi, aman aneih jousiah tung a thunei dingin abawl ding hi.
Hinanleh sila gilou in a lungsim in, Ka pu ahung paizok kei ding chi in,
a silapihte na vuata henla, uain khamte kiangah ne-in dawn in na om taleh.
Hua silapa pu agintat louhni, a kivenlouh laitak in a hungpai ding a.
Tualeh amah tunnih asuah ding a, milepchiahte tan bangbang a tangsak ding a, huasan ah kahleh hagawina aom ding hi.
“Huahun chiangin van gam pen nungak siangthou sawm a meivak uh tawia mouneipa dawn ding a pawtkhiate tawh teh ahi ding.
Alak ua mi-ngate apil ua; adang ngate amaw uhi.
Amawte`n ameivak uh akeng ua, thautui a kengkop kei uhi,
hinanleh apilte`n ameivak utawh abawm ah thautui zong a kengkop uhi.
Mouneipa ahung zekai jiakin aun un a lusu ua, ana ihmuta uhi.
“Tualeh ja`nkim laiin, ‘Ngaiin, mouneipa hungpai hi! A dawn ding in pawtkhia un!’ chia kikou ging a omta a.
Tuatakin nungak siangthoute athou ua, ameivak uh adeta ua.
Tualeh amawte`n apilte kiangah, ‘Na meivak tui uh themkhat hung hawm un, ka meivakte uh mit ding ahita,’ achi ua.
Hinanleh apilte`n adawng ua, ‘Kou leh nou dingin a kiching kei ding, ajuakte kiangah pai unla leijaw un,’ achi ua.
Tualeh amauh alei ding a apaikhiat kal un mouneipa a hungpaita a; tualeh kigingsa a na omte amah tawh moulopna inn ah a lutkhawmta ua; tuachi`n kot a kikhakta hi.
“Huanung in nungak siangthou dangte zong a hungpai ua, ‘Toupa, Toupa! Kot hunghon in!’ achi ua.
Hinanleh aman adawng a, ‘Adiktak in kung hilh ahi!’ Nou kungthei khakei, achi hi.”
Tuajiakin, “Kiging un mihing Tapa hungpai ding ni leh ahun na theihlouh jiak un.”
Van gam pen mi khat in asilate samkhawm a asilneih jousiah akiang ua kemsak a, khual gamlapi a zinmang tawh kibang ahi.

Tualeh aman asila khat kiang ah talent nga, adang khat kiang ah talent nih, tualeh asila dang khat kiang ah talent khat apia a, amau bawltheih khom chingchiat tawh kijui in apia a, amah khual azinta hi.
Tuachi`n talent nga ngahpa paiin summet avabawl a, talent nga dang ava metsak beh hi.
Tuachimah bang in talent nih ngahpa in zong talent nih dangmah ametsak beh a.
Hinanleh talent khat mupa apai a lei atou a, apu dangka avaphualta hi.
“Hun sawtpi nungin hua silate pu a hungtungta a, amauh tawh sum a sutuakta hi.
Tuachi`n talent nga ngahpa a hungpai a, talent nga dang ahung tawi a, ‘Pu, nang talent nga nung kemsak a, En-in! Talent nga dang ka muhbeh hi,’ achi a.
Apu in a kiang ah, sila hoih leh gin-om, na bawlhoih hi; sil tawmnoukhat tung ah na gin-om a, sil tampi tung a thunei in kung bawl ding hi; napu kipahna ah lut in! achi hi.
Talent nih ngahpa zong a hungpai a, ‘Pu, nang talent nih nung kemsak a, En-in! Talent nih dang ka muhbeh hi,’ achi a.
Apu in a kiang ah, ‘Sila hoih leh gin-om, na bawlhoih hi! Sil tawmnoukhat tungah na gin-om a, sil tampi tung a thunei in kung bawl ding, napu kipahna ah lut in!’ achi hi.
Tuachi`n talent khat ngahpa a hungpai a, ‘Pu, mi giloutak nahi chih kungthei a; na tuhlouhna ah na at a, na thehlouhna ah zong na khawm khawm hi.
Tuajiakin kunglau a, ka vapaia na talent leinuai ah ka vaphual a; En-in! Hiah nang a mah na mukikta hi,’ achi hi.
Hinanleh apu in a kiang ah, ‘Nang, sila gilou leh thadah! Ka tuhlouhna ah ka at a, ka thehlouhna ah ka lakhawm jel hi, chih nathei maw?
Tuachi`n ka dangka sumsinte kiangah na vakoih ding a, kungpai chianga kei a pen amet tawh ka muh ding hilou maw.
Tuajiakin a talent a kiang a pan laksak unla, talent sawm neipa kiang ah pia un.
Kuapeuh aneite piakbeh ahi ding a, tamsem a hungnei ding; hinanleh kuapeuh aneiloute aneihsun nangawn laksak ahi ding hi.
Tualeh sila phatuamlou tuh pualam mial ah paikhia un, huasan ah kah leh hagawina aom ding hi,’ achi hi.
“Mihing Tapa a vanmi siangthoute tengteng tawh a thupina a kivon a a hungpai hun chiangin, a thupina laltouna ah atou ding a,
amai ah namchih a kikhawm ding ua; belam chingpa`n kel lak a a belamte a khenkhiat bangin, amauhte a khenkhia ding.
Tualeh belamte ajiatlam ah akoih ding a, hinanleh kelte aveilam ah akoih ding.
Huahun chiangin kumpipa`n a jiatlamate kiang ah, ‘Nou ka Pa deihsakte aw, hungpai unla, leitung kisiam chil a pat a noua ding a gam bawlsa luah un.
Ka gil akial in nek ding nung pia ua, ka dang atak in dawn ding nung pia uh, mikhual ka hih in nung jintun ua,
guaktang ka hih in puan nung silhsak uh; ka damlouh in nungveh ua, thong a ka om in ka kiang ah nungpai uh,’ achi ding.
Huahun chiangin mi diktatte`n, ‘Toupa bangchik in ahia gilkial a kungmuh ua an kung piak uh, bangchik in ahia dangtak a kungmuh ua dawn ding kung piak uh?
Bangchik in ahia mikhual nahih kungmuh ua kung zintun uh? Guaktang a kungmuh ua puan kung silhsak uh?
Bangchik in ahia china in hiam, thong ah hiam kungmuh ua na kiang a kungveh uh?’ aci ding ua.
Kumpipa`n akiang uah, ‘Adiktak in kung hilh ahi, hih ka sanggamte lak a neupen khat tung a nabawl uh keitung a bawl nahi uh, achi ding!’
“Tuazohchiang in aman aveilam a omte kiang ah, ‘Nou hamsiat thuakte, kakiang a pat paimang unla, tangtawn mei, dawi leh a sawltakte ding a abawl ah lut un!
Ka gil akial in an nung piakei ua, kadang atak in dawn ding nung piakei uh;
mikhual kahih in nung zintun kei uh; guaktang kahih in puan nung silhsak kei ua; china leh thong a ka om in nungveh kei uh,’ achi ding.

Tuachiang in amau`n zong adawng ding ua, ‘Toupa, bangchik in ahia gilkial in hiam, dangtak in hiam, khualzin in hiam, guaktang in hiam, damloua na om in hiam ahihkeileh thong a na om kungmuh ua, kung donlouh uh?’ achi ding uhi.
Tuachiang in aman adawng ding a akiang uah, ‘Adiktak in kung hilh ahi, hih mineupente lak a khat tung a na bawllouh uh katung a bawllou na hi uh,’ achi ding.
Tualeh hihte tangtawn gawtmun ah alutta ding ua, midiktatte tangtawn hinna ah alutta ding uh,” achi hi.
Tualeh hichi ahung hi a, Jesu`n hihthu tengteng a genzoh in a nungjuite kiang ah,
“Ninih zoh chiangin paikan ankuang luina ahung om ding ahi, tualeh Mihing Tapa kilhden ding a matsak in aom ding hi, chih nathei uhi,” achi hi.
Tuatakin siampite leh laigelhmite, vantang upate siampi lianpen Kaiapha achih uh inn ah a kikhawm ua,
tualeh Jesu lungsim a bawl a, man a a thahtheihna ding un akihou ua.
“Hinanleh ankuang lui ni-in hihdah heh, ahuachih keileh mipi lak ah buaina ahung om khading,” achi uhi.
Tualeh Jesu Bethani khua a miphak Simon inn a aom laiin,
Numei khat Alabastar bawm a sathau namtui mantam tak tawiin a kiangah a hungpai a, dohkan a atoulai in, a lutung ah a hungbuak hi.
Hinanleh a nungjuite`n hih amuhtak un, aheh ua, “Bangding a namawk sukthelthang a hiam?”
“Hih sathau mantam juak a mijawngte kiang a piaktheih ahi!” achi ua.
Jesu`n hih atheih in akiang uah, “Bangding a hih numei subuai nahi ua? Amahnu`n ka tung ah silhoihtak abawl hi.
Mijawngte na kiang uah a omjing ua, hinanleh kei na kiang uah omjing ka hikei hi.
Hih thau namtui katung a abuak pen, vuia ka omni a ding a abawl ahi.
Adiktak in kung hilh ahi, khoimun peuh ah, leitung pumpi ah hih tangthupha akigenna teng ah hih numeinu silbawl zong amah theihjingna dingin agen jel ding uhi,” achi hi.
Tuanung in sawmlehnihte lak a khat Juda Iskariot achih uh siampite kiang ah avapai a
tualeh akiang uah, “Amah na kiang uah hung piakhia leng nou kei bang nung pia ding ua?” avachi a, tualeh amau`n dangka sawmthum piak akhamta ua.
Huanung siah amah matsak nang lemtang a zongta hi.
Tanghou tol sawhlouh ankuang luini masapen in, nungjuite Jesu kiang ah a hungpai ua, “Paikan ankuang lui nekna dingin khoiah hung bawlsak le ung na ut ei?” achi ua.
Tuachi`n aman, “Khuapi ah pai unla, mi khat kiangah: ‘Siapa`n ka hun anaita a, ka nungjuite tawh na inn ah paika`n ankuang ka nekhawm ding uh achi hi, vachi un,’ ” achi a.
Tuachi`n a nungjuite`n Jesu`n akiang ua ahilh bangin abawl ua, paikan ankuang a bawljouta uhi.
Tualeh nitak lam a hunghih in nungjui sawmlehnihte tawh an a im ua.
Anek laiun aman, “Adiktak in kung hilh ahi, nalak ua mi khat in kei ahung mansak ding hi,” achi hi.
Tuatakin amauh a lungkham mahmahta ua, aban ban in akiang ah, “Toupa kei kahi hiam?” a chichiat ua.
Tualeh aman adawng a akiang uah, “Ankuang hung sawkpihpa in kei ahung mansak ding hi.
Mihing Tapa a tanchin kigelh bang jel in apai ding hi, hinanleh Mihing Tapa mansak ding pa tung agik hi! Huapa piang kei leh amah a dingin ahoihjaw ding hi!” achi hi.
Tuachi`n amansak dingpa Juda in adong a, “Siapa keimah ka hi hiam?” achi hi.
Aman a kiangah, “Nang man na chita hi,” achi hi.
Tualeh anek laiun, Jesu`n tanghou ala a, gual ajawl a, abalkek a; tuachi`n nungjuite kiangah apia a, “La unla ne un, hih ka taksa ahi,” achi a.
Tuazoh in aman nou ala a, kipahthu agen a, a kiang uah apia a, “Na un un, dawn un,”
“Khialhnate ngaihdamna ding a mi tampi a ding a pawt, hih ka sisan a thukhunthak ahi,” achi hi.
Hinanleh kung hilh ahi, ka Pa gam a nou tawh athak ka dawnni atun masiah tuban hih grepgah tui ka dawnnawn kei ding, achi hi.
Tualeh la asak zoh un apawt ua, Olive mual ah apaita uhi.
Tuachi`n Jesu`n akiang uah, “Tuja`n chiangin na un un ka tungthu ah lungkia in na omsiang ding ua; ‘Belampu ka jep ding a, belam honte a kithehjak ding uh chih gelh ahi.’
Hinanleh ka thohkik zohnung chiangin, Galili gam ah namai uah ka pai ding,” achi hi.
Peter in adawng a, akiang ah, “Mi jousiah na tungthu ah lungkia in omnanle uh, kei pen lungkia in ka omkei ding!” achi hi.
Jesu`n a kiangah, “Adiktak in kung hilh ahi, tuja`n chiangin, ak khuan ma-in thumvei nung kitheihmoh bawl ding”, achi hi.
Peter in a kiang ah, “Nang tawh sikhawm ding hinanleh zong kung kitheihmoh bawl kei ding hi!” achi a.
Huachimah bangin nungjuite jousiahin zong a chichiat uhi.
Tuazoh in Jesu amauhte tawh munkhat Gethsemani achih uh atung ua, tualeh a nungjuite kiangah, “Pa`m a ka vathum kal in hiah nanatou un,” achi a.
Tualeh aman Peter leh Zebedi tapate nih azohpih a, lungkham in ahung mangbang mahmahta hi.
Tuachi`n aman akiang uah, “Ka kha a lungkham mahmah a, sihna khop hial ahi. Hiah om unla hung venpih un,” achi hi.
Amah themkhat avapai gamla deuh a, khupbok in a thum a, “Pa aw, ahihtheih liaileh hih nou in hungpel hen! Ahihhangin kei deihna bang hilou in, nang deihna bang hijaw hen,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n amah nungjuite kiangah a hungpai a, amauhte ihmu in amu a; Peter kiangah, “Bangchi, nou dakkal khat sung zong hung venpih zoulou nahi uh maw?
Khemna a na lutlouhna ding un kiveng gige in thum un; kha injaw a ngap a, hinanleh taksa pen ahatkei hi,” achi a.
Anihveina ding in ava paikhia kik a, athum a, “Pa aw, hih nou ka dawn louh a, hung peltheilou ahihleh, nadeih lam kibawl hen,” achi a.
Tualeh amah a hungpai a, amauhte ihmu in a mukik a, a ihmut uh asuak mahmah jiak in.
Tualeh amauhte nusia in avapai kik a, athumveina ding in ava thum kik a, agen ngaiteng mah agen hi.
Tuakhit in amah a nungjuite kiangah a hungpai a, akiang uah, “Noute ihmu lailai a tawlnga lailai nahi uh maw? En un! Ahun a hungtungta, Mihing Tapa mikhialte khut a matsak in aom ding.
Thou un, ipai ding uh; En un, kei hung mansak dingpa a hungtungta hi!” achi hi.
Tualeh aman hihthu agen laiin, en-in, sawmlehnihte lak a khat, Juda; siampite leh upate kiang a kipan mipi thupitak namsau leh khetbuk tawite tawh a hungpai a.
Tualeh amansak ding pa in amauh chiamtehna ahilh masa a: “Ka tawp penpen amah ahi ding hi. Amah man un!” chi-in.
Tuachi`n amah kintakin Jesu kiangah avapai a, “Chibai, Siapa,” chi`n atawp a.
Tualeh Jesu`n a kiangah, “Lawm, bang ding a hungpai nahia!” achi a. Tuachi`n Jesu tungah khut akha ua, amanta uhi.
Tualeh ngaiin, Jesu ompihte lak a mi khat in akhut in asawk a a namsau adokkhia a, siampi silapa asat a, abil a satkhiatsak hi.
Tuachiah Jesu`n a kiang ah, “Na namsau akoihna ah koih in, Namsau zangmi namsau in asi ding hi.
Tuin zong vanmite sangguk mun sawmlehnih sang a tamjaw hung sawlsak dingin ka Pa kiang a ngentheilou hungsa nahi uh hiam?
Hinanleh tuabang hitaleh Laisiangthou bangchi`n ahia ahung tangtuntheih ding?” achi hi.
Tuahun mah in Jesu`n mipite kiangah, “Guta man ding bangin namsau leh khetbuk tawiin kei man dingin nung pawt uh maw? Niteng in tempul ah noutawh thuhilh in katou a nungman kei ua.
Hinanleh Jawlneite Laisiangthou thute ahung tangtun theihna ding a, hihte jousiah hung om ahi,” achi hi.
Tuakhit in nungjuite tengteng in a nusia ua, a taimangta uhi.
Tualeh Jesu mante`n amah siampi Kaiapha inn a laigelhmite leh upate kikhopna ah apaipih ua.
Hinanleh Peter in siampi inn dong in gamlatak in amah ajui a, avalut a, atawptan theihsawm in silate lak ah avatou hi.
Tuachi`n siampite leh upate leh vaihawmmite jousiahin, Jesu a thahtheihna ding un, theihpihtu diklou a zong ua;
hinanleh amukei uhi, theihpihtu diklou tampi hungpai nanle uh amutuan kei uhi. Atawp in theihpihtu diklou nih a hungpai ua
“Hihpa`n, ‘Pasian tempul hihsia in nithum sung in lamthakthei ka hi achi hi,’ ” achi ua.
Tualeh siampi a dingdok a, “Nang bangmah a dawnglou ding maw? Hihte hung hekna bang chidan ahia?” achi hi.
Hinanleh Jesu daidide in a om a, tuatak in siampi in a kiang ah, “Pasian hing min in kungvau ahi: Pasian Tapa Krist nahihleh hihlouh hunghilh in,” achi hi.
Jesu`n a kiang ah, “Na chita hi. Hinanleh kung hilh ahi: tunung chiangin Mihing Tapa silbawltheihna jiatlam a tou leh van meipi tung a hungpai na mu ding uhi!” achi hi.
Tuachi`n siampi in apuan a botkek a, “Pasian agensia hi! Theihpihtu dang bang i poimoh lai dia! Ngaiun Pasian agensiatna tuin naja uhi! achi hi.
Bang na chingaih ua?” achi a.
Amauhte`n adawng ua, a kiangah, “Sitak ahi,” achi uhi.
Tuachi`n amaiah chil aphih ua; a khuttum un atum ua, khenkhat in akhutphang ua beng in,
“Nang Krist! Hunghilh in kua ahia hungbeng!” achi uhi.
Tualeh Peter pualam ah huangsung ah atou a; nungak khat a kiangah a hungpai a, “Nang zong Galilimi Jesu tawh lawikhat nahi,” achi a.
Hinanleh aman, “Na thugen ka theikei chi`n aun ua amai uah theimoh akipang a.”
Tualeh innlim a avapawt khiat tak in nungak dang khat in amah ana mu a, huamun a omte kiangah, “Hihpa zong Nazareth Jesu kiang a om ahi,” achi a.
Hinanleh aman, “Hihpa ka theingai kei achia, kichiam in a kitheihmoh bawl kikta hi!”
Tualeh tomkhat zoh in huamun a dingte a hungpai ua Peter kiangah, “Nang zong alak ua mikhat hi ngel teh, na ham in akithei hi!” achi ua.
Tuachi`n aman, “Hihpa ka theingai kei! chi`n hamsia kiloh in a kichiamta hi!”
Tuatakin ak ahung khuangpaita hi.
Tuatakin Peter in Jesu thugen, “Ak khuanma in nang thumvei nung kitheihmoh bawl ding, achih ahung theikhiata a.” Tuachi`n pualam ah apawt a, akap ngutngutta hi.
Jingsang ahunghih in siampite leh vantang upate jousiah Jesu thahna dingin a kihoukhawm ua.
Tualeh amah ahenkhit un apaipih ua, gam ukpa Pontia Pilat kiangah a piakhiata uhi.
Tuachi`n Juda, a mansakpa in Jesu siamlouh a tangsak uh chih a theihtak in a kisik a, daan dangka sawmthum pen siampite leh vantang upate kiangah ahung nungtawi a.
“Midik sisan kakhok pen sil kana bawlkhial hi!” achi hi.
“Tua koutawh bang kisai ahia? Na lawhlawh kilawh ve!” achi uhi.
Tuachi`n aman daan dangka sawmthum pen tempul sung ah apailut a, apawt a, paiin ava awklumta hi.
Hinanleh siampite`n daan dangka pen ala ua, “Sisan man ahihjiak in hihpen thohlawm bawm a koih asiang kei,” achi ua.
Tualeh amauh a kihoukhawm ua, khualzinmite vuina dingin hua sum in bel khengpa lou aleita uhi.
Tuajiakin tuamun pen tunitan in sisan mun achi uhi.
Tuachi`n Jawlnei Jeremiah thugen: “Israeltate lak a kuate hiam in ana saksa uh amah man ding daan dangka sawmthum pen alata ua,
Toupa`n a hunghilh bangin belkhengtu mun man dingin apia uh,” chih ahung tangtungta hi.
Tuachi`n Jesu gam ukpa maiah ading a, tualeh gam ukpa`n, “Judate kumpipa nahi hiam?” chi-in adong a.
Jesu`n a kiangah, “Na gen bangbang in himah ing,” achi hi.
Tualeh siampite leh vantang upate`n amah aheklai un, aman bangmah in adawng kei hi.
Tuachi`n Pilat in a kiang ah, “Ahung hekna tengpi uh zalou nahi maw?” achi hi.
Hinanleh aman kamkhat in zong a dawng kei a, tuachi`n gam ukpa`n lamdang asa mahmah hi.
Tualeh paikan ankuang luini chiang a gam ukpa`n thongkia khat mipite`n atel penpen uh a khahkhiat jel ahihdan ngaina ahi hi.
Tualeh huahun laitak in Barabba kichi thongkia minthang tak khat a om hi.
Huajiakin amauh ahung kikhop tak un, Pilat in akiang uah, “Kua hung pawtsak leng na ut ua? Barabba maw? Jesu Krist kichi?” achi hi.
Ajiak hazat man a Jesu ama khut a pia uh ahi, chih aman athei hi.
Tualeh vaihawmna touna a atoulai in, azi-in a kiangah mi asawl a, “Hua midik tung ah bangmah bawlken, tunin amah jiakin kamang in sil tampi kathuak hi,” ava chisak hi.
Hinanleh siampite leh vantang upate`n Barabba nget a Jesu hihlum ding a ngen ding in mipite akhem ua.
Gam ukpa`n adong a akiang uah, “Hih nih tegel lak a kuapen hung khahkhia leng na ut ua?” achi a.
A mau`n, “Barabba!” achi uhi.
Pilat in akiang uah, “Ahihleh Jesu Krist kichi bang kalawh diai?” achi a, aun un akiang ah,
“Kross ah kilhden in om hen!” achi ua.
“Bangding inla? Aman bang bawlkhial anei a?” achi a.
Amau`n, “Kross ah kilhden in om hen!” chi-in ngaihjaw sem in akikou uhi.
Pilat in bangmah lawh theihlouh leh buaina semsem hiding ahi chih amuhtak in, tui ala a, mipi mai a akhut sil in, “Hih midik sisan ah mawhna ka neikei! Nou na lawhlawh kilawh un!” achi hi.
Tuachi`n mipi jousiahin adawng ua, “A sisan mawh koute tung leh ka tate uh tung ah om hen!” achi ua.
Tuakhit in aman Barabba akiang uah a khahkhiata a, tualeh Jesu ajepzoh in kross a khailup dingin a piakhiata hi.
Tuakhit in gam ukpa galkapte`n Jesu kikhopna innpi sung ah alutpih ua, galkap jousiah akim ah ahung kikhawm ua.
Tualeh amauhte`n apuan asutkhiat sak ua, puan sandup asilhsak uhi.
Tualeh linglukhu aphan ua, akhusak ua, akhut jiatlam ah pumpeng chiangkhut atawisak ua, tualeh amai a khupdin in akun ua, “Chibai Judate kumpipa!” chi`n chiamnuih bawlnan anei uhi.
Tualeh atung ah chil asiat ua, pumpeng chiang alaksak ua, alu satnan anei uhi.
Tualeh amah chiamnuih bawlna a aneihzoh un, puansandup asutkhiat sak ua, ama puante asilhsak ua, kross a kilhden dingin a paipihta uhi.
Tualeh ahung pawtdok uleh Kurini mi amin Simon kichi mikhat amu ua, amah kross puading in aman uhi.
Tualeh Golgotha kichi mun a hungtun un, “Hua pen luguh mun chihna ahi.”
Amauhte`n uain silkha tawh kihel dawn ding in apia ua, aman achep takin a dawnnuam kei hi.
Tualeh kross a akilhden khit un, aisan in a puansilhte akihawm ua; Jawlneiin, Amau`n ka puante a kihawm ua, ka puan-ak tual tung ah ai asan uh, chia anagen atangtun na ding in.
Huamun ah atou ua, avengta uhi.
Tualeh ahekna, “HIH JUDATE KUMPIPA JESU AHI,” chia gelh alutung ah atak uhi.
Tualeh amah tawh suamhat nih zong akilhden ua, ajiatlam ah khat aveilam ah khat.
Tualeh mi vaklehte`n alu uh lawhkhum in a enghou uhi.
“Nang tempul hihsia a nithum sung a lamkik dingpa! Nang leh nang kihunkhia tanla Pasian Tapa nahihleh! Kross a pan hung kumkhia in!” achi ua.
Tuachimah bangin siampite`n enghou in laigelhmite leh upate tawh:
“Aman midangte a hundam a; amah leh amah a ki hundamthei kei. Israelte kumpipa ahihleh kross dawn a pat hungkumta henla? Tuahileh igingta mai ding uh!
Aman Pasian amuang vele: ama deih ahihleh tuin hunkhiata henla, Pasian Tapa ka hi achi vele!” achi ua.
Hua suamhatte amah tawh kross a akilhdente un zong huachimah bangin a enghou uhi.
Dak gukna pan dak kuana dongin gamsung pumpi ah khim ahung ji`ng a.
Tualeh dakkua tuam in Jesu aw ngaihtak in akikou a, “ELOI, ELOI, LAMA SABAKTHANI?” achi hi, tuapen “Ka Pasian, ka Pasian bangding a hung taisan?” chihna ahi.
Akiang a ding mi khenkhatte`n, tua ajaktak un, hihpa`n, “Elijah sam ahi!” achi ua.
Alak ua mikhat kintakin avataipai a sponzi ala a grep tuithuk ah adiah a, pumpeng dawn ah atak a, adawnsak tou hi.
Midangte`n, “Huachisak in, amah hundam dingin Elijah a hungpai ei enni!” achi ua.
Jesu aw ngaihtak in a kikou kik a, akha akhahta hi.
Tualeh ngaiin, tempul puanjak a tunglam a pan in a nuailamtan in keknih ahung kisuah a; jin ahung ling a, suangpite ahung pokkek a,
tualeh hante ahung kihong a; misiangthou sisate pumpi tampi kaithoh in a omta uhi.
Tualeh ama thohkik nung in hante a pat hung pawtdok in khuapi siangthou ah alut ua, mi tampi kiang ah akilak uhi.
Tuachi`n galkap zalamkai leh akiang a Jesu veng a omten jinling leh sil hung omte amuh tak un alau mahmahta ua, “Hihpa Pasian Tapa ahi taktak na hi!” achi uhi.
Tualeh Galili gam a pat a ana sepsakjel kawm a Jesu hungjui numei tamtak huamun ah a om ua, gamlatak a pat a en uhi.
Huate lak ah Mari Magdalini, Mari Jakob leh Joseph nu, Zebedi tapate nu Mari a om uhi.
Nitaklam ahunghih in Jesu nungjui hive Arimathai khua a om amin Joseph mihausa khat a hungpai a.
Amah Pilat kiangah apai a, Jesu luang a ngen a, tuachi`n Pilat in pia dingin thu apia hi.
Tuachi`n Joseph in aluang ala a, puan malngat siangtak in atuam a,
ahanthak, suang akhuak hawm ah asial a, han kongkhak ah suang lianpi khat aliklut a, apaita hi.
Mari Magdalini leh Mari dangte han mai ah touin a om uhi.
Tualeh ajingni in, hua hi kiginni jingni ahi a, siampite leh Pharisaite Pilat kiang ah ahung kikhawm ua.
“Siapa, hih mikhemhat pa`n adamlai in, ‘Nithum zohchiang in ka thoukik ding achih ka theigige uhi.’

Tuajiakin han pen nithum tan hoihtak a veng dingin thu pia in, atuachih keileh jan kal in a nungjuite paiin amah avagu kha ding ua, mipilak ah, misi lak a kipan a thoukikta hi, achi khading uhi; tuachi`n khemna masa sang in khemna nunung pen asiajaw sem ding,” achi ua.
Pilat in akiang uah, “Vengmi galkapte nanei ve ua le,” “Pai unla na hihtheih bang un venghoihsak ta unla,” achi a.
Tuachi`n apai ua han a enchian ua, asuang achiamteh ua, vengtu akoihta uhi.
Khawlni khit nipi kal a ni masapen phalvak in Mari Magdalini leh Mari dangte han en ding in a hungpai ua.
Ngaiin jin thupitak ahung ling a, Pasian vantungmi van a pat in ahung kumsuk a, tualeh hungpai in hankong a pat suang ahung likkhia a, atung ah atouta hi.
Amel kilatdan ahihleh tunphe bang mai ahi a, a puansilh ahihleh vuk bang a ngou ahi.
Tualeh amah alaujiak un vengtute a kithing ua, misi bangin ahung omta uhi.
Hinanleh vantungmi-in numeite a houpih a akiang uah, “Laukei un,” “A kilhden uh Jesu nazong uh chih kathei hi.
Hihsan ah a om nawn kei aman agensa mahbang in a thoukikta hi. hungpai unla alupna mun hung en un.
Tualeh kintakin pai unla, a nungjuite kiangah ‘Misi lak a kipan a thoukikta; ngaiun, Galili gam ah namai uah apai!’ Huasan ah amah namu ding uh, chi-in vahilh un, ngaiun kung hilhta ahi,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n amauh lau leh kipak kawm in han a pat in manlang takin apaita ua, a nungjuite hilh dingin ataita uhi.
Tualeh nungjuite hilh ding a apailai un, ngaiun, Jesu`n amauhte aki muhpih a, akiang uah, “Na kiang uah khamuanna om hen,” achi a. Tuachi`n amau`n a kengte tuin abia uhi.
Tuachi`n Jesu`n akiang uah, “Laukei un, pai unla ka sanggamte Galili gam a pai dingin vahilh un, huasan ah ahung mu ding uhi,” achi hi.
Tuachia amauhte apailai un, ngaiun vengtu khenkhat khuapi sung ah avapai ua, siampite kiangah sil omdan jousiah avahilh ua.
Tualeh upate tawh akikhop ua akihou zoh un galkapte sum tampitak apia ua
akiang uah, “Ka ihmut kal un, a nungjuite a hungpai ua amah ana gumangta uh, chi un, achi uhi.
Tualeh gam ukpa`n hihte anajak ta`kleh zong, kouman ka khem lungdam ding ua, nou kung hunkhia nading uh hi,” achi uhi.
Tuachi`n dangka ala ua, amauh ahilh bangbang un abawlta ua; Judamite lak ah hihthu tunitan in akigen nalai hi.
Tuachi`n nungjui sawmlehkhatte Galili gam ah Jesu`n amauh a ding a aguatsak mual ah apaita ua.
Amah amuhtak un abia ua, hinanleh khenkhat in aginglel uhi.
Tuachi`n Jesu akiang uah hungpai in amauh a houpih a, “Van leh lei a thuneihna ka kiangah piak ahita.
Tuajiakin pai unla, namchin a mi nungjui in bawl unla, Pa leh Tapa leh Khasiangthou min in baptis un,
thu kungpiak jousiah juiding in thu hilh un, tualeh ngaiun, kei bangchik tan in leitung tawpdong in na kiang uah ka omgige ding,” achi hi. Amen.
Pasian Tapa Jesu Krist tangthupha kipatna;
Jawlnei Isaiah laibu ah:
“Ngaiin, ‘ka sawltak na maiah ka sawl a,
aman na lampi abawl ding.’
Gamdaia kikou aw khat in,
‘Toupa lamlian sial unla;
a lampite tangsak un!’ ”
achi, chia gelh bang in.
Johan in gamdai ah a baptis a, “sil bawlkhialhte ngaihdamna ding a kisikna baptis thu gen in a hungpawt hi.”
Tualeh Judea gam a mi jousiah leh Jerusalem a omte a pawt ua, a kiangah apai ua, a khialhna uh phuangkhia in, Jordan luiah akiang ah baptisma atangchiat uhi.
Tualeh Johan in sangawngsau mul puan in asilh a savun kawng-gak in akawng a gak a, kauphe leh khuaiju ane hi.
Tualeh, “Ka nung a hungpaipa kei sang a hatjaw ahi. Kun-a ama khedap khau sutding nangawn chinlou ka hi.
Ken tuiin nou kung baptis a, hinanleh aman Khasiangthou in noute a hung baptis ding chi`n thu agen hi.”
Tualeh huahun laiin hichi ahi a, Jesu Galili gam Nazareth khua a kipan in a hungpai a, Johan kiangah Jordan luiah baptisma a tangta a.
Tualeh tui a pat ahung pawttak in, van akihong a, Khasiangthou vakhu bang a hung kumsuk, atung a tuang amu a.
Tualeh van a pan aw khat a hungging a; “Nang ka Tapa deihtak na hi, na tungah ka kipak mahmah hi,” achi hi.
Tuakhit phet in kha-in amah gamdai ah a-sawl khia pai a,
Tuachi`n Setan khem a om in gamdai ah ni sawmli a om a. Gamsa gilou lak ah a om a, vantungmite`n a nna a sepsak uhi.
Johan thong a akhum nung un, Jesu Pasian gam tangthupha gen in Galili gam ah a hungpai a.
“Ahun a tungta, Pasian gam anaita hi! kisik unla tangthupha gingta un!” chi-in.
Tualeh Jesu Galili tuipi piau a avak na ah, Simon leh a sanggampa Andru dil a ngenkhuh a mu a, amauhte ngamanmi ahi uhi.
Tuachi`n Jesu`n a kiang uah, “Kei hungjui un, mihing man dingin nou kungbawl ding hi,” achi hi.
Tuatakin amau`n a ngente uh nusia in amah ajuipai uhi.
Hua a kipan themkhat a paibehlaileh, Zebedi tapa Jakob leh a sanggampa Johan amu a, amau a ngen uh phawh a gunkuang sung a om ahi ua.
Tualeh aman amauhte a sam pai a; amauh tegel in zong apa uh Zebedi pen a migoihte utawh gunkuang sungah nusia in ajuita uhi.
Tuachi`n Kapernaum khua ah avalut ua; khawlni-in kikhopna inn ah alutpai a, thu ahilh hi.
Tualeh laigelhmite banglou a, thuneihna neimi bang a amauh thu ahilhjiak in, a thuhilh lamdang asa mah mah uhi.
Tualeh a kikhopna inn uah dawinin pai pasal khat a om a; a kikoukhia a,
ka tang un hung omsak in, “Nazareth Jesu nang tawh kou bang bawl ding nei ihia? Koute hih mangthang ding a hungpai nahi maw? Nang kua nahia chih kungthei hi. Pasian Misiangthou nahi!” achi hi.
Hinanleh Jesu`n a phawk a, “Dai inla, asung a kipan in hungpawt in!” achi a.
Dawinin in amah engbawl a ngaihtak a kikou in asung a kipan ahung pawtkhia hi.
Tualeh aun un lamdang asa mahmah ua, tuachi`n, “Hih bang ahia? Bang chibang thuhilhna thak ahia? Aman thuneitakin dawininte nasan thu apia a, athu amangjel uh!” chi in, a kidong tuah uhi.
Tualeh Galili gam kim tengah gamchin ah atanchin a thangsuak pai hi.
Tualeh kikhopna inn a pan ahung pawtkhiat khit un Simon leh Andru inn ah, Jakob leh Johan tawh alutpai ua.
Simon sungnu nattun a damlou in lupna ah ana lum a, tuathu Jesu ahilhpai uhi.
Tuachi`n amah hungpai in, akhut a tuin a phongtou a, tuachi`n a nattun adamta a, a nna uh a sepsakta hi.
Tualeh nitaklam nitum nung in damlou jousiah leh dawimatte a kiangah ahung paipih uhi.
Tualeh khuapi sung a mi jousiah kotpi bul ah ahung ki khawmkhawm ua.
Aman mi tampi natna tuamtuam a nate a damsak a, dawite tampi zong a hawlkhia a; hinanleh dawite`n amah kua hihiam chih thei ahihman in, aham uh aphalkei hi.
Jingsang baihtak in, khuavak ma in, Jesu athou a, a pawtkhia a, munsip ah apai a, huamun ah athumta ahi.
Tualeh Simon leh akiang a omten azong ua,
Amah amuhtak un a kiangah, “Mi jousiahin nang a hungjong uhi!” achi uhi.
Aman akiang uah, “Aban a khuate ah paini. Hualak ah zong ka thupuak ka phuankhiat theih nang in, tua mah kungpaina san ahi,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n a kikhopna inn uah a thupuak gen in Galili gam teng ah apai kawikawi a, dawite a hawlkhia hi.
Phak mi khat a kiangah a hungpai a, amai a khupdin in; “Na ut leh nung siangthousak thei hi, chi`n ahung ngen ngutngut a.”
Tuachi`n Jesu`n amah a lainat mahmah a, akhut ajan a, akhoih a, “Ka ut hi, na siangthouta in!” achi hi.
Hihthu agen khitkhit in, phak in amah a nusiapai a, ahung siangthouta hi.
Jesu`n khauhtak a khamna tawh amah a sawlkhiata hi.
“Kuamah kiang ah bangmah genlou dingin pilvang in. Hinanleh Siampu kiang ah vakilak inla, na kisiansuahna dingin Mosi-in sil a sehte lan in, a theihchet na ding un,” achi hi.

Hinanleh amah a paikhia a tua thu mipi lak ah a genjakta hi. Tuabang ahihman in Jesu a langtang in khuapi ah a lutthei takei a, gamdai kuamah omlouhna ah a omjawta hi. Hinapi`n munteng a pat in a kiangah mite a hungpaijel uhi.
Ni bangjah hiam nungin Jesu Kapernaum khua ah ahung lutkik a; tualeh inn ah a om chih mipite`n athei uhi.
Tuachi`n kongkhak kim tanpha a omna ding omlou khop in mi tampi ahung kikhawmpai ua, Aman akiang uah thu agen a.
Mijeng khat mi li in hungjong in a kiangah ahung paipih ua.
Tualeh mi tamjiak a Jesu kiangnai a ahung paitheihlouh tak un, a omna inntung ahong ua; aphehvang zoh un mi jengpa alupna tawh a khaikhia suk uhi.
Jesu`n aginna uh amuhtak in jeng a damloupa kiangah, “Tapa na khialhnate ngaihdam ahita,” achi hi.
Hinanleh laigelhmite khenkhat huamun a tou aom ua; a lungsim un,
“Bangding a hihpa`n Pasian gensia a hichibang thu gen ahia? Pasian chihlouh kua ahia khialhna ngaidamthei!” chi`n a ngaihtuah uhi.
Hinanleh Jesu`n a lungsim un huachibang in a ngaihtuah uh chih akha-in athei a. Aman akiang uah, “Hichibang bangding a na lungsim ua ngaihtuah nahi ua?
Mijeng kiangah, ‘Na khialhnate ngaihdam ahita,’ chih leh, ‘Thou inla na lupna la inla paita in, chih khoi a baihlam jaw ei’?
Hinanleh mihing Tapa in leitung ah na khialhnate uh ngaihdam theihna anei chih natheihna ding un,” mijeng kiang ah,
“Thou inla, na lupna la inla na innlam ah paita in kungchi ahi!” achi hi.
Amah a thoupai a, alupna la-in aun ua amitmuh un a pawtdokta hi. Tuachi`n aun un lamdang asa ua, “Hichibang mawng mawng i mungai naikei uh!” chi`n Pasian aphatta uhi.
Tuachi`n amah tuipigei ah apaikhia kik a, tualeh mipi jousiah a kiangah a hungpai ua, aman thu anahilh hi.
Tuachia apailai in Alphai tapa Levi siah donna zum
Tualeh hichi ahung hi a, Jesu`n Levi inn ah an a im a, siah dongmi leh mikhial tampite`n Jesu leh a nungjuite a impihchiat ua. Tampi ahi ua, a nung ajui uhi.

Tualeh Laigelhmite leh Pharisaite`n siah dongmite leh mikhialte tawh an anekkhawm uh amuhtak un, amau`n a nungjuite kiang ah, “Bang-chidan ahia siah dongmite leh mikhialte tawh anek a, adawn?” achi ua.

Jesu`n hih ajaktak in, akiang uah, “Mi chidamte`n daktor a poimohkei ua, hinanleh mi chinate`n a poimohjaw uh; mi diktakte sam ding a hungpai ka hikei a, mikhialte kisiksak ding a hungpai ka hijaw hi,” achi hi.
Johan nungjuite leh Pharisaite`n an a ngawljel ua. Tuachi`n a hungpai ua a kiangah, “Bangding a Johan nungjuite leh Pharisaite`n an ngawl uh a, na nungjuite`n an a ngawllouh uh?” achi ua.
Tualeh Jesu`n a kiang uah, “Mou neipa akiang ua a om laiin Mou neipa lawmte`n an a ngawl ngai uh maw? Mou neipa amauh tawh akiang ua a omsawt laisiah an a ngawlkei ding uhi!
Hinanleh Mouneipa akiang ua kipan a puakmang ni a hungtung ding a, tuachi`n huani chiangin a ngawl ding uhi.
“Mi kuaman puanlui puanthak them in a phawhngai kei, phawh nanle uh, a phawhna pen in aluipen a kaikek ding a, asiajaw sem ding hi.

Tualeh mi kuaman uain thak savun thawl luiah athunngai kei, thuntale uh uain thak in savun thawl lui aphukek ding a, uain akibua ding a amangthang ding hi. Uain thak savun thawlthak a thun ding ahijaw hi,” achi hi.
Tualeh hichi ahi a, khawlni in Jesu buhleilak ah apaisuak a. A paikawm un a nungjuite`n buhvuite ajut ua.
Tuachi`n Pharisaite`n a kiangah, “En in, bangding a amau`n khawlni a bawl sianglou bawl uh ahia!” achi ua.
Aman akiang uah, “David leh a lawite a taksap ua, a gilkiallai ua a silbawl uh simkhalou nahi umaw?
Abiathar siampi ahih lai a, Pasian inn a lut a Siampute chihlouh nek sianglou tangkou sehtuam anek a, alawite kiang a zong apiak thute,” achi hi.
Tualeh aman akiang uah, “Khawlni mihing a ding a siam ahi a, mihing khawlni a ding a siam hilou hi.
Tuajiakin Mihing Tapa ahihleh khawlni Toupa ahi.”
Tuachi`n kikhopna inn ah a lutkik a, huasan ah khutjeng mikhat a om hi.
Tualeh mi pawlkhat in amah a hektheihna ding un khawlni-in a damsak leh damsaklouh adap-et ua.
Jesu`n khut jengpa kiangah, “Mipi maiah ding in,” achi a,
Tuachi`n Jesu`n amauhte kiang ah, “Khawlni a silhoih bawl maw asiang, silsia maw? Hundamna maw asiang, hihlup maw?” chi in adong hi.
Hinanleh amauh a daidide ua.
A lungtang uh atakjiak a lungkham leh hehkawm a amauhte a et kawikawi nung in, “Khut jengpa kiangah na khut jan in,” achi a. Aman a jankhia a, tuachi`n a langkhat bangin ahung damsiangta hi.
Tuachi`n Pharisaite a pawtkhia ua Jesu thah ding dan Herod pawl a mite tawh a kikum uhi.
Hinanleh Jesu a nungjuite tawh dil lam ah apaita ua; Galili gam a kipan mipi tamtak in anung ajui ua,
a silbawl thupidan ajak un, Judea gam a kipan, Jerusalem khua a kipan, Idumai gam a kipan, Jordan gal a kipan Tura leh Sidon khuakim a kipan in, mipi tamtak a kiangah a hungpai ua.
Mipite jiakin amah a ding a gunkuang neu khat mansa a koih ding in a nungjuite thu ahilh a, atuachih keileh ahung nehgawp ding uh, achi hi.
Aman mi tampi ana damsakta a, tuachi`n natna nei jousiahin amah a khoihkhak theihna ding un abawh lutlut uhi.
Kha giloute`n amah amuhtak un amai a puk in, “Nang Pasian Tapa nahi chi in a kikoujel uhi!”
Hinanleh aman amah kua hihiam chih gendoklou dingin khauhtak in akham hi.
Jesu mualtung lam ah a kahtou a, adeihtuamte a sam a, amau a kiangah avapai ua.
“Tualeh a kiang a om ding leh a thupuak gen a asawl ding in sawmlehnihte a namdet a,
tualeh damloute damsak theihna leh, dawite nohdok theihna thuneihna nei ding in.”
Ama seh sawnlehnihte hihte ahi uh: Simon (Peter chia amin aphuak pa);
Zebedi tapa Jakob leh a sanggampa Johan, (Aman Bonerges a sa, “Huapen van ging tapa chihna ahi”);
Tualeh Andru, Philip, Bartholomai, Mathai, Thoma, Alphai tapa Jakob, Thaddai, Kananmi Simon,
tualeh a mansakpa Juda Iskariot zong ahi uh; Tuachi`n amauhte innsung ah alut uhi.
Tualeh amauhte an na-ngawn netheilou khop in mipi ahung kikhawm kik ua.
A inkuanpihte`n hihthu ajaktak un, “A lungsim venglou ahita chi in pummat asawm uhi.”
Tualeh Laigelhmite Jerusalem a pat a hungpaisukte`n, “Beelzebul pai ahi, dawimangpa jiakin ahi dawite adelhdok achi ua.”
Tuachi`n Jesu`n amauhte asam a akiang uah gentehna in thu agen a, “Bangchi`n Setan in Setan adelhdok diai?
Gamkhat kilangkhen in kidouleh agam ading thei kei ding.
Tualeh innsung khat kilangkhen in kidouleh, hua inkuan zong adingdok kei ding hi.
Setan zong amah leh amah kidou in kilangkhen leh adingdok jou kei ding a, a mangthang jaw ding hi.
“Mi kuaman mihatpa ka`n masa loupi in mihatpa inn a lut in avan a hihsiatsak ngaikei, a ka`ntawm jawh chiangin ahihsiatsak thei pan ding hi.
“Adiktak in kung hilh ahi, mihing tate akhialhna jousiah uh leh Pasian gensiatna lam a a gensiatna jousiahte uh ngaihdam ahi ding ua.
Hinanleh kuapeuh khasiangthou gensia bangchiktan in ngaihdam ahikei ding a, tangtawn khialhna a lauhhuai ah aomjaw ding,” achi hi.
“Dawinin-pai ahi achihjiak ua hihthu agen ahi.”
Tuanung in anu leh a sanggamte a hungpai ua, inn Pualam a dingin amah sam dingin mi asawl uhi.
Tualeh akim ah mipi atou diamduam ua, a kiangah, “Inn pualam ah nanu leh na sanggamte`n ahung jong uh,” achi ua.
Tualeh aman akiang uah, “Ka nu leh ka sanggamte kuate ahia?” achi a.
Tuachi`n akim a toute a en kawikawi a, “En un! Ka nu leh ka sanggamte! achi hi.
Kuapeuh Pasian deihlam bawl taphot ka sanggampa, ka sanggamnu leh kanu ahi,” achi hi.

Tualeh aman tuipi piau ah thuhilh apan kik a, tualeh mipi tamtak a kiangah ahung kikhawm ua, tuachi`n tuipi tung a gunkuang sungah alut a, atou a, tualeh mipi jousiah tuipilam nga in tuipi piau ah leitak ah aom uhi.
Tuachi`n aman gentehna zang in thu tampi amauhte ahilh a:
“Ngaikhia unla! En un, khaichithehpa khaichi theh ding in a kuan a.
Tualeh hichi ahung hi a, athehlai in, khenkhat lamsik ah atu a; tungleng vasate hungpaiin anejouta uhi.
Khenkhat suangsilei, lei tamlouhna lak ah atu a; lei asahlouh jiakin a poupai a.
Hinanleh ni ahungsan in ahaivul a; tualeh jung aneihlouh jiakin a gawsiangta hi.
Tualeh khenkhat ling lak ah atu a; alingte hung khang in adepmangta a, gah aneikei uhi.
Hinanleh khenkhat leihoihlak ah atu a, apou a, hungkhang in gah anei a, aleh sawmthum, aleh sawm guk tualeh jakhat bang in ahung pungta hi,” achi hi.
Tualeh aman akiang uah, “Jakna ding bilnei jousiahin ja hen!” achi hi.
Hinanleh amah guak a a omlai in, Sawm leh nihte tawh akiang a omten gentehna thu adongchian ua.
Tualeh aman akiang uah, “Nou kiangah Pasian gam thugu`k piak ahi a, hinanleh pualam mite a ding in pen, bangkim gentehna a gen ahi,
tuachi`n,
‘Muh jaw a muthei ua,
a theisiam kei ding uh;
ja jaw ajathei ua,
angaihna a theikei ding uh.
Ahuachih keileh denchiah ahung kiheikik kha ding ua,
a khialhnate uh ngaihdam ahi kha ding uh,’ ”
achi hi.
Tualeh aman akiang uah, “Hih gentehna thu theisiamlou nahi uh maw? A tuachih leh bangchi`n gentehna thudang tengteng na theisiamta ding uale?
Buhchithehpa`n thu atheh ahi.
Tualeh lamgei a thu athehte hichibang ahi, thu ajaktak un manlang takin Setan hung paiin a lungtangte ua thute a laksakpai hi.
Tualeh tuachimah bang in suangsilei a thehte hihte ahi uh; amau`n thu ajaktak un kipaktak in a sangpai uhi.
Hinanleh a mauh ah jung aneikei ua, tomnou khat sung a om uhi. Tuanung in thu jiak a gimthuakna hiam, vuakna hiam ahung om chiangin akipuk pai uhi.
Tualeh ling lak a kithehte hihte ahi uh, amau`n thu aja ua,
leitung hinkhua ngaihsutnate, hauhsak utna khemnate, leh sil dangdang deihgohnate hunglut in thu adep a, gahtheilou in a omta hi.
Hinanleh leihoihlak a thehte hihte ahi uhi. Thu ja a, sa`ng a, aleh sowmthum bang, aleh sawmguk bang tualeh jakhat bang in agah uhi,” achi hi.
Aman akiang uah a genkik a, “Meivak akoihna a koihlou a, lawhnuai hiam, lupna nuai hiam a koihding in kuan a hungtawi ngai a?
Thanglou ding a im bangmah a omngai kei a, langlou ding a phual bangmah a omngai kei.
Kuapeuh jakna ding a bilnei jousiahin ja uhen!”
Tuachi`n aman akiang uah, bang ahia najak uh pilvang un; natehna ngaimah un ahung tehsak ding ua, tualeh nou a ngaikhiate kiang ah, ahung piak behlap ding uh atamjaw piak in na om ding uhi.
“Kuapeuh anei kiangah piakbeh ahi ding a; hinanleh kuapeuh aneilou kiangah aneihsun zong laksak ahi ding,” achi hi.
Tualeh aman, “Pasian gam pen min lei a khaichi atuh tawhbang ahi;
Janchiah a ihmu a, sunchiah athoujel a, khaichi anapou in, anakhang a, hinanleh bangchi a pou a, bangchi a khang ahia chih a theikei.
Leiin amah in gah ahung suahjel a; amasan anah tuazohchiah avui, tuazohchiah avui a atang.
Hinanleh agah ahungmin chiangin buhlak ahuntak man in Kawite in a at paita hi, achi hi.”
Tuachi`n aman, “Pasian gam bang tawh itehkak tadiai?” Ahihkeileh “Bangtawh tehkhin a gen ding ita ua?
Ankam chi tangkhat leia akituh chiang, lei a khaichitang tengteng sang in neupen nanleh.
Atuhkhit nung un a hungpou a, Loupa jousiah sang in ahung lianjaw a, ba lianpipi a hungnei a, tuachi`n tungleng vasate alim ah agiak uhi, huachibang mah ahi,” achi hi.
Tualeh hichibang gentehna thu tampi in a jaktheih khomkhom un, thu akiang uah agen jel hi.
Hinanleh aman gentehna louin akiang uah thu agenngai kei. Tualeh amauh guak a aom chiang un a nungjuite kiangah sil bangkim a hilhchian jel hi.
Tuani mah in, nitaklam a hunghih in, aman akiang uah, “Galkhat lam ah igalkah ding uh,” achi a,
Amau`n mipite a paisan zoh un, gunkuang a aom bangbang in amah a paipihta ua. Tualeh akiang uah gunkuang neu dang zong aom hi.
Tualeh huihpi hattak ahunglang a, tui kihotte, gunkuang sung ah a hunglut juajua a; tuachi`n gunkuang a hungdim phialta hi.
Hinanleh amah gunkuang mawng langkhat lam ah tangkham kham in ihmu in a om a. Tualeh a phong ua, a kiangah, “Siapa, ka manthai ding uh khawk salou nahi maw?” achi ua.
Tuachi`n amah ahungthou a, huih atai a, tualeh tuipi kiangah, “Dai in! Om khinkhian in!” achi a. Tuachi`n huih a tawpta a, a sipdideta hi.
Hinanleh aman a kiang uah, “Bangding a hichilau nahi ua? Ginna himhim na neihlouh uh bang chidan ahia?” achi hi.
Tualeh amauh lau chihtak in alauta ua, “Hihpa bang chibang mi ahia? Huih leh tuipi nangawn in athu aman uh!” chi in khat leh khat a kichituah uhi.
Tuachi`n tuipi gal Garasin mite gam a hungtung ua.
Tualeh gunkuang a pat ahung pawtkhiattak in, mi khat han a pat a hungpawt in amah anatuak pai a.
Amah hanlak a teng ahi a; tualeh kuaman sikkhau nangawn in a hentheikei uhi.
Kol bulh in sikkhau in anakanta ua; hinanleh sikkhaute a bottan a, kolte a botsia jel a, kuamah in a thujohkei uhi.
Tualeh sun leh jan in mualte leh hante ah omjing in akikou a, suang in aki-at jel hi.
Aman gamla tak a pat Jesu amuh tak in, tai in, a vabiata a,
tualeh amah aw ngaihtak in a kikou a, “Jesu Pasian tungnung pen Tapa! nang leh ken bang ahia bawlding kaneih? Hung gimsak lou dingin Pasian min in kung ngen hi!” achi hi.
Aman a kiangah, “Nang kha-nin, hihpa sung a pan hungpawt in!” ana chita a.
Tuachi`n aman, “Na min bang ahia?” chi in adong a.
Tualeh aman a kiangah, “Ka min ahihleh ‘Nuai ahi,’ tampi ka hihjiak un!” achi a.
Hua gam a kipan amauh sawlmanglou dingin a kiangah angen ngutngut a.
Tualeh huasan ah mual pang ah vok tampi a om a.
Tuachi`n dawininte jousiahin, “Vok sungah hungsawl in asung ua ka luttheihna ding un,” chi in a kiangah a ngen ua.

Tuachi`n Jesu`n amauh thu apia a, tuachi`n Dawininte a pawtkhia ua, vok sungah alut ua; tualeh vokhonte sangnih bang ahi ua, vokhonte ken a pat in tuipilam juan in hahtai in a hungtai ua; tuilak ah a kialumta uhi.
Tuachi`n vok chingte atai ua, hihthu khuapi leh gam teng ah ahilhta uhi. Tualeh bang sil hungtung ata chia en ding in mipite ahung taikhawm uhi.
Tuachi`n amauhte Jesu kiang ah a hungpai ua, dawi-mat nuai khat paipa puan silh a, lungsim ngaina pua a anatou ahung mu ua; tuatakin alauta uhi.
Tualeh amauhte`n dawimatpa tung a sil tundan leh vok omtan amauh anahilh ua.
Tuachi`n amah tawh agam ua pat a pawtkhia dingin a ngenta uhi.
Tualeh amah gunkuang sung a aluttak in, dawinin paipa in, “Nang tawh pai ka ut!” chi in a kianga om dingin a ngen a.
Hinanleh Jesu`n a phalkei a, a kiangah, “Na inn ah, na lawite kiangah pai inla, Toupa`n nang a ding a silthupi ahung bawlsak dante leh, nang ahung hehpih dante vahilh in,” a chijawta hi.
Tuachi`n a pai a, Jesu`n amah a ding a sil thupi a bawlsak dante Dekapoli khua ah a tangkoupih ta a, mi jousiahin lamdang asa mahmah uhi.
Jesu gunkuang a galkhat lam ahung tunkik takin mipi tamtak akiang ah ahung paikhawm ua, tualeh amah tuipi gei ah a om a.
Tualeh ngaiin, kikhopna inn a vaihawmte lak a mikhat amin Jaira kichi a hungpai a, Jesu amuh takin a kengbul ah akhupbok a.
“Ka tanu naupang nou asi dekdek a, ahung dam a, a hintheihna dingin, hungpai a atung a nakhut nga ding in kungngen hi!” chi`n, chitaktak in a ngen hi.
Tuachi`n Jesu amah tawh apaita a, mipi tampi in ajui ua, aboh lutlut uhi.
Tualeh Numei khat kum sawmlehnih sipawt a damlou aom a,
Daktor tampi lak a pan sil tampi a nathuak in, aneih jousiah ana jangjouta a, hinanleh bangmah a phatuamkei a, a khawk jawsem a.
Aman Jesu tanchin ajaktak in, anung ah mipi lak ah a hungpai a, apuan a khoih a.
“Apuan maimai khoihkha lengzong ka dam ding hi,” chi`n a ngaihsun hi.
Thakhat in asipawt pen akangta a; anatna adamta hi chih ataksa tungah akithei hi.
Tualeh Jesu`n a sung a kipan in silbawltheihna apawt chih atheipai a, mipilak ah akihei kawikawi a, “Kua ahia ka puan khoih?” achi a.
Hinanleh a nungjuite`n a kiangah, mipi in ahung phuk lutlut na mu vele, kua ahia hung khoih nachih, achi ua.
Tualeh aman hua sil bawlnu muh sawm in adak kawikawi a.
Hinanleh numeinu in atung a sil kibawl athei a, lau leh chitun kawm in a hungpai a, a maiah khupbok in, a kiangah thudik jousiah ahilhta hi.
Tualeh aman amahnu kiang ah, “Tanu, na ginna in ahung damsakta hi, pai inla, na natna a kipan na dam tawntungta in,” achi hi.
Aman hihbang a thu agen laiin, kikhopna inn a vaihawmpa inn a kipan mi a hungpai ua, “Na tanu asita ve, bangding a siapa buaisak nalai nahia?” a hungchi ua.
Jesu`n hih thu ajaktak in, kikhopna inn a vaihawmpa kiang ah, “Lauken gingta mai in,” achi hi.
Tualeh aman Peter leh Jakob leh Jakob sanggampa Johan chihlouh in amah ajuih uh aphal kei.
Tuachi`n amah kikhopna inn a vaihawmpa inn ah a hungtung a, ana buai vengvung leh kap a na mau vengvungte amu a.
A valut a akiang uah, “Bangding a kap a mau vengvung nahi ua? Naupangnu asi ahikei, a ihmu ahi!” achi hi.
Tualeh amauhte`n amah a nuihsan ua, ahihhang in aman aun un a notkhia a, naupangnu nu leh pa leh a jawhpihte a paipih a, naupangnu omna ah alut ua.
Tuachi`n aman naupang akhut in akai a akiang ah, “Talitha kumi,” achi a. Tuapen, “Nungaknou, thouin, kungchi hi!” chihna ahi.
Tuachi`n Numei naupang a thoua a paipai ngal a, (amahnu kum sawmlehnih mi ahita a), tuatakin a mau`n lamdang asa mahmah uhi.
Hinanleh aman akiang uah, hih kuamah in theikei heh achi tinten a, “Tualeh nek ding banghiam pia ding in, thu apia hi.”
Tuachi`n hua a kipan in apawt a, ama tenna gam ah a hungpai a, tualeh a nungjuite`n amah ajui ua.

Tualeh khawlni a hunghih in, kikhopna inn ah thuhilh apanta a, tualeh mi tampi athu zate`n “Hipa`n hih thute khoia pan a amuh ahia? A kiang a pilna kipia bangpilna ahia? Akhut in hijahta a silthupi abawl bang chidan ahia?
Hihpa Mari tapa Jakob, Jos, Juda leh Simon sanggampa, sing nasep sempa hilou amaw? A sanggamnute zong hihsan a ikiang ua om hilou ahi uh maw?” achi ua. Tuachi`n atung ah alungkim takei uhi.
Hinanleh Jesu`n a kiang uah, “Jawlnei jaw ama gamsung leh ama inkuante lak leh ama insung ah chihlouh jahbawllouh in a omngai kei hi,” achi hi.
Mi damlou tamloute tung a akhut nga a adamsak chihlouh ngal hih gam ah sillamdang a bawlthei kei hi.
Tualeh a gintatlouh jiak un lamdang asa mahmah hi. Tuachi`n khuate ah thu hilh in avak kawikawi hi.
Tualeh aman sawmlehnihte a kiangah a samkhawm a, nihnih in asawlkhia a, tualeh Dawininte tung a thuneihna zong apia hi.
“Tualeh a khualjinna uah chiangkhut chihlouh bangmah, thungpite, tanghoute, leh akawng a dangka pualou ding in thu apia hi.
Hinanleh khedap bulh unla, puan-ak nih keng kei un,” achi hi.
Aman akiang uah, “Inn khatpeuh a na lutchiang un, huamun a na pawtkhiat masiah uh tua inn ah tung kinken un.

Tualeh kuapeuhin ahung tunsaklouh ua, nathu uh zong a ngaihnuam kei uleh, tua a pan na pawtchiang un, amauh mawhpaihna dingin na kengtaw ua leivui thingkhia un. Adiktak in kung hilh ahi, vaihawmni chiangin tua khua thuak ding sang in Sodom leh Gomorrah thuak ding adan a omjaw ding!” achi hi.
Tuachi`n amauh a pawtkhia ua mite kisik dingin thu ahilh uhi.
Tualeh amauhte`n dawi tampi a notdok ua, damlou tampi sathau nuh in a damsak uhi.
Tualeh kumpi Herod in anaja a, amin athanta`k jiakin, “Baptispa Johan misi lak a kipan-a hung thoukik a! Huajiakin hih silbawltheihnate`n amah ah sem ahive,” achi hi.
Adangte`n, “Elijah ahi achi ua,”
Midangte`n, “Jawlnei ahi, Jawlneite lak a khat ahi,” achi ua.
Hinanleh Herod in hihte ajaktak in, “Alu ka tansakpa Johan ahi ve! Misi lak a pan hung thoukik ahi!” achi hi.
Herod in a sanggampa Philip zi Herodia a kitenpih tak jiakin Herodia jiakin mi asawl a, Johan a mansak a, ka`n in thong ah akhumta hi.
Ajiak Johan in Herod kiangah, “Na sanggampa zi na kitenpih dan ngaina ahikei!” anachi hi.
Tuajiakin Herodia in amah a mudah a thah a ut a, hinanleh a thatthei kei hi.
Herod in Johan hi midiktat leh Siangthoutak ahi chih atheih jiakin a lau a, amah ana humhum a; athu ajak in a lungkham a, hinanleh kipaktak in a ngaikhia jel hi.
Tuachi`n Herod in a pian ni-in ami thupite, galkap lamkai liante, Galili gam a miliante a ding a jahna ankuang aluilai in hun lemtang a hung omta a.
Tualeh Herodia tanu a hunglut a, alam a, tualeh Herod leh a kiang a toute a kipaksakta a, kumpipa`n numei naupangnu kiangah, “Na deihdeih hung ngen in? Kung piading,” achi a.
“Bang khatpeuh nung nget taphot, kungpia ding, ka gam kimkhat tan in zong chi in amahnu kiangah a kichiam hial hi!”
Tuachi`n amahnu vapawt khia in anu kiangah, “Bang ka ngen dia?” chi`n ava dong a.
Tualeh amahnu`n, “Baptispa Johan lutang,” anachi hi.
Kintakin kumpipa kiang ah hunglut in a kiangah, “Tu leh tuin Baptispa Johan lutang kuang khat in hungpia lechin ka ut!” chi-in a ngen a.
Tuachi`n kumpipa a lungkham mahmah a, hinanleh a chiamsa ahihman in leh a kiang a toute jiakin a nial nuam kei a.
Tuachi`n kumpipa`n athat ding in mikhat a sawlpai a, amah paiin thong sung a alu a vatanta a;
a lutang kuang khat in a hungtawi a, numei naupang kiang ah apia a; tualeh numei naupangnu`n anu kiangah a piata hi.
A nungjuite`n ajaktak un aluang avala ua, han ah avuita uhi.
Tuachi`n sawltakte Jesu kiangah ahung kikhawm ua, a silbawlte jousiah uleh a thuhilhnate uh a hunghilh ua.
Tualeh aman akiang uah, “Noumau guak in hungpai unla, munsip ah tomkhat hung khawlphot un,” achi a. Ajiak atung akuan ki phamat den ahihman in an nekna ding hun nasan amukei uhi.
Tuachi`n amauhte gunkuang in munsip ah atuampai ta uhi.
Hinanleh mipite`n apailai uh amu ua, mi tampi in amah athei ua, khuapite a pan keng in a hungtai ua, ana makhelh in a kiangah ahung paikhawm ua.
Tualeh Jesu ahung pawtkhiat takin, mipi tampitak a muta a, chingtu bei belam bang ahihjiak un a hehpih mahmah a; tuachi`n thu ahilh panta hi.
Sun hun tamjaw ahung manzoh tak un, a nungjuite hungpaiin a kiangah, “Hih gamdai mun ahi a, hunlah a jekaita a;
I kim a gamte leh khuate a vapai a nek ding aki leitheihna ding un amauhte sawlkhia in, tanghou nek ding bangmah lah aneingal kei ua,” achi ua.
Hinanleh aman akiang uah, “Nou nek ding pia un,” chi`n adawng a.
Tualeh amauhte`n a kiang ah, “Tanghou makhai zanih man kava lei un nek ding ka pia ding uh maw?” achi ua.
Hinanleh aman akiang uah, “Tanghou phel bangjah nanei ua? Pai unla va en un,” achi a.
Tualeh amau`n atheihtak un, “Phel nga leh ngasa nih,” achi ua.
Tuachi`n aman akiang uah, mipite loupa tung a apawl pawl a tousak dingin amauhte thu apia hi.
Tuachi`n amauh agual gual in jakhat khat bang sawmnga nga bangin atouta ua.

Tualeh aman tanghou phelnga leh ngasa nih alakzoh in vanlam a entou a, gual ajawl a, tanghoute a balkham a, amai ua luisak dingin a nungjuite kiang ah apia a; tualeh ngasa nihte zong amauhte jousiah lak ah a homsakta hi.
Tuachi`n amauhte`n aun un ane ua, avahchiatta uhi.
Tualeh amau`n tanghou nente leh ngasa nente a luak ua, lawh sawmlehnih a dim hi.
Tualeh tanghou nete pasal piching sangnga bang ahi uhi.
Jesu`n mipite a sawl khiat sungin a nungjuite galkhat lam Bethsaida khua a na mapai dingin gunkuang ah atousak pai hi.
Tualeh amauhte tengteng a sawlkhiat khit in thumna neiding in mual ah apaita hi.
Nitak a hunghih in, gunkuang tuipi laiah a omta a; amah guak in gam ah a om hi.
Tuachi`n Jesu`n nungjuite huih in aleh lamlam a amut jiaka gunkuang hot a hahpan a pang amu a, khuavak kuan in amah tuipi tung ah keng a hungpaiin amau lam a hungjuan a, amau paisan suak asawm a.
Tualeh a mauhte`n Tuipi tung a keng a pai amuhtak un, “Sikha khat hinteh!” achi ua, akikou khia ua.
Amau`n amah amuchiat ua, abuaita uhi.
Hinanleh aman amauhte a houpihpai a, “Khamuang takin om un! Keimah ka hi. Laukei un!” achi hi.
Tuakhit in amah gunkuang sung ah akiang uah akah a; huih a khawlta hi. Tuachi`n amauhte`n genzohlouh khop in lamdang asa mahmah uhi.
A lungtangte uh atak jiakin amau`n tanghou a sil omte atheisiam nawn kei uhi.
Amauhte a galkah khit un, Gennesaret gam a hungtung ua, tuamun ah gunkuang a khihta ua.
Amauhte gunkuang a pat a hungpawt tak un, mipite`n amah a theipai ua.
Tua gam kim tengteng ah atai ua, aom hi chih atheihtak un, damloute alupna pum in ahung jawng hial ua.
Khuata hi`n khuapi hi`n ahihkeileh gam hitaleh a lutna taphot ah damloute van juakna mun bang ah alumsak ua, a puanmong bek khoihtheih a ngen ua. Tualeh a khoihkha taphot adam jel uhi.
Tuachi`n Jerusalem a kipan a hungpai Pharisaite leh Laigelhmi khenkhat akiang ah ahung paikhawm ua.
Tualeh amauhte`n a nungjuite khenkhat in khut nin pum a tanghou a nek uh a muta ua, nin chih in, khut sillouh chihna ahi.
Pharisaite leh Judate`n upate thugousiah apom tinten jiak un a khut uh hoihtak a asil kei uleh ane ngai kei uhi. Tuapen khanglui thugousiahte ajuihna uh ahi hi.
Van juakna mun a kipan apaichiang un zong, a kisilphot kei uleh ane ngai kei uhi. Tualeh thugousiah dang tampi achi`n uh aom, nou, noupi bilnei, taubel, lupna sil chihte.
Tuachi`n Pharisaite leh Laigelhmite`n, “Bangding a na nungjuite upate thugousiah bang a omlou a, khut sawplou a tanghou ne uh ahia?” chi`n adong ua.
“Aman akiang uah, Isaiah in nou milepchiahte thu ana genkholh dik talua hi! Hih bangin ana gelh hi:
‘Hihte`n amuk un a hung zahtak ua,
hinanleh a lungtang uh keia pan in a gamla hi.
Tualeh a thuhilhna ua mihing thupiakte ahilh jiak un ahung biak uh athawn ahi,
chih gelh bang in!’
“Pasian thupiakte koihkhia in, mihing thugousiahte najuih tinten jiak uh ahive, noupi leh nou sil leh adang hichibang mah tampi na chiin uh,” achi hi.
Aman akiang uah, “Na thugousiahte uh na zuihtheihna ding ua Pasian thupiakte nialdan na siam mahmah uhi.
Mosi-in, ‘Na nu leh na pa zahtakin,’ tualeh ‘Anu leh apa samsia si heh,’ achi hi.
Hinanleh nou, ‘Mi`n anu hiam apa hiam kiangah nung phattuampihna ding korban ahita,’ achihleh, (Huapen, Pasian kiang a lat, chihna ahi),
Tuazoh chiangin anu leh apa a ding bangmah sepsak naphal nawn kei uhi.
Na thugousiah uh mi na piaksawn na un Pasian thu bangmahlou na suah uhi. Tuabang sil tampi nabawl uhi,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n Jesu`n mipite sam in akiang uah, “Na un un ka thugen ngaikhia unla, theichian un.
A pualam pan a mihing sung a lut in mi aninsakthei bangmah omlou hi. Hinanleh amah sung pan a hungpawt silte in mi aninsakjaw hi.”
Jakna ding a bil neiin, ja hen! achi hi.
Mipite nusia a inn sung a alutkhit in a nungjuite`n gentehna thu a dongchianta ua.
Tuachi`n aman akiang uah, “Nou zong huachipi a theihsiamna neilou nahi uh maw? Bangpeuh pualam a kipan a mihing sung a lut in, amah aninsakthei kei, chih theilou nahi uhiam?
Ajiak ahihleh, a lungtang sung a lut loua, a gilsung a lutjaw a, nek chiteng siangsak a dailenna a pawtkhia mai ahi chih theilou maw?” achi hi.
Tualeh aman, “Mihing sung pan a pawtkhiate in mihing ninsak hi.
Sunglam a, mihingte lungtang a kipan in, ngaihtuahna giloute, angkawmnate, thanghuainate, tualthahnate,
Guktatnate, ennate, gitlouhnate, khemhatnate, huknate, mitsipnate, gensiatnate, kiletsaknate, mot-huainate,
Hih silgiloute jousiah sunglam a pat hungpawt in mihing aninsak jel hi,” achi hi.
Huamun pan in amah ding khia in Tura leh Sidon gam ah apaita a, inn khat sungah alut a, kuamah in a theihlouh ding a ut a, hinanleh a kiphualthei kei hi.
Numei khat, a tanu naupang khanin pai in, a tanchin anaja a, tuachi`n hung paiin a kengbul ah a ku`n a.
Numeinu Grik mi ahi a, Suria gam Phoinisia khua a piang ahi, pianna lam ah Siro-Phoiniki-mi ahi. Amahnu in a tanu sung a khanin nohkhiat sak dingin a kiangah a ngen hi.
Hinanleh Jesu`n a kiang ah, “Tate hungvah masa phot uheh, tate tanghou laksak a uite kiang a paih ahoihkei,” achi hi.
Tualeh amahnu`n a kiangah, “Toupa,” hih jaw ahi a, “hinanleh dohkan nuai a uite`n zong tate tanghou neng kia anejel uh hi!” chi`n a dawng hi.
Tuachi`n aman a kiangah, “Hihbang a nagen man in paita in, dawi na tanu sung a kipan in a pawtta hi!” achi hi.
Tualeh amahnu inn a hungpai takin, atanu dawiin a pawtkhiatsan, lupna a lum ahung muta hi.
Tuachi`n Tura leh Sidon gam a pawtsan kik a, Dekapoli gam Galili tuipi a hungtungta hi.
Tuachi`n mikhat bilbing, ham zong ham chian theilou a kiangah ahung zohpih ua, atung a akhut ngading in a ngen ua.
Tualeh aman mipi lak a kipan apaipih tuam a, akhutjungte in a bilsung a khoihsak a, achil asiat a, tualeh alei a khoihsak a.
Tuachi`n vanlam a entou a, anak-huai a,
Abil a hungvang pai a, aleigui akiphel a, ahung hamsiang theita hi.
Tuachi`n aman kuamah hilhlou dingin thu apia a, hinanleh a hahkham leh a hahgen jawsem uhi.
Tualeh genzohlouh khop in lamdang asa ua, “Aman sil jousiah a bawlhoih a! Bilbingte azasak a, hamtheiloute a hamsak thei jel!” achi uhi.
Tuanite in, mipi atam mahmah ua, nek ding bangmah aneikei ua, Jesu`n a nungjuite asam a akiang uah,
“Mipite tuin ka kiangah nithum nek ding neilou a om uh ahihtak man un ka hehpih mahmah hi.
Gilkial in a inn uah nungsawl leng lamkal ah a husam kha ding uh, khenkhat houh ahung kipatna uh gamlapi ahi,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n a nungjuite`n, “Mi`n hih gamdai ah tanghou tawh hih mipite bangchi`n avahsakthei dia?” chi`n adawng ua.
Aman, “Tanghou bangzah nanei ua?” chi in amauh adong a.
Tualeh amau`n, “Sagih,” achi ua.
Tuachi`n aman mipite tual a tou dingin thu apia a; tualeh tanghou sagihte ala a, kipahthu agen a, abalkham a amai ua lui dingin a nungjuite kiangah apia a; tuachi`n mipite mai ah aluita uhi.
Amau`n ngasa themkhat zong anei ua; aman gual ajawl a, hihte zong amai ua lui dingin thu ahilh a.
Tuachi`n ane ua, a khamchiat ua; a khamval nen uh bawm lianpi sagih dim in aluak uhi.
Ane teng mi sangli bang ahi ua; tuachi`n aman amauhte a paisakta hi.
A nungjuite kiangah gunkuang sungah atuangpai a, Dalmanutha gam a tungta uhi.
Tuachi`n Pharisaite a hungpai ua, amah ze-etna dingin amah a pan van a kipan-a chiamtehna zong in amah a kisel pih uhi.
