Hinanleh amah nakpitak in akhuisa a, “Bangding a tulai khangthakte`n chiamtehna zong uh ahia? Adiktak in kung hilh ahi! Tulai khangthakte kiangah chiamtehna mawng mawng piak ahikei ding!” achi hi.
Tualeh amauhte nusia in gunkuang sungah tuang in a galkhat lam ah apai hi.
A nungjuite`n tanghou akeng manghilh ua, tanghou phelkhat chihlouh gunkuang sungah tanghou dang aneitakei uhi.
Tuachi`n aman akiang uah, Pharisaite tol leh Herod pawlte tol lak ah kiveng unla, pilvang un, achi hi.
Tualeh amauh, “Tanghou i neihlouh jiak hinteh,” chi`n a kingaihtuah ua.
Hinanleh Jesu`n atheihtak in akiang uah, “Bangding a tanghou na neihlouh jiak ua kingaihtuah nahi ua? Tutan a zong theitheilou leh theisiamlou lai nahi uh maw? Na lungtang uh tak nalai ahi maw?
Mit nei napi`n mulou nahi umaw? Tualeh bil nei napi`n zalou nahi umaw? Thei gige nawnlou maw?
Mi sangnga a ding tanghou phelnga ka balkhap laiin a neng bangzah ahia naluak uh?” achi a.
Amau`n a kiangah, “Sawmlehnih,” achi uhi.
“Mi sangli a ding sagih ka balkhap laiin, aneng bawm bangzah ahia naluak uh?” a chikik leuleu a,
Amau`n, “Sagih,” achi ua.
Tuachi`n aman a kiang uah, “Bang achi ei, theisiam lou maw?” achi hi.
Tuachi`n Bethsaida a hungtung ua; a kiangah mittaw khat a hungpua ua, amahpa khoih dingin a kiangah a ngen ua.
Tuachi`n aman mittawpa a khut in atu a, khua pualam ah apaipih a. Tualeh amit ah achil asia a, atung ah akhut akoih a, “Sil khatpeuh a muhtheih leh theihlouh adong hi.”
Tualeh amah a daktou a, “Mite sing bangin paiin ka mu hi,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n aman amit ah akhut a koihkik a. Adaktou sak a, tuachi`n ahung damta a, mi zousiah chiantak in ahung muta hi.
Tuachi`n aman a inn lam uah asawl a akiang ah, “Khuasung ah lut kenla,” khuasung a mi kuamah hilhken, achi hi.
Tuachi`n Jesu leh a nungjuite Kaisaria Philippi khua juan in a paikhiata ua. Tualeh lampi ah aman a nungjuite kiangah, “Mi`n kei kua ahi a hungchi ua?” chi`n adong a.
Amau`n a kiang ah, “Baptispa Johan ahi, a hungchi uh, hinanleh khenkhat in Elijah ahi, a hungchi uh, tualeh midangte`n Jawlnei lak a khat ahi, a hungchi uh, chi`n a dawng ua.”
Aman a kiang uah, “Ahihleh nou kei kua ka hi nungchi ua?” achi a,
Peter in a kiangah, “Krist nahi,” chi`n adawng hi.
Tuachi`n aman a tanchin kuamah hilhlou dingin amauhte khauhtak in akham hi.
“Tualeh mihing Tapa in sil tampi a thuakdingte, upate, Siampite, Laigelhmite deihlouh a aom ding, thah a aom ding, nithum nunga a thohkik ding thu amauh a hilhpanta hi.”
Aman hih thute langtang takin agen a, tuachi`n Peter in amah paipih tuam in atai a.
Hinanleh amah a kihei a, a nungjuite a en a, Peter atai a, “Setan, Ka nung ah pai in, Pasian silte na ngaihsun kei a, mihing silte na ngaihsunjaw hi,” achi hi.
Aman mipite tawh a nungjuite a kiang a asapkhit in akiang uah, “Kuapeuhin ka nung a juihnuam leh,” “Amah kimanghilh in a kross pua in hungjui hen, achi hi.
Kuapeuh a hinna it in ata`n ding a, hinanleh kuapeuh ka min jiak leh tangthupha jiaka a hinna ta`n in a humbit ding.
Mi`n Leitung pumpi nei henla ahinna ta`n taleh amah a ding in bang aphatuam diai?
Ahihkeileh mi`n a hinna ta`ng in bang apiathei diai?

Kuapeuh tulai khangthak angkawm leh sil gilou bawlte lak a keimah leh ka thu zumpih, Mihing Tapa-in a vanmi siangthoute toh a Pa thupina a kivon a hungpai hun chiangin huapa aman zong ajumpih ding,” achi hi.
Tualeh aman akiang uah, “Adiktak in kung hilh ahi, hihsan a ding khenkhatte Pasian gam sil bawltheihna toh hungtung amuhma un, sihna chiamlou ding a om uh,” achi hi.
Niguk nung in Jesu`n Peter, Jakob leh Johan a tonpih a atuam in mual sangtak tung khat ah amauh guak in apaipih a, tualeh amai uah amel omdan ahung lamdangta a,
a puansilhte leitung a puansawpte`n asawp ngou theihlouh khop hial a vuk bang a ngou in ate selsel hi.
Tualeh Elijah Mosi tawh a kiang uah ahung kilak ua, Jesu tawh akihou ua.
Tuachi`n Peter in Jesu ahoupih a, “Rabbi, ei a dingin hihsan a om ahoih hi, hampheng buk thum i bawl ding a, nang a dingin khat, Mosi a dingin khat, Elijah a dingin khat,” achi hi.
Alau mahmah jiak un gen ding bangmah atheikei uhi.
Tualeh meipi hungpai in amauh a hungtuam a, “Tualeh meilak pan aw hungging in, hih ka Tapa deih tak ahi, a thu ngai un!” achi hi.
Kintakin akim akiang uh a en ua, Jesu chihlouh akiang uah midang kuamah a mutakei uhi.
Mual a pan ahung kumsuk laiun, “Mihing Tapa misi lak a kipan athohkik khit masiah asilmuhte uh kuamah hilhlou ding in thu apia hi.”
Tuachi`n hihthu avom kinkenta ua, “Misi lak a pat thohkik achih bang achihna adiam aw?” chi`n a kidong uhi.
Tualeh amauhte`n a kiangah, “Bangding a Laigelhmite`n Elijah a hungpai masa ding ahi, chi ahi ua?” chiin adong ua.

Tuachi`n aman a kiang uah, “Siljousiah bawlhoih thak dingin Elijah hungpai masa him ahi. Tualeh sil tampi athuak ding a, tualeh muhdah leh simmawh bawl in a om ding chi a mihing Tapa tangthu bang chidan a gelh a na om ahia? achi hi.
Hinanleh kung hilh ahi, Elijah ahung paikhinta hi tualeh a tanchin agelh bangbang un atung ah a ut ut un abawlta uh,” achi hi.
Tualeh amah nungjuite kiang a hungtun in, aki`m ua mipi tampitakte leh laigelhmite`n anasel lai uh amu hi.
Mipi jousiahin amah amuh tak un lamdang asa ua, a kiangah a taipai ua, chibai abuk uhi.
Tualeh aman Laigelhmite kiangah, “Amauh tawh bangthu houlim na hi ua?” chi`n a dong hi.
Tuachiang in mipi lak a mi khat in, “Siapa, ka Tapa dawi hamtheilou nei na kiangah kung zohpih hi.

Tualeh a matna mun teng ah apuksak jialjial a, akam ah chilphuan apawt a, aha agawi a, agawng hulhul a, tuachi`n na nungjuite kiangah hung hawlkhiatsak dingin ka gen a, hinanleh amau`n a hawlkhiathei kei uh,” chiin adawng hi.
Tuachi`n aman akiang uah, “Khangthak ginna neiloute aw! Bangtan na kiang uah om ding ka hia? Bangtanvei hung thuakthei ding ka hia? Amah ka kiangah hung paipih un!” chi in adawng hi.
Tuachi`n a kiangah ahung paipih ua.
Tualeh dawiin amah amuhtak in naupangpa hahtak in a bawlgenthei a, tual ah kipuk in chilphuan kai niainuai in a kilik vutvut a.
Tuachi`n aman apa kiangah, “Hichi bang a aom na bangtan ahita a?” chi`n adong a.
Tualeh aman, “A naupan lai a pat ahita,” achi hi.
“Tuachi`n amah bawlsiat sawm in tamveipi meiah leh tuiah a sawnpuk a. Hinanleh nang banghiam bawltheih naneihleh, hung hehpih inla hung panpih in!” achi hi.
Jesu`n a kiangah, “Na gintat theih photleh! A gingtami a dingin bangkim ahithei hi,” achi hi.
Tuatakin naupangpa pa ngaihtak in a kihou a, “Tuachi`n mittui luang pum in Toupa ka gingta hi, ka ginlahna ah hung panpih in!” achi hi.
Jesu`n mipi hungtai khawm lai amuhtak in, dawinin atai a, a kiangah, “Hamtheih louhna leh bilbingna dawi,” “Thu kungpia hi, asung a pat hung pawtkhia inla lutkik nawn ken!” achi hi.
Tuachi`n dawinin a kikou khia a, hahtak in abawl genthei a, asung a pat ahung pawtkhia ta a, naupangpa misi bangin ahung om a, mi tampite`n, “Asi ahi!” achi uhi.
Hinanleh Jesu`n akhut a tuin akaithou a tuachi`n amah ahung thouta hi.
Tualeh amah inn sung a ahunglut takin, a nungjuite`n, “Bangchia kou hawlkhia theilou ka hi ua le?” chi`n aguk in a dong ua.
Tuachi`n aman akiang uah, “Hihbangte pen thumna leh anngawlna chihlouh, bangmah in apawtsak theikei,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n hua a kipan a paikhia ua, Galili gam anawk ua, aman kuamah theih ding a deihkei hi.
A nungjuite a dingin thu ahilh a akiang uah: “Mihing Tapa mihingte khut a matsak in a om ding a, athat ding uh. Tualeh a thahkhit nung uh nithumni chiangin a thoukik ding,” achi hi.
Hinanleh amau`n athugen atheisiam kei ua, amahlah a dongngam ngal kei uhi.
Tuachi`n Kapernaum khua a hungtung a, innsung a aomlai in aman akiang uah, “Hua lampia bangthu ahia na kisel uh?” chi`n adong a.
Hinanleh, lampi ah ilak uah kua ilianpen dia? chia akiselkhit jiak un, hamlou in a om uhi.
Tuachi`n amah atou a, sawmlehnihte asam a akiang uah, “Kuapeuh a masapen hih ut tuh mi tengteng sang in nunungpen in aom ding a, tuachi`n mi tengteng nna sem in aom ding hi,” achi hi.
Tuakhit in naupangnou khat ala a alak uah adingsak a, tuazoh in a pom a akiang uah,

“Kuapeuh ka min a hichibang naupang neute lak a khat kipahpih in kei hung kipahpih ahi ding; tualeh kuapeuh kei hung kipahpih tuh, kei hung kipahpih ahi kei ding ua, kei hungsawlpa kipahpih ahijaw uhi,” achi hi.
Johan in a kiangah, “Siapa, ei hungjuilou namin a dawite hawlkhia mikhat kamu ua, ei hung juihlouh jiakin ka kham uh,” achi a.
Hinanleh Jesu`n a kiangah, “Amah kham kei un, kuamah ka min a sillamdang bawl a anung a kei hung gensiapai thei aom kei.
Kuapeuh ei hungdou loute eilam a pang ahi ua.
Kuapeuh Krist a nahihjiak ua kamin a tui noukhat dawn ding hungpia tuh, adiktak in kung hilh ahi, a nuamman amansuah kei hial ding hi.
“Hinanleh Kuapeuh kei hung gingta neunoute lak a khat puksak pen, a ngawng ah buhgawina suang lianpi awhsak uh henla, tuipi ah khiale uh, amah a dingin ahoihjaw ding hi.
Na khut in khialhna a ahung puksak leh, tankhia in. Khut nih nei a gawtmun mei mittheilou a pai sang in, khut tan a hinna a lut nang a ding in ahoihjaw hi.
‘Athan uh sihlouhna leh meikuang mihlouhna ah.’
Na keng in khialhna a ahung puksak leh, tankhia in. Keng nih neia gawtmun mei mittheilou a paih a na om sang in, kengbai a hinna a lut nang a dingin ahoihjaw hi.
Athan uh sihlouhna leh meikuang mihlouhna ah.
Na mit in khialhna a ahung puksakleh, kheikhia in! Mit nih nei a gawtmun mei mittheilou a paih a na om sang in, mit khat nei a Pasian gam a lut nang a dingin ahoihjaw hi.
‘Athan uh sih louhna leh mei amih theihlouhna ah.’
“Michih mei a alsak in aom ding ua, tualeh kithoihna zousiah chi a alsak in aom ding hi.
“Chi ahoih hi, hinanleh chi in a alna mansuah taleh bangchi`n na alsak kik diai?
“Nouman chi kineih unla, khat leh khat kilem in om un,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n hua a kipan ading a Judea gam ah Jordan gal lam ah apaita hi. Tualeh a kiangah mipite ahung kikhawm kik ua, tuachi`n a bawl ngaina mah bangin amauhte thu a hilhkikta hi.
Pharisaite hungpai in a kiangah, amah ze-et nan, “Mi`n azi akhul asiang diam?” chi`n adong ua.
Tuachi`n aman akiang uah, “Mosi in bangchi`n thu ahungpia a?” achi hi.
Amau`n, “Mosi in kikhulna lai gelh a khul aphaljel hi,” achi ua.
Jesu`n a kiang uah, “Na lungtang uh atakjiak aveleh hih thupiak noua ding a ahung gelhsak.
Hinanleh sil kisiamchil a pan in, ‘Pasian in aman numei leh pasal in asiam hi.’
‘Hih thu jiakin pasal in anu leh apa apaisan ding a, azi atu tinten ding,
tualeh anih un taksa khat ahung hita ding uh.’ Tuachi`n nih ahi nawn takei ua, taksa khat ahung hijawta uhi.
Tuajiakin Pasian in agawmsa mihing in khen kei hen,” chi`n a dawng hi.
Innsung ah a nungjuite`n hih thu mah ana dongkik ua.
Tuachi`n aman akiang uah, “Kuapeuh azi khul a, midang neiin azi ang akawmsan ahi.
Tualeh numei in zong a pasal khen a midang tawh a kiteng leh, angkawm ahi,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n a tham dingin naupang neute a kiangah ahung zohpih ua, hinanleh nungjuite`n a hung paipihte ana tai ua.
Hinanleh Jesu`n hua amuhtak in, alung nuammoh mahmah a akiang uah, “Naupang neute ka kiangah hung paisak unla, amauhte kham kei un, van gam pen hichibang mite a ahi.
Adiktak in, kung hilh ahi, mi kuapeuh naupang neute bang a Pasian gam sanglou pen asung ah alut kei ding hi,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n amauhte a ang ah atawi a, atung uah akhut nga in gual azawlta hi.
Tualeh lampia pai ding a apawtkhiat laiin, mi khat a kiang ah hungtai in, a maiah khupdin in, akiang ah, “Siapa hoih aw, tangtawn hinna ka tantheihna ding in bang ahia ka bawl ding?” chi`n adong a.
Tuachi`n Jesu`n akiang ah, “Bangding a hoih hungchi nahia? Mi khat guak loungal kuamah a hoih a omkei, hua pen Pasian ahi,” achi hi.
Thupiakte nathei vele; angkawm ken, tualthat ken, gu ken, theihpihtu taklou in pangken, mi khemken, na nu leh na pa zahtak in, chihte achi hi.
Tuachi`n aman a kiangah, “Siapa aw, hihte tengteng ka naupan laia pan kajuih ahita,” achi hi.

Tuachi`n Jesu`n amah a en a, a itta a, a kiangah, “sil khat na tasamlai hi, achi a; pai inla, naneih jousiah juak inla migentheite kiangah pia in, tuachi`n van ah gou nanei ding, tuakhit chiang in hungpai inla kross pua in hungjui in,” achi hi.
Hinanleh hih thute jiakin adah mahmah a, lungkham takin a paimangta siltampi nei ahihjiak in.
Tuachi`n Jesu`n a enkual a a nungjuite kiangah, “Mi hausate a dingin Pasian gam a lutding bangzahta a haksa a tazen a!” achi hi.
Tuachi`n nungjuite`n a thugen lamdang asa mahmah ua. Hinanleh Jesu`n adawng kik a akiang uah, “Tate aw, dangka muangte a dingin Pasian gam a lut bangzahta a haksa ahia!
Mihausa Pasian gam a lut sangin, sangawngsau phin bilvang a lutpaisuak abaihjaw” achi hi.
Tuachi`n amau`n a thugen lamdang asa mahmah ua, “A tuachihleh kua Hundam in a omjou dia?” chi`n akihou ua.
Hinanleh Jesu`n amauh a en a akiang uah, “Huapen mihing a dingin sil hitheilou ahi a, hinanleh Pasian a dingin ahi kei; Pasian a dingin sil jousiah ahithei hi,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n Peter in a kiangah, “En in, kou sil bangkim paisan in kungjui ua,” chi`n ahung gen pan a.

Tuachiah Jesu`n “a dawng a, adiktak in kung hilh ahi, kuapeuh keimah jiak leh tangthupha jiak a inn hiam, sanggampa hiam, Sanggamnu hiam, apa hiam, anu hiam, azi hiam, atate hiam, gamte hiam nusia tuh,
tu damsung mahmah in, Tu hun mahmah in innte, sanggampate sanggamnute, nute, tate, gamte, bawl gentheihnate tawh alehja a mukiklou ding a om kei, tualeh hun hungtung ding a tangtawn hinna tawh.
Hinanleh mi tampi a masapente a nunungpen ahung hi ding ua, a nunungpente a masapen ding uh,” achi hi.

Jerusalem khua a hawhtou ding a, lampia apailai un, Jesu amai uah apai a; amau`n lamdang asa mahmah ua. Tualeh ajuih pum un alau uh a. Tuachi`n aman sawm lehnihte a tuam in apaipih kik a atung a sil hungtung dingte ahilh panta hi.

“Ngaiun, Jerusalem khua ah hawhtou ding ihi ua, mihing Tapa siampite leh laigelhmite kiang a matsak in aom ding. Tualeh amah siding in siamlouh atangsak ding ua, tuateh Jentelte kiangah apia ding uhi,
chiamnuih bawlnan ajang ding ua, ajep ding ua, chil asiatkhum ding ua tualeh athat ding uh; tuachi`n nithum nin a thoukik ding,” achi hi.
Tualeh Zebedi tapate Jakob leh Johan, a hungpai ua a kiangah, “Siapa aw, na kiang a kung nget taphot uh nung bawlsak ka deih uhi,” achi ua.
Tuachiah aman a kiang uah, “Nou a dingin bang hung bawlsak leng na ut ua?” achi a.
Amau`n a kiangah, “Na thupina ah na jiatlam ah khat na veilam ah khat hung tousak in,” achi ua.
Hinanleh Jesu`n akiang uah, “Na nget uh na theikei ua ahi. Ka nou dawn ding na dawnthei ding uai? Ka baptisma tan ding na tangthei ding uai?” achi a.
Amau`n a kiangah, “thei e,” achi ua. Tuachi`n Jesu`n akiang uah, “Ka nou dawn ding na dawnthei ngut ding uh, ka baptisma tan ding zong na tangthei ding uh.
Hinanleh ka jiatlam leh ka veilam a tou ding pen kei hungpiak ding ahikei a, Pasian in a bawlsakte uh a ding ahijaw ding hi,” achi hi.
Tualeh sawmte`n hihthu ajaktak un Jakob leh Johan tung ah a lungkim takei ua.
Hinanleh Jesu`n amauhte a kiangah asam a akiang uah “Jentelte tung a vaihawm ding a aguatte uh atung uah a lal mahmah uh, tualeh a miliante un atung uah a thunei mahmah uh, chih nathei uhi.
Hinanleh nou lak ah jaw hichibang ahikei ding. Hinanleh kuapeuh nalak ua milian hih utte na sila un a pangjaw ding hi.
Tualeh kuapeuh nalak ua masapen hih ut tuh mi tengteng silain apang ding hi.
Mihing Tapa hial zong na sepsak a om dingin a hungpai kei a, hinanleh nna sem ding leh mi tampi tatna ding a ahinna pia ding in hungpai ahijaw hi,” achi hi.
Tualeh Jeriko khua a hungtung ua; Jesu Jeriko a kipan in a nungjuite leh mipi tampitak tawh apawt laiun, Timai tapa mittaw Bartimai khutdoh in lamgei ah atou a.
Tualeh aman Nazareth Jesu ahi chih ajaktak in, “Jesu! David Tapa! ka tungah zahngai in!” chi`n a kikou panta a.
Tuachi`n mi tampite`n dai ding in ataihilh ua. Hinanleh aman, “David Tapa, ka tungah zahngai in!” chi`n aki hahkou semsem a.
Tuachi`n Jesu adinkhawl a, “amah sam ding in thu apia a.”
“Tuachi`n amau`n mittawpa asam ua, a kiangah, Thou in, aman a hungsam hi,” achi ua.
Aman zong apuan silhpaiin a dingkhia a, Jesu kiangah a hungpai hi.
Tuachi`n Jesu`n amah ana houpih a, “Nang a ding in bang hung bawlsak leng na ut ei?” achi a. Mittawpa`n a kiangah, “Rabboni, muhtheih ka ut,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n Jesu`n a kiang ah, “Paita in, na ginna dampih hiteh,” achi a.
Tuachi`n a mutheipai a, lampi ah Jesu ajuita hi.
Tualeh Jerusalem khua tung ding a akisak uh, Olive mual a Bethphage leh Bethani khuagei atun un, aman a nungjuite minih a masawl a.
Akiang uah, “Na mai ua khua ah pai unla; khuasung na lutphet chiang un sabiltung nou khau a kikhih kuamah tuanngailouhna na muding uhi. Sut unla hungkai un.
Tualeh kuapeuhin, bangding a hih nabawl? a chih uleh, Toupa`n a deih hi, hiah a hung koihkikpai na ding,” chi un, achi hi.
Tuachi`n a paita ua, kongjing a kongkhak pualam ah sabiltung nou kikhih avamu ua, tuachi`n asut uhi.
Hinanleh huasan a ding kuate hiam in, akiang uah, “Bangding a sabiltungnou sut nahi ua?” achi ua.
Tuachi`n amau`n Jesu thupiak bangin a kiang uah agen ua. Tuachi`n a paisakta uhi.
Tuachi`n sabiltungnou Jesu kiangah a hungkai ua, atung ah apuante uh aphah ua; amah atung ah a tuangta hi.
Tualeh mi tampi in lampi ah apuante uh aphah ua, tualeh adangte`n gam a sawlpang sat in lampi ah aphah ua.
Tuachi`n amai lam a paite leh anung lam a hung juite`n: “Hosanna! Toupa min a hungpai ahampha hi!
Toupa min a hungtung ding Ipa David lalgam ahampha hi! Tungnung pen ah Hosanna!” achi ua.
Tualeh Jesu Jerusalem khua ah apai a, Tempul sung ah alut a. Tuachi`n siljousiah a et kawikawi khit in nitaklam a hunghita a, sawmlehnihte tawh Bethani khua ah a paita uhi.
A jingni`n, Bethani khua pan a ahung pawt nung un, agil ahung kialta a.
Theipi kung tehnei gamlapi ah amu a, banghiam agah ka muh khakleh chi`n avapai a. Avatun takin, atehguak chihlou bangmah avamuta kei a; theipi gah hun ahihlouh jiak in.
Jesu`n ahoupih a sing kiangah, “Bangchiklai peuh in kuaman nang a kipat gah nenawn takei hen!” achi a.
A nungjuite`n hih aja uhi.
Tuachi`n Jerusalem khua atung ua; Jesu tempul sung ah avalut a, tempul sung a vanjuak leh leite a notkhia panta a, tualeh dangka khekte dohkan leh palva juakte tounate a khuhlek sak hi.
Tualeh kuamah in tempul sung a van alut paisuakpih uh a phal kei hi.
“Tuachi`n aman akiang uah, ‘Ka inn nam jousiah a ding in thumna inn achi ding uh chia kigelh hilou maw.’ Hinanleh nou gutate khukpi in nabawl uhi!” chi`n ahilh hi.
Laigelhmite leh siampite`n hih ajaktak un amah a thahtheihna ding uh azongta ua; mipi teng in a thuhilh lamdang asak jiak un, amah a lauta uhi.
Nitaklam ahunghih in, khuapi a pat a pawtkhiata hi.
Jingsang a apailai un theipi kung a tung a pat ajungtan a gaw amu ua.
Tualeh Peter in, theikhia in a kiangah, “Rabbi, En in, theipi kung na samsiat pen avulta!” achi hi.
Tuachi`n Jesu`n a dawng a akiang ah, “Pasian gingta un.

Adiktak in na kiang uah kung hilh ahi, Kuapeuhin hih mual kiangah, na kisuan inla tuipi ah na kipai in, chia a lungtang a ginlahna neilou a, tualeh agen bang in ahung tangtung ngeingei ding hi chih gingta jousiahin, agen bangbang in amu ding uhi.
Tuajiakin kung hilh ahi: Sil bangkim nathum ua na nget chiang un, amusa in kingai un, tuachi`n namu ding uhi, achi hi.
Tualeh thum a na din chiang un, kua tung hiam a thubuai banghiam naneih uleh, amah ngaidam un, na Pa uh van a om in nou tatkhialhnate zong ahung ngaihdam theihna ding in.”
Hinanleh na ngaihdam kei uleh, na Pa uh van a om in zong nou tatkhialhnate ahung ngaidam kei ding hi.
Tuachi`n amauhte Jerusalem khua ah atungkik uhi. Tempul sung a avak kawikawi laiin, siampite, laigelhmite leh vantang upate akiang ah a hungpai ua
amau`n akiang ah, “Bang thuneihna in ahia hih sillamdangte nabawl? Na kiangah hihbang sillamdang bawltheihna thuneihna kua`n hungpia ahia?” chi`n adong uhi.
Hinanleh Jesu`n adawng a akiang uah, “Ken zong noute thu khat kung dong ding, hung dawng un, tuachiah ken zong bang thuneihna tawh hih silte bawl ka hia chih noute kung hilh ding.
Johan baptisma, van a hung kipan maw: ahihkeh mihing a hung kipan? Hung dawng un?” achi a.
“Tualeh amauh leh amauh a kingaihtuah ua, ‘van a kipan,’ chilei la, ‘Bangding a athu gingtalou nahi ua?’ hung chi ding a.
‘Mihing a pat chileila, mipite a laujel ua,’ ” (Mi zousiah in Johan Jawlnei taktak in asim ua.)
Tuachi`n amauhte`n adawng ua Jesu kiangah, “Ka theikei uh,” achi ua.
Tualeh Jesu`n a dawng a akiang uah, “Ken zong kua thuneihna tawh ahia hih silte ka bawl chih kung hilh kei ding,” achi hi.

Tuachi`n aman gentehna in akiang uah thu agen panta a, “Mi khat in grep huan abawl a, daiin a umkual a, grep suknang khuk atou a, innsang alam hi. Tualeh grephuan bawlmite kiangah asan in apia a, gam dang ah khual azinta hi.
Huan a agah atanding grep huanbawlmite kiangpan a vala ding in grep huanbawlmite kiangah a silate khat asawl hi.
Tualeh amauhte`n ana man ua, avua ua, tuachi`n khut guak in asawl mangta uhi.
A sila dang khat akiang uah a sawlkik a amauhte`n suang in ana deng ua, alutang aliam sak ua, zahlaktak in anabawl ua a sawlmangta uhi.
Tuachi`n aman adang khat a sawlkik a, amah anathat ua; adang tampi zong, khenkhat avua ua, khenkhat athat uhi.
Tuajiakin Tapa khat aneilai a, a it mahmah, ‘Ka Tapa ana zahtak ding uh chi`n atawp in a Tapa akiang uah a sawlta hi.’
Hinanleh grep huanbawlmite`n, ‘Hihpa a gouluah dingpa ahi, hungpai un, amah ithat ding uh, tuachi`n a gouteng ei a ahimai ding!’ a kichi ua.
Tuachi`n aman ua, amah athat ua, grep huan pualam ah apaikhia uhi.”
“Tuajiakin grep huan neipa`n bang abawl tadia le?” chi`n adong a, “Amah hungpai in ahih mangthang ding a, grep huan midangte kiangah apia ding hi.
Hih Laisiangthou simkha ngailou nahi uh maw?
‘Inn lam mite suang deihlouh huam ah
aning a suang poimoh pen ahung suak hi.
Hihpen Toupa bawl ahi;
Tualeh hihpen imit muh in a lamdang hi!’ ”
chih, achi hi.
Tualeh hih gentehna thu amauh demna a agen ahi chih atheih jiak un atung ah khut akhak sawm ua, hinanleh mipite alau uhi; tuachi`n amah anusia ua, a paisanta uhi
Tuachi`n amau`n a kam a thute a amah amattheih nang un, Pharisaite leh Herod pawl a mi khenkhat a kiangah a hungsawl ua.

Akiang a hungtun un amau`n a kiangah, “Siapa, midik na hi a, mi kuamah na laukei hi. Ajiak mi maizah tuam na neikei a, diktakin Pasian lampi thute na hilhjel chih ka thei uhi. Kaisar kiang a siah piak asiang hiam? siang lou? Ka pia ding uam, ka piakdah ding uam?” achi ua.
Hinanleh aman a lepchiah dan uh athei a, akiang uah, “Bangding a hung ze-et nahi ua? Makhai khat hungtawi un ka en ding,” achi a.
Tuachi`n amau`n ahung tawi ua, tuachi`n aman akiang uah, “Hih kua lim leh kua laigelh ahia?” achi a,
Amau`n akiang ah, “Kaisar a,” achi ua.
Tuachi`n aman adawng a akiang uah, “Kaisar silte Kaisar kiangah pia unla, Pasian silte Pasian kiangah pia un,” achi hi.
Tuatakin amau`n lamdang asa mahmah uhi.
Tuachi`n Sadukaite misi thohkikna aom kei chite akiang ah a hungpai ua,
“Siapa, Mosi in, ‘Mi khat a sanggampa sita henla, azi taneilou in nusia taleh azi aluah ding a a sanggampa dingin chi akhahsak ding chi`n ahung gelhsak hi.’
Tuin sanggam pasal sagih a om ua, a masapa in zi anei a, asi a, chikhah beiin a nusiata hi.
Tualeh anihna in amahnu ala a, chikhak neilou in asi a, tualeh athumna zong hua chimah bang in a om a,
tuachi`n a sagihna pa`n aluah a, asi a, chikhak neilou in a nusia hi. A tawp khakna in numeinu zong asita hi.
Tuajiakin, thohkikni chiangin, amauh a thohkik chiang un, numeinu kuapen zi ata diai le? Asagih un zi in aneichiat ua” chi`n adong ua.
Jesu`n amauh adawng a akiang uah; “Laisiangthou leh Pasian silbawltheihna natheih jawsam uh a omlouh jiak tak a bawlkhial hilou nahi umaw?
Misi lak a kipan a thohkikni chiang un zi leh pasal a kitengkik ding a hinawn kei ua, van a vanmite bang ahijawta ding uhi.
Hinanleh misite kaihthoh a aom ding uh thu tawh kisai Mosi laibu ah, loubawk kuang a pan Pasian in, ‘Kei Abraham Pasian, Isak Pasian leh Jakob Pasian ka hi chia a houpih dan simkhalou nahi uh maw?’
Amah asite Pasian a hikei a, ahingte Pasian ahijaw hi. Tuajiakin nou na theikhial mah mah uhi!”
Tuachi`n laigelhmite lak a khat a hungpai a, akisellai uh aja a, Jesu`n amauh hoihtak in adawng chih athei a, akiang ah, “Thupiak jousiah lak ah thupiak masapen bang ahi diai?” chi`n adong a.
Jesu`n adawng a, “Thupiak jousiah lak a masa ahihleh: ‘Ngai un, aw Israel! Toupa I Pasian, Toupa khat ahi a.
Tuajiakin Toupa na Pasian uh na lungtang tengteng in, na kha tengteng in, na lungsim tengteng in, tualeh na hatna tengteng in na it ding ahi.’ Hih thupiak masapen ahi.
Tualeh anihna ahihleh, hihbang ahi: ‘Nangmah na ki it bang in na innvengte na it ding ahi.’ Hihte sang a thupiak lianjaw dang a omkei, achi hi.”
Tuachi`n laigelhmipa`n a kiangah, “Na gendik, Siapa! Thudik nagen ngut Pasian khat guak a om, amah chihlouh Pasian dang a om kei.

Tualeh amah lungtang tengteng, theihna tengteng, kha tengteng tualeh hatna tengteng a it a, tualeh eimah i ki it bang a ivengte it sillat leh kithoihna jousiah sang in thupijaw a ahoihjaw hi,” achi hi. Hua nungsang kuaman thu mawng mawng a dongngam nawn kei uhi.
Tualeh aman piltak a adawn Jesu`n a muh takin, a kiangah, “Pasian gam a pan na gamla kei hi,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n Jesu`n tempul a thu ahilhlai in, amauhte a houpih a, “Bang chidan a laigelhmite`n Jesu David Tapa ahi, chi uh ahia?
David amah mah-in khasiangthou in:
‘Toupa`n ka Toupa kiang ah:
Na galte uh nakeng totphah a kabawl masiah,
ka jiat lam ah touin,’ achi, chih ahi ngal a.
Tuajiakin David amah mah in zong ‘Toupa’; a chih leh; bangchi`n amah a Tapa ahithei dia?” Tualeh mipi vantang in kipaktak in athu a ngaikhia uhi.
Tuachi`n aman akiang ua a thuhilhna ah, “Laigelhmite lak ah pilvang un, amauh puantual silh a vak a ut ua, van juakna mun lak a chibaibuk a ut uhi,
kikhopna inn sung ah touna hoih adeih ua, tualeh nekkhawm nate ah munhoih adeih uhi.
Meithaite innsung a negam ua, mi khemna ding in sawtpipi thumna anei uhi. Hihte`n siamlouh tansakna thupitak amu ding uhi!” achi hi.
Tuachi`n Jesu dangka kholna bawm maiah atou a, tualeh mipite`n dangka khawlna ah dangka a khiat uh amu a. Tuachi`n mi hausa tampite`n tampi pi-in a khia ua;
tuachi`n mijawng meithai khat hungpai in daan dangka makhai nih a hungkhia a, guadran khat tawh kikim ahi.
Tuachi`n aman a nungjuite asam a akiang uah, “Adiktak in na kiang uah kung hilh ahi, mijawng meithainu`n midang tengteng sang in akhia tampen hi.
Amau`n aneihsa val uh akhia ua, hinanleh amahnu`n aneih jousiah a hinna ding teng akhia hi,” achi hi.
Tualeh Tempul a pat a pawtkhiat khit takin, a nungjuite khat in a kiangah, “Siapa, en-in! Hih a suangte omdan leh a innte omdan bang chibang ahia!” achi hi.
Tualeh Jesu`n adawng a akiang ah, “Hih inn thupitakte na mu maw? Sukchip louh a suang khat tung a khat kichiang mawng mawng hihsan ah namu kei ding hi,” achi hi.
Olive mualtung a tempul tawh ki galsaina mun a atoulai in, Peter, Jakob, Johan leh Andrute`n atuam in ahoupih ua, hihte bang hunchiang a hung hi ding ahiam?
“Tualeh hihte hung tangtunna ding chiamtehna bang ahi ding a, koute hunghilh in,” achi uhi.
Tuachiah Jesu`n, a dawng a akiang uah, “Kuaman ahung khemlouhna dingin pilvang un.
Mi tampi, ‘Keimah Jesu ka hi!’ chi`n ka min in a hungpai ding ua, mi tampi a khemjou ding uhi.
Hinanleh kidou leh kidou thuthang na jakchiang un, lungbuai kei un; hihbang silte ahung om ding mawng ahi, hinanleh atawpna ahinai kei ding.
Namtuam leh Namtuam ahung kidou ding ua, tualeh gam tuam leh gam tuam a kidou ding uhi. Tualeh mun tuamtuam ah zin aling ding a, kial leh buaina hung om inchin. Hihte nauvei kipatna ahi uhi.

“Hinanleh noumah kipilvang un, vaihawmmite kiang ah ahung piakhia ding ua, kikhopna insung bang ah ahung jep ding ua, keimah jiakin gam ukte leh kumpipate maiah amauh theihpihtu ding in hung paipih ding uhi.
Tangthupha nam zousiah kiangah gen masak ahi ding hi.

Hinanleh ahung mat ua ahung piakdok hun chiang un lungkham masa kei unla, bang ka gen tadia chi`n ngaihtuah masa kei un. Hinanleh huahun a nang hung kipia thute bek gen in; ajiak agentu nang na hikei a, Khasiangthou in agenjaw ding hi.
A sanggampa`n a sanggampa thah ding in a mansak ding a, Pa in a tate a mansak ding a; tualeh tate`n nu leh pate adou ding ua a thatsak ding uhi.
Ka min jiakin mi jousiah huat na hung hi ding ua. Hinanleh kuapeuh atawptan a thuakjoute hundam in aom ding uhi.”
Jawlnei Daniel in anagen, “Hihmangtu kihdak om a dinlouhna ding a ding namuh chiang un” (asim jousiahin a omjia thei heh!) “Huahun chiangin Judea gam a omte mualte ah tai uhen.
Inntung a omte innsung a van omte lading in lutdah hen.
Tualeh lou a omte apuante lading in kikdah hen.
Hinanleh hihni chiangin agaite leh naungek neite tung agik hi!
Tuajiakin hih hunte phalbilai ahihlouhna dingin thum un!
Ajiak hih nite chiangin gimthuakna thupitak ahung om ding a, hihbang Pasian in sil asiam tung a pat tunitan in ana omngai naikei a; tunung chiangin zong a omngai nawn kei ding hi.
Tualeh Pasian in hihnite tomsak kei henla hileh, mihing kuamah mawng mawng a suakta aom kei ding a; hinanleh a mitelte jiakin hihnite a tomsakta hi.
“Tuachi`n mi kuahiam in na kiang a, ‘En in, Krist hiah a om!’ ahihkeh, ‘En in, amah huah a om!’ achihleh taksan kei in.
Ajiak Krist taklou leh jawlnei taklou ahung pawt ding a, tualeh ahung khemna dingin chiamtehna lamdang taktakte ahung ensakding a, hitheileh houh atelte na-ngawn a khemkhia ding hi.
Hinanleh, ki pilvang un! En un, siljousiah kung hilhkhinta hi.
“Hinanleh hua nite tua gimthuakna tunzoh chiangin, ni amialta ding a, tualeh kha zong avak nawn kei ding,
van a aksite ahung kia ding a, van a aom van sil bawltheihnate akiling ding hi.
Tuatak chiangin Mihing Tapa sil bawltheihna leh thupina lianpi tawh meipi lak a hungpai amu ding uhi.
Tuachi`n aman vantungmite asawlkhia ding a, atelte lei ningli a kipan, leitawp a kipan in vantawp dong in a khawmkhawm ding uhi.
“Tualeh theipi kung a pat gentehna zil un. Aba ahung meng a atehte ahung sel chiangin doupi anaita chih nathei uhi.
Huachimah bang in hih silte ahungtun namuh chiang un, amah ahung naita kongkhak bul ahung geita, chih thei un.
Adiktak in kung hilh ahi, hih sil jousiah a tunkim masiah tulai khangthakte amang kei ding uhi.
Van leh lei a mang ding a, hinanleh ka thu amang kei ding hi.
“Hinanleh huani leh hun Pa loungal, kuamah in, van a om vantungmite`n zong Tapa in zong, athei kei hi.
Ahun ding na theihlouh jiak un pilvang unla, kiging zing a om in thum un.
Ajiak pen mihing Tapa ahihleh mi khat a inn nusia a, asila kiang a thuneihna pia a, tualeh a nasep ding uh piachiat a, khual gamlapi a vazin tawh kibang ahi.
Tuajiakin kigingjing un; inn neipa hungpai ding hun nitak lam hiam, jankimlai hiam, akkhuan in hiam, ahihkeileh jingsang in hiam chih nathei kei uhi.
A tuachih keileh thakhat a hungpai in, ihmu in ahung mukha ding hi.
Tualeh na kiang ua ka gen mijousiah kiang a ka gen ahi!”
Tuachi`n ninih nung in paikan kut leh Tanghou tol sohlouh kut aom a; tualeh siampite leh laigelhmite`n amah khembawl a, mat a, thahtheihna ding dan a zongzong uhi.
“Hinanleh kut ni in hihdah hen, atuachih keileh mipi lak ah buaina aom kha ding,” achi uhi.

Tualeh Bethani khua a phak Simon inn a aomlai a, ankuang im a atoulai in, numei khat alabaster bawm a spaiknard thau namtui mantamtak tawiin a hungpai a; tuachi`n amahnu in abawm atatkek a, alutung ah asungta hi.
Hinanleh alak uah lungkim lou khenkhat aom ua, “Bangding a hih thau namtui amawk a hihbei ahia?
Hih makhai zathum sang a tamjaw a zuak a mijawngte kiang a piaktheih ding hi a!” achi ua; tuachi`n amahnu tung ah aphunta uhi.
Tuachi`n Jesu`n, “Amahnu aom om in omsak un! Bangding a vahihbuai nahi ua? Aman keia dingin silhoih asem hi.
Ajiak pen mijawngte na kiang uah a omjing ua, na ut hun teng un na panpihthei uh, hinanleh keipen na kiang uah ka omjing kei hi.
Amahnu`n a bawltheih tawp a bawlta ahi, ka sapum vuiding a thau hung nuhkhawlh ahi.
Adiktak in kung hilh ahi, Leitung pumpi a hih tangthupha akigenna phot ah hihnu silbawl zong amahnu theihzingna dingin akigen ding hi,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n sawmlehnihte lak a khat, Juda Iskariot pen amah mansak dingin siampite kiangah avapai a.
Hihthu azak tak un amauh a kipak mahmah ua, tuachi`n amah dangka piak ding a chiamta uhi. Tuachi`n aman amatsakna ding lemtang a zongta hi.
Tualeh Tanghou tol sohlouh kut ni masapen, paikan kut Belamnou agoh ni un, a nungjuite`n a kiangah, “Paikan kut ankuang na nektheih na dingin khoiah vabawl le ung na ut a?” achi ua.
Tuachi`n aman a nungjuite nih asawlkhia a, akiang uah, “Khuapi sung ah valut unla, tuachi`n pasal tuibel pua khat tawh na kituak ding ua, amah jui un.
A lutna penpen, hua inn neipa kiangah, ‘Siapa`n ka nungjuite tawh paikan ankuang ka nekna ding uh mikhual inndan khoitak ahia?’ achi, chi un.
Tuachi`n aman inndan tungnung liantak, van omsa leh guatsa diam ahung ensak ding; huamun ah ei a ding bawl un,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n a nungjuite apai ua, khuapi sung ah alut ua, tualeh akiang ua agen bangbang in amuta ua, tuachi`n paikan ankuang abawlta uhi.
Nitak lam ahunghih takin amah sawmlehnihte tawh a hungpai ua.
Tualeh toua anek laiun Jesu`n, “Adiktak in kung hilh ahi, an ka nekkhawmpih nalak ua mikhat in ahung mansak ding hi,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n a lungkham panta ua, a kiangah, khat khat in, “Kei kahi maw?” achi ua, abanban in adongta uhi.
Tuachi`n aman adawng a, a kiang uah, “sawmlehnihte lak a khat, kuang a ka an sawkkhawmpih ahi.
Mihing Tapa ahihleh a tanchin kigelh bangbang a pai ding ahi a; hinanleh mihing Tapa mansak dingpa tung agik hi! Huapa pianglou hivetleh amah a dingin ahoihjaw ding hi!” achi hi.
Tuachi`n anek laiun Jesu`n tanghou ala a, a gualjawl a, tuachi`n a balkek a, akiang uah apia a, “la unla ne un,” “Hih ka taksa ahi,” achi a.
Tuachi`n nou ala a, kipahthu agenzoh in, a kiang uah apia a; aun un adawn chiat uhi.
Tuachi`n aman akiang uah, “Hih ka sisan a thukhunthak mi tampi a ding a luang pen ahi.
Adiktak in kung hilh ahi, Pasian gam a athak ka dawnni atun masiah greptui ka dawnnawn kei ding,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n amau`n la-khat asakzoh un, apawt khia ua, Olive mual ah apaita uhi.
Tuachi`n Jesu`n akiang uah, “Tuja`n chiangin na un un lungkia in nung taisansiang ding uhi, ajiak, ‘Belampu ka jep ding a, Belam honteng aki thehjak ding uh,’ chih gelh ahi.
Hinanleh ka thohkik nung chiangin Galili ah namai uah ka pai ding,” achi hi.
Peter in akiang ah, “A un un Lungkia in hung taisan nanle uh, ken kung taisanngai kei ding!” achi hi.
Jesu`n akiang ah, “Adiktak in kung hilh ahi, tuni`n, tujan chiangin ak nihvei akhuan ma-in thumvei nung kitheihmoh bawl ding,” achi hi.
Hinanleh aman khauhtakin, “Nang tawh sikhawm ding hinanleh zong, kung kitheihmoh bawl kei ding!” achi hi.
Tuachimah bang in aun un achi chiat uhi.
Tuachi`n amau Gethsemani kichi mun khat a hungtungta ua; tualeh aman a nungjuite kiangah, “Ka thum sungteng hihsan ah anatou un,” achi a.
Tualeh Peter, Jakob leh Johan apui a, lung kham sengseng in ahung mangbangta a.
Tuachi`n akiang uah, “Ka kha sihna khop hial in a lungkham hi; hihsan ah ana om unla, kiging gige un,” achi hi.
Amah themkhat avapai gamla deuh a, tual ah apuksuk a, ahihtheihleh hua hun in amah apelhtheihna dingin athum hi.
Tualeh aman, “Abba-Pa,” sil zousiah Nang a dingin ahithei hi; hih nou kei a pat in lamang in; hinanleh, kei thu hilouin, Nang thu hijaw hen, achi hi.
Tuachi`n a hungpai a, amauh ihmusa in amu a, tuatakin Peter kiangah, “Simon, ihmu nahi uh maw? Dakkal khat zong kiging a omzoulou nahi uh maw?”
“Khem a na omlouhna ding un kiging jing unla thum un. Kha injaw angap a, hinanleh taksa in azoukei,” achi hi.
Tuazoh in paikhia in ava thumkik a, agenngai mah ava genkik a.
Tuachi`n ahung paikik a, amauh ihmu in ahung mu jel a, a ihmut uh asuak mahmah jiakin; amau`n adawn dingdan uh athei kei uhi.
Tuachi`n a thumveina in ahung pai a, akiang uah, “Ihmu leh tawldam a om lailai nahi uh maw? Ahunta hi! Ahun zong a tungta! Ngaiun, mihing Tapa mikhialte khut a piakkhiat ahita.
Thou un, ipai ding uh. En un, kei hung mansak dingpa anaita hi!” achi hi.
Tuachia thu agen laiin, sawmlehnihte lak a khat, Juda pen siampite leh laigelhmite leh upate a kipan in namsau leh khetbuk tawiin mipi tampitak tawh a hungtung pai a.
Tualeh amah mansakpa in: “Ka tawp penpen, amah ahi, man unla, hoihtakin paimangpih un,” chi`n chiamtehna ape masa khinta hi.
Tualeh a hungtun takin avanaihpai a, “ Rabbi Rabbi!” chi`n avatawpta a.
Tuachi`n amau`n atung ah khut akha ua, amanta uhi.
Tuachiah akiang ua dingte lak a khat in namsau adok a, siampi suakpa asat a, abil a satkhia hi.
Tuachi`n Jesu`n amauh adawng a akiang uah, “Guta manding bang hial in namsaute leh khetbukte keng in kei man dingin nung kuan uh maw?
Niteng in noute tawh tempul ah thuhilh in ka om jing a, nungman kei ua, hinanleh Pasian Laisiangthou thu a tangtun ngei ding ahi,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n aun un anusia ua, ataita uhi.
Tualeh tangval kuahiam khat in puannem khat silh in amah a jui a, tuachi`n tangvalte`n ana man ua;
tuateh a puannem nusia in a saguak in ataita hi.
Tuachi`n Jesu siampi mai ah apaipih ua; tuachi`n amah tawh siampite, upate leh Laigelhmite jousiah ahung kikhawm ua.
Tualeh Peter in gamlapi ah, siampi innsung tan dongin ajui a; tuachi`n silate tawh a toukhawm a, mei a awi hi.
Tuachi`n siampite leh vaihawmna inn a om jousiahin Jesu a thahtheihna ding un ahekna ding ajong ua; hinanleh amukei uhi.
Mi tamtak in juau thuin ahek ua, hinanleh ahekna te uh a kituak kei hi.
Tuachi`n mi kuate hiam a dingkhia ua juauthu in ahek ua:
“Hih khut a bawl tempul ‘Ka hihsia ding a, nithum sung in khut a bawllouh adang khat ka lam ding, aman achih kaja uh, achi ua.’”
Hinanleh huachi`n zong a kituakthei tuan kei uhi.
Tuachi`n siampi alaiah ading dok a, Jesu kiangah, “Bangmah a dawnglou maw? Hihte hung hekna bang chidan ahia?” chi`n adong hi.
Hinanleh amah a daidide a, bangmah in a dawng kei hi. Tuachiah siampi in a kiangah, “Nang Hampha Tapa Krist na hi hiam?” chi`n a dong kik a.
Tuachi`n aman, “Ka hi,” tualeh “mihing Tapa sil bawltheihna jiatlam a tou a, van meipi lak a hungpai na mu ding uhi!” achi hi.
Tuatakin siampi-in a puante a bawtkek a, “Theihpihtu dang bang ding i chilai dia!
Pasian a gensiat na jata uh, bangchi nasa ua?” achi a.
Tuatakin aun un amah siatak in siamlouh atanta uhi.
Tuachi`n khenkhat in achil asiat panta ua, amai atuamsak ua, khut in atum ua, tuachi`n a kiangah “Gen in achi ua!” Tualeh silate`n zong a khutpek un abeng uhi.
Tualeh Peter nuailam a innpi huang sung a aom laiin, siampi sila nungakte lak a khat a hungpai a.
Tuachi`n amahnu`n Peter mei awi a om amuh in, a en a, “Nang zong Nazareth Jesu tawh kilawi nahi,” achi hi.
Hinanleh aman kitheihmoh bawl in, “Ka theikha kei,” achi a. Tuachi`n innlim ah ava pawtkhia a, tuachi`n ak a khuangta hi.
Tualeh nungak khat in amah a mukik a, a kiang a dingte kiangah, “Hihpa alak ua khat ahi,” a chijel a.
Hinanleh aman a kitheihmohbawl kik a, tomkhat zoh in a kiang a dingten Peter kiangah,
“Alak ua khat hijenteh: ajiak Galili mi nahi a, naham in zong a kithei hi,” achi ua.
Hinanleh aman, “Tua na migenpa uh ka theikha kei! chi`n hamsia lawh in a kichiamta hi!”

Tuachi`n a nihveina in ak ahung khuangta a, tuatak in Peter in Jesu`n a kiang a, “Ak nihvei khuan ma-in thumvei nung kitheih mawh bawl ding hi,” achih thu a theikhia thak a, tuachi`n huathu a ngaihtuah a akapta hi.
Jingsang ahung hih takin siampite`n upate, laigelhmite leh vaihawm pawlte jousiah tawh kihoukhawm na anei ua, tualeh Jesu ahen ua, apaipih ua, Pilat kiangah apiata uhi.
Tuachi`n Pilat in akiang ah, “Nang Judate kumpipa nahi hiam?” chi`n adong a.
Tua khit in aman a kiangah, “Ahi nachih bang in” chi`n adawng hi.
Tuachi`n siampite`n sil tampi in a ngawh ua, hinanleh aman bangmah in adawng kei hi.
Tuachi`n Pilat in a dong kik a akiang ah, “Bangmah a dawnglou maw? En-in, ahung hekna tengpi uh!”
Hinanleh Jesu`n bangmah in a dawng tuan kei lai hi, tuatak in Pilat in lamdang asa mahmah hi.
Tualeh Pilat in kut ankuang luini chiangin thongkia khat anget penpen uh a pawtsakjel hi.
Tualeh amin Barabba kichi, a gitlouhna lam a tualthat agitlouh pihte tawh thong tangkhawm khat aom a.
Tuachi`n mipite`n, ngaihtak a kikou in, nidang a amau ding a a bawlsak ngaina bang a bawl dingin a ngen panta ua.
Hinanleh Pilat in akiang uah, “Judate kumpipa na kiang ua kung khah na ut uh hiam?” achi a.
Siampite`n engsiatna tawh Jesu amah kianga a piak uh ahi chih atheihjiak in.
Hinanleh siampite`n aman Barabba akiang ua a khahtheih nangin mipite atokthou ua.
Pilat in adawng a akiang uah, “Achihleh Judate kumpipa nachihpa uh bang lawh leng na ut ua?” a chikik a.
Tuachiang in amauhte`n “Kross ah kilhden in!” chi`n ahung kikou kik ua.
Tuachi`n Pilat in akiang uah, “Bangjiak in, aman bang khialhna nei ahia?” achi a.
Hinanleh amauhte`n, “Kilhden in!” chi`n ngaih sem in akikou uhi.
Tuakhit in Pilat in, mipite lungdam sak a ut man in, Barabba a pawtsak a; tualeh Jesu ajep zoh in kross a kilhden dingin apiata hi.
Tuachi`n galkapte`n amah kikhopna innsung Praitoriam achih uah apaipih ua, tualeh galkap jousiah a samkhawm ua.
Tuachi`n amah puan sandup asilhsak ua, linglukhu aphan ua, a lutung ah akhusak ua,
“Chibai Judate kumpipa!” chi`n zahna apia uhi.
Tuachi`n alu pumpeng in asat ua; chil asiat khum ua, tualeh khupdin in abia uhi.
Chiamnuih bawlna a azakzoh un, puan sandup amah a pat a lakhia ua, ama puanmah asilhsak ua, Kross a kilden dingin apaipihta uhi.
Tuachi`n amau`n mikhat, Kurini gam a mi, Aleksander leh Rafa pa, gam lam a kipan a hungpai, kross pua ding in a pummat ua.
Tuachi`n amau`n Golgotha mun ah amah ahung paipih ua, “Hih pen Luguh mun chihna ahi.”
Tuakhit in murah tawh kihel uain adawn dingin apia ua, hinanleh aman asang nuam kei hi.
Tualeh kross a amah a kilhden zoh un, atan ding chiat uh theihna dingin ai asan ua, a puansilhte a kihawmta uhi.
Tualeh amah a kilhden hun uh ahihleh dak thumna tuamlak ahi a.
Tualeh a ngawhna uh atung ah, “JUDATE KUMPIPA,” chi`n laimal in akigelh hi.
Amah tawh guta suamhat nih akilhkhawm ua; khat ajiat lam ah, adang khat aveilam ah.
Tuachi`n Laisiangthou in, “Amah mikhialte tawh simkhawm ahita hi,” chih a tangtungta hi.
Tualeh ageia mi sukvak touvakte`n alu uh lohkhum in, “Ehe! Nang tempul hihsia a nithum ni a lamkik ding pa!
Nang leh Nang kihunkhia inla kross a pan hung kumsuk tanla,” achi ua.
Tuachimah bangin siampite`n zong, laigelhmite tawh a enghou ua, “Aman midangte a hundam a, amahleh amah aki hundamthei kei a.
Israelte kumpipa Krist tuin kross a pan hung kumsukleh atave, imuh a igintat theihna ding un!” achi ua. Kross a akilhden khawmpihte`n zong amah ahousia uhi.
Tuachi`n dakguk a hunghih in gam pumpi ah dak kuana dongin khimpi ajing hi.
Dak kuana a hunghih in Jesu ngaihtak in ahung kikoukhia a, “ELOI ELOI LAMA SABAK THANI?” chi in, tuapen, “Ka Pasian, ka Pasian, bangding a hung taisan na hiam?” chihna ahi.
A kiang a ding mi khenkhatte`n azaktak un, “En un, aman Elijah asam!” achi ua.
Tuachi`n kuahiam khat vatai in sponzi uain thuk in adiah dim a, pumpeng dawn ah akoih a, adawn dingin apia a, “Amah guak in omsak un! Amah lakhia dingin Elijah a hungpai ei i en ding uh!” achi ua.
Tuachi`n Jesu aw ngaihtak in a kikoukhia a, a kha akhahta hi.
Tuachi`n tempul puanjak atunglam a pat atawtan phelnih kisuahin ahung keksuk a.
Tualeh amailam a ding galkap zalamkai pa in, hihbang a akikou leh akha akhahte amuhtak in, “Hihpa Pasian Tapa taktak ahi!” achi hi.
Gamlapi a pan agal et numei khenkhat zong aom ua, tuate lak ah Mari Magdalini, Jakob naupangjaw leh Jos nu Mari tualeh Salomi ajau uhi.
Amauhte Galili gam a aom laia anungjuia a nna sepsakte ahi ua, tualeh numei dang tampi Jerusalem a amah tawh kitontoute zong aom uhi.
Tualeh nitak lam ahung hih in, kisakkholhni ahihjiak in, huapen khawlni ma-a ni ahi a.
Joseph Arimathai khua mi, vaihawmtu zah omtak, Pasian gam ngak jing a om, a hungpai a, hangsan takin Pilat kiangah alut a, Jesu luang ava ngenta a.
Tualeh Pilat in asihpai lamdang asa mahmah a, tuachi`n galkap zalamkai asam a, akiang ah, asihna asawtta hiam, chi`n adong a.
Tualeh galkap jalamkaipa a pat atheihchian takin Pilat in aluang Joseph apiata hi.
Tuachi`n aman puannem alei a, amah a lakhia a, puannem in atuam hi. Tualeh suang khuakkuaksa han khat ah asialta a, tuachi`n suang khat hankot ah a likkhumta hi.
Tualeh Mari Magdalini leh Jos nu Mari-in asialna a en uh hi.
Khawlni beitak in, Mari Magdalini, Jakob nu Mari leh Salomite`n vapai a amah anuh ding uh silnamtui alei ua.
Nipikal ni masapen jingsang matak nisuah phet in amauhte han ah a hungpai ua.
“Kuan han kongkhak a pan suang hung likkhiatsak ding ata diam?” chi`n a kihou ua.
Hinanleh amauhte adaktouh uleh han kongkhak suang likkhiatsa a om amu uhi. Asuang pen alet a lian ahi.
Tualeh hankhuk sung a alut uleh, tangval khat puanngou tualtak silh a ajiatlam pang a tou amu ua, alauta uhi.
Hinanleh aman akiang uah, “Laukei un, aki kilhlum Nazareth Jesu na zong uhi, amah a thoukikta hi! En-un, asialna uh.
Hinanleh pai unla, a nungjuite leh Peter kiangah, ‘Galili gam ah namai uah apai hi; na kiang ua agensa mah bangin, huasan ah amah na mu ding uhi, chi`n vahilh un,’ ” achi hi.
Tuachi`n a pawtkhia ua; han a pan in manlangtak in ataita ua, lamdang asak jiak un a kithing ua, tualeh alau jiak un kuamah kiangah bangmah agenkei uhi.
Tualeh Jesu nipikal ni masapen jingsang matak a athohkik zoh in, asung a dawinin sagih a hawlkhiat saknu Mari Magdalini kiangah akilak masapen hi.
Amahnu apai a, amah tawh omkhawm jelte, amah su`n a kapte avahilh hi.
Tualeh amauhte`n amah ahing ahi, chih leh amah nu`n amu hi chih ajak hang un, ataksan kei uhi.
Tuakhit in, amauh lak a minih gam lam juan a apailai un, meltuam pua in akiang uah akilak a.
Tuachi`n amauhte avapai ua nungjui dangte kiangah avahilh ua, hinanleh amauhte`n ataksan kei uhi.
Tuanung in dohkan kim a atoulai un, nungjui sawm leh khatte kiangah akilak a; a thohkik zoh nung a mute thugen ataksan louh jiak un, ataksan louhna uh leh a lungtangte uh atakjiak in aphawk hi.
Tualeh aman akiang uah, “Leitung pumpi ah pai unla silsiam jousiah kiangah tangthupha vagen un, achi hi.
Kuapeuh agingta a baptisma tangte hundam in aom ding uh; hinanleh kuapeuh agingtaloute siamlouh tang in aom ding hi.
Tualeh a gingtate hih chiamtehnate in ajui ding hi: Ka min in dawite a hawlkhia ding ua, hamthak in aham ding uh;
Amauhte`n akhut un gulte aman ding ua; sihna gu dawn nanle uh; tua in amauhte anasak kei ding; damloute tungah khut anga ding ua, adam ding uhi.”
Tuachia Toupa`n akiang ua thu agen khit in, amah van ah laktouh in aom a, Pasian jiatlam ah atouta hi.
Tuakhit in nungjuite apai ua mun chinteng ah thu agen ua, Toupa`n amauhte a seppih a, ajui chiamtehnate`n athupuak a hihkipsak jel hi. Amen.
I lak ua ataktak a sil na om, mi tampite`n phuankhiat na ding ngaihtuah a gelh ana tup uh:
Atu`ng a pan a mit a mute leh thu nagelhte`n a hunghilh bang un,
Theophila aw, abul a kipan sil bangkim kiteltak a theihkimna neiin ka enchian a, kijom jel a na kiang a gelh hoih kasa hi.
Masang a nang hung kihilh thute adik na hi chih na theihna ding in.
Judea gam a Herod kumpi a apan laiin, amin Zakariah kichi siampi nasem khat a om a, tualeh azi Aaron tanute khat ahi a, amin Elizabeth ahi.
Amau nupa Pasian mitmuh in midik ahi ua, Toupa thupiakte leh dante dembei in a juikim uhi.
Hinanleh Elizabeth achi`n jiakin ta anei kei ua, amauh a upa tuak mahmahta uhi.
Tualeh hichi ahung hi a, aman a huntan dungjui a Pasian mai a siampi nna sem a aom laiin.
Siampu tawndan dungjuiin Pasian tempul sung a alut chiang a gim namtui hal ama tan ahi a,
tualeh gim namtui kihal sung in mipite`n apualam ah thumna ana nei uhi.
Tuachi`n Pasian vantungmi khat gimnamtui kihalna maitam jiatlam ah dingin a kiangah ahung kilak a.
Zakariah in amuh takin adihguih a, ahung lauta hi.
Hinanleh Pasian vantungmi in a kiang ah, “Zakariah, lauken! Na thumna jak ahita hi, nazi Elizabeth in tapa ahung neisak ding a, amin Johan naphuak ding ahi.
Tuachi`n nang nuam in na kipak ding a, mi tampite amah pianni-in akipak ding uhi!
Pasian ngaih in amah milian ahi ding a, uain ahihkeileh khamtheih dang mawng mawng adawn kei ding, anu gilsung a kipan Khasiangthou in adim ding hi.
Tuachi`n Israeltate tampi Toupa a Pasian uh lam ah a kilehkik sak ding hi.

Tualeh pate lungtang tate lam a ngasak ding leh, thu mang loute midiktat pilna lam ngasak ding leh, Toupa ding a mi honkhat mansa a omsak ding a na bawlkholh dingin Elijah lungsim leh silbawl theihna tawh Toupa mai ah apai ding hi,” achi hi.
Tuatakin Zakariah in Pasian vantungmi kiangah, “Hihmi bangchi`n ka theithei dia? Keilah upata ing a, ka zi zong a upata mahmah hi.” achi a.
Tuachi`n Pasian vantungmi in a dawnga a kiangah, “Kei Gabriel, Pasian maia ding pen ka hi; tualeh na kiang a hihthu gen ding leh hihthu kipak huaite hilh ding a sawl ka hi.
Hinanleh ngaiin, ahun bang a hung tung ding hihthu ka gente na gintatlouh jiakin, hih silte ataktak a ahung tun masiah hamtheilou in na om ding a, bangmah na genthei kei ding,” achi hi.
Tualeh mipite`n Zakariah angak ua, Pasian tempul sung a asawt om seng jiakin lamdang asa uhi.
Hinanleh a hungpawt in akiang uah thu a genthei takei a; tuatak in tempul sung ah kilakna amu hi chih atheita ua; ajiak akiang uah akhut in theihsakna abawl a, tuachi`n hamtheilou in a omjingta hi.
Tualeh hichi ahung hi a, a nasep ni achin takin inn ah apaita hi.
Tuachi`n ni tomkhat zoh in azi Elizabeth ahung gaita a, kha nga sung a kibu a, agen a.
“Mi lak a ka minsiat sel dingin, Toupa`n ahung muh in ka tung ah hichi bangin abawlta hi!” achi hi.
Tualeh Elizabeth gai a khagukna ah Pasian in a vantungmi Gabriel Galili gam a khuapi khat amin Nazareth kichi ah,
Nungak siangthou khat, David suan a mi, amin Joseph kichipa zi ding a kikhamsa kiangah asawl a, tua nungak siangthou min ahihleh Mari ahi.
Tualeh vantungmi a kiangah alut a, “Chibai nang nakpitak a deihsaknu, Toupa na kiangah aom hi! Numei lak a hamphanu nahi!” achi hi.
Hinanleh amahnu`n amah amuh takin a thugente a lunghimohta mahmah a, bangchi dan a chibai hungbuk adiam aw? chi`n aki ngaihtuah hi.
Tuachi`n Pasian vantungmi in amahnu kiangah, “Mari, Lauken; Pasian a pan deihsakna natang hi.
Ngaiin, nagai ding a, tapa na nei ding a, amin Jesu naphuak ding ahi.
Amah milian ahung hi ding a, tunungpen Tapa a kichi ding; tualeh Toupa Pasian in a kiangah apa David laltouna apia ding hi.
Tualeh Jakob suante tung ah kumtawn in vai ahawm ding a, agam in beini anei nawn kei ding hi!” achi hi.
Tuachi`n Mari-in vantungmi kiangah, “Kei nungak siangthou hi-ing a, hih bangchi`n a hithei diai? Pasal lah neilou ing a?” achi hi.

Tuachi`n vantungmi-in adawng a akiang ah, “Khasiangthou natung ah ahung tung ding a, Tungnungpen silbawltheihna-in ahung liahkhuh ding; tuajiakin nang a pat hung piang ding zong siangthou Pasian Tapa chih ahi ding hi.
Tualeh ngaiin, na sanggamnu Elizabeth in zong a upat nung in tapa khat apaita hi, achi`ng achihnu uh, a khagukna ahita hi.
Ajiak ahihleh Pasian dingin a hitheilou bangmah aom kei hi,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n Mari-in, “En-in, kei, Toupa silanu ka hi, nagen bangbang in ka tungah hung tung hen,” achi a. Tuachi`n vantungmi-in apaisanta hi.
Huanite in Mari athou a; singtang ah Judea gam khuapi khat ah apaipah vingveng hi.
Tuachi`n Zakariah inn ah alut a Elizabeth chibai abuk hi.
Tualeh hichi ahi a, Elizabeth in Mari chibaibuk ajak takin, asung a naungek a kitawm a, tuachi`n Elizabeth pen Khasiangthou in ahung dimta a;
Tuachi`n aw ngaihtak in ahung kikoukhia a; “Nang numei tengteng lak ah hamphanu nahi, nagil a gah zong ahampha hi!
Ka Toupa nu ka kiang a nungpai bangchi dan ahia?
Ngaiin, nung chibaibuk husa gin kabil a alut takin, ka naubu sung a om naungek nuam in akitawm hi.
Tuachiah agingtanu zong ahampha hi; Toupa`n akiang a athugen tangtung ding ahih jiakin!” achi hi.
Tuachi`n Mari-in:
“Ka hinna in Toupa apahtawi a,
Tualeh kakha zong a hundampa Pasian tung ah a kipak hi,
Ajiak aman asilanu nam ngiam dan alimsak a!
Ngaiin tu a kipan in khangthak jousiahin hampha a hungchi ding uhi.
Amah mihat in ka tung ah sil thupitak ahung bawlta a;
tualeh amin zong siangthou ahi.
Tualeh amah laudan siamte tungah ahehpihna
akhang akhang in a omtou pek ding hi.
Aban in a thahatdan a ensak a,
mi kiliansakte a lungsim suangtuah nate uh athehjak sak hi.
Mihatte a laltouna ua kipan a kaikhia a,
mi ngiamte a tawisangta hi.
Gilkialte silhoih in ataisak a,
hinanleh mi hausate khutguak in a sawlmangta hi.
Azahngaihna theihjingna in,
a sila Israel a panpih ta a;
Tangtawn a ding a ipu leh pate,
Abraham tualeh asuan leh khakte kiang a agen bangbang in!”
achi hi.
Mari Elizabeth kiangah kha thum vel atam a, tuachi`n a inn ah apaikikta hi.
Tualeh Elizabeth nausuah hun a hungtungta a, tuachi`n tapa ahung neita hi.
A innvengte leh a sanggamte`n Toupa`n hehpihna thupitak atung ah a langsakta chih anaja ua, a kipahpih mahmah uhi.
Tualeh hichi ahung hi a, a nigiatni in naungek teptan dingin a hung zohpih ua, amin dingin apa min la in Zakariah aphuak sawm uhi.
Hinanleh anu in, “Hilou e! amah Johan kichi ding ahi,” achi hi.
Hinanleh amau`n a kiangah, “Nabeh naphung lak ah hihbang min nei kuamah om nailou pi!” achi ua.
Tuachi`n amau`n apa kiangah chiamtehna bawl in, amin dingin bang phuak lei nadeih a? achi ua.
Aman laigelhna pek a ngen a, “Amin Johan ahi,” chi`n agelh a, tuatakin aun un lamdang asa chiat uhi!
Tuachi`n akam ahung kihong pai a, alei ahung kiphel a, ahung ham a, Pasian aphatta hi.
Tuachi`n akiang ua tengte jousiah ahung lauta ua, tualeh hihthu Judea gam singtang jousiah ah a thangsuakta hi.
A jakha jousiahin a lungtang uah agel chiat ua, “Hih naungek bang chibang ahung hitazen diam aw?” Chi-in, Toupa khut in amah a ompih hi.
Apa Zakariah Khasiangthou in ahung dimta a, a genkholh a:
“Toupa Israel Pasian phat in om hen!
Ajiak aman amite hungveh a a hungtanta hi.”
A sila David suante lak ah,
hundamna kii ahung siamsakta hi.
Leitung pianchil a pat Jawlnei siangthoute kam a anagen mahbang in;
I melmate lak a kipan in leh
ahung huate jousiah khut a kipan hundam a i om ding thu.
I pu leh pate kiang a zahngaihna achiam bawl dingin leh
a thukhun siangthou theigige dingin.
Ipu uh Abraham kiang a a kichiamna,
I melmate lak a pan ahung hutkhiat a,
lauloua a nna iseptheihna ding;
I damsung teng a amitmuh a siangthou leh
diktat tak a om ding in.
Tualeh “Naungek, nang, tungnung pen Jawlnei ahung kichi ding hi.
Ajiak a lampite bawl dingin
Toupa maiah napai ding hi,
A khialhnate uh ngaihdamna ding a
amite kiang a hundamna theihna pia ding in.
I Pasian uh hehpihna nemnou jal in,
tunglam a kipan nisuak in ahung khohta hi
miallak a leh sihna lim nuai a toute tanvak ding leh
khamuanna lampi a i kengte kal suansak dingin,”
achi hi.
Tuachi`n naungek a hung khanglian a; a khalam ahung hat hiai hiai a, Israelte kiang a ahung kilak masiah gamdai ah a omjing hi.
Tualeh huahun laiin hichi ahi a, Kaisar Augastas in leitung pumpi minkhum ding thu apia a,
(Tualeh hihpen Siria gam a Kurinias gam uktu ahihlai a minkhumna masapen ahi).
Tuachi`n mijousiah minkhum dingin amauh khuapi chiat uah apaita ua.
Tuachi`n Joseph zong Galili gam a Nazareth khua a kipan in Judea gam a David pianna khuapi Bethlehem ah apaitou a (David innkuan pihte leh akhak asuan a mi ahihjiak in),
Mari, azi kham gaisan laitak tawh minkhum dingin apaita a,
huasan a aom laitak un a nauneih ahung hunta hi.
Tuachi`n ata masa in pasal a neikhiata a, puannem in atuam a, zintunna inn amauh a ding mun a omlouh jiakin gan ankuang sungah asial hi.
Tualeh huagam ah belampute a belamte uh ching a jan a gam a giak aom ua.
Ngaiin, Toupa vantungmi khat akiang uah ahung kilak a, Toupa thupina in akim uh asalhvak a, tuatak in alau mahmah ua,
hinanleh vantungmi in akiang uah, “Laukei unla! ngaiun, michih a dingin tangthupha kipak huai mahmah nou kungpuak hi.
Tuni-in noua dingin David khuapi ah hundampa apiangta, amah Krist Toupa ahi!
Tualeh hih nou a dingin chiamtehna ahi ding; naungek puannem a tuam gan an piakna kuang a lum namu ding uhi,” achi a.
Thakhat in vantungmi kiangah van mipite ahung kikhawm ua, Pasian aphat ua:
“Tunung pen ah Pasian thupi henla,
leitung a akipahpih mahmah mihingte kiangah lemna leng hen!”
achi uhi.
Vantungmite`n amauh van a apaisan tak un, “Tuin Bethlehem khua pha in ipai ding ua, Toupa`n a hunghilh hungtung pen iva en ding uh,”
a kichi ua.
Tuachi`n apai mengmeng ua, Mari leh Joseph tawh, gan an piakna kuangsung a naungek lum avamu ua,
Avamuh tak un a naungek tanchin vantungmi-in agente agen thangta uhi.
Tualeh ajakha jousiahin hih belampute thugen lamdang asachiat uhi.
Hinanleh Mari-in hithute jousiah a lungtang ah a vom jing a, a ngaihtuah jingta hi.
Tuachi`n belampute`n, a kihilh bang ngeia sil bangkim azak ua amuh jiak un Pasian pahtawi leh phat kawm in a kilehkikta uhi.
Tualeh a teptanna ding nigiat ahung chin in, amin dingin sul a aom masang a vantungmi in a phuaksa Jesu aphuakta uhi.
Mosi dan dungjui a aki siansuahni uh a hungtun in, Jerusalem khua ah amah avatonpih ua, Toupa mai a alat ding in.
Toupa danthu a agelh dungjuiin, “Ta pasal sul hong masa peuhmah Toupa a ding a sehtuam ahi,” achi ding uhi.
Tualeh Toupa danthu a kigen dungjui in; vakhu kopkhat hiam, palva nou nih hiam kithoihna a lan ding in.
Tualeh ngaiin, Jerusalem ah pasal khat amin Simeon kichi a om a; amah ahihleh midiktat leh Pasian ngaihsaktak ahi a, Israelte khamuanna ding a ngakjing a, atung ah Khasiangthou a om hi.
Tuachiah Krist Toupa amuh masiah asi kei ding chih Khasiangthou in ana theihsak mawng ahi hi.
Tuachi`n Kha theihsak in tempul sung ah avalut a; naungek Jesu anu leh apa in da`n ngaina bang a atung a bawlsak dingin ahung zohpih tak un,
Aman ana angpom a, Pasian aphat a:
“Thuneitu Toupa, Na kamchiamsa bang in,
tu in na sila khamuang takin na paisak ding a;
Na hundamna ka mit in amuhta`k jiak in,
Hua mijousiah muh a na bawl pen;
Jentelte kiang a kilakna vak leh
nami Israelte thupina dingin,”
achi hi.
Tualeh naungek tungtang thu agen anu leh a pan lamdang asa mahmah ua.
Tuachi`n Simeon in amauh agualjawl a, anu Mari kiangah ngaiin, “Hih naupang Israelte lak a mi tampi pukna ding leh dinkhiatna ding a seh ahi, gensiat a om ding chiamtehna ding ahi.
Ahi, nangmah ngei lungtang zong namsau in asun pailet ding a, tuachia mi tampite lungtang a ngaihtuahnate akilat theihna dingin,” achi hi.
Tualeh Asher nam a mi, Phanuel tanu, Anna kichi numei Jawlnei khat a om a; amahnu teksia ahita a, akiten zoh uh kum sagih a pasal kiangah a om a,
tuachi`n amahnu meithai kum sawmgiat leh li hial ahi a, Pasian tempul paisan louin sun leh jan in anngawl kawm a thum in Pasian abia jel hi.
Tualeh huachih laitak in amah a hungpai a, Pasian kiangah kipahthu agen a, Jerusalem tatna lam en jousiah kiangah Jesu tanchin agen hi.
Tuachia Joseph leh Mari-in Toupa da`n dungjui a siljousiah a bawlzoh un Galili gam ah amauh khua mah Nazareth ah a kilehkikta uhi.
Tuachi`n naungek hung khang in khalam ah a hung hatta a, pilna in ahung dimta a, Pasian hehpihna atung ah aom hi.
Tualeh kum teng in paikan kut hun in anu leh apa Jerusalem ah a hawhjel ua.
Tualeh amah kum sawmlehnih ahih in da`n dungjuiin ankuang luina ah a hawhtou ua.
Tualeh ankuang lui khit a a kilehkik lai un, naupang Jesu`n Jerusalem ah a omsan a, hinanleh anu leh apa in athei kei uhi;
tuachi`n apawllak uah om hinanteh achi ua, nikhat lam a paikhinta ua, a sanggam lak uleh ameltheih lak uh azong ua.
Tuachia amuh louh tak un amah zong kawm kawm in Jerusalem ah aki nungleh kik ta uhi.
Tualeh hichi ahi a, nithum nung in Pasian tempul sung ah siate lak a tou a, athugen uh ngaikhia leh, amauh thu dong a om ava muta ua.
Tualeh athu jataphot in a theihdan leh a dawndan lamdang asa mahmah uhi.
Anu leh apa in amuh tak un lamdang asa mahmah ua, anu in akiang ah, “Tapa bangding a hichi bang a hungbawl na hia? En-in napa leh ken lunghimoh takin kung zong uhi,” achi hi.
Tuatakin aman akiang uah, “Bang ding a hungzong nahi ua? Ka Pa inn a om ding ka hi chih theilou nahi uh hiam?” achi hi.
Hinanleh amau`n akiang ua a thugen atheisiam kei uhi.
Tuachi`n amauh ajuisuk a, Nazareth khua a hungtung ua, athu uh mang in aom a, hinanleh anu in hih sil kigen jousiah a lungtang ah avom gige hi.
Tuachi`n Jesu pilna ah leh taksa ah ahung khanglian deuhdeuh a, Pasian leh mihing deihsak in a hung om deuhdeuh ta hi.

Tiberia Kaisar vaihawm kum sawmlehnga kum in Pontia Pilat Judea gam vaihawmtu ahi a, Herod Galili gam kumpipa ahi a, a sanggampa Philip Ituria leh Trakonotis kumpipa ahi a, tualeh Lisanias ahihleh Abilene gam kumpipa ahi a,
Annas leh Kaiapha siampi ahi ua, huahun laiin gamdai a om Zakariah tapa Johan kiangah Pasian thu a hungtung hi.
Tuachi`n amah Jordan luikim gam jousiah ah apai a, khialhnate ngaihdamna ding kisikna baptisma thu agen a.
Jawlnei Isaiah laibu a:
“Gamdai a kikou aw khat in;
‘Toupa lampi sial unla;
a lampite tangsak un!
Guamte sukdim ahi ding a,
mual leh tangte sukngiam ahi ding;
tualeh mun kawite suktang ahi ding a,
lampi pholte suknam ahi ding.
Tuachi`n mijousiahin Pasian hundamna amu ding uhi chia kigelh bang in!’ ”
Tuachi`n aman akiang a baptisma tang ding a hungpai mipite kiangah, “Nou gul suante aw! Pasian thangpaihna hungtung ding a kipan suakta ding a kuan nou hung taihilh ahia?
Tuajiakin kisikna ching gah hungnei masa phot un, tualeh Abraham kapu uh ahi chi`n na lungsim un ngaihtuah kei un, ajiak Pasian in hih suangtangte Abraham tate in a dingsakthei hi!
Tu mahmah in singbul chin ah hei koihkhit ahita. Tuajiakin singkung gahhoih neilou jousiah phuk in mei lak ah apaijel uh,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n mipite`n akiang ah, “A tuachihleh kou bang kabawl ta ding ua le?” chi`n a dong ua.
Aman adawng a akiang uah, “Kuapeuh puan ak nih nei in aneiloupa hawm hen, tualeh kuapeuh an nei in tuachimah bang in bawl hen,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n siah dongpa zong baptisma tang ding in a hungpai a, akiang ah, “Siapa, kou bang ka bawl ding ua?” achi a.
Tuachi`n aman a kiang ah, “Nang ding a ahung bikhiahzah val siah dong nawnken,” achi hi.
Tuachimah bang in galkapte`n zong a kiangah, “Tualeh kou bang ka bawl ding ua?” chi`n adong ua.
Tuachi`n aman akiang uah, “Kuamah vaulau kei un, ahihkeileh diklou pi-in ngoh kei un. Na nitha uh tawh lungkim un,” achi hi.
Mipite`n lam etna aneih ua, Johan tung thu a a lungtang ua Krist ahi kha dia aw, ahikei dia aw, chia a ngaihsut lai un,

Johan in adawng a akiang uah, “Ken tui in noute kung baptis ngei ngut a, hinanleh kei sang a hatjaw leh thupijaw khat a hungpai hi, a khedap khau sutding in zong ka chingkei, aman Khasiangthou leh mei in ahung baptis ding, achi hi.
A phikphek akhut ah atawi a, aman abuh phual hoihtakin a japsiang kilkel ding a, buhtakte a anbuk ah a koihkhawm ding a, hinanleh buhkhemte pen mei mittheilou tawh ahal ding hi.”
Tualeh hasotna thu tampi mipite kiangah agen hi.
Hinanleh kumpipa Herod, a sanggampa Philip zi Herodia jiak leh asil gilou bawlte jiakin Johan in aphawk jiakin.
Tualeh atung a te tengteng behlap in Johan thong ah akhumta hi.
Tuachia mi tengteng a baptis zoh in, hichi ahung hi a, Jesu`n zong baptisma a tangta a; tualeh athum laiin van ahung kihong a,
Khasiangthou vakhu bang a taksa a om in hung kumsuk in atung ah ahung tuang a. Tualeh van a pan in aw khat a hungsuak a, “Nang ka Tapa deihtak nahi, na tungah ka kipak mahmah hi,” achi hi.
Jesu`n thugen a pat chil in amah kum sawmthum vel ahita a, mi ngaih dan in Joseph tapa ahi a, hua pen Heli tapa ahi a,
Hua pen Mathat tapa ahi a, huapen Levi tapa ahi a, huapen Mekhi tapa hi a, huapen Jannai tapa ahi a, huapen Joseph tapa ahi a,
huapen Mattathiah tapa ahi a, huapen Amos tapa ahi a, huapen Nahum tapa ahi a, huapen Esli tapa ahi a, huapen Naggai tapa ahi a,
huapen Maath tapa ahi a, huapen Mattathiah tapa ahi a, huapen Semei tapa ahi a, huapen Joseph tapa ahi a, huapen Judah tapa ahi a,
huapen Joanna tapa ahia, huapen Rhesa tapa ahi a, huapen Zerubbabel tapa ahi a, huapen Shealtiel tapa ahi a, huapen Neri tapa ahi a,
huapen Melkhi tapa ahi a, huapen Addi tapa ahi a, huapen Kosam tapa ahi a, huapen Elmodam tapa ahi a, huapen Er tapa ahi a,
huapen Joshua tapa ahi a, huapen Eliezer tapa ahi a, huapen Jorim tapa ahi a, huapen Matthat tapa ahi a, huapen Levi tapa ahi a,
huapen Simeon tapa ahi a, huapen Judah tapa ahi a, huapen Joseph tapa ahi a, huapen Jonam tapa ahi a, huapen Eliakim tapa ahi a,
huapen Melea tapa ahi a, huapen Menan tapa ahi a, huapen Matthat tapa ahi a, huapen Nathan tapa ahi a, huapen David tapa ahi a,
huapen Jessai tapa ahi a, huapen Obed tapa ahi a, huapen Boaz tapa ahi a, huapen Salmon tapa ahi a, huapen Nahshon tapa ahi a,
huapen Amminadab tapa ahi a, huapen Ram tapa ahi a, huapen Hezron tapa ahi a, huapen Perez tapa ahi a, huapen Judah tapa ahi a,
huapen Jakob tapa ahi a, huapen Isak tapa ahi a, huapen Abraham tapa ahi a, huapen Terah tapa ahi a, huapen Nabor tapa ahi a,
huapen Seruk tapa ahi a, huapen Reu tapa ahi a, huapen Peleg tapa ahi a, huapen Eber tapa ahi a, huapen Shelah tapa ahi a,
huapen Kainan tapa ahi a, huapen Arphasad tapa ahi a, huapen Shem tapa ahi a, huapen Noah tapa ahi a, huapen Lamek tapa ahi a,
huapen Mathuselah tapa ahi a, huapen Enok tapa ahi a, huapen Jared tapa ahi a, huapen Maharlalel tapa ahi a, huapen Kainan tapa ahi a,
huapen Enosh tapa ahi a, huapen Seth tapa ahi a, huapen Adam tapa ahi a, huapen Pasian Tapa ahi.
Tuachi`n Jesu pen Khasiangthou a dim in Jordan lui a pat in akileh kik a gamdai ah kha puiin a om a.
Ni sawmli sung setan khem in a omta a, tualeh huanite in bangmah ane kei a, atawp in agil ahung kialta hi.
Setan in a kiangah, “Nang, Pasian Tapa nahihleh hih suang tanghou suak dingin thu piain,” achi a.
“Hinanleh Jesu`n, ‘Mihing tanghou guak in ahing kei ding a, Pasian kam a thuchin pawt in ahingjaw ding, chih gelh ahi,’ ” chi`n adawng hi.
Tuachi`n setan in mualsang tung ah a paipihtou a, tomnou khat sung in leitung kumpi gam jousiah a ensak a.
Tualeh akiang ah, “Hih tengteng tung a thuneihna leh athupina kung pia ding, ka kiang a piak ahihtak jiakin, ka piaknuam taphot kiangah ka piajel hi.
Tuajiakin, kei nungbiak leh aun in nang a ahi ding,” achi a.
Jesu`n adawng a akiang ah, “Ka nunglam ah om in setan; ‘Toupa na Pasian nabia ding a; ama nna guak nasep ding ahi, chih gelh ahi!’ ” achi hi.
Tuachi`n setan in Jerusalem ah apaipih a, tempul tungvum ah akoih a, akiang ah, “Nang, Pasian Tapa nahihleh hihsan a pan in kekhiasuk in.
‘Aman nang hung humbit dingin a vantungmite thu apia ding a.’
‘Tuachi`n amau`n akhut un ahung nadom ding uh; atuachih keileh na keng in suang nasuihkha ding, chih gelh ahi,’ ” achi a.
“Hinanleh Jesu`n adawng a akiang ah, ‘Toupa na Pasian ze-et ken, chih ahi,’ ” achi hi.
Tuachia setan in akhemna ding teng a akhemzoh in hun lemtang a dingin apaisanta hi.
Tuachi`n Jesu Kha silbawltheihna neiin Galili gam ah akileh kikta a; tualeh a tanchin hua gamkim jousiah ah athangsuak ta hi.
Tuachi`n kikhopna inn ah thu ahilhjel a, mijousiah pahtawi in a omta hi.
Tualeh akhanletna khua Nazareth a hungtungta a; a bawldan ngaina bang in khawlni-in kikhopna inn ah alut a sim dingin ading a.
Tuachi`n a kiangah Jawlnei Isaiah laibu apia ua, tuachi`n aman tua laibu aphel a, hihthu kigelhna santak amu a:
“Mi gentheite kiang a tangthupha gen ding a nungsawl jiakin,
Toupa Kha ka tung ah a om hi. Aman lungtang khasiate damsak ding leh,
saltangte kiang a suahtakna thu leh
mittawte kiang a mitvak neihkikna thu leh
bawlsiat thuakte pawtsakna ding
Toupa lungkim kum thu gen ding in a hungsawl hi,”
chih.
Tuachi`n laibu ajial a, nna sepsakpa kiangah a piakik a atouta hi. Tualeh kikhopna inn a om jousiah mit a tung ah atuta hi.
Tuatakin aman akiang uah, “Tuni in hih Pasian Laisiangthou thu najak un a tangtungta hi,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n mijousiahin athu atheihpih ua, akam a pawt hehpihna thute lamdang asa mahmah uhi. Tualeh amau`n, “Hihpa Joseph tapa hilou amaw le?” achi uhi.
Tualeh aman akiang uah, “Nou hih thupil, ‘Daktor, nang leh nang ki damsak in,’ Kapernaum khua a na silbawl ka najak jousiah uh, hiah nangma khua lam ah zong bawl in, nungchi ngei ding uhi, achi hi.
Tuachiang in aman, Adiktak in kung hilh ahi, Jawlnei kuamah amah khualam ah kipahpih in a omngai kei.”
Hinanleh thutak kung hilh ahi: “Elijah damlai a kum thum leh khaguk van akikhak a leitung pumpi a kial nasatak atunlai in Israel gam ah meithai tampi a om uhi.
Hinanleh Sidon gam a Sarepta khua a meithainu khat kiang ah chihlouh alak ua kuamah kiang ah Elijah sawl ahi kei hi.
Tualeh Jawlnei Elisa damlaiin Israel gam ah phak tampi aom uh, hinanleh Sireami Naaman chihlouh kuamah suksiangthou in aom kei uh,” achi hi.
Tualeh kikhopna inn a omten hihthu ajak tak un aheh mahmah ua,
Tuachi`n a dingdok ua, amah khua a kipan in adelhdok ua, akhua gei kawl a sawnkhiat dingin apaipihta uhi.
Hinanleh amahpen mipite kawmkal ah akigelkhia a a paimangta hi.
Tuachi`n Galili gam a khua khat Kapernaum ah ahung paisuk a, khawlni-in amauh thu ahilh hi.
Tualeh thunei tak a agen jiakin a thuhilhdan lamdang asa mahmah uhi.
Tualeh kikhopna inn sung ah dawiniin pai mi khat a om a, aw ngaihtakin akikou khia a,
“Kou guak in hung omsak in; Nazareth Jesu? Nang leh kou bang ahia bawlding ineih? Nang kua na hiam chih kungthei hi, Pasian Misiangthou na hi!” achi hi.
Tuatakin Jesu`n atai a, “Dai inla, asung a pat in hungpawt in!” achi a. Tuachi`n dawi in amah alai ua apuksak zoh in amah liamsak louin asung a pat in ahung pawtdok hi.
Tuatakin aun un lamdang asa mahmah ua, “Hih bangthu ahi a le? Thuneitak leh silbawlthei takin dawininte thu apia a, apawt uh!” chi in akihou ua.
Tuachi`n huakim gam munchin ah a tanchin athangta hi.
Tuachi`n amah kikhopna inn a pan a pawtkhia a, Simon inn ah apaita hi. Tualeh Simon sungnu nasatak in ana nattun a; tuajiakin amah a dingin ana ngetsak ua.
Tuachi`n Jesu amahnu geiah ading a, a nattun atai a, tuachi`n aphata hi; amahnu zong kintakin ahung thoukhia a, ana uh asepsak ta hi.
Tualeh nitumkuan ahunghih in natna tuamtuam a damlou nei jousiahin a kiangah ahung paipih ua; tuachi`n aman atung chiat uah akhut anga a, a damsakta hi.
Tualeh dawininte zong, “Nang Krist, Pasian Tapa nahi, chia kikou in mi tampite sung a pat ahung pawtdok uhi!”
Tuachi`n aman amauhte atai a, aham ding uh aphal kei hi; ajiak Krist ahi chih athei uhi.
Tuachi`n khua ahung vak in, apawt a gamdai mun ah apaita a, mipite`n amah a zong ua, a kiangah a hungpai ua, amauh apaisan louhna ding un tuk asawm ua.
Hinanleh aman akiang uah, “Khua dang ah zong Pasian gam tangthupha ka gen ding ahi; hua ding a sawl kahihman in,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n Galili gam a kikhopna innte ah athupuak ahilhjel hi.
Nikhat mipite`n Pasian thu ngai ding a aboh huthut laiun, Jesu Genesaret nawng geiah ading a.
Nawng geiah gunkuang nih om amu a; hinanleh ngaman mite a gunkuang uh nusia a a ngente uh sawp in aom ua.
Tuachi`n gunkuang lak a khat, Simon a pen ah atuang a, piaugei a pat themkhat kitawl deuh dingin a ngen a, tuachi`n atou a, mipite gunkuang sung a pat in thu ahilhta hi.
Tualeh a thugen zoh in Simon kiangah, “Lithuklam naih unla nga man dingin na ngente uh khuh un,” achi a.
Simon in adawng a akiang ah, “Siapa, jankhuavak in gimtak in ka pang ua, bangmah ka mankei uhi; hinanleh na thu in ngen ka khuh ding,” achi hi.
Tualeh hih abawl jawh un nga tampi akhuhkha ua; a ngen uh akek diakdiak a.
Tuatakin gunkuang dang a tou alawite uh hungpai a panpih dingin akhut jap a, amauh zong a hungpai ua, gunkuang tegel a sungdim ua, tuachi`n tum dingin akisahial ta hi.
Simon Peter in hih a muhtak in, Jesu kengbul ah khupbok in, “Toupa! Hung paisan in, mikhial ka hi!” achi hi.
A ngamat uh amah leh alawite`n lamdang asak mahmah jiak un.
Tualeh Simon kithuahpih Zebedi tate Jakob leh Johan in zong lamdang asa uhi. Tuachi`n Jesu`n Simon kiangah, “Lauken; tu a pat in mihing naman ta ding,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n a gunkuangte uh luipiau a ahung tawldok zoh un, bangkim anusia ua amah ajuita uhi.
Tualeh hichi ahung hi a, khuakhat a aom laiin, ngaiin, mikhat apumtang a phak in atuam aom a; Jesu amuhtak in amaiah a khupbok a, “Toupa, na ut leh nung siangsakthei hi!” chi`n a ngen a.
Tuatakin Jesu`n akhut a tungah akoih a, “Ka ut hi,” “Siangthouta in!” achi a. Tuachi`n manlang takin aphakna in amah a nusiata hi.
Tualeh aman, “Kuamah hilh ken, hinanleh pai inla siampute kiangah vakilak in; amauhte theihsakna dingin Mosi thupiak bang in kisiansuahna dingin sil valan in,” achi hi.
Hinanleh a tanchin athang nasa jawsem a; tualeh mipi tamtak athu ngaikhia ding leh a natnate uh ki hihdamsak dingin a hungpai uhi.
Tuachi`n amah gamdai ah a paituam a athumta hi.

Tualeh nikhat hichi ahung hi a, thu ahilhlai in, Galili leh Judea gam khuachin leh Jerusalem a kipan-a hungpai Pharisaite leh dansiamte a kiangah atou ua, amauh damsakna dingin Toupa hihdam theihna akiang uah a om a.
Tualeh ngaiin, mi`n jeng khat lupna in ahung jawng ua; tualeh amah a jawnglut theihna ding leh a koihtheihna ding a ngaihtuah ua.
Hinanleh mipi jiakin jawnglut theih nang amu kei ua inntung ah akahtou ua, inntung phetvang in alaitak ah Jesu maiah alupna tawh a khaikhia suk uhi.
Tualeh aman aginna uh amuhtak in a kiangah, Mihing na khialhnate ngaihdam ahita hi, achi hi.
Tuachi`n Laigelhmite leh Pharisaite`n, “Pasian gensia hihpa kua ahia! Pasian guak loungal kuan ahia hih khialhna ngaidam thei!” chi in a ngaihtuah ua.
Hinanleh Jesu`n angaituah uh athei a akiang uah, “Bang ahia na lungtang ua na ngaihtuah uh?
‘Na khialhnate uh ngaihdam ahita,’ chih leh, ‘Thou inla keng in paita in,’ chih khoipen abaihlam jaw ei? achi a.
Mihing Tapa in leitung ah khialh ngaidam theihna anei hi, chih na theihna ding un,” jeng a damloupa kiangah, “Thou inla na lupna la inla, na inn ah paita in kungchi ahi!” achi hi.
Tuachi`n amah a thoutoupai a, alupna la-in Pasian phat kawm in a innlam ah apaita hi.
Tuatakin amauhte`n aun un lamdang asa mahmah ua, Pasian a phat ua, “Tualeh tuni`n sillamdang takmai imu uh chi`n alau mahmah uhi!”
Tualeh hih silte tengteng zoh in apawt khia a, siah dawnna zum a tou amin Levi kichi siah dawngtu khat amu a; a kiangah, “Hung juiin,” achi a.
Tuachi`n aman bangkim nusia in dingtou in anung ajuita hi.
Tuachi`n Levi in a inn ah Jesu a dingin ankuang luina thupitak anei a, hua ah siah dongtute tampi leh midang tampite`n a ankuang uh a umpih uhi.
Hinanleh a laigelhmite uleh Pharisaite a nungjuite tung ah aphun ua, “Bangding a siah dongte leh mikhialte tawh ne a dawnkhawm nahi ua?” achi ua.
Tuatakin Jesu`n a dawng a akiang uah, “Mi chidamte`n daktor a poimoh kei ua, mi chinate`n a poimohjaw uhi.
Midiktatte sam ding a hungpai ka hikei a, mikhialte sam a kisiksak ding a hungpai ka hijaw hi,” achi hi.

Tualeh amauhte`n a kiangah, “Bangding a Johan nungjuite`n anngawl jel uh a, thumna aneijel ua, tualeh Pharisaite nungjuite`n zong huachimah bang in abawl ua, hinanleh nang nungjuite`n ne a dawn ahi ua,” achi ua.
Tuachi`n Jesu`n akiang uah, “Moupuite kiang a mouneipa a om laiin moupuite an na ngawlsak ngai uai le?
Hinanleh alak ua pat mouneipa lakmang hun ahung tung ding a, huani chiangin a ngawl ding uh,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n aman akiang uah, gentehna thu zong agen a, “Kuaman puanthak in puanlui aphawh ngaikei; phawhta henla hileh anih in akek ding a, tualeh athak them pen alui tawh akituak kei ding hi.
Tualeh kuaman uain thak savun thawllui ah akoih ngaikei, koihta henla hileh uainthak in savun thawlluipen apokjak sak ding a, a kibua ding, tualeh athol zong asia siang ding hi.
Hinanleh uainthak pen savun thawlthak a koih ding ahi, tuachi`n anih un abit ding uh! achi hi.
Mi kuaman uain lui adawn zoh nung un athak a duhpai ngaikei uh; ‘Aluimah limjaw,’ achi uhi.”
Tualeh hichi ahung hi a, khawlni khat in buhleilai tuan in apaisuak a, a nungjuite`n buhvui asiktan ua, akhut ua nuaisiang in ane ua.
Tualeh Pharisai kuate hiam in a kiangah, “Bangding a khawlni a bawl sianglou na bawl uh ahia?” achi ua.
Tuachi`n Jesu`n adawng a, “David in agilkial laia asilbawl uh sim khalou nahi uh maw?
Tuachia Pasian inn a alut a, siampite loungal nek sianglou tanghou alak a, anek a tualeh alawite kiang a zong apiakthu,” achi hi.
Tualeh aman akiang uah, “Mihing Tapa hi khawlni Toupa ahi,” achi hi.
Tualeh hichi ahung hi a, khawlni dang in kikhopna inn ah alut a, thu ahilh a, tualeh huasan ah mi khat khut jiatlam jeng ana om a.
Tuachi`n laigelhmite leh Pharisaite`n ahekna ding a muhtheihna ding un, khawlni a a damsakleh a damsaklouh adap et ua.
Hinanleh aman a ngaihtuah uh athei a, khutjawpa kiangah, “Thou inla alai ah dingdok in,” achi a, tuachi`n amah athou a, a dingdokta hi.
Tuachi`n Jesu`n akiang uah, “Silkhat kung dong ding hi, khawlni a silhoih bawl ahia asiang sil hoihlou? Hundam ahia asiang hihlup?”
Tuachiah akim a omte jousiah a en kawikawi a, khutjawpa kiangah, “Na khut zandok in,” achi a. Tuatakin aman azan a; akhut langkhat bang in adamta hi.
Tuatakin amauh ahehta mahmah ua, Jesu tung a abawl dan ding uh khat leh khat a kihouta uhi.
Tualeh huahun laiin hichi ahung hi a, mual ah thum dingin apai a, Pasian kiangah jan khuavak in athum hi.
Tualeh khua ahung vak takin a nungjuite asam a; alak ua pat sawmlehnih atel a, amin uh zong sawltakte ahisak hi.
Simon (aman Peter zong achih) leh a sanggampa Andru, Jakob leh Johan, Philip leh Bartholomai;
Mathai leh thoma, Alphai tapa Jakob, tualeh Simon (Zealot achih uh,)
Tualeh Jakob sanggampa Juda, tualeh a mansakpa Juda Iskariot ahi uhi.

Tuachi`n amauh tawh a kitonsuk a, munjang ah ading a, a nungjuite mi tampi leh Judea gam pumpi leh Jerusalem a kipan leh Tura leh Sidon lam a tuipi geia kipan mipi tampitak tawh, huate pen a thugen ngai ding leh a damlouh nate uh damsak ut in a hungpai ua.
Tualeh khanin bawl gentheihte zong a hungpai ua a damsiangta uhi.
Tualeh amah a kipan-a sil bawltheihna pawtkhia a miteng adamsak jel jiakin mipite`n aun un amah khoih atum uhi.
Tuachi`n a dakkhia a, a nungjuite en in agen a,
“Nou migentheite na hampha uhi;
van gam nou a ahihjiak in!
“Nou tu a gilkialte na hampha uhi;
tai ding nahihjiak un!”
“Nou tu a kapte aw, na hampha uhi;
nui ding nahihjiak un!”
“Mihing Tapa jiak a mi`n ahung huat ua, ahung pampaih ua, ahung phawk ua, namin uh ahoihkei chia ahung paihmang chiang un, na hampha uhi!
Hih ni-in kipak unla nuam in kidiang un, ngaiun, van ah na nuamman uh athupi jiakin. Huachi mah bang in napu napate un Jawlneite ana bawl uhi.
“Hinanleh nou mihausate tung agik hi;
na khamuanna uh namuhtak jiak un!”
“Nou, tu a vahte aw, natung uh agik hi;
nagil uh hungkial ding ahihjiak in!”
“Nou tu a nuite aw, natung uh agik hi;
lungkham a kap ding nahihjiak un!”
“Mijousiahin a hungphat chiang un natung uh agik hi; ajiak huachimah bang in apu apate un Jawlnei takloute tung ah ana bawl uhi.”
“Hinanleh nou ka thu ngaikhiate kiangah kung hilh ahi: Na melmate uh it unla, ahung mudahte limbawl un.
A hung hamsiatte vangbuak unla, ahung simmohte thumsak un.
Na pheta hung beksaktu kiangah alang khat zong doh in, tualeh na puantual uh hung laksaktu kiangah na puan-ak uh zong it kei un.
Na kiang a hung ngen jousiah kiangah pia unla, navan hung laksakpa kiangah ngenkik nawn kei un.
Tualeh mi`n natung ua silhoih abawl ding nadeih bang un, nou zong amauh tung ah bawl un.
“Hinanleh nou hung itte guak na it uleh, pahtakna bang nalawh ding ua? Mikhial tenzong amauh itte a it uhi!
Tualeh natung ua hoihte tung guak a nahoih uleh pahtakna bang nalawh ding ua? Mikhial ten zong huachi bang in abawl uhi.
Tualeh muhkik na kinepna kiang guak a na batlaksak uleh pahtakna bang nalawh ding ua? Mikhialte`n zong azahmah mukik dingin mikhialte kiangah a batlaksak uhi!

Hinanleh nou na melmate uh it unla, hoih bawl un, bangmah muhkik kinem louin batlaksak un. Tuachi`n na nuamman uh a thupi ding a, Tungnungpen Tate na hi ding uhi; aman mi kipakdan theiloute leh mikhialte ahehpih hi.
Huajiakin napa uh mihehpih asiam mah bang in nou zong mihehpih siam un.
“Thu khen kei un, tuachi`n thu khensak in na omkei ding uh, mohpaih kei un, tuachi`n mohpaih in na omkei ding uh. Tualeh ngaihdam un tuachi`n ngaihdam in na om ding uhi.
Pia un, tuachi`n piak in na om ding uh, sawndet in, hentaak in, tualeh letjen in na angsung uah piak in na om ding uhi. Nou mauh tehna mah in tehsak in na om ding uhi.”
Tualeh aman akiang uah gentehna thu khat agen a, “Mittaw in mittaw khat a lamkaih theih ding maw? Anih un kuakhuk ah kiakhawm talou ding uh maw?
Nungjuimi pen a siapa tung ah aom ngaikei, hinanleh mi hoihtak a sinsak zoh chiangin asiapa bang in a omthei hi.
“Tualeh bangding a nangma mit a singtun om mulou a, na sanggampa mit a ninthem om mu na hia?
