Nangma mit a singtun om mulou pia na sanggampa kiang a, ‘Sanggampa na mit a ninthem om hung laksak ning,’ bangchia na chih ahia? Nang milepchiah! Namit a singtun om pen lakhia masa inla, tuahileh na sanggampa mit a ninthem om lakkhiat ding chiantak in na muthei ding hi.
“Ajiak ahihleh sing hoih agah asia ngai kei a, tualeh singsia zong gahhoih in agahngai kei hi.
Singchih agah ah kithei hi. Ajiak mi`n lingkung ah theipi alou ngai kei ua, tualeh lingnawk lak ah zong grep alou ngai kei uhi.

Mihoih in a lungtang goubawm hoih a kipanin silhoih ahung suahkhia a, tualeh migilou in a lungtang goubawm sia a kipanin sil hoihlou ahung suahkhia jel hi. Bangjiakin ahia ichihleh lungtang a dimlette akam in ahung gen hi.
“Tualeh noute`n ka gen bawllou pia bangding a, ‘Toupa’ hungchi nahi ua?
Kuahileh ka kiang a hungpai a, ka thugente ja a, tualeh juite bang chibang mi ahi ua kung ensak ding;
Amauhte pen innlammi thuktak tou a suangpi tung a suangphum lem tawh kibang ahi; tuachi`n tui ahung khang a tui hat in tua inn ahung khoh a ahihling jou kei, dettak a lam ahihjiak in.
Hinanleh za-ngal a juiloute pen suang phum loua, leitung maimai a innlam tawh kibang ahi; huapen tui hat in ahung khoh a, apukpai hi, tualeh hua inn siatdan anasia hi, achi hi!”
Tualeh mipite jak a athugen tengteng azohkhit in Kapernaum khua ah alut a.
Tualeh galkap zalamkai kuahiam sila deihtak achi ana a, asi dekdek a.
Tuachi`n aman Jesu tanchin ajaktak in, akiang ah a hungpai a, a silapa damsak ding a ngen ding in Juda upate a kiangah asawl a.
Tuachi`n amauhte Jesu kiang avatun un, “Amah hi bawlsak tak ahi.
Ajiak ahihleh aman i mi nam uh a it a, tualeh ka kikhopna inn uh zong ama hung lamsak ahi,” chi`n hoihtak in a ngen ua.

Tuachi`n Jesu amauh tawh a hungpaita a, tualeh inn a pat gamlalou ahungtun in, tua galkap zalamkaipa`n a silate a kiangah asawl a, “Toupa, kigimsak nuam dah maiin, ajiak ka innsung na lutna tak ahikei hi,
tuajiakin kei zong na kiang a paitak in ka kingaihsun kei a, athu in genlechin ka silapa dammai ding ahi.

Ajiak kei zong mi thunuai a om ka hi a, ka nuaiah zong galkapte a omsawn a. Khat kiangah, ‘Pai in!’ ka chihleh apai a, adang khat kiang ah, ‘Hung pai in!’ ka chihleh a hungpai a, tualeh ka silapa kiangah, ‘Hih bawl in!’ ka chihleh a bawljel,” achi hi.
Jesu`n hihthute ajak takin amah lamdang asa mahmah a, a kinunghei a mipi amah juite kiang ah, na kiang uah kung hilh ahi, “Israelte lak ah zong hizahta a ginna lian ka mukha kei hi achi hi!”
Tuachi`n hua amisawlte innlam ah apaikik ua, sila damlou a ompa pen dam in amuta uhi.
Tualeh huakhit in hichi ahung hi a, amah Nain khua kichi khat ah apaia, tualeh a nungjuite leh mi tamtak in ajui ua.
Khuapi kongkhak gei a hungtun in, ngaiin misi khat ahung jawngdok ua, anu tapa neihsun ahi a, amahnu meithai ahi a, tualeh hua khua a mipi tampitak akiang ah aom uhi.
Tualeh Toupa`n amahnu amuhtak in ahehpih mahmah a, tuachi`n a kiangah, “Kap ken,” achi a.
Tuachi`n a hungpai a, ala`ng akhoih a, tuatakin ajawngtute adingta uhi. Tuachi`n aman, “Tangval! Thou in, kungchi ahi!” achi a.
Tuatakin hua misi pen ahung thoukhia a, ahung hamta hi; tuachi`n aman amah anu kiangah a piakhiata hi.
Tuatakin mi jousiah ahung lauta ua, Pasian apahtawita ua, “I lak uah Jawlnei thupitak ahung suakta!” Tualeh “Pasian in amite ahung vehta hi!” achi uhi.
Tualeh hih a tungtang thu pen Judea gam pumpi leh akim akiang a gam jousiah ah a thangsuakta hi.
Tualeh Johan nungjuite`n hihthu jousiah amah avahilh ua
tuatakin Johan in a nungjuite lak a minih asam a, Jesu kiangah asawl a, “Hung paidingpa nahi hiam? Ahihkeileh midang na hungaihlai ding ka hi uh hiam?” chi in.
Tualeh akiang a hungtun un, “Baptispa Johan in ahung paidingpa nahi hiam? Ahihkeileh midang hungaih lailai ding ka hi uh hiam?” chia na kiang a ahung sawl ka hi uh, achi ua.
Tualeh hualaitak in Jesu`n mi tampi, chinate hipi veite tualeh dawimatte adamsak a, tualeh mittawte mit asuk vaksak a.

Tuachi`n Jesu`n adawng a akiang uah, “Paikikta unla nasil muh uleh na jakte uh Johan vahilh un, bang chibang a mittawte mit hungvakta a, kengbaite ahung paitheita a, miphakte ahung siangthouta, bilbingte`n a hung jatheita a, misite kaihthoh in ahung omta a, tualeh tagahte kiangah tangthupha gen in a omta hi, chih.
Tualeh kuapeuh ka tung a lung hihmohna mulou pen ahampha hi!” achi hi.
Tualeh Johan misawlte apai nung un aman mipite kiang ah: “Bang en ding a gamdai a paikhia nahi ua? Pumpeng huih mutling maw?
Ahihkeileh bang en ding a paikhia nahi ua? Puannem silh maw? Ngaiun, puanthupi silh leh mi nuamsate pen kumpipate inn ah ahi aom uh!
Ahihkeileh bang pen en ding a pawtkhia nahi uhiam? Jawlnei maw? Ahi ka hungchi ahi, Jawlnei sang a thupi jaw ahi.
‘Ngaiin, ka kamtai namai ah ka sawl a, aman na maiah na lampi abawl ding, chih atanchin kigelh pen amah ahi.’ ”
“Numei suan lak ah baptispa Johan sang a thupijaw Jawlnei aom kei, hinanleh Pasian gam a neupen zong amah sang in a thupijaw hi, chih kung hilh ahi,” achi hi.
Tualeh athu jajousiah leh siah dongte`n Johan baptisma tang in Pasian siam atan uhi.
Hinanleh Pharisaite leh dansiam mite`n akiang ah baptisma tanglou in Pasian in amauh a ding a a lemguatsak pen anialta uhi.
Tuachi`n Toupa`n, “Tulai khangthakte bang tawh kateh dia aw? Tualeh bangchi bang ahi ua?
Amauh ahihleh naupang van juakna mun a tou a, khat leh khat kikou tuah a, theile kung mutsak ua nalam kei ua! ‘Kung kah uleh zong nakap tuan kei ua; kichite bang ahi uhi!’
Bangjiakin ahia ichihleh, baptispa Johan pen anlah nelou uain lah dawnlou in a hungpai a, tuachi`n nou dawipai ahi nachi uhi.
Tualeh Mihing Tapa pen ne leh dawn in a hungpai a, tuachi`n nou, ‘En un! Anhaipa, uain haipa, siah dongte leh mikhialte lawmpa!’ na chijel uhi.
Hinanleh pilna pen ata tengteng in siam atan uhi,” achi hi.
Tualeh Pharisaite lak a khat in amah an anekpih ut a, tuachi`n amah Pharisaipa inn ah alut a, ankuang ah atouta a.
Tualeh ngaiin, hua khua a om mikhial numei khat in Jesu Pharisaipa inn ah anne in atou chih atheih in alabastar bawm in sathau namtui a hungtawi a.
Anung ah a kengbul ah kapkawm in ading a, a kengphangte a mittuiin a hihkawt a, a samin asiak a, a kengpek atawp a, sathau namtui anuh hi.
Tualeh Pharisai amah sampa in hua a muhtak in a lungsim in, “Hihpa Jawlnei ahihleh hih akhoihnu kua ahia, tualeh bang chibang mi ahiam chih theileh kilawm a, a mahlah mikhial ahi a!” achi hi.
Tuatakin Jesu`n adawng a akiang ah, “Simon, na kiang ah gennuam khat kanei hi,” achi a.
Tuachi`n aman, “Siapa, gen in,” achi hi.
“Sum batlaksaktu kuahiam khat in leibatu nih anei a, Khat in makhai ja nga aba a, tualeh khat in sawmnga.
Tualeh aditna ding aneihlouh tak un anih un a ngaihdam tuakta hi. Tuajiakin hunghilh in alak ua kuapen in amah a itjawdiak diam?” achi a.
Simon in adawng a, “A ngaihdam tamjawpa in hiding in ka ngaihsun achi a.”
Tuachi`n aman, “Na chidik hi,” achi a.

Tuachiah amah numeinu lam anga a, “Simon kiang ah hih numeinu namu ei? Na innsung ah kung lut a, nang ka keng silna ding tui nungpia kei hi; hinanleh amahnu`n a mittui in ka kengpek asil a, asam in asiak hi.
Nang tawpzong nungtawp kei a, hinanleh numeinu`n ka hunglut a pat ka keng tawp akhawl naikei hi.
Nang ka lu sathau nungnuh kei a, hinanleh hihnu in, ka kengpekte sathau namtui ahung nuh hi.
Tuajiakin kung hilh ahi; a khialhna tampi ngaihdam ahita hi; a it mahmah jiak in; hinanleh ngaihdam tawm in a itna aneu hi,” achi hi.
Tualeh aman numeinu kiang ah, “Na khialhnate ngaihdam ahita hi,” achi hi.
Tualeh amah tawh ankuang a toukhawmte`n alungsim un, “Khialhnate zong ngaihdam hihpa kua ahia?” a kichi ua.
Tuatakin aman numeinu kiang ah, “Naginna in ahung hundamta hi, khamuang tak in paita in,” achi hi.
Tualeh hichi ahung hi a, Jesu thuhilh kawm leh Pasian gam tangthupha gen kawm in khuapi leh khuata ah avak kawikawi a, sawmlehnihte a kiangah a om uhi.
Tualeh numei kuate hiam, dawipai damkik leh natnate a pat damkik Mari Magdalini achih uh, a sung a pat dawi sagih pawtdoknanu tawh,
tualeh Herod dangka kemtu Chuza zi Joanna tawh, Susana tawh, tualeh midang tampite tawh ahi ua, huaten aneihsa un a nna asepsak jel uhi.
Tuachi`n mipi tampitak ahung kikhawm ua, khuachin a mi akiang a ahung pai tak un, gentehna thu agen a:
“Khaichi thehpa a khaichi theh in akuan a; tualeh athehlai in khenkhat lamsik ah atu a, mi`n atuanchil a, tungleng vasaten anengaita uhi.
Tualeh khenkhat suangtung ah atu a, apoutak in alei anawm louh jiakin avulpaita hi.
Tualeh khenkhat loulingnei lak ah atu a, tuachi`n ling tawh a hung poukhawm a, adeplumta hi.
Tualeh khenkhat leihoih ah atu a, ahung pou a, alehja in agahta hi,” achi a.
Tualeh hihthute agen khit in akikou a, “Kuapeuh jakna ding bilnei jousiahin ja hen!” achi hi.
Tuachi`n a nungjuite`n hih gentehna thu bang chihna ahia? chin amah adong ua.
Tuachi`n aman, “Pasian gam thugukte noute theih ding phal ahina, hinanleh midangte kiangah gentehna guak a gen ahi; mujing ngala amuh louhna ding uleh, jajing ngala atheihsiam louhna ding un.”
“Hua gentehna thu ahihleh hih a hi: Buhchi pen Pasian thu ahi a.
Lamsik a tute ahihleh thu jate ahi uh, tuachi`n dawimangpa a hungpai a, thu a lungtang ua pat a lamang hi, a gintat ua hundam a a omlouhna ding un.
Suangtung ate ahihleh hichi bang ahi uh, azak tak un thu kipak takin apom ua; tualeh hihte`n jung anei kei ua, tomkhat sung agingta ua, khemna atuah chiang un apukjel uhi.
Tualeh loulingnei lak a tute ahihleh thu jate ahi ua, ajak nung un apai ua, khawsak ding dan ngaihtuah nate, hausaknate tualeh damsung nopsaknate`n adep a, agah piching ngaikei hi.
Hinanleh leihoih a tute ahihleh lungtang siangthou leh hoih in thu aja ua, apom ua, tualeh kuhkal tak a gah suangte ahi uhi.
“Mi kuaman meivak adet chiangin kuang in a khuhngai kei, ahihkeileh lupna nuaiah zong a koihngai kei hi. Alut jousiahin vak a muhtheihna dingin meivak tunna ah akoihjaw hi.
“Kilanglou ding a im bangmah aom kei a, tualeh theihlouh ding a kisel bangmah aom kei hi.
“Tuajiakin bang chi`n ahia najak uh pilvang un, ajiak ahihleh kuapeuh aneite piak beh ahi ding a, tualeh kuapeuh aneiloute aneihsun zong laksak ahi ding hi,” achi hi.
Tualeh anu leh a sanggamte a hungpai ua, hinanleh mipi jiakin akiang atungthei kei ua.
Tuachi`n, “Na nu leh na sanggamte nang hung munuam in inn pualam ah ading uh chi`n ahilh ua.”
Tuatakin aman adawng a akiang uah, “Ka nu leh ka sanggamte ahihleh Pasian thu ngaikhia a juite ahi uh,” achi hi.
Tualeh hichi ahung hi a, nikhat a nungjuite tawh gunkuang ah ahung tou ua, aman akiang uah, “Nawng galkhat lam ah ipai ding uh achi a,” tuachi`n gunkuang phel in atawlta ua.
Tualeh a kitawl laiun amah a ihmuta a, tualeh tua nawng tung ah huihpi ahung langsuk a, a gunkuang uh tuiin adimta a, tuachi`n lauthawng huaitakin ahung omta uhi.
Tuatakin amauhte a kiangah ahung pai ua, aphong ua, “Siapa, Siapa! mangthang ding ka hita uh!” achi ua. Tuachi`n amah a hungthou a, huih leh tui kihot ataita a, tuachi`n atawp a, ahung daita hi.
Tuakhit in aman akiang uah, “Na ginna uh khoia om ahia?” achi a.
Tuachi`n amauh lauin lamdang asa mahmah ua, “Hihpa bang chibang mi hi ahia? Huihte leh tui nasan thu apia a, athu amang uh!” achi ua.
Tuachi`n Galili gal a om Gadarate gam ahung tung ua.
Tualeh amah gam a akaidok takin hun sawtpi dawinin pai kuahiam khat in khuapi a pat amah ana kituah pih a; tualeh aman puan asilh kei a, inn mawng mawng ah zong a om kei a, hanmual lak ah a omjel hi.
Tualeh aman Jesu amuh takin, a kikou a, amaiah apuk a, tuachiah aw ngaihtak in, “Jesu nang tungnung pen Tapa, kei leh nang bang bawlding nei ihia? Hung hihgim lou dingin kung ngen ahi!” achi hi.

Aman dawinin hua mipa sung pat a pawt ding a thu ana piaktak jiakin, tamveipi dawinin in ana mankhata a, sikkhau leh kol bulhsak in a omta a, tualeh aman a kikannate a phutan a, gamdai ah dawi delhmang in a om hi.
Tuachi`n Jesu`n akiang ah, “Na min bang ahia?” chi`n a dong a,
“Aman, ‘Nuai,’ ” achi a; asung a dawi tampi lut ahihjiak in.
Tualeh amau`n kawkhuk thukpi a paikik ding a thu pialou dingin akiang ah a ngen ua.
Tualeh huamun ah vok-hon tampi ata ua, amau`n huate sung a alut phalsak dingin a ngen ua, tuachi`n aman aphalsak hi.
Tuatakin dawite hua mipa sung a pat a pawtkhia in vokte sung ah alut ua, vok honte nawnglam ah munken a pat a taisuk ua, tui valh in asita uhi.
Tualeh akhawite`n sil omdan amuhtak un atai ua, hihthu khuapi leh khua neu ah avagen uhi.
Tuatakin bang thu ata chia en ding in ahung pawt ua; Jesu kiang ahung tun uleh dawimatpa puansilh a, lungsim hoihtak pua a Jesu kengbul a tou amu ua, tuatakin alauta uhi.
Tualeh amauhte`n dawimatpa damsak a ahung omdante ana hilh ua.
Tuatakin Gadara gam kimvel a mi jousiahin alau mahmah jiak un amah akiang uapan paimang dingin a ngen ua; tuachi`n amah gunkuang sung ah alut a akik kikta hi.
“Tualeh a sung a dawi pawtnapa`n akiang a omden dingin a ngen a.”
Hinanleh Jesu`n amah asawl khia a.
“Na inn ah paikik inla, Pasian in natung a bangchituk a silthupi hung bawlsak ata ale, chih vahilh in,” achi a.
Tuatakin amah apaita a, Jesu`n sil thupitak amah ding a abawlsak khuapi pumpi ah a phuangjakta hi.
Tualeh hichi ahi a, Jesu ahung kinungleh kik in mipi`n amah kipak takin ana vaidawn ua, ajiak aun ua amah nangak jing ahi uhi.
Tualeh ngaiin, pasal khat amin Jaira kichi kikhopna inn a vaihawmtu ahung pai a, Jesu kengbul ah a khupbok a a inn a hawhding in a ngen a,
ajiak aman tanu kum sawmlehnih vel pha khatguak anei a, amah laitat in alum a.
Hinanleh Jesu apai takin mipi`n atuam lutlut ua.
Tualeh numei khat kum sawmlehnih sipawt, aneih jousiah daktorte kiang a joubeita, hinanleh kuaman adamsak zohlouh.
Anung ah a hungpai a, apuan mong akhoih a tuachi`n asipawt akangta hi.
Tuatakin Jesu`n, “Kua ahia ahung khoih?” achi a.
Tualeh mi jousiahin kei hikeng achihchiat tak un, Peter leh alawite`n, “Siapa mi jousiahin hung tuam a, hungneh lutlut ua, kua ahia ahung khoih nachih,” achi ua.
Jesu`n, “Kua ahiam khat in ahung khoih hi, ajiak sil bawltheihna ka sung a pat in apawt hi chih kathei hi,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n numeinu`n akiphual theihlouh amuh takin, kithing kawm in a hungpai a, a maiah apuk a, mipi jousiah maiah a kiangah akhoihna san leh ahung dampai dan a phuangta hi.
Tuachi`n Jesu`n a kiang ah, “Tanu, khamuangtak in om in; naginna in ahung damsak ahi. Lungmuangtak in paita in,” achi hi.
Aman hichi a thu agenlai in kikhopna inn vaihawmtu inn a kipan in mikhat a hungpai a, “Na tanu asita hi, Siapa hihbuaidah maiin,” achi hi.
Hinanleh Jesu`n hih ajaktak in adawng a, a kiangah, “Lauken; gingta maiin tuachi`n amah adamdok kik ding,” achi hi.
Tualeh innsung a aluttak in Peter tawh Jakob tawh Johan tawh tualeh naupang apa leh anu chihlouh kuamah lut aphal kei hi.
Aun un amahnu kah in ana mau vengvung ua, hinanleh aman, “Kap kei un; asi ahikei a ihmu ahijaw!” achi hi.
Amau`n amahnu asita chih atheih un amah anuihsan uhi.
Tualeh aman aun un a sawldok siang a, amahnu khut in atu a, “Nungak thou in!” chi`n asam a.
Tuatakin akha ahung paikik a, a thoukhiapai a, tuachi`n amahnu nek ding piading in thu apia hi.
Tuatakin anu leh apa`n lamdang asa mahmah ua; hinanleh hua sil kibawl pen kuamah hilhlou dingin aman amauh a khamta hi.
Tuachi`n aman anungjui sawmlehnihte a samkhawm a, dawi jousiah tung a silbawltheihna leh thuneihna tualeh natnate damsak theihna apia a.
Amauhte Pasian gam thu gen ding, damloute damsak dingin a sawlkhiata hi.
Tualeh aman akiang uah, “Na zinna ding un chiang hiam, thungpi hiam, tanghou hiam, dangka hiam bangmah keng kei un; puan tungsilh zong nih keng kei un.
Na lutna inn uah tungden unla, tualeh hua inn a kipanin paikhia un.
Tualeh ahung kipahpih lou peuhmah pen hua khuapi a kipan-a na pawtdok chiang un amauh mawhpaihna dingin na kengpek ua leivui thingkhia un,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n apaikhia ua, tangthupha genkawm in leh munchin a mite damsak in akhua akhua ah apaita uhi.
Tuachi`n kumpipa Herod in a silbawl jousiah anaja a; alung buaita a, ajiak khenkhat in Johan ahung hingkik ahi achi ua.
Khenkhat in Elijah ahung hingkik ahi, achi ua, tualeh midangte`n tanglai a Jawlneite khat a hung hingkik ahi achi uhi.
Tualeh Herod in, “Johan lah a ngawng tanta ing a; hinanleh hichi bang a athu kajak hi kua ahi diam aw?” achi a. Tuachi`n amah muh a utta hi.
Tualeh sawltakte`n ahung kinungleh un a silbawl jousiah uh amah ahilh ua, tuachi`n Jesu`n amauh apui a, Bethsaida kichi khuapi a gamdai munkhat ah apaituampih a.
Mipite`n tua atheihtak un amah ajui ua, tualeh aman amauhte ana kipahpih a, akiang uah Pasian gam thu ahilh a, damsak ngaite adamsak hi.
Tualeh nitum kuan ahung hih in sawmlehnihte a hungpai ua a kiangah, “I kim ua khuapite leh gamte a paia giahna leh nek ding zong dingin mipite sawlkhia in, hihsan gamdai mun ahi,” achi ua.
Hinanleh aman akiang uah, “Nou a nek ding uh pia un,” achi hi.
Amau`n, “Mipi hizahpi nek ding i valeisak keileh tanghou nga leh nga nih guak chihlouh ngal, bangmah i neikei uhi?” achi ua.
Ajiak amauh mi sangnga vel ahi uhi.
Tuachi`n aman a nungjuite kiangah, “Sawmnga jel in ahawn hawn in tousak un,” achi a.
Tuachi`n amau`n abawl ua, a tousakta uhi.
Tuachi`n aman hua tanghou ngate leh nga nihte ala a, vanlam entou in agualjawl a, abalkek a a nungjuite kiangah mipite mai a lui dingin apia hi.
Tuachi`n ane ua avahchiatta uh; tualeh anekval uh aneng lawh sawmlehnih aluak dim uhi.
Tualeh hichi ahi a, amah guak a athum laiin a nungjuite a kiangah a om ua; aman akiang uah, “Mipite`n kei kua ka hi hungchi ua?” chi`n adong a.
Amau`n adawng ua, “Baptispa Johan ahi,” a hungchi uh; “Hinanleh khenkhat in Elijah ahi a hungchi ua; tualeh adangte`n tanglai a Jawlneite lak a khat hung thoukik ahi, a hungchi uh,” achi ua.
Aman akiang uah, “Ahihleh nou kei kua ka hi nungchi ua?” achi a.
Peter in adawng a, “Pasian Krist nahi,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n aman hihthu kuamah hilhlou dingin akhamta hi.
“Mihing Tapa in sil tampi athuak ding a; upate, siampite, laigelhmite deihlouh in aom ding a, thah in aom ding, tualeh nithum ni`n kaihthoh in aom ding hi,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n aman amauhte tengteng kiangah, “Mi khatpeuh in kanung ajuih nuam leh amah kimanghilh in nisial a akross pua in hungjui hen.
Ajiak kuapeuh a hinna humbit ut in ata`n ding a, hinanleh keimah jiak a a hinna ta`n in a humbit ding hi.
Mi`n leitung pumpi nei henla, amah ki mangsak hiam ahihkeileh ki siatlawh in omtaleh! amah a dingin bang a phatuam dia?
Kuapeuh keimah leh ka thu jumpihte pen mihing Tapa in ama thupina tawh a Pa thupina tawh vantungmi siangthoute thupina tawh ahung pai chiangin amauh azumpih ding hi.
Hinanleh adiktak in kung hilh ahi, hihsan a dingte Pasian gam amuh masiah uh, sihna chiamlou ding aom uh,” achi hi.
Tualeh hichi ahung hi a, hihte agenzoh nung nigiat ding bang in aman Peter, Johan leh Jakob apui a mualtung ah thum dingin apai a.
Tualeh athum laiin amel omdan ahung lamdangta a, apuansilhte a hung vam a, ate-selhsawlh a.
Tualeh ngaiin, minih amah tawh akihou ua, huate Mosi leh Elijah ahi uhi.
Amauh thupina a kithuam in akilak ua, Jerusalem khua a sihna ahihkim ding thu agen uhi.
Hinanleh Peter leh akiang a omte a ihmut uh asuak mahmah a, hinanleh a hunghalh tak un Jesu thupina leh akiang a ding minihte amuta uhi.

Tualeh hichi ahung hi a, akiang a kipan a paikhiat un Peter in Jesu kiangah, “Siapa, ei a dingin hihsan a om ahoih hi! Sawlbuk thum ilam ding a, nang a dingin khat, Mosi a dingin khat tualeh Elijah a dingin khat,” achi a; (A thugen zong theilou pi`n.)
Tuachia agen laiin meilum ahung kaia, amauh ahung khuh a, meilum lak a aluttak un alauta uhi.
Tualeh meilum lak a kipan aw ahung suak a, “Hih ka Tapa deihtak ahi, athu ngai un” chi in.
Tualeh aw adaihtak in Jesu guak amuta ua, tualeh a sipdide a, huahun laiin asilmuhte uh kuamah ahilh kei uhi.
Tualeh hichi ahung hi a, ajingni a mual a kipan ahung kumsuk un, mipi tampitak in amah ana dawn ua.
Tualeh ngaiin mipi lak a pat mikhat hung kikou in, “Siapa! kung ngen ahi, ka tapa en in; ka tapa neihsun ahihjiak in!
En in, khanin khat in aman a, thakhat khat in akikou khia a, tualeh chilphuan kaijen in a bawlgim jel a, nakpitak a sidup in a nusia jel hi.
Na nungjuite kiangah hawlkhia dingin ka ngen a, a delhdokthei kei uh,” achi hi.
Jesu`n adawng a, “Ginna beite leh khangthak hilhhakte aw! Na kiang uah bangtan om a hung thuakpih ding ka hia?” “Na tapa hiah hung paipih in,” achi a.
Tualeh amah ahung pailai, dawi-in apuksak a a bawlgim hi. Tuatakin Jesu`n dawinin atai a, naupang adamsak a, apa kiangah apiata hi.
Tualeh aun un Pasian silbawl theihna thupitak tuh lamdang asa mahmah ua.
Hinanleh michih in Jesu silbawl jousiah lamdang asak laiun aman a nungjuite kiangah,
“Hihthu kigente na bilsung uah lut heh; ajiak mihing Tapa mite khut a matsak a om ding ahi,” achi hi.
Hinanleh amau`n a thugen atheisiam kei ua, atheihlouh ding ua im ahihjiak in. Tualeh athugen amah adong ngam kei uhi.
Tuachi`n alak ua kua alianpen dia chih thuin kiselna ahung neita ua.
Jesu`n a lungtang ua a ngaihtuah uh athei a, naupang khat ala a, ageiah atousak a,
akiang uah, “Kuapeuh ka min a hih naupang kipahpih tuh kei hung kipahpih ahi, tualeh kei hung kipahpih tuh a hungsawlpa kipahpih ahi, nouteng lak a aneupen tuh alianpen ding ahi,” achi hi.
Tualeh Johan in adawng a, “Siapa, mikhat namin a dawite notdok kamu ua, ei ahung juihlouh jiakin ka khamta uhi,” achi a.
Jesu`n akiang uah, “Amah khamkei un,” “ajiak, ei hung doulou tuh eilam a pang ahi,” achi hi.
Tualeh hichi ahung hi a, laktouh a aom ding hun a hungtun in, Jerusalem khua a pai ding in amai angat tinten a.
Amasang ah kamtai mi asawl a, tuachi`n amah napaiin amah ding a guatsa diam a nakoih dingin Samariamite khua khat ah alut hi.
Tualeh amau`n Jerusalem lam a paiding bang a amel alat jiakin amah ana kipahpih kei ua.
Tualeh a nungjuite Jakob leh Johan in hih atheihtak un, “Toupa, Elijah bawl bang in amauh kangmang dingin van a kipan in mei samkhialei hoih nasa diam?” achi ua.
Hinanleh amah a kihei a, amauh atai a, “Bang chibang lungsim puami nahih uh kitheilou nahi uh.
Ajiak mihing Tapa mite hinna hihsia ding a hungpai hilouin, hundam dingin hungpai ahijaw,” achi hi.
Tualeh hichi ahung hi a, lampi a apailai un mikhat in a kiangah, “Toupa napaina teng ah hung juining,” achi a,
Jesu`n a kiangah, “Si-alte`n kua anei ua, tungleng vasate`n zong bu anei uh; hinanleh mihing Tapa-in alu ngakna ding zong a neikei,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n aman midang khat kiangah, “Hung juiin,” achi a, hinanleh aman,
“Toupa, kapa vavui masa phot ning,” achi a.
Jesu`n a kiang ah, “Misi-in amisi uh kivui uhen, hinanleh nang pai inla Pasian gam thu vagen in,” achi hi.
Tualeh midang khat in zong, “Toupa hungjui ning; hinanleh ka inn a mite kampha in hung khasak masa phot in,” achi a.
Jesu`n a kiang ah, “Mi kuapeuh langkawn tukawm a nunglam en pen Pasian gam mi hitak ahi kei,” achi hi.
Hih silte nung in Toupa`n midang sawmsagih zong aguat a, ama painang khuachin leh munchin ah amai ah nih nih in asawl hi.
Tuachi`n aman akiang uah, “Buh lak ding atam mahmah a, hinanleh asemtute atawm uhi; tuajiakin abuh lading a nasem dingte hung sawlkhia dingin buh neipa kiangah ngen un.
Pai un! ngai un, ngia hon lak a belamnou bang in kungsawl ahi.
Dangka-ip hiam, thungpi hiam, khedap hiam keng kei un; tualeh lampi ah kuamah chibai buk kei un.
Tualeh inn na lutna phot uah, amasa pen in, ‘Hih inn ah khamuanna tung hen,’ chi un.
Tualeh hua-ah khamuanna ta aom leh na khamuanna uh atung ah aom ding a; a om keileh na khamuanna uh noukiang ah ahung kinungleh kik ding.
Tualeh hua inn ah omjing unla, a hungpiak bang un ne unla dawn un; ajiak nasemtu thaman mutak ahi. Inn khat a pat inn khat ah kisuan lehleh kei un.
Khua na lutna phot uah ahung na kipahpih uleh namai ua alui taphot uh ne un,
hua-ah adamlou omte hihdam unla, akiang uah, ‘Pasian gam na kiang uah a hungtungta,’ chijel un.
Hinanleh khua na lutna phot uah ahung na kipahpih kei uleh akhua kongjing ah pai unla,
‘Na khua leivui uh ka kengphang ua bang nasan natung uah ka tatsiang uh; ahihhangin Pasian gam na kiang uah a hungtungta chih thei un!’ chi un.
Hinanleh kung hilh ahi, huani chiangin hua khuate thuak ding sang in Sodom khua thuak ding adan a omjaw ding!
“Korazin natung agik hi! Bethesda natung agik hi! Na kianga sil thupi kibawlte Sidon leh Tura a kibawl hileh sawtpi a pan la-ip silh a vut lak ah touin a kisikkhin ta ding uhi!
Hinanleh vaihawmni chiangin nou thuak ding sang in Tura leh Sidon thuak ding adan a omjaw ding hi.
Tualeh, Nang Kapernaum! Vantan a tawisang, misi khua ah puaksuk in na om ding hi!”
“Kuapeuh na thugen uh ngaikhia tuh kei hung ngaikhia ahi uh; tualeh kuapeuh nou hungnial tuh kei hungnial ahi uh; kei hungnial tuh a hungsawlpa nial ahi uh,” achi hi.
Tualeh sawmsagihte kipaktak in ahung tungkik ua, “Toupa, namin jiakin dawite nangawn ka thu-un a om uh!” achi ua.
Aman akiang uah, “Setan van a kipan-a tunphe bang a hungkia kamu hi, achi a.
Ngai un gulte leh mom-aite totden theihna leh melma silbawltheihna jousiah tung a thuneihna kungpia hi. Bangmah in ahung hihna kei ding hi.
Hinanleh dawite na thuthu ua aom jiakin kipak kei unla, van a namin uh gelh ahihjiak in kipakjaw un,” achi hi.

Huahun laitak in Jesu Khasiangthou in akipak a, “Pa aw, van leh lei Toupa! Nang, mipilte leh misiamte kiangah hihthute na im a, naungekte kiang a naphuan jiakin kung pahtawi hi; ahi, Pa, huachibang bawl nang ngaih in ahoih hi.
“Siljousiah kapa`n kei ahung piakhiata hi. Tapa kua ahia chih Pa loungal kuaman athei kei; tualeh Pa kua ahia chih Tapa leh akiang a atheihsak nuamnate loungal kuaman athei kei,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n a nungjuite lam anga a, aguk in, “Na silmuhte uh amu mitte ahampha hi!
Ajiak kung hilh ahi, Jawlnei tampite leh kumpi tampite`n na silmuhte uh muh a ut ua, hinanleh amu kei uh, tualeh najakte uh zong jak a ut ua, ajakei uh,” achi hi.
Tualeh ngaiin dansiam mi khat a dingkhia a amah ze-etna in, “Siapa, tangtawn hinna ka neihtheihna dingin bang ka bawl dia?” achi a.
Aman a kiang ah, “Dan laibu ah bang akigel ei? Bang nachi sim ei?” achi a.

Aman adawng a, “ ‘Toupa na Pasian tuh na lungtang tengteng in, nakha tengteng in, na hatna tengteng in tualeh na lungsim tengteng in na it ding ahi; tualeh nangmah na ki it mahbang in na innvengte zong na it ding ahi,’ ” chi`n, achi a.
Tuachi`n Jesu`n akiang ah, “Na dawng dik ngel hi, hichi`n bawl in, na hing ding hi,” achi hi.
Hinanleh amah siam kitan ut in Jesu kiangah, “Ka innveng kua ahia?” achi a.
Tuachi`n Jesu`n adawng a, “Mi kuahiam khat Jerusalem a pat Jeriko ah apaisuk a, suamhatte atuakkha a, huate`n apuansilh asutsiang sak ua, avua ua, siloubep in anusiata uhi.
Tuachi`n siampi khat tua lampi ah hung paisuk kha laizang a; amah amuhtak in lampi gei langkhat ah apelta hi.
Tuachibang mah in Levi mi khat huamun a hungtun in, a en a, lampi gei langkhat ah apelta hi.
Hinanleh Samaria mi khat khualjinlai huapa omna mun a hungtung a, amah amuhtak in ahehpih mahmah a.
A kiangah apai a, aliamnate sathau leh uain buak in atuamsak a, ama gantung a tuangsak in zinbuk ah apaipih a, a enkolta hi.
Tualeh ajingni a apai dingin makhai nih alakhia a, zinbuk neitu kiangah apia a, ‘Amah na enkol inla, hih ban a nasen zahzah kung paikik chiangin kung piakik ding,’ ” achi hi.
“Ahihleh hih mi thumte lak ah kuapen gutate tuakpa innveng hiding in na ngaihtuah a?” achi hi.
“Aman atung a khuatuahna neipa achi a.”
Tuachi`n Jesu`n akiang ah, “Pai inla nang zong hihbang in vabawl in,” achi hi.
Tualeh hichi ahung hi a, apai laiun khuakhat ah alut ua, numei khat amin Martha in a inn ah atungsak hi.
Tualeh amahnu`n Mari kichi sanggamnu khat anei a, amah Jesu kengbul ah atou a, a thugen angai hi.
Hinanleh Martha pen nek bawlin abuai mahmah a, Jesu kiangah ahung pai a, “Toupa, ka sanggamnu`n kei guak nek bawl a ahung ngansiah khawk salou nahi maw? Hung huh dingin sawl in!” achi a.
Jesu`n adawng a, a kiangah, “Martha, Martha! Sil tampi na ngaihtuah a buai nahi,
hinanleh sil khatguak apoimoh hi; Mari-in tanhoih atelta a, huapen laksak louh ding ahi,” achi hi.
Tualeh hichi ahung hi a, mun khat a athum laiin, tualeh athum zoh in a nungjuite khat in a kiang ah, “Toupa, Johan in a nungjuite ahilh bangin ka kiang uah thumdan hunghilh in,” achi a.
Aman akiang uah, “Na thum chiang un:
‘Ka Pa uh van a om:
Na min kizahtak hen;
Na gam hungtung hen.
Na deihlam van a a kibawl bangin,
Leiah zong kibawl hen.
Nisial a ka nekkhop uh an hung pian
Ka tung ua khialte ka ngaihdam bang un,
Kou khialhnate zong hung ngaidam in.
khemna ah hung kailut kenla
Gilou lakpan hung hunkhiajaw in,’ ”
chi un, achi hi.
Tualeh aman akiang uah, “Na lak ua kuahiam in lawm khat nei henla, jankim laiin a kiangah vapai henla, ‘Lawm aw, tanghou beuthum hung batlaksak in.
Ajiak ka lawm khat khualjin ka kiangah ahung paia, amai a lui ding bangmah ka neikei chi henla!’
Tualeh aman innsung panin dawng henla, ‘Hung hihbuai ken! Kot khak ahita a, tualeh ka tate zong ka kiangah lupna ah a ihmuta uh, hung thouin kung piathei kei na chileh.’
Kunghilh ahi, alawm ahihjiak a vathouin vapia kei mah leh zong, anget teitei jiakin vathou in adeih zahzah avapia ding hi.
Kunghilh ahi: Ngen un, tuachi`n piak in na om ding uh; zong un, na mu ding uh; tualeh kiu un, honsak in na om ding uhi.
Ajiak kuapeuh a ngen in a ngah a, kuapeuh azong in amu a, kuapeuh akiu tuh honsak in a om ding hi.
Na lak ua pate kuahiam khat a tapa in tanghou ngen leh kuan suang apia dia? Ahihkeileh ngasa ngen leh kuan ahia nga tang a gul pia ding?
Ahihkeileh aktui ngen leh kuan ahia mom-ai piading?
Tualeh nou migiloute`n bawn na tate uh silhoih piakdan na theih uleh na Pa uh van a om in a ngente kiangah Khasiangthou piakdan hahtheih tazen lou ding maw!”
Tualeh Jesu`n dawi hamtheilou khat ahawlkhia a, tualeh hichi ahi a, dawi apawttak in hamtheilou pen ahung hamtheita a; tuachi`n mipi`n lamdang asa mahmah ua,
hinanleh alak ua khenkhat in, “Dawimangpa Beelzebul jal a dawite a hawlkhiat ahi,” achi ua.
Adangte`n amah ze-etna in van a pan a chiamtehna a ngen ua.
Hinanleh aman angaihtuah uh ana thei a, akiang uah, “Gam amah leh amah kidou taphot a mangthang jel hi; tualeh innsung khat zong a kidou leh apukjel hi.
Setan zong amah leh amah akidou leh bang chi`n agam a dingthei dia? Beelzebul jal a dawite hawlkhia nung chi ua.
Tualeh ken Beelzebul jal a dawite hawlkhia ka hihleh na tapate un kua jal a hawlkhia ahia le? Tuajiakin amauhte noute hung vaihawmsak dingte ahi uhi!
Hilehzong ken Pasian khutzung vang a dawite ka hawlkhiat leh Pasian gam na kiang uah a hungtung taktak ahita hi.”
“Mihat in galvan kim a a inn aveng chiangin a inn abit a.
Hinanleh amah sang a hatjaw khat ahung paia, a hungzoh chiangin a kivonna galvan jousiah alaksak a, aneih leh lam alaksakte ahawmjak jel hi.
“Kuapeuh keilam a pangloute kei hung dou ahi ua; tualeh kuapeuh ahung lak khawmpih lou tuh athehjak ahi.
“Dawinin pen mi sung a kipan a pawtkhiat in khawlna ding zongin gamgaw mun lak ah avak kawikawi a, hinanleh amukei a; ‘Ka pawtna inn mah ah ka paikik mai ding,’ achi a.
Tualeh ahung pai takin phiatsiang a zephoihsa in amuta hi.
Tuatakin apai a, amah sang a giloujaw dawi adang sagih ahung puia, asung ah alut ua, atengta uhi. Tualeh huapa omdan nunung pen amasa sang in ahung siajawsemta hi,” achi hi.
Tualeh hichi ahung hi a, hih thute agen laiin, mipi lak a pat numei kuahiam khat ahung kikou khia a, “Nang hung kipaina gil ahampha hi, tualeh nanawi tepte tawh!” achi a.
Hinanleh aman, “Ahi, hinanleh Pasian thu ja a juite ahampha jaw uh!” achi hi.
Tualeh mipi ahung kikhop khawm laiun, aman akiang uah, “Tulai khangthakte khang giloutak ahi uh! Chiamtehna azong ua, hinanleh Jawlnei Jona chiamtehna loungal chiamtehna dang piak ahikei ding uh.
Ajiak Jona Ninevi khua a mite a ding a chiamtehna ahih bang in Mihing Tapa zong tulai khangthakte dingin chiamtehna ahi ding.

Simlam kumpinu vaihawmni chiangin tulai khangthakte tawh ahung thou ding a, siamlouh atangsak ding hi; ajiak Solomon pilna ngaikhia dingin leitawp a pan ahung pai hi; Solomon sang a thupijaw hiah a om hi.

Ninevi khua mite vaihawmni chiangin tulai khangthakte tawh athou ding ua, siamlouh atangsak ding uh, ajiak Jona thugen jiakin amauh a khialhnate uh akisik uh; ngaiin Jona sang a thupijaw hiah a om hi!
“Mi kuamah in meivak adet chiangin bemkawm ah akoih ngai kei; lawh nuaiah zong akoih ngai kei, ahung lutte`n avak a muhtheihna ding un meivak tunna ah akoihjaw hi.
Taksa vakna mit ahi a, tuajiakin namit achim chiangin na taksa zong aun in avak suak hi, hinanleh namit ahoihlouh chiangin na taksa zong amial hi.
Tuajiakin nasung a vak om pen mial ahihlouhna dingin pilvang in.
Tuajiakin na taksa apumpia avak a, amialna mun a om kei leh meivak vakphatak in a hung tanvak bang in avaksuak siang ding,” achi hi.
Tualeh a thugen laiin Pharisai kuahiam khat in akiang ah an ne dingin amah achial a; tuachi`n an ne dingin alut a atouta hi.
Tua Pharisaipa`n annekma a akhut asillouh amuh in lamdang asa mahmah hi.
Toupa`n akiang ah, “Nou Pharisaite`n nou leh kuang a pualam na silsiang gut ua; hinanleh na sunglam uh duhgawlna leh gitlouhna in adim hi.
Nou mimawte, apualam siamtu in asunglam zong siam lou ahi maw?
Hinanleh nasil neihte uh migentheite kiangah piajaw un; tualeh ngaiun, sil jousiah nou dingin asiang hi.

“Hinanleh Pharisaite aw, natung uh agik hi! Ajiak nou lengmaselte, lounamsiate tualeh anteh louhingte sawm a khat napia ua, vaihawmna dik leh Pasian lungsiatna lah na thudon kei uh. Hihte ahi na bawlding uh, adangte bawllou tuan lou in.
“Nou Pharisaite aw, natung uh agik hi! Ajiak nou kikhopna inn ah touna hoih penpente leh van juakna mun a min chibai ahung buk ding nadeih uhi.
Nou laigelhmite leh Pharisai lepchiahte aw natung uh agik hi! Ajiak nou hankhuk, min ahihlam theiloua atunga ava paikhakjel nate bang nahi uh,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n dansiammite lak a khat in adawng a, akiang ah, “Siapa, hihbang a na thugen in kou zong hungtai na hi!” achi hi.
“Nou dan siammite zong natung uh agik hi! Nou van-gik puakhak taktak mi na puasak ua, noulah hua van-gikte nakhut mengleng khat un zong nakhoih nuam kei uhi.
Na tung uh agik hi! Ajiak nou Jawlneite han nalam ua, amauhlah napu napate uh thah ahi hi.
Na pu napate uh ahoih hi chi`n na theihpih uhi, ajiak amau`n Jawlneite ana that ua, nou ahan uh nalamsak uhi.
Tuajiakin Pasian pilna in zong akiang uah, ‘Jawlneite leh sawltakte kasawl ding a, alak ua khenkhat ana that ding ua, khenkhat abawl genthei ding uhi.’
Leitung siamchil a kipan a kisuah Jawlnei jousiah sisan phu tulai khangthakte tungah a kilathei ding hi,
Abel sisan kisuah a pat maitam leh Pasian tempul kikal a si Zakariah sisan tan in; achi hi. Adiktak in kung hilh ahi, hih phuba pen tulai khangthakte tungah akila ding hi!
“Nou dansiammite aw, natung uh agik hi! Ajiak nou pilna chabi na lamang ua, nou lah na lut kei ua, mi alut dingte zong nakham uhi!” achi hi.
Tualeh aman hihthute agen laiin laigelhmite leh Pharisaite`n amauh thu tampi gensak tum in hahtok in atawng panta ua,
siamlouh atansak theihna ding un a hamkhelh na mat tum in atang gige uhi.
Huachih laiin mipi simsenglouh khat leh khat kituanpai hial a ahung kikhop tak un, aman a masapen in a nungjuite kiangah, “Pharisaite tol, lepchiahna lak ah kiveng un.
Ajiak kilanglou ding a khuh bangmah aom kei a, tualeh theihlouh ding a kiphual zong bangmah aom kei.
Tuajiakin, mial a nagen taphot uh vak ah jak in aom ding a; tualeh innsung tawng a bilkawm a nagen uh inntungvum ah tangkoupih in aom ding hi.
“Tualeh nou ka lawmte aw, kung hilh ahi, taksa sisak thei a, tuazoh chiang a bangmah dang bawltheih neinawnloute lau kei un.
Hinanleh kua ahia nalau ding uh kung hilhkholh ding: Athah nung a zong gawtmun a paihtheihna thuneihna neipa amah lau un; ahi, kung hilh ahi, amah lau un!
“Vatou nga daan dangkasik nih in ajuak jel uh hilou maw? Tualeh alak ua khat zong Pasian maiah manghilh in a om kei hi.
Hinanleh nalu ua samzangte nangawn simsiang ahi. Tuajiakin lau kei un; vatou tampi sang in na manpha jaw uhi!
“Kunghilh ahi, kuapeuh mi mai a kei hung gum taphot mihing Tapa in zong Pasian vantungmite mai ah agum ding hi.
Hinanleh mi mai a kei hung kitheihmoh bawl tuh Pasian vantungmite mai ah kitheihmoh bawl in a om ding.
“Kuapeuh mihing Tapa kalh a thugen tuh a gensiatna ngaihdam ahi ding a, hinanleh Khasiangthou kalh a thu gen tuh agensiatna ngaihdam ahi kei ding hi.
“Tualeh nou kikhopna innte, thukhentute, tualeh thuneitute mai a ahung paipih chiang un bang chi in, bang thu in ka dawng dia, ahih kei leh bang ka gen dia chi`n lungkham kei un.
Ajiak Khasiangthou in ahuntak in nagen ding uh ahung hilh ding hi,” achi hi.
Tualeh mihon lak a khat in, “Siapa, ka sanggam kiangah kapa un hung nutsiat gou hung kihawmpih dingin gen in,” achi a.
A man akiang ah, “Mi, kua in ahia kei natung ua vaihawmtu hiam, tan hawmtu hiam a hungbawl?” achi hi.
Tualeh aman akiang uah, “Pilvang unla, enna lak ah kiveng un; ajiak hauhsak mihing hinpih hilou hi,” achi hi.
Tualeh aman gentehna thu khat agen a, “Mi hausa kuahiam khat alou a piang ahung tam mahmah ta a.
Tuachi`n a lungsim in aki ngaihtuah a, ‘Ka buh leh balte koihna ding lah ka neikei a, bang lawh ding kadiam aw? chi`n aki ngaihtuah a.
Tualeh hichi`n bawlning, Ka anbukte kaphel ding a, alianjaw kalam ding; tuachi`n hua-ah ka buh leh balte leh kavan jousiah kakoih ding, achi hi.
Tualeh ka kha kiangah ka kha aw, kum tampi sung a dingin sil tampi naneita a; tawldam inla ne in, dawn in tualeh nuamtakin om in!’ Ka chi ding, achi hi.
Hinanleh Pasian in akiang ah, ‘Nang mimaw, tujan chiah na hinna hung ki laksak ding ahi, hua nasil kholkhawmte kua a ding ahita diai?’ ” achi hi.
“Amah guak ding a gou kikhol a, Pasian lam a hausa lou tuh hichi bang ahijel hi,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n aman a nungjuite kiangah, “Tuajiakin kung hilh ahi, bang ahia ka nek ding, chi`n na hinna thu uleh, bang ahia ka silh ding chi`n nataksa ding un lungkham kei un.
Hinna nek ding sang in athupi jaw a, tualeh taksa zong puansilh sang in athupi jaw hi.
Va-akte ngaihsun un, buh atuh kei ua at zong a atkei uh; hinanleh Pasian in amauhte avak hi! Nou vasate sang a bang zahta a manphajaw na hi ua?
Tualeh nalak ua kua in ahia lungkham jiak a adin tongkhat abehlap thei?
Tuachia nou hua sil neupen bawn na bawltheih kei uleh bang ding a adangte lungkhampih nahi ua?
Lili pak khandan ngaihtuah un, na asem kei ua khau a khek kei uh; hinanleh kung hilh ahi, Solomon zong a thupina tengteng a akijep in zong hih lilipakte lak a khat bang a zep in aom kei hi.
Tuachia gam a hampa tunia hing a ajing a meikhuk a paihmai ding bawn Pasian in huachituk a ajepleh. Aw nou ginna tawmte, bangzah takin silhsak in na om ding uai?
“Tualeh nanek ding uhiam, nadawn ding uhiam, zong kei un.
Ajiak leitung a namte`n hihte jousiah azong uh; tualeh na Pa un hih silte napoimoh uh chih athei hi.
Hinanleh nou Pasian gam zongjaw un, tuachi`n hih silte piakbeh in na om ding uhi.
“Pawltawmte aw, laukei un; ajiak na kiang uah kumpi gam piak na Pa uh kipak na lamtak ahi.
Na neih jousiah uh juak unla, migentheite kiangah pia un; van ah guta pailouhna leh samek neksiat louhna ah dangka-ip luitheilou leh gou setheilou kikholjaw un.
Ajiak nagou uh omna ah na lungtang uh zong a om ding hi.
“Na kawng uh gak unla, na meivak uh zong kuangsak jing un,
mi apu kitenna ankuang luina a pat a hungpai a kongkhak ahung kiuh chiang a na honsakpai thei ding a na ngakjing bangin om un.
Apu a hungpai chiang a amah nangak jing a amuh silate a hampha uhi! Adiktak in kung hilh ahi, akawng uh agak ding a, amauhte ankuang ah a tousak ding a, anek uh a bawlsakta ding.
Tualeh janlai in hiam, thawh hun in hiam, a hungpai a, hua chibang a amuh hua silate ahampha uhi!
Hinanleh hih thei un, guta hungpai ding hun inn nei pa`n thei henla hileh aveng ding a a inn aphetvang sak kei ding.
Tuajiakin nou zong kiging jingin om un, ajiak na gintaklouh laitak un Mihing Tapa ahung pai ding hi,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n Peter in a kiangah, “Toupa, hih gentehna koukiang guak a nagen ahia, ahihkeileh mi jousiah kiangah zong?” achi a.
Toupa`n, “Dangka kemtu gin-om leh piltak, apu in ahun teng a atan ding uh hawmsak ding a a innkuan pihte tung a vaihawmtu ding a abawl ding kuapen ahita diam le?
Apu a hungpai chiang a sila huachibang a bawl ahung muh ding pa pen ahampha hi!”
Diktakin kung hilh ahi, amah aneih jousiah tung a vaihawmtu in abawl ding hi.
Hinanleh hua sila pa`n kapu hung paizok kenteh chi`n asilanu asilapa navua taleh, tualeh ne in dawn in nakham taleh,
Hua silapa pu pen a gintalouh ni khat in atheihlouh kal in a hungpai ding a, tunnih asuah ding a, gingloumite tan bang a tangsak ding hi.
“Tualeh sila apu deihlam theigige napi a na kiging lou leh apu deihlam a zong gamtang lou pa, tamvei vuak ahi ding.

Hinanleh theilou pi a vuakna thamching a silbawlpa tawmnou khat a vuak ahi ding. Ajiak kuapeuh tampi kipiakna kiangah tampi akiphut ding a, tualeh mi`n tampi akepsak kiangah atamjawsem aphut ding uhi.
“Leitung a mei khiasuk ding a hungpai ka hi, tu in zong kangpaileh chi na ing e!
Hinanleh baptisma tan ding ka nei, hua ka tangtun masiah ka om nuamlou hina e!
Leitung a lemna lengsak ding a hungpai in nung ngaihtuah uh maw? Hibaih lou, kung hilh ahi, kikhenna omsak ding a hungpai ka hijaw hi.
Ajiak tu a kipan in innsung khat a om mi nga a kikhen ding ua, nih in thum adou ding a, thum in nih adou ding.
Pa in tapa, tualeh tapa in pa, nu in tanu, tualeh tanu in nu, innpinu in amounu, amounu in innpinu adou ding,” achi hi.
Tualeh aman mipite kiangah zong, “Nou tum lam a meikai namuh chiang un guah ju ding ahi nachi pai ua, huachi`n ahung om ngei a.
Tualeh sim huih a hunglan natheih chiang un khualum ding ahi nachi ua; tuachi`n a hung lum hi.
Nou milepchiahte aw! Van leh lei omjia lah na theisiam ngal ua, bangding a tulai hun omdan theisiam lou nahi ua?”
“Tualeh bangdin nouman thu adik a kikhen lou nahi ua?

Hung hekpa tawh thukhentu kiang nazot lai un, lampi ah kilep theihna khat zong teitei in, atuachih keileh vaihawmtu maiah ahung tut ding a, vaihawmtu in miman lamkaipa kiang ah ahung pekhia ding a, tualeh miman lamkaipa`n thong ah ahung khumkha ding hi.
Kung hilh ahi, paisasan khat nangawn na piakkim masiah hua a kipan in napawt ngai kei ding hi,” achi hi.
Huachih hun laiin, Galili gam a mite Pilat in athah a, a sisan uh a Pasian biakna sa tawh ahal khawmsak uh thu Jesu kiangah hunghilh mi bangzah hiam a om ua.
Jesu`n adawng a akiang uah, “Huachibang sil athuak jiak un hua Galilimite Galili gam a mijousiah sang a khialjaw diak in na ngaihsun uh hiam?
Kunghilh ahi! Hilou e, nou zong na kisik kei uleh huachibang mah in na mangthang siang ding uhi, achi hi.
Ahihkeileh siloam innsang in apukkhum a anetlup mi sawmlehgiatte zong Jerusalem khua a tengte jousiah sang a khialjaw a ngaihtuah nahi uhiam?
Kunghilh ahi, hilou e, nou zong na kisik kei uleh huachibang mah in na mangthang ding uhi,” achi hi.
Aman hih gentehna zong agen a, “Mi kuahiam khat in agrep huan ah theipi kung suan khat anei a, tualeh agah ahung zong a, khat zong amukei a.
Tuatakin aman grep huanbawlte kiangah, ‘Ngaiin, kum thum sung hih theipi kung agah kung zong a, khat zong ka mukei hi. Phuk maiin! Bangding a mun dal a om ahia?’ achi a.
Hinanleh aman adawng a akiang ah, ‘Toupa tukum zong omsak nalai in, akimkawt in katou ding a, leihoih in ka phungvuk ding.
A hung gah leh ahoih ahi ding a; ahung gah kei a ahihleh, tuachiang in na phuk na ding,’ ” achi hi.
Tualeh aman khawlni-in kikhopna inn khat ah thu ahilh a.
Tualeh ngaiin, kum sawm leh giat hatlouhna dawi in amat numei khat aom a, a ngum akul a, a dingtang thei mawng mawng kei hi.
Jesu`n amah amuhtak in asam a, “Numei, na hatlouhna a pat khahkhiat na hita!” achi hi.
Atung ah akhut a nga a, tuachi`n thakhat in ahung tangpai a, Pasian a phatta hi.

Tualeh khawlni a Jesu`n mi a damsak jiakin kikhopna inn vaihawmpa ahehta a, mipite kiangah, “Mihing nasepna ding niguk sung aom hilou maw; hua sung in hungpai unla hung ki hihdamsak ta unla, khawlni a hilou in!” achi hi.
Tuatakin Toupa`n amah adawng a, “Nang milepchiah! Khawlni-in na bawng uh hiam na sabiltung uh hiam akhihna a pat sut in tui dawnsak dingin na kaikhia jel uh hilou maw.
Hih numei Abraham tanu ahih tawh, ngaiin, setan in kum sawm leh giat sung amat khawlni a agakna sutsaklou ding maw?” achi hi.
Tualeh aman hihthute agentak in, a melmate jousiah ajumta ua; mipite pen a silthupi bawlte jiakin akipak chiat uhi.
Tuachi`n aman, “Pasian gam bang chibang ahia? Bang tawh tehkak ding ka hia?
Hih pen mi`n ankam tang khat alak a, ahuan a apaihlut bang ahi; huapen ahung pou a, akhang a, sing lianpi ahung hi a, tualeh tungleng vasate`n aba giahna in anei uh,” achi hi.
Tualeh, “Pasian gam pen bang tawh genteh ding ka hia? achi kik a.
Hih pen tol, numei in alak a, tehna thum dim annel ahel a athoh masiah aphum bang ahi,” achi hi.
Tualeh aman thu hilhkawm in Jerusalem lam juanin khuapi leh khuaneute tuan in apaijel a.
Tuachi`n mi khat in akiang ah, “Hundam a om dingte tawm noukhat hi uh maw?” achi a.
Jesu`n akiang uah,
“Kong kawchik ah lut sawm teitei un; ajiak kung hilh ahi, mi tampi`n lut asawm ding ua, alutthei kei ding uhi.

Inn neitu khatvei athoh a kot akhak zohchiah, nou inn pualam a ding in, ‘Toupa, Toupa, kong hung honin chia kong nakiuh chiang un, aman na kiang uah, Khoilammi nahi ua, kung theingai kei!’ chi`n ahung dawng ding hi.
Tuatakchiah nou, ‘Na maiah kane un ka dawn ua, tualeh ka kongjing uah thu nahilh hi; nachi ding uh!’
Hinanleh aman, ‘Kunghilh ahi, khoilammi nahi ua kung theikha kei. Nou silgilou bawlte jousiah, ka kiang a pat paimang un, ahung chi ding hi!’
Abraham leh, Isak leh, Jakob leh Jawlneite jousiah Pasian gam a om namuh ua, nou pualam a paihkhiat a om nahih uh nung kitheih chiang un, huasan ah kahleh hagawina aom ding!
Tualeh suahlam leh, tumlam leh, simlam leh, mallam a pat in mi ahung pai ding ua, Pasian gam ah atou ding uhi.
Tualeh ngaiun, a nunungpente amasapen a pang ding aom ua, tualeh amasapente zong a nunungpen a pang ding aom uhi,” achi hi.
Huani mah in Pharisai kuate hiam ahung pai ua, a kiangah, “Pawt inla hihmun a pat paimang in, ajiak Herod in thah hungsawm hi,” achi ua.
Aman akiang uah, pai unla, hua si-al kiangah hihthu vagen un, ngaiin, tuni leh jingchiang dawite notkhia in natnate damsak in nithum ni-in kajou ding hi.
Bangteng hileh tuni tawh, jingchiang tawh, ajingkik tawh ka paijel ding hi, ajiak Jerusalem ah Jawlnei sih ngaina hilou ahi, achi hi.
“Aw Jerusalem, Jerusalem! Jawlneite that leh na kiang ua hung kisawlte suang a na denglum! Akpi-in anoute a khanuaia a opkhum bangin bangzah vei na tate opkhum kasawm a, hinanleh na ut kei uhi!
Ngaiun, na inn uh ahawm a nutsiat in a omta hi; tualeh adiktak in kung hilh ahi, ‘Toupa min a hungpai ahampha hi, nachih masiah uh nung mukei ding uh,’ ” achi hi.
Tualeh hichi ahung hi a, khawlni a Pharisai lamkai khat inn a an ne ding a apaiin a enkhia ua.
Tualeh ngaiin, amaiah chibawk a damlou mi khat aom a,
Jesu`n dansiamte leh Pharisaite ahoupih a akiang uah, “Khawlni-in sukdam asiang hiam sianglou?” achi a.
Amauh adai chiat ua, tuachi`n aman damlou pen atu a, adamsak a, a paisakta hi.
Tuachi`n akiang uah, “Na lak ua kuan ahia, na sabiltung uh hiam, na bawngtal uh hiam guamkhuk ah kiataleh, khawlni a zong kaikhialou ding,” achi hi.
Tualeh amau`n hih thute a dawngthei kik takei uhi.
Tualeh amisapte un munhoih pen ateljel uh amu a, akiang uah genteh thu in agen a:
“Kitenna a kuahiam in ahung sap chiangin touna hoihpen ah toukei un, ahuachihkeh nang sang a mizah huaijaw ana sam kha ding a,
nang hungsampa leh amah na kiang ah hung paiin, ‘hihpa tounang awn in, ahung chi ding a, nang jumtakin mun ngiam pen ah nava tou kha ding hi.’

‘Hinanleh ahung kisap chiangin pai inla mun hoihlou pen ah vatou jaw in; tuachi`n a hung samtu ahung pai chiangin na kiangah lawm asang deuh ah hungtou in, ahung chithei ding a.’ tuatak chiangin na an nekpihte zahbawl in na om ding hi.
Kuapeuh amah kingaisang tuh angiam ding a, tualeh amah kingaingiam tuh tawisang in a om ding,” achi hi.

Tuachiah aman ankuang luipa kiangah zong, “Sun ankuang hiam, jan ankuang hiam nalui chiangin, nalawmte, na sanggamte, na innkuanpihte tualeh naveng mihausate zong sam ken; a huachihkeh amau`n zong ahung sam kha ding ua a hungthuk kha ding uhi.
Hinanleh ankuang nalui chiangin, tagahte, piangsualte kengbaite tualeh mittawte samjaw in.
Tuachi`n na hampha ding hi; ajiak amau`n ahung thukjou kei ding ua, midiktatte thohkik chiangin thuk in na om ding hi,” achi hi.
Tualeh a an nekpihte khat in hihthu ajak in akiang ah, “Pasian gam a an nedingte ahampha hi!” achi hi.
Tuachi`n aman akiang ah, mi “Kuahiam khat in ankuang luina thupitak abawl a.
Tualeh annek hun in mi achialte kiangah, ‘Hung paiun tuin bangkim amanta!’ vachi dingin a silapa asawl a.
Tualeh amau`n ki thutuak in suanlam anei chiat ua, amasa pen in akiang ah, ‘Lou kaleita a a en ding a kapai poimoh hi, nung ngaihsiam kung ngen hi,’ achi hi.
A dang in, ‘Bawngtal tuahnga kaleita a, asiat aphat en ding a kapai poimoh hi, nung ngaihsiam kung ngen hi,’ achi a.
Tualeh adang khat in, ‘Zi ka neita a, tuajiakin kung paithei kei hi,’ achi a.

Tuachi`n hua silapa ahung paia, huathute apu a hunghilh a, tuachiah hua inn neipa heh in, a silapa kiangah, ‘Kongjing leh daining lak ah kintakin pai inla, tagahte, piangsualte, mittawte tualeh kengbaite hih teng ah hung puilut in,’ achi hi.
A silapa`n, ‘Nung thupiak bang in ka bawl jouta a, hinanleh mun a awng nalai hi,’ achi hi.
Tuachi`n apu in a silapa kiangah, ‘Lamlian leh daipam ah pai inla ka inn a dimtheihna dingin mi hung jawllut hamham in, achi hi.
Ajiak kung hilh ahi, ka misapte khat mah in zong ka ankuanglui a chiamkha kei ding uhi!’ ” achi hi.
Tualeh mipi thupitak tawh amah apaita ua, tualeh amah aki nunghei a, akiang uah
“Mi kuapeuh ka kiang a hungpai in, apa, anu, atate, a sanggamte, asanggamnu leh amah hinna nangawn tawh ahuat kei leh ka nungjui ahithei kei ding.
Tualeh kuapeuh a kross pua a hung juilou tuh ka nungjui ahithei kei ding.
Tualeh nou kuapeuhin innsang lam sawm in alamzohna ding aneih leh neihlouh ding tou masa phot a alut ding zah tuat masalou ding kua nahi ua?
A tuachih kei leh suangphum alepzoh nung in lamjou kei taleh amu jousiahin nuihsan in,
‘Hihpa`n innlam pan ngal a hinanleh a jouthei takei!’ achi kha ding uh.

Ahihkeileh kumpipa kua ahiam kumpi dang dou ding a kuan ding in, tou masa phot a, amah dou ding a mi singnih tawh hung kuanpa mi singkhat tawh atuah ngam ding leh ngamlouh ding ngaihtuah masa lou ding?
Ahihkei vanglakleh kumpi khat pen gamlapia aom laiin kilemna thuchiam ngen dingin palai asawl ding hi.
Tuachimah bangin noulak ah aneih jousiah paisan lou tuh ka nungjui ahithei kei ding.”
“Chi ahoih a hinanleh alimna beitaleh bangchin a alkik thei dia?
Leia dingin ahoihkei ding a, ekvum dingin zong ahoih kei ding, mi`n apaikhia uh. Kuahileh jakna ding a bil nei jousiahin ja hen!” achi hi.
Tuachi`n siah dongte leh mikhialte jousiah athu ngaikhia dingin akiang ahung juan ua,
tualeh Pharisaite leh laigelhmite`n, “Hihpa`n mikhialte a kipawlpih a, an anekkhawmpih!” chi`n aphun ua.
Tuachi`n aman hih gentehna akiang uah agen a:
“Na lak ua mi kuahiam in belam ja nei henla, alak a khat mansuah taleh, sawmkua leh kuate gamdai ah nusia a amangpen amuh masiah vazonglou ding kua nahi ua?
Tualeh amuh takin kipak takin aliangkou ah apua a
tualeh inn atun in alawmte leh a innvengte a samkhawm a, ‘Hung kipahpih un, ka belam mang ka mukikta hi!’ achi hi.
Kung hilh ahi, huachimah bangin midik kisikna ding neilou sawmkua leh kuate tung ah sang in mikhial khat kisik tung ah van ah kipakna alianjaw ding.
“Ahihkeileh numei kuahiam khat in daan dangka sik sawm neiin, khat mansuah taleh, meivak de a, inn phiat a, amuhkik masiah kua ahia hoihtak a zonglou ding?
Tualeh amuhkik chiangin alawmte leh a innvengte asam khawm a, ‘Hung kipahpih un ka dangka mansuah ka mukikta hi!’ achi hi.
Kunghilh ahi, tuachimah bangin Pasian vantungmite mai ah mikhial kisik khat tung ah kipahna a om hi.”
Tuachi`n aman, “Mi kuahiam khat in tapa nih anei a.
Tualeh a naupangjaw pa`n apa kiangah, ‘Pa, gou katan ding teng hungpia in,’ achi a. Tuachi`n apa`n a dangka amauh ahawmsak ta hi.
Tualeh nisawt lou nung in a tapa naupangjaw pa`n atanteng aun in ala khawm a, khual gamlapi ah azinta hi. Tualeh huamun ah aneih teng paktat takin ava zangbeita hi.
Hinanleh aun a ajakbei takin tuagam ah kial nasatak a hungtungta a, nek ding ahung ki tasamta hi.
Tuachi`n amah apai a, huagammi khat avabelta a, huapa`n amah vok an pia ding in loulam ah anasawl a.
Tualeh vok nek be hawngte a agil vahsak a ut mahmah a; kuaman lah bangmah apia kei hi.
Hinanleh amah leh amah ahung kiphok takin, ‘Ka pa kiang a kilawh silate annek senglouh a nei a atamtam utawh, keilah gilkial a siding himai ing a!
Ka thou ding a, kapa kiangah ka pai ding a, akiang ah, “Pa, van a tungah leh nangma mitmuh in sil ka bawlkhialta hi.
Na tapa chihtak zong ka hinawn kei, na kiang a kilawh na silate khat bangin hungbawl in, ka chi ding,” ’ achi hi.
Tualeh athou a, apa kiangah ahung paita a.
“Hinanleh gamlapi a aom laiin, apa`n anamu a, ahehpih mahmah a, atai a, a ngawng kawi a, atawp a.
Tualeh a tapa in akiang ah, ‘Pa,’ ‘vantung leh nang mitmuh in sil ka bawlkhialta, na tapa chitak zong ka hinawn kei,’ achi hi.
Hinanleh apa`n asilate kiangah, ‘Kintakin! puan hoihpen hung lakhia unla, silhsak un; a khut ah khutsip bulhsak unla, a keng ah khedap bulhsak un.
Tualeh bawngnou thautak hungla unla, gou un, tuachi`n ine ding a kipak takin i om ding uh!
Ajiak ka tapa pen asi-a, ahung hingkikta hi,’ achi a. Tuachi`n kipak takin a omta uhi.
“Tualeh a tapa upajaw pen lou ah aom a, inn a hungtun kuan in, sil tumging leh lam thawmging a jata a,
Tuatakin asilate khat asam a, hihte bang ata le? chi`n adong a.
Tualeh amah pa`n a kiang ah, ‘Na naupa a hungtung a,’ ‘dam leh hoih a amuhkik jiakin napa`n bawngnou thautak athah ahi,’ achi hi.
Tuatakin amah ahehta a, alutnuam takei a; tuajiakin apa ahung pawt khia a, ahung jawl a.

Tuachi`n aman adawng a apa kiang ah, ‘Ngaiin kum hihjahpi hungvak ing a, khatveimah zong na thupiak juikhiallou ing a, huachi in zong kalawite tawh gualnop ka bawlna dingin kelnou khat zong nung piangai kei! achi hi.
Hinanleh na tapa kijuakte kiang a na dangka teng vazangbeipa a hungtun takin amah a dingin bawngnou thautak nagohsak pai hi!’ achi hi.
Tualeh apa`n a kiang ah, ‘Tapa,’ ‘nang ka kiang a omjing nahi a, ka neih jousiah zong nang a ahi.
Kipak tak leh nuamtak a i om ding hilou maw? Ajiak hih inaupa asi a ahung hingkikta hi; amang a i mukikta hi,’ ” achi hi.
Aman a nungjuite kiangah hihthu zong agen a, “Mi hausa kuahiam in dangka kemtu khat anei a, amahpa`n a dangka amok zakthang sak chi`n a kiang ah ahek uhi.
Tuatakin amah asam a akiang ah, ‘Na tungthu kaja hi bangchi ahia? Na dangka kep thu hungpia in, tubansiah dangka kem in napang nawn kei ding,’ achi hi.
Tuachi`n dangka kem pa`n a lungsim in, bang chi ding kata le? ‘Ka pu inlah ka dangka kep hung tawpsak ding ahita a, leitawh lah ngaplou ing a, khutdoh lah jum ing a.
Dangka kem ahung tawpsak chiang a a inn ua ahung omsak theihna ding un ka bawldan ding ka theita!’ chi hi.
Tuachi`n apu dangka bate asam khawm a, a masapen kiangah, ‘Ka pu a bangzah ahia nabat?’ achi hi.
‘Aman sathau tehna jakhat,’ achi a. Tuachi`n aman a kiang ah, ‘Nalai la inla, toukin inla, sawmnga gelh in,’ achi hi.
Tuachi`n adang khat kiangah, ‘Nang bangzah ahia nabat?’ achi hi. ‘Aman buh tehna jakhat,’ achi a. ‘Nalai la inla sawmgiat gelh in,’ achi hi.
Hua dangka kemtu diktatlou pa apu in alemsiam jiakin aphat ta hi, ajiak vak tate sang in hih leitung tate atulai thu ua apil jawk jiak un.”
“Tualeh kung hilh ahi, na dangka un nalawm ding uh kibawl un; hua abei hun chiang a tangtawn a omna a nou zong a hung omsak theihna ding un.
Kuapeuh tawm nou khat tung a gin-om tuh tampi tungah zong agin-om hi; tualeh kuapeuh tawmnou khat tung a gin-om lou tuh tampi tungah zong a gin-om kei ding hi.
Huajiakin diktatlouhna dangka tung a na gin-om kei uleh, kuan ahia nou dangka tak hung kemsak ding?
Tualeh midang a tung a bawn na gin-om kei uleh, kuan ahia nou atak hung pia ngam ding?
“Sila khat in pu nih nna a semkop thei kei; khat hua in khat a it ding a; ahihkeileh khat gum in khat ahua ding hi. Pasian nna leh dangka nna na semkop thei kei ding uh,” achi hi.
Tualeh dangka ngaina Pharisaite`n zong hihthu aja ua, amah anuihsan ua.
Aman akiang uah, “Mi mitmuh a siamtan tumte nahi uh; hinanleh Pasian in na lungtang uh athei hi; ajiak mihing lak a pahtawi a om Pasian mit muh in kihdakhuai tak ahi.
“Dan leh Jawlneite thu baptispa Johan hung om tan chiang aom a; huabansiah Pasian gam tangthupha akigen a, tualeh mijousiahin hua-ah lut asawm chiat uhi.
Tualeh danthu neunou khat aman sang in van leh lei aman abaihlam jaw hi.
“Kuapeuh azi khul a adang kiten pih tuh angkawm ahi; tualeh a pasal in akhulsa kitenpih tuh angkawm ahi.
“Mi hausa kuahiam khat a om a, puan sandup leh puan malngat asilh a, niteng in nuamsatak in a om hi.
Tualeh Lazar kichi apumtang a meima a dim a kawngkhak bul a alupsak jel uh khut doh khat a om a,
mi hausapa dohkan a pat khateh neng kia pouh nek a ut a, uite ahung pai a ameima aliahsak jel uhi.
Tualeh hichi a hung hi a, tua khutdohpa asi a, vantungmite`n Abraham angsung ah apaipih ua. Tualeh mi hausapa zong asi a, vui in a omta a,
tualeh gawtmun ah gimthuak in aom a, adaktou a, gamlapi a om Abraham leh a angsung a Lazar om amuta hi.
Tuachi`n a kikou a, ‘Pa, Abraham! Ka tungah zahngai inla, Lazar akhut muk tuia diahkawt a ka lei hung votsak dingin hung sawl in, hih meikuang ah kagim mahmah hi!’ achi hi.
Hinanleh Abraham in, ‘Tapa, nang na damlaiin silhoihte na kimuh a, tuachi bang in Lazar in sil hoihloute amu chih gelkhia in; hinanleh tu`n amah khamuan in aom a, nang gimthuak in na om ahi.

Tualeh hihtelou zong kou leh nou kikal ah guam thukpitak koih in aom hi; hihlam a kipan noulam a paisawmte paitheihlouh nang in leh noulam a pat a hihlam a hung paisawmte paitheihlouh nang in achi hi.’
Tualeh aman, ‘Ahihleh Pa, amah ka pa inn a sawl dingin kung ngen hi,
sanggam pasal nga kanei a, amauh vahilh hen. Ahuachih keileh amauh zong hih gimthuakna mun ah a hungpai kha ding uh, achi hi.’
Abraham in a kiang ah, ‘Amau`n Mosi leh Jawlneite anei uh; huate thu ngaikhia uheh,’ achi hi.
Tuachi`n aman, ‘Hilou e, Pa Abraham! Misi lak a mi khat akiang uah vapaileh akisik ding uh,’ achi hi.
Aman, ‘Mosi leh Jawlneite thu a ngaihkhiat nuam kei uleh misi lak a kipat mi khat thoukik nanleh zong a taksan tuan kei ding uhi,’ ” achi hi.
Tuachi`n aman nungjuite kiangah, “Puknate omlou thei ahikei, hinanleh pukna omsaktu tung agik hi!
Hih mineute lak a khat apuksak sang in, a ngawng ah buhgawina suang awhsak in tuipi ah kipai leh amah a dingin ahoihjaw ding hi.”
Pilvang un!
“Na sanggam pa`n natung a sil a bawlkhial leh phawk in, tualeh akisik leh ngaidam in.
Nikhat sung a natung a sil sagihvei abawl khial a sagihvei na kiang a, ‘Ka kisik hi,’ chia nanglam ahung kihei kikleh na ngaihdam ding ahi,” achi hi.
Tualeh sawltakte`n Toupa kiangah, “Ka ginna uh khangsak in,” achi ua.
Toupa`n, “Ankam tang khat bang ginna naneih uleh hih kawl sathau kung kiangah, ‘Na kibawtkhia inla tuipi ah na kisuan in nachi ding ua!’ na thu uh amang ding hi.
“Nou lak a kua nahi ua, loukai hiam, belam ching ahiam a sila khat nei a, lou a pat a hungtun chiang a pai inla an neding in toungal in ana chi ding?
‘Ka nek ding hung bawlsak inla, nakawng gak inla, ka nek a ka dawnzoh masiah ka nek ding bawl in, huazoh chiangin nang ne-in nadawn ding, chijaw lou ding maw?’
Aman hua silapa kiangah thu kipia bang a abawl jiakin apakta ei le?
Huachi mahbang in nou zong na kiang ua thupiak jousiah na bawlzoh chiang un, ‘Sila phatuam lou ka hi uh ka bawl ding mawng uh ahi ka bawl uh, chi un,’ ” achi hi.
Tualeh hichi ahung hi a, Jerusalem juan a apai in Samaria leh Galili gam atuan paisuak a.
Tuachia khuakhat a alut leh phak sawm in ana lamdawn ua, amauh gamlapi ah ading ua
tualeh aw ngaihtak in akikou ua, “Jesu! Siapa! Ka tung uah zahngaiin!” achi ua.
Tualeh aman amauh amuhtak in akiang uah, “Pai unla siampute va ki-ensak un,” achi a.
Tualeh hichi ahung hi a, apai lai un ahung siangthouta uhi.
Tualeh alak ua khat in adamta chih ahung kitheih takin akik kik a, aw ngaihtak in Pasian a phat a.
Jesu kengbul ah a khupbok a, kipahthu agen hi, amah Samaria mi ahi.
Tuachi`n Jesu`n adawng a, “Sawm hilou maw suksiangthou a om; kuate khoia om ta ula?
Hih gamdangmipa chihlouh Pasian phat ding a hung kik kik kuamah akimu kei,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n aman a kiang ah, “Thou inla, paita in, na ginna in ahun damsakta hi,” achi hi.
Tualeh Pharisaite`n Pasian gam hungtun hun ding adok uleh aman adawng a akiang uah, “Pasian gam muhtheih in a hungtung kei hi.
Tualeh, ‘En un, hihtak ah!’ ahihkeileh, ‘En un, huatak ah!’; zong achi kei ding uh, bangjiakin ahia ichihleh, ngaiun, Pasian gam pen nalak uah aom hi,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n aman a nungjuite kiangah, “Mihing Tapa damlainite nikhat bek na muhnuam ni uh ahung om ding, hinanleh na mukei ding uhi.
Tualeh amau`n na kiang uah, ‘En un, hihteng ah!’ ahihkeileh, ‘En un, huatak ah!’ ahung chi ding ua, pai kei unla, anung uh zong juikei un.
Tunphe van mong langkhat a aphet a, van mong langkhat lam tanpha asalhvak mahbang in mihing Tapa zong ahung paini in ahi ding.
Hinanleh hua masang in sil tampi athuak ding a, tulai khangthakte deihouh in aom ding hi.
Noah damlai a sil omdan bang in Mihing Tapa hung paikik ni chiangin zong ahi ding hi.
Noah gunkuang a alut a tui ahung let a, aun ua a hihlupni atun masiah ane un, adawn ua, zi anei ua, tualeh zi-leh ta in akipia tuah uhi.
Tuachimah bang in Lot damlai in zong aom ua, ane un adawn ua, alei un ajuak ua, asuan un alam uhi.
Hinanleh Sodom khua a pat Lot apawt ni-in van a pat in mei leh kat aju a, aun un a kanglumta hi.
Tuachimah bang in Mihing Tapa hung kilakni chiangin ahi ding hi.
“Tuani chiangin kuahileh inn tung a om innsung ah a dangka omte lading in kum kei hen; tualeh huachi mahbang in kuapeuh lou a om zong hungkik kik kei hen.
Lot zi theijing un!
Mi kuapeuh a hinna humbitna zong in ata`n ding a, tualeh kuapeuh ahinna ta`n in ahumbit ding uhi.
Kunghilh ahi, huazan in lupna khat ah minih alum ding a: khat lakmang in aom ding a, khat nutsiat in a om ding.
Numei nih ansu in a om ding a, khat lakmang in a om ding a, khat nutsiat in a om ding.”
Lou ah minih aom ding ua, khat lakmang in aom ding a, khat nutsiat in aom ding, achi hi.
Tualeh amau`n adawng ua akiang ah, “Toupa, khoi ah la?” achi ua,
Aman akiang uah, “Saluang omna phot ah langta zong a omkhawm ding uh,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n Jesu`n mi`n lungkialou a athum gige ding uh ahi chih theihna dingin akiang uah gentehna thu khat agen a.
“Khuapi khat ah Pasian zong laulou tualeh mihing zong bangmah a simlou vaihawmtu khat a om hi.
Tualeh hua khuasung ah meithai khat zong om a; amahnu akiang ah a hungpai a, ‘Ka langpa tung ah phuba hung laksak in!’ achi hi.
Tualeh amah tomkhat sung a ut kei a, hinanleh a nung in a lungsim in, ‘Pasian laulouin mihing bangmah in simkei nanleng zong,
hih meithainun ahung sukbuai jiakin aphuba ka laksak ding; ahuachih keileh hung paithithe leh, ahung gimsak kha ding!’ ” achi hi.
Tuachi`n Toupa`n, “Thukhentu diktatlou thugen ngai un.
A tung ah dohjou tadih nanleh, amitelte, sunleh jan a amah samte phuba laksaklou ding ahi hiam?
Kung hilh ahi, aman aphuba alaksak pai ding hi. Hinanleh mihing Tapa a hungpai hun chiangin leitung ah tuabang ginna ahung muna diam?” achi hi.
Tualeh aman mi amah midiktat a kingaihtuah a midangte simmoh kuate hiam kiangah hih gentehna thu agen a,
“Mi nih Pasian tempul ah thumna nei dingin apai tou ua: khat Pharisai ahi a, adang khat siah dongtu ahi.
Pharisaipa ading a, amah guak in thumna anei a, ‘Pasian, midang vau a sum laksakte, dikloute, angkawmte, bang ka hihlouh jiak leh, hih siahdongpa bang ka hihlouh jiakin natung ah ka kipak hi.
Kal khat sungin an nihvei ka ngawl a, kaneih jousiah sawm a khat kapia jel hi,’ achi a.
Tualeh siah dongpa gamla tak ah dingin, van lam zong a enngam kei a, hinanleh, ‘Pasian kei mikhial tung ah zahngaiin!’ chi`n a awm atum a.
Kung hilh ahi, khat pen sang in hihpa siamtang in a inn ah a paisukta hi; kuapeuh amah kingaithupi peuhmah a ngiam ding a, tualeh mi amah kingaingiam peuhmah tawisang in aom ding,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n akhoih dingin a kiang ah naungekte a hungpaipih ua, hinanleh nungjuite`n amuhtak un anatai ua,
hinanleh Jesu`n amauh asam a, “Naupang neute ka kiangah hung paisak unla, kham kei un, Pasian gam hichibang mite a ahih jiak in.
Adiktak in kung hilh ahi! Kuapeuh Pasian gam naupang neute bang a kipahpihlou tuh, asung ah alut kei ding,” achi hi.
Tualeh vaihawmtu khat in a kiangah, “Siapa hoih aw, tangtawn hinna ka tantheihna dingin bang ahiam ka bawl ding?” chi-in adong a.
Jesu`n a kiang ah “Bang ding a hoih hung chi na hiam?” “Mi khat guak chihlouh kuamah ahoih aom kei, hua ahihleh Pasian ahi.
‘Angkawm ken, tualthat ken, gu ken, theihpihtu diklou in pang ken, nanu leh napa zahtak in chihte,’ ” achi a.
Aman, “Hihte jousiah kaneu a pat kana juih ahita hi,” achi a.

Jesu`n hihthute ajak takin a kiangah, “Silkhat nasam nalai hi, naneih jousiah juak inla, mijawngte kiangah pia in, tuachi`n van ah gou na nei ding, tuazohchiang in hungpai inla, hung jui in,” achi hi.
Tualeh aman hih ajak in a lungkham mahmah a, mi hausa mahmah ahih jiak in.
Tualeh Jesu`n a lungkham mahmah chih amuh in, “Mi hausate a dingin Pasian gam lut haksa hina tazen e!
Mi hausa Pasian gam a alut sangin sangawngsau phinbil vang a alut paisuak abaihjaw hi,” achi hi.
Tualeh hihthu jatuten, “Tuachi ahihleh kua hundam in a omjou dia?” achi ua.
Hinanleh aman, “Mihing ding a sil hitheiloute Pasian dingin ahi thei hi,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n Peter in, “En-in! Kou bangkim nusia in kung jui uhi,” achi hi.
Jesu`n akiang uah, “Adiktak in kung hilh ahi, Pasian gam jiak a a inn hiam, anu leh apa hiam, a sanggamte hiam, azi hiam, a tate hiam nusia tuh
tu adamsung ngeiin aleh tampi tualeh hun hungtung ding a tangtawn hinna tawh mulou ding kuamah a om kei,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n aman sawmlehnihte apaipih tuam a akiang uah, “Ngaiun! Jerusalem a paitou ding ihi a, mihing Tapa tungtang thu a Jawlneite laigelh jousiah ahung tangtung ding hi.
Amah Jentelte khut ah piak khiat ahi ding a; chiamnuih bawlnan azang ding ua, jumhuai takin abawl ding ua, chil asiatkhum ding uh.
Tualeh avua ding ua, athat ding uh; tualeh nithum nin athoukik ding,” achi hi.
Amau`n hih silte atheisiam kei ua, hih thute alak uah phual in aom a, thu kigente zong athei kei uhi.
Tuachi`n hichi ahi a, Jeriko khua atun kuan in mittaw kuahiam khat khutdoh in lamgei ah ana tou a.
Aman mipi pai thawmging aja a, “Bang thu ata?” chi`n adong a.
Amau`n, “Nazareth Jesu pai ahi,” chi`n ahilh ua.
Tualeh aman, “Jesu! David Tapa! Ka tung ah zahngaiin!” chi`n akikou a.
Tuachi`n amasate`n dai dingin atai ua, hinanleh amah, “David Tapa! Ka tung ah zahngaiin!” chi`n aki hahkou sem a.
Tuachi`n Jesu ading a, amah akiang a hung paipih dingin thu apia a; tualeh akiang a hungtun in ana dong a,
“Na tung ah bang hung bawlsak leng na ut ei?” achi a.
Aman, “Toupa, muhtheih ka ut hi,” achi a.
Jesu`n a kiangah, “Mutheita in! Na ginna in ahung damsak ahi,” achi hi.
Tualeh thakhat in ahung mutheita a, Pasian pahtawi kawm in amah ajuita a; tualeh mijousiahin hih amuh tak un Pasian aphatta uhi.
Tuachi`n Jesu Jeriko khua ah alut a, apaisuak a.
Tualeh ngaiin, mikhat amin Zakai kichi, siah dong lamkai khat aom a, amah mi hausatak ahi.
Tualeh aman Jesu mi bang chibang ahiam chih muh asawm a, hinanleh mipi lak ah adin a ngiam jiakin amu thei kei hi.
Tuachi`n ana matai a, a en dingin theipi kungah akah a, aman hua lampi hungjui ding ahihjiak in.
Jesu huamun a hungtun in, adaktou a, amah amu a akiang ah, Zakai, “Kintakin hung kum in, ajiak tuni`n na inn ah hungtung ding ka hi,” achi hi.
Tuatakin kintakin akum a, kipak takin amah a zintunta hi.
Hinanleh amau`n hih amuh tak un, “Mikhialte inn a tung dingin apai tave!” chi`n aphun uhi.
Tuachi`n Zakai ading a, Toupa kiangah, “Toupa, en in! ka dangka kimkhat mi gentheite kiangah ka pia ding a, tualeh mi neihsa khat peuh diklou tak a kalak aom leh alehli in kadin ding,” achi hi.
Jesu`n akiang ah, “Tuni`n hih inn ah hundamna a tungta hi, amah zong Abraham tapa ahihjiak in.
Ajiak mangthangte zong ding leh hundam ding a Mihing Tapa hungpai ahi,” achi hi.
Tualeh hih thute a ngaihkhiat lai un Jerusalem anaih ta`k jiak leh Pasian gam hungtung pai ding a a ngaihsut jiak un gentehna thu khat agen beh hi.
Aman huajiakin agen a, “Mi thupi kuahiam khat kumpi gam khat la a hung kileh kik dingin khual gamla tak ah ahawh a.
Tualeh aman a sila sawmte asam a, ‘Dangka-eng sawm akiang uah apia a, tualeh kung paikik masiah hihtawh summet na bawl un,’ akiang uah achi hi.
Hinanleh amite`n amah ahua ua, ‘Hihpa katung ua vaihawm dingin ka deihkei uh chi`n anung ah palai asawl uhi.’
“Tualeh hichi ahung hi a, gam avanei a, ahung kilehkik in, a dangka peipung dan uh theihna dingin a sila dangka apiakte a kiang ah asam sak a.
Tuachi`n khatnapa a hungpai a, ‘Toupa na dangka-eng sawm in apung hi,’ achi a.
Aman a kiangah, ‘Hoih e,’ ‘nang sila hoih! sil tawmnou khat tung a na gin-om jiakin khuasawm tung a vaihawmtu in pang in,’ achi hi.
Anihnapa ahung pai a, ‘Toupa, na dangka-eng nga in apung hi,’ achi a.
Aman tuachi mahbang in a kiangah, ‘Nang zong khua nga tung a vaihawm in pang in achi hi.’
Tuachi`n adang ahung pai a, ‘Toupa en-in, na dangka-eng hiah aom hi, kinawtna puan in ka tu`n a hoihtak in ka kem hi.
Ajiak migumtat nahi a kung lau hi, na koihlouh zong nala a, tualeh na tuhlouh zong na-at hi,’ achi a.
Aman a kiangah, ‘Nang sila gilou! na kamsuak ngeiin siamlouh kung tangsak ding. migumtat kahih a, ka koihlouhna a zong ka lak a, tualeh ka tuhlouhna a zong ka-at nathei hi.
Atuachi ahihleh kungtun chiang a ka dangka apung tawh ka laktheih ding a ka dangka dangka inn a na koihlou na hia?’ achi hi.
Tuachi`n aman agei a dingte kiangah, ‘A dangka laksak unla, sawm neipa kiangah pia un,’ achi hi.
Hinanleh amau`n a kiang ah, ‘Toupa, aman dangka sawm anei!’ achi ua;
‘Ajiak kung hilh ahi,’ ‘kuapeuh aneite piakbeh ahi ding a, tualeh kuapeuh aneiloute aneihsun zong laksak ahi ding hi.
Hinanleh ka melmate atung ua ka vaihawm ding deihloute hungpui unla, kamai ah that un!’” achi hi.
Tualeh aman hichibang thu agenkhit in a lamkaih a, Jerusalem lam juanin apaitou ua.
Tualeh hichi ahi a, Olive kichi mual a Bethphage leh Bethani khuagei a hungtun un a nungjuite lak a minih asawl a
“Namai ua khua ah vapai unla, na lut chiang un sabiltung nou kuamah tuanngai nailouh navamu ding uh, sut unla, hungkai un.
Tualeh mi kuapeuhin bangding a nasut uh chia a hungdok uleh, Toupa`n apoimoh hi, chi`n akiang uah gen un,” achi hi.
Tualeh asawlte avapai ua, akiang ua agen bangbang in avamu uhi.
Hinanleh sabiltungnou asut uleh aneiten akiang uah, “Sabiltung nou bangding a nasut uh ahia?” achi ua.
Amau`n, “Toupa`n adeih a ahi,” achi ua,
tuachi`n Jesu kiangah ahung kai ua. Tualeh sabiltung nou tungah apuante uh aphah ua, atung ah Jesu atousak uhi.
Tualeh apailai in lampi ah apuante uh aphah ua.
Tuachi`n atun ding kuan a Olive mual kumsukna ding takah nungjui mipi jousiahin asil thupi bawlte jousiah amuh jiak un akipak ua aw ngaihtakin Pasian apahtawi ua:
“Toupa min a hungpai kumpipa ahampha hi, van ah lemthu leng henla, tungnungpen ah thupina om hen!” chi in.
Tualeh mipi lak a Pharisai khenkhat in, “Siapa, na nungjuite phawk in,” achi ua.
Aman adawng a akiang uah, “Kung hilh ahi, hihte adaih uleh hih suangte akikou pai ding uhi.”
Tualeh a tunkuan in khuapi amu a akahkhum a,
“Aw nangmah ngeiin tu nahun sung be`k in na khamuanna hung thei leteh maw! Hinanleh tuin jaw na muhlouhna dingin akiphualta hi!
Ajiak hichibang nite natung ah a hungtung ding, na melmate in na kimkot in leikulh akhawh ding ua, na kimkawt in pawt theilouin ahung umkhum ding ua.
Tualeh nang leh natate tualsatna in ahung nei ding ua, na sung ah suang khatbek kithuap in a nusia kei ding uh; ahung kivehlai na theihlouh jiakin chi in!”
Tuachi`n amah Pasian tempul sung ah alut a, siljuakte leh leite a hawlkhia a,
akiang uah, “Ka inn ahihleh thumna inn kichi ding ahi, chih gelh ahi. hinanleh nou gutate kua in nabawl uhi!” achi hi.
Tualeh aman niteng in tempul ah thu ahilh a, hinanleh siampite, laigelhmite leh mipi lamkaiten amah sukmang atum uhi,
hinanleh mipi jousiahin lunglut tak a athu angaihkhiat jing jiak un alawhna ding dan atheikei uhi.
Tualeh hichi ahi a, Pasian tempul ah thu hilh a, tangthupha agen laiin, nikhat siampite leh laigelhmite upate tawh ahung pai ua
tuachi`n a kiang ah, “Kua thu in ahia hih silte nabawl? Kuan ahia thu ahung piak?” Hung hilh in, achi ua.
Hinanleh aman adawng a akiang uah, “Ken zong silkhat kung dong ding hi. Hung dawng un,
Johan baptisma van a kipan ahia, ahihkeileh mihing a kipan?” achi a.
Tuatakin amauh a kingaihtuah ua, “ ‘Van a kipan chileila, ahihleh bangding a gingta lou?’ Hung chi ding a.
Tualeh, ‘Mihing a kipan ahi chileila,’ mipi jousiahin suangin ahung deng ding uh, ajiak Johan hi Jawlnei ahi a chihchiat jiak un.”
Tuachi`n amau`n, “Khoia pat ahia chih ka genthei kei uh,” chi`n adawng ua.
Jesu`n akiang uah, “Ken zong bang thuneihna a hih silte bawl ka hiam chih kung hilh kei ding hi,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n mipite kiangah hih gentehna thu agen a, “Mi kuahiam khat in grep huan abawl a, grep huanbawlmite kiangah asan dingin apia a, tualeh gamtuam ah sawtpi tam dingin paita hi.
Tualeh agah lawh hun in grephuan a agah ana piak ding un grep huanbawlmite kiangah a silate khat asawl a; hinanleh grep huanbawlmite`n amah anavua ua, khutguakin asawlmang ta uhi.
Tuachi`n aman sila dang asawl kik a, amah zong anavua ua, jumhuaitak in abawl ua, khutguakin asawlmangta uhi.
Tuachi`n aman athumna asawl kik a, amah zong ana hihliam ua, adelhdokta uhi.
Tuachi`n grep huanneipa`n, ‘Bang chi bawl ding kadiam? Ka tapa ittak ka sawl ding hi, amah be`k amuh chiang un amah anajah khamoh kei ding uh!’ achi hi.
Hinanleh grep huanbawlmite`n amah amuh tak un, ‘Hihpa gouluah dingpa ahi, agou itantheihna ding un ithat ding uh!’ chi`n aki hou ua.
Tuachi`n grep huan a pat apaikhia ua, a thatta uhi.
“Tuajiakin, grep huanneipa`n atung uah bang chi`n abawl tadia le?”
“A hungpai ding a, grep huanbawlmite ahihmang ding a, tualeh grep huan midangte kiangah apia ding hi,” achi a.
Amau`n hihthu ajak tak un, “Tuachi liangjaw tundah hen!” achi ua.
Tuachi`n aman amauhte a en a, “Ahihleh hihthu kigelh bang hiam?
‘Inn lamte suang deihlouh pen
tuapen mah aning a suang poimoh pen ahung hita,’
chih, achi a.
Kuapeuh hih suangtung a puk tuh a kitattawng ding a; tualeh kuapeuh apukkhum tuh aguaijan ding hi,” achi hi.
Tualeh hua hunlai mah in siampite leh laigelhmite`n amah mat asawm ua, hinanleh mipite alau uh, ajiak hua gentehna amauh demna a agen ahi, chih athei uhi.
Tuachi`n amah ata`ng ua, gam ukpa vaihawmna leh thuneihna atuttheihna ding un athu genkhialh man dingin midik kipang enkhiami asawlkhia ta uhi.
Tuachi`n amau`n a kiang ah, “Siapa, diktakin nagen a, na hilhjel, tualeh kuamah khentuam neilouin Pasian lampi diktakin nahilh hi chih ka thei uhi.
Kou a dingin Kaisar kiang a siah piak asiang hiam siang lou?” chi`n adong ua.
Hinanleh aman a ze-et uh a thei a akiang uah, bangding a hung ze-et nahi ua?
“Makhai khat hung ensak un. Kualim leh kua laigelh ahia atuang?” achi a. Amau`n adawng ua,
“Kaisar a,” achi ua.
Aman akiang uah, “Tuajiakin Kaisar silte Kaisar kiangah pia unla, Pasian silte Pasian kiangah pia un,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n mite maiah athu gen khialh mat ding amu takei ua, adawnna lamdang asa mahmah ua, adaita uhi.
Tualeh thohkikna a om kei chi Sadukaite lak a mi khenkhat a kiangah a hungpai ua, amah adong ua,
“Siapa, ‘Mosi-in kuapeuh a sanggam pa`n zi aneih a taneilou a asihsan leh anaupa`n azi aluah ding a, a upa dingin chi khahsak ding ahi,’ chi`n ahung gelhsak hi.
Tuin sanggam pasal sagih aom ua, atak pen in zi anei a, ta neilou in asi a.
Tuachi`n anihna in aluah a, ta neilou in asi a,
tualeh athumna in aluah a, tuachimah bangin asagihna in aluah a, ta neilou in asi chiatta uhi.
Atawp in numeinu zong asita hi.
Tuajiakin thohkikni chiangin amahnu kua zi ahita diai? A sagih unlah zi-in aneichiat ua,” achi ua.
Jesu`n adawng a akiang uah, “Hih leitung tate akiteng ua, tualeh zi leh ta in akinei uhi.
Hinanleh huahun chiang a jautak ding leh misi lak a pat thohkikna a jautak ding a aguatte akiteng kei ua, zi leh ta in zong akinei kei uhi.
Amauhte si zong asi nawn kei ding uh; ajiak vantungmite bang ahi ua; tualeh thohkikna tate ahihjiak un, Pasian tate ahi uhi.
Misi kaihthoh in a om ding chih Mosi in zong sawlbuk mun ah, ‘Toupa tuh Abraham Pasian, Isak Pasian tualeh Jakob Pasian achih laiin a theisakta hi.’
Amah misi Pasian ahi kei a mihing Pasian ahijaw hi; ajiak ama ngaihin mi jousiah ahing hi,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n laigelhmite khenkhat in adawng ua, “Siapa, nagen dik hi!” achi ua.
Huanung in amau`n thu dang mawng mawng a dongngam nawn kei uhi.
Tualeh aman akiang uah, “Krist hih David tapa ahi bang chidan a achih uh ahia? achi a.
Amah David ngeiin sam laibu ah,
‘Toupa`n ka Toupa kiangah:
ka jiat lam ah tou inla
Na melmate nakeng ngakna a ka bawl masiah,’
achi a.
Tuajiakin David in amah ‘Toupa’; achihleh bang chidan a a tapa hithei ding ahia?” achi hi.
Tuazoh in mipi kikhawmte jousiah jak in a nungjuite kiangah,
“puan-ak tual silh a vak ut, vanjuakna munte a chibai buk bang, kikhopna inn a touna hoihpente leh ankuang luina a mun hoihpente tan ngaina laigelhmite lak ah kiveng un;
meithaite innsung ane gam ua, mi khemna in sawtpipi thumna anei uh! Tuachibang mite`n siamlouh ahahtan sem ding uh!” achi hi.
Tualeh a dakkhia a, mihausate`n thohlawm bawm a dangka akhiat lai uh amu a,
tualeh aman meithainu jawng mahmah khat in paisasan nih akhiat lai zong amu a.
Tuatakin aman, “Adiktak in kung hilh ahi, amauhte tengteng sang in hih meithai jawng mahmahnu in akhia tamjaw hi.
Ajiak amauhte tengteng in aneihval uh Pasian thohlawm bawm ah akhia ua, hinanleh aman ahinna ding a aneihsun teng a khiasiang hi,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n kuate hiam in Pasian tempul thu, suang hoihtakte leh silpiak hoihtakte a zephoih ahihdan agen uleh aman,
“hih nasil muhte uh ahihleh sukchimlouh a suang khat tung a khat kichiang mawng mawng a omlouh hun a hungtung ding hi,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n amau`n, “Siapa, hih silte bangchik chiang ahung om dia? Tualeh hih silte a hungtun ding chiangin bang theihsakna ahung om dia?” chi`n adong ua.
Tualeh aman, “Khem a na om louhna ding un pilvang un. ‘Krist ka hi!’ tualeh ‘Ahun tung ding ahita!’ chi`n mi tampite kamin in a hungpai ding uhi. Tuajiakin mauhte juikei un.
Hinanleh kidou thu leh buai thute najak chiang un lau kei un; ajiak hih silte hungtung masa ding mawng ahi; hinanleh atawpna ahung tungpai naikei ding hi,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n aman akiang uah, “Nam tuam in nam tuam tualeh gam tuam in gam tuam adou ding.
Tualeh mun tuamtuam ah jin thupitak aling ding a, kialte hungtung in, hiite ahung leng ding; tualeh van a pat in sil lauhhuaite leh chiamtehna thupite ahung om ding hi.
Hinanleh hih silte atun ma in nou ahung man ding ua, kikhopna inn leh thong lak ah hungpaipih in ahung bawl genthei ding ua, ka min jiakin kumpipate mai leh vaihawmte mai ah ahung paipih ding uhi.
Hinanleh hihpen nou a dingin theihsakna ahi ding.
Tuajiakin bangchi dawn ding chih ngaihtuah masalou dingin na lungtang uh kipsak un,
ajiak na melma jousiah un ahung dou ua, ahung sel theihlouh ding uh kam leh pilna kung pia ding hi.
Tualeh nanu leh napate uh, na sanggamte uh, nabehte uleh nalawmte un zong ahung mansak ding ua, nalak ua khenkhatte ahung hihlum ding uhi.
Tualeh kamin jiakin mijousiah huat in na om ding uhi.
Hinanleh nalu ua na samjang khat zong a mangthang kei ding hi.
Na kuhkal na uah na hinna uh na humbit ding uhi.
“Hinanleh galkapte`n Jerusalem a umkhum namuh chiang un amanthaina ding anaita chih thei un.
Huahun chiangin Judea gam a omte mualtung ah tai uhen, asung a omte zong pawtdok uhen; tualeh gam a omte zong asung ah lut kei uhen.
Ajiak thu kigelh jousiah a tangtunna ding a ‘Huanite pen phuba lakni,’ ahi ding.
Hinanleh huani chiangin agaite leh naungek nawiteplai neite tung agik hi! gamsung ah haksatna thupitak leh hihmite tung a thangpaihna tung ding ahihjiak in.
Tualeh amauhte namsau hiam in asi ding ua, namchin kiangah sila a puiin aom ding uhi; tualeh Jentelte hun bukim masiah Jerusalem pen Jentelte totden in aom ding hi.
“Tualeh ni leh kha leh aksite ah chiamtehna aom ding a; leitung ah namchin haksatna leh mangbatna a om ding; tuipi kihot in aging veng vung ding.
