Mite launa jiak leh leitung a sil hungtung dingte ngaihtuahna jiakin a sibup ding uh; van silbawl theihnate kihihling ding ahihjiak in.
Tuachi`n amauhte`n Mihing Tapa silbawl theihna leh thupina thupitak tawh meilak a hungpai amu ding uhi.
Hih silte a hungtun kipat chiangin entou unla, dakkhia un, ajiak na tatna ni uh ahung naita hi,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n aman akiang uah gentehna thu khat agen a: “Theipi kung leh singkung jousiah en un.
Anah ahungsel tak chiangin doupi ahung naita chih namu ua nathei uhi.
Tuachimah bangin hih silte ahungtun namuh chiang un Pasian gam ahung naita chih thei un.
“Adiktak in adiktak in kung hilh ahi, sil jousiah a tangtun kim masiah tulai khangthakte amang kei ding uhi.
Van leh lei a mang ding a, hinanleh ka thu amang kei ding hi.
“Hinanleh pilvang un ahuachih keileh nekvah taluat leh uain kham leh damsung khuasak ngaihtuahna in na lungtang uh adim talua kha ding a, tuachi`n huani na theihlouh kal un a hungtung kha ding hi
ajiak thang kipel bang a leitung pumpi a omte jousiah tung a tungchiat ding ahihjiak in.
Tuajiakin hih silte tengteng pelding leh Mihing Tapa maia dingtak ding a guat na hihtheihna ding un bangchiklai peuhin thum unla, limsak jing un,” achi hi.
Tualeh aman sunlaiin Pasian tempul ah thu ahilh a, jan chiangin a pawtdok a, Olive mual ah ava omjel hi.
Tuachi`n mipi jousiah jingsang in a kiangah tempul ah athu ngaikhia dingin ahung pai uhi.
Tualeh tanghou tol sawhlouh ankuang luina paikan kut achih uh ahung naita a.
Tualeh Siampite leh laigelhmite`n amah a thahtheihna ding uh a ngaihtuah ua; mipite lah alau ua.
Tuachi`n sawmlehnihte lak a pang Juda amin khem Iskariot achih uh sung ah setan alut a.
Tualeh apaita a, akiang ua Jesu amatsak theihna dingdan siampite leh laigelhmite ava kihoupih hi.
Tuatakin amauh akipak mahmah ua, amah dangka piak dingin ana chiamta uhi.
Tuachi`n aman lem asata a, mipi omlouhkal a matsakna ding lemtang a zongta hi.
Tuachi`n tanghou tol sawhlouhni paikan kut belam nou gohni ding a hungtungta hi.
Tualeh aman Johan leh Peter asawl a: “Pai unla paikan kut inekna ding un hung vabawlsak un,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n amau`n a kiangah, “Khoitak ah hung vabawlsak le ung nadeih a?” achi ua.
Aman akiang uah, “Ngai un, khuapi sung a nalut chiang un tuibel pua pasal khat in ahung natuak ding a; alutna inn ah juilut un,
tuachi`n a inn neite kiangah: ‘Siapa`n ka nungjuite tawh paikan kut ka nekna ding uh mikhual inndan khoitak ahiam?’ ahung chi hi, chi`n gen un.
Tuachi`n aman inndan tungnung lianpi, guatsa a om khat ahung ensak ding; huasan ah bawl un,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n apai ua, agen bangin a vamuta ua; paikan kut abawlta uhi.
Ahun ahung chin takin atouta ua, sawmlehnihte`n zong atoupih ua.
Tuachi`n aman akiang uah, “Ka thuakma in hih paikan kut noutawh nek ka ut mahmah hi!
Ajiak kung hilh ahi, Pasian gam a sukbukim ahih masiah hih ka nenawn kei ding hi,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n nou ala a, kipahthu agenzoh in, “Hih la unla kihawm un.
Ajiak Pasian gam a hungtun masiah grepgah tui ka dawn nawn kei ding hi,” achi hi.
Tualeh tanghou ala a, kipahthu agenzoh in abalkek a, akiang uah apia a, “Hih ka taksa nou a ding a piak ahi, nung theihjingna ding un hih bawljel un,” achi hi.
Tuachimah bangin nitak an anekzoh un nou ala a, “Hih nou ka sisan a thukhunthak, nou a ding a luangkhia pen ahi.
“Hinanleh, ngaiun! A hung mansak dingpa khut ka kiangah dohkan tungah aom hi!
Mihing Tapa pen a kiguatsa bangin apaitakpi ding hi; hinanleh amansakpa tung agik hi!” achi hi.
Tuachi`n amauhte hichibang bawl ding alak ua kuapen hi ding ahia chi`n aki dongtuahta uhi.
Tualeh amauh lak a kua ahia alian pen a seh ding chi a kinialna zong aom a.
Aman akiang uah, “Jentelte kumpipate atung uah laltak in aom ua, tualeh atung ua thuneitute pen, ‘Mi hoihna ding bawltute achi uhi.’
Hinanleh noupen hichi bang na hikei ding uh; nalak ua lianpen tuh naupangjaw bang in om henla; tualeh a thupipen tuh nekbawl bang in omjaw hen.
Ajiak ankuang imtu leh nek bawltu kua ahia alianjaw? Hinanleh kei tuh nalak ua nek bawltu bangin ka om hi.
“Hinanleh nou pen khemna katuah sung a hung ompihte nahi uhi;
tualeh ka Pa`n kei gam ahung guatsak bangin nou dingin gam kung guatsak hi.
Ka gam a ka dohkan a nanek ua, nadawn ua, tualeh Israel nam sawmlehnihte vaihawmsak a, lal touna a na toutheihna ding un, achi hi.”
Tualeh Toupa`n, “Simon, Simon! Ngaiin, setan in buh bang a ahung septheihna dingin ahung ngen hi.
Hinanleh na ginna aman louhna dingin kung thumsak ahi. Na kiheikik chiangin nasanggamte hihkip in,” achi hi.
Hinanleh aman a kiangah, “Toupa nang tawh thong leh sihna ah zong pai ka-ngap hi!” achi a.
Tuachi`n aman, “Peter, kung hilh ahi, thumvei nung kitheihmoh bawl masiah tunin ak akhuang kei ding,” achi hi.
Tualeh aman akiang uah, “Nou dangka-ip beia, thungpi beia, tualeh khedap beia kungsawl laiin sil khatbek na kitasam uai le?” achi a,
amau`n, “Tasam lou,” achi ua.
Tuachi`n aman akiang uah, “Hinanleh tuin, dangka-ip neiin keng henla, tuachibang mah in thungpi neiin zong tualeh namsau neilouin apuantual juak henla, lei hen.
Ajiak kung hilh ahi, amah pen, ‘dan bawtsiatute lak ah asimtel uh,’ chih gelh pen ka tungah a tangtung ding mawng ahi, ka tungtang thute tungkim ahita,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n amau`n, “En in Toupa! Hihsan ah namsau nih aom hi!” achi ua.
Aman akiang uah, “A hun hi!” achi hi.
A pawtkhia a, angaina bangin Olive mual ah apai a; tualeh a nungjuite`n zong ajui ua.
Amun atun un aman akiang uah, “Khemna a na lutlouhna ding un thum un,” achi hi.
Tualeh amah suang a denphakna ding chiang ah apaituam a, akhup din a, athum a.
“Pa aw, lem nasak a ahihleh hih nou ka kiang a pan suankhia in, hinanleh kei thu hilouin nang thu hijaw hen,” achi hi.
Tuatakin van a pan vantungmi khat a kiangah ahung kilak a, amah ahung hatsak hi.
Amah agim mahmah a, ahah thum jawsem a, tualeh a khua-ulsisan bangin mal lian taktakin leiah ahung takkhia a.
Athum zoh in dingkhia in a nungjuite kiangah ahung pai a. amauhte lungkham jiakin ihmu in ahung mu a.
Tuachi`n akiang uah, “Bang ding a ihmu nahi ua? Khemna a na lutlouhna ding un thou unla thum un,” achi hi.
Tualeh thu agen laitakin ngaiin, mipi honkhat ahung pai ua, tualeh sawmlehnihte lak a khat Juda achih uh ahung lamkai a, tawp sawm in Jesu kiang ahung naih a.
Hinanleh Jesu`n a kiangah, “Juda, Mihing Tapa tawp a matsak ding nachi maw?” achi hi.
Akim a mi omten sil hung om ding amuh un, “Toupa, namsau in ka satding uai?” achi ua.
Tualeh alak ua mi khat in siampi silapa asat a, abil jiatlam asatkhiat sak hi.
Hinanleh Jesu`n ahoupih a, “Hichitan ah hunsak un!” achi a, tuachi`n abil atham a adamsakta hi.
Tualeh Jesu`n akiang a hungpai siampite leh Pasian tempul a lamkaite leh upate kiangah, “Guta man ding bangin namsau leh khetbuk tawiin nungpai uh maw?
Na kiang uah niteng a Pasian tempul a ka om laiin lah ka tungah khut nakha kei ua, hinanleh tuin nahun uh ahi, tualeh mial thuneihna hun ahi,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n amah aman ua, apaipih ua, siampi inn sung ah a pailutpih uhi. Tualeh Peter in gamla tak a pat agal juih a.
Amau`n huangsung lai ah mei atawh ua, atoukhawm ua, Peter zong alak uah avatou a.
Tualeh meigeia atou laiin nungak kuahiam khat in amu a, hoihtak in a en a, “Hihpa zong a kiang a om ahi!” achi a.
Hinanleh aman, “Numei, amah ka theikha kei!” chi`n aki theihmoh bawl hi.
Tualeh tomkhat zoh in midang khat in a mukik a, “Nang zong alak ua mikhat nahi!” achi a.
“Ka hikei, nangpa!” achi hi.
Tuachi`n dakkal khat ding zoh in midang khat in, “Hihpa zong akiang a om himah ve aw, Galilimi himah veh!” achi tinten a.
Hinanleh Peter in, “Na thugen ka theikei nangpa!” achi a.
Tualeh athugen laitak in ak ahung khuangta hi.
Tualeh Toupa akihei a, Peter a en a, Peter in “Tuni`n ak khuanma in thumvei nung kitheihmoh bawl ding,” chia Toupa`n akiang a achihpen ahung theidok a.
Tuatakin Peter apawtkhia a, akap huthut ta hi.
Tualeh Jesu mantute`n amah chiamnuih bawlnan anei ua, avua ua.
Tualeh amai a tuamsak zoh un amai abeng ua, “Kua ahia hung vua? Gen in!” chi`n adong ua.
Tualeh thudang tampi in amah gensia in akawk uhi.
Khuavak takin siampite leh laigelhmite ahung kikhawm ua, a vaihawmna mai uah apaipih ua.
“Krist nahi hiam? Hung hilh in,” achi ua.
Aman akiang uah, “Hung hilh nan leng zong na gingta kei ding uh;
tualeh ken zong nou thu hung dong leng nung dawng kei ding uh, pai zong nung paisak kei ding uhi.
Tubansiah mihing Tapa pen Pasian silbawl theihna jiatlam ah atouta ding hi,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n aun un, “Ahihleh Pasian Tapa nahi maw leh?” achi ua.
Aman akiang uah, “Nung chihmah bang un ka hi,” achi a.
Tualeh amau`n, “Bang theihsakna dang ipoimoh nawn lai ding ua! Eimah ngeiin akamsuak ijata uhi!” achi uhi.
Tuachi`n mipite aun un ading ua, amah Pilat kiangah apaipih ua,
hihpa`n, “Kei Krist kumpipa ka hi chia Kaisar kiang a siah tawi akham leh ka chite uh atokbuai ka thei uhi,” chi`n ahek ua.
Tuachi`n Pilat in, “Judate kumpipa nahi maw?” chi`n adong a.
Aman adawng a, “Na chih bangin ka hi,” achi a.
Tualeh Pilat in siampite kiang leh mipite kiangah, “Hihpa tung ah bangmah mohna ka mukei hi,” achi hi.
Hinanleh amau`n, “Hihpa`n Galili gam a pat in hihtanin Juda gam khuachin ah mipite thu hilh in mipite a tokbuai veu hi,” chi`n ahahpan sem uhi.
Galili gam thu ajak takin, “Pilat in huapa Galili gammi ahihleh hihlouh adong a.”
Tualeh Herod vaihawmna nuaia om ahi chih atheih takin Herod kiangah asawl a, hualaiin amah zong Jerusalem a om ahihjiak in.
Tualeh Herod in Jesu amuh takin akipak mahmah a; atanchin anajak jiakin hun sawtpi a pat akimuhpih ut mawng ahi a; muh zong akinem hi.
Tuachi`n aman a kiangah, thu tampi adawng a; hinanleh aman bangmah in adawng kei hi.
Tualeh siampite leh laigelhmite a dingkhia ua, nasiatakin ahek uhi.
Tualeh Herod leh a galkapte`n Jesu asimmoh bawl ua, chiamnuih bawlnan azang ua, puan thupi asilhsak ua, Pilat kiangah a sawlkikta uhi.
Tualeh huani mah in Herod leh Pilat akihou theita uhi; hua masang ana ki houtheilou ahi uhi.
Tuachi`n Pilat in siampite, lamkaite leh mipite asam khawm a.
A kiang uah, “Mi atokbuai chia hihpa ka kiang a nungpui uh ahi a. Tualeh ngaiun, namai ua hoihtak a ka etchian nung in na hekna uah a tung ah bangmah diklouhna ka mukei hi.
Herod in zong amu kei, ajiak nou akiang ah kungsawl a, ngaiun, sihna khop hial bangmah abawl kei hi.
Tuajiakin, ka jep ding a, ka khahmai ding,” achi hi.
Ajiak ankuang luini a mi khat akiang ua a khahkhiat sak teitei ding ahi hi.
Amauh kituak takin akikou ua, “Hihpa hih mangthang inla! Barabba hung pawtsak in!” achi ua.
(Huapa khuapi sung a helna jiak leh tualthah jiak a thong a tang ahi.)
Tuajiakin Pilat in Jesu akhah dok nuam a, akiang uah thu agen kik a.
Hinanleh amauh akikou ua, “Kross ah kilhden in! Kross ah kilhden in!” achi ua.
Tuachi`n aman athumveina dingin akiang uah, “Bang jiak in ahia? Bang ahia a bawlkhialh! Sihna khop hial atung ah bangmah ka mukei hi; tuajiakin ka jep ding a, ka khahmai ding,” achi hi.
Hinanleh amau`n aw ngaihtak in, kross a kilhden dingin a ngen teitei ua. Tuachi`n amauh aw leh siampite aw in ajou jawta hi.
Tuachi`n Pilat in anget bang ua bawl dingin thu atanta hi.
Tualeh helna leh tualthahna jiak a thong tang angetpa uh akhah a, Jesu ahihleh a ut ut ua bawl dingin a piakhiata hi.
Tualeh amah apaipih lai un gamlam a kipan-a hungpai Kurini gammi Simon aman ua, Jesu nunglam a pua dingin atung ah kross angata uhi.
Tualeh amah kah a mau jenjun numei hon in ajui ua.
Hinanleh Jesu`n amauhlam hung nga in, “Jerusalem tanute aw! Kei hung kah kei unla, nou a ding leh na tate ua dingin kapjaw un.
Ajiak ngaiun, hichi bang nite a hungtung ding a, ‘Tuani chiangin chiingte leh naupai ngailouhna gilte tualeh naungek tepngailouh noite ahampha uhi!’ achi ding uh.
Tuachi`n amau`n mualte kiangah, ‘Hung netkhum un!’ Tualeh ta`ngte kiangah, ‘Hung khuhkhum un!’ achi ding uh.
Ajiak sing hing a bawn hih silte abawl uleh, singgaw ah bang akibawl tazen diai?”
Amah tawh midang migilou nih zong hihlup dingin apui ua.
Tualeh “Kalvari,” achih mun uh hualam ah kross ah akilhden ua migiloute tawh, khat ajiatlam ah tualeh khat aveilam ah akilhden uhi.
Tuachi`n Jesu`n, “Pa, amauhte ngaidam in! A silbawl uh atheikei ua hi,” achi hi.
Tualeh apuansilh kihawm in ai asan uhi.
Tualeh mipite`n a en gige ua tuachi`n lamkaite`n, “Midang bawn a hundam vele; Pasian mitel Krist ahih taktak leh amahleh amah ki hundamta henla!” chi`n a enghou ua.
Galkapte`n zong chiamnuih bawlnan azang ua, hungpai in uain thuk apia ua,
Tualeh, “Judate kumpipa nahih taktakleh nangmah leh nangmah ki hundam in!” achi uhi.
Tualeh a lutung lam ah Grik leh Latin leh Hebrai ham in, “HIHPA JUDATE KUMPIPA AHI,” chia kigelh atuang hi.
Tuachi`n migilou kikhaite lak a khat in, “Krist nahihleh nangmah ki hundam inla, kou zong hung hundam tanla!” achi a.
Tualeh khat pen in amah phawkkawm in adawng a, a kibang a ahung kigawt theiin, “Pasian laulou lai nahi hiam?
Eipen gawttak mawng ihi; ajiak isilbawlte man mu ihi; hinanleh hihpa`n bangmah a bawlkhial kei,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n aman Jesu kiangah, “Toupa nagam na tunchiang in hung theigige in aw!” achi a.
Jesu`n a kiang ah, Adiktak in kung hilh ahi, “Tuni`n ka kiangah paradis ah na om ding hi,” achi hi.
Tualeh dakgukna ding vel ahi a, dakkuana tan dongin leitung jousiah ahung mialta a.
Tuachi`n ni ahung mialta a, Pasian tempul puanjak akimlai ah ahung kekta hi.
Tualeh Jesu aw ngaihtak in a kikou a, “Pa! Na khut ah ka kha kung kemsakta hi!” achi a; tualeh hua achih zoh in akha akhahta hi.
Tuachia galkap jalamkaipa`n sil omdan amuh in, hihpa pellou in midik ahi hi chi`n Pasian aphatta hi.
Tualeh hua etnop a en ding a hung paikhawm mipite jousiahin sil omdan amuhtak un a awm uh tum kawmkawm in Innlam ah apaikikta uhi.
Hinanleh ameltheihte tengteng leh Galili gam a amah hungjui numeite gamlapi ah ading ua, hih silte a en gige uhi.
Tualeh ngaiun, mikhat amin Joseph kichi vaihawmtu aom a, amah mihoih leh midik ahi a.
Aman avaihawm uleh asilbawl uh zong lem anasakpih kei a; Amah Judate khuapi Arimathaimi ahi a, Pasian gam ngak jing a om ahi.
Hihpa Pilat kiangah apai a, Jesu luang a ngen a.
Tuachi`n ala a puannem in atuam a, kuamah sialngai nailouh suangkhuak kuak han khat ah asialta hi.
Huani pen kiginni ahi a, khawlni ahung naita hi.
Tualeh Galili gam a amah tawh hungjawkte`n zong anung ajui ua, ahan leh a luang kisial dan amu uhi.
Tuachi`n apaikik ua sil namtui leh sathau namtuite asiam ua.
Tualeh thupiak dungjuiin khawlni in akhawlta uhi.
Tualeh nipikal ni masa ni-in jingsang matakin a gimnamtui bawlte uh tawiin, numei dang kuate hiam tawh han ah ahung pai ua.
Hinanleh suang han a pat likkhiatsa in amu ua,
tuachi`n asung ah alut ua Toupa Jesu luang amu kei uhi.
Tualeh hichi ahung hi a, huajiaka a lungbuai laiun ngaiin, mi nih puan teselhsolh silh in agei uah ahung ding a.
Tuachi`n amauh laua leia a khupbok laiun, amau`n akiang uah, “Bangding a misi lak a mihing zong nahi ua?
Hihsan ah aom nawn kei a, a thoukikta hi; Galili gam a aom laia na kiang ua agen thei un:
‘Mihing Tapa ahihleh mikhialte khut ah matsak in aom ding a, kross ah akilhden ding ua, tualeh nithum ni-in a thoukik ding,’ ” achih achi a.
Tualeh amau`n athugente ahung theidokta uhi.
Tuachi`n anung paikikta ua, hih silte jousiah sawmlehnihte leh midangte jousiah kiangah ahilhta uhi.
Amauhte Mari Magdalini tawh Joanna leh Jakobnu Mari tawh tualeh akiang ua om numei dangte tawh ahi ua. Hih silte sawltakte kiangah ahilhta uhi.
Tualeh athugen uh thu maimai bangin a ngaihsut ua; ana taksan kei uhi.
Hinanleh Peter a dingkhia a, han ah avatai a, tualeh kun a a et leh puannemte guak om amu a, sil omdante lamdang asak takin a paimangta hi.
Tualeh ngaiin, alak ua mi nih Emmau kichi khua khat Jerusalem a pat mel sagih a gamla ah hoh dingin apai ua.
Amauh hih sil hung omte jousiah thu ah ahoulim ua.
Tualeh hichi ahung hi a, houlim a aki doktuah laiun, Jesu`n ahung naih a amauh tawh a zawkkhawmta a;
hinanleh amah atheih louhna ding un amit uh sukvaihsak in aom hi.
Tualeh aman akiang uah, “Na paikawm ua na kihoulimna uh leh na dahna thu uh bang ahia?” achi a.
Tuachi`n khatpa amin Kleopa kichi pen in adawng a akiang ah, “Tulai a sil omdante na theihlouh, Jerusalem a nangguak mikhual nahi hiam?” achi hi.
Aman akiang uah, “Bang silte ahia?” achi a.
Tualeh amau`n a kiangah, “Nazareth Jesu, Pasian leh mijousiah mitmuh a asilbawl leh thugen Jawlnei minthang tak tungtang thu.”
“Amah siampite leh ka lamkaite un sitak a siamlouh atansak ding un a piakkhiat ua, kross-a akilhden thu uh.
Hinanleh kou Israelte tantu ding amah ahi chih ka kinem uhi! Tualeh hihte lou zong, hihte atunzoh tuni anithum ni ahita hi.
Tualeh ka lawilak ua numei khenkhat han a matak a vapaite`n lamdang satakin ahung koih uhi,
a luang amuhlouh takun ahung kinungleh kik ua, ahing kikta chia hunghilh vantungmite zong kamu uh, achi ua.
Tualeh ka ompihte lak ua khenkhat han ah avapai ua, numeite gen bang takin ava mu ua, hinanleh amah amu tuankei uhi,” achi ua.
Tuachi`n aman akiang uah, aw mimawte leh, Jawlneite thugen jousiah taksan nuamloute (taksan ding a lung ngongte)
“Krist in hih silte thuak a athupina a alut ding mawng hilou amaw?” achi hi.
Tualeh Mosi leh Jawlneite laibu a pan in Laisiangthou pumpi a amah tungtang kigelhte akiang uah a hilhchianta hi.
Tuachi`n apaina ding khua uh tungpai ding ahita ua, amah gamla tak a paisuak sawm bangin aom a;
hinanleh amau`n akhouh ua, “Ka kiang uah ta`m maiin, nitaklam ahita a, tualeh ni zong tum ding ahita hi,” achi ua. Tuachi`n akiang ua om dingin alutta hi.
Tualeh hichi ahung hi a, amauh tawh dohkan a atouin, tanghou ala a, agualjawl a, tualeh abalkek a, akiang uah apia a.
Tuachi`n amit uh ahung vakta a, amah atheita uhi; tuatakin amah amit muh uapat amangta hi.
Tualeh amau`n, “Lampi a ahung houpih a, Pasian Laisiangthou thute ahung hilhchian laiin ilungtang sung ah akuang hial hilou amaw?” a kichi ua.
Tualeh huahun laitak mah in athoukhia ua, Jerusalem khua ah aki nungleh ua, sawmlehkhat omkhawmte leh akiang ua omte amu uhi.
Amau`n, “Toupa tuh athoukik taktak ahi! Simon kiangah zong akilakta!” ana chi ua.
Tuatakin amau`n zong lampi a sil hung omte leh tanghou abalkek a amah atheihkhiat dante uh ahilh uhi.
Tualeh hihthute agen laiun Jesu ngei alak uah ahung ding a, “Na kiang uah khamuanna om hen,” achi hi.
Hinanleh amauh a chija mahmah ua, tualeh alau ua: sikha mu bangin aki ngaihsun ua.
Tualeh aman akiang uah, “Bangding a mangbang nahi ua? Tualeh bangding a na lungtang ua ginglahna hung om ahi hiam?
Ka khutte leh ka kengte en-un, kei mahmah hilou ka hi hiam? Hung tham unla en-un; sa leh guh nei a nungmuh bang un, kha in sa leh guh aneikei hi,” achi hi.
Hihte agen zoh in amauh a ensak a.
Hinanleh akipak seng jiak ua agingtat louh uleh lamdang asaklai un aman akiang uah, “Hiah nek ding nanei uh hiam?” achi a.
Tualeh amau`n a kiangah nga kikang gaw khat leh khuaiju khalkhat apia ua,
aman hua ala a, amai uah aneta hi.
Tuachi`n aman akiang uah, “Mosi dan leh Jawlneite laibute leh Psam bu a ka tungtang kigelh jousiah ahung tangtun ding dan nou tawh ka omkhawm lai a na kiang ua ka thugente hihte ahi,” achi hi.
Tualeh Pasian laibute a theihtheihna ding un a lungtang uh ahonsakta hi.
Tuachi`n aman akiang uah, “Hichi bang a gelh ahi: Krist in gim athuak ding a, nithum nia misi lak a kipan a thoukik ding mawng ahi,
Tualeh kisik na leh khialh ngaihdamna tuh amah min in Jerusalem a pat in namchin lak ah gen ahi ding.
Nou hih silte theihpihtu nahi uhi.
Ngaiun, ka Pa silchiam natung uah ka sawl ding hi; hinanleh tunglam a kipan a sil bawltheihna a thuam nahih masiah uh Jerusalem khuapi ah om kinken un,” achi hi.
Tualeh amauh Bethani tanpha in apaipih a, aban ajak a, amauh agualjawl a.
Tualeh hichi ahung hi a, a gualjawl laitakin amauh apaisanta hi.
Tualeh amau`n amah abia ua, kipak mahmah in Jerusalem ah akileh kik ta uhi.
Tualeh Pasian tempul ah Pasian phat leh pahtawiin a omjingta uhi.
Atu`ng in thu a om, Thu hih Pasian kiangah a om, Thu hih Pasian ahi.
Amah atu`ng in Pasian kiangah a om.
Sil jousiah ama siam ahi a, silsiam tengteng ama siamlouh bangmah aom kei.
Amah ah hinna aom a, tua hinna ahihleh mihingte vakna ahi.
Vak mial lak ah ahung vak a, mial in amah atheikei hi.
Pasian a kipan a sawl mi khat aom a, amin Johan ahi,
amah theihpihtu dingin a hungpai a, tua vak theihpih dingin, mi jousiahin amah jiak a agintat theihna ding un.
Amah tua vak ahi kei a, hinanleh vak theihpihtu ding a sawl ahijaw hi.
Tuapen vak diktak michih tanvak ding a leitung ah a hungpai lellel hi.
Amah leitungah aom a, leitung ama siam ahi; tualeh leitungin amah atheikei hi.
Amah amite kiangah a hungpai a, amah amite`n ana kipahpih kei uhi.
Hinanleh amah kipahpih jousiahte kiangah Pasian tate hihtheihna ding sil bawltheihna apia hi; amah agingtate kiang ah.
Tuate ahihleh sisan a piang ahikei a, taksa deihdan a piang zong ahi kei a, tualeh mihing deihdan a piang zong ahikei a, hinanleh Pasian a piang ahijaw uhi.
Tualeh Thu hih sa ahung suak a, eite lak ah ateng hi, hehpihna leh thutak a dim in; a thupina Pa Tapa tang neihsun thupina bangbang, eite`n imuta hi.
Johan in amah theihpihna apia a, akikou a, “Ka nung a hungpaipa in ahung makhelhta hi, ‘ka maia ommawng ahihjiak in, chia athu ka genpa amah ahi.’ ”
Ama bukimna itangchiat uh, hehpihna tung a hehpihna sawnsawn tawh.
Ajiak danthu Mosi tungtawn a piak ahi a; hinanleh hehpihna leh thutak Jesu Krist a pat hungpai ahi.
Kuaman bangchiklai in zong Pasian amu ngaikei; Tapa tang neihsun, Pasian angsung a ompa, amah in atanchin aphuangta hi.
Tualeh hih pen Judate`n Jerusalem a kipan siampute leh Levite kiang a, “Nang kua na hia?” chia dong ding a asawllai ua Johan thu theihsakna ahi hi.
Amah panglou in a kiphuang a: “Krist ka hi kei,” achi hi.
Tualeh amau`n, “Ahihleh nang kua na hia?” Elijah na maw chi`n adong ua. Aman, “Ka hikei,” achi a,
“Jawlnei namaw leh?” achi ua,
Aman, “Hilou,” chi`n adawng a.
“Tuachi`n amau`n a kiangah, kua na hia, a hungsawlte ka dawntheihna ding un hunghilh in, nang leh nang kua ka hi kichi na hia,” achi ua.
Aman Jawlnei Isaiah gen bang a:
“Toupa lampi tangsak un,
chia gamdai a kikou aw, ‘keimah ka hi!’ ” achi hi.
A misawlte uh Pharisaite lak a mi ahi ua,
tualeh amah adong ua, a kiangah, Krist lah hilou, “Elijah lah hilou, hua Jawlnei lah hilou nahihleh bangding a na baptis ahia?” achi ua.
Johan in amauh adawng a, “Ken tui in ka baptis a, hinanleh na theihlouh khat nalak uah ading hi.
A khedap khau sutding in zong ka chingkei, ka nung a hungpaia hung makhelhpa, amah ahi,” achi hi.
Hih silte Jordan gal a, Bethabara, Johan in a baptisna mun a kibawl ahi.
Ajingni-in Johan in Jesu a kiang lam a hungpaiin amu a, “En un Pasian belamnou, leitung khialhna puamang dingpa!
Hihpa ahi, mi khat ahung makhelhpa, ‘Ka nung ah a hungpai hi, kama-a omsa mawng ahihjiak in,’ chia ka nagenpa.
Amah ka theikha kei, hinanleh Israelte kiang a amah suklang a aom theihna dingin tui a baptis in kungpai ahi,” achi hi.
Tualeh Johan in athu atheihpih a, “Khasiangthou vakhu bang a van a kipan a hung kumsuk atung a hungtuang den kamu hi.

Ken amah ka theikei, hinanleh tui a baptis ding a hungsawlpa amah mah in ka kiangah, ‘Kuahiam tung a Kha hung kumsuk a, atung a tuangden namuh penpen, amah ahi Khasiangthou a baptis dingpa,’ ahung chi hi.
Tua kamu a, tualeh hihpa Pasian Tapa ahi chih ka thei hi,” achi hi.
Ajingni in Johan ading a a nungjuite nih tawh,
tualeh Jesu vak kawikawi a om amu ua, “En un, Pasian belamnou!” achi hi.
Tua nungjui nihte`n athugen aja ua, Jesu ajuita uhi.
Tuachi`n, Jesu akihei a, ahung juih uh amuh in akiang uah, “Bang ahia na zon uh?” achi a. Amau`n a kiang ah,
“Rabbi khoiah ahia naten?” achi ua. (huahi “Siapa” chihna ahi.)
Aman akiang uah, “Hungpai unla, en-un,” achi a. Tuachi`n a hungpai ua, atenna a en ua, amu ua, tualeh a kiangah tuani in a om uhi, sunnung dak lina vel ahihjiak in.
Johan thugen ja, Jesu jui tegel lak a khat ahihleh Simon Peter sanggampa Andru ahi a.
Aman a masapen in ama sanggampa Simon amu a, akiang ah, “Messiah ka muta uh,” achi a, (huapen “Krist” chihna ahi.)
Tuachi`n amah Jesu kiangah azohpih a,
Jesu`n amah a en a, nang Jona tapa Simon nahi a; “Kifa ahung kichi ta ding hi,” achi a. (huapen “suang” chihna ahi).
Ajingni-in Jesu`n Galili gam ah pai asawm a, Philip amu a, akiang ah, “Hung juiin!” achi hi.
Philip zong Andru leh Peter tenna khuapi Bethsaida a teng ahi hi.
Philip in Nathanael amu a, akiang ah, “Mosi in dan laibua a tungtang anagelh leh Jawlneite`n anagelh uh Nazareth Jesu Joseph tapa ka muta uhi,” achi hi.
Tuatakin Nathanael in akiang ah, “Nazareth a kipan in silhoih apawt khiathei ngaia maw?” achi a. Philip in akiang ah,
“Hung en in,” achi a.
Jesu`n Nathanael akiang juan a pai amu a, akiang ah, “En un, gitlouhna neilou Israelmi chitak hiah a om!” achi hi.
Nathanael in a kiangah, “Bang nung chitheih ahia?” achi a.
Jesu`n adawng a akiang ah, “Philip in nang ahung sap ma in, theipi kung nuaia na om laiin kungmu hi,” achi hi.
Nathanael in adawng a akiang ah,
“Rabbi, Nang Pasian Tapa na hi! Israelte kumpipa nahi!” achi hi.
Jesu`n adawng a akiang ah, “Theipi kung nuai ah kungmu na kiang a kungchih jiak a gingta nave maw? Hih silte sang a thupijaw namu ding hi!” achi hi.
Tualeh Jesu`n akiang ah, “Adiktak in kung hilh ahi: tunung chiangin van kihong a, Pasian vantungmite mihing Tapa tung a kah leh kum na muta ding uhi,” achi hi.
Tualeh nithum ni in Galili gam a Kana khua ah kitenna a om a; huasan ah Jesu nu a om a,
Jesu leh a nungjuite zong kitenna ah achial ua.
Tualeh uain ahung beitakin, Jesu nu in a kiangah, “Uain anei nawn kei uh,” achi a.
Jesu`n a kiangah, “Numei nang nungtheihsak ding bang om ahia? Ka hun atung naikei,” achi hi.
Anu in silate kiangah, “Na kiang ua agen taphot bawl un,” achi hi.
Tualeh Judate tawndan dungjui a kisiansuahna suang tuibel belguk gallon sawmnih hiam sawmthum hiam ta a kitung a.
Jesu`n akiang uah, “Tuibelte ah tui sungdim un,” achi a. Tuachi`n belgong tan in a sungdim ua.
Tualeh aman akiang uah, “Tu in dim unla, nekbawl thusate kiangah tawi un achi a,” amau`n atawi ua,
Nek bawl thusate`n tui uain hung suak pen achiam ua, khoia hung kipan-a hung om ahih atheikei ua, (hinanleh silate tuidimte`n athei ua), nek bawl thusate`n mouneipa asam ua
tualeh aman a kiangah, “Miteng in atu`ng in uain hoih atungkhia ua, tualeh tamdeuh ahung dawn nung chiang un ahoihlou jaw atungkhia uh; nang tutanin uain hoih natung nalai hi!” achi uhi.
Hih sillamdang kipatna pen Jesu`n Galili gam a kana khua a abawl ahi a; athupina alangsakta a, tualeh a nungjuite`n amah agingta ta uhi.
Tuazoh in Kapernaum ah apaisuk a, amah tawh, anu tawh, a sanggamte tawh, tualeh a nungjuite tawh, huasan ah ni sawtpi atam kei uhi.
Tualeh Judate paikan kut ahung naita a, Jesu Jerusalem ah apaitou a.
Tualeh Pasian tempul a bawng leh belam leh vakhu juakte leh dangka khekte tou amu a.
Jepna khauhual a bawlzoh in tempul a kipan belamte bawngte a hawlkhia a, tualeh dangka khekte dangka a sunbuaksak a, a dohkan uh asawnpuk sak hi;
tualeh aman vakhu juakte kiangah, “Hih silte hihsan a pat lakhia un; Ka Pa inn summet bawlna in bawlkei un!” achi hi.
Tuachi`n a nungjuite`n, “Na inn a ka phattuam ngaihna in ahung negaita,” chih gelh ahung theikhia uhi.
Tualeh Judate`n adong ua a kiangah, “Hih silte nabawl chiamtehna bang ahia nung lahtheih?” achi ua.
Jesu`n adawng a, akiang uah, “Hih tempul hihsia le uchin nithum ni-in ka tungding kik ding,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n Judate`n, “Kum sawmli leh guk hih tempul bawlnan alut a! Nang nithum sung in na tungding ding maw?” achi ua.
Hinanleh aman tuapen a taksa tempul gen ahijaw hi.
Tuajiakin misi lak a kipan a athohkik nung in a nungjuite`n, akiang uah hihthute gen ahi chih ahung thei khiata ua; Pasian Laisiangthou leh Jesu thugente agingta ta uhi.
Tualeh paikan ankuang luina a Jerusalem a aom laiin a sillamdang bawlte amuh tak un, mi tampite`n amin agingta ta uhi.
Hinanleh Jesu alak uah aki phumlut nuam kei hi, ajiak aman mi jousiah athei hi.
Tualeh mihing sung a om atheih jiakin mihing thu kuamah hilhchet apoimoh kei hi.
Pharisaite lak a mi amin Nikodem kichi Juda vaihawmtu khat a om a.

Amah jan in Jesu kiangah a hungpai a, a kiangah, “Rabbi, Pasian akipan a siapa ding a hungpai nahi chih kung thei uhi. Ajiak Pasian akiang a aom keileh na sillamdang bawlte kuaman a bawlthei kei ding,” achi hi.
Jesu`n adawng a akiang ah, “Adiktak in adiktak in, kung hilh ahi: mi kuapeuh apianthak keileh Pasian gam amukei ding hi,” achi a.
Nikodem in a kiangah, “Mi atek nung in bangchi`n a piangthei dia? Anu sung ah nihvei lut in a piangthei ding maw!” achi a.
“Adiktak in, kung hilh ahi, mi kuapeuh tui a leh kha a apianthak keileh Pasian gam alutkei ding hi.
Sa-a piang taphot sa-a ahi a, Kha-a piang taphot Kha-a ahi.
Na pianthak ngeingei ding ahi na kiang a kungchih lamdang saken.
Huih a utna na ah alang a, agin naja hi, hinanleh khoia kipan a hungpai ahia, khoilam a pai ding ahia chih na theikei. Kuapeuh Kha-a piangte tuachi bang ahi,” achi hi.
Nikodem in adawng a, akiang ah, “Hihsilte bangchi`n ahithei dia?” achi a.
Jesu`n adawng a, akiang ah, “Israelte siapa nahi a hih silte theilou nave maw?
Adiktak in kung hilh ahi: kou ka theih uh ka gen ua ka muh uh ka theisak uhi; hinanleh ka thu theihsak uh nasang kei uhi.
Leitung silte kung hilh bawn gingtalou nahih uleh van lam silte hung hilh leng bang chi`n na gingta ding ua?
Van a pat a hung kumsuk mihing Tapa van a om chihlouh kuamah van ah akah ngai naikei hi.”
Tualeh Mosi-in gamdai a gul akhai kang mahbang in mihing Tapa zong khaikang in aom ding hi,
kuahileh amah gingta in mangthang lou a khantawn a hinna aneih jawkna ding un.
Ajiak Pasian in hih leitung a it mahmah a, tuachi`n a Tapa tang neihsun apia hi, tuachia kuahileh amah gingtate mangthang lou a tangtawn hinna a neizawkna ding un.
Leitung siamlouh tangsak dingin Pasian in a Tapa a sawlkei, leitung amah jiak a hundam a hihtheihna dingin a sawljaw hi.
Kuahileh amah gingtate siamlouh tansak in aom kei ding a, hinanleh a gingtaloute pen siamlouh tansak khit ahi ta, Pasian Tapa tangkhat min a gintatlouh jiak in.
Tualeh hih siamlouh tanna ahi, vak leitung ah a hungpai a, hinanleh mi`n vak sang in mial a itjaw uh, a silbawlte uh agitlouh jiak in.
Ajiak kuahileh silgillou bawl in vak ahua ua, tualeh vak ah zong apai nuam kei uhi; atuachih keileh a silbawl uh alang kha ding.
Hinanleh kuahileh sildik bawlte pen vak ah ahung pai ua, a silbawlte uh Pasian jiaka bawl ahi chih alattheihna ding in.
Hih silte zoh in Jesu a nungjuite tawh Judea gam ah a hungpai ua, huasan ah amauh tawh aom jing a, tualeh a baptis hi.
Tualeh Johan in zong Salim gei Ainon ah a baptis a, huasan a tui atamjiak in, tualeh amauh a hungpai ua, baptisma atang uhi.
Ajiak huahun laiin Johan thong ah aki khum naikei hi.
Tuachi`n Johan nungjuite leh Judate kikal ah ki siansuahna thu ah kinialna ahung omta a.
Tualeh amauhte Johan kiangah a hungpai ua, akiang ah, “Rabbi, Jordan gal a na kiang a om, a tanchin na theihpih pa`n, ngaiin, huapa`n baptisma a tangsak a, mijousiah a kiangah a hungpai uh!” achi ua.
Johan in adawng a, “Van a kipan a piak ahihkeileh mihing in bangmah a bawlthei kei.
‘Kei Krist ka hikei a, ama-a sawl ka hijaw chih nou mahmah in nung theihpih uhi.’
Mouneipa pen mou pasal ahi a, hinanleh mouneipa lawmpa, akiang a ding a athu ngaikhia tuh mouneipa aw jiakin akipak mahmah ding hi. Tuajiakin hih ka kipahna abukimta hi.
Amah akhangtou semsem ding a keipen ka kiamsuk semsem ding hi.”
Tunglam a kipan a hungpaipa pen mi jousiah tung a ahi a; leia piangjaw leimi ahi, tualeh leithu agen hi, van a kipan a hungpaipa pen mijousiah tung a ahi.
Tualeh amuh leh ajakte aman a theisak jel hi, kuaman athu theihsak a taksan kei uhi.
Kuahileh athu theihsak taksan in Pasian midik ahi chih akipsak hi.
Ajiak Pasian sawl in Pasian thu agen hi; Pasian inlah a kiangah Kha teh sese in apia kei hi.
Pa in Tapa it a, akhut ah sil jousiah apiata hi.
Kuapeuh Tapa gingta in tangtawn hinna aneita, kuapeuh Tapa gingta lou in hinna amu kei ding a, Pasian hehna atung ah aom jing jaw ding hi, achi hi.
Tuajiakin Jesu`n Johan sang in nungjui asiam tamjaw a, a baptis chih Pharisaite`n aja uh chih Toupa`n atheihtak in.
(Hinanleh Jesu hial in a baptis kei, a nungjuite`n a baptis jawjel uhi).
Judea gam nusia in Galili gam ah a paikikta hi;
hinanleh Samaria gam tuan a apaingai ahi a.
Tuachi`n Samaria khuapi khat Saikar achih uh, Jakob in atapa Joseph kiang a mun apiakna gei a hungtungta hi.
Huasan ah Jakob tuikul aom a, Jesu a khualzinna agim jiakin tuikul geiah atouta a, huahi dakguk tuamlak ding ahi a.
Tualeh Samaria numei khat tuitawi dingin a hungpai a, Jesu`n a kiangah “Dawn ding tui hungpia in,” achi hi.
Anungjuite lah nek ding leiin khuapi ah a paikhinta ua.
Tuachi`n Samaria numeinu in a kiangah, “Bangchi dan a nang Judami in kei Samaria numei kiang a dawn ding nungnget ahia?” Juda mite`n lah Samariamite bangmah in asim ngal kei ua, achi hi.

Jesu`n adawng a akiang ah, “Pasian silthawn piak leh na kiang a dawn ding tui hungpia in chipa kua ahiam chih theilechin jaw nang a kiang ah ngen ding chin a, aman tuihing hungpia ding hiven,” achi hi.
Numeinu`n a kiangah, “Pu, asawkna ding bangmah lah na neikei a, tuikul lah athuk ngal a, khoia kipan in ahia tuihing nalak ding?
Ka pu uh Jakob sang a lianjaw nahi maw? Aman hih tuikul a hungpia a, tualeh amah mah in zong adawn a, a tate leh agan hawn in zong adawn uh,” achi hi.
Jesu`n adawng a akiang ah, “Kuapeuh hih tuikul a dawn tuh adangtak kik ding,

hinanleh ken akiang a kapiak ding tui dawn jousiah adangtak ngai nawn kei ding. Hinanleh ken akiang a tui kapiak ding pen amah ah tuinak ahung hi ding a, tangtawn hinna dawngin aki khohkhia ding,” achi hi.
Numeinu`n akiang ah, “Pu, hua tui hungpia ve! Ka dang atak nawnlouh na ding leh tuitawi a hihsan a kungpai louhna dingin,” achi hi.
Jesu`n akiang ah, “Na pasal vasam inla, hihsan ah hung paikik in,” achi hi.
Numeinu`n adawng a, “Pasal ka neikei,” achi hi.
Jesu`n akiang ah, “Pasal ka neikei nachih na chidik mahmah hi.
Ajiak pasal nga naneita a, tu a naneih zong na pasal ahi kei. Hua thu nagen dik achi hi.”
Numeinu`n akiang ah, “Pu, Jawlnei nahi chih ka thei.”
“Ka pu leh pate un hih mual ah Pasian abia jel ua, hinanleh nou, mi`n Pasian abiakna mun ding ahihleh Jerusalem ahi, nachi uh,” achi hi.
Jesu`n akiang ah, “Numei hung gingta in, hih mual sese lou ah zong ahihkeileh Jerusalem sese lou ah zong Pa nabiak hun uh hungtung ding ahita.
Nou na theihlouh uh nabia uh, kou katheih uh kabia uh; ajiak hundamna Judate a hung kipan ahi.
Hinanleh ahun tung ding ahita, tu mahmah in zong atung hi, hua hun chiangin abia taktak ten Pa tuh Kha leh thutakin abia ding uhi, ajiak Pa in huachibang mi amah bia dingin azong hi.
Pasian ahihleh kha ahi a, abia miten Kha leh thutak a abiak ding uh ahi,” achi hi.
Numeinu`n akiang ah, “Krist kichi, Messiah hungpai ding ka thei, amah a hungpai chiangin sil bangkim ahung hilhsiang ding,” achi hi.
Jesu`n akiang ah, “Kei, na kiang a thugenpa, amah ka hi,” achi hi.
Tualeh huahun laitakin a nungjuite a hungtung ua, numeinu a kihoupih lamdang asa mahmah ua, hinanleh kuaman, “Bang ding a numeinu na kihoupih?” achi kei uhi.
Numeinu`n atuibel ataisan a, khuapi ah apai a, mi kiangah,
“Ka silbawl jousiah hunghilh mikhat aom, hungpai unla, hung en-un, Krist ahithei diam ah?” achi a.
Tuachi`n amauh khuapi a pat ahung paikhia ua, akiang ah ahung paita uhi.
Tuachih laiin a nungjuite`n, “Siapa an ne in!” chi`n asawl ua.
Hinanleh aman aking uah, “Nou theihlouh nek ding an kanei,” achi hi.
Tuajiakin a nungjuite a kihou ua, “Kuahiam in anek ding ahung tawisak adiam?” achi ua.
Jesu`n akiang uah, “Ka an,” ahihleh, “a hungsawlpa deihlam bawl leh a nna sepzoh ahi.
Nou, ‘Khali zoh chiangin buhlak hun a hungtung ding na chikei uh amah,’ ngaiun kung hilh ahi, dak unla, loujaute en-un, lak hun in aminsiangta hi!
Tualeh kuahileh ala in thaman amu ding a, tangtawn hinna tan om ding in gah akikhol jel hi; atuhpa leh alapa a kipakkhawm theihna ding un.
‘Ajiak khat in atuh a, adang in ala hi,’ chih hihsan ah adik ngel hi.
Na sepgimlouh uh lading in kung sawl ahi, midangte`n anasem ua, nou asepsa uh na sunjom uh ahi,” achi hi.
Tualeh, ka bawl jousiah hih numeinu thugen jiakin hua khuapi a Samaria mi tampi in amah agingta ta uhi.
Tuachi`n Samariamite Jesu kiang a hungtun tak un akiang ua om dingin akhouh ua; tualeh amah huasan ah ninih atam hi.
Tualeh ama thugen jiakin mi tampi in agintat beh uhi,
tuachi`n numeinu kiangah, “Tu injaw nang gen jiak a gingta ka hikei ua, kou mahmah in a thugen kaja ua, tualeh hihpa pen leitung hundampa, Krist ahi chih kathei uhi,” achi ua.
Tualeh ninih zoh in hua-a kipan in apawt a Galili gam ah apaita hi.
Ajiak amah Jesu ngeiin, “Jawlnei amah gam lam ah pahtawiin aom ngaikei chih a theisakta hi.”
Tuachi`n Galili gam a hungtun in, Jerusalem a ankuang luilai a a silbawl jousiah amuh jiak un Galili mite`n ana kipahpih ua; amauh zong hua ankuang luina ah avapai uhi.
Tuachi`n Jesu tui uain a suahsakna Galili gam a Kana khua a hungtung kik a; tualeh huatak ah mithupi khat a tapa Kapernaum khua a china khat aom hi.
Jesu Judea gam a pat Galili gam a hungtungta chih azaktak in, akiang ah apai a, tualeh hung paisuk a a tapa damsak dingin a ngen a, si dekdek a china ahihjiak in.
Tuachi`n Jesu`n akiang ah, “Chiamtehnate leh sillamdangte namuh kei uleh na gingta kei ding uh,” achi hi.
Mithupipa in a kiang ah, “Pu, ka tapa sihma in hung paisuk in,” achi a.
Jesu`n akiang ah, “Paita in, na tapa adamta hi,” achi a. Tualeh huapa`n Jesu thugen agingta a, apaita hi.
Tualeh apaisuk laiin asilate`n ana kituahpih ua, “Na tapa adamta!” chi`n ana hilh ua.
Tuachi`n aman ahung dampat lai hun akiang uah adong a, mau`n, “Jani dakkal sagih hunin anattun in amah a nusiata hi,” achi ua.
Tuachi`n apa`n Jesu`n akiang a, “Na tapa adamta,” achih hun laitak ahi chih atheita a; tualeh amah leh a innkuanpih teng in agingta ta uhi.
Hih pen Jesu`n Judea gam a pat ahung pawt a, Galili gam a ahung pai lai a, a sillamdang bawl nihna ahi.
Hih nungin Judate ankuang luina khat aom a, Jesu Jerusalem ah apaitou a.
Tualeh Jerusalem ah belam kongkhak geiah dil khat Hebrai ham a Bethesda kichi inlim nga nei aom hi.
Tuate ah damloute, mittawte, keng baite tualeh jengte tampitak alum ua, tui hungtak ngak in,
ajiak, hun chih khat chiangin vantungmi hua dil ah ava paisuk a tui avatok jel a, tualeh kuapeuh tui kitok zoh a lut masa penpen bang chibang natna nei hinanleh zong, sukdam in aom jel hi.
Tualeh huasan ah kum sawmthum leh giat damlou mi khat aom hi.
Jesu`n amah huasan a lum amuh in, tualeh huachibang in hun sawtpi om ahita chih atheih in akiang ah, “Sukdam na ut hiam?” achi a.
Damlou pa`n, “Pu, tui kitok chiang a dil a hungkoih ding mi kanei kei a, kapai chiangin mi`n ahung makhelh jel hi,” achi a.
Jesu`n akiang ah thou inla, “Na netphah la inla nakeng in paita in,” achi a.
Thakhat in amah ahung damta a, anetphah ala a, kengin apaita hi.
Tualeh tuani khawlni ahi a,
Tuajiakin Judate`n adampa kiangah, “Khawlni ahi a, na netphah na puak asiang kei,” achi ua.
Aman akiang uah, “A hung damsakpa in na netphah la inla, nakeng in paita in ahung chi hi,” achi a adawng a.
Tuachi`n amau`n akiang ah, “Na netphah la inla paita in hungchi kua ahiam?” achi ua, adong ua.
Hinanleh adampa in kua ahiam chih ka theikei a, huasan ah mi tampi a om a, Jesu lah apai mangta a.
Tuakhit in, Jesu`n amah tempul ah amu a akiang ah, “Ngaiin, damsak in na omta hi, khialkik nawn ken, atuachih keileh sil hoihloujaw natung ah a hungtung kha ding,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n huapa apaita a, a damsakpa Jesu ahi chih Judate ava hilhta hi.
Tuajiakin Judate`n Jesu a gawtbawl ua, thah asawmta uhi, hih silte khawlni a abawl jiakin.
Hinanleh Jesu`n amauh adawng a, “Ka Pa in tutan in nna asemjing a, tualeh ken zong nna kasem jing,” achi hi.
Tuajiakin Judate`n amah thah asawm semsem ua, aman khawlni asuksiat guak hilou a, Pasian ka pa ahi achih a, Pasian tawh kibang a akibawl man in.
Tuachi`n Jesu`n adawng a akiang uah, “Adiktak in kung hilh ahi: Tapa in amah thu in bangmah a bawlthei kei, Pa in abawl amuhte loungal, ajiak Aman abawl jousiah, huate Tapa in zong a bawljel hi.
Ajiak Pa in Tapa a it a, a silbawl jousiah akiang ah a musakjel hi, tualeh lamdang nasak ding uh hihte sang a thupijaw a musak ding hi.
Pa in misite akaihthawh a, ahinsak mahbang in, Tapa in zong a ut jousiah a hingsak jel hi.
Pa in kuamah vai ahawmsak ngai kei a, hinanleh vaihawmna jousiah Tapa kiangah apiata hi.
Mi tengteng in Pa azah bang ua, Tapa zong azah ding uh ahi. Kuapeuh Tapa zahlou in Pa asawlpa zong azah kei uhi.
“Adiktak in kung hilh ahi: kuahileh ka thu ja a ahung sawlpa gingta in tangtawn hinna aneita; siamlouh tansakin a omnawn kei ding a, hinanleh sihna a pat hinna ah alutjawta hi.
Adiktak in adiktak in kung hilh ahi: misite`n Pasian Tapa aw ajakna ding uh hun hungtung ding ahita, tu leh tu in zong a hungtung hi, tualeh aja jousiah ahing ding uhi.
Ajiak Pa in amah a hinna akineih mahbang in Tapa in zong amah a hinna akineih na dingin apiata hi.
Tualeh Mihing Tapa ahihman in kiangah vaihawmna apiata hi.
Hih lamdang sakei un, ajiak ahun tung ding ahita, huahun chiangin hankhuk a om jousiahin a aw aja ding ua.
Tualeh ahung pawtdok ding ua, silhoih bawlte tangtawn hinna tang dingin a thoukhia ding ua; tualeh silgilou bawlte siamlouh tang dingin a thoukik ding uhi.
“Ken kathu in bangmah ka bawlthei kei a; ka ja`k bangin vai ka hawmjel hi, tualeh ka vaihawm adik hi, ajiak keima deihdan zonglou in, Pa ahung sawlpa deihdan ka zongjaw hi.
“Keimah tanchin ki theihpih hitaleng, ka thu theihpih adik ahikei ding.
Ka tanchin theihpih khat a om, tualeh aman ka tanchin atheihpih pen adik ahi, chih ka thei hi.
Nou Johan kiangah mi nasawl uh, aman thutak tanchin atheihpih hi.
Tua theihsak kasa`n pen mihing a kipan ahi kei a; hinanleh hundam a na omtheihna ding un hih silte ka gen ahi.
Johan amah ahihleh meivak kuangtak leh va`ktak ahi a, tualeh nou avak ah tomkhat nopsak tadih na ut uhi.
Hinanleh Johan a sang a theihpihna lianjaw ka nei hi: ka Pa`n ka sepjawh ding a ahungpiak ka nasepte amah in, Pa in ahungsawl chih ka tanchin ahung theihpih hi.
Tualeh Pa, ahung sawlpa, mah in zong ka tanchin ahung theihpih hi. Nou bangchiklai in zong a aw na jangai kei ua, amel zong na mungaikei uhi,
hinanleh athu nasung uah aom kei a, amah ahung sawlpa na gintatlouh jiak un.
Laisiangthou na hoihsim ngel ua, ajiak asung ah tangtawn hinna neiin na kingaihsun ua. Huate ahihleh ka tanchin theihsakna ahi!
Hinanleh hinna naneih na ding un ka kiangah nung painuam kei uhi.
“Mihingte pahtawina ka zongkei hi.
Hinanleh Pasian hehpihna na kiang uah a om kei chih kung thei hi.
Ka Pa min in kungpai a, hinanleh nou nung ki pahpih kei uhi; adang khat, amah min in hungpai lehlah, na kipahpih ding uhi.
Nou khat leh khat kipahtawi tuahna ngaina a, Pasian guak; a kipan a hungpawt pahtawina zongloute`n, bangchi`n, na gingtathei ding ua?
Pa kiang a nou hunghek dingin hung ngaihtuah kei un. Nou hunghektu khat aom, amah nataksan uh Mosi ahi.
Bang jiakin ahia achihleh Mosi ana gingta hile uchin kei zong nung gingta ding uhi, ajiak aman ka tanchin ahi ana gelh.
Hinanleh amah thugelh nagintat kei uleh bangchi`n kei thute na gingta ding ua?” achi hi.
Hih silte khit in Jesu Galili dil, (Tiberia dil zong kichi) gal lam ah apaita a.
Tualeh natna neite tung a sillamdang abawlte amuh man un mipi tampi`n amah ajui ua.
Jesu mual ah apaitou a, huasan ah a nungjuite tawh atou a.
Tualeh paikan kut ankuang luina ahung naita hi.
Tuachi`n Jesu adak a, mi tampi akiang lam juan a hungpai amuh in Philip kiangah, “Hihte nek ding tanghou khoiah ahia ilei ding uh?” achi a.
Hinanleh aman Philip ze-etna ding a agen ahi a, ataktak in bang ahia abawl ding chih aman atheikhin hi.
Philip in akiang ah, “Michih in themkhat chiat a atan ding uh zong makhai zanih man tanghou in achin kei ding,” achi hi.
A nungjuite lak a khat Simon Peter sanggampa Andru in akiang ah,
“Hihsan ah barli buh tanghou phelnga leh nga gaw nih nei naupang khat aom hi. Hinanleh mi hizahpi lak ah bantham ahi dia,” achi hi.
Jesu`n, “Mipite tousak un,” achi a. (Tualeh huasan ah loupa tampi aom a.) Tuachi`n mipite atou ua, atam lam uh sangnga bang ahi.
Tualeh Jesu`n tanghoute ala a, a gualjawl zoh in a nungjuite kiangah ahawm a, a nungjuite`n atoute kiangah, tuamah bangin ngate zong adeihzah un a hawm uhi.
Tualeh akham nung un aman a nungjuite kiangah, “Bangmah manglou dingin anengthem in luak un,” achi hi.
Tuajiakin aluak khawm ua barli buh tanghou phelnga nete nekval lawh sawmlehnih aluak dim uhi.
Tuachi`n Jesu sillamdang bawl amuh un, “Hih mipite`n hihpa leitung a Jawlnei hung paidingpa ahi taktak hi!” achi uhi.
Jesu`n amah kumpipa a bawl ding a mat teitei tum in a hungpai ding uh chih atheih jiakin amahtang in a paituamta hi.
Tualeh nitak lam a hunghih in a nungjuite dil lam ah apaisuk ua,
gunkuang khat ah atuang ua, Kapernaum lam juan in dil tung ah apai ua. Tualeh khua amialta a, Jesu lah akiang uah ahung painai kei a.
Huihpi hattak alan jiakin tuipi akihawt sang hulhul hi.
Tualeh mel thum hiam mel li hiam ajap nung un Jesu dil tung a paia gunkuang lam hungnaih in amu ua, alauta uhi.
Hinanleh aman akiang uah, “Keimah ka hi! Laukei un,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n amau`n kilawptak in gunkuang ah a tuangsakta ua, tualeh a gunkuang uh zong apai nang uh a hungtung paita hi.
Ajingni-in dil galkhat lam a ding mipite`n a nungjuite tuanna loungal gunkuang dang a omkei chihleh, Jesu a nungjuite tawh gunkuang ah a paikei a, a nungjuite amauh guak apai uh chih atheita ua.
Hinanleh Tiberia a kipan in Toupa`n a gualjawl nung a tanghou anekna mun gei ah gunkuang dang ahung tungpai a.
Tuachi`n mipite`n Jesu hileh, a nungjuite hileh a om nawn kei uh chih atheihtak un amauh zong gunkuang neute a tuang in Jesu zong in Kapernaum a hungtung ua.
Tualeh amah dil gal langkhat lam a amuhtak un akiang ah, “Rabbi, bangchik a hihtak natung na hia?” achi ua.
Jesu`n adawng a akiang uah, “Adiktak in kung hilh ahi: sillamdangte na muh jiak ua hung zong na hikei ua, tanghou nanek ua navah jiak un nung zong uh ahijaw hi.
An mangthang ding leltak zong in nna semkei un, tangtawn hinna dong a omjing ding an mihing Tapa in a hungpiak ding zong in semjaw un; ajiak Pa Pasian in amah a chiamtehta hi,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n amau`n akiang ah, “Pasian nna ka septheihna ding un bang ahia ka bawl ding uh?” achi ua,
Jesu`n adawng a akiang uah, “Amah a hungsawlpa na gintat uh, tua ahi Pasian nasep,” achi hi.
Tuajiakin amau`n akiang ah, “Ahihleh ka muh ua kung gintat theihna ding un bang chiamtehna nung ensak thei dia?
Ka pu leh pate un gamdai ah Manna ane uh; ‘Aman van a kipan in nek ding apia,’ ” chia kigelh bangin, achi ua.
Tuachi`n Jesu`n akiang uah, “Adiktak in adiktak in kung hilh ahi, Mosi in hua tanghou van a pan in a hungpia kei a, hinanleh ka Pa in van a kipan in tanghou diktak ahung piajaw hi.
Pasian tanghou van a kipan a hung kumsuk leitung mite kiang a hinna piapa ahi,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n amau`n akiang ah, “Toupa, hua tanghou hungpia gige in,” achi ua.
Jesu`n akiang uah, “Kei hinna tanghou ka hi, kuapeuh ka kiang a hungpai a gilkialngai nawn kei ding; tualeh kuapeuh kei hung gingta tuh a dangtakngai nawn kei ding.
Hinanleh kung hilh ahi, nou nung muh un zong nung gingta kei uhi.
Ka Pa`n a hungpiak jousiah ka kiangah a hungpai ding; tualeh ka kiang a hungpai jousiah bangchileh zong ka nawtdok kei ding hi.
Ajiak kei deihlam bawl ding a van a pan a hung paisuk ka hikei a, ahung sawlpa deihlam bawl ding a hung paisuk ka hijaw hi.
Tualeh Pa ahung sawlpa deihlam hih ahi, aman a hungpiak jousiah khatbek mansaklou a, hinanleh nitawpni chiangin ka kaihthou jawk ding.
Tualeh hih ahung sawlpa deihlam ahi, kuapeuh Tapa mu a gingta in tangtawn hinna aneih a, tualeh ken nitawpni chiangin ka kaithou ding,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n Judate atung ah aphun ua, “Kei van a pan a tanghou hung kumsuk ka hi,” a kichih jiakin.
Tualeh amau`n, “Hihpa hi Jesu, Joseph tapa, apa leh anu zong itheih uh hilou ahi maw? Van a pan a hung kumsuk ka hi, bang chidan a achih ahia?” achi ua.
Tuajiakin Jesu`n adawng a, akiang uah, “Phun phun kei un.
Pa ahung sawlpa`n a hungpiak kei leh kuamah ka kiangah ahung paithei kei; tualeh ken amah nitawpni chiangin ka kaithou ding hi.
Jawlneite laibu ah; Pasian hilh in a omsiang ding uh, chih gelh ahi. Tuajiakin Pa thu ja a thei jousiah ka kiangah ahung paijel uhi.
Mi kuamah in Pa amu ngaikei, Pasian a kipan a hungpaipa loungal; aman ahihleh Pa amuta hi.
Adiktak in, adiktak in kung hilh ahi, kuapeuh kei hung gingta in tangtawn hinna aneita.
Keimah hinna tanghou tuh ka hi.
Na pu leh pate un gamdai ah manna ane ua, asi uhi.
Hih ahihleh van a pat a hung kumsuk tanghou, mi`n anek a asih louhna ding uh ahi.

Kei van a pat a tanghou hing hung kumsuk pen ka hi, mi kuapeuhin hih tanghou anek uleh tangtawn in ahing ding uh; tualeh ka tanghou piak ding ahihleh leitung mite hinna ding a ka piak ding ka taksa ahi,” achi hi.
Tuajiakin Judate akisel ua, “Bang chidan a hihpan a taksa nek ding a piathei ding adiam?” achi ua.
Tuachi`n Jesu`n akiang uah, “Adiktak in, adiktak in kung hilh ahi: mihing Tapa taksa na nek ua tualeh a sisan na dawn kei ua ahihleh noumauh in hinna neilou hive uchin.
Kuapeuh ka taksa ne a, tualeh ka sisan dawn in tangtawn hinna aneita; tualeh ken nitawpni chiangin ka kaithou ding hi.
Ajiak ka taksa hi an taktak ahi a, ka sisan zong dawn ding taktak ahi.
Kuapeuh ka taksa ne a ka sisan dawn tuh, kei ah aom jing a, tualeh kei amah ah ka omjing hi.
Pa hing in a hungsawl a, Pa jiak a ka hin mahbang in, kuahileh kei hung ne tuh kei jiakin amah zong ahing ding.
Hihpen van a kipan a tanghou hing hung kumsuk pen ahi. Na pu leh napate un manna anek ua asih bang uh ahikei, kuapeuh hih tanghou ne in tangtawn in ahing ding hi,” achi hi.
Hih thute aman Kapernaum khua a aom laia kikhopna inn a agen ahi.
Tuajiakin a nungjuite tampi in hihthu ajak un, “Hihpen thu haksa ahi, kuan ahia ngaithei ding?” achi ua.
Tualeh Jesu`n hih thu ah a nungjuite aphun uh chih alungsim a atheih in akiang uah, “Hih thu in nou ahung lunghimoh sak maw?
Mihing Tapa tu-ma a aom na ngai a kahtou mule uchin bang nalawh ding ua?
Hinna piajaw kha ahi a, taksajaw bangmah a phatuam kei, na kiang ua ka thugente kha ahi a, tualeh hinna zong ahi.
Hinanleh nalak uah gingta lou khenkhat na om uh,” achi a, (ajiak Jesu`n atung a pat a agingta loute leh amah mansak dingpa atheihsa ahi.)
Tualeh aman, “Tuajiakin ahi, ka Pa`n ahung piak kei leh kuamah ka kiangah ahung paithei kei, chia na kiang ua ka gen ding,” achi hi.
Hua hun a kipan a nungjuite tampi anung paita ua, amah ajui nawn kei uhi.
Tuachi`n Jesu`n sawmlehnihte kiangah, “Nou zong na paimang mai ding uh maw?” achi a.
Simon Peter in adawng a akiang ah, “Toupa, kua kiangah ahia ka pai ding uh? Nang tangtawn hinna thute nanei hi.
Tualeh nang nahihleh hua Pasian hing Tapa Krist tuh na hi chih ka gingta ua, thei zong kathei uhi,” achi hi.
Jesu`n amauh adawng a, “Nou sawmlehnihte kungtel hilou nahi uh maw? Tualeh nalak ua khat dawimangpa ahi!” achi hi.
Aman Simon tapa Juda Iskariot thu gen ahi; amah zong sawmlehnihte lak a pang, amah mansak dingpa ahihman in.
Hih silte khit in Jesu Galili gam ah avak a, Judate`n thah asawm jiak un Judea gam a phanuam takei hi.
Tualeh Judate bawkta kut ahung naita a,
tuajiakin a sanggamte`n akiang ah, “Hihsan a pat Judea gam ah paimang in, na nungjuite`n na nasep amuhtheih na ding un.
A minthan na ding zong ngal in kuaman sil asimtham in
Ajiak a sanggamte mahmah in zong agingta kei uhi.
Tuachi`n Jesu`n akiang uah, “Ka hun atung naikei hi. Hinanleh nou hun ahihleh bangchiklai peuhin atung gige hi.
Leitungmite`n nou ahung huakei a, hinanleh kei ahung hua uhi, a lampite uh ahoihkei chih ka theihsak jiakin.
Nou ankuang luina ah na paitou un, kei pen ankuang luina ah kung paitou naikei ding hi. Ajiak ka hun atung bukim naikei hi,” achi hi.
Hih thute agenkhit in amah Galili gam ah a omden lai hi.
Hinanleh a sanggamte ankuang luina a apaitouh nung un, amah zong vantang theihlouh in, aguk a pai bangin ahawhtou hi.
Tuachi`n Judate`n ankuang luina ah amah azong ua, “Khoi a om ahia?” achi ua.
Tuachi`n amah tungtang ah mipite lak ah phunna nasatak a omta a. “Ajiak khenkhat in mihoih ahi,” achi ua, khenkhat in, “Hilou, mikhem ahijaw,” achi ua.
Hinanleh Judate alau jiak un kuaman a tungthu ahahgen ngam kei uhi.
Tualeh ankuanglui kimlaitak in Jesu Pasian tempul ah apaitou a, thu ahilh a.
Tualeh Judate`n lamdang asa ua, “Hihpa`n zilngailou pi a bang chidan a laithei ahia?” achi ua.
Tuachi`n Jesu`n amauh adawng a, “Ka thuhilh hi keimah a hung kipan ahikei a, ahung sawlpa a hung kipan ahijaw hi.
Kuahileh ama deihlam bawlnuam in thuhilhna pen Pasian a kipan ahia, ahihkeileh keima phuahtawm a ka gen, chih athei ding uhi.
Kuahileh amah phuahtawm thu gen tuh amah kipahtawina ding zong ahi; hinanleh kuahileh asawlpa pahtawina ding zong tuh amah pen midik ahi a, amah ah diktatlouhna mawng mawng aom kei hi.
Mosi-in nou dan hungpia hilou amaw? Hinanleh nalak uah kuaman dan najui kei uh, bangding a thah hung sawm na hi ua?” achi a.
Mipite`n adawng ua “Dawi pai nahi ve! Kuan ahia nang thah hung sawm?” achi ua.
Jesu`n adawng a, akiang uah, “Nna lamdang khat kasem a, na un un lamdang nasa uhi.
Tualeh Mosi-in teptan thu nou a hungpia a, (Mosi a kipan ahi kei a, pulehpate a kipan ahijaw hi), khawlni in zong mi tep natan uhi.
Mosi dan bawhsiat louhna ding a mi`n khawlni a tep atan uleh, ken khawlni a mi khat ka damsiangsak jiakin katung ah naheh tuam umaw?
A kilang bangin thu khen kei unla, diktat takin thu khenjaw un,” achi hi.
Tualeh Jerusalem a pat mi khenkhat in, “Hihpa thah asawmpa uh hilou amaw le?
Hinanleh ensin ua! Hangsan takin thu agen a, amau`n lah akiang ah bangmah agen kei uh! Amah hi Krist ahi chih vaihawmtute`n athei taktak na uh adiam?
Hinanleh enlah hihpa khoi a hung kipan chih ithei ngal ua, hinanleh Krist a hungpai chiangin kuaman athei kei ding hi,” achi ua.

Tuachi`n Jesu Pasian tempul ah thu hilh in akikou a, “Nou kei nung thei ua, tualeh khoi a hung kipan chih zong nungthei uh, keimah thu a hungpai ka hikei a. Hinanleh ahung sawlpa adik ahi, nou amah na theikei uh,
hinanleh ken amah ka thei hi, ajiak amah a kipan ka hi a, tualeh ama hung sawl ka hi,” achi hi.
Tuajiakin amah mat asawm ua, hinanleh ahun atun nailouh jiakin kuaman atung ah khut akha kei uhi.
Tualeh mipi tamtakin amah agingta ua, “Krist a hungpai chiangin, hihpa bawl sang a sillamdang abawl diam?” achi ua.
Pharisaite`n atung thu ah mipite huachi bang a aphun uh aja ua, tualeh Pharisaite leh siampite`n amah man dingin lamkaite asawl ua.
Jesu`n akiang uah, “Tomnou khat ka om ding a, tuazoh chiangin ahung sawlpa kiang ah ka pai ding hi.
Nou nung zong ding ua, nung mukei ding uh; tualeh ka omna ah nung paithei kei ding uh,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n Judate akihou ua, “I muhlouh ding ua khoi a pai ding adiam aw? Jentelte lak a i mi kithehthangte kiang a pai a Jentelte thu vahilh ding adiam?
Nung zong ding ua nung mukei ding uh, tualeh ka omna ah nung paithei kei ding uh, achih bang achihna adiam?” achi ua.
Tualeh ankuanglui nithupi ni nunung pen ah Jesu ading a, akikou a, “Kuapeuh adang atak leh ka kiangah hungpai henla, dawn hen,
kuapeuh kei hung gingta in Pasian Laisiangthou in agen mah bangin ‘Asung a kipan in tuihing luite a luangkhia ding,’ ” achi hi.
Hinanleh hihpen aman amah gingtate`n amuh ding uh Khasiangthou agenna ahi a; hua hun ah Jesu pahtawi a aom nailouh jiakin Khasiangthou piak ahi naikei hi.
Tuajiakin mipi tamtakte`n hihthu ajak tak un, “Hihpa Jawlnei taktak ahi!” achi ua.
Khenkhatte`n “Krist ahi!” achi ua, hinanleh khenkhatte`n “Krist Galili gam ah ahung piang ngap ding amah!
Pasian Laisiangthou in, Krist ahihleh David suante lak a leh David tenna khua Bethlehem ah a hungpiang khia ding, chilou amaw?” achi ua.
Tuachi`n amah jiakin mipite lak ah kikhenna a omta hi.
Tualeh alak ua khenkhat in amah mat asawm ua, hinanleh kuaman atung ah khut akha kei uhi.
Tuachi`n lamkaite, siampite leh Pharisaite kiangah ahung pai ua, amau`n akiang uah, “Bangding a amah hung paipih lou anachi ua?”
“Lamkaite`n hihpa thugen bangin kuaman agenngai mawng mawng kei hi!” achi ua, adawng ua.
Tuachi`n Pharisaite`n “Nou zong khem a om na hita uh maw?”
“Vaihawmtute ahihkeh Pharisaite lak ah amah gingta aom khatai leh?
Hinanleh dan theilou hih mite ahihleh hamsia thuak ahi uh!” achi ua, adawng ua.
Nikodem, jan a Jesu kiang a hungpaipa alak uah aom a, akiang uah,
“I danthu un mi amah kam a thu jak leh a silbawlte atheihma in siamlouh a tangsak ngai maw,” achi a.
Amau`n adawng a akiang ah, “Nang zong Galili mi na maw? Zong inla en in Galili gam ah Jawlnei mawng mawng apiang ngai kei hi,” achi ua.
Tuachi`n mi jousiah a innlam chiat uah apaita uhi.
Jesu Olive mual ah apaitou a.
Tualeh jingsang matak in tempul ah a hungpai kik a, mipi jousiah akiang ah a hungpai ua, tualeh amauh atousak a, thu ahilh hi.
Tuachi`n laigelhmite leh Pharisaite`n numei khat a angkawmlai a amat uh, akiang ah ahung paipih ua, alai ua adinsak zoh un.
A kiangah, “Siapa, hih numeinu a angkawm laitak a kiman ahi a,
Dan laibu ah Mosi-in hichibang mi suang a denlik ding thu a hungpia hi; hinanleh nang bang chiding nachi a?” achi ua.
Hihpen amah mohmatna ding a muhtheihna ding ua a ze-etna a agen uh ahi a. Hinanleh Jesu akun a, amauh gen jalou hileh kilawm in, akhutmuk in leilak agelh a.
Tuachi`n adok lailai jiak un a dingkhia a, akiang uah, “Na lak ua khialhna nei kingkeng lou penpen in amahnu deng masa hen,” achi a.
Tualeh akun kik a, leilak agelh jel a.
Tuachi`n amau`n hih thu ajak un asia leh pha theihna un siamlouh tangsak in, a upapen a pat in atawptan in khat khat in a paimangta ua; Jesu guak aom a, alai a ding numeinu tawh.
Tualeh Jesu a dingkhia a, numeinu chihlouh kuamah amuhlouh takin akiang ah, “Numei nang hung hekte khoi a om ahita ua? Kuaman siamlouh hung tangsak lou umaw?” achi a.
Amahnu`n, “Kuaman hung tangsak lou, Toupa,” achi a.
Jesu`n akiang ah, “Ken zong siamlouh kung tangsak kei hi. Pai inla, khialkik nawn ken,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n Jesu`n akiang uah, “Kei leitung va`k ka hi, kuapeuh kei hungjui tuh mial ah akhuasa kei ding a, hinanleh hinna va`k aneijaw ding hi,” achi hi.
Tuajiakin Pharisaite`n akiang ah, “Nangmah leh nangmah thu na kitheihpih hi, na thu theihpih adik kei,” achi ua.

Jesu`n adawng a akiang uah, “Keimah leh keimah thu kitheihpih hinanleng zong ka thu theihpih adik hi; ajiak khoi a kipan a hungpai ka hih leh, khoi a pai ding ka hia chih ka thei hi; hinanleh nou khoi a kipan a hung pai ka hih leh khoi a pai ding ka hia chih nathei kei uhi.
Nou taksa dan in vai nahawm uh; ken kuamah vai ka hawmsak kei.
Tualeh vai hawmsak hitaleng zong ka vaihawm adik hi, ajiak kei guak ka hikei a, kei leh ka Pa, ahung sawlpa ka hijaw uhi.
Na dan laibu uah zong minih thu theihpih pen adik ahi, chih gelh ahi.
Keipen keima thu theihpih khat ka hi a, tualeh Pa ahung sawlpa`n ka thu ahung theihpih hi,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n mau`n akiang ah, “Na pa khoi ah aom ei?” achi ua.
Jesu`n adawng a, “Nou kei nung theikei ua, kapa zong nathei kei uh, kei hungthei hile uchin kapa zong nathei ding uh,” achi hi.
Hih thute Jesu`n tempul a thu ahilhlai in dangka koihna mun a agen ahi a; tualeh ahun atun nailouh jiakin kuaman atung ah khut akha kei uhi.
Tuachi`n Jesu`n akiang uah, “Ka paimang ding a, nou nungzong ding uh. Ka paina ah nung paithei kei ding uh,” achi a.
Tualeh Judate`n, “Aman, kapaina ah nung paithei kei ding uh, achih jiakin amah leh amah kithat ding amaw le” achi ua.
Tualeh aman akiang uah, “Nou pen nuailam a kipan na hi ua, kei kahihleh tunglam a kipan ka hi, nou leitung a nahi ua, kei leitung a ka hikei hi.
Tuajiakin na kiang uah, na khialhna uah na si ding uh; ajiak ‘Kei Amah ka hi’,” chih nagintat kei uleh na khialhna uah na si ding uhi, kungchi ahi.
Tuachi`n amau`n akiang ah, “Nang kua na hia?” achi ua.
Jesu`n akiang uah, “A tu`ng a kipat a na kiang ua ka gen huamah ka hi.
Na tung thu uah gen ding leh vaihawmsak ding tampi kanei hi; hinanleh ahung sawlpa adik hi; tualeh amah a pat a ka jakte pen leitung mite kiangah ka genjel hi,” achi hi.
Aman Pa thu akiang uah agen ahi chih amau`n athei kei uhi.

Tuachi`n Jesu`n akiang uah, “Mihing Tapa na khaikang zoh chiang un ‘Amah Ka hi’; chih leh keimah thu in bangmah ka bawlkei a, hinanleh ka Pa`n a hunghilh bangin hihthute ka genjaw ahi chih nathei ding uhi.
Amah ahung sawlpa ka kiangah aom hi; Pa in kei guakin ahung nusia kei; ajiak ama deihlam silte ka bawljing hi,” achi hi.
Hih thute aja mi tampite`n amah agingta uhi.
Tuachi`n Jesu`n amah gingta Judate kiangah, “Ka thu a na omjing uleh ka nungjuite nahi taktak ding uhi;
tualeh thutak nathei ding ua, thutak in nou ahung suaktasak ding hi,” achi a.
Amau`n, “Abraham suante ka hi ua,” bangmah chik in kuamah sal-ah ka tangngai kei uh; “ ‘bang chidan a na suakta ding uh nachih ahia’?” chi`n adawng ua.
Jesu`n amauh adawng a, “Adiktak in adiktak in kung hilh ahi: kuahileh khialhna bawl tuh khialhna suak ahi.
Suak ahihleh tangtawn in inn ah aom ngaikei a, hinanleh Tapa ahihleh tangtawn in a omjing hi.
Tuajiakin Tapa in ahung suahtak sak leh na suakta taktak ding uhi.
Abraham suante nahi uh chih kungthei hi, hinanleh nou kei thah nung sawm uh, ka thu nou a aomlouh jiakin.
Ken kapa kiang a ka muhte ka gen a, nou napa kiang ua namuhte na bawl uhi,” achi hi.
Amau`n adawng ua, akiang ah, “Abraham kapa uh ahi,” achi ua.
Jesu`n akiang uah, “Abraham tate hile uchin, Abraham nasepte nasem ding uhi.
Hinanleh tuin kei, Pasian kiang a pat a kajak thutak na kiang ua hunghilhpa thah nung sawm uh; Abraham in hichi bangin a bawlngai kei hi!
Nou napa uh silbawlte nabawl uhi,” achi a.
Tuachi`n amau`n akiang ah, “Ang kikawm a piang ka hikei uh, pa khat guak kanei uh, Pasian,” achi ua.
Jesu`n akiang uah, “Pasian napa uh hileh pen keimah nung it ding uhi; ajiak Pasian a kipan a hungpawt ka hi a, keimah thu in kung paikei a, aman a hungsawl ahijaw hi.
Bang chidan a ka ham omdan theisiam lou nahi ua? Ka thu na ngaihlouh jiak uh ahi.

Tualeh noupen napa uh dawi a hung kipan nahi ua, tualeh napa uh deihlam nabawl ut uhi. Amah ahihleh atung a kipan-a tualthat ahi a, tualeh thutak ah aom kei, amah ah thutak a omlouh jiakin. Juauthu agen in amah a kipan in ahi agen, ajiak amah mijuau ahi a, tualeh juaupa zong ahi.
Thutak ka gen jiakin nou nung gingta kei uhi.
Na lak uah kua nahi ua siamlouh hung tangsak? Thutak ka gen leh bangding a hung gingtalou nahi ua?
Mi Pasian a hung kipan in Pasian thu a ngaikhia; tuajiakin na ngaikhia kei uhi; Pasian a hung kipan na hihlouh jiak un.”
Tuachi`n Judate`n adawng ua, akiang ah, “Samariami nahi a, tualeh dawipai nahi kungchih uh ka chidik mahmah uh hilou maw?” achi ua.
Jesu`n adawng a, “Dawipai ka hikei a, Ka Pa ka pahtawi ahijaw hi, nou kei nung pahtawi kei uhi.
Keimah guak thupi na ding zong ka hikei a; azong leh vaihawmtu khat aom hi.
Adiktak in, adiktak in kung hilh ahi: mi kuapeuh in ka thu azop leh sihna amu ngai mawng mawng kei ding,” achi a.

Tuachi`n Judate`n akiang ah, “Tuin dawipai nahi chih kung theita uhi! Abraham asita a, tualeh Jawlneite zong asita uhi; hinanleh nang mi kuapeuhin ka thu azop leh sihna amu ngai mawng mawng kei ding, nachi hi.
Ka pu uh Abraham sang a thupijaw nahi maw? Tualeh Jawlneite zong asita uh; nang leh nang kua a kibawl nahia?” achi ua.
Jesu`n, “Kei leh kei ka kipahtawi leh ka kipahtawina bangmah ahikei ding. Ahung pahtawitu ahihleh ka Pa, nou ka Pasian uh ahi nachih pen uh ahi.
Hinanleh nou amah na theikei uh; hinanleh ken amah ka thei hi; amah ka thei kei chileng nou bang a mi juau ka hi ding hi. Hinanleh amah ka thei a, tualeh athu zong kazop hi.
Na pa uh Abraham in ka ni muh ding a ut mahmah a, tualeh a mungei a, akipak mahmah hi,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n Judate`n akiang ah, “Nang kum sawmnga zong ching nailou chin a, Abraham na mukha a maw?” achi ua.
Jesu`n akiang uah, “Adiktak in, adiktak in kung hilh ahi, Abraham omma in, ‘Ka om hi,’ ” achi a.
Tuachi`n mau`n adenna ding suang ala ua, hinanleh Jesu akibu a, tempul a pat apawt a, alak uah paisuak in apaita hi.
Tualeh Jesu a paikawm in apian a pat mittaw khat amu a.
A nungjuite`n akiang ah, “Rabbi, hihpa mittaw a apian kuan ahia sil a bawlkhialh? Hihpa`n maw, ahihkeileh anu leh apa`n?” chi`n adong ua.
Jesu`n adawng a, “Hihpa`n zong a bawlkhial kei, anu leh apa`n zong a bawlkhial kei uh, hinanleh Pasian nasepte atung a a kilattheihna dingin ahijaw hi.
Sun ahihlai in a hungsawlpa nna kasep ngeingei ding ahi; jan hungtung ding ahita, hua hun chiangin kuaman nna asemthei nawn kei ding uhi.
Kei leitung a ka om sungteng leitung va`k ka hi,” achi a.
Tuachia agenzoh in lei ah chil asia a, tua chil in tungman abawl a, tua tungman mittawpa mit ah anuh a
tualeh akiang ah, “Pai inla Siloam dil ah vasil in,” achi a. (Siloam ahihleh “Sawl” chihna ahi.) Tuachi`n amah apai a, asil a, muthei in ahung paikikta hi.
Tuajiakin a innvengte leh ama a amittawt lai a amusate`n, “Hihpa khut doh a toujelpa hilou amaw le?” achi ua.
Khenkhatte`n, “Amah ahi,” achi ua, “khenkhatte`n a kibakpih ahi,” achi uhi.
Hinanleh aman, “Keimah ka hi,” achi hi.
Tuajiakin amau`n akiang ah, “Bangchi`n ahia namit ahungvak?” achi ua.

Aman adawng a, “Jesu kichi mi khat in tungman abawl a, ka mit ahung nuhsak a, tualeh ka kiangah, Siloam dil ah pai inla, vasil in, a hungchi a. Tuachi`n kapai a, kasil a, tuachi`n ka mutheita hi,” achi a.
Tuatakin amau`n akiang ah, “Amah khoitak ah aom ta?” achi ua.
Aman, “Ka theihkei,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n amau`n mittawsa a piangpa pen Pharisaite kiangah ahung paipih ua.
Jesu`n tungman bawl a amit avaksakni pen khawlni ahi hi.
Tuachi`n Pharisaite`n zong amit ahung vakdan akiang ah adong kik ua. Aman akiang uah, “Ka mit ah tungman akoih a; ka vasil a, tuachi`n ka muta hi,” achi hi.
Tuajiakin Pharisaite khenkhat in, “Hihpa Pasian a hungkipan ahi kei, ajiak khawlni atangkei,” achi ua.
Adangte`n, “Bang chi`n mikhial in hichibang sillamdang a bawlthei dia?” achi ua. Tuachi`n alak uah kikhenna ahung omta hi.
Amau`n mittawpa kiangah, “Na mit ahung sukvak sakpa, amah tungtang nang bang nachi ngaihtuah ei?” achi ua, aman Jawlnei ahi achi hi.
Hinanleh Judate`n amit hungvakpa nu leh pa asap masiah uh mittaw ana hi a, ahung vakta ahi chih a tungtang thu agingta kei uhi.
Tualeh amau`n anu leh pa kiangah, “Hihpa na tapa uh mittaw a piang achihpa uh ahi maw; bangchi`n ahia tua ahung muhtheih?” achi ua.
Anu leh apa`n amauh adawng ua, “Hih ka tapa uh ahi a, tualeh mittaw in apiang chih ka thei uhi.

Hinanleh bangchi`n ahia tua ahung muhtheihtak chih ka theikei uh, tualeh kua`n amit abawl vaksak ahia chihzong ka theikei uhi. Mi piching ahina; amah dong un, ama thu aman akigen na ding;” chi`n adawng ua.
Hihthu anu leh apa`n Judate alaujiak ua agen uh ahi, ajiak Judate`n masang a pat in amah Krist ahi chia phuang aom leh kikhopna inn a pat nohkhiat ding chi`n lem ana sakhinta uhi.
Tuajiakin ahi anu leh pa`n, “Mi piching ahina, amah dong un achih uh!”
Tuachi`n Judate`n mittawpa a samkik ua akiang ah, “Pasian pahtawi in! Hihpa pen mikhial ahi chih ka thei uh,” achi ua.
Aman adawng a, “Mikhial ahihleh hihlouh ka theikei, silkhat ka thei hi: Mittaw ka hi a, tuin ka mutheita hi,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n amau`n akiang ah, “Aman natung ah bang ahia abawl? Na mit bang ahung chibawl vaksak ahia?” chi`n adong kik ua.
Aman, “Kunghilhta a, hinanleh na januam kei uh. Bang ding a januam kik nahi ua? Nou zong a nungjui hih ut nahi uh maw?” chi`n adawng hi.
Tuachi`n amah atai ua, “Nang amah nungjui nahi a; kou Mosi nungjui ka hi uh, achi uhi.
Pasian in Mosi kiangah thu agen chih ka thei uh; hihpa ahihleh khoi a kipan a hungpai ahia chih ka theikei uh!” achi ua.
Amahpa`n adawng a akiang uah, “Ahuachih natak mah ahi a lamdanna! Khoi a kipan a hungpai ahih na theihlouh uh! Amanlah ka mit a hungbawl vaksak ngal a.
Pasian in mikhialte thu a ngaikhia ngaikei chih ithei uhi; hinanleh mi kuahileh Pasian ngaihsak a, adeihlam bawlte Pasian in a ngaikhiajel hi.
Leitung pianchil a kipan kuaman mittaw apiang mit abawl vaksak chih ka ja ngai kei.
Hihpa Pasian a kipan ahihkeileh bangmah a bawlthei kei ding,” achi hi.
Amau`n adawng ua akiang ah, “Nang mikhialsa a piang in kou nung hilhvial maw?” achi ua. Tuachi`n amah kikhopna inn a pat a notdokta uhi.
Jesu`n amah anotdok uh chih ajak in, tualeh amah amuh in akiang ah, “Pasian Tapa na gingta hiam?” achi a.
Aman adawng a, akiang ah, “Toupa, amah kua ahia, hunghilh in ka gintat theihna dingin!” achi a.
Jesu`n akiang ah, “Amah na muta a, tualeh nang hung houpihpa ahi,” achi a.
Tuachi`n aman, “Toupa, ka gingta hi,” achi a, tuachi`n amah abiata hi.
Tualeh Jesu`n, “Mutheiloute`n ahung muhtheihna dingin leh mit vakte mit ahung tawtna dingin leitung ah hungpai ka hi,” achi hi.
Akiang a om Pharisai khenkhatte`n hihthute ajak un, akiang ah, “Kou zong mittaw ka hi uh hiam?” achi ua.
Jesu`n akiang uah, “Mittaw hile uchin khialhna neilou ding hi uchin a; hinanleh tuin ka muthei uh, nachi ua; tuajiakin na khialhna uh a omjing hi,” achi hi.
“Adiktak in kung hilh ahi: kuahileh kong a lutlou a, lamtuam a kah a belam huang a lut pen guta leh suamhat ahi.
Hinanleh kuapeuh kong a lut pen belampu ahi.
Amah kong ngakpa`n ana honsak a; belamte`n a aw aja uh, tualeh a belamte amin un asam a, a pawtkhiatpih jel hi.
Tualeh belamte apawtkhiat sak chiangin amai uah apai a, belamte`n anung ajui uh, a aw atheih jiak un.
Midang ahihleh ajuikei ding ua; a taimangsan jaw ding uh; midangte aw atheihlouh jiak un,” achi hi.
Hih gentehna thu Jesu`n akiang uah agen a; hinanleh amau`n akiang ua bangthu ahia agen chih atheikei uhi.
Tuachi`n Jesu`n akiang uah, “Adiktak in kung hilh ahi: Kei belam kongkhak ka hi.
Ka maia hungpai jousiah gutate leh suamhatte ahi uh; hinanleh belamte`n athu uh angai kei uh.
Kei kongkhak ka hi; kuapeuh keimah a alut leh hundam in a om ding, tualeh lut in apawt ding a, nek ding amu ding hi.
Guta ahihleh gu ding leh that ding leh bawlsia ding loungal in a hungpai kei; kei ka hih leh amau`n hinna aneihna ding uleh tampitak a aneihna ding ua hungpai ka hi.
“Kei belampu hoih ka hi; belampu hoih in a belamte dingin ahinna apia hi.
Hinanleh kilawh, belampu taklou, belamte amah a hilouin ngia hungpai amuh in belamte a nusia a, ataisan jel; tualeh ngia in amauh aman a, athehjak hi.
Kilawh ahi a, belamte a ding a deihsakna mawng mawng aneihlouh jiakin a taimangsan jel hi.
Kei belampu hoih ka hi, ka belamte ka thei a, amau`n zong kei ahung thei uhi.
Pa in kei a hungtheih mahbang in, ken zong Pa ka thei hi; tualeh belamte dingin ka hinna ka pia hi.
Tualeh hih belam huang a hilou belam dang ka nei hi; amauh zong kung paipih ding a ka aw aja ding uh; tualeh honkhat in aom ding ua belampu khat tawh.
“Tuajiakin ka Pa in ahung it hi, lakkik ding a ka hinna ka piak jiakin.
Kei a pat kuaman ahung laksak ahi kei a, hinanleh ka thu in kapia ahijaw hi. Piak theihna leh lakkik theihna thu ka nei hi. Hih thupiak ka Pa a pat kamuta hi,” achi hi.
Hih thute jiakin Judate lak ah kikhennate a omkik ta hi.
Tualeh alak ua mi tampite`n, “Dawipai ahi! Amaw ahi! Bang ding a athu ngaikhia nahi ua?” achi ua.
Adangte`n, “Hih thute dawipaimi thugen ahi kei! Dawi in mittaw mit a vaksakthei ngel ei?” achi ua.
Tualeh Jerusalem a kipum apna ankuang luilai ahi a, phalbilai ahi.
Jesu hih innlim ah Solomon inlim ah avak kawikawi a,
tuachi`n Judate`n a im ua akiang ah, “Bangtan ahia lung awpkai a nung koih ding? Krist nahihleh chiantakin hunghilh in?” achi ua.
Jesu`n amauh adawng a, “Kunghilhta a nagingta kei uh; ka Pa min a ka nasepte`n ahung theihpih uhi;
hinanleh na kiang ua ka genta`k mah bangin ka belam lak a mi na hihlouh jiak un na gingtakei uhi.
Ka belamte`n ka aw aja uh, ken amauh ka thei hi; tualeh amau`n ahung jui uhi.
Tualeh ken akiang uah tangtawn hinna kapia hi, tangtawn in a mangthang kei ding ua, kuaman ka khut a pat ahung tuhkhiathei kei ding uhi.
Ka Pa amauh hung piapa mi jousiah sang in alianjaw hi, kuaman ka Pa khut a pat ahung tuhkhiathei kei ding hi.
Kei leh ka Pa khat ka hi uh,” achi a.
Tuachi`n Judate`n adenna ding suang ala ua.
Jesu`n akiang uah, “Nasep hoih tampi ka Pa a kipan nou kung musak a, hua nate lak ah khoipen jiakin ahia suang a nungden sawm uh?” achi a, a dong a.
Judate`n adawng ua, “Nasep hoih jiakin suang in den kungsawm uh ahikei a; hinanleh Pasian nagensiat jiak leh nang mihing hi chin a Pasian bang a na kibawl manin ahijaw!” achi ua.
Jesu`n akiang uah, “Pasian in, ‘pasiante nahi uh,’ achi, chih gelh hilou maw?
Pasian thu tunnate bawn pasiante chih ahihleh, Pasian Laisiangthou lah suksiat theih hilou a.
Pa in aguat, leitung a asawlpa tung ah, Pasian Tapa ka hi ka chihjiak in Pasian nagensia nungchi uh ahi maw?
Ka Pa nasepte kasep kei leh hung gingta kei un.
Hinanleh kasep a ahihleh kei hung gingta kei nanle uchin zong ka nasepte bek gingta un,” achi hi.
Tuajiakin amah mat asawm kik ua, hinanleh akhutte ua pat apawt a.
Tuachi`n Jesu Johan in baptis abawlna mun Jordan gal ah a paikik a, huasan ah ava omta hi.
Tuachi`n mipi tampi a hungpai ua, “Johan in sillamdang bangmah bawl anei kei a, hinanleh hihpa tungtang Johan in agen adiksiang hi,” achi ua.
Tuachiah huasan ah mi tampi`n amah agingta uhi.
Tualeh mi khat, Mari leh a sanggamnu Martha tenna khua Bethani khua a om, amin Lazar kichi achii ana a.
A sanggampa Lazar chi-na nu pen Toupa sathau namtui nuh a, asam a akeng siaknu Mari ahi.
Tuajiakin a sanggamnute`n Jesu kiangah, “Toupa, ngaiin, na itpa achina hi,” chi`n kamtai mi asawl ua.
Jesu`n hihthu ajaktak in, “Hih natna pen sihna ding hial ahi kei a, hinanleh hihjiak a Pasian thupina ding ahijaw, Pasian Tapa hihjiak a bawlthupi ahihtheihna dingin,” achi hi.
Jesu`n Martha leh a sanggamnu leh Lazar a it a.
Tuajiakin a chi-na chih ajak in, a omna mun mah ah ninih aom nalai hi.
Tuachi`n a nungjuite kiangah, “Judea gam ah i paikik ding uh,” achi a.
A nungjuite`n a kiangah, “Rabbi, tu madeuh in Judate`n suang in ahung den sawm ua, huasan a pai nasawm kik maw?” achi ua.
Jesu`n adawng a, “Sun khat sung a dakkal sawmlehnih a om hilou maw? Mi kuapeuh sun a avak leh a kisuihkha ngai kei, hih leitung vak amuh jiakin achi hi.
Hinanleh mi kuapeuh jan a avak leh a kisuihkha jel hi, amah a vak a omlouh jiakin.”
Hih thute aman agen a, tuazoh in akiang uah, “I lawmpa Lazar a ihmuta, hinanleh a ihmutna a pan thousak dingin ka pai ding,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n a nungjuite`n, “Toupa, a ihmu ahihleh adam kik na ding,” achi ua.
Jesu`n asih thu agen ahi a, hinanleh amau`n ihmu a tawldam thu gen hi in a ngaihtuah uhi.
Tuachi`n Jesu`n chiantakin akiang uah ahilh a, “Lazar asita hi.
Tualeh nou jiak a huasan a ka omlouh ka kipak hi, na gintak theihna ding un, hitaleh zong a kiangah ipai ding uh,” achi a.
Tuachi`n Thoma, (Didum) kichipa`n a nungjui hihpihte kiangah, “Amah tawh isihkhawm theihna dingin ei zong ipai ding uh!” achi hi.
Tuachi`n Jesu a hungtun in amah han ah nili ana omta chih ahung thei a.
Bethani hi Jerusalem khuagei naih, melnih a gamla ahi a,
tualeh Judate tampi Mari leh Martha kiangah, a sanggampa uh sihna tung a amauh hehnem dingin a hungpai ua.
Tualeh Martha in Jesu hungpai chih ajak takin, apai a, amah ana dawn a, hinanleh Mari innsung ah atou nalai hi.
Tualeh Martha in Jesu kiangah, “Toupa hihsan a om hilechin ka sanggampa silou ding hi a!
Hinanleh tu in zong Pasian kiang a nanget taphot Pasian in ahung pia ding chih ka thei hi,” achi hi.
Jesu`n amahnu kiangah, “Na sanggampa athoukik ding hi,” achi hi.
Martha in a kiangah, “Nitawpni chiang a misite thohkikni chiangin a thoukik ding chih ka thei hi,” achi a.
Jesu`n amahnu kiangah, “Kei thohkikna leh hinna ka hi. Kuapeuh kei hung gingta tuh sinanleh zong ahing ding hi;
tualeh hing a hung gingta jousiah bangmah chik in asi ngai nawn kei ding hi, hih nagingta ei?” achi a.
Amahnu`n a kiangah, “Hi, Toupa! Nang Krist, Pasian Tapa, leitung a hungpai dingpa nahi chih ka gingta hi,” achi hi.
Martha in hih agenkhit in apai a, a sanggamnu Mari aguk in ava sam a. “Siapa a hungpai a, ahung sam hi,” achi a.
Amahnu`n tua ajaktak in kintakin athou a, akiang ah a hungpai a.
Jesu khuasung a hungtung naikei a, Martha in ava dawnna mun ah aom nalai hi.
Tuachi`n Judate innsung a amah hehnem a amah tawh omten Mari kintak a thou a pawtkhia amuh un, han a kap dingin apai chi`n anung ajui ua.
Tuachi`n Mari-in Jesu omna mun a hungtun a, amah amuh in, a kengbul ah apuk a, akiang ah, “Toupa, hihsan a om hilechin ka sanggampa silou ding hi a!” achi a.
Tualeh Jesu`n Mari kap leh amah tawh hungpai Judate zong kap a om amuh takin a lungtang akhoih mahmah a, a mangbangta a.
Tualeh aman, “Amah khoia nasial uh ahia?” achi a.
Amau`n akiang ah, “Toupa hungpai inla en in,” achi ua.
Jesu akapta.
Tuachi`n Judate`n, “En un, it na tazen e!” achi ua.
Khenkhat in, “Hihpa mittaw mit hihvak sakpa`n silousak theilou adiai?” achi ua.
Tuachi`n Jesu a lungsim a na sakik kawm in han ah a hungpai a, han pen suanghawm ahi a, suang a net ahi.
Jesu`n, “Asuang lakhia un!” achi a.
Misipa sanggamnu Martha in, akiang ah, “Toupa tu injaw a uihta ding ajiak asihna nili ahita hi!” achi a.
Jesu`n amahnu kiangah, “Na gintat a ahihleh Pasian thupina namu ding, na kiangah chilou ka hi hiam?” achi hi.
Tuachi`n amau`n misi omna pat suang alakhia ua, tualeh Jesu`n vanlam a entou a, “Pa, ka thu na ngaihkhiat jiakin natung ah ka kipak hi.
Tualeh nung ngaikhia gige chih zong kathei hi, hinanleh kakim a ding mipite jiakin hih kachi ahi, Nangman nungsawl chih agintat na ding un,” achi a.
Tuachia agenzoh in aw ngaihtak in, “Lazar hung pawtkhia in!” chi`n aki kou a.
Tuatakin misi pen akhut akeng hanpuan a kituam in ahung pawtdok a; amai kinawtna puan a tuam ahi a. Jesu`n akiang uah, “Phel unla, paisak un,” achi hi.
Tualeh Mari kiang a hungpai leh Jesu sillamdang bawl mu Judate tampi in Jesu agingta ta uhi.
Hinanleh khenkhat Pharisaite kiang ah apai ua, Jesu silbawlte avahilh uhi.
Tuachi`n siampite leh Pharisaite`n vaihawmtute a samkhawm ua, “Bang ilawh ding uai? Hihpa`n sillamdang tampi abawl hi!
Hih bang a amah guak i omsak uleh, mi jousiahin amah agingta ding ua, tualeh Rommite a hungpai ding ua, imun leh ichi leh namte ahung laksak ding uh!” achi ua.
Tualeh alak ua mi khat Kaiapha achih un, hua kum a siampi ahi a, akiang uah, “Bangmah na theikei uh!
Inam pumpi amanlouh na ding a mipi tang a mikhat sih ei a dingin ahoih chih zong na ngaihtuah kei uh?” achi a.
Hihpen aman ama phuahtawm a agen ahikei a, hua kum a siampi ahi a, hua namte tang a Jesu asih ding agen kholhna ahi hi.
Tualeh hua namte guak hilou in, Pasian ta kitheh jakte jousiah pawlkhat a akaihtheihna dingin zong ahi.
Tuachi`n huani a pat in amah thahna ding ngaihtuah in a kihou jingta uhi.
Tuajiakin Jesu Judate lak ah a langtang in avak nawn kei a, hinanleh hua a kipan in gamdai naihlam ah Ephraim kichi khuapi khat ah apai a, huasan ah a nungjuite tawh a omjingta uhi.
Tualeh Judate paikan ankuang luina ahung naita a, mi tampite gam a kipan in a kisiansuah dingin Jerusalem ah paikan ankuang luima in apai tou ua.
Tuachi`n amau`n Jesu azong ua, Pasian tempul ah dingkawm in aki hou ua, “Bangchi`n na ngaihtuah ua? Ankuang luina a hungpailou ding adiam?” achi ua.
Siampite leh Pharisaite`n amah amat theihna ding un, mi kuapeuh in a omna atheihleh agenkhiat ding ahi, chih thu apiata uhi.
Tuachi`n paikan kut ni masang niguk in Jesu`n misi lak a akaihthou Lazar omna Bethani khua a hungtung a.
Huasan ah amah a dingin nitak an abawl ua, Martha in nek abawl a, hinanleh Lazar amah tawh ankuang ompihte lak a khat ahi.
Tuachi`n Mari-in spaiknard sathau namtui man tamtak bawm kimkhat ahung tawi a, Jesu keng anuh a, asam in akengte asiak a, tualeh sathau gim in innsung a dimta hi.
Hinanleh nungjuite lak a khat amah mansak dingpa Juda Iskariot Simon tapa in,
“Bangding a hih sathau namtui makhai zathum a juak a, mi gentheite kiang a piajaw lou uh ahi?” achi a.
Hihpen aman mi gentheite akhuatuah jiak a hihthu gen ahi kei a, guta ahi a, dangka-ip a kem a, tualeh asung a kikoih a lak jel jiakin agen ahijaw hi.
Hinanleh Jesu`n, “Amah guak in nusia un! Ka kivuini chiang a dingin aman hih akoih ahi.
Mi gentheite ahihleh na kiang uah a omjing ua, kei pen na kiang uah ka om gige kei ding,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n Judate`n amah huasan ah aom chih atheita ua; Jesu guak hilou in misi lak a pat akaihthoh Lazar zong amuh nuam jiak un a hungpai ua.
Hinanleh siampite`n Lazar zong athah theihna ding un akihou ua,
ajiak amah jiakin Judate tampi a paimang ua, Jesu agingta uhi.
Ajingni in ankuang luina a hungpai mi tampi in Jesu Jerusalem ah hungpai ding ahi chih ajaktak un.
Tumnahte atawi ua amah dawn dingin apawtkhia ua, tualeh, “Hosanna! Toupa min a hungpai Israel kumpipa a hampha hi!” chi`n aki kou ua.
