Tuachi`n Jesu`n sabiltung nou khat amu a, atung ah atuang a, hichi a gelh bangin:
“Lauken, Zion tanu!
ngaiin, na kumpipa
sabiltung nou tung a tuangin a hungpai hi,”
chih.
Hih silte nungjuite`n atu`ng in a theikei uh, hinanleh pahtawi a aom nungin hih thute amah tungtang a kigelh ahi a, tualeh atung ah hih silte abawl uhi chih ahung theikhiata uhi.
Tuajiakin hihsan a pat Lazar asap khiat leh misi lak a pat akaihthoh lai a akiang a omten athu a theihpih uhi.
Hih jiakin mipite`n zong hih sillamdang abawl chih ajak jiak un amah ana lamtuah uhi.
Tuachi`n Pharisaite a kikou ua, “Bangmah nalawh theikei uh chih nathei uai! En un, leitung mite`n amah ajuita uh!” achi uhi.
Tualeh ankuang luina a hungpaite lak ah Grikmi kuate hiam zong a om uh a.
Amauh (Galili gam a Bethsaida khua a om) Philip kiang ah a hungpai ua, “Pu, Jesu muh ka ut uh chi`n a ngen ua.”
Philip a hungpai a, Andru a hunghilh a, tualeh Andru leh Philip in Jesu ahilh ua.
Hinanleh Jesu`n amauh adawng a, “Mihing Tapa pahtawi a aom na`ng hun a tungta hi.
Adiktak in kung hilh ahi: buh tangkhat leia akiat a, asih kei leh amahtang in a omjing hi; hinanleh asihleh tampi in agah jel hi.
Kuapeuh hinna it in ata`n ding a, tualeh kuapeuh hih leitung a ahinna hua in tangtawn hinna dongin akembit ding hi.
Kuapeuh in kana asep ut leh hung jui hen; ka omna ah ka silapa zong a om ding ahi; mi kuapeuh in kana asep leh ka Pa in a kipahpih ding hi.
“Tu in ka kha a mangbang hi; tualeh bang ahia ka gen ding? ‘Pa, hihhun lak ah hung hundam in ka chiding hiam’? Hinanleh hihding a hungpai lah ka hi ngal a.
Pa, na min pahtawi in!” achi a.
Tuachi`n van a pan in aw khat a hungsuak a, “Ka pahtawita a, tualeh ka pahtawi kik ding hi,” chi in.
Tuajiakin mipi akiang a ding leh hih jate`n, “Van ging ahi!” achi ua.
Hinanleh Jesu`n adawng a akiang uah, “Hih aw pen kei jiak a hungsuak ahi kei a, hinanleh nou a ding a hung suak ahijaw hi.
Tu in hih leitung vaihawm lai ahi a, tu in hih leitung vaihawmtu paihkhiat ahi ding hi.
Tualeh kei pen leia pat a khaikang a ka om leh mi jousiah ka kiangah ka hip ding hi,” achi hi.
Hihpen aman bangchi bang sihna in ahia asih ding chih theihsakna a agen ahi.
Mipite`n adawng ua, “Krist ahihleh tangtawn in a omjing ding chih ka dan uapat kaja uh, bang chidan a nang mihing Tapa khaikang a om ding ahi, nachih ahia? Hih Mihing Tapa kua ahia?” achi ua.

Tuachi`n Jesu`n akiang uah, “Hun tomnou khat vak nalak uah aom ding hi, vak naneih laiun vak ah khuasa un, atuachih keileh mial in ahunglap ding hi. Kuapeuh mial a khuasa in khoilam apai chih atheikei hi.
Vak naneih laiun vak gingta un, vak tate na hung hihtheihna ding un,” achi a. Hih thute Jesu`n agen a, tualeh apawt a, amauh ua pat a kibuta hi.
Hinanleh amai uah sillamdang tampi bawl nanleh amah agingta tuan kei uhi.
Jawlnei Isaiah in:
“Toupa, ka thugen uh kua ahia agingta?
Tualeh Toupa khut zong kua kiangah ahia a kilak?” chia agen ahung tangtun theihna ding in.
Tuajiakin agingta thei kei uh, ajiak Isaiah in:
“Aman amit ua amuh theihlouh na ding un
amit uh asuk tawtsak a,
tualeh a lungtang ua a theihsiam theihlouh na ding un,
a lungtang uh asuk khauhsak hi;
ahung kihei kik ua,
kana sukdam kik louhna dingin,”
achi kik hi.
Hih thute pen Isaiah in a thupina a muhlai a agen ahi a, tualeh a tungtang thu agenna ahi.
Ahihhang in vaihawmtu lamkaite lak ah zong tampi in amah agingta ua, hinanleh Pharisaite jiakin amah aphuang khia ngam kei ua, atuachih keileh kikhopna inn a pat nawhdok in a omkha ding uhi.
Ajiak amau`n Pasian kipahpih a om sang in mihingte phat a om adeih jaw uhi.
Tuachi`n Jesu a kikoukhia a, “Kuahileh kei hung gingta tuh kei hung gingta ahikei a, a hungsawlpa gingta ahijaw hi.
Tualeh kuahileh kei hung mu tuh kei hungsawlpa mu ahi.
Vak ding a leitung a hungpai ka hi a, kuahileh kei hung gingta te miala a omlouh na dingin.
Mi kuapeuhin ka thugente ja in gingta kei nanle uh zong, ken siamlouh ka tangsak kei; ajiak leitung siamlouh tangsak ding a hungpai ka hikei a, leitung hundam ding a hungpai ka hijaw hi.
Kuapeuh kei hung deihlou a, ka thugente zong sanglou in siamlouh tangsak khat anei hi, ka thugente mahmah in nitawp ni chiangin amah siamlouh a tangsak ding hi!
Ajiak keima phuahtawm in ka gen kei a, hinanleh Pa, a hungsawlpa`n ka gen ding leh ka hilh ding thu a hungpia hi.
Tualeh a thupiak ahihleh tangtawn hinna ahi chih ka thei hi; tuajiakin ka gen ding jousiah Pa in ka kianga agen bangin ka genjel hi,” achi hi.
Tualeh paikan kut ankuang luima in, Jesu`n hih leitung a pat paimang a Pa kiang a apai ding hun hungtungta chih athei a, leitung a amite a it ngutngutta a, atawptan in a it hi.
Tualeh nitak annek laiin setan in Simon tapa Juda Iskariot lungtang ah Jesu matsak ding a ngaihtuah sak a.
Jesu`n Pa in sil bangkim a khut ah apiata chih leh, Pasian a kipan a hungpai a, Pasian kiang a paikik ding ahihdan thei in.
Nitak an imlai ading a, apuansilh akoih a; tualeh kinawtna puan ala a, ateng a.
Kisilna kuang a tui asunzoh in a nungjuite keng asilsak a, kinawtna puan aten in anawtjel hi.
Tuachi`n Simon Peter kiangah a hungtung a, Peter in akiang ah, “Toupa nangmaw ka keng nasil ding?” achi a.
Jesu`n adawng a, akiang ah, “Ka silbawl tu in na theikei, hinanleh tunung chiangin nung thei ding hi,” achi hi.
Peter in akiang ah, “Ka keng nasil ngaikei ding!” achi a.
Jesu`n adawng a, “Ka sil kei a ahihleh, ka kiang ah tan bangmah nanei kei ding hi,” achi hi.
Simon Peter in akiang ah, “Toupa ka keng guak hilou in! ka khut leh ka luvum zong hungsil in!” achi a.
Jesu`n akiang ah, “Kuapeuh silsa in a kengguak lousiah sil apoimoh kei, hinanleh apum in asiang hi, na un un hilou in,” achi hi.
Ajiak aman a mansak dingpa athei a; tuajiakin, “Na un un nasiang kim kei uh,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n a keng uh asil zoh a, apuansilh la a atoukik zoh in akiang uah, “Na tung ua ka silbawl bang ahih nathei uh hiam?”
“Nou kei Siapa leh Toupa nungchi ua, nung chidik ngut uh, ajiak ka hi him ahi.
Tuachi a kei na Toupa uleh Siapa-un bawn nakeng uh kasil a ahihleh nou zong khat leh khat nakeng uh na kisilsak ding uh ahi.
Na tung ua ka bawl bang a na bawlna ding un na etton ding uh kung pia ahi.
Adiktak in kung hilh ahi: sila apu sangin alianjaw kei a, a kisawlpa zong asawltu sangin alianjaw kei hi.
Hih silte natheih uleh, bawl le uchin mi hampha na hi ding uhi!
“Na un ua thu ka genkei a; katelte ken kathei hi. ‘Hinanleh tua ka tanghou nekpihpa in ka tungah a khetul a khangtouta,’ chih Pasian Laisiangthou a tangtun theihna ding ahi.
A hungtunma in tuin hih kung hilh ahi, a hungtun chiang a ‘Amah ka hi,’ chih na gintat theihna ding un.
Adiktak in kung hilh ahi: kuahileh kasawl taphot ki pahpih, kei hung kipahpih ahi; tualeh kuahileh kei hung kipahpih in a hungsawlpa a kipahpih ahi,” achi hi.
Jesu`n hichibang a agenzoh in a lungsim a mangbangta a, “Adiktak in kung hilh ahi: nalak ua khat in ahung mansak ding,” chi`n atheisak ta hi.
Nungjuite`n kuapen ahia agen chih theilou in aki entuah ua.
Tualeh a nungjuite lak a khat Jesu`n a itpa Jesu ang ah kingam in a om a.
Tuajiakin Simon Peter in, “Kua thu ahia agen chih dong ding in mit in a houpih a.”
Tuachi`n Jesu awm a kingam in akiang ah, “Toupa, kuapen ahia?” achi a.
Jesu`n adawng a, “Tanghou them kadiah a, kapiak penpen amah ahi,” achi a. Tualeh tanghou them a diahzoh in Simon tapa Juda Iskariot kiang ah apia hi.
Tualeh tanghou them apiak zoh in setan asung ah a lutta a, Jesu`n akiang ah, “Na bawl bawl ding kintak in bawl in!” achi hi.
Hinanleh dohkan kim a toute kuamah in bang chihna a hihthu akiang a agen ahia chih a theikei uhi.

Ajiak alak ua khenkhat in, Juda in dangka-ip akep jiak a Jesu`n akiang a, ankuang luina a i silpoimoh dingte lei in, chi ahia, ahihkeileh migentheite kiang a banghiam khat piak ding ahiam in a ngaihtuah uhi.
Tualeh aman tanghou them ala a, tuachi`n a pawtkhia pai a, tuahun pen janlai ahi.
Tuachi`n apawt nungin Jesu`n, “Tu in jaw mihing Tapa pahtawi in a omta, tualeh Pasian zong amah ah pahtawi in aom hi.
Amah a Pasian pahtawi a aom leh Pasian in zong amah ah amah apahtawi ding a, apahtawi paingal ding hi.
Naute aw, tomnou khat nalak uah ka om tadih hi. Nou nungjong ding ua, Judate kiang a, ‘Ka paina ah nungthei kei ding uh,’ ka chihmah bangin, tuin na kiang uah ka chi ahi.
Thuchiam thak kungpia ahi, nou khat leh khat ki it un, ken nou kung it bangin, nou khat leh khat ki it pelmoh un.
Khat leh khat na ki it uleh mi jousiahin ka nungjuite na hi uh chih tua-ah athei ding uhi,” achi hi.
Simon Peter in akiang ah, “Toupa khoi ah ahia napai ding?” achi a.
Jesu`n amah adawng a, “Ka painang ah tuin nung juithei naikei ding,” achi hi.
Peter in a kiangah, “Toupa bangjiak ahia tu a kung juihtheih louh ding? Nang jiakin ka hinna ka piakhia ding,” achi a.
Jesu`n amah adawng a, “Keimah jiakin na hinna na piakhia ding maw? Adiktak in kung hilh ahi: nang thumvei nung kitheihmoh bawlma in ak akhuang kei ding hi.” achi hi.
“Na lungtang uh mangbang kei hen, Pasian na gingta ua kei zong hung gingta un.
Ka Pa inn ah tenna ding mun tampi a om, omlou hileh kung hilh ta ding hi. Nou ding a mun bawl a pai ding ka hi.
Tualeh kapai a, nou a ding a mun ka vabawlleh, kung paikik ding a, ka kiangah nou kung la ding; ka omna a nou zong na omtheihna ding un.
Khoi a kapai ding nathei ua, ka lampi zong nathei uh,” achi hi.
Thoma in akiang ah, “Toupa, khoi a napai ding ka theikei uh; a lampi bangchi`n kathei ding ua?” achi a.
Jesu`n akiang ah, “Keimah lampi leh, thutak leh, hinna ka hi; keimah a pailou kuamah Pa kiang a tungthei kei hi.
Kei hungthei hile uchin ka Pa zong nathei ding uh, tu a kipan amah nathei ua, mu zong namuta uhi,” achi hi.
Philip in a kiangah, “Toupa, Pa kou hung musak in tuachi`n kou a dingin a hun ding,” achi a.
Jesu`n akiang ah, “Tamveipi na kiang uah ka om a, tuachi`n zong hungthei nailou lai maw, Philip? Kuahileh kei hungmu in Pa mu ahi; ‘Bang chidan a Pa kou hung musak in nachih ahia’?
Kei Pa ah ka om a, tualeh Pa kei ah aom chih gingtalou na hi hiam, Philip? Na kiang a ka thugente, keima thu in ka gen kei a. Hinanleh Pa kei a om in, aman sil a bawljel hi.
Kei Pa ah ka om a, tualeh Pa kei ah aom chih gingta un; ahihkeileh silbawlte jiak be`k in hung gingta un.
Adiktak in kung hilh ahi, kuahileh kei hung gingta in, ka silbawlte aman zong abawl ding a, tualeh hihte sang a thupijaw zong abawl ding, ka Pa kiang a kapai ding jiakin.
Tualeh ka min a nanget jousiah uh, ka bawljel ding, Pa Tapa-a pahtawi a aom theihna ding in.
Ka min a banghiam khat peuh nanget uh, ka bawljel ding.
“Kei nung it uleh ka thupiakte jui un.
Tualeh Pa ka ngen ding a, Aman nou khamuantu ahung pia ding, na kiang ua tangtawn a om ding in.
Tuapen thutak kha ahi; leitung taksa dan a hingten aneithei kei, ajiak amah amu kei ua, thei zong atheikei uh; hinanleh nou amah nathei uh; ajiak na kiang uah a om a, na sung uah a om ding hi.
“Tagah dingin kung nusia kei ding, na kiang uah kung pai ding hi.
Tomkhat zoh chiang in leitung in kei ahung munawn kei ding a; hinanleh nou nung mu ding uh; ajiak kei ka hing a nou zong nahing ding uhi.
Tuani chiangin kei ka Pa ah ka om a, nou kei ah na om ua, tualeh kei nou ah ka om chih nathei ding uhi.
“Kuahileh ka thupiakte neia jui tuh, kei hung it ahi a; tualeh kuapeuh kei hung it tuh ka Pa it in aom ding a, ken amah ka it ding a, akiang ah ka kilak ding,” achi hi.
Iskariot hiloupen Juda in akiang ah, “Toupa koukiang a kilak a, leitung mite kiang a na kilaklouh ding bang chidan ahia?” achi a.
Jesu`n adawng a akiang ah, “Mi kuapeuh in ahung it leh ka thu ajui ding a. Tualeh ka Pa`n amah a it ding a, akiang uah kung pai ding ua, amauh tawh ka tengkhawm jing ding uhi.
Kuapeuh ahung it lou in ka thute ajui kei a, thu najakte uh keimah a ahikei a, Pa a hungsawlpa a ahijaw hi.
“Na kiang ua ka om tadih sungin hih thute na kiang uah ka gen ahi.
Hinanleh Khamuanpa, Khasiangthou Pa in ka min a ahung sawl ding in, aman siljousiah nou a hunghilh ding a, tualeh thu na kiang ua ka gensa jousiah nou ahung theisak ding hi.
“Khamuanna kung nutsiat hi, keimah khamuanna kungpia hi; leitung in apiak bangin ken nou kung piakei a, na lungtang uh mangbang sak kei unla, lau zong lausak kei un.

‘Ka paimang ding a, na kiang uah kung paikik ding,’ chia na kiang ua ka gen na jata uhi. Kei hung it hile uchin Pa kiangah ka pai ding kachih jiakin na kipak ding uhi, ajiak ka Pa kei sangin alianjaw hi.
Tuin ahung tunma in kung hilhta hi, ahun a hungtun chiang a na gintattheih na ding un.
Tubansiah na kiang uah thu tampi ka gen nawn kei ding hi; ajiak leitung vaihawmpa hungpai pai ding ahi a, aman keimah ah bangmah aneikei hi,
hinanleh Pa ka it a, a hungpiak bangin ka bawljel hi chih leitung in atheihna ding un ahi.
“Thou un, hihsan a kipan ipai ding uhi.
“Kei grepgui diktak ka hi, ka Pa ahuan neipa ahi.
Keimah a om ba gahneilou jousiah a paimang jel a; tualeh agah jousiah a hahsiang a; agah tamsemna dingin.
Tuin nou na kiang ua thu ka gen jiakin na siangthou uhi.
Keimah ah omgige un, kei zong nou mauh ah ka omgige ding, aba grepgui a aom gige keileh amah guak a agah theihlouh mahbang in, nou zong keimah a na omgige kei uleh na gahthei kei ding uhi.
“Kei grepgui ka hi a, nou abate na hi uh, kuahileh keimah a aom gige uleh kei mauh a ka omgige nate tampi in agah jel hi; ajiak keimahlou in bangmah a bawlthei kei uhi.
Mi keimah a aom gige keileh ba bangin paikhiat in a om a, avuljel hi, tualeh mi`n amauh a tomkhawm a, mei ah apai ua, a kangtum hi.
Keimah a na omgige ua tualeh ka thu zong noumauh a aom gige leh na ut ut uh ngen un, nou a dingin bawl in a omjel ding hi.
Hi-ah ka Pa pahtawi in a om hi, tampi nagah na uah; tuachi`n ka nungjuite na hi ding uhi.
Pa`n kei ahung it mahbang in, ken zong nou kung it hi; ka itna ah omgige un.
Nou ka thupiakte najuih uleh ka itna ah na omgige ding uhi. Ken ka Pa thupiakte ka juih a a itna a ka omgige mahbang in.
“Ka kipakna nou a aom gige theihna ding leh, ka kipakna uh a bukim theihna dingin hih thute na kiang uah kung gen ahi.
Ken nou kung it bangin nou zong khat leh khat ki it un chih ka thupiak ahi.
Mi`n a lawmte ding a ahinna apiak sang a lianjaw itna kuaman anei kei hi.
Thu kung piak taphot nabawl uleh ka lawmte na hi ding uhi.
Tu a kipat in sila kung chinawn kei ding, ajiak sila in apu in bang abawl atheikei hi; lawmte kung chijaw ta ding, ajiak ka Pa kiang a kazak jousiah nou kung hilhta hi.
Nou kei nung tel kei ua, hinanleh ken nou kung teljaw hi; pai a gah ding leh nagah uh omjing dingin, tualeh ka min a Pa kiang a nanget peuh uh a hung piak theihna dingin nou kungguat ahi.
Hih thute nou kungpia hi, khat leh khat ki it un.
“Leitungmite`n nou ahung huat leh nou ahung huat ma in kei ahung huakhinta chih thei un.
Leitung a hile uchin leitung in amah a it ding hi; hinanleh leitung a hilou-a, leitung a kipan a kungtel khiatte na hihzawk jiak un leitung in nou ahung hua ahi.
‘Sila apu sangin alianjaw kei chih na kiang ua kunggen theijing un.’ Amau`n kei ahung thuaksak uleh, nou zong ahung thuaksak ding uhi; ka thugente ajuih uleh nou thugente zong ajui ding uhi.
Hinanleh ka min jiakin hih silte jousiah natung uah a bawl ding uhi, ahung sawlpa atheihlouh jiak un.
Kei hung pailou a akiang ua thu genlou hileng, khialhna neilou ding hi uh a, hinanleh tun a khialhna uh paulap ding aneita kei uhi.
Kuapeuh kei hung hua-in, ka Pa zong ahua uh ahi.
Midang kuamah bawl ngailouh alak uah bawllou hileng, khialhna neilou ding hi ua, hinanleh tuin mu zong a hungmu ua, tualeh keileh ka Pa kanih un hua zong ahung hua uhi.
‘Hinanleh hihpen amau`n ajiak bei in ahung hua uh,’ chih a danbu ua kigelh thu a tangtunna ding a hung om ahi.
“Hinanleh Pa kiang a pat na kiang ua kung sawl ding, khamuantu, Pa a pat hungpawt, thutak Kha a hungtun chiangin, aman ka tanchin atheisak ding hi.
Tualeh atung a kipan a ka kiang a om nahih man un, nou zong na theisak ding uhi.
“Lungkia a na om louhna ding un hih thute na kiang uah ka gen ahi.
Kikhopna innte ah ahung notpot ding ua; ahi, kuapeuh nou hung that in Pasian tung a silhoih bawl in aki ngaihtuah ding uh, huachibang hun a hungtung ding hi.
Tualeh Pa leh kei ahung theihlouh man un, hih silte natung uah a bawl ding uhi.
Hinanleh ahun a hungtun chiang a huate kung hilhta chih na theihdokna ding un hih silte nou kung hilh ahi. Na kiang ua ka om jiakin hih thute atungin na kiang uah ka gen kei hi.
“Hinanleh tuin pen a hungsawlpa kiang a pai ding ka hi a; hinanleh kuamah in khoi a pai ding na hia? chi`n nung dong kei uhi.
Hinanleh hih thute na kiang ua ka gen jiakin na lungtang uh lunggimna in adimta hi.
Hinanleh thutak kung hilh ahi; ka paimang nou a dingin ahoih hi; ajiak ka paimang keileh Khamuantu na kiang uah a hungpai kei ding hi; ka pai leh na kiang uah kung sawl ding hi.
Amah a hungpai chiangin khialhna thu ah, diktatna thu ah tualeh vaihawmna thu ah leitung adiklouh dan atheisak ding hi.
Khialhna thu ah siamlouh a tangsak ding, kei a hung gintatlouh jiak un;
diktatna thu ah siamlouh a tangsak ding, ka Pa kiang a pai a nungmuh nawnlouh ding jiak un;
vaihawmna thu ah siamlouh a tangsak ding, hih leitung lal vaihawm sak a aom tak jiak in.
“Na kiang uah gen ding thu tampi kanei nalai a, hinanleh tuin na puajou naikei uh.

Bangteng hileh thutak Kha a hungtun chiangin, aman nou thutak tengteng ah ahung lamkaih ding; ajiak ama phuah thu in thu a genkei ding a, hinanleh ajak taphot agenjaw ding; tualeh sil hungtung dingte ahung musak ding hi.
Aman kei a hung pahtawi ding; ajiak keimah a ala ding a, nou ahung musak ding hi.
Pa silneih jousiah kei a ahi; tuajiakin keimah a ala ding a, nou ahung musak ding, ka chi ahi.
“Tomkhat nou kei nung mukei ding uh a, tualeh tomkhat zoh in nou kei nung mukik ding uh, Pa kiang a kapai ding jiakin,” achi hi.

Tuachi`n a nungjuite khenkhat in, “Tomkhat nou nung mukei ding uh, tualeh tomkhat zoh in nou kei nung mukik ding uh, ‘Pa kiang a kapai ding jiakin,’ ikiang a achih bang achihna ahia? chi`n aki hou ua.
Tuajiakin amau`n hih a thugen ‘tomkhat,’ achih bang achihna ahia!” achi ua.
Tualeh amah a dong nuam uh chih Jesu`n athei a, akiang uah, “ ‘Tomkhat nou kei nung mukei ding ua, tualeh tomkhat zoh chiang nou kei nung mukik ding uh,’ chi-a ka gen naki dongtuah uh maw?
Adiktak in, adiktak in kung hilh ahi: nou nakap ding ua na sun ding uh; hinanleh leitung a kipak ding; nou na lungkham ding ua; na lungkhamna uh kipakna asuak ding hi.
Numei anau in apehlai in a lungkham a, ahun atuntak jiakin; hihnanleh nau asuahzoh takin a lungkhamnate athei nawn kei hi, mihing khat leitung a ahung pian kipakna jiakin.
Tuajiakin tulaitak in lungkhamna nanei uhi, hinanleh nou kung mukik ding a, na lungtang uh akipak ding; tualeh na kipahna uh kuaman ahung laksak kei ding hi.
“Tualeh huani chiangin nou bangmah nung ngen kei ding uh, adiktak in kung hilh ahi, kamin a Pa kiang a na nget uh khat peuh Aman ahung pia ding hi.
Tutan in kamin in nou bangmah na ngen naikei uh; ngen un, namu ding uh, na kipak uh a kimna ding in.
“Hih thute ahem in na kiang uah ka gen hi; hinanleh ahem a na kiang ua thu gennawnlou a, Pa tungtang chiantak a kung theihsak ding hun tung ding ahi ta.
Huani chiangin kamin in nung ngen ding uh; nou dingin Pa ka ngen ding chi ka hikei hi,
ajiak nou kei nung it ua, tualeh Pa a kipan a hungpai ka hih na gintak jiak un Pa amah in zong nou ahung it hi.
Pa a kipan a hung paikhia a, leitung a hungpai ka hi, tualeh leitung nusia a Pa kiang a paikik ding ka hi,” achi hi.
A nungjuite`n akiang ah, “Ngaiin tuin ahem in nagen kei a, chiantak in nagenta hi.
Tualeh tuin pen sil bangkim nathei a, kuamah in ahung dok na kiphamoh kei chih ka theichianta uh; hih jiakin Pasian a kipan a hungpai nahi chih ka gingta uhi,” achi ua.
Jesu`n amauh adawng a, “Tuin na gingta uh maw?
Ngai-un, a hun a hungtung ding; ahi, tuin zong a tungta, michih na inn chiat uah na kikhenthang ding ua; keiguak in nung nusia ding uh; hinanleh Pa ka kiang a aom jiakin keiguak ka hikei hi.
Keimah a khamuanna naneih na ding un hih thute na kiang uah ka gen ahi. Leitung ah thuakgimna nanei ding uh; hinanleh kipaktak in om un ken leitung ka zouta hi!” achi hi.
Hih thute Jesu`n agen a, tualeh vanlam nga in adak a, “Pa, ahun a tungta, na Tapa pahtawi in, na Tapa in zong nangmah ahung pahtawi theihna dingin.
Tualeh nangmah in akiang a napiak jousiahte tangtawn hinna apiak theihna ding a mi jousiah tung a thuneihna napiak bangin.
Tualeh hih ahi tangtawn hinna, nang Pasian diktak guak leh nasawl Jesu Krist atheih uh.
Leitung ah namin ka pahtawita, bawl ding a nung piak nna kasem jouta hi.
Pa aw! Tuin leitung omma a na kiang a kaneih pahtawina in nang mah kiang ah hung pahtawi in.
“Leitung a kipan a nung piakte kiang ah namin ka langsakta hi. Amauh nang a ahi a, nang kei nungpiak ahi; tualeh nathu ajuita uhi.
Nang ka kiang a nungpiak jousiah nangmah a kipan ahi chih atheita uhi.
Ajiak nang thu nung piakte akiang uah ka pia a, amau`n zong asangta uh, tualeh chiantak in nang a kipan a pawt ka hi chih atheita ua, nung sawl ahi chih agingta ta uhi.
“Amauh a dingin ka ngetsak hi. Leitung a dingin ka ngetsak kei a, nang nungpiakte a dingin ka ngetsakjaw hi; ajiak amauh nang a ahi uhi.
Tualeh keia jousiah nang a ahi a; nang a jousiah kei a ahi; tualeh amau uah pahtawiin ka om hi.

Tuin kei leitung ah ka omsawt nawn kei ding, hinanleh hihte leitung ah a om ding uh, kei na kiangah hung pai ding ka hi. Pa siangthou! Ei pumkhat ihih mahbang a amauh zong pumkhat a hihtheihna ding un, nang nungpiakte na min in kem in.
Leitung a amauh tawh ka omsung in na min in amauh kakem a, Pasian Laisiangthou tangtun theihna dingin mangthang tapa loungal khatbek a mangthang kei uhi.
Tuin na kiang ah hungpai ding ka hita, tualeh amau ua ka kipahna abukim theihna dingin hih silte leitung ah ka gen ahi.
Na thu leitung ah ka piata a, leitung in amauh ahua hi; kei leitung a ka hihlouhjiak a amauh zong leitung a ahihlouh jiak un.
Amauh leitung a kipan a lamang dingin kung ngen kei a, hinanleh migiloupa a pat a veng ding in kung ngen ahijaw hi.
Amauh leitung a ahi kei uh, kei leitung a ka hihlouh mahbang in.
Na thu in amauh susiangthou inla; na thu thutak ahi.
Kei leitung a nungsawl mahbang in ken zong amauh leitung ah kasawl hi.
Amauh jiakin kaki hihsiangthou hi.
“Hihte guak a dingin kungngen kei a, hinanleh athujiak ua kei hung gingta dingte a dingin zong kung ngen hi.
Pumkhat ahihtheihna ding un; Pa, nang keimah a na om a, kei nangmah a ka om mahbang a amauh zong eimah a pumkhat ahihtheihna ding un; tualeh nang nungsawl chih leitung in agintat theihna ding un.
Tualeh nang nung piak thupina amauh ka piata hi; ei pumkhat ihih bang a amauh zong pumkhat ahih theihna ding un:
Kei amauh ah, nang kei ah, pumkhat a mauh hih bukim a aom theihna ding un; tualeh nang nungsawl a, kei nung it bangin amauh na it chih leitung in atheihna ding un.
“Pa aw! Nang kei nung piakte zong ka omna a kei tawh om dingin ka deih hi; nung piak thupina a muhtheihna ding un; ajiak nang leitung pianma pek in kei nung it hi.
Pa diktak aw! Leitung in nang ahung theikei a, hinanleh ken kungthei hi; tualeh nang nungsawl ahih hihte`n atheita uhi.
Tualeh akiang uah namin ka theisakta a, ka theisakjel ding; keimah nung itna akiang uah a omtheihna ding leh, kei amauh ua ka omtheihna dingin,” achi hi.
Jesu`n hih thute agen khit in a nungjuite tawh apawt ua, Kidron luiguam akan ua; huasan ah huan khat aom a, hua-ah a nungjuite tawh alut uhi.
Tualeh Jesu a nungjuite tawh hualam a avakjel jiakin, a mansakpa Juda in zong huamun athei a.
Tuachi`n Juda in siampite leh Pharisaite a pat galkap pawl leh miman lamkaite zohpih in, meivakte leh meiselte leh galvante tawiin huasan ah a hungtungta hi.
Tuajiakin Jesu`n atung a sil tung ding jousiah thei in apawtkhia a, akiang uah, “Kua ahia nazon uh?” achi hi.
Amau`n adawng ua, “Nazareth Jesu”, achi ua. Jesu`n akiang uah, “Kei ka hi”, achi a.
Tualeh a mansakpa Juda zong akiang uah ading hi.
Tualeh akiang ua keimah ka hi achih takin anungtawn ua, leiah apuk uh hi.
Tuachi`n aman, “Kua ahia nazon uh?” chi`n adong kik a.
Amau`n, “Nazareth Jesu,” achi ua.
“Jesu`n adawng a, keimah ka hi chi`n kung hilhta; tuajiakin kei hung zong nahih uleh hihte paisak un,” achi a.
“Nang nung piakte khat zong ka mansuah kei,” chia aman agen a tangtun theihna dingin.
Tuachi`n Simon Peter in namsau khat aneih adokkhia a, siampi silapa asat a, abil jiatlam a satkhiat sak hi. Silapa min Marka ahi.
Tuachi`n Jesu`n Peter kiangah, “Na namsau apaiah siat in! Ka Pa`n nou a hungpiak tuh dawnlou ding ka hi hiam?” achi hi.
Tuachi`n galkap pawlte leh a lamkaite uleh Judah lamkaite`n Jesu a man ua, ahen uh a,
a masapen in Anna kiang ah a zohpih ua, amah huakum a siampi a pang Kaiapha sungpa ahih jiakin.
Tualeh Kaiapha pen mipite tang a mikhat sih ahoih hi, chia Judahte kiang a hilhpa ahi.
Tualeh Simon Peter in Jesu ajui a, tuachimah bangin nungjui dangte`n zong ajui hi; tua nungjuipa pen siampi meltheih ahi a, siampi huang sung ah Jesu tawh alut khawm a,
hinanleh Peter apualam ah kongkhak bul ah ading hi. Tuachi`n nungjui dang siampi meltheihpa ava pawt a, kongkhak ngaknu kiang ah agen a, Peter ahung lutpih hi.
Tuachi`n sila kongkhak ngak nungaknu in Peter kiang ah, “Nang zong hihpa nungjuite lak a khat hilou na maw?” achi hi.
Aman ka hikei achi hi.
Tualeh silate leh lamkaite huasan ah ading ua, avot jiakin suang meihol atoh ua a awi uhi. Tualeh Peter zong amauh tawh ding khawm in mei a awi hi.
Tualeh siampi-in a nungjuite tungtang leh a thuhilhna tungtang adong a.
Jesu`n adawng a, “A langtang in leitung ah thu ka gen a, Judahte omkhawm jingna kikhopna inn leh tempul ah thu ka hilh jing hi. Aguk in bangmah ka gen kei hi.
Bangding a kei hungdong nahia? Akiang ua bang ka gen ka thugen jate kiang ah dongin, amau`n ka gen athei uhi,” achi hi.
Tualeh hihbang thute agenzoh in akiang a ding lamkai khat in akhut in Jesu abeng a, “Siampi huachi bangin na dawng maw!” achi a.
Jesu`n adawng a, “Thu gilou ka genleh, agitlouhna hung theisak in; hinanleh ahoih ka genleh bangding a hung beng nahia?” achi a.
Tuachi`n Anna in amah kansa in siampi Kaiapha kiang ah asawlta hi.
Simon Peter in dingin mei a awi a, tuajiakin amau`n akiang ah, “Nang zong nungjuite lak a khat hilou namaw?” achi ua.
Aman aki theihmoh bawl a, “Ka hikei,” achi a.
Tualeh Peter in abil asatkhiat sakpa sanggam siampi silate khat in, “Huan ah amah tawh na omkhawm uh hungmu hilou ka maw?” achi a.
Tuachi`n Peter in, “Ka hikei,” chi`n a kitheihmoh bawl kik a, tuachi`n ak akhuang paita hi.

Tuachi`n amau`n Jesu Kaiapha inn a pat in vaihawmna inn ah apaipih ua; jingsan matak ahi a; hinanleh amauh vaihawmna innsung ah alutkei uhi; atuachih keileh aki hihnin kha ding ua, paikan ankuang a umthei kei kha ding uhi.
Pilat akiang uah a hungpawt a, “Hih hekna bang ahia naneih uh,” achi a.
“Amah mi gilou hikeileh na kiang ah hung piakhialou ding ka hi uh,” achi ua.
Tuachi`n Pilat in akiang uah, “Paipih unla, nadan dungjui un athu vaihawmsak un,” achi hi.
Tuajiakin Judahte`n akiang ah, “Kou kuamah thahtheihna ding dan ka neikei uhi,” achi ua.
Hih ahihleh bangchi bang a asih ding thu Jesu`n agen a tangtun theihna dingin ahi.
Tuachi`n Pilat vaihawmna innsung ah alut kik a, Jesu asam a akiang ah, “Judate kumpipa namaw?” achi a.
Jesu`n adawng a, “Hih nangmah lungsim a hungsuak nagen ahia ahihkeileh midang in ka tungtang thu ahih a hunghilh ahia?” achi a.
Pilat in adawng a, “Kei Judami ka hi hiam? Na chipihte leh siampite`n nang ka kiangah ahung piakhia ahi; bang ahia nabawl tak?” achi hi.

Jesu`n adawng a, “Ka kumpi gam hih leitung ah ahikei, ka kumpi gam hih leitung ah hitaleh Judahte khut ah piakkhiat ka hihlouhna dingin ka silate`n adou ding uhi. Hinanleh ka gam pen hih ahi naikei hi!” achi hi.
Tuajiakin Pilat in akiang ah, “Ahihleh kumpipa na hi hiam?” achi a.
Jesu`n adawng a, “Kumpipa, na chihpen mah ka hi. Tualeh hih ding a piang ka hi a, tualeh thutak theihpih ding a leitung a hungpai ka hi. Kuapeuh thutak a om taphot in ka aw aja uhi,” achi hi.
Pilat in akiang ah, “Thutak bang ahia?” achi a.
Tualeh hihthu agenzoh in Judate kiangah apawt kik a, akiang uah, “Amah ah diklouhna bangmah ka mukei hi.
Hinanleh paikan ankuang luini a mikhat kung khahsak ding ahi chih tawndan khat nanei uh; tuajiakin Judate kumpipa hung khahkhia leng na ut uai?” achi a.
Tuachi`n aun un akikou ua, “Hihpa hilou in! Barabba pen!” chi in. (Barabba ahihleh suamhatmi ahi.)
Tuachi`n Pilat in Jesu a paipih a, ajepta a.
Tualeh galkapte`n linglukhu a phan ua, a lutung ah a khusak ua, puan sandup asilhsak uhi.
Tuachi`n, “Chibai Judate kumpipa!” achi ua, akhut un abeng uhi.
Tuachi`n Pilat a pawt kik a akiang uah, “Ngaiun, amah ah diklouhna ka mukei chih na theihna ding un na kiang uah kung paipih hi,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n Jesu linglukhu khu-in leh puan sandup silh in ahung pawtkhia a, Pilat in akiang uah, “En un! Mihing!” achi a.
Tuajiakin siampite leh lamkaite`n amah amuhtak un, “Kross ah kilhden in! kross ah kilhden in!” achi ua.
Pilat in akiang uah, “Nou paipih unla, kilhden un, ajiak ken amah ah diklouhna ka mukei hi,” achi hi.
Judate`n amah adawng ua, “Dan khat kanei uh, Pasian Tapa a akibawl jiakin ka dan dungjui un sitak ahi,” achi ua.
Tuajiakin Pilat in hua thu ajaktak in alau semsem ta a.
Tualeh vaihawmna innsung ah alut kik a, Jesu kiangah, “Khoisan a hung kipan nahia?” achi a.
Hinanleh Jesu`n adawng kei hi.
Tuachi`n Pilat in akiang ah, “Ka kiangah thu genlou ding maw? Kross ah kilhden theihna leh khahkhiat theihna nei ka hi chih theilou namaw?” achi hi.
Jesu`n adawng a, “Tunglam a kipan a piak hikei lechin ka tungah bangmah bawltheih na neikei ding hi. Tuajiakin na kiang a hung piakhia pa`n khialhna alian neihjaw hi,” achi hi.
Tuanung siah Pilat in khahkhiat asawm a, hinanleh Judate`n, “Hihpa na paisak leh Kaisar lawm na hikei ding! Kuahileh amah leh amah kumpipa a kibawl tuh Kaisar dou ahi!” chi`n aki kou ua.
Tuajiakin Pilat in huathu ajaktak in Jesu ahung paikhiatpih a, tualeh “Vaihawmna suanglep” (Hebrai ham a “Gabbatha”) kichi tungah atou a.
Tualeh tuani pen paikan kut kigin kholhni ahi a, dak gukna tuam ahi; tualeh aman Judate kiang ah, “En-un, na kumpipa uh!” achi a.
Hinanleh amauh aki kou ua, “Paimangpih in! Paimangpih in! Kross ah kilhden in!” achi uhi.
Pilat in akiang uah, “Na kumpipa uh ka kilhden ding maw?” achi a.
Siampite`n, “Kaisar loungal kumpipa dang ka neikei uh!” chi`n adawng uhi.
Tuachi`n aman amah kross a kilhden dingin akiang uah a piakhiata a, tuachi`n amau`n Jesu atu ua, a paipihta uhi.
Tualeh aman a kross kipuak in “Luguh mun,” kichi (Hebrai ham in “Golgotha” kichi) mun ah apai a.
Huasan ah amah midang nih tawh kross ah a kilhdenta ua, ageiah khattuak, Jesu alai ah.
Tualeh Pilat in lai agelh a, kross tung ah atak a, a laigelh ahihleh: “NAZARETH JESU, JUDATE KUMPIPA,” chih ahi.
Tuachi`n hih lai Judate tampi`n asim ua; Jesu akilhden na uh khuapi gei ahihjiak in. Tualeh hihpen Hebrai ham, Grik ham leh Latin ham a kigelh ahi.
Tuajiakin Judate siampite`n Pilat kiang ah, “ ‘Judate kumpipa chi`n gelh kenla, Judate kumpipa ka hi achi, chi`n gelhjaw in,’ ” achi ua.
Pilat in adawng a, “Ka gelhkhitsa, ka gelhkhitsa ahi,” achi hi.

Tuachi`n Jesu kross a a kilhden zoh un galkapte`n apuan silhte ala ua, khatchiat a atan ding un phelli asuah ua, tualeh apuan-ak zong ala uh; apuan-ak akhuina bei ahi a, a ngawng a pat apum a gat ahi.
Tuajiakin amau`n, “I botkek kei ding a; kuatan ding chih ai isan ding uh,” chi`n a kihou ua. Pasian Laisiangthou in,
“Ka puansilhte aki hawm ua,
Ka puan-ak dingin ai asan uh,”
chih ahung tangtunna dingin.
Tuajiakin hih silte galkapte`n abawl uhi.
Tualeh Jesu kross gei ah anu leh anu sanggamnu Mari Kleopa zi leh Mari Magdalini ading ua.
Tuajiakin Jesu in anu leh a nungjui a itpa akiang a ding amuh in anu kiang ah, “Numei, en-in na tapa,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n nungjuipa kiangah, “En in nanu,” achi a. Hua a kipan in tua nungjuipa`n a inn ah apuita hi.
Hih nungin Jesu`n sil bangkim tuin zohsiang ahita chih thei in Pasian Laisiangthou thu a tangtun na dingin, “Ka dang atak,” achi a.
Huasan ah bel uain thuk a dim khat akitung a, sponzi khat uain thuk in adiah dim ua, tualeh hussop chiangah atak ua, akam ah akoihtou uhi.
Tuachi`n Jesu`n uain thuk adawn zoh in, “Zoh ahita!” achi a.
Tuachi`n alu akun a, a Kha akhahta hi.

Tuajiakin Judate`n, kiginni ahih jiakin aluangte uh khawlni a kross dawn a aom louhna dingin, ajiak khawlni pen ni thupi ahi a. Pilat kiangah a kengte uh hihtansak a, aluang uh lakmang dingin a ngen ua.
Tuachi`n galkapte a hungpai ua, aki kilhdenpih tuak masakpen leh khat pen akeng ahih tansak ua.
Hinanleh Jesu kiang ahung phak un ana sikhinta chih ahung mu ua, akeng ahihtansak kei uhi.
Hinanleh galkapte lak a khat in teipi-in anak adawt a, tuachi`n sisan leh tui ahung pawtkhia hi.
Tualeh hih mupa`n atheihpihta a, athu theihsak adik ahi; tualeh na gintat theihna ding un agendik hi chih atheita hi.
Ajiak Pasian Laisiangthou ah: “Aguh khat zong suktan ahi kei ding,” chih a tangtun theihna dingin, hih silte a hung omta hi.
Tualeh Pasian Laisiangthou dang in, “Amau`n adawtpa uh a en ding uh,” achi hi.

Hih nungin, (Joseph, Arimathai khua a mi, Judate lau jiaka aguk a Jesu nungjui in Jesu luang alak theihna dingin Pilat kiangah ava ngen a.) Pilat in ana phal a, tuajiakin amah a hungpai a, Jesu luang alata hi.
Tualeh Nikodem, atu`ng a jan a Jesu kiang a hungpaipa zong ahung pai a, murah leh aloe bawm sawmnga vel a hungtawi a.
Jesu luang ala ua, Judate kivui ngaina bangin sil namtui leh puan malngat in atuam uhi.
Tualeh kross a akilhden na mun uah huan khat a um a.
Tuajiakin Judate kiginni ahih jiakin huasan ah Jesu asialta uh, han naitak ahih jiakin.
Nipikal ni masapen in, jingsang baihtak khuamial nalai in, Mari Magdalini han ah avapai a, tualeh han a kipat suang ki lakhia in amuta a.
Tuachi`n atai a Simon Peter leh nungjui dang Jesu`n a itpa kiangah a hungpai a, akiang uah, “Han a kipat in Toupa a lamangta ua, khoisan a akoih uh ka theikei uh!” achi hi.
Tuachi`n Peter a pawtkhia a, nungjui dang tawh han lam juanin a hungpai ua.
Tuachi`n ataituak ua, nungjui dang in Peter a makhelh a han a hungtung masa hi.
Tualeh aman kun in a en a, puan malngat om amu a, ahihhang in asung ah alut kei hi.
Tuachi`n Simon Peter in a nung ah ahungjui a, hansung ah alut a, puan malngatte amu hi.
Tualeh a lutuamna kinawtna puan pen puanmalngat tawh omkhawm lou a atuam a munkhat a kijial a om amu hi.
Tuachi`n nungjui dang hantung masapen zong asung ah alut a, tualeh amu a, ataksanta hi.
Ajiak amau`n misi lak a kipan a thoukik ding ahi chih Laisiangthou athei naikei uhi.
Tuachi`n nungjuite amauh inn lam ah a paikikta uhi.
Hinanleh Mari pen han pualam ah ading a; tualeh akah pum in akun a, hansung a en a.
Tualeh Jesu luang kisialna mun ah puanngou silh vantungmi nih khat alukhung ah khat a khekhuantaw ah tou in amu hi.
Tuachi`n amau`n akiang ah, “Numei bangding a kap nahia?” achi ua.
Amahnu`n akiang uah, “Ka Toupa a lamangta ua, tualeh a koihna uh ka theihlouh jiakin!” achi hi.
Tuachia agenzoh in a kinunghei a, Jesu ding amu a, hinanleh Jesu ahi chih atheikei hi.
Jesu`n amahnu kiang ah, “Numei bangding a kap nahia? Kua ahia nazon?” achia hi.
Amahnu`n huan vengpa sa in akiang ah, “Hihsan a pat amah na puakmang ahihleh na koihna hunghilh in, tuachi`n amah ka la ding,” achi hi.
Jesu`n amahnu kiangah, “Mari!” achi a.
Amahnu akihei a akiang ah Hebrai ham in “Rabboni!” achi a, (Huapen “Siapa” chihna ahi hi.)

Jesu`n amahnu kiang ah, “Hungtu ken, ajiak ka Pa kiangah ka paitou naikei hi, hinanleh ka sanggamte kiangah pai inla, akiang uah ka Pa, na Pa uh, tualeh ka Pasian, na Pasian uh kiangah paitou ding ka hi chi in vahilh in,” achi hi.
Mari Magdalini a hungpai a, Toupa amuh thu leh hih silte akiang ah agen hi chih ahilhta hi.
Tuachi`n tuani mah nipikal ni masapen nitak in Judate lau jiak a nungjuite omna kongte kikhak nungin Jesu ahung pai a, akiang uah, “Na kiang uah khamuanna om hen,” achi a.
Tuachia achih zoh in akhutte leh anak akiang uah alah a. Tuachi`n nungjuite`n Toupa amuh tak un a kipakta uhi.
Tuachi`n Jesu`n akiang uah, “Na kiang uah khamuanna om hen. Ka Pa`n kei a hungsawl mahbang in ken zong nou kungsawl hi.”
Tuachi`n hih thu aman agen zoh in, atung uah ahu akhahkhum a, akiang uah, “Khasiangthou tangta un.
Kua khialhna zong na ngaihdam taphot uh ngaihdam ahi ding a, kua khialhna zong na ngaihdam louh taphot uh ngaihdam louh ahi ding,” achi hi.
Hinanleh Thoma, Didum a kichi, sawmlehnihte lak a khat, Jesu hungpai laiin akiang uah a om kei a;
Tuajiakin nungjui dangten akiang ah, “Toupa ka muta uh!” achi ua.
Hinanleh aman akiang uah, “Akhut a sikkilhna mapawnte ka muh a, sikkilhna sunga ka khutzung ka guan a, tualeh anak a ka khut ka guan keileh ka gingta kei ding,” achi hi.
Tualeh nigiat nungin nungjuite innsung ah aom kik ua, Thoma zong akiang uah a om a; kongkhakte khak hinapi`n Jesu a hungpai a, alai uah ahung ding a, “Na kiang uah khamuanna om hen,” achi a.
Tuachi`n aman Thoma kiangah, “Na khutzung in hungsawk inla, ka nak sawk in; gingta lou in om kenla, gingta mai in!” achi hi.
Thoma in adawng a akiang ah, “Ka Toupa leh ka Pasian!” achi a.
Jesu`n akiang ah, “Thoma, nang nungmuh jiak a na gintat ahi a; mulou a gingtate ahampha uhi!” achi hi.
Tualeh hih laibu a kigelhlou sillamdang tampi Jesu`n a nungjuite maiah abawl hi.
Hinanleh hihte nou Jesu pen Krist, Pasian Tapa ahi chih na gintak na ding uleh na gintat jiak ua amin a hinna naneih na ding ua kigelh ahi.
Hih silte khit in Jesu Tiberia dil a nungjuite kiangah a kilakkik a; hichi bangin akilak hi.
Simon Peter tawh, Thoma, (Apeng kichipa) tawh (Galili gam a Kana khua a om) Nathanael tawh Zebedi tapate tawh, tualeh a nungjui nihte om khawm ahi ua.
Simon Peter in akiang uah, “Nga man in ka pai ding,” achi a.
Amau`n akiang ah, “Kou zong kungjui ding uh,” achi ua. A paikhia ua, gunkuang sung khat ah atoupai ua; tuajan in bangmah aman kei uhi.
Hinanleh jingsang ahunghih in Jesu dil piau ah ading a; ahih hangin nungjuite`n Jesu ahih atheikei uhi.
Tuachi`n Jesu`n akiang uah, “Naute, nek ding banghiam khat nanei uhiam?” achi a.
Amau`n, “Neilou,” chi`n adawng ua.
Aman akiang uah, “Gunkuang jiatlam pang ah nangen uh khuh un,” tamlou na man ding uh, achi a. Tuajiakin amau`n akhuh ua, nga atam mahmah jiakin a kaikhia jou nawn kei uhi.
Tuajiakin Jesu`n a it nungjuipa`n Peter kiangah, “Toupa ahi!” achi a. Tualeh Simon Peter in Toupa ahi chih ajaktak in apuan-ak asilh a (puan silhlou a om ahih jiakin).
Hinanleh nungjui dangte ngen a ngasa kaikawm in, gunkuang neu khat in a hungpai ua, ajiak piaugei a pat a gamla kei ua, tong janih vel ahi.
Tualeh piaugaw a hungtun un suang meihol a mei kitawh leh atung a ngasa leh tanghou kikoih amu ua.
Jesu`n akiang uah, “Tu a na ngasa matte uh hungtawi un,” achi a.
Simon Peter a paitou a ngasa lianpipi ja leh sawmnga leh thum a dim ngen pen piaugaw ah ahung kaikhia a, tam mahmah nanleh a ngen a kek kei hi.
Jesu`n akiang uah, “Hungpai unla jing an hungne un,” achi a. A nungjuiten Toupa ahi chih atheih jiak un kuaman, “Kua nahia?” achi ngam kei uhi.
Tuachi`n Jesu a hungpai a, tanghou ala a, akiang uah apia a, tuachimah bangin ngasate zong apia hi.
Hih pen Jesu`n sihna a pan a athohkik nung a a nungjuite kiang a akilak a thumveina ahi.
Tuachi`n ajing an uh anek zoh un Jesu`n Simon Peter kiangah, “Simon, Jona tapa, nang hihte sangin kei nung itjaw hiam?” achi a.
Aman akiang ah, “Hi, Toupa, kung it hi chih nathei hi”, achi a.
Aman akiang ah, “Ka belam noute vak in,” achi hi.
Aman anihveina in akiang ah, “Simon, Jona tapa, nang kei nung it hiam?” achi a.
Aman akiang ah, “Hi, Toupa, kung it hi chih nathei hi,” achi a.
Aman akiang ah, “Ka belamte chingin,” achi hi.
Aman a thumveina in akiang ah, “Simon, Jona tapa, nang kei nung it hiam?” achi a,
Aman a kiang a a thumveina, nang kei nung it hiam achih jiakin Peter a lungkham a. Tuachi`n aman akiang ah, “Toupa nang siljousiah nathei a; kung it hi chih nathei hi!” achi a.
Jesu`n akiang ah, “Ka belamte vak in, achi a.

Adiktak in kung hilh ahi, na naupan laiin nang leh nang nakawng na kigak a, na utna lamlam ah na paijel; hinanleh nung upat chiangin na khut najak ding a, mi`n nakong ahung gaksak ding a na utlouhna lamlam ah a hungkai ding hi,” achi hi.
(Hihpen aman bang chibang sihna in ahia Pasian apahtawi chih theihsakna ding a agen ahi.) Tualeh hih agen zoh in aman a kiangah, “Hungjuiin!” achi hi.
Tuachi`n Peter aki nunghei a, nungjui Jesu`n a it, nitak an nekna a zong a awm a ki-ngam a, “Toupa, kua ahia nang hung mansak ding?” chipa in hungjui in amu a.
Peter in amah amuh in Jesu kiangah, “Hinanleh Toupa, hihpa la bangchi?” achi hi.
Jesu`n akiang ah, “Kungpai masiah dam a aom ka deihleh hua nang a dingin bang ahia? Nang hungjui in!” achi hi.

Tuachi`n hua nungjuipa a sikei ding chi`n hihthu kigen a sanggamte lak ah athang vengvungta a; Jesu`n lah akiang ah asikei ding achi kei a, “Hinanleh kungpai masiah om dingin deihleng hua nang a dingin bang ahia?” a chijaw ahi.
Hih silte theisak leh gelh nungjui pen hihpa ahi; tualeh athu theihsak adik ahi chih ithei uhi.
Tualeh Jesu`n abawl sildang tampi zong aom a, tuate gelh khinsiang ding hitaleh laibu kigelh dingte jousiah leitungin zong dawllou dingin ka ngaihtuah hi, Amen.
Theophila aw:
Ka laibu masa ah Jesu silbawl leh thuhilh patchil thu jousiah ka gelh ahi.
Khasiangthou panpihna in sawltak a telte kiang a thu apiakkhit a laktouh a aom ni tan thu.
Akiang uah gentheihna athuak nungin theihpihna tampi-in hingin aki musak a, nisawmli sungin akiang uah tamveipi akilak a, Pasian gam thu agen gen hi.
Tualeh amauh tawh kipawl jel in, “Jerusalem khua paisan kei unla, hinanleh Pa silchiam ka gen najak uh hua nangak un, chi`n thu apia hi.
Ajiak Johan in tuiin hung baptist ngut a, hinanleh nou ni sawtlou nungin Khasiangthou in baptisma natang ding uh,” achi hi.
Tuajiakin, amauh ahung kikhop un, akiang ah, “Toupa tuin maw Israelte kiang a a kumpi gam uh napiak kik ding?” chi`n adong ua.
Tualeh aman akiang uah, “Pa in ahun leh ani ama thuthu a om ding a aguat, nou natheih ding uh ahi kei, achi hi.

Hinanleh natung uah Khasiangthou a hungtun chiangin sil bawltheihna nanei ding ua; tuachi`n Jerusalem khua ah zong, Judea gam tualeh Samaria gam jousiah ah zong, tualeh leitawp tanpha in zong ka thu theihpihte na hi ding uhi,” achi hi.
Tualeh hih thute agen zoh in, amuhlaipi un laktouh in aom a, meiin amuhphak louhna uah ala mangta hi.
Tualeh apaitouh lai a amau`n vanlam a et et lai un, ngaiin, minih puankang silh in akiang uah ahung ding ua,
huate`n, “Galili gam a mite aw, bangding a vanlam en a ding ding na hi ua? Hih Jesu na kiang ua pat a laktouh a om namuh mahbang un, a mahmah ahung paikik ding hi.”
Tuachi`n Olive mual achih ua pat in Jerusalem khua ah ahung kilehkik ta ua,Olive mual pen Jerusalem khuagei ahi a, khawlni a vaphak theihna ahi.
Tualeh inn atun un, Peter leh Johan, Jakob leh Andru, Philip leh Thoma, Bartholomai leh Mathai, Alphai tapa Simon zealot leh Jakob a sanggampa Juda omna indan tung ah a paitou ua.
Hihte tengteng numei leh Jesu nu Mari tawh, Jesu sanggamte tawh mun khat ah omkhawm in lungsim munkhat a phattuam ngaitakin a thum thum ua.
Tualeh huani in Peter nungjuite laiah ading a, aun un za leh sawmnih bang ahi ua.
“Sanggamte aw, Khasiangthou in David kam a, Jesu mante lamkaipa Juda thu ana genkholh, hua Pasian Laisiangthou pen ahung tung ding mawng ahi.
Ajiak amah eite lak a simtel ahi a, hih nasepna ah tan anei hi.”
Tualeh hihpan a khialhna man in mun a lei a, abungbu in akia a, alai ah apokkek a agil jousiah alawt khiata hi.
Tualeh hihthu Jerusalem khua a tengte jousiahin athei ua, tualeh huamun pen amauh ham in Akeldama, achi ua, tuapen “Sisan mun” chihna ahi.
“Psam Laibu ah hihthu gelh ahi:
‘A tenna mun sukgam in om henla,
Asung ah kuamah tengkei hen.’
Hichi`n zong akigelh hi,
‘Tualeh a lamkai hihna midang in tang hen,’ chih.”
Tuajiakin, “Toupa Jesu ilak ua lutjel pawtjel a aom sung a,
Johan baptisma a kipan, alak ua kipan van a laktouha a omni tanpha ahung na kithuahpihte lak a mikhat, thohkikna hung theihpihtu dingin aom ngeingei ding ahi,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n minih aguat ua, khat ahihleh Joseph Barsabbas, (amin khem Justa achih uh,) tualeh khat ahih leh Matthia ahi.
Tualeh thumna anei ua, “Nang, aw Toupa mihing jousiah lungtang theitu, hih nihte lak a kuapen ahia natel, hung theisak in.
Juda in amah omna a pai dingin hih nasep leh sawltak hihna khialhna a apuksan mun luah dingin,” achi ua
Tualeh ai asansak ua, a aisan uh Matthia tungah atu a; tuachi`n amah sawltak sawm leh khat tetawh simkhawm ahita hi.
Tualeh Pentikos ni a hungtun in, a unpi un munkhat ah a omkhawm ua.
Tualeh thakhat in van a kipan in thawmging, huihpi lang bangin ahung om a, tuachi`n a touna inn uh ahung luahdim siang a.
Tuachi`n leite amah leh amah kihawm in mei bangin akiang uah ahung kilang a, tualeh atungchiat uah ahung omta hi.
Tuachi`n aun un Khasiangthou in adimta ua, Kha in ahamsak bang jelin hamdang in ahung hamta uhi.
Tualeh vannuai a nam jousiah lak a kipan Pasian ngaihsak Judate Jerusalem khua ah a om ua.
Tualeh hua thawmging ahung om takin mipi ahung kikhawm ua, tualeh aham uh mi jousiahin amauh ham chiat a ajak jiak un ahung buaita ua.
Tuachi`n aun un lamdang saseng sengin, “Ensin ua hia hamte jousiah Galili gam a mi ngen hilou ahi umaw!
Bang chidan ahia i un ua ipianpih ham ua ijakchiat uh?
Khenkhatte Parthiate, Medeste, Elammite tualeh khenkhat Mesopotamia gam a teng, Kappadosia gam a teng, Judea gam a teng, Pontas gam a teng, Asia gam a teng,
Phrigia gam a teng, Izipt gam a teng tualeh Kurini khuagei lak Libia gam a teng ihi ua; tualeh khenkhat Rom khua a mikhual, Judate leh abiak dan uh juite ihi ua,
khenkhat Krit gam leh Arab gammi bang ihi ua, hinanleh Pasian silbawl thupite agen uh eima ham chiat in ija uh!” achi ua.
Tuachi`n aun un lamdang sa sengseng in abuaita ua, “Hih bang chidan ahia le?” chi`n khat leh khat aki hou ua.
Khenkhat in anuihsan ua, “Uain thak kham ahi uh!” achi uhi.
Hinanleh Peter sawm leh khatte tawh ading khawm a, aw ngaihtakin akiang uah agen a, “Nou Judea gam a tengte leh Jerusalem khua a teng jousiahte aw, hihthu thei unla ka thu zong ngai un.
Hihte nagintat bang un akham kei uh, tu in jingsang dakkua tuam ahi pan hi.
Hinanleh hihte Jawlnei Joel in ana gen ahi hi:
‘Pasian in, ni nunungte ah hichi ahung hi ding:
Mi jousiah tungah ka kha ka buakkhum ding a.
Na tapa na tanute un ka thu agen ding ua,
Na khanglaite un kilakna amu ding ua,
Na teksiate un mang aman ding uh.
Tualeh tuani chiangin ka silapate ka silanute tung ah,
Ka kha kabuak ding a,
Ka thu agen ding uh.
Tualeh tunglam van ah sillamdangte
tualeh nuailam leiah chiamtehnate ka musak ding.
Sisan leh mei tawh meikhu tawh;
Toupa ni thupi leh minthang tak ahung tunma in
Ni mial asuak ding a,
Kha sisan asuak ding.
Tualeh hichi ahung hiding a,
kuahileh Toupa min lou taphot hundam in a om ding uh,’
achi hi, achih.
“Nou Israelte, hihthute ngaiun! Nazareth Jesu Pasian in amah jang a nalak ua sillamdangte, sil thupite leh chiamtehnate abawlte a pat in zong nathei uhi.
Amah pen Pasian lemguat mawng leh theihkholh bangin piakkhiat a om in na paipih ua, migilou khut in kross ah na kilhden ua, na thatlumta uhi.
Amah Pasian in sihna gaknate a phelsak a; a kaithouta hi; sihna tukdet gual ahihlouh jiakin.
Ajiak David in atung thu agen a:
‘Kamai ah bangchiklai peuhin Toupa ka mujing a;
Hihli`ng a ka om louhna dingin ka jiatlam ah a om hi.
Tuajiakin ka lungtang anuam a,
Ka lei zong a kipak a.
Ka taksa zong kinem takin,
a om nalai ding hi.
Ka kha misikhua ah na nusia kei ding a;
Na misiangthou zong muatna na musak kei ding hi.
Nangman hinna lampi nung theisak a,
Nangman namel in kipahna in nung dimsak ding,’
chi in.
“Sanggamte aw, chisuangtu David thu pen laulouin na kiang uah ka gen thei hi, amah pen asi a, vuizong avuita ua, a han zong ikiang uah aom nalai hi.
Tuajiakin amah Jawlnei ahi a, sa dan a akhal a kipanin a Laltouna a tou ding, Krist kung tungdok ding chih, Pasian in kichiam in agen hi chih athei a.
Aman hihpen ana theihkholhsa ahih jiakin, Krist thohkik ding thu agen hi,
‘Amah misikhua ah nutsiat in aom kei a;
Aluang zong amuat kei hi,’ chi in.
Hih Jesu Pasian in a kaithou ta-ngut a, hih thudik i un ua theihpihtute ihi uhi.
Tuajiakin Pasian khut jiatlam ah pahtawiin aom a, tualeh Khasiangthou chiampen Pasian kiang a pat in amu a, namuh uleh najak uh a hungbuak ahi.
David van ah a kahtou kei a; hinanleh a mahmah in,
‘Toupa`n ka Toupa kiangah:
Ka jiatlam ah tou gige in
Na galte na kengphang ngakna a ka bawl masiah achi hi,’
a chijaw hi.
“Tuajiakin Jesu na kilhdenpa uh pen Pasian in Toupa leh Krist hikhawm in a bawlta hi chih, Israel nam jousiahin chiantakin thei uhen!” achi hi.
Tualeh hih thu ajak tak un a lungtang uah sut bang ahung hita ua, tualeh Peter leh sawltak dangte kiangah, sanggamte aw, “Bang ahia ka bawl ding uh?” achi ua.
Tuachi`n Peter in akiang uah, “Kisik unla, na khialhna uh ngaihdam ahihtheihna dingin Jesu Krist min in baptisma tangchiat un, tuachi`n Khasiangthou piak na tang ding uhi.
Achiam pen nou a ding zong, na tate ua ding zong, gamlatak a om jousiah a dingin zong Toupa I Pasian in asap taphot a dingin zong ahi,” achi hi.
Tualeh thudang tamtakin a hilhchian a, “Tulai khangthak giloute lak ah ki humbit un!” chi`n a hanthawn hi.
Tuachi`n athu pom jousiahin baptisma a tang ua; tuani in mi sangthum vel behlap in aom uhi.
Tualeh sawltakte thugin ah leh kipawlna ah, tanghou balkham in thum in phattuam ngaitakin a omjing uhi.
Tuachi`n lauhna mi jousiah tung ah ahung omta a, sawltakte`n sillamdang leh chiamtehnate tamtak a bawl uhi.
Tualeh a gingta jousiah aki punkhawm ua, sil bangkim aki kopkhawmta uhi.
Tualeh a silneih jousiah uh a juak ua, a kisapna bangin aun ua lak ah a hawm jel uhi.
Tuachi`n niteng in lungsim munkhat in tempul ah phattuam ngaitakin aom jel ua, a inn a inn a kipan in tanghou balkham in kipaktak leh lungkim takin a ante uh anejel uhi.
Pasian aphat ua, mi jousiah deihsakna bangin a omjel ua; tualeh hundamna hungmu taphot Toupa`n niteng in akiang uah a behlap sakjel hi.
Tualeh Peter leh Johan dakkua in thumna hun ahih in tempul ah apaitou ua.
Tualeh kuahiam pasal khat apianchil a pat kengbai khat ahung jawng ua, tuapa pen tempul a lutte kiang a silpiak ngen dingin tempul kongkhak kilawm achih uh bul ah niteng in a lumsak jel uhi.
Tuachi`n Peter leh Johan tempul a lutding amu a, silpiak ana ngen a
Tualeh Peter in Johan tawh tangtakin amah a en ua, “Kou hung en in!” achi a.
Tuachi`n aman amauh a enpai a, tualeh amauh a pan bang hiam khat muh aki lam-en a.
Tuachiah Peter in, “Dangka leh kham bangmah ka neikei a, hinanleh ka neihsun kung pia ding; Nazareth Jesu min in thou inla vakta in!” achi a.
Tuachi`n akhut jiatlam a tu-in a kaitou a, thakhat in akeng leh a siatmit guhte ahung hatta a;
tuachi`n amah a tawmdok a, ading a, akeng in apaita a, amauh toh tempul sung ah alutta hi.
Tualeh keng a apai leh Pasian aphat mi jousiahin amu ua,
tuachi`n amau`n, tempul kongkhak kilawm bul a mikiang a silpiak ngen a toujelpa ahi chih athei ua, tualeh atung a siltung lamdang asa mahmah uhi.
Tualeh kengbai hung dampa in Solomon innlim a Peter leh Johan atuklai in, mi jousiahin lamdang asa mahmah ua, akiang uah ahung taikhawm uhi.

Tuachi`n Peter in hua amuh in, mipite kiang ah, “Israel mite aw, bangding a hih lamdang sa nahi ua? Ahihkeileh, kou silbawl theihna leh Pasian ka ngaihsak jiak ua amah ka paisak bang hial a kou hung guh-et nahi ua?
Abrahamte, Isakte, Jakobte Pasian, ipu leh pate Pasian in a sila Jesu a tawisangta ahi, amah na mansak ua, Pilat in khah atup in zong na awikei uhi.
Hinanleh misiangthou leh mi diktat pen na deih kei ua, tualthatpa pen na kiang ua piak na ngenjawta uhi.
Tualeh hinna lengpa na that ua, hinanleh Pasian in amah sihna a pan a kaithou kik a, tua theihpihtute ka hi uhi.
Tualeh amah min gintat jiakin, ama min in hihpa na muh uleh natheih uh pen a hatsakta hi; ahi amah jiak a ginna hung om in, na un ua mitmuh in adamsak sitsetta hi.
“Tuin sanggamte aw, na lamkaite un zong ana bawl bangin, na theihlouh jiak un hih nabawl uh chih ka thei hi.
Hinanleh Pasian in a Jawlnei jousiah kam a, Krist in a thuak ding ahi chih ana genkholhsa pen tuachibang in a tungsakta hi.
Tuajiakin, kisik unla, na khialhnate uh nawtmang ahihtheihna ding in. Ki heikik un, tuachi`n Toupa kiang a pat halhthakna hunte ahung tungthei ding a,
tualeh Jesu Krist nou a ding a aguatsa pen ahung sawl ding hi.
Bangkim bawlhoih hun a hungtun masiah amahpen van in akem tadih ding hi, tua bawlhoih ding pen Pasian in leitung pianchil a pat a Jawlnei siangthou jousiah kam in a genkhinta hi.
Ajiak, diktakin Mosi-in ipu leh pate kiangah, ‘Toupa na Pasian in keimah ahung siam bangin na sanggamte lak ah Jawlnei khat ahung siamsak ding; aman na kiang ua thu agen na ngaihkhiat sak ding uhi.
Tualeh hichi ahung hiding a, mi kuapeuh tua Jawlnei thu ngaihsak lou pen mipi lak a kipan suk mangthang ahi ding uh,’ achi hi.
Ahi, Samuel om a kipat Jawlnei jousiah, tualeh anung uate tawh thu anagen taphot in tuachi bangin tulai tanchin ana genkholh uhi.
Nou, Jawlneite leh thukhun tate na hi uhi. Pasian in Abraham kiangah, ‘Nasuan nakhak jalin leitung a nam jousiah ka gualjawl ding hi,’ chi`n Ipu leh pate kiangah achiam hi.
Pasian in a Tapa Jesu kaithou in, na khialhnate uh kiheisan sak ding leh vang hungpia ding in nou kiangah ahung sawl masapen hi,” achi hi.
Tualeh Peter leh Johan in mi kiang a thu agen laiin, siampite, tempul lamkaite leh Sadukaite a hungpai ua.
Mi ahilh uleh Jesu jiak a misi lak a kipan a thohkikna thu a tangkoupih jiak un buaina thupitak apiangta a.
Tualeh atung uah khut akha ua, ajingni matan thong sungah akhumta uhi.
Hinanleh, thu ngaikhia lak a tamtak in ataksan ua; atam dan uh pasal ngen zong sangnga bang ahi uhi.
Tualeh hichi ahung hi a, ajingni in a lamkaite uleh a upate leh laigelhmite.
Tualeh siampi Anna leh Kaiapha leh Johan leh Aleksander leh siampi chipih jousiahte Jerusalem ah aki khawm ua.
Tualeh Peter leh Johan alai uah a dingsak ua, “Bang thuneihna in ahia, ahihkeileh kua min in ahia hihbang nabawl uh?” chi in adong ua.
Tuachi`n Peterpen, Khasiangthou in ahung dimta a, akiang uah, “Nou mipi lamkaite leh Israel upate aw:
Kou tunia mi hatlou khat hatsakna thu ah, amah bangchi a hungdam ahi hiam, chi a nung phul uleh,
na-unpi un thei un, tualeh Israelmi jousiahin zong thei un, Nazareth Jesu kross a na kilhlup uh, Pasian in misi lak a pat akaithou kik a, amah min in hihpa na-un ua mai ah dam in adingta ahi.
Hih suang ahi,
‘Nou inn bawlten na suang deihlouh uh,
aning a suang poimoh pen ahung hita hi.’
Midang kuamah kiangah hundamna a om kei; vannuai a mihingte kiang a kipia min lak ah hung hundam ding min dang mawng mawng aom kei hi,” achi hi.
Tualeh Peter leh Johan hangsan dan amu ua, tualeh laisiam lou leh mimawltak ahi uh chih atheih un, lamdang asa mahmah ua. Jesu kiangah a omta uh chih a theichianta uhi.
Tualeh a mi damsakpa uh akiang ua ding amuh un, bangmah agenthei takei uhi.
Hinanleh, a vaihawmna pat ua paituam ding a thu apiak nung un aki hou ua.
“Hih mite bang ilawh ding ua le? Sillamdang kithang tak abawl uh Jerusalem khua a om jousiahin kichiantak in athei ua; enzong inial thei tuan kei uhi.
Hinanleh, mi kiang a aki thangsem louhna dingin tubansiah hih min a kuamah kiang a thu agen nawnlouh na ding un khauhtakin ivau ding uh,” achi ua.
Tuachi`n amauh asam ua, Jesu min a thu genkik nawnlou leh hilhkik nawn mawng mawng lou dingin thu apia uhi.
Hinanleh Peter leh Johan in akiang uah, “Pasian mitmuh in Pasian thu man sangin nou thu man ahoihjaw diai le, ngaihtuah un.
Koujaw ka silmuh uleh kajakte uh genlouin ka omthei kei ding uh,” achi ua.
Tuachi`n amauh ahah vau semsem ua, a paisakta uhi. Ajiak asil bawlte uh jiakin mi jousiahin Pasian apahtawi man un, mipi jiakin gawtna lemtang amukei uhi.
Sillamdang a adamsakpa uh kum sawmli sang a tamjaw ahi.
Tualeh Peter leh Johan apawt un alawite uh kiangah apai ua, siampite leh upate`n agen jousiah uh ahilh uhi.
Tualeh amau`n ajaktak un, kituaktak leh aw ngaihtak in, Pasian kiangah, “Toupa, Nang van leh leite, tualeh tuipi leh asung a om jousiahte siamtu Pasian na hi!
Nang na silapa David kam in hih thu na gen hi,
‘Bang chidan a Jentelte heh uh ahia;
tualeh miten bang chidan ahia sil phatuam lou a ngaihtuah uh?
Leitung kumpipate ading ua,
vaihawmte zong a kikhawm uh
Toupa leh Krist kalh in,’ chi in.
Na sila, na thaunuh Jesu tung ah, Herod leh Pontia Pilat tawh Jentelte leh Israelmite aki khawm takpi uhi.
Na khut leh na lungsim ahung tung ding a na guatkholh taphot bawl dingin.
Tualeh, tuin, Toupa, ahung galgik dan uh en in; tualeh na silate`n hangsan tak a na thu agentheihna ding un pia in.
Mite damsak ding a nakhut jan in; na sila siangthou Jesu min jal a chiamtehnate leh sillamdangte bawl in,” achi ua.
Tualeh, athum zoh un a omkhawmna mun uh ahung kiling a; tualeh aunpi un Khasiangthou in ahung dimsiangta ua, tuachi`n Pasian thu hangsan takin a genta uhi.
Tualeh agingta mipite lungsim khat leh ngaihtuah mun khat in a om ua; alak ua khat in zong a silneih pen kei a tuam ahi achi kei ua; a silneih jousiah a kikopjel uhi.
Tualeh Sawltakte`n sil bawltheihna thupi tak tawh Toupa Jesu thohkikna thu ahilh ua, a un ua tungah hehpihna thupitak aom hi.
Alak uah zong tasam kuamah aom kei uhi. Gamte ahihkeileh inn neite`n ajuak ua, a siljuakte uh man a hungtawi ua,
sawltakte kengbul ah a koihjel uhi; tualeh michih kiangah apoimoh uh ching hun chiat in a hawm jel uhi.
Tualeh, Jos, sawltakte`n Barnabas achih uh (hua min omdan pen, “Khamuanna ta chihna ahi”), Levi chi Kupra gammi ahi a,
agam neihpen ajuak a, aman ahung tawi a, sawltakte kiangah akoihta hi.
Hinanleh mikhat amin Anania in azi Saphira tawh aneih uh ajuak ua.
Tualeh azi theihpih in aman kimkhat a imta a, tualeh, akimkhat hung tawiin sawltakte kengbul ah akoih a.
Hinanleh Peter in, “Anania, Khasiangthou khem ding leh gam man kimkhat koihkhen dingin bangding a setan in na lungsim dimsak ahiam?
A om sungteng nang a hijinglou amaw? Na juak nungin zong na thuthu in a omkei ama? Bangding a hih thute na lungsim a ngaihtuah? Mihing khem na hikei a Pasian khem nahijaw hi!” achi hi.
Tualeh Anania in hihthu ajaktakin, apuk a, asita a, tualeh huathu jajousiah alau mahmahta uhi.
Tualeh tangvalte ahung pai ua atuam ua, azawngkhia ua, avuita uhi.
Tualeh dakkal thum ding vel zoh in azi, sil omdan theilou pi-in a hung lut a,
Tualeh Peter in akiang ah; “Hung hilhin, gam hihzah in ahi maw najuak uh?” achi a.
Tualeh amah nu`n, “Hi, hihzah in ahi,” achi a.
Tuachi`n, Peter in amahnu kiangah, “Bangding a Toupa Khasiangthou ze-et ding a ki thutuak na hi ua? Ngaiin na pasal vuite keng kongkhak ahung geita, nang zong ahung jongkhia ding uh!” achi a.
Tuachi`n thakhat in akengbul ah apuk pai a, asita hi; tuachi`n tangvalte ahung lut ua, amahnupen si-in ahung mu ua, azawngkhia ua, a pasal kiangah avuita uhi.
Tuachi`n saptuam jousiah leh huathu zakha jousiahte kiangah launa thupitak ahung omta hi.
Tualeh sawltakte khut in mi lak ah chiamtehna leh sillamdang tamtak abawl jel hi. Tualeh amauh aun un lungsim munkhat in Solomon innlim ah a om uhi.
Midang kuamah alak uah ajaungam takei uhi, hinanleh mi`n amauh a ngaisang mahmah uhi.
Tualeh gingthak numei leh pasal tampi tak Toupa kiangah ahung ki behlap deuh deuh uhi.
Tuachi`n mi damloute kongjing ahung paipih in lupnate, phekte ah alumsak ua, Peter apaikawm a alimbek in, khenkhat bek aliah theihna dingin, achi ua.
Tualeh Jerusalem kim a khuate a kipan mipite zong damloute leh dawinin bawlgimte hung paipih in ahung kikhawm ua; huate zong ahung damsiangta uhi.
Tuachi`n siampite leh alawite jousiah ading ua, tua alawite pen Sadukai pawl a ahi uhi. A thangsia mahmah ua.
Tualeh sawltakte aman ua, vantang khumna thong ah akhumta uhi.
Hinanleh Toupa vantungmi in janin thong kongkhakte hung hong in amauhte apaikhiat pih a,
“Pai unla, tempul ah ding unla, mikiang ah hih hinna thu jousiah vagen un,” achi a.
Tualeh huathu ajak un jingsang matakin tempul ah ava lut ua, thu ava hilh ua.
Hinanleh siampite leh alawite ahung pai ua; vaihawmte leh Israel suan upate tengteng asam khawm ua, sawltakte vapui dingin thong ah asawl uhi.
Hinanleh lamkaite avapai ua, thong ah amauh ava muta kei ua, ahung ki nungleh kik ua,
“Thong bittak a kikhak in leh avengtute zong a pualam ah kongkhak bul ah dingin kamu ua, hinanleh kahon uleh asung ah kuamah kamu kei uhi!” chi`n agen ua.
Tempul lamkai leh siampite`n hua thu atheih un hih bangzah takin ahung thang tazen diam aw, chi`n lamdang asa uhi.
Tuachi`n, mi khat ahung pai a akiang uah, “En un! Thong a na mi khumte un tempul ah dingin mi thu ahilh uh!” chi`n ahung gen a.
Tuachi`n lamkaipa upate tawh avapai ua, mipite alau jiak un bawlsialou in ahung paipih ua, atuachilou hileh suang a den in aom ding uhi.
Tualeh amauh ahung puitung tak un, vaihawmte maiah thusit ding in a dingsak ua, tuatak in siampi in a kiang uah.

“Hih min a thu hilhkik nawnlou dingin thu kungpiata uh hilou maw,” tualeh “En un na thugin un Jerusalem khua na dimsuak sakta uh, tualeh hihpa sisan ka tung ua hung khusak tum na hi uh hiam, chi`n adong ua!”
Hinanleh Peter leh sawltak dangte`n, mihing thu sangin Pasian thu kaman jawk ding uh ahi.
Jesu, nou singdawn a khai a na thahpa uh, Ipu leh pate Pasian in a kaithouta hi.
Amah Pasian in kumpipa leh hundampa a om dingin a jiatlam ah a tawisangta a, Israelte kiang a kisikna leh khial ngaihdamna pia ding in.
Tualeh, kou hih thute theihpihtute ka hi uhi; tuachimah bangin Khasiangthou, Pasian in athujui jousiahte kiang a apiak zong theihpihtu ahi nalai hi, achi ua, adawng ua.
Tualeh amau`n hihthu ajaktak un aheh mahmah ua, thah asawmta uhi.
Tuachi`n vaihawmmite lak a mi khat amin Gamaliel, Pharisai, dan lam a siapa a minthang tak khat ahung ding a, hua sawltakte paikhiat pih phot dingin thu apia a.
Tuachi`n akiang uah, “Nou Israelmite aw, hih mite tung a na silbawl sawm uh pilvang un.
Tuma in zong Theoda, milian ka hi chi`n ahung om a, mi tamtak zali vel bangin amah anazom ua, amah thahlup in a omta a, tualeh amah zomteng zong a ki thehthangta ua, bangmah ahita kei uhi.
Hihpa nungin minkhum laiin, Galili gammi Juda ahung om kik a, a kiang ah mi tamtak ala a, hinanleh amah zong asita a, tualeh athu juite jousiah zong aki thehjakta uhi.
Tualeh tuin kung hilh ahi, hih mite khoihdah unla, hichi`n ommai uheh! Hih asiltup uleh asilbawl uh mihing a kipan ahihleh ahung mang ding hi,
hinanleh Pasian bawl ahihleh, amauh na hihmang thei kei ding uhi. Atuachih keileh Pasian dou nahi kha laizang ding uhi!” achi hi.
Tualeh agenpen lem asa ua, tuachi`n sawltakte asam ua, azep ua, azep zoh un Jesu min a thu gennawn mawng mawng lou dingin thu apia ua, akhahta uhi.
Tuachi`n amauh vaihawmte lak a pat a pawtkhia ua, hua min jiak a jumna thuaktak a guat ahihjiak un akipak mahmah uhi.
Tualeh nitengin tempul leh innchin ah Jesu Krist ahi chia thuhilh leh tangkou atawpkei uhi.
Tualeh huahun lai a nungjuite atam semsem lai un, a niteng silhawm uah meithaite a ngaihsak louh gige jiak un Grik ham jang Judate Hebraite tungah aphunta ua.
Tuachi`n sawm leh nihte`n nungjui mipite asam ua, “Pasian nasep ka tawpsan ua dohkan tung a nek ding nna kasep uh ahoihkei ding hi.
Tuajiakin sanggamte aw, nalak ua Khasiangthou leh pilna a kidim, mihoih ngen sagih tel un, amauhte hih sil ngaihtuah dingin i bawl ding uhi.
Hinanleh kou pen thumna leh thu nna sem ding in kung ki pumpiak jing ding uhi,” achi ua.

Tualeh huathu in mijousiah aki paksak a, tuachi`n Stephen, ginna leh Khasiangthou a dim tawh, Philip tawh, Prokoras tawh, Nikanor tawh, Timon tawh, Parmenas tawh, Judate biak dan jui, Antiok khua a mi Nikolas tawh atel ua.
Amauhte sawltakte mai ah adingsak ua, athum ua, atung uah akhut uh akoih uhi.
Tuachi`n Pasian thu ahung kithehjak deuhdeuh a, Jerusalem ah nungjuite ahung tam mahmahta uhi. Tualeh siampute lak ah zong mi tamtak ginna lam ah a thumangta uhi.
Tualeh, Stephen, ginna leh sil bawltheihna a dim in mi lak ah sillamdang leh chiamtehna thupitakte a bawljel hi.

Tuachi`n sal a pat suahtakna ngahmite, Kurini khua-ate, Aleksandria khua a mite kikhopna inn achih ua mi khenkhat leh Silisia gam a leh Asia gamate kikhopna inn a mi khenkhatte ahung kisa ua, Stephen ahung kinialpih uhi.
Hinanleh apilna leh a genpihtu Khasiangthou tuh anialkhia thei takei uhi.
Tuachi`n mi agu`k in athuzoh ua, huate`n, “Mosi leh Pasian agensiat uh kaja uh!” achi ua.
Tuachiah mipi, upate, laigelhmite a tokthou ua, tuachi`n amauh ahung pai ua, Stephen aman ua, vaihawmmite kiangah apaipih uhi.
Tualeh theihpihtu dikloute abawl ua, huate`n, “Hihpa`n, hih mun siangthou leh Mosi dan agensia gige,
Ajiak, hih Nazareth Jesu`n hih mun siangthou a hihsia ding a, Mosi-in dan ahung piakte akhek lamdang ding chia agen kaja uh!” achi ua.
Tualeh vaihawmna a toute jousiah in Stephen a ensal chiat ua, amel vantungmite mel bangin amu uhi.
Tuachi`n siampi in, “Hih thute adik hina hiam?” achi a.
Tualeh Stephen in, “Sanggamte leh pate aw, Ngai un! Ipu uh Abraham Haran khua a atenma a, Mesopotamia gam a atenlai in, thupina Pasian a kiangah ahung kilak a
‘na gam a kipat leh nachite a kipat pawtkhia inla, gam kung etsak ding lam ah hungpai in,’ achi hi.
Tuachi`n amah Kaldaite gam a kipat apaikhia a Haran ah avatengta hi. Tualeh apa asih nungin Pasian in hua a pat in hih tu a natenna gam uah a pemlut sakta hi.
Tualeh hihsan ah mun luah ding bangmah, akeng ngakna ding khop zong apiakei a, hinanleh ta aneihma pek in amah leh anung a asuante gou ding tanpha in achiam hi.
Hinanleh Pasian in hichi bangin agen a: ‘Asuante mi gam ah ata`m ding ua, suak in akhoi ding ua, tualeh kum zali abawl genthei ding uhi.
Tualeh, Pasian in suak a aom na ding nam keiman ka ngaihtuah ding a, tuazoh chiangin ahung pawt ding ua hihmun ah kana asem ding uh,’ achi hi.

Tuachi`n Pasian in akiang uah teptan thukhun apia hi. Tuachi`n Abraham in Isak asuang a, tualeh ani giatni-in atep atan a, tualeh Isak in Jakob asuang a, tualeh Jakob in chikhahtu sawmlehnihte asuang hi.
“Tualeh chikhahtute thangsiatna in hungdim in Joseph pen Izipt gam lam ah ajuakta ua, hinanleh Pasian akiang ah aom a,
a gimthuaknate jousiah a pat ahunkhia jel a. Izipt gam kumpipa angsung ah deihsakna leh pilna apia a, tuachi`n amah Izipt gam leh a Inn a mi jousiah tung ah gam ukpa in abawlta hi.
Tuachi`n Izipt gam leh Kanan gam ah kial a hungtung a, gimthuakna thupitak ahung omta a, Ipu Ipate un nek ding mawng mawng amu nawn takei uhi.
Hinanleh Jakob in Izipt gam ah buh aom chih ajak takin Ipu Ipate uh asawl a, huapen apai masakna uh ahi.
Tualeh anihvei paina uah Joseph in a sanggamte a kitheisak ta a, tualeh Joseph sanggamte Pharoah atheisakta uhi.
Tuachi`n Joseph in apa Jakob leh a sanggamte jousiah a samsak a, aun un sawm sagih leh nga ahi uhi.
Tuachi`n Jakob Izipt gam ah apaisuk a, tualeh amah asita a, amah leh Ipate uh.
Tualeh aluang uh Sekem khua a puatung ua, Abraham in Sekempa Hamor tapate kiang a sum a alei han ah avuita uhi.
“Hinanleh Pasian in Abraham kiang a athuchiam atun hun ahungnai takin, amauh Izipt gam ah hung khang in ahung tam deuhdeuhta ua.
Atawp in Joseph theilou kumpi dangin vai ahung hawm a.
Aman ichi leh namte a jekhem a, Ipu leh pate tung ah akhansia a, a naungekte uh hinglou dingin a paikhiasak jel hi.
Hih hun laiin Mosi a hungpiang a, amel ahoih mahmah a, apa inn ah khathum avak ua,
tualeh amah inn a pat a paihkhiat un, Pharoah tanu in ala a, ama tapa dingin avakta hi.
Tuachi`n amah Izipt gam pilna jousiah ahilhta ua, tuachi`n thu leh silbawl ah a thupi mah mahta hi.
“Tualeh Mosi kum sawmli ahung hih in, achi leh nam Israelte bangin aki enkol a chih kan ahung utta a.
Tualeh alak ua mikhat diklou tak a sukgim a om amu a, apai a ava hun a, a phuba a laksak a, Izipt gam mipa a thatta hi.
Ajiak aman ama khut in Pasian in amauh hunkhia ding ahi, chih a sanggamte`n theiding asa a; hinanleh amau`n a theikei uhi.
Tualeh ajingni-in Israelmi nih kihau amu a, aman kilemsak asawm a akiang uah, ‘Ngai un, nou Israelmi tuak hilou nahi uh maw, bangding a hichibang a kihau nahi ua?’ achi a.
Hinanleh khatpa tung a sil gilou bawljawpa in Mosi asawn khia a. ‘Kuan nang ka tung ua vaihawm ding leh lamkaitu dingin ahung bawl a?’
‘Jani a Iziptmi na thah bang a hung thahsawm na maw?’ achi a.
Hih thu Mosi-in ajak takin Izipt a pat a taimangta a, Midian gam ah ateng a, huasan ah tapa nih avanei hi.
“Tualeh kum sawmli abei nungin, Sinai mualgei gamdai ah sawlbawk ah meikuang lak ah Pasian vantungmi khat akiang ah ahung kilak a.
Mosi-in hih amuh takin, asil muh lamdang sa in en ding in avanaih laiin Toupa aw in akiang ah:
‘Kei napu napate uh Pasian ka hi, Abraham Pasian, Isak Pasian, Jakob Pasian,’ achi a. Tuatakin Mosi a kithing a, a enngam takei hi.
Tuachi`n Toupa`n akiang ah, ‘Na khedap sut in, nadinna munsiangthou ahi.
Izipt gam a kami omte gentheihna ka mujing a. Tualeh a thumna uh zong kajata a, amauh hunkhia ding a hung paisuk ka hi. Hungpai in, Izipt gam ah kung sawl ding,’ achi hi.

“Hih Mosi, ‘lamkaitu leh vaihawmtu dingin kuan ahung bawl a?’ chia ahuat uh sawlbawk lak a akiang a hung kilak vantungmi ki thuahpih sakin Pasian in amah lamkaitu leh hunkhiatu kikawm dingin a sawlta hi.
Aman Izipt gam lak ah, tuipi san ah, tualeh gamdai ah sillamdang leh chiamtehnate amuhsak nungin amauh a puikhiata hi.
Israel suante kiang a ‘Toupa na Pasian un keimah ahung sawl mahbang in, na sanggamte ah mikhat ahung sawlsak ding a, ama thu na ngaikhia ding uhi, chitu tua Mosi pen hih ahi.’
Sinai mual a amah tawh kihou vantungmi leh Ipu leh pate tawh gamdai a saptuamte lak a om, ikiang ua piaksawn ding a thuhing latu hihpa ahi.
“Hinanleh Ipu leh pate`n athu ajui ut kei ua; ahua ua, tualeh Izipt gam a lunggulh kik ua.
Aaron kiangah, ‘I makai dingin pasiante hung bawlsak in, ajiak hih Mosi Izipt gam a hung puikhiapa lah a tanchin ka theikha nawn kei uh,’ achi ua.
Tualeh hualaiin bawngnou lim abawl ua, alim pen gan that in abia ua, tuachi`n amauh khutsuak tungah a kipak mahmah uhi.
Tuachi`n Pasian in aki heisan a, van a aksite abiak theihna ding un amauh a nusiata hi. Jawlnei laibu a:
‘Israel namte aw!
gamdai ah kum sawmli sungin
sa leh gan that in kei nung biangai uh maw.
Molok puanbuk leh
na pasian uh Remphan aksi biak ding a na bawlte uh na zongjaw ua,
amauhte milim ahi uhi.
Tualeh ken nou Babilon khuakhen lam ah kung puimang ding chih gelh bangin.’
“Alim amuh bang a bawl ding a Mosi hilhtu in aguat bangin, Ipu leh pate un hua gamdai ah theihsakna puanbuk anei ua.
Tuamah ahi Ipu leh pate khaksawnte`n Pasian in Ipu leh pate, maia Jentel ahawlkhiatte gam aluah laiun Joshua lut bangin alutpih ua, David hung om tanin huasan ah aom jingta hi.
Tua David pen Pasian mitmuh in deihsakna amu a, Jakob Pasian dingin biak inn bawlsak a ut a.
Hinanleh Solomon in tua inn alam jawta hi.
“Hinanleh tungnung pen Pasian ahihleh khut a bawl inn peuh ah aom kei hi. Jawlnei in,
‘Toupa`n van ka touna ahi a,
lei kakeng ngakna ahi.
inn bang chibangin nung bawlsak ding uai?
ka khawlna mun zong bang ahiai?
Ka khut in hih sil jousiah abawl hilou maw?’
achi a, chia agen bangin.
“Mi genhak, lungtang leh bil teptanloute aw!” Khasiangthou na doudal jing uhi! “Na pu leh pate bawl bangin nabawl jing uhi!
Na pu leh pate un Jawlneite lak ah kua ahia abawl gentheih louh uh a om? Tualeh midiktak hungpai ding thu genkholhte athat ua, hua midiktak mansaktu, thattute tuin noumah ngei na hi uhi.
Dan vantungmite piaksawn munapi a juingailoute aw!” achi hi.
Hih thute ajaktak un alungtang uah sattan abangta ua, a hagawtkhumta uhi.
Hinanleh amahpen Khasiangthou a dim in vanlam a ensaal a, Pasian thupina leh Pasian jiatlam a tou Jesu amu a.
“En in! van kihong a, tualeh Pasian jiatlam a mihing Tapa ding zong kamu hi!” achi a.
Tuachi`n amauh aw ngaihtakin akikou ua, abil uh ahum ua, thakhat a pang in adelh ua,
tualeh khua a pat in ahawlkhia ua suang in adeng ua, tualeh a theihpihtute`n tangval khat amin Saul kengbul ah apuante uh akoih uhi.
Tualeh Stephen in, “Toupa Jesu kakha la in!” chia Pasian asap laiin suang in adeng loulou uhi.
Tuachi`n amah akhupdin a, aw ngaihtakin akikou a, “Toupa! Hih akhialhna uah moh puasak ken!” achi a. Tualeh hihthu agenzoh in a ihmuta hi.
Tualeh Saul in zong Stephen sih pen lem asa hi.
Huahun laiin Jerusalem khua a saptuam omte nasiatakin a bawlgenthei panta ua. Tuachi`n sawltakte chihlouh ngal Judea leh Samaria gam khuachin ah a kithehjak siangta uhi.
Tualeh Pasian ngaihsak kuate hiam in Stephen luang puain avui ua, nasatak in asu`n uhi.
Saul in ahihleh saptuam pawlte a bawlgenthei mahmah a, innchin ah alut a, numei pasal akaikhia a, thong ah akhum hi.
Tualeh aki thehjakte khuachin ah apai ua, thu a genta uhi.
Tuachi`n Philip pen Samaria khuapi ah apaisuk a, akiang uah Krist thu agen hi,
Tualeh a sillamdang bawlte amuh uleh ajak un mipite`n Philip thugen lungsim munkhat in a ngaihsak mahmah uhi.
Dawininte, aw ngaihtak a kikou a mi tampi amatte uh sung a kipat ahung pawt ua, tualeh jeng leh kengbaite zong ahung damtak jiak un.
Tua khuapi ah kipakna thupitak ahung omta hi.
Hinanleh amin Simon kichi mi khat aom a. Aman ahihleh milian ka hi chi`n tu masangin hua khuapi ah mitphialdawi zang in Samariamite lamdang satakin akoihjel a,
mi jousiahin aneupen a pat alianpen tanpha in, “Hihmi pen ‘Pasian silbawl theihna thupi ahi achih uh ahi,’ ” chi`n athu a ngaihsak jel uhi.
Tualeh mitphial dawia hun sawttak lamdang taktak ana bawltak jiakin amah angaihsak mahmah uhi.
Hinanleh amau`n Pasian gam leh Jesu Krist tangthupha Philip thugen agintat tak un, anumei apasal in baptisma atangta uhi.
Tuachi`n Simon amah ngeiin zong ahung gingta ta a, tualeh baptisma atan nungin Philip kiangah a omjing a, chiamtehna leh sillamdang thupi taktak kibawlte amuh in lamdang asathei mahmah hi.
Tualeh sawltakte Jerusalem a omten Samariate`n Pasian thu a awita uh chih atheih un, akiang uah Peter leh Johan asawl ua.
Amauh ava tunsuk un Khasiangthou atan theihna ding un a thumsak ua.
Hua masang in ahihleh alak ua kuamah tung ah atung naikei a, Toupa Jesu min a baptisma atan maimai uh ahi nalai hi.
Tuachi`n sawltakte`n atung uah akhut uh anga ua, Khasiangthou atangta uhi.
Tualeh Simon in sawltakte khut ngak jiak a Khasiangthou piak ahi chih atheih takin,
“Hichibang thuneihna hungpia un, kuatung hitaleh zong khut ka ngakna phot in Khasiangthou amuh theihna ding un,” chi`n dangka piak asawm a.
Hinanleh Peter in akiang ah, “Na dangka nang mah tawh mangkhawm heh, Pasian silpiak dangka tawh lei nasawm jiak in!
Hih thua ka nasep na uah nang panna nanei kei a, tan zong na neikei hi, na lungtang Pasian mitmuh a adiklouh jiak in.
Tuajiakin, na khialhna kisik inla, Pasian kiangah thum in, tuachi`n na lungtang a na ngaihtuah ahung ngaihdam khamoh kei ding hi.
Ajiak, nang pen gu khatak leh khialhna sal a tang na hi chih kung thei hi.”
Tuachi`n Simon in adawng a, “Na silgente uh ka tung a atunlouhna dingin Pasian kiangah hung thumsak un,” achi a.
Tuachi`n amau`n Toupa thu atheihsak zoh uh leh agenzoh nung un Jerusalem khua ah apaikikta ua, Samariate khua tamtak ah tangthupha a genta uhi.
Tualeh Toupa vantungmi in Philip ahoupih a, “Thou inla simlam a kipan Gaza khua sunsuk lampi, tua gamdai ah paiin,” achi hi.
Tualeh amah athou a, apaita a. Tualeh ngaiin, Ethiopia gam a mi khat, Ethiopia kumpinu Kandake nuai a michilgeh lamkai liantak, agou jousiah kemtu Jerusalem khua ah Pasian bia dingin avapai a.
A kilehlam in a sakolleng a toukawm in Jawlnei Isaiah laibu asim a,
Tuachi`n Khasiangthou in Philip kiangah, “Tua sakolleng vanaih inla, va kithuahpih in,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n Philip akiang ah avatai a, Jawlnei Isaiah laibu asim aja a, “Nasim pen na theisiam ei?” achi a.
Tualeh aman, “Kuahiam in ahung hilhchian kei leh bang kachi theihsiam dia?” achi a. Tuachiah Philip kahtou a akiang a tou dingin achial a.
Pasian Laisiangthou asimna mun ahihleh hih ahi:
“Thahding belam bangin amah apaipih ua,
tualeh belamnou amulmetpa maia a daihdide bangin.
Aman zong akam akak kei hi.
A kingiamkhiat laiin a thudikna lakmangin a om a.
Asuante tanchin kuan ahia hung gen ding,
leitung a panin ahinna laksak ahih jiakin,”
chih.
Tualeh michilgeh in Philip ahoupih a, akiang ah, “Hung hilh in, hih thu Jawlneiin kua thu agenna ahia? ama thu ahia, ahihkeileh midang thu?” achi a.
Tuachi`n Philip in akam akak a, tua Pasian Laisiangthou a panin akiang ah Jesu tanchin a genta hi.
Tualeh lampi a apai laiun tui omna munkhat a hungtung ua, tuatakin michilgeh in, “En in, hihsan ah tui aom. Baptisma katanna dingin bangin ahung dal a?” achi a.
Tuachi`n Philip in, “Na lungtang tengteng a na gintak leh na tangthei hi,” achi a. Tuachiah aman adawng a, “Jesu Krist hih Pasian Tapa ahi chih ka gingta hi,” achi a.
Tuachi`n sakolleng khawlsak in anih un, Philip leh michilgeh tuilak ah apaisuk khawm ua, Philip in amah a baptista hi.
Tualeh tui a pat apawtkhiat tak un, Toupa Khasiangthou in Philip a lamangta a, michilgeh in a mukik takei hi. Tualeh a lampi ah nuamtak in apaijel ta hi.
Hinanleh Philip Azota khua ah amukik ta ua, tualeh pai suaksuak in Kaisaria khua atun masiah khuachin ah tangthupha a genta hi.
Tuachi`n Saul in Toupa nungjuite avau thu leh thah atup thu genkhia kawm kawm in siampi kiangah avapai a.
Tualeh Damaska khua a kikhopna innte a dingin lai a ngen a, lampi a mi kuapeuh pasal hi`n numei hitaleh amuh muh kansa a Jerusalem khua a ahung paipih theihna ding in.
Tualeh khualzin a Damaska khuagei a hungtun in, thakhat in van a kipan in vak akim ah ahung tang a.
Tuachi`n leiah apuk a, “Saul, Saul! Nang bangding a hung bawlgenthei na hia?” chi`n aw aja a.
Tuachi`n aman, “Toupa kua na hiam?” achi a.
Tuachi`n Toupa`n, “Jesu na bawlgentheih ka hi,” chiangjumte pekjing nang a dingin ahaksa hi, achi a.

Tuachi`n aman kithing kawm leh lamdang satakin, Toupa bang bawl dingin nungdeih a? achi a. Tuachi`n Toupa`n akiang ah, “Thou inla khuapi sung ah lut in, tuachi`n nabawl ding ahung nahilh ding uh,” achi hi.
Tualeh amah tawh zinkhawmte gen ding beiin ading ua, aw aja ua, hinanleh kuamah amukei uhi.
Tuachi`n Saul leia kipan in athou a, ahung hak a hinanleh bangmah amuthei kei a, tuachi`n akhut in akai ua, Damaska khua ah apuilut uhi.
Tuachi`n khua mulou in nithum aom a, bangmah ane in adawn kei hi.
Tualeh Damaska ah amin Anania kichi nungjui khat aom a, Toupa`n mangmu bangin akiang ah, “Anania!” achi a, tualeh aman,
“Toupa hiah ka om,” achi a.
Toupa`n akiang ah, “Thou inla, lamlian tang achih uah pai inla, tualeh Juda inn a om Tarsa khua a mi amin Saul kichi kankhia in, ajiak ngaiin, athum laitak ahi, achi a,
tualeh mangmu bangin mikhat amin Anania kichi lut a, amit vaksak ding a atung a akhut ngain amuta hi.”
Tuachi`n Anania in, “Toupa, hihpa in Jerusalem khua a na misiangthoute tung a sil hoihlou abawl dante mi tampi kam ah kija hi.
Tualeh hihsan ah zong na min lou jousiahte mattheihna dingin siampite kiang a kipan in thu amu hi,” achi a.
Hinanleh Toupa`n akiang ah, “Pai maiin, ajiak amah pen Jentelte leh kumpipate leh Israelte kiang a Ka thu pualut ding a ka belseh ahi.
Tualeh kamin jiak a bang zahta a thupi ahia athuak ding, akiang ah theisak ding ka hi,” achi hi.

Tuachi`n Anania avapai a, inn ah alut a, atung ah khut ngaiin, “Sanggampa Saul, namit vakna ding leh Khasiangthou na dimtheihna dingin, Toupa, nung paina lampi a na kiang a kilak Jesu ngeiin a hungsawl ahi,” achi hi.
Thakhat in lip tawh kibang banghiam khat amit a kipan akiata a, tualeh thakhat in amit ahung vakta a, tuachi`n a thou a, baptisma atangta hi;
tuachi`n an ane a, a halhta hi. Tuachi`n Saul Damaska a nungjui omte kiang ah ni bangzah hiam atam hi.
Tualeh kikhopna innte ah Jesu pen Pasian Tapa ahihdan thu atang koupihpai ngal hi.

Tuachi`n athu jate jousiahin lamdang asa mahmah ua, “Hihpa Jerusalem khua a, hih min loute bawlgenthei jelpa hilou amaw? Tualeh kansa a siampite kiang a pui tum a hihsan a hungpai hilou amaw?” achi ua.
Hinanleh Saul pen ahung hat semsem a, Jesu hi Krist ahi taktak hi chih hilhchian in Damaska khua a Juda omte angaihna theilouin akoih hi.
Tualeh ni tamtak nungin amah thah tum in Judate akihou ua,
hinanleh Saul in athiltup uh ana thei a. Tualeh amau`n amah thah tum in kulh kongkhak sun leh janin ata`ng uhi.
Tuachi`n nungjuite`n amah janin apui ua, kulhbang ah bawm in a khaikhiata uhi.
Tualeh Saul Jerusalem atun in nungjuite kithuahpih asawm a. Hinanleh amau`n nungjui ahih a gintatlouh jiak un alau mahmah uhi.
Hinanleh Barnaba in amah apui a, sawltate kiang ah ahung paipih a. Lampi a Toupa amuh a, ahoupih bang, tualeh Damaska khua a Jesu min a hangsantak a thu agendante bang a genta a.
Tuachi`n amah Jerusalem khua ah akiang uah lutjel pawtjel in aomta hi.
