Toupa Jesu min in hangsan takin thu agen jel a, tualeh Grik Judate anial a, hinanleh amau`n amah thah atum uhi.
Tuachia a sanggamte`n atheih tak un Kaisaria khua ah apaipih suk ua, Tarsa khua ah asawl mangta uhi.
Tuachi`n saptuamte Judea gam vel, Galili gam vel, Samaria gam vel ah adet deuhdeuh ua, muangtak in aomta uhi. Tualeh Toupa laudan siam in, Khasiangthou khamuan in aom ua, ahung tam deuhdeuhta uhi.
Tualeh hichi ahung hi a, Peter pen gam jousiah tuan in apai a, Lidda khua a misiangthou tengte kiang ah ahung paisuk a.
Tualeh huasan ah amin Aenia kichi, ajeng jiak a kum giat lupna a lumjing khat amu a.
Tualeh Peter in akiang ah, “Aenia, Jesu Krist in ahung damsak hi, thou inla napuan phah jial in,” achi a, tuachi`n amah athou pai a.
Tuachi`n Lidda leh Saron a om jousiahin amah amu ua, Toupa lam angata uhi.
Tualeh Joppa khua ah amin Tabitha kichi nungjui khat aom a. (Tabitha Grik ham in Dorka ahi) Hih numeiin sil bawlhoih leh silpiak ahau mahmah hi.
Tualeh hichi ahung hi a, hualaiin achi ana a, asita a, asilzoh un inndan tungnung ah alumsak uhi.
Tualeh Lidda khua hi Joppa khua gei ahihjiak in nungjuite`n Peter huasan ah aom chih aja ua, “Sawt hallou a akiang ua hungpai ding a va-ngen dingin akiang ah minih asawl ua.”

Tuachi`n Peter athou a amauhgel tawh akitonta a. A hungtun in amah inndan tungnung ah apaipih ua, tualeh meithai jousiah akiang a dingin Dorka akiang ua adamlai a apuan ak bawlte apuan bawlte lak pum in akap ua.
Hinanleh Peter in aun un apawtsak a, akhupdin a athumta a; tualeh aluanglam nga in, “Tabitha thou in!” achi a, tualeh amahnu`n amit ahung hah a, Peter amuhtak in ahung touta hi.
Tuachi`n Peter in akhut apia a, akaithouta a, tualeh misiangthoute meithaite asam a, dam in apiata hi.
Tualeh huathu Joppa khua mi jousiahin atheisuak ua, tuachi`n mi tampi in Toupa agingta uhi.
Tualeh hichi ahung hi a, Peter pen Joppa khua ah savun bawlpa Simon inn ah ni tampi atamta hi.
Tualeh, Kaisaria khua ah amin Kolnelia kichi mi khat aom a, “Itali galkap pawl a jalamkai ahi a.”
Pasian ngaihsakmi ahi a, a innkuante jousiah tawh Pasian laudan asiam ua, mi kiang ah sil tampi apia a, tualeh Pasian kiang ah zong a thum jing hi.
Aman sun dakkua ding vel in mangmu bangin, chiantakin Pasian vantungmi khat akiang a lut a, “Kolnelia!” chi`n amu a.
Tuachi`n Kolnelia in, amah a etleh, alau a, “Toupa, bang ahita a?” achi a.
Tuachi`n vantungmi in akiang ah, “Na thumnate leh na silpiakte theihjing dingin Pasian maiah ahung tungtouta hi.
Tualeh tuin Joppa khua ah mi sawl inla, mi khat amin Simon, amin khem Peter kichi va samsak in.
Amah ahihleh tuipi gei a om, savun bawlpa Simon inn a tung ahi,” achi a.
Tuachi`n vantungmi Kolnelia houpih pen apaikhit tak in Kolnelia in asilate lak a mi nih leh amah nna sepsak jingte lak a Pasian ngaihsak galkap mi khat asam a.
Tuachia thu jousiah akiang ua a hilhkhit takin Joppa khua ah asawlta hi.
Ajingni a apai laiun, tualeh khuapi atunkuan un, Peter thum dingin intung ah akahtou a, sun dakkal gukna ding vel ahi a.
Tuachi`n agil ahung kial mahmah a, annek a ut a, hinanleh nek ding a bawllai un ana haitu man a.
Tualeh, van kihong in, banghiam bawm liantak khat aningli a kikhih a, leia hung ki khaikhiasuk in amu a.
Huasung ah leitung a kengli nei ganhing chichin teng leh gamsate leh ganhing bokvakte leh tungleng vasate aom a.
Tualeh akiang ah aw khat in, “Peter thou inla, tualeh that inla ne in!” achi a.
Hinanleh Peter in, hilou e, “Toupa! ajiak sil sianglou leh anin kichi mawng mawng ka nengai kei hi,” achi a.
Tualeh aw in anihveina in, “Pasian in a suksiangthousa nang siangthoulou chiken,” achi hi.
Tuachibang in thumvei ahung om a, tuachi`n asil bawm pen van ah khaitouh in aom kikta hi.
Tualeh Peter in mangmu bang a asilmuh angaihna theilou a abuai laiin, ngaiin Kolnelia misawlte`n Simon inn a kankhiata ua, kelkot bul ah ana ding ua.
Tualeh asam ua, “Simon, aminkhem Peter achih uh atun leh atun louh ana dong ua?”
Peter in mangmu bang a asilmuh pen angaihtuah laiin, Khasiangthou in akiang ah, “Ngaiin! Mi thum in ahung zong uhi.
Thou inla, tualeh kumsuk inla, bangmah ginglah louin amauh juiin, amauh kasawl ahi uh,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n Peter Kolnelia misawlte kiang ah apaisuk a, akiang uah, “Kei ka hi nazon uh. Bang jiak a hungpai nahi ua?” achi a.

Tualeh amau`n, Pasian a pat a vantungmi siangthou khat in, “Kolnelia galkap zalamkai midiktak, Pasian lauhdan siam, Judami jousiahin agenphat, kiang ah na thugen ajakna ding a a inn a nang samsak dingin ahilh hi,” achi ua.
Tuachi`n amauh asamlut a, agiak sakta a.
Ajingni in Peter amauh tawh apai a, tualeh Joppa khua ah gingtu unau kuate hiam in amah a kitonpih uhi.
Tualeh ajingkik in Kaisaria khua ah alutta ua, tualeh Kolnelia in a sanggam ittakte leh alawm deihtakte samkhawm in amauh ana ngak jing a.
Tualeh Peter ahung lut kuan in Kolnelia in ana lamtuah a, akeng bul ah khupbok in Pasian biak bangin ana bia hi.
Hinanleh Peter in amah akaithou a, “Ding in, kei zong mihing ka hi,” achi hi.
Tualeh, amauh tawh kihoulim kawm in, innsung ah alut ua, mi tamtak omkhawm amuta a.
Tualeh akiang uah, “Judami nam dang tawh kipawl a, akiang ua pai asian louhdan nathei uh, hinanleh, kuamah sianglou leh nin kachih ding ahikei, chih Pasian in ahung theisak hi.
Tuajiakin nungsap tak un niallou in kungpai pai ahi. Tualeh nung sapna san uh bang ahiam?” achi hi.
Tuachi`n Kolnelia in, “Ka anngawlna nili ahita hi, tualeh ka inn ah dakkua ding vel in kathum a, tualeh ngaiin, mikhat puanngou silh kamai ah ahung ding a
tualeh: ‘Kolnelia! Na thumna jak in a omta, tualeh mi kiang a na silpiak zong Pasian in atheijing hi.
Tuajiakin Joppa khua ah mi sawl inla Simon, amin khem Peter achih uh na kiangah sam in. Amah tuipi pang a savun bawlpa Simon inn a tung ahi,’ achi hi.
Tuajiakin na kiang ah mi kung sawl pai hi. Nung pai hi ahoih hi. Tuachi`n Pasian in na kiang a, ahung thupiak jousiah jading in tuin Pasian mitmuh in ka un un hihsan ah ka om uhi,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n Peter in agen a, “Pasian in mi deihsak tuam anei kei hi, chih diktakin ka thei hi.
Hinanleh, namchin lak ah kuapeuh Amah lauhdan siam a, diktattak a gamtang peuhmah apahtatmi ahi hi.
Pasian in, khamuanna thu Jesu Krist min in agen a, Israel suante kiang a akhak pen Jesu hih mijousiah Toupa ahi.
Johan in a tangkou pih baptisma nung in, thu Galili gam a panin ahung thang pan a, Judea gam jousiah ah a thangsuak a, nou nathei uhi.

Nazareth Jesu tungtang thu, Pasian in amah pen Khasiangthou leh silbawl theihna a athuam dan. Amah pen Pasian akiang a aom jiakin mi tung a silhoih bawl leh dawiin abawl gentheih jousiah damsak in avak kawikawi a.
Tualeh Judate gam leh Jerusalem khua a asil bawl jousiah theihpihtu ka hi uhi, Amah pen singdawn a khai in athat lum ta ua,
Amah pen Pasian in nithum nin a kaithou kik a, chiantak in amusak hi,
mijousiah kiang ah ahikei a, hinanleh Pasian in theihpihtu aguatkholhte kiang guak ah ahi, kou misi lak a pat athohkik nung a, akiang a ne a dawnte kiang ah.
Tualeh amah pen mihing misite tung a vaihawm ding a Pasian guat ahi chih, mi kiang a tangkoupih ding leh theisak dingin Pasian in thu ahung pia hi.
Kuapeuh amah gingta in amin jal a khialhnate ngaihdamna amu ding uh chih a tanchin pen Jawlnei jousiahin ana theihsaksa uh ahi,” achi hi.
Peter in hih thute agen laitak in, athu jajousiah tung ah khasiangthou a hungtungta a.
Tualeh teptante lak a gingtute Peter tawh hung paite`n Khasiangthou piak pen Jentelte tung a zong buak ahih jiakin lamdang asa mahmah uhi.
Amau`n ham theihlouh a thu gen in Pasian phat in aja ua, tuachi`n Peter in,
“Hih mite eimah bang a Khasiangthou tang ve in baptisma atan louhna ding un mi`n tui zak akham thei ding uh maw?” achi a.
Tuachi`n Toupa Jesu min a baptisma tang dingin thu apia a, tuateh ni bangjah hiam ta`m ding in akhouhta uhi.
Tualeh Judea gam a sawltakte leh gingtu omten Jentelte`n zong Pasian thu asangta uh chih, ajata ua.
Tualeh Peter Jerusalem khua atuntouh takin teptanten akiang ah,
“tep tanloute inn ah na lut a, akiang uah nane vial a chi`n akalh ua!”
Hinanleh Peter in sil omdan abul a kipat in akizom jelin akiang uah a hilhchian a, hichi a chi in:
“Joppa khua a thum a ka om laitak in, mangmu bangin ka om a. Bang hiam bawm liantak khat ningli a khih van a kipat a kikhaikhia ka mu a, ka kiang mahmah ah a hungtung a.
Tuapen ka enkil kel a, ka ngaihtuah a, tualeh lei a gamsa kengli neite, gamsate, ganhing bawkvakte leh tungleng vasate kamu a.
Tualeh aw in, ‘Peter, thou inla; that inla ne in!’ hungchi`n kaja a.
Hinanleh ken, ‘Toupa! Hilou e, ajiak pen sianglou leh nin mawng mawng bangmah ka kam ah alut ngaikei,’ kachi a.
Hinanleh van a kipanin aw in, ‘Pasian in a suksiangsa nang sianglou chiken,’ ahung chikik a.
Tualeh hichi bang ngen in thumvei ahung om a, tuachi`n aun in van ah khaitouh in aom kikta hi.
Tualeh tuahun mahmah in mi thum Kaisaria a pat a ka kiang a ahung sawl uh ka omna inn ah ana tung uh a.
Tuachi`n Kha in ginglahlou leh kuamah khentuam neilou a amauh jui dingin ahung sawl a, hih gingtu mi gukten zong ahung jui ua, ka un un Kolnelia inn ah kalut uhi.
Tualeh aman ka kiang uah, a inn a vantungmi ding amuh dan leh vantungmi in akiang ah, ‘Joppa khua ah mi sawl inla, Simon, aminkhem Peter achih uh vasam sak in.
Aman thu ahung hilh ding a, tua thu in nang leh na innkuanpihte hundam in na om ding uh, achih dan zong ahung hilh hi.’
Tualeh thu ka gen pat leh Khasiangthou itung a ahung tunchil lai mahbang in katung uah a hungtungta a.
Tuachi`n Toupa thu: ‘Johan in tui in mi a baptis jel a, hinanleh noujaw Khasiangthou in baptisma nungtang ding uh,’ achih pen kung theikhia kikta hi.
Tuajiakin, ei Toupa Jesu gingtate kiang a Pasian in silpiak a hungpiak bang akiang ua a piaknung in keibang leltak Pasian nialgual ka hi ding maw!” achi hi.
Huathu ajak tak un adaita ua, “Tuachi ahihleh Pasian in Jentelte zong hing dingin akisik uh phal ahita ve!” chi`n Pasian aphatta uhi.
Tualeh Stephen jiak a a bawlgentheih uh, ataijakte pen Phoinisia gamte, Kupra gamte, Antiok khua tanpha in ajin ua, Judate kiang guak chihlouh kuamah kiang ah agen kei uhi.
Hinanleh alak ua khenkhat Kupra gam leh Kurini khua a mi ahi ua, tua mite`n Antiok khua atun un Grikte zong ahoupih ua, Toupa Jesu tangthupha ahilhta uhi.
Tualeh Toupa khut in amauh apanpih a, mi tamtakin agingta ua, Toupa lam ahung ngata uhi.
Tuachi`n hihthute Jerusalem khua a saptuam omte bil ah alutta a, tualeh Antiok khua tung ding in Barnaba asawl khia ua.
Tualeh amah avatun a, Pasian hehpih dan avamuh in akipak mahmah a, phattuamngai tak a Toupa tujing dingin aun un a hanthawnta hi.
Amah pen mihoihtak ahihjisak in, Khasiangthou leh ginna adim ahi a, tualeh mi tamtak Toupa kiangah atelbehta uhi.
Tuachi`n Barnaba pen Saul zong ding in Tarsa khua ah apaita hi.

Tualeh amah amuhtakin Antiok khua ah ahung paipih a, tualeh hichi ahung hi a, kumkhat sung pumpi kikhopna ah ajau ua, mi tampi thu ahilh uhi. Tualeh Antiok khua ah nungjuite Kristian a kichi masapen uhi.
Tualeh tualaiin Jerusalem ah Jawlnei kuate hiam Jerusalem khua a kipat in Antiok khua ah a hungpai ua.
Tuachi`n alak ua mikhat amin Agaba, ading a, leitung pumpi ah kial thupitak tung ding ahi, chih Khasiangthou in amusak a. (Tua kial pen Klaudia Kaisar lallai in a hungtung hi.)
Tuachi`n nungjuite`n a ngap dan chiat un Judea gam a gingtu omte kiang ah panpihna khak asawm ua.
Tuapen abawlta ngei ua, Barnaba leh Saul khut ah upate kiang ah akhakta uhi.
Tualeh huahun laiin kumpipa Herod in saptuamte lak a kuate ahiam bawlgentheih sawm in akhut alekta a.
Tualeh Johan sanggampa Jakob pen namsau in asat lum a.
Tualeh hih in Judate akipaksak chih amuh in. Peter zong mat sawm a (Hualai pen tanghou tol sawhlouh nite ahi a.)
Tualeh amah amattak un thong ah akhumta ua, galkap hawnli li in aveng aki khelsak jel a. Paikan kut zoh in mipite kiang ah paikhiat pih asawm hi.
Tuajiakin Peter pen thong sung ah akoih tadih a, hinanleh saptuamte`n amah dingin phattuamngai takin Pasian kiang ah ana thumsak uhi.
Tualeh Herod in a paikhiatpih dingni, huajan ngeiin Peter pen galkap nih kikal ah sikkol nih bulh in a ihmu a, tualeh avengtute`n zong kongkhak bul ah om in thong aveng uhi.
Tualeh ngaiin, Toupa vantungmi khat akiang ah a hungpai a, thong sung ah vak ahung tangta a, tualeh Peter apang bengin aphong a, “Thoukin in!” achi a, tualeh kolte akhut a pat akiata hi.
Tuachi`n vantungmi in akiang ah, “Na kawng gak inla na khedap bulh in,” achi a. Tualeh aman tuachibang in abawl a, tuakhit in vantungmi in akiang ah, “Na puan silh inla hungjui in,” achi a.
Tuachi`n Peter apawt a ajuita a, vantungmi silbawl pen atak ahih atheikei a, manglam a amuh asajaw hi.

Vengtu masa leh anihna apelh nung un, khuapi lutna sikkot a tungta ua, tuapen amauh a dingin amah leh amah ahung kihongta a, tualeh apawt ua, kongpi khat akhen ua, tuachi`n vantungmi in a paisanta hi.
Tualeh Peter ahalhtak in, “Toupa`n vantungmi ahung sawl a! Herod khut a leh Judamite kinepna jousiah a kipanin ahung hunkhiata chih tuin chiantak in ka theikhiata,” achi a.
Tualeh hua sil angaihtuah zoh in Johan amin dang Marka achih uh nu Mari inn ah avapai a, tuasan ah thumna nei in mi tampi ana omkhawm uhi.
Tualeh Peter in kot akiuh takin, amin Rhoda kichi nungak khat adawng dingin ahung pai a.
Tualeh Peter aw ahih atheihtak in, a kipak jiakin kot honglou in atailut kik jawta a, Peter kotkhak bul ah ading chi`n avagen a.
Amau`n akiang ah, “Amaw hiteh,” achi ua. Hinanleh aman, thudik ahi chi`n apang teitei a. Tuachi`n amau`n, “Vantungmi ahi,” achi uhi.
Hinanleh Peter in kot akiu kiu a, tualeh kot ahon tak un amah amu ua, lamdang asa mahmah uhi.

Hinanleh aman adaihna ding un akhut in ajap a, Pasian in thong a pat amah apaikhiat pih dan ahilhta a, “Hih thute Jakob leh gingtu dangte kiang ah vahilh un,” achia. Tuachi`n apawt a mun dang ah apaita hi.
Tuachi`n ni asuah takin, galkapte pen Peter khoia om ahia? chi`n buai chihtak in abuaita ua.
Tualeh Herod in azong a, amuhlouh takin avengtute a enchian a, thah ding in thu apiata hi.
Tuachi`n Herod pen Judea gam a kipan Kaisaria khua ah apaisuk a, huasan ah aom denta hi.

Tualeh Herod Tura leh Sidon mite tung ah alung kim mahmah kei a, hinanleh amau`n Blasta kumpipa innsung vaipuapa a kijolhpih ua. Thukhat a luangkhawm in akiang uah a hungpai ua. A khualamte uh kumpipa khualam a puktawjel ahihjiak un kilemna a ngen ua.
Tualeh ani chiamni in Herod in a Leng puan asilh a, aleng touna tung ah atou a, akiang uah thu agen a.
Tualeh mipite kikou in, “Hihpen Pasian aw ahi, mihing a ahi kei!” achi ua.
Tualeh Pasian kiang a pahtawina apiaklouh jiakin, Toupa vantungmi in amah aman paingal a. Hut in ane a, asita hi.
Hinanleh Pasian thu pen akhang a, apung semsem hi.
Tualeh Barnaba leh Saul pen a nasep azoh un, Jerusalem khua a kipat akik kikta ua, Johan aminkhem Marka pen akiang uah azohpih uhi.
Tualeh Antiok khua a saptuam omte lak a Jawlnei leh siate aom ua: tuate ahihleh Barnaba, Simeon, (Nigar kichipa,) (Kurini khua a om Lusia kumpipa Herod tawh khangkhawm) Manaen, leh Saulte ahi uhi.
Tualeh Toupa nna sem a an a ngawl laiun, Khasianthou in, “Barnaba leh Saul keima nna sem dingin hung khenkhiat sak un,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n an a ngawl ua, athum zoh un, atung uah khut anga ua, a paisakta uhi.
Tuachi`n Khasiangthou sawlkhiat in Seleusia khua ah apaisuk ua, hua a kipan in Kupra lam juanin gunkuang in apaita uhi.
Tualeh Salami khua a aom laiun, Judate kikhopna innte ah Pasian thu agen ua, tualeh Johan zong a nna uh semsak dingin azoh pih uhi.
Tualeh Kupra tuikulh gam tawnsuak in Paphos khua ah atung ua, huasan ah mitphial dawisiam, jawlnei taklou Juda mikhat amu ua, amin Bar-Jesu ahi.
Hihpa pen gam uktu Sergia Paulas mipiltak kiang a om ahi a. Tua gam uktu in Saul leh Barnaba a sam a, Pasian thu jak a ut jiakin.
Hinanleh Elima ( grik ham a Bar-Jesu min dang khat ahi ) dawisiam pa`n ginglouh sak teitei sawm in amauh ana khak hi.
Tuachi`n Saul, Paul zong a kichi- pen Khasiangthou in adim a, amah a ensaal a
tuachi`n, aw nang mikhem leh hoihlouhna chinteng a dimpa, “Nang dawi tapa! Nang diktatna jousiah melmapa. Toupa lam diktakte suksiat tawplou ding nahi maw!
Tuin ngaiin, Toupa khut na tungah atu hi, namit ahung taw ding a, bangtan hiam nisa vak mulou in na om ding,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n thakhat in tuimei mial khat a tungah ahung kia a, khut a kaitu ding zongin avak kawikawita hi.
Tuachi`n gam uktu in tua sil kibawl pen amu a, Toupa thuhilh lamdang asa mahmah a, agingta ta hi.
Tuachi`n Paul pen alawite tawh Paphos khua a pat in apai ua, Pamphilia gam a Gerga khua atung ua, tualeh Johan in amauh paisan in Jerusalem khua ah a kikta hi.
Hinanleh amauh Perga khua a pat apaijel ua Pisidia gam a Antiok khua atung ua, tualeh khawlni-in kikhopna inn ah alut ua, avatou ua.
Tualeh dan laibu leh Jawlneite laibu asim zoh un kikhopna inn upate`n akiang uah mi asawl ua: “Unaute aw, mi hasotna thu gen ding naneih uleh gen un,” achi ua.
Tuachi`n Paul ading a, khut jap in agen a:
“Israel mite leh Pasian lauhdan siam mite aw: ngaiun!
Hih Israel namte Pasian in Ipu leh pate uh atel a, Izipt gam a gamdangmi bang a aomlai un abawl thupi a, tualeh asil bawltheihna thupitak tawh huasan a kipan in apuikhiata hi,
tualeh kum sawmli sung vel gamdai a asil bawlte uh athuak teitei a.
Tualeh Kanan gam a Nam sagihte asukmang zoh in agam uh akiang uah ahawmsak hi.
Huanung in kum zali leh kum sawmnga vaihawmtute apia a,
“Jawlnei Samuel tan chiang in.
Tualeh hua nungin kumpi a ngen ua, tuachi`n Pasian in Saul, Kis tapa Benjamin phung a mi amauh apia a, kum sawmli sung ding in.

Tualeh amah a suanmang nung in a kumpipa ua pang dingin David atung khia kikta a. Pasian in huapa thu theisak in, ‘David, Jessai tapa, Ka lungtang bang pua mi ka mukhiata hi,’ aman ka deihlam abawl ding hi, achi hi.
Hih mipa suante lak ah Pasian in achiam dungjuiin Israelte kiang ah hundampa Jesu ahung dingkhia sakta hi.
A hung paima in Johan in kisikna baptisma thu Israel mi jousiah kiang ah anahilh masa hi.

Tualeh Johan in a nasep azohkuan in, ‘Nou kua hiding in nung gingta ua? amah tuh hilou ka hi. Hinanleh ngaiun, ka nung ah mi khat hungpai ding ahi, kei pen a khedap khau sut ding a zong chinglou ka hi,’ achi hi.
“Unaute aw, Abraham suan a tate aw, nalak ua Pasian laudan siamte tengteng aw: na kiang uah hih hundamna thu hung kikhak ahi!
Jerusalem khua a omte leh a lamkaite un ana theihlouh jiak un. Tualeh khawlni teng a kisim Jawlneite thu ana theihlouh jiak un amah siamlouh tangsak in hua thute ana tangtung sakta uhi.
Asihna ding khop atung a bangmah amuhlouh un zong, Pilat kiang ah hihlum dingin a ngen ua.
Tualeh a tungtang thu a kigelhsa jousiah asuk tangtung zoh un, sing a kipan in a lakhia ua han ah asialta uhi.
Hinanleh amah pen Pasian in misi lak a kipat akaithou kikta a.
Tualeh amah tawh Galili gam a kipat a Jerusalem khua a paitoute kiang ah ni tampi sung akilak a. Hua mite pen tuin mi kiang a athu theihpihtute ahi uhi.
Tualeh kouzong Ipu leh pate kiang a chiamsa: hua thuchiam tanchin kipahpih huai kung hilh uhi.
Pasian in Jesu akaihthoh kikna ah, tuapen ei atate kiangah a tangtungsak hi. Psam, nihna a,
‘Nang, ka Tapa na hi a;
tuni a kung hin na hi,’
chih gelh bang in.
Tualeh muatna mun a paikik talou ding a Pasian in amah misi lak a kipat akaihthoh ding dan thu hichin a gen hi:
‘David kiang a om hehpihna thawnloute
Nangmah kung pia ding hi,’ chi in.
Tuajiakin aman psam dang ah,
‘Na misiangthou muatmang naphal kei ding hi,’ a chihbeh lai hi.
Ajiak David in Pasian vaihawmsak bang a amah khang a mite nna asepsak zoh in, a ihmu a, tualeh Ipu leh pate kiang ah asialta ua, amuat mangta hi.
Hinanleh Pasian kaihthohte injaw muatna amu kei ding uhi.
Tuajiakin hihthu theiun unaute aw, amah jiakin khialh ngaihdamna thu na kiang ua kigen ahi hi.
Tualeh kuapeuh agingta jousiah Mosi dan a siam natan zohlouhna uh sil jousiah ah siamtansak in aom hi.
Tuajiakin pilvang un, atuachih keileh Jawlneite laibu a kigen natung uah a hungtung kha ding hi.
‘Nou, simmohtute! En un, tualeh lamdang sa unla, mangthang un!
Ajiak na damsung un nna khat kasem hi,
tua nna pen mi`n nou hunghilh nanleh na gingtabaih kei ding uhi!’ ”
chih achi hi.
Tualeh Judate kikhopna inn a pat apawt un, Jentelte`n khawlni kik chiang a huathu gen dingin a ngen ua.

Tualeh kikhawmte a kikhenjak tak un Judate tamtak leh Judate biak dan jui Pasian ngaihsak lak a mi tamtak in Paul leh Barnaba ajui ua, amau`n amauh ana houpih ua, Pasian hehpihna a om gige dingin ana hasuan uhi.
Khawlni kik in a khuajang phial un Pasian thu ngaiding in ahung kikhawm ua.
Hinanleh Judate`n mipite amuh tak un, a thangsia mahmah ua, Paul thugen akalh ua, agensia uhi.
Tuachi`n Paul leh Barnaba in hangsan takin agen ua: “Pasian thu pen nou kiang a gen masak ding mawng ahi a, hinanleh na nial ua, tangtawn a hingtaklou a na kibawl jiak un, Jentelte lam ka ngata uhi.
Ajiak Toupa`n kou hichibang in thu ahung pia hi:
‘Jentelte vak hi dingin kungguat ahi,
leitawp tanpha a hundamna hi dingin, chih gelh bangin,’ ”
achi hi.
Tualeh Jentelte`n huathu ajak un akipak ua, Toupa thu apahtawi ua, tualeh tangtawn a hingding a seh leh guat taphot in agingta uhi.
Tualeh Toupa thu tuagam pumpi ah a kithehjakta hi.
Hinanleh Judate`n Pasian ngaihsak numei zahtak huaite leh khuasung upate achial ua. Paul leh Barnaba a thuaksak ua, agam ua pat a delhmangta uhi.
Tuachi`n amaute mohsakna in a kengphang ua leivuite athinkhum ua, Ikonium khua ah apaita uhi.
Tualeh nungjuite kipakna leh Khasiangthou in a dimta uhi.
Tualeh Ikonium khua ah hichi ahung hi a, Judate kikhopna inn ah alut khawm ua, thu agen ua, tuachi`n Judate leh Grikte tamtak in agingta ta uhi.
Hinanleh agingta lou Judate`n Jentelte achilsia ua, unaute a mudahsak ta uhi.
Tuajiakin Toupa ah hangsan tak a thu genin huasan ah sawttak aom ua, amau`n chiamtehnate leh sillamdangte akhut ua bawlsakin, a hehpih thu atheisak jel uhi.
Hinanleh khuapi sung a mipite aki langkhen ua, khenkhat in Judate agum ua, khenkhat in sawltakte agum uhi.
Tualeh Jentelte leh Judate`n alamkaite utawh kithuah a sawltakte jumhuaitak a bawl leh suang a den sawm a a buailai un.
Amau`n hihthu ana thei ua, Likaunia gam a Litra leh Derbe khua tualeh akimvel gam ah ataimang uhi.
Huasan ah tangthupha a genta uhi.
Tualeh Litra khua ah kengjaw kuahiam mi khat atou a, apiantung a pat kengbai mawng ahi a, keng in apaikha ngaikei hi.
Hihpa`n Paul thugen angaikhia a, tualeh Paul in limtak in a en a, a damna dingin ginna anei chih athei a
aw ngaihtak in, “Na keng in dingtang in!” achi a, tuachi`n amah akitawm a, akeng in apaita hi.
Tualeh mipite`n Paul silbawl amuh tak un, aw ngaihtakin akikou ua, Likaunia ham in, “Pasiante pen mihing bang a ikiang ua hungpai ahi uh!” achi ua.
Tualeh Barnaba pen Jupiter achi ua, Paul pen thugenpen ahih jiakin Markuria achi uhi.
Tuachi`n, khuapi kong mai a om Jupiter siampipa`n bawngtalte leh pakvui kongpi bul ah ahung tawi a, mipite tawh amauh gel biakna dingin thah atum hi.
Hinanleh sawltakte, Paul leh Barnaba in hua atheih tak un apuan uh a botkek ua mipi lak ah atawmlut ua, akikou ua,

“Pute bangding a hih silte bawl nahi uhiam? Kou zong noutawh thuak kibang ka hi uhi! Tualeh hih sil thulim loute na kiheisan ua, van leh lei tui khanglian tualeh asung a sil om jousiah bawlpa Pasian kiang ah nung kihei theihna ding un tangthupha kung tut uh ahi.
Hua Pasian in nidanglai in namchin amauh lampi chiat a apai aphal a.

Ahihhang in amah theihsakna bawllou in ama thuin a omsak kei hi: tuachi`n silhoih abawl jel a, van a pat guahtui leh gahpha bangkim ahung pia a, ilungtang uh nek ding leh kipakna in adimsak jing hi,” achi ua.
Tualeh hihthute genin mipite`n amauh biakna ding a gan agoh ding uh a kham jou hamham uhi.
Tuachi`n Antiok khua leh Ikonium khua a pat Juda kuate hiam huasan ah ahung pai ua, mipite akhem jou ua, tuachi`n Paul suang in adeng ua, si a agintat jiak un khuapi geilam ah akaikhia uhi.
Hinanleh gingtute aki`m a adin laiun, ahung thou a, khuapi sung ah ahung lutkikta a, tualeh ajing in Barnaba tawh Derbe khua ah apaita uhi.
Tualeh amau`n hua khuapi ah tangthupha agen ua. Nungjui tampi asiam khit un Listra leh Ikonium leh Antiok khua ah akileh kikta uhi.
“Gimna tampi thuakin Pasian gam ah ilut ding mawng uh ahi,” chi`n nungjuite lungsim a kipaksak ua. Ginna a omgige dingin a hanthawn uhi.
Tualeh saptuam chin a upate a namdet ua, an ngawla athum zoh un amauh aginna uh Toupa kiang ah akemsakta uhi.
Tualeh Pisidia gam atawnsuk ua, Pamphilia gam atung ua.
Tualeh Perga khua a thu agenzoh un Attalia khua ah apaisuk ua,
huasan a kipanin gunkuang in apai ua, a nna sepsa uh sem ding a unauten Pasian hehpihna kemsak a apawtna uh Antiok khua ahung tungta uhi.
Tualeh a hungtun un saptuamte asam khawm ua, Pasian in amauh zang a sil abawl jousiah leh Jentelte ding a ginna kongkhak ahonsak dante ahilh uhi.
Tuachi`n nungjuite tawh sawtpi a omkhawmta uhi.
Tualeh mi kuate hiam Judea gam a pat Antiok ah ahung paisuk ua, “Mosi dan bang a tep natan kei uleh hundam na hithei kei ding uh,” chi`n unaute ahunghilh ua.

Tualeh Paul leh Barnaba amauh tawh hahsel in akisel ua, a kikhing jiak un, Paul leh Barnaba pen alak ua kuate hiam tawh hua thubuai tungah Jerusalem khua a sawltakte leh upate kiang a hawhtou dingin asawl ua.
Tuachi`n saptuamte`n avakha ua, amau`n Jentelte lunghei kik dan thu genjel in Phoinisia leh Samaria gam a tawnsuak ua, tuachi`n unaute nasatak in a kipaksak uhi.
Tualeh Jerusalem khua atun un saptuamte leh sawltakte leh upate`n ana kipahpih ua, tualeh Pasian in amauh zang a a silbawlte jousiah agen uhi.
Hinanleh Pharisai pawl a gingtu kuate hiam akipan ua, “Jentelte`n tep atan ua, tualeh Mosi dan zong hilh ding mah ahi,” achi uhi.
Tuachi`n sawltakte leh upate huathu ngaihtuah dingin akikawm ua.
Tualeh hahnial a akinial nung un Peter akipan a, akiang uah, “Unaute aw, Jentelte`n keimah kam a tangthupha ja a, agintat na ding ua, Pasian in nidanglai a ilak uapat ahung guatdan nathei uhi.
Tualeh lungsim theitu Pasian in eite ahung piak bang mah in Khasiangthou akiang uah apia a, atheihpihta hi.
Tualeh eite leh amauh khentuam neilou in, ginna in alungsim ahih siangthou hi.
Tualeh Ipu leh pate leh eite`n zong izohlouh sa uh hakkol pen tuin nungjuite ngawng a bat tum a bangdin Pasian ze-et sawm na hi ua?
Hinanleh amauhte bangin eite zong Toupa Jesu Krist hehpihna jiak a hundam ding hi in iki gingta uhi,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n mipi jousiah adaita ua, Barnaba leh Paul in, Pasian in amauh zang a, Jentelte lak a chiamtehna leh sillamdang abawl thu agen uh a ngaikhia uhi.
Tualeh agenzoh un Jakob in agen a, “Unaute aw, ka thu ngai un!
Pasian in Amah min puading a alak ua honkhat lakhia dingin amasa in Jentelte aveh chih thu Simon in a genta hi.
Tualeh hih thu leh Jawlneite thu aki tuak hi,
‘Hih zoh chiangin kung paikik ding a,
David biak inn puksa ka bawl kik ding.
Asiatnate ka bawlkik ding a
tuachi`n ka tungding ding hi.
tuachia midangten Toupa a zontheihna ding un,
Jentel ka min a kisam jousiahte nangawn in zong,
hih silte jousiah bawlpa Toupa`n achi hi, chih gelh bang in.
A silbawlte jousiah pen tanglai a pat in Pasian theihpih ahi.’
“Tuajiakin, Jentelte lak a Pasian lam a kiheinate pen sukbuai dahlei chih ka ngaihdan ahi.
Milim biakna; silnin nekte, kingaihte; sa heklup leh sisan nekte tawpsan dingin akiang uah gelhlei ka chijaw hi.
Ajiak nidanglai a pat in Mosi in khuachin ah athuhilhtu anei a, kikhopna inn ah khawlni tengin athu sim jeljel ahi,” achi hi.

Tuachi`n sawltakte leh upate, saptuamte jousiah tawh, alak ua mi tel a, Paul leh Barnaba tawh Antiok khua a paisak hoih asa ua. Atelte uh min ahihleh Juda, amindang Barsaba, leh Sila ahi ua, amauh unaute lak a lamkai ahi uhi.
Hih laikhak pen hihbang in a gelh uhi:
“Sawltakte, upate leh unaute`n, Antiok khua leh Suria leh Silisia gam a om Jentel unaute chibai abuk uhi.

Kalak ua mi kuate hiam in tep natan ua tualeh dan zong najuih ding uh ahi chia thu genin nou ahung buaisak ua, na lungsim uh a mangbang sak uh chih ka thei ua, akiang uah lah thu bangmah kapia ngal kei ua.
Tuajiakin lungsim munkhat pua a ka kikhop un, mi telkhia a ka deihtak uh Barnaba leh Paul,
Toupa Jesu Krist jiak a sih khawk salou a, om tegel tawh na kiang ua hungsawl dingin hoih kasa uhi.
Tuachi`n Juda leh Sila kung sawl uhi, amau`n zong hihthu kam in a hunghilh ding uhi.
Ajiak Khasiangthou leh kou, hih thupoimohte chihlouh puakgik dang bangmah na tung uah ka ngaklouh uh hoih kasa uhi.
Milim biakna sanekte; sa heklup nekte, sisan nekte leh kingaih hatnate hihte natan uleh na bawlhoih ding uhi; mangpha chi in.”
Tuachi`n a sawlkhiata ua, Antiok khua atung ua, tualeh mipi asam khawm ua, laikhak pen apiata uhi.
Hua asim zoh un khamuanna thu ajak jiak un akipak mahmahta uhi.
Tualeh Juda leh Sila zong Jawlnei ahi ua, tuamun a sanggamte thu tamtak in a hanthawn ua ahahkip sem uhi.
Tualeh huasan a sawttak aom nung un amauh khamuang takin unaute lak a pat sawltakte kiang ah apaisakta uhi.
Sila in huasan a om takdih hoih asa hi.
Paul leh Barnaba pen Antiok khua ah midang tamtakte tawh Toupa thu hilh leh gen in aom jing uhi.
Tualeh nibang jah hiam nungin Paul in Barnaba kiang ah, “Ipai kik ding a khuachin a Toupa thu igenna jousiah a unaute vavehni, bangchi`n aom uai chih iva en ding,” achi a.
Tualeh Barnaba in Johan, aminkhem Marka pen akiang ua tonpih atum a,
hinanleh amah, Pamphilia gam a amauh kiksan a, a nasepna a amauh tawh pailoupi akiang ua tonpih ding pen Paul in hoih asakei hi.
Tuachi`n hahnial in akinialta ua, tualeh akikhen ua: Barnaba in Marka apui a, Kupra gam ah gunkuangin apaita hi,
tualeh Paul in Sila atel a, unaute`n Pasian hehpihna akepsak nung un a paikhiata uhi.
Tualeh saptuam detsakjel in Suria leh Silisia gam atawnsuak uhi.
Tuachi`n amah Derbe leh Listra khua a hungtung a, tualeh ngaiin, huasan ah Timothi kichi nungjui khat aom a. Amahpen gingtu Juda numei kuahiam tapa ahi a, hinanleh apa Grikmi ahi.
Amah pen Listra leh Ikonium khua a om gingtute`n agen phat mahmah uh ahi.
Paul in amah tonpih dingin adeih a, tualeh apaipih a hualak a Juda omte jiakin atep atansak a, amau`n apa Grikmi ahi chih atheih jiak un.
Tualeh khuapite tawn a apaikawm un amau`n Jerusalem khua a om sawltakte leh upaten juihding a anamdet uh thupuknate akiang uah apiakhia uhi.
Tuachi`n saptuamte ginna ah adetta ua, niteng in apung deuh deuhta uhi.
Tualeh, amau`n Phrigia gam leh Galatia gam atotsuak zoh un Khasiangthou in Asia gam a thugen akham a.
Misia gam kiang atun un, Bithinia gam ah lut atum ua, hinanleh Khasiangthou in aphal kei hi.
Tuachi`n Misia gam akhen ua Troas khua ah apaita uhi.
Tualeh janlai in Paul in mangmu bangin Mesidonia gam a mikhat dingin, “Mesidonia gam ah hung galkai inla, hung panpih in!” chia genin amu a.
Tualeh Paul in mangmu bang a sil amuh zoh in Mesidonia gam a pai ka sawmpai ua, akiang ua tangthupha gen dingin Pasian in ahung sap ahi chih chiantak in kathei uhi.
Tuachi`n Troas khua a pat gunkuang in kapai ua, tangtakin Samothrakia ah kapai ua, ajingin Neapoli ah kapai jel uhi.
Tualeh hua khua a pat Philippi khua ah kapai ua, huapen Mesidonia gam a khua poimoh pen khat ahi a, Rom khua a mipemte khua ahi. Hua khua ah ni tamdeuh katam uhi.
Tualeh khawlni in khuapi pualam ah luipang ah thumna mun hi a ka gintatna mun uah kapai ua, ka tou ua, numei hung paikhawmte kiang ah thu ka gen ua.
Tualeh numei khat amin Lidia, puan sandup juak Thiatira khua a om Pasian biami in ka thu uh aja a, Paul thugen juiding in Pasian in a lungtang ahonsak a.
Tualeh amah leh a innkuanten baptisma atanzoh un, “Toupa a gin-om a nungseh uleh, ka inn ah hungpai unla hungtung un,” chi`n ahung ngen a. Tuachi`n ahung khouhtang teitei ta hi.
Tualeh hichi ahung hi a, thumna mun a ka pailai un, sila nungak kuahiam dawi aisan siam khat in ahung kituah pih a. Aman a aisan jiakin apute sum tamtak amuhsak jel hi.
Hihnu`n Paul leh kei ahung jui a, kikou in, “Hih mite hundamna lampi hunghilhte ahi! Tungnung pen Pasian silate ahi uh!” achi a.
Tualeh hichi`n ni sawttak abawl a, tuachi`n Paul a lunghimoh a, akihei a dawi kiang ah, “Jesu Krist min in asung a kipat pawt thu kungpia ahi!” achi a. Tualeh amah hualaitak in apawtpai hi.
Hinanleh, apute`n asum muhna uh abei chih atheihtak un, Paul leh Sila aman ua, mipilak a lamkaite mai ah akailut uh a.
Tualeh thukhentute kiang ah apaipih ua, “Hihte Judami ahi ua, ka khua uh ahah sukbuai mahmah uhi.
Tualeh ei Rommi in ilak leh izop sianglou dante juihsak ahung sawm uhi,” achi ua.
Tuachi`n mipite amauh vuading in ahung kisa ua.
Tualeh thukhentute`n apuan uh a bohkeksak ua, chiang a jepding in thu apia uhi.
Tualeh tamveipi ajep zoh un thong ah akhum ua, avengtu kiang ah bittak a veng dingin thu apia a.
Huachitak a thu apiak jiak un aman tanna inn sungnungjaw ah akhum a akengte uah sikkol a bulhsak hi.
Hinanleh jankhang laiin Paul leh Sila in thumna anei ua, Pasian kiang ah phatna la asa ua, tualeh midangte in angaikhia uhi.
Thakhat in jin thupitak ahung kiling a, tuachi`n thong khuambulte akiling jak a, tualeh kongkhak jousiah aki hawng a, kol kibulh jousiah akiphel siangta hi.
Tuachi`n thong vengtu ihmu ahung halh a, tualeh thong kot kihong amuh in thong a tangte taimangta uh asa a, a namsau adok a akithah sawmta hi.
Hinanleh Paul aw ngaihtakin akikou a, “Bangmah kilawh ken ka un un hiah ka om uhi!” achi hi.
Tuachi`n avengtu in mei tangin ajong a, atawmlut a, kithing kawm a hungpaiin, Paul leh Sila kiang ah a khupbokta hi.
Tualeh amauh ahung paikhiatpih a, “Siate, hutdam a ka om nangin bang ka bawl diam?” achi a.
Tuachi`n amau`n, “Toupa Jesu gingta in, tuachi`n hundamin na om ding nang leh na innkuante tawh,” achi ua.
Tuachi`n amau`n akiang leh a inn a om jousiahte kiang ah Toupa thu a genta uhi.
Tualeh aman amauh tuajan in, huahun laitak mahmah in apaipih a, ajepna maliamte asilsiang sak a, tualeh amah leh a innkuante jousiahin baptisma atang paingal uhi.
Tualeh amauh a innsung ah apaipih a, amai uah an alui a, Pasian agintat jiak un a innkuante utawh akipak uhi.
Tualeh nisuah in, thukhentute`n, “Hua mite khah in,” chi`n mimantute asawl ua.
Tualeh thong vengtu in Paul kiang ah huathu ahilh a, “Thukhentute`n nou khah ding in mi ahungsawl uhi. Tuajiakin, tu in pawt unla, khamuang takin pai un,” achi a.

Hinanleh Paul in akiang uah, “Rommite ka hi ngal ua, kasiam na uh leh kasiam louhna uh theilou in vantang mitmuh in a hungsat ua, thong ah ahung khum ua! Tualeh tu in aguk a hung hawlkhiat sawm uh ahi uh maw? Hithei ngailou di! Amauh mahmah hungpai uh henla, hung puidok uhen,” achi hi.
Tualeh mi mantute`n hua thu thukhentute kiang ah ahilh ua, tualeh Rommite ahi uh chih ajaktak un, alau mahmah ta ua.
Tuachi`n amauh ahung paikhiatpih ua, ajawl ua, apaikhiat pih ua, khuapi pualam a paimang dingin a ngen uhi.
Tualeh amauh thong a pat apawt ua, Lidia inn ah alut ua, unaute amuhtak un a hanthawn ua, a pawtta uhi.
Tualeh Amphipoli khua leh Apollonia khua tuan in apai suak ua, Thessalonika khua atung ua, huasan ah Judate kikhopna inn a om hi.
Tuachi`n Paul in amau dan ngaina bangin akiang uah a lut a. Khawlni thumvei Pasian Laisiangthou a pat kichiantak in asutpih a
Krist pen gimthuak ding mawng ahihdan, tualeh misi lak a pat thoukik ding ahihdan bang leh, “Hih na kiang ua ka gen Jesu pen, Krist ahi, chih ahilhchian a,” alangsak hi.
Tuachi`n alak ua khenkhat in agingta ua, Paul leh Sila ajuita ua, Pasian ngaihsak Grik mipi thupitak leh numei lamkai tamtakte tawh.

Hinanleh ginglou Judate`n a huphulh ua, van juakna mun a migilou thadah kuate hiam akiang uah apaipih ua, mipi asam khawm ua, khuapi sung teng atokbuaita uhi. Tualeh Jason inn aluh ua, amauh mipi lak ah puikhiat a sawm uhi.
Tualeh amauh amuhlouh tak un, Jason leh unau dang kuate hiam khuapi sung lamkaite kiang ah akai lut ua, a kikou ua, “Hih leitung hihbuaitute! Hihsan ah zong ahung pai ua,
Jason in ana jintun sak a, hihte jousiahin amin Jesu kumpipa dang aom hi chi`n Kaisar thu kalh in aom uhi,” achi ua.
Tualeh mipite leh khuapi sung a lamkaite`n hua thu ajaktak un abuaita ua.
Tualeh amau`n Jason leh midangte kiang a pat in atang ua hen ding bang ahiam ala ua, amauh akhahta uhi.
Tualeh amauhte`n Paul leh Sila ajan ajan in Beria khua ah asawlkhia pai ua, huasan avatun un Judate kikhopna inn ah avalut ua.
Huasan a mite Thessalonika khua a mite sang in ana hoihjaw ua. Lungsim kipaktakin thu ana pom ua, athugen uh adik leh diklouh theihna dingin niteng in Pasian Laisiangthou sung ah azong jel uhi.
Tuajiakin alak ua mi tamtakin agingta ua, Grik numei zah omte leh pasalten zong agingta uhi.
Hinanleh Thessalonika khua a Judate`n Paul in Beria khua ah Pasian thu a genta chih atheihtak un huasan ah zong a hungpai ua, mipite ahung tokbuaita uhi.
Tuachi`n kintakin unauten Paul pen tuipi lam a paiding in a sawlkhia ua, hinanleh Sila leh Timothi pen huasan ah a omdenta uhi.
Tualeh Paul paipihtute`n Athen tanin apaipih ua, tualeh Sila leh Timothi pen akinthei lam a akiang a paiding a athukhak pen puain apaita uhi.
Tualeh Paul in Athen khua a amauh ana ngak laiin, hua khua pen milim pasian lim a dim in amu a, tuachi`n ahehta hi.
Tuajiakin kikhopna inn ah Judate leh Pasian ngaihsakte anial jel a, a van juakna mun ua ana omte niteng in anialjel hi.
Tuachi`n Epikuriamite leh Stoikmite lak a mipil kuate hiam in zong amah ahung nial a. Tualeh khenkhat in, “Hih mikamtam in bang ahia agen sawm?” achi ua.
Adangte`n, “Jesu thu leh thohkikna thu agen jiakin gamdang pasiante thu gen ahihtuak hi,” achi uhi.
Tualeh amauh apaipih ua Areopaga ah atut ua, akiang ah, “Hih thuhilhna thak nagen pen nung theisak thei diai.
Sillamdang banghiam khat kabil uah nung tut hi, tuajiakin hih sil omjia ka thei ut uhi.”
Ajiak Athen mite jousiah leh akhua ua inn omte zong amankal sung in thuthak genin hiam ahihkeileh a ngaikhia in hiam aom jel uhi.
Tuachi`n Paul Areopaga laitak ah ading a, agen a, “Nou, Athen khua a mite aw, bangkim ah sahkhua ngaihsaktak nahi uh chih kungthei hi.
Ajiak kavak kawm a na biakte uh ka et leh maitam khat atung a, ‘THEIHLOUH PASIAN A DIING,’ chia kigelh kamu hi. Tuajiakin theilou pia nabiak uh tuapen kung hilh ahi.
Pasian leitung leh asung a sil jousiah siamtu pen, van leh lei Toupa ahihjiak in khut abawl inn ah aom ngai kei hi.
Sil tasam bangin mihing khut a nna sepsak in zong aom ngai kei, amahmah tuh bangkim kiang a hinna, nakna leh siljousiah piapa ahijaw hi.
Tualeh leitung pumpi luahsuak a om dingin sisan bul munkhat a pat in namchin mi asiam a, amauh dingin hun aguat a, a tenna gii uh zong a khunsak hi.
Amau`n Toupa azong ua, kinemtak in amai amai ua amuh teitei na ding un, hinanleh aman eite ahung gamlat kei hi;
midang khenkhat in,
‘Ajiak amah ah ihing ua, i om uh ahi ngal a.’
Nou mauh laphuak siam kuate hiam in zong,
‘Ei zong asuante ihi ua,’
chia agen bang un.
Tuajiakin, Pasian suante ihih jiak un, mihing khutsiam leh suktuah a khen milim tawh kibang ahi, ichih ding uh ahikei hi.
Adiktak in, Pasian in itheihlouh laite uh aki theihmoh bawl a, hinanleh tuin gamchin a mijousiah kisik dingin thu apiata hi.
Ni achiam jiakin, tuani chiangin amiguat pen lei a mite diktat takin angaihtuah sak ding, huapen Pasian in amah misi lak a kipat a kaithou in, mijousiah kiang ah atheisakta hi!” chi in.
Tualeh, amau`n misi lak a kipat a thohkik na thu ajaktak un, kimkhat in anuihsan ua, adangte`n, “Hih thu na kiang ah kung ngaikhia kik ding uh,” achi ua.
Tuachi`n Paul alak ua kipat in a pawtkhiata hi.
Hinanleh mi kuate hiam amah lam ah abelh tinten ua, agingta ta ua, tualeh akhen khat ahihleh Areopagami Dionisia leh numei khat amin Damari leh akiang ua midangte tawh ahi uhi.
Hih silte zohin Paul Athen khua a pat apawt a, Korin khua ah apaita hi.

Tualeh amin Aquila Judami khat amu a, a mah Pontas gam a piang ahi a, Klaudia in Judate jousiah pawt thu apiak jiak a azi Prisila tawh Itali gam a kipat hung tungpan phet ahi ua. Tualeh Paul akiang uah ahung pai a,
tualeh a nasep uh a kibang ahihjiak in akiang uah atung a, a semkhawmta ua, a nasep uh ahihleh puan inn bawl ahi.
Tualeh khawlni tengin kikhopna inn ah thu asutpih a, Judate leh Grikte agingta dingin achial jel hi.
Tualeh Sila leh Timothi Masidonia gam a kipat a hungtun un, Paul pen kha phut in thu maimai gen in aomta a, Jesu hih Krist ahi chih Judate kiang ah ahilhchian jel hi.
Hinanleh akalh un agensia ua, Paul in apuante athing a akiang uah, “Na mohna sisan uh natung uah kituk heh, kei kasiang ahi, tubansiah Jentelte kiang ah ka paita ding hi,” achi hi.
Tualeh hua a pat in apai a, mikhat amin Tita Jasta achih uh inn ah alut a, huapan Pasian a biajel a, a inn zong kikhopna inn tawh kizom ahi.
Tualeh Krispa, kikhopna inn vaihawmpa a innkuante jousiah tawh Toupa agingta ua, Korin khua a mi tamtak in zong ja in agingta ua, baptisma a tangta uhi.
Tuachi`n janin Toupa`n Paul kiang ah mangmu bangin, “Laukenla, dailouin thu genjel in,
kei na kiang ah ka om gige hi. Tualeh hihliam dingin kuaman natung ah khut akha kei ding hi, hih khua ah mi tampi kanei ngal a,” achi hi.
Tualeh Paul huasan ah, alak uah Pasian thu hilh in kumkhat leh akim a omta hi.
Tualeh Gallio, Akhaia gam uktu ahihlai in, Judate`n ki thutuak takin Paul asual ua, vaihawmna touna mai ah atut ua.
“Hihpa`n, dan kalh in Pasian biading in mi akhempuk jel hi!” achi ua.
Tualeh Paul in dawng ding a akisak laitakin, Gallio in Judate kiang ah, “Aw nou Judate, hihte hih sil diklou thu hiam, sil bawlkhial thu hiam bek hileh pellouin kung ngaihsak ding a.
Hinanleh, thute, minte nou dan tung thu lel ahihleh nou kingaih tuahjaw un, ajiak kenjaw hichibang thu ka ngaihtuah utkei hi!” achi a.
Tualeh vaihawmna touna mai a pat amauh adelh mangta hi.
Tuachi`n Grikmi jousiahin kikhopna inn vaihawmtu Sosthene aman ua, vaihawmna touna mai ah avua ua. Tualeh Gallio in tua asil bawlte uh khawk asa kei hi.

Tualeh hua nungin Paul sawttak atam nalai a, tuazoh in unaute kampha in akhen a, huasan a kipan in Suria gamlam ah gunkuang in apaita a, Prisila leh Akuila tawh zong ajawk uhi. Kichiamna aneih jiakin Kendria khua ah Paul in asam aheu hi.
Tuachi`n Ephesa khua atung a, amauh huasan ah anusiata a, hinanleh amah pen kikhopna inn ah alut a, Judate tawh thu a sutkhawmta ua.
Tualeh amau`n akiang ua sawtdeuh tam dingin akhouhta ua, amah a utkei hi.

Hinanleh kampha in akhen a, Jerusalem a ankuang luina om ding ah jauh teitei kasawm a, “Pasian in pha asakleh na kiang uah kung paikik ding hi,” chi in. Tuachi`n Ephesa khua a pat in gunkuang in apaita hi.
Tualeh Kaisaria khua ah a hungtung a, Jerusalem khua ah apai tou a, saptuamte chibai abuk a, tuakhit in Antiok khua ah apaisukta hi.
Huasan a bangtan hiam aom nungin apaita a, nungjuite jousiah kipsak dingin Galatia gam leh Phrigia gam jousiah atuansuak hi.
Tualeh Judami khat amin Apollo, Aleksandria khua a piang, mipiltak Pasian Laisiangthou theisiammi Ephesa khua ah apai a.
Tuapa pen Pasian lampi thu jilsa ahi a, khalam ah lunglut takin Toupa tanchin pilvangtak a genin ahilhjel a, Johan baptis guak athei hi.
Tualeh kikhopna inn ah hangsan takin thu agen panta a, Prisila leh Akuila in a thugen ajak un a inn uah apaipih ua, akiang ah Pasian lampi kichian takin ahilhchianta uhi.

Tualeh aman Akhaia gam a paisuak atup takin, unaute`n a hasuan ua, amah ana kipahpih na ding un nungjuite kiang ah lai akhakta uhi. Amah atun takin Pasian khuatuahna jal a gingtate nasatakin apanpih hi.
Ajiak, aman vanta`ng theih in Judate a selthal a, Pasian Laisiangthou zang in Jesu hih Krist ahi chih atheisak hi.
Tualeh hichi ahung hi a, Apollo Korin khua a aom sungin Paul in khuasak lam tuansuak jouin Ephesa khua a hungtung a, tualeh nungjui kuate hiam amu a
aman akiang uah, “Na gintat tu`nglai un Khasiangthou natang uai?” achi a.
Amau`n akiang ah, “Khasiangthou aom chih zong ka jakha ngai mawng mawng kei uhi,” achi ua.
Tuachi`n, aman akiang uah, “Ahihleh nou bang baptisma ahia natan uh?” achi a,
Amau`n, “Johan baptisma,” achi uhi.
Tuachi`n Paul in, “Johan in mi kiang ah anung a hungpai ding Jesu Krist na gintat ding uh ahi, chi`n kisikna baptisma in a baptis jel hi,” achi hi.
Amau`n hih thu ajaktak un, Toupa Jesu min in baptisma atangta uhi.
Tualeh Paul in atung uah akhut a nga a, Khasiangthou atung uah a hungtungta a, ham theihlouh in ahung hamta ua, thu a genta uhi.
Tualeh aun un mi sawm leh nih ahi uhi.
Tualeh Paul kikhopna inn ah alut a, khathum sung ding hangsan takin thu agen a, Pasian gam lam thu ngaihsun in, mi kun in athuzohjel hi.
Hinanleh khenkhat aphengphi ua, agingta ut kei ua, mipi mai a hua lam agensiat tak un, amauh apaisan a, nungjuite apaipih tuam a, Tairanna kichi siamsinna inn ah niteng in a houlim pihta hi.
Tualeh hichi bangin kumnih sung a om a, tuachi`n Asia gam a om jousiah Judate leh Grikte`n zong Toupa Jesu thu ajata uhi.
Tualeh Pasian in Paul khut in sillamdang taktakte abawlsak a.
Tuachi`n a satung a kipat in kinawtna puan hiam, puantualte hiam damloute kiang ah ahung tawi ua, a natnate uh adam jel a, tualeh asung ua dawite zong apawt jel hi.
Tuachi`n Judami khualjin kawikawi dawithu thei kuate hiam in, “Paul in athu atang koupihjel Jesu min in kung vau uhi, chi`n dawipaite tungah Toupa Jesu min alou vial ua.”
Tualeh Judami siampi khat Skeva in huachibang bawl tapa sagih anei hi.
Hinanleh dawiin adawng a, “Jesu ka thei hi, Paul zong ka thei hi, hinanleh nou kuate nahi ua?” achi hi.
Tuachi`n dawipaiin amauh ahung bawh a, ajou a, anuaisiahta a, tuachi`n hua inn a pat guaktang leh liam in a taikhiata hi.
Tualeh hihthu Ephesa khua a teng jousiah, Judate leh Grikte kiangah zong athangta a, tualeh aun un alau ua, Toupa Jesu min alianta hi.
Tualeh agingtate zong tamtak a hungpai ua, a silbawlte uh thupha atawi ua, aki phuangta uhi.
Mitphial dawi tawi tampi`n zong alaibute uh ahung tawikhawm ua, mijousiah mitmuh in ahalta ua, tualeh aman atuat ua, daan dangka tang sang sawmnga bang a phasak uhi.
Tuachi`n thupitakin Toupa thu ajaakta a, agualjou jel hi.
Hua silte nungin Paul in a lungsim in, Mesidonia gam leh Akhaia gam a tawtsuak zoh chiang a Jerusalem khua a pai asawm a, “Huasan a ka paizoh chiangin, Rom khua zong kava mu teitei ding,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n a sepkhawmpih minih Timothi leh Erasta pen Mesidonia gam ah asawl a, hinanleh amah Asia gam ah hun tomkhat aom tadih hi.
Tualeh hualai velin Toupa lampi thu in mi ahahbuai mahmah ua.
Ajiak mikhat amin Demetria, dangka sik khengtu, daan dangka sik a Diana lim bawltu in khutsiamte kiang ah kilawhna tampi apiajel hi.
Huapa`n amauh asam khawm a, anasep bang uh semte tawh, tuachi`n akiang uah, “Pute aw hih nasepna pen ihauhna uh ahi, chih nathei uhi.
Hih Ephesa khua guak ah hilou in, Asia gam pumpi ah zong hih Paul in khut a bawlte pen Pasian ahi kei uh chi`n mi tampi athuzoh a, aki heisak jouta hi chih noumah ngeiin na mu un na ja uhi.

Tuachi`n, ikivaina uh bang mahlou ahung suak ding guak lauhuai hilou in, pasiannu thupi diana biak inn zong ahung ki ngaineu ding a. Tualeh Asia gam pumpi leh leitung pumpi a mi`n abiak uh amahnu ngei zong athupina suksiat in ahung om kha ding chih alauhhuai hi!” achi hi.
Tualeh hua thute ajaktak un aheh mahmah ua. “Ephesamite diana athupi hi!” chi`n aki kou uhi.
Tuachi`n akhua pumpi in a buaisiangta ua, Gaia leh Aristarkha, Mesidonia gam a mi, Paul in a khualzinna a azohpih tegel aman ua, kituak takin etnop bawlna inn ah atai lutpihta uhi.
Tuachi`n Paul in mipi lak a lut atup leh a nungjuite`n aphal kei ua.
Tualeh Asia gam lamkai liante lak a Paul lawmte khenkhat in akiang ah mi asawl a, etnawp inn a lut mawng mawng lou dingin a ngen ngen uhi.
Khenkhat thukhat in aki kou ua, khenkhat thudang in aki kou ua, kikhawmte abuai ua, mi tamjaw in aki khopna san uh zong athei kei uhi.
Tualeh mipi lak a pat Aleksander akai khia ua, Judate`n amah mi mailam ah asawn ua, tualeh Aleksander in akhut in ajap a, mi jousiah kiang ah adikna thu gen asawm hi.
Hinanleh amah Judami ahi chih atheihtak un, dakkal nih sung ding bang aw kituak takin, “Ephesamite diana thupi hi!” chi`n aki koukou uhi.
Tualeh khuasung laigelhtu in mipi adaihsak zoh in, “Nou Ephesa khua a mite!” “Ephesate hih pasiannu diana thupi leh jupiter a pat hung kia milim bia ahi uh, chih theilou kua aom a.
Tuachi`n hihthu nialgual ahihlouh nungin, nadaih khinkhian ding uh ahi, kinoh hehu a bangmah na bawllouh ding uh ahi.
Ajiak hih nung mipuite uh biak inn luhmi lah ahi kei ua, na pasiante uh gensiate zong ahi kei uhi.
Demetria leh azohpih khutsiamten mi kua tung hiam a thubuai aneih uleh, thubuai genna inn honsa in a om hi, tualeh gam uktute zong aom uhi, kihek uh hen.
Hinanleh, sildang buaina naneih mawng uh ahihleh dan bang a kikhopna inn ah lepding ahi.
Tunia buaina jiakin itung ua thu ahung om ding lauhuai hi, i kikhopna san pen lah hih ahi chihding lah aom ngal kei a,” achi hi.
Tualeh aman huachi a thu agen zoh in kikhawmte atawpsakta hi.
Tualeh buaina adaih nungin Paul in nungjuite akiang ah asam a, amauh ahasawt a, kampha in akha a, Mesidonia gam a dingin apaita hi.
Tualeh hua gam teng atotsuak a, akiang ua hanthawnna thu tampi agen zoh in Grik gam a hungtungta a,
tualeh huasan ah khathum atam a, tualeh Judate`n amah atangdap jiak un Suria gam lam a gunkuang a apai ding laiin Mesidonia gam lehphak kik atumta hi.
Tualeh Beria khua a Sopater, Thessalonika khuate; Aristarkha leh Sakundate; Derbe khua a Gaia leh Timothi; tualeh Asia gam a Takika leh Trophima in Asia gam dongin atonpih uhi.
Hihte kamai uah anapai ua, Troas khua ah ahung nangak uhi.
Hinanleh kou, tanghou tol sawhlouh nite zoh in Philippi khua a pat gunkuang in kapai ua, ninga nin akiang uah, Troas khua ah ka tung ua, huasan ah ni sagih katam uhi.
Tualeh nipi kal ni masa ni in nungjuite tanghou balkek ding a ahung kikhop laiun, Paul in ajingni a pai asawm jiakin akiang uah thu agen a, tualeh jankim dongin agen jawm hi.
Tualeh inndan tungnung a akikhopna uah meivak tampi aom a.
Tualeh amin Eutika kichi tangvalnou khat kotta ah atou a, a ihmut asuak sengseng a, Paul in thu asawt gen jiakin a ihmutsan a, Innsawng thumna a pat akiasuk a, asisa in atawm uhi.
Hinanleh Paul akumsuk a, atung ah abok a, apom a, “Patau kei un, ahinna amah ah a om nalai hi!” achi hi.
Tuachi`n pindan tungnung a akahtouh kik khit in, tanghou abalkkek a, ane a, sawtpi khuavak dongin akiang uah thu genin ahoulim a, tuachi`n apaita hi.
Tualeh amau`n tangvalpa pen ahing in ahung paitouhpih ua, alung muang mahmah uhi.
Tuachi`n kou gunkuang lam ah kanapai masa ua, Assos juanin gunkuang in kapaita ua, Paul tuansak kasawm ua, aman keng a pai asawm jiakin, hichibang dingin agen mawng hi.
Tualeh Assos khua a ahung kituahpih takin ka tuangsakta ua, Mitilene khua ka tungta uhi.
Tualeh hua a pat in gunkuang in ka paikik ua, ajingni in Khios ka tung ua, ajing kik in Samos ka tung ua, Trogiliam ah ka ta`m ua, ajingni in Mileta ka tung uhi.
Ajiak Paul in Asia gam a omsawt a utlouh man in, Ephesa khua gunkuang a paikhensuak atup mawng ahi a, ahihtheihleh Jerusalem khua ah pentikos ni a om atum a, akinpai hi.
Tualeh Mileta khua a pat Ephesa khua ah mi asawl a, saptuam upate asamsak hi.
Tualeh amauh ahungtun un aman akiang uah, “Asia gam a kungpai masakni a pat na kiang ua ka om sungteng ka omdan nathei uhi.
Kingiamkhiat tak leh Judate`n ahung tup jiak ua mittui tampi leh sil haksa ka tung a hungtungte thuak kawm in Toupa nna kasem hi.
Tualeh nou phattuamna ding sil bangmah ka im kei a, kung theisak siang a, vantang leh inchin ah kung hilh jel hi.
Judate leh Grikte kiang ah zong Pasian lam a lungsim kisik thu leh I Toupa Jesu Krist lam a ginna thu ka theisak jel hi.
Tualeh tuin, ngaiun, Khasiangthou thununna pailou theilou a ka kitheih jiakin Jerusalem khua a pai ding kisa ka hi, hua mun a ka tung a sil hung tungdingte ka theikei hi.
Khasiangthou in henna leh haksatna a ahung gak ahi chia khuachin a ahung theihsakte guak ka thei hi.

Hinanleh ka taidemna kipak tak a ka taitung theihna ding leh Toupa Jesu a pat a ka muh Pasian hehpihna tangthupha theihsak ding nasepna ka sepzoh theihna dingin hih silte khat bek in ahung lingsak kei a, ka hinna zong itta`k in kasim kei hi.
“Tualeh tuin, Ngaiun, noute jousiah Pasian gam thu gen a ka vaklehnate`n kamel namu nawn kei ding uh chih ka thei hi.
Tuajiakin mijousiah sisan ah ka siang ahi chih tuni in kung theisak hi.
Ajiak Pasian in thu a hunghilhte jousiah na kiang ua phuankhiat louh a im kanei kei hi.
Tuajiakin, Pasian saptuam ama sisan a aleite vak dingin Khasiangthou in lamkai a ahung bawlna pawlte jousiah leh noumauh tung ah pilvang un.
Ajiak ka painung chiangin ngia gilou nalak uah ahung vaklut ding a, pawlpite akhawi kei ding uh chih ka thei hi.
Noumauh lak mahmah ah zong nungjuite amauh lam a kaimang dingin thutuam gen nung om ding uhi.
Tuajiakin kiveng un, kum thum sung hial mittui luangpum a sun leh jan a miteng taihilh ka tawplouh dan theijing un.
“Tualeh tuin, unaute hung khangsakthei a, tualeh, mi siangthousate lak a agoutan piathei Pasian leh a hehpihna thu kiang ah nou kung kemsak hi.
Kuamah dangka, kham, silh leh ten ka eng ngaikei hi.
Hih khutten keimah leh kalawite taksapte asemkhia jel chih nou mahmah in nathei uhi.

Bangkim ka bawl taphot na juihding un kung ensakta hi, huachibang a semgim leh Toupa Jesu thu theijing kawm in mi hatloute na panpih ding uh ahi. ‘Amah mah in lak sangin piakna in gualjawlna ahaujaw hi,’ ” achi hi.
Tualeh hichibang thu agen zoh in, akhupdin a, aun un athum khawm uhi.
Tualeh aun un hahkah in akap ua, Paul a ngawngkawi ua, atawp ua,
amel amuh nawn louh ding uh thu agenpen a lungkhampih diak uhi. Tualeh longkhawlna mun tanpha in avakhata uhi.
Tualeh hichi ahung hi a, amauh tawh ka kikhennung un gunkuang in kapai ua tangtak in Kos katung ua, tualeh ajingni in Rhode katung ua, hua a pat in Patara katung uhi.
Tualeh Phoinisia gam a paiding long khat kamu ua, katuang ua, kapai jel uhi.
Tualeh Kupra gam ka muh un veilam pangah ka pel ua, Suria gam lam ah kapai jel ua, Tura khua ah ka ki-nga uhi, huamun a long van suahkhiat ding ahihjiak in.
Tualeh nungjuite ka zongkhia ua, huasan ah nisagih ka ta`m uhi, amau`n kha hilh in Paul Jerusalem a apailouh ding ahi, chih agen uhi.
Tualeh anitawp lam ka hungtun un ka kipankhia ua, kapaina ding uh kajuanta ua, tualeh amau`n aun un azite atatte utawh khuagei dongin ahung kha ua, tuachi`n tuipi piau ah kathum uhi.
Tualeh mangpha ka kikhak zoh un kou longah katuangta ua, amauh innlam ah apaikikta uhi.
Tualeh Tura khua a pat long a tuangin Tolemai khua katung ua, unaute chibai kabuk ua, akiang uah nikhat ka om uhi.
Tualeh ajingni in kou Paul lawite ka kipankhia ua, Kaisaria katung ua, sagihte lak a khat Philip inn ah ka lut ua, amah tawh ka om uhi.
Tualeh hihpa`n tanu nungak siangthou li anei a, Pasian thu agen jel uhi.
Tualeh huasan a ni tampi katam laiun, Judea gam a kipan amin Agabas kichi Jawlnei khat ahung paisuk hi.

Tuachi`n amah ka kiang uah a hungpai a, Paul kawnggak ala a, akhutte leh akengte akikan a: “Tualeh hih kawnggak neitu pen Jerusalem khua a Judate`n hichibang in akan ding ua, Jentelte khut ah apiakhia ding uhi, Khasiangthou in achi hi,” achi a.
Tualeh, hihthu ka jaktak un, kou leh huasan a omten Paul pen Jerusalem a pailou dingin ka ngen ua.
Tuachi`n Paul in, “Bangchi nahi ua, na kahkah ua, nung khasiat sak uh? Ajiak Jerusalem khua a akan guak hilou in, Toupa Jesu min dingin sihzong ka ngap hi,” chi`n adawng hi.
Tualeh khouhzoh gual ahihlouh takin katawp ua, “Toupa thuthu hihen,” ka chita uhi.
Tualeh huanite nungin ka vante uh kakan ua Jerusalem ah ka paitouta uhi.
Kaisaria a pat in nungjui kuate hiam in ahungjui ua, amauh amin Mnason, Kupra khua a nungjui masa khat tunna a kaneih dingpa uh ahung paipih uhi.
Tualeh Jerusalem khua kungtun tak un unaute`n kipak takin ahung nadawn uhi.
Ajingni in Paul kou tawh Jakob kiang ah alut a, huasan ah saptuam upate jousiah aom uhi.
Tualeh Paul in amauh chibai abuk zoh in, a nasepna zang a Pasian in Jentelte lak a sil abawlsak jousiah abanban in agen hi.
Tualeh amau`n huathu a jaktak un Toupa apahtawi ua, tuachi`n Paul kiang ah, “Sanggampa Judate kiang ah gingtu tamtak namu a, tualeh aun un dan angai poimoh mahmah uhi.
Tualeh nang, Jentelte lak a Juda omte jousiah kiang a atate uh tep tanlouh ding leh dan bang a omlouh ding chi`n Mosi paihkhiat na ding na thuhilh jel chih mi tampi kam a kipan in na thu athei uhi.
Bang chihding ata le? Mipi ahung paikhawm ngeingei ding uhi, nang hungpai chihlah ja ngeingei ding ahi ua.
Tuajiakin, na kiang a ka genbang un bawl in, kichiamna nei pasal li kanei uh.

Tua mipite paipih inla, asam uh aheunang uh sum pia in, tuachi`n mijousiahin mi kam a nathu ajakteng uh bangmahlou ahi chih athei ding ua, nang pen dan juiin kichian takin na omjaw chih athei ding uhi.
Hinanleh Jentelte lak a gingtute tungtang thu pen milim biakna silnek lam ah, sa heklup nek lam ah, kingaih lam a aki hepkhiat uh chihlouh ngal sildang atangkei uhi,” achi ua.
Tuachi`n Paul in pasalte apaipih a mauhte tawh aki siansuah a. Pasian tempul ah alut a, ki siansuahna ni abei hun ding leh amauhchiat a ding a asillat hun ding uh siampu kiang ah avahilh hi.
Tualeh ni sagih achin ding kuan takin, Asia gam a Judate`n tempul sung a Paul amuh tak un, mipi jousiah atok thou ua, atung ah khut akha ua.

A kikou ua, “Israelmite! Hung panpih un! Hih mipa ahi gamchin a mi jousiah kiang a, Judamite, dante tualeh hihmun gensia, tuaban ah Pasian tempul ah Grikte alutpih a, hih inn siangthou abuahsak jouta hi!” achi ua.
Ajiak hua masang in khuapi ah Ephesa khua a mi Trophima, a kiang ah amu ua, Paul in amah Pasian tempul a ahung paipih takin agingta uhi.
Tuachi`n khuapi sung jousiah abuaita a, mipite ahung taikhawm ua, Paul aman ua, Pasian tempul a pat akaikhia ua, kotte akhak pai uhi.
Tualeh amah thah asawm laitak un Jerusalem khua a mi jousiah abuai uh chih thu galkap lamkai lian kiang atung a.
Aman galkapte leh galkap jalamkai apaipih pai a, akiang uah ataisuk a, tuachi`n amau`n lamkai lianpen leh galkapte amuh tak un, Paul avuak uh atawpta uhi.
Tuachi`n lamkai lianpen pan ahung naih a, Paul atu a sikkol nih khih ding thu a pia a; “Tualeh kua hi ahia, bang bawlsiat nei ahia?” chih adong hi.
Tualeh mipi lak ah akhen thu khat in a kikou ua, akhen thudang in a kikou uhi, tualeh buaijiakin thuchian bangmah atheikei ua, kulh sung a puilut dingin thu apia hi.
Tualeh Paul kalbi atun laiin mipi`n aholhseng jiak un galkapte`n amah adomkang uhi.
Mipi jousiahin, “That un!” chia kikou in anung ajui huthut ua.
Tualeh Paul giahbuk a apuilut ding kuan un, aman galkap lianpenpa kiangah, “Na kiang ah thu themkhat ka genthei diai?” achi a.
Tualeh aman, “Grik ham nathei ei?”
“Tu ma a mite buaina bawl a hasuan a mithatte sangli gamdaia puikhiatu Izipt gammi hilou na maw?” achi a.
Hinanleh Paul in, “Kei Judami, Silisia gam a Tarsa khua a mi ka hi, khua na dan maimai a om hilou ka hi. Hung hehpih inla mipite kiangah thu hung gensak in,” achi hi.
Tualeh aman a phalsak takin Paul kalbi tung ah ading a, mipi lam akhut in ajap a, tualeh amauh adaihsiang tak un Hebrai ham in thu agen hi:
“Unaute leh pate aw, tuin na kiang uah ka dikna thu ka gen ding hi, ngaiun!” achi a.
Tualeh akiang ua Hebrai ham a thu a gentakin adaisem ua, tuachi`n aman:

“Kei Judami ka hi a, Silisia gam a Tarsa khua a piang ka hi. Hinanleh hih khua ah Gamaliel kengbul a khanglian a Ipu leh pate uh dan khauhtak dungjui a tunia noute bang a Pasian lam a kipumpiak ka nahi hi.
Tualeh hih lampi a mite ka`n in sihtan in ka bawlgenthei jel a. Tualeh numei pasal in thong ah ka khum jel hi.

Siampite leh upate jousiahin zong hua thu ahung theihpih uhi. Amauh kiang a pat unaute piak ding lai kamu a, Damaska khua a om jousiahte bawlgenthei dingin Jerusalem khua a ka`nsa a puiding in kapai hi.
“Tualeh hichi ahung hi a, Ka pai a, Damaska khuagei katun in, sunkim laitak ahi a, thakhat in van a kipat vak thupitak ka kim ah ahung vakguih a.
Tualeh kei, tual ah ka puksuk a, tualeh aw khat in, ‘Saul, Saul! Nang bangding a hung bawlgenthei na hia?’ chi in kaja hi.
Tualeh ken, ‘Toupa, Nang kua na hia?’ chi`n ka dong a, tualeh aman ka kiangah, ‘Nazareth Jesu, na bawlgentheih ka hi,’ achi hi.
Tualeh ka kiang a omten vak amu ua, alau ua, hinanleh ka kiang a thugentu aw ajakei uhi.
Tualeh ken, ‘Bang ka bawldia Toupa?’ kachi a, tualeh Toupa`n ka kiang ah, ‘Thou inla Damaska khua ah lut in, huasan ah siljousiah na bawldingte ahung ki hilh ding hi,’ achi hi.
Tualeh hua vak thupi jiakin khua ka muthei nawn takei a, ka lawite`n khut in ahung kai ua, Damaska khua ah ka lutta hi.
“Tuachi`n hua khuapi sung a mi khat Anania, dan lam a Pasian ngaihsak leh huasan a om Juda jousiahin agen phat uh.
Ka kiang ah a hungpai a, ading a, ‘Sanggampa Saul, khua muta in!’ ahung chi a. Tuachi`n huahun mahmah in amah ka muta hi.
Tuachi`n aman, ‘Ipu leh pate Pasian in nang adeihlam thei ding leh midiktat asila mu a, akam a aw suak ja ding a ahung guat na hita hi.
Ajiak namuh leh najak thu ah mijousiah kiang ah amah thu theihpihtu na hi ding hi.
Tualeh bangding a khuangai nalai na hia? Thou inla Toupa min loukawm in baptisma tang inla, na khialhna sawpsiang in,’ a hungchi hi.
“Tualeh hichi ahung hi a, Jerusalem a ka paikik zoh in Pasian tempul a ka thumlaiin, mangmu bang in ka om a,
‘kinoh inla Jerusalem khua a pat in pawt in, ajiak hihsan a mite`n ka tanchin nagen sanglou ding ahi uh,’ hungchi`n amah kamu hi.
Tualeh, ken, ‘Toupa,’ amau`n, ‘Nang hung gingtate thong a ka khum a, kikhopna innchin a ka vuakjel athei uhi.
Tualeh na thu a lamkai Stephen sisan asuah laiun keizong akiang uah ka ding a, lem ka nasa a, athatte puante zong kana kem hi,’ kachi hi.
Tuachi`n aman ka kiang ah, ‘Paiin,’ ‘hihsan a kipat gamlapi ah, Jentelte kiangah kung sawl ding hi, ahung chita a,’ ” achi a.
Tualeh amau`n hihtan chiang a ngaikhia ua, tuachi`n aw ngaihtak in, hichi bangmi! leitung a kipat in, “Hihmang un! Hingtak ahi kei!” achi ua.
Tualeh akikou ua, apuante uh a bawtkek ua, vanlam ah leivui atheh uhi.
Galkap lamkai lianpa in Paul kulhsung a puilut dingin thu apia a, atung a hizahta a kikouna jiak theihna dingin jep a dokchian ding, achi hi.
Hinanleh savun khau a ahenzoh un, Paul in akiang a ding galkap jalamkaipa kiang ah, “Rommi mawng mawng siamlouh tansakna bei a vuakna ding thu nanei uai le?” achi a.
Galkap jalamkaipa`n hih thu ajak takin, galkap lamkai lianpenpa kiangah apai a, “Na silbawl ding pilvang in, hihpa Rommi ahi!” chi`n ahilh a.
Tuachi`n galkap lianpenpa a hungpai a, akiang ah, “Rommi namaw? hunghilh in,” achi a,
Tualeh aman, “Hi e,” achi hi.
Tualeh galkap lianpen in, “Hih khuami hihna ken sum tampi a kalei ahi,” chi`n adawng a.
Hinanleh Paul in, “Kei Rommi a piang mawng ka hi,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n dokchian sawmten amah apaisan pai ua, tualeh galkap lianpenpa in zong Rommi ahi chih a theihchian takin amah mah in akansak ahihjiak in alauta hi.

Ajingni in Judate`n bang jiakin ahia Paul ahek uh chih theihchian atup jiak un galkap lamkai lianpen in amah aphel a, siampite leh vaihawmte jousiah kikhawm dingin thu apia a, Paul ahung paipih ua, amai uah adingsak ta uhi.
Tuachi`n Paul in vaihawmtute tangtak in a en a, “Ka chipih Israelmite aw! Tuni chiangdong in Pasian mitmuh a hoih a katheih taphot bawl in ka omjing hi,” achi hi.
Tualeh siampi Anania in, Paul geia dingte kiangah akam beksak dingin thu apia a.
Tuachi`n Paul in akiang ah, Nang bang kinuhkangpa, “Pasian in nang ahung bengjaw ding hi, nang dan bang a ka thu ngaihtuah dingin natou a, danlou bang a kei bek ding nungchih maw!” achi a.
Tualeh akiang a dingte`n, “Nang Pasian siampi na housia vial a!” achi ua.
Tuachi`n Paul in, “Ka chipih Israelmite aw, siampi ahih ka theikei a ahi. ‘Na chihpihte lamkai tung ah thuhoihlou genken,’ ” chih gelh ahi, achi hi.

Hinanleh Paul in khenkhat Sadukaite ahi ua, adangte Pharisaite ahih uh atheih takin, vaihawmtute lak ah a kikou a, “Unaute! Kei pen Pharisai tapa Pharisai ka hi. Kinepna leh misi thohkikna ah vaihawmsak a om ka hi!”
Tualeh aman hichi a agen zohzoh in Pharisaite leh Sadukaite kal ah kiselna ahung om a, tualeh mipi aki langkhenta uhi.
Ajiak Sadukaite`n misi thohkikna a om kei, vantungmi zong a om mawng mawng kei, achi ua, hinanleh Pharisaite`n huategel a om hi chi`n agum uhi.
Tuachi`n hahbuai in ahung buaita ua, “Hihmipa ah gitlouhna bangmah ka mukei uh! Kha in hiam, vantungmi in hiam akiang a thu gen ahihleh idou kei ding uh!” achi ua.
Tualeh ahung kiselsang deuhdeuh tak un, galkap lianpenpan Paul abohtel uh alau a, galkapte vapaisuk a, alak ua pan a Paul vapum mat a, kulhsung a hung paipih dingin thu apia hi.
Tualeh tuajan in Toupa Paul kiangah ahung ding a, “Paul, lauken! Khamuang takin om in, Jerusalem a ka thu na theihsak bangin Rom khua ah zong na theihsak ding ahi,” achi hi.
Tualeh khua ahung vak takin, Judate lawikhat a kithukim ua. Paul athah masiah ua bangmah nelou dawnlou dingin aki chiamta uhi.
Tualeh mi thahsawm a kithukimte mi sawmli sang a tamjaw ahi ua.
Tuachi`n amauh siampite leh upate kiangah apai ua, “Paul ka thah masiah ua bangmah nelou dingin nasatakin ka kichiam uhi.

Tuajiakin nou vaihawmte tawh athu kichian jawsem a ngaihtuah ding kipang in na kiang uah puikhia dingin galkap lamkai lianpen kiangah va ngen un. Tualeh aman na kiang uh ahung phak masanga na that ding a mansa ka hi uhi,” achi ua.
Hinanleh Paul sanggamnu tapa in, aguk a ata`ng thu uh anaja a, kulh ah avalut a, Paul ahilhta hi.
Tuachi`n Paul in, galkap jalamkai khat akiang ah asam a, “Hih tangvalnou galkap lianpenpa kiangah paipih in, akiang ah gen ut anei hi,” achi hi.

Tuatakin aman galkap lianpenpa kiang ah apaipih a, “Paul thong ngakpa`n akiang ah ahung sam a, hih tangvalnou in na kiangah banghiam gen ut aneih jiakin na kiang a hungpaipih dingin ahung sawl hi,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n galkap lianpenpa`n akhut in atu a, atuam in apaikhiat pih a, “Ka kiang a nagen ut bang ahiam?” chi`n agu`k in adong hi.
Tualeh aman, “Paul thu kichian sem a ngaihtuah sawm bangin, jingchiang a vaihawmtute kiang a puisuk dingin Judate`n hungnget lem asata uhi.
Hinanleh athu uh na gingta ken, ajiak alak ua mi sawmli sang a tamjaw in agu`k in ata`ng uhi. Huamite`n amah athah masiah ua bangmah nelou ding leh dawnlou dingin a kichiam uhi,” achi hi.
Tuatakin galkap lianpenpa`n tangvalnou apaisak a, “Hihthu nung theisakta chih kuamah hilhken,” chi`n thu apia hi.
Tualeh aman galkap jalamkai nih asam a, “Jan dakkua chiang a Kaisaria khua a paiding in galkap zanih tawh, sakawl tungtuangmi sawmsagih tawh, tei tawimi zanih tawh kimansa in koih un, achi a.
Tualeh gam ukpa Felik kiang a bittak a tuttheihna dingin Paul tuanna ding sakol zong guatsak un,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n galkap lianpenpa in hichibang in laikhak agelh hi:
“Klaudia Lisia in, gam uktu hoihpen Felik: Chibai abuk hi.
Hihpa Judate`n amat ua athah ding kuan un, kei galkapte tawh kava pai a, amah pen Rommi ahih ka thei a, ka hunkhiata hi.
Tualeh ahekna pen uh theih ka ut a, vaihawmtute kiang ah kapaipih a.
Amah pen adanthu uh bang ahiam a kihek ahi chih ka thei a, hinanleh ahekna uh thu ah sihna ding leh kol bulhna ding hial bangmah a om kei hi.

Tualeh Judate`n amah atang uh chih mi`n a hunghilh takin na kiang ah amah kintakin kung sawlta hi. Tualeh ahektute`n atung a thubuai aneih jousiah uh namai a gen ding in thu kapia hi,” Mangpha, chi in.
Tuachi`n galkapte`n athupiak bangin Paul pen jan in apaipih ua, antipatri atunpih ua.
Ajingni in sakol tung tuangmite amah tawh akitonsak ua, amauh kulh ah ahung kilehkikta uhi.
Amauh Kaisaria atung ua, gam ukpa kiangah laikhakpen apia ua, Paul zong amai uah a dingsak uhi.
Tualeh gam ukpa`n laikhak asim zoh in Paul omna gam adong a, tualeh Silisia gam ahi chih a theihtak in,
“Nang hung hekte a hungtun chiang un, na thu ka ngaikhia ding,” achi a. Tualeh Herod vaihawmna innsung a koihding in thu apia hi.
Tualeh ni-nga zoh in siampi Anania tawh upate leh amin Tertulla thugensiam tawh ahung paisuk ua, Paul tung a thubuai pen gam ukpa kiangah agen ua.
Tualeh Paul asapkhiat tak un, Tertulla in amah ahek panta a:
Felik zah omtak! Nang mah jalin lungmuang takin ka om ua, tualeh nang kepna jal a hih namte a ding a gitlouhna khamhoih a aom jiakin.
Bangchik tanin khoimun peuh ah lungkim takin ka kipak uhi.
Hitaleh zong nang ding a chimtak-huai talua ka utkei, na migitna a ka thu uh themkhat hung ngaihkhiatsak dingin kung ngen hi.
Ajiak kou hihpa huat huaitak, leitung a Judate jousiah tokbuaitu leh Nazareth pawl a lamkai khat ahih ka thei uhi.
Pasian tempul zong sukbuah zong asawm a, amah kaman ua, ka dan uh bang a atung a vaihawm sawm hi ung a.
Hinanleh galkap lamkai lianpen Lisia ka kiang uah ahung pai a, kakhut ua pan in gumtat takin a lamangta hi.
Atung a thubuai neite na kiang a hungpai dingin thu pia in, nangmah ngeiin amah dongchian in, ka hekna thute uh na theichian ding hi, achi a.
Tualeh Judate`n zong hua thupen huachimah bang ahi, chi`n apanpih uhi.
Tuachi`n gam uktu in Paul thugen ding a khut a ajap takin, Paul in,
“Nang, kum tamtak hih namte vaihawmtu nahih kungtheih jiakin kipak takin kadikna thu ka gen ding hi.
Jerusalem a Pasian biading a ka paitouh nung ni sawm leh nih val a hinaikei ding chih na theithei ding hi.
Tualeh tempul a mi toh ka kinialna ahihkeileh kikhopna inn leh khuasung a mi ka chilsiatna bangmah amukei uhi.
Tuin zong ahung heknate uh kichiantak in abul a zongkhiathei kei uhi.
Hinanleh hihthu na kiangah kung pulak hi, amau`n biakdan tuam achih uh lamtuam juiin kapu leh pate uh Pasian kabia a, Mosi dan leh Jawlneite laibu jousiah gingta in.
Tualeh mi diktatte leh mi diktatloute thohkikna aom ding chia amau`n zong apom uh, huapen ken Pasian lam ah ka lam en ahi.
Tuajiakin, Pasian lam leh mihing lam a asia apha theihkhenna nei a, bawlkhial bei a om dingin keimah leh keimah bangchik lai peuhin kaki engbawl hi.
“Tuin kum tampi nungin ka namte uh kiang a sil piak ding leh gan thah ding hungkeng in kungpai a.
Hua sil ka piaklaiin, Asia gam a hung kipan Judami kuate hiam in, mipi jaulou leh buailou in Pasian tempul a ka kihihsiangthou ahung mu uhi.
Huate`n katung a thubuai nei hile uh hiah namai ah om in ahung hek ding uhi.
Ahihkeileh hih mite mahmah in vaihawmtute mai a ka dinlaiin, ka bawlkhial muh aneih uleh gen uh hen.
Hihthu themkhat jiak houh ahihngal keileh alak ua ding a: ‘Misi thohkikna aom chih thu ah tunin namai uah salh in ka om ahi,’” kachih pen, chi`n adawng hi.
Hinanleh Felik in hihthute ajak takin hua lam thute atheichian sem a. Amauh kiangah, “Galkap lianpen Lisia ahung tunsuk chiangin, na thu ka ngaihtuah siang ding chi`n ahun asuan phot hi.”
Tualeh aman Paul veng a, hinanleh awngkhah deuh a omsak a, tualeh alawite`n a nna asepsak uh khamlou dingin galkap jalamkai khat kiangah thu apia hi.
Tualeh ni bangzah hiam nungin Felik azi Judami numei Drasilla tawh ahung pai ua, Paul asamsak a Krist a ginna thu angaikhia hi.
Tualeh Paul in diktatna thute, kidekna thute leh vaihawmna hung tung ding thute agen leh, Felik lauin akithing a, “Tu`n paikik phot in. Hunlem kaneih chiangin kung samkik ding,” achi hi.
Tualeh a khahkhiatna ding a Paul in dangka apiak bang akinem a, asamsak mun sim a, ahoupih thimthem hi.
Hinanleh, kumnih nungin Porsia Festa in Felik ahung khekta a, tualeh Felik in Judate kipaksak a ut a, Paul pen kansa in a nusiata hi.
Tuachi`n Festa in gam pen a ukta a, Kaisaria a pat Jerusalem ah apaitou a,
tuachi`n siampite leh Juda lamkaite`n akiang ah, Paul tungtang thu ahilou lam in atheisak ua.
Tualeh lampi ah ana tangdap ua, ana thahtheihna ding un akiang ah, Paul Jerusalem a vapuitou sak dingin a ngen uhi.
Hinanleh Festa in, “Paul pen Kaisaria a koihding ahi, keizong tomkhat zoh chiangin hualam ah kapai ding hi.
Tuajiakin, hihpa in gitlouhna nei ahihleh, nalak ua thuneithei jousiahin hung juisuk uhenla, hek uh heh,” chi`n adawng a.
Tualeh alak ua nisawm val a om nung in Kaisaria khua ah apaisuk a, tualeh ajingni in vaihawmna touna ah a tou a, Paul hung paipih dingin thu apia hi.
Tualeh Paul ahung tuntak in Jerusalem a kipan a hung paisuk Judate akim ah ading ua, atung ah thubuai tampitak gen in, siatakin ahek ua, a thudiktak a ensakthei tuan kei uhi.
Paul in adikna thu agen a: “Judate danthu ah hi in, tempul thu hitaleh, tualeh Kaisar thu hitaleh sil mawng mawng ka bawlkhial kei hi,” achi hi.
Hinanleh Festa in Judate deihlam bawl aut a, Paul kiangah, “Jerusalem paitouh a kamai a hihthute ngaihtuah hileh na ut ei?” chi`n adong a.
Tuachi`n Paul in, “Kaisar vaihawmna touna mai ah vaihawmsak a om dingin ka ding hi, Judate tung ah bangmah ka bawlkhial kei hi, nang chiantak in nathei hi.

Migilou ka hih a, sihna khop hial sil bawlkhial ka hihleh sihzong kanial kei hi. Hinanleh hihten ahung hekna uh adiktak aom kei leh kuaman akiang uah ahung piakhia thei kei ding uhi, Kaisar kiangah ka tutding,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n Festa in vaihawmtute a houpih kawikawi zoh in, “Kaisar kiang a tut na ut maw, Kaisar kiang natung ngut ding hi,” chi`n adawng hi.
Tualeh ni bangzah hiam nungin, kumpipa Agrippa leh Bernisi Kaisaria ah Festa chibai buk dingin ahung pai ua.
Amauh huasan a ni tampi atam nung un, Festa in Paul tungthu kumpipa kiang ah agen a, “Felik in mi thongtang khat anusia a,
Jerusalem a ka om lai in siampite leh Juda upate`n athu ahung theisak ua, siamlouh tangsak dingin ahung ngen uhi.
Hinanleh ken akiang uah, ahekpa uh leh ahekte a kimaituah ua, ahekna thu ua aman adikna thu agenna lemtang aneih ma in, mi kuamah gawt ding a piakkhiat Rommite dan ahi kei hi chi`n ka dawng hi.
Tuajiakin, amauh hihsan a hungtun un sawt hallou in ajingni in vaihawmna touna ah ka tou a, hua mipa hung paipih dingin thu kapia hi.
Tualeh ahektute adinlai un kagintat bangtak in atung ah gitlouhna thubuai bangmah lah agen kei ua.
Hinanleh amauh biak dante leh mi khat, Jesu, asisa, Paul in ahing kik chia agen, thu a kinialna nei ahijaw uhi.
Tualeh ken, hua chibang kinialna thute khendan ka theihlouh jiakin Jerusalem a pai a huasan a hihthu khen a ut leh a utlouh ka dong hi.
Hinanleh Paul in Augasta khen ding a koihphot ding a angetzawk jiakin Kaisar kiang a ka sawltheih masiah veng dingin thu kapia hi,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n Agrippa in Festa kiang ah, “Ken zong huapa thugen ka ngaikhia ding,” achi a,
“Aman jingchiang in na ngaikhia ding,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n ajingni in Agrippa leh Bernisi pen thupitak in a hungpai ua, galkap liante leh khuasung a miliante tawh mipi kikhopna inn ah a hunglut ua. Festa thu in Paul ahung paipih ua.

Tualeh, Festa in, “Kumpipa Agrippa leh hihsan a ka kiang a om jousiahte`n hihpa na mu uhi, amah ahihleh Judate mipi jousiahin Jerusalem leh hihsan ah ka kiangah ahek ua. Hingtak ahikei chi`n a kikou uhi.
Hinanleh sihna ding khop bangmah a bawlkei chih ka thei a. Tualeh aman Augasta kiang a thu tut asawm jiakin sawl kasawm ahita.

Hinanleh, athu gina bangmah ka toupa kiang a gelh ding lah kanei kei a, tuajiakin namai uah kung puikhia a, kumpipa Agrippa aw, nang mai a kung puikhiat ahi deuh hi, ajiak athu dokchian nung a gelhding themkhat bek ka muhtheih na ding in.
Thong tang khat atung a ahekna thu uh theihkham louh khat tawh kumpipa kiang a sawlpen sil mot-huai a katheih jiakin,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n Agrippa in Paul kiangah, “Na dikna thu nagen thei hi,” achi a. Tuatak in Paul in akhut ajak a, adikna thu agen a:
“Kumpipa Agrippa aw! Judate`n ahung hekna jousiah ah kadikna thu tunia namai a ka gen ding jiakin kipak in ka kithei hi,
ajiak ahihleh Judate lak ah dan thubuai jousiah thu ah nasiam mahmah chih ka theih jiakin ahi.
“Ka naupanlai a kipan, a masapen a ka chipihte lak ah leh Jerusalem khua a ka om dan Judate jousiahin athei uhi.
Atu`ng a pat in ka tanchin athei uhi, ka sahkhua dan ua akhauhpen Pharisai ka hi a, a ut uleh ahung genpih thei uh ahi.
Tualeh tuin kapu leh pate uh kiang a Pasian thuchiam pen kineppihna jiakin hihsan ah vaihawmsak in ka ding hi.
Hua thuchiam pen kanam uh sawm leh nih in sun leh jan a Pasian nna kuhkaltak a sem in muh akinem uhi. Kumpipa Agrippa, hua kinepna jiakin Judate`n ahung hek uhi!
Pasian in misite akaithou chih bangding a gintat huailou a ngai na hi ua?
“Ken zong Nazareth Jesu min kalhlam in sil tampi bawl leng hoihding in kana gingta a.
Huabang Jerusalem khua ah ka bawl jel a. Tualeh siampite kiang a pat phalna kamu a, misiangthoute lak a mi tampi thong ah ka khum a, tualeh amauh athahlai un lemsa lam ah kana pang hi.
Tualeh kikhopna inn tengah amauh ka gawtjing a, Jesu min gensiatsak katum hi. Tualeh atung uah ka gilou mahmah a, gam dang khua tanpha in kagawt jel hi.
“Huachibang bawl dingin, siampite thu mu in leh asawlna lai uh tawi in, Damaska khua ah ka pai a.
Kumpipa aw, sun laitak in van a kipan in, vak, ni sang a vakjaw keileh kajawkpihte kim ah vak in ka mu a.
Tualeh ka un un leiah kapuk ua, Hebrai ham in, ‘Saul, Saul! Nang bangding a hung bawlgenthei na hia? Vuakna chiangjumte pek nang a ding in ahaksa hi,’ chi`n aw khat kaja a.
Tualeh ken, ‘Toupa, Nang kua na hia?’ kachi a. Tuachi`n aman, ‘Na bawlgentheih Jesu ka hi.
Hinanleh, thou inla, na keng in dingin, hih nasil muhte leh na kiang a kung kilakna dingte tawh, hua nna sem ding leh theihpih ding a nang hung sawl ding in na kiang ahung kilak ka hi hi.
Judate leh tu a kung sawlna Jentelte khut a kipan ka hung hunkhia ding.

Amit uh vaksak ding leh mial a pat vaklam ngasak ding in, tualeh setan thuneihna a pat Pasian lam a akihei theihna ding uleh khial ngaihdamna amuh theihna ding un, tualeh kei ahung gintat jiak ua ki hihsiangthoute lak a gou aluah theihna ding un,’ achi hi.
“Tuajiakin, kumpipa aw, vanlam kilakna thu juilou in ka om kei hi.

Hinanleh a masa in Damaska khua a mite kiang ah, tualeh Jerusalem khua a mite kiangah, tualeh Juda gam pumpi a mite kiang ah leh Jentelte kiangah zong, a kisik ua, Pasian azot ua, kisikna tawh kituak nna asepna ding un, ka theisakta hi.
Hihte jiakin Judate`n Pasian tempul ah ahung man ua, thah ahung sawm uhi.

Hinanleh Pasian akipan panpihna ka muh jiakin, tuni tan in mineute kiang leh miliante kiangah thu theisak in ka om nalai hi. Jawlneite leh Mosi in hung tung ding achih uh thu chihlou ngal thudang genlou in:
Krist in gim athuak ding a, tualeh misite lak a thoukik masapen ahi ding a, tualeh Judate leh Jentelte kiangah vak amusak ding, achih thu uh,” achi hi.
Tualeh, huachi a adikna thu agen laiin, Festa in, aw ngaihtak in, “Paul! amaw hiteh, Na simtamna in ahung motsak ahi!” achi a.
Hinanleh aman, “Milianpen Festa, Amaw ka hikei hi! Thudiktak leh pilna thu agen ka hijaw hi.
Hih thute kumpipa in athei hi! Tuajiakin akiang ah laulou a ka gen ahi. Hih silte a kiangah bangmah im ahikei chih ka thei hi, hih silte ningkawm khat abawl ahihlouh jiak in.
Kumpipa Agrippa aw, Jawlneite thu na gingta ei? Na gingta chih kathei hi!” achi hi.
Tuachi`n Agrippa in Paul kiang ah, “Thu themkhat a khem a kristian suakding in nungjou dektak hi,” achi hi.
Tualeh Paul in, “Thu themkhat hi in, thu tampi in hitaleh, nang guak hilouin tuni a ka thu jajousiah keimah bang a om ding in Pasian kiangah ka ngen hi, hih sikkolte bulhlou in!” achi hi.
Tualeh Paul in huachi a agenzoh in, kumpipa tawh, gam ukpa tawh, Bernisi tawh tualeh akiang a toute tawh ading chiat ua,
tuachi`n apaikhia tuam ua, aki hou ua, “Hihpa in sihna leh sikkol bulhna ding khop hial in bangmah a bawlkei hi,” achi ua.
Tuachi`n Agrippa in Festa kiangah, “Hihpa in Kaisar kiangah athu tut sawmlou hileh khahkhiat theih mai ding hiven,” achi hi.
Tualeh Itali gam a long a kapai ding uh thupukna a om takin, Paul leh thong tang dang kuate hiam pen, “Augasta pawl a mi galkap jalamkai amin Julia kichi akemsak ua.”
Tualeh Asia gam tuipi geia khua omte tawn ding Adramitim long ah ka tuang ua, ka kitawlta ua. Thessalonika khua a om Mesidonia gammi Aristarkha ka kitonpih uhi.
Ajingni in Sidon katung uhi. Tualeh Julia in Paul a hoihbawl a, ki hihhalh dingin alawite kiang ah apawtsak hi.
Hua a pat in ka paikik ua, huih alehlan jiakin Kupra gam liahlam ah ka kitawl uhi.
Tualeh, Silisia gam leh Pamphilia gamjul tuipi kakhen nung un, Lisia gam a Mira khuapi katung ua.
Huasan ah galkap jalamkai in Itali gam juan ding Aleksandria long amu a, hua ah ahung tuangsak hi.
Tualeh awl awl in mi tampi ka kitawl ua, haksatak in Knida lak katung hamham ua, huih in ahung nan jiakin Salmoni juanin Krit gam liah ah ka kitawl ua.
Tualeh haksatak a paisuak in long khawlna kilawm achih mun uh katung ta ua, huasan ah Lasia khua aom hi.
Tuachi`n ni tampi apaitak jiakin leh long a pai alauhuai jiakin an ngawlni abeita a, Paul in amauh a thuhilh a:
akiang uah, “Pute aw, hih long a paina ah tuahsiatna manna thupitak tung ding ahi chih ka thei a, van puakte leh along guak hilou in, i hinna uh nasan in alauhhuai hi,” achi hi.
Hinanleh galkap jalamkai pa`n Paul gen sangin longpute leh long neipa thugen agingtajaw hi.
