Tualeh phalbi hun a omna ding long khawlna mun akijenlouh jiakin atamjaw in huapan a kitawlkhiat a Phoinik tun teitei a, huasan a phalbi sung om asawm ua, Phinisi ahihleh Krit gam a long khawlmun khat ahi a, mal tumlam leh sim tumlam ngattuah ahi.
Tualeh simlam huih awl awl a ahung lan tak in, adeihdan uh mu kisa in long asut ua, Krit gamning juljul ah akitawl uhi.
Hinanleh tomkhat zoh in hua a pat in “Euroklidon” achih uh huihpi hattak ahung langsukta hi.
Tualeh long ahung phukhata a, tualeh huihlam a ngattheih louh tak in ka khahta ua, ahung lam lehlehta hi.
Tualeh Klauda achih uh tuikulh gam khat ah katai ua, haksatak in longneu pen ka bitsak hamham uhi.

Akaihkhiat zoh un apanpihna khaute azang ua, long nuailam ah avial ua, tuachi`n denchiah sirti sehnel lak ah kileng lutkha inteh chi`n puanjakna jousiah apuksak ua, tuachi`n ahung mawk toh kawikawita hi.
Tualeh tui kinawk in ahung hahphuk jiakin ajingni in long a avanpuakte tui ah apaikhia uhi,
tualeh a nithumni in ka khut ngei un long vante ka paikhia uhi.
Tualeh ni tampi ni leh aksi a kilang kei a, huihpi nadan maimai in ahung nuai ahikei a, hing dingin ka kinem nawn kei uhi.
Tualeh sawttak an nelou a aom nung un, Paul alak uah ading a, “Pute aw, Krit tuikulh a ka thu man a long sutlou a, hihbang siatna leh manna tuahlouh ding hinapi a.
Hinanleh tuin lungmuang tak a om dingin kung ngen hi, ajiak nalak ua kuamah in hinna ata`n kei ding ua, long pen sia ding ahi.
Ajiak amah a ka hih a, a nna zong kasep Pasian vantungmi tujanin ka kiang ah hung ding a
‘Lauken, Paul! Kaisar maiah nading ngei ding hi. Tualeh ngaiin, long a natuanpihte jousiah zong Pasian in a hungpiak ahita,’ ahung chi hi.
Tuajiakin, pute aw, lungmuangtak in om un! Pasian ka gingta a ahunghilh bangin a om ding hi.
Bangteng hileh tuikulh gam khat ah ahung lekdok ngei ding hi,” achi hi.
Hinanleh Adria tuipi a huih in adung avai a ahung mutleng uh ajan sawm leh li janin jankim lai dingin longmiten gamkhat tung ding bangin a kitheita ua.
Tualeh tui litdan ateh ua, lam sawmnih hi in athei ua, tualeh themkhat kitawl gamla deuh in atehkik ua, lam sawm leh nga hi in athei ua.
Tuachi`n suanglak ah lenglutkha inteh chih alau ua, long nunglam ah sikka li akhia ua khuavak angakta uhi.
Tualeh long mite`n long mailam ah sikkate khia kipang in long neupen tuipi ah akaikhia ua, long taisan asawm uhi.
Tualeh Paul in, galkap jalamkai leh galkapte kiangah, “Hihte long a aom kei uleh nabit kei ding uhi,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n galkapte`n longneu khaute a sattan ua, akhahta uhi.
Tualeh khua vak kuan in, Paul in aun un an neding in asawl a, “Tuni, anngawl a na-ngak ua, bangmah nelou a na omna uh ni sawmlehli ni ahita.
Tuajiakin, an neding in kung sawl ahi; hihpen na damna ding uh ahi. Na lak ua kuamah a samjang khat zong a mang kei ding,” achi hi.
Tualeh, hua thu agenzoh in, tanghou ala a, amai uah Pasian kiang ah kipahthu agen a, tualeh abalkek zoh in a nepanta hi.
Tuachi`n, aun un lungmuang tak in aom ua, tualeh anzong aneta uhi.
Tualeh longsung a om mi ka un un zanih leh sawmsagih leh guk ka hi uhi.
Tualeh an anekkham zoh un buhpen tuilak ah apai ua, long ajangsakta uhi.
Tualeh khuavak takin khoigam ahia chih atheikei ua, hinanleh long khawlna piautak neukhat amu ua, huasan ah ahihtheihleh chi`n long tawllut asawm uhi.
Tualeh sikkate akhahkhia ua, tuipi ah anusia ua, long kanna aphel ua, tualeh long puanjak huih lanna lam ngat in akaitou ua, piautak ajuanta uhi.
Hinanleh tuipi nih kisuktuahna mun ah ka lutkha ua, long lei asunsakta ua, tuachi`n long mailam akiphutdetta a, hihling zohlouh in omta a, anunglam tui kihot ahatjiakin akekta hi.
Tualeh galkapte`n thong tangte tuipek a taimang khat omkha unteh achi ua, thah asawmta ua.
Hinanleh galkap lamkaipa`n Paul hutkhiat a utta a, asiltup uh akham a, tuipeksiam jousiah tui napek a gam nakai masa ding leh;
midang khenkhat long tung ah, khenkhat long phelkek tung bang a galkai ding thu apia hi. Tuachi`n a un un gam ah bittak in agalkai siangta uhi.
Tualeh amauh asuahtak tak un, hua tuikulh gam pen Malta ahi chih atheita uhi.
Agammite`n ahung na hehpih mahmah ua, guah ajuk jiak leh avot jiakin mei atawh ua, ka un un kipaktak in ahung na vaidawn uhi.
Tualeh Paul in sing lomkhat atom a, mei a avakleh meisa hu jiakin gul khat ahung pawtkhia a akhut atu a, a kikhaidenta hi.
Tualeh agammite`n gul akhut a kikhaiden amuh un, “Hihpa pen tualthat hiding ahi tuipi a pat suakta nanleh phuba latu in ahin ding phal nawnlou ahita,” achi ua.
Hinanleh Paul in gul pen meilak ah athingkhia a, bangmah achi kei hi.
Amau`n pen ahung pom hiam, ahihkeileh thakhat a puk a sipai ding a gingta in a ngak ua, hinanleh sawtpi a ngak ua bangmah achihlouh takin, alungsim uh akhek ua, “Amah pen pasian ahi!” a chijawta uhi.
Huamun pen hua tuikulh hausapa amin Pablia achih uh gam ahi a, huapa in kipaktak in ahung vaidawn a, ngainatak in nithum ahung jintungsak hi.
Tualeh hichi ahung hi a, Pablia pa pen nattun leh santen in ana lum a, Paul akiang ah avalut a, a thum a, atung ah akhut a nga a, a damsakta hi.
Tuachibang a abawl zoh in hua tuikulh gam a midang natna nei jousiah zong ahung pai ua, adam chiatta uhi.
Amau`n thupitak in ahung pahtawi ua, tualeh ka paiding un ka poimoh jousiah uh longah ahung koihsak uhi.
Tualeh khathum nungin Aleksandria long, phalbi sungteng tuikulh a tam alulam, “Unau peng,” lutang lim suang ah kapai uhi.
Tualeh Siraka ah ka ki-nga ua, hua ah nithum ka ta`m uhi.
Tualeh huasan a pat ka paikual ua, Rhegium katung ua. Tualeh nikhat zoh in simhuih ahung lang a, ajingkik in Puteoli katung uhi.
Huasan ah unaute kamu ua, akiang uah ni sagih ta`m ding in ahung khouh ua, tuachi`n Rom. lam juanin kapaijel uhi.

Tualeh unauten ka tanchin uh ajak tak un, huasan a kipan in Appia vanjuakna mun leh jinbuk thumte chiang a hungdawn ding in a hungpai ua, Paul in amauh amuh in, Pasian kiangah kipahthu agen a, a khamuangta hi.
Tualeh Rom. khua katun un, galkap jalamkai in thong tangte pen avengtu galkap lamkaipa kiangah apiakhia a, hinanleh Paul pen avengtu galkap khat guak tawh a om aphalsak hi.

Tualeh hichi ahung hi a, nithum nungin Paul in Juda lamkaite asam khawm a, amauh ahung kikhop tak un akiang uah, “Unaute aw, Juda nam leh Ipu leh pate uh dan tungah bangmah ka bawlsiat a omlouh hang in, Jerusalem a Rommite kiangah thong tang a piakkhiat ka hita hi.
Ahung etdik zoh un sihnakhop hial katung a bangmah a omlouh jiakin khah ahung sawm ua.
Hinanleh Judate`n hua anial jiak un Kaisar kiang a kathu tutlou theilou ka hitakei hi, ka chipihte hekna a bawl hilou in.
Hih thu jiak a nou tawh ki mutuah a ki houlim dingin kungsam ahi. Israelte kinepna jiak a hih sikkhau a kan a om ka hi,” achi hi.

Tuachi`n amau`n akiang ah, “Na tanchin Judea gam a kipat laikhak in ka mukha kei uh, unaute kuamah in zong hihsan a hungpai in, natung thubuai bangmah ahung ensak kei ua, gen zong ahung gen ngai kei uhi.
Hinanleh nangaihdan nang a pat ka januam uhi, ajiak hihpawl pen gamchin a gensiat a aom uh ka thei uhi,” achi ua.

Tualeh ani aguat ua, aniguat uh a hungtun in mi tampi ahung pai ua. Jingsang a kipat nitaklam dongin Pasian gam thu ahilhchian in atheisak a, Mosi dan laibu leh Jawlneite laibu thu in Jesu lam ah amauh a jawljawl hi.
Tualeh khenkhat in thu kigen agingta ua, khenkhat in agingta kei uhi.

Tualeh amauh aki thulual theihlouh phet un, Paul in thukhat agen khit in a paikhiata uhi. A thugen ahihleh hih ahi: “Khasiangthou in Jawlnei Isaiah kam a, Ipu leh pate uh kiang a agen pen adik mahmah hi!
Aman hichi`n agen a,
‘Pai inla hih mite kiangah vagen in:
jak pen na jading ua, hinanleh angaihna na theikei ding uhi;
muhpen na mu ding ua, hinanleh na theikhia kei ding uhi,
ajiak hih namte a lungtang uh akhengta a,
abil uh abingta a,
amit uh asingta uhi.
Atuachih keileh, amit un amukha ding ua,
abil un ajakha ding uh,
a lungsim un atheikha ding uh,
tuachi`n a hung kiheikik kha ding ua,
ken kana hihdam kha ding,’ ”
achih pen.
Tuajiakin, “Pasian hundamna pen Jentelte kiang a sawl ahita chih thei un, amau`n pen ngaizong a ngaikhia ding uhi!” achi a.
Tualeh hihthu Paul in agenzoh in Judate apawtkhiata ua, amauh lak ah nasatak a kinialna anei uhi.
Tuachi`n Paul kumnih sung vingveng ama innluah ah aom a, akiang a pai taphot aki pakpih a.
Pasian gam thu agen a, Toupa Jesu Krist thu hangsan takin ahilhjel a, kuaman amah akham kei uhi.
Paul Jesu Krist sila, sawltak hiding a sehtuam, a tangthupha gen ding a Pasian sap in.
Hua tangthupha aman tanglai pek a, a Jawlneite tungtawn a Laisiangthou a ana chiamsa.
Taksa dan a David suan a piang, a Tapa Jesu Krist I Toupa uh;
tualeh siangthouna kha lam ah, misi lak a thohkikna in silbawltheihna tawh Pasian Tapa ahih a suklat tungtang thu.
Amin jiak a namchin lak a, mi ginna lam a thumang sak dingin hehpihna leh sawltak hihna itangta uhi.
Huate lak ah nou zong Jesu Krist sapte na hi uhi.
Pasian ittak misiangthou hiding a sap, Rom khua a om jousiahte kiangah:
Pasian i Pa uh leh i Toupa Jesu Krist a kipan hehpihna leh khamuanna na kiang uah om hen.
Leitung pumpi a na tanchin uh a kithang suak jiakin na un ua tung a ka kipahna thu, amasa penin Jesu Krist jiakin ka Pasian kiangah ka gen hi.
Ajiak ka thumna teng ah tawplouin namin uh kalou gige a, chih a Tapa Jesu Krist tangthupha a ka kha a a nna kasepsak jing Pasian ahung theihpihtu ahi.
Tu beek a na kiang ua kung paitheihna ding Pasian lemsak a jinhun lemtang ka muh teitei theihna ding a ngen in.
Ajiak nadetna ding ua khalam silpiak bang hiam kung piaktheihna dingin nou kung mu ut mahmah hi.
Tuapen na ginna uleh ka ginna a, nou leh kei iki khamuan tuah theihna dingin kachihna ahi.

Tualeh unaute, Jentel dangte kiang a ka sepgimna gah ka muh tak mahbang a nou lak ua zong ka muhtheihna dingin na kiang uah tamvei hungpai ka tumta hi, hinanleh tu dongin dal in ka om jing chih na theihlouh uh ka deihkei hi.
Grikte leh melmate kiangah bat kanei hi, mipil leh mipilloute kiang ah zong.
Tuachi`n nou Rom khua a omte kiang ah zong tangthupha ka theihtawp a gen dingin ka kiman jing hi.
Tangthupha ka jumpih kei hi, ajiak agingta jousiah a dingin hihpen hundamna ding a Pasian sil bawltheihna ahi, Judate dingin ahi masa a, tualeh Grikte dingin zong ahi.
Ajiak ahihleh gintatna dingin ginna in Pasian diktatna suklat in aom a, “Mi diktat ginna in ahing ding,” chih gelh bang in.
Ajiak, thutak diktatlouhna a dal mite Pasian ngaihsak louhna leh diktatlouhna jousiah tung ah Pasian thangpaihna van a pat in ahung kilangta hi.
Pasian in atheihsak tak jiakin Pasian tanchin theihding pen amauh uah suklat in aom ta hi.
Ajiak pen leitung siamchil a pat a, sil muhtheihlouhte a tangtawn sil bawltheihna leh a Pasian jia natan chiang silsiam ah chiantakin akilang a, chiantak a muh in aom hi!
Pasian theingal in Pasian bangin a pahtawi kei ua, kipahthu zong agen kei uh, hinanleh sil thulimlou pouh a ngaihtuah jawta ua, tualeh a lungtang maw uh ahung mialta hi.
Pil kisa in mimaw ahung suakta ua;
Sithei lou Pasian thupina pen sithei mihingte, vasate, keng li nei ganhingte leh abok a vak ganhingte lim in a suaksakta uhi.
Tuajiakin Pasian in amauh pen a sapum uh jumhuai tak a kibawl tuah ding leh a lungtang uh deihlam bang a silnin abawl uh phal in a omsanta hi.
Huate`n Pasian thutak juau tangsak in, asiamtu sangin, a silsiam bia in a nna asepsak jawta uhi, asiamtu pen tangtawn a phattak ahi, Amen.
Huathu jiakin Pasian in jumhuaipi a ahuk uh phal in alehlam a ngatsanta hi; ajiak a numeite uh nasan in zong apianpih omdan ngaina uh danlou bang a om dingin a kibawl lamdang jel uhi.
Tuachimah bangin pasalte`n zong numei zatdan ngaina tawpsanin, huk in aki enlah ua, pasal leh pasal kilawmlou takin aom ua, a gitlouh man muh ding uh pen a satung uah amu uhi.
Tualeh a lungsim ua Pasian atheih utlouh man un Pasian in sil kilawmloute bawl ding a adeihlouh lam lungsim neih phal in a omsanta hi.
Diktat louhna jousiah, kingaihna jousiah, gitlouhna jousiah, duh amna jousiah, ki muhdahna jousiah a dim in; thangsiatnate, tualthahnate, kinialnate, kikhemnate. Mi siatna ding ngaihtuah in adim ua
thugu`k gen hatte, mi gensiat hatte, Pasian huatlamte, simmoh hatte, kiliansakte, kisatheite, sil gilou pankhiatute, nu leh pa thu mangloute;
theihsiamna neiloute, thuchiam botsiate, pianpih lungsiatna neiloute, ngaihdamna neiloute, zahngaihna neiloute ahi uhi.
Huachibang sil bawlte pen sitak ahi chih Pasian vaihawmna theingal in, amauh guak bawl zong hilou in, midang bawl zong a kipahpih uhi.
Tuajiakin mihing aw, midang na thukhensakna tak ah nangmah siamlouh na kitan hi, nang thukhenpan zong huabang silte nabawl veve jiakin ngaihdamtheih na hitakei hi.
Hinanleh huachibang sil bawljelte tung a Pasian vaihawmna pen thutak dungjuiin ahi chih ithei uhi.
Tualeh huachibang silbawlte gensia a nang zong huate bawl veve, mihing aw! Pasian vaihawmna pel ding a kigingta na hi hiam?
Ahihkeileh Pasian hoihna in kisik dingin nang ahung makaih chih theilou in, ahoihna hauhdan leh dohzawh dan leh thuaktheihnate simmoh nahi hiam.
Hinanleh na lungtang khauhjiak leh na kisik nuamlouh jiakin Pasian thangpaihna ni leh vaihawmna diktak hung kilakni chiang a dingin natung ah thangpaihna naki khawlkhawm hi.
Aman michih asilbawl bang jel un athukkik ding hi.
Silhoih bawl a kuhkal tak a pang a, thupina, leh pahtawina, leh manthai theihlouhna; zong mite kiangah tangtawn hinna apia ding a.
Hinanleh genhak a, thutak juilou a, diktatlouhna juijawte tungah hehna leh thangpaihnate a om ding.
Thuakgimna leh lungkhamna thupitak sil gilou bawlte kha tungah a om ding hi; Judate kha tungah a om masa ding a, Grikte kha tungah zong a om ding hi.
Hinanleh silhoih bawl jousiahte kiangah pen thupinate, pahtawinate tualeh khamuannate piak ahi ding; Judate kiangah piak masak ahi ding a, tualeh Grikte kiangah zong piak ahi ding hi.
Ajiak Pasian in mi deihsak tuam aneikei hi.
Kuapeuh dan neilou a sil bawlkhial pen dan louin a mangthang ding a, kuapeuh dan nei a sil bawlkhial pen dan a vaihawmsak in a om ding hi.
Ajiak dan ajami guak hih pen Pasian mitmuh in midik ahi kei a, hinanleh dan juite pen midik ahijaw ding uhi.
Ajiak dan neilou Jentelte`n amauh pianpih dan silte abawl ua, dan neikei nanle uh hihte dan in a kineih tawm uhi.
A lungtang uah dan silbawl gelh ahi chih a ensak ua, tuapen asia leh pha theihna un atheihpih a, a lungsimte uh kisel in khatvei siam, khatvei siamlouh aki tangsak lehleh uhi.
Ka Tangthupha gen dungjui a Pasian in Jesu Krist zang a mihingte thugu`k vai ahawmni chiangin.
Ngai un? Nangpen Judami kichi nahi a, dan namuang ua;
tualeh adeihlam nathei a, dan hilh in na om a, sil hoihjawte na khen thei a;
tualeh nang mahmah mittawte lamkaitu leh mial a omte a dingin vak hi in nakithei a.
Dan a pilna leh thutak omdan naneih jiakin mimawte hilhtu leh naungekte hilhtu hi in na ki gingta hi.
Tuajiakin, nang, midangte hilhtu, nang leh nang kihilhlou na hi maw, “Nang, guktatlouh ding chia thugenpa`n hinanleh nangin na gujel maw?”
“Nang, angkawm louhding chia hilhtu`n”— hinanleh nang ang nakawmjel maw? Nang, milim kihdakpa, milim biakna tempul a silte nagu jel maw?
Nang, dan suangpa, dan na bohsiat jiakin Pasian min na hihminsia jel maw?
“Ajiak Pasian min pen nou jiakin Jentelte lak ah gensiat in a omta hi,” chia gelh bangin.
Ajiak dan juitu nahihleh teptan a phatuam a, hinanleh dan botsitu nahihleh na teptan pen tanlouh mahbang ahita hi.
Tuajiakin tep tanlou mi`n dan thusehte ajuih leh a teptanlouh pen tan bang a sim ahi kei ding maw?
Tualeh piandan a teptan mi`n dan ajuihkim leh, nang, dan thugelh leh teptan dan neingal a dan botsiatu pen ahung mohpaih kei ding uh maw?
Ajiakpen a pualam guak a Judami hihpen Judami taktak ahikei, a kilang a a pualam guak a teptanmi pen teptan ahikei hi.

Hinanleh a sungtawng a Judami hihpen Judami taktak ahi, tualeh teptan taktak ahihleh lungsim lam a tan ahi, lai thu guak a hilou in, kha ah ahi, amah pahtat lawh pen mihing a ahi kei a, Pasian a pat ahijaw hi.
Ahihleh Judami in bang ahia hamphatna aneih tuan? Ahihkeileh teptan zong bang ahia a phattuam na?
Lam jousiah ah, aphatuam hi! Pasian kamsuakte akiang ua kepsak a aom jiak uh ahi pen hi.
Ajiak mi khenkhat in gingta kei mahle uh bang ahituan dia? Agintat louhna un Pasian gin-omna bangmah lou asuaksak diai le?
Suaksak baih lou e! Pasian pen midiktat hi henla, hinanleh mi jousiah pen juauthei hijaw hen.
“Na thugen a siamtang a na om a;
vaihawmsak a na om chiang a zong na zohtheihna dingin,”
chia gelh bang in.
Hinanleh i diktatlouhna in Pasian diktatna a suklat sem leh bang igen tadia? Pasian in mi agawt chiangin mi diktatlou ahi diai? (Mihing bangin ka gen ahi)
Hibaihlou! Ajiak huachi hitaleh Pasian in leitung vai bangchi`n ahawm tadia?
Hinanleh ka juau genjiak a Pasian thu dikdan ama thupina khop hial a alatsem leh? Bangding a kei zong mikhial bang a siamlouh tansak a omlai ka hia?

Tualeh bangding a, khenkhat in nunghek ua, ka gen louhpi nung gensak bang a, “Silhoih ahung pawt theihna dingin sil hoihlou i bawlding uh”? chia genjawlou ihi ua! Hichi bang mite`n siamlouh atan uh adik hi.
Ahihtakleh bang? Amauh sangin ihoihjaw tuan uh maw le? Hoihjaw tuan baihbaih lou! Ajiak Judate leh Jentelte anih un khialhna nuai a omsiang ahi uh chih masang in a ngawh tave vua le.
Hichia gelh bangin:
“Kuamah midiktat mawng mawng aom kei uh,
khat mah zong a om kei.
kuamah theisiam mawng mawng aom kei
kuamah Pasian zong mawng mawng aom kei.
Pasian a pan ahilou lam ah apial mangta uh;
bang mah phatuamlou ahung suak mangta uh,
kuamah silhoih bawl a om kei uh, khat mah zong a om kei uhi.
A lawl uh han kihong bang ahi a,
alei un khemna thu agen a,
amuk uah gulgu a om hi;
akamte uh hamsia lawhna leh khaatna in adim a,
akalte uh sisan uah dingin akinsuan uhi;
manthaina leh gentheihna a lampi uah aom a.
Tualeh khamuanna lampi zong athei kei uhi,
amit hah uah Pasian lauhna mawng mawng a om kei hi.”
Tuin dan in sil khatpeuh agen taphot kam jousiah hum ahihtheihna ding leh, leitung jousiah Pasian mai a mohtang a a omtheihna ding un, dan nuai a omte kiang a agen ahi, chih ithei uhi.
Tuajiakin dan silbawlte jiakin kuamah Pasian mitmuh in siam tangin a om kei ding uhi, dan jiakin khial kitheihna hung om ahih jiakin.
Hinanleh tuin dan leh Jawlneite`n atheihsak bang un dan panglou in Pasian diktatna suklat in aomta hi.
Tuapen Jesu Krist gintat jiak a, agingtate tengteng a ding a Pasian diktatna ahi, lamdanna mawng mawng a om kei hi.
Ajiak mi tengteng in sil a bawlkhialta ua, Pasian thupina atan zohlouh nung un.
Krist Jesu a om tatna jiakin, ahehpihna a athawn a siam tansak in a om uhi.
Pasian dawhzohna jiak a nidanglai a khialhnate uh kitheih mawh bawl a aom jiakin adiktatna etsakna dingin Krist Jesu pen a sisan a ginna jiak a khialhna thupha tawina hi dingin Pasian in abawlta hi.
Amah midiktat ahihtheihna ding leh, Jesu gingta jousiahte siam tangsaktu a hihtheihna ding a tulaia adiktatna etsakna ding ahi.
Ahihleh kisaktheihna ding khoi ah a om a? A omthei mawng mawng kei hi! Bang dan in ahia? Sil bawl dan in maw? Hilou, ginna dan in ahijaw hi.
Tuajiakin, mi`n dan silbawlte jiak hilou in, ginna jiakin siamtangin i ngai uhi.
Pasian Judate Pasian guak adiai le? Jentelte Pasian zong hilou maw? Hita lua, Jentelte Pasian zong ahi hi.
Teptante agintat jiak ua siam tangsak ding leh, tep tanloute agintat jiak ua siam tangsak ding Pasian khat guak ahi.
Tuachi ahihleh ginna jiakin dan pen bangmah louin ibawl uh adiam? Bawl lou e, dan pen i hihkipjaw lehbung uhi.
Ahihleh taksa dan a Ipa uh Abraham in amuh bang ahia igen ding uh?
Nasep jiak a Abraham siam tangsak a aom leh suan ding anei hi, hinanleh Pasian lam ah hilou in.
Laisiangthou in bangchi`n agen a, “Abraham in Pasian agingta a, hua ginna pen amah a dingin diktatna a sim ahi,” achi hi.
Tuin amah a pan nasemtu thaman pen hehpihna a sim ahi kei a, bat a sim ahijaw hi.
Hinanleh nna semlou a Pasian ngaihsak loute siam tangsakpa gingtajaw mi ginna pen diktatna a sim ahi.
Mi, nasep panglou a Pasian in diktat a asim a gual ajawl sak thu David in zong:
“A khialhnate uh ngaihdam a omte leh,
a khialhnate uh khuh a omte ahampha uhi!
Toupa`n khialhna neilou a asehte a hampha uhi.”
Ahihleh hua hamphatna teptante tung guak a om ahi diam ahihkeileh teptanloute tung ah zong? “Abraham ginna pen adiktatna a sim ahi achi ngal a.”
Ahihleh hua bangdan a sim ahia le? A teptan nungin ahia, a teptan masang in? A teptan nungin ahi kei a, a teptan masang in ahijaw hi.

Tualeh tep tanlou ahihlai a ginna a amuh diktatna theihna teptan chiamtehna amu a, tep tanlou hinanleh uh agingta jousiah pa ahih theihna dingin, diktatna pen amauh ding a zong seh ahihtheihna dingin.
Tualeh tep tanloute a ding a tep tante pa guak ahi kei a, hinanleh Ipa uh Abraham tep tanlouh a a omlai a aginna neih bang a ginna neite pa zong ahi.
Ajiak Abraham hiam ahihkeileh asuante kiang a leitung gouluahtu a hi ding chih thu dan jiak a chiam ahi kei a, ginna a diktatna jiakin ahijaw hi.
Ajiak dan a mite gou luahtu ahih ding uleh ginna bangmahlou asuak ding a, thuchiam zong bangmahlou asuakta ding hi.
Ajiak pen dan in thangpaihna asiam a, hinanleh dan omlouhna ah khialhna zong a om kei hi.

Tuajiakin hehpihna jiak a ahihtheihna dingin, ginna jiakin ahi, suante jousiahin zong thuchiam pen pellou a muhtheihna ding un. Dan nei mite guak hilou in, i un ua Ipa uh Abraham bang a ginna nei jousiahin zong amu ding uhi;
“Nam tampite pa in kungbawl hi,” chia gelh bang in. Misite hingsaktu leh a omloute aom bang a gentu agintat Pasian mitmuh ah.
Kinep-huai a a omlouh in zong aman kinem takin agingta a, “nam tampite pa” ahung hihtheihna dingin. “Huachibang in nasuante ahung hi ding,” chia kigen dungjui in.
Tualeh ginna a hatlou hilouin, ataksa sisa bang a om leh, amah pen kum jakhat vel ding mi ahi a, Sarah chiin zong angaihtuah kei hi.
Ginglahna jiakin Pasian thuchiam taksanlou in aom kei a, ginna ah ahat a, Pasian apahtawi hi.
Tualeh thu aman achiam taphot pen a tangtung sak thei ahi chih theiin a gingta tinten hi.
Tuajiakin aginna pen, “adiktatna a sim ahita hi.”
Tualeh “aginna pen adiktatna a seh ahita,” chih amah jiak guak a gelh ahikei a.
Hinanleh misi lak a kipan a I Toupa Jesu kaithoupa igintat ua ahihleh eite a dingin zong diktatna asim ahi ding hi.
Hua Jesu pen i khialhnate uh jiakin piakkhiat in a om a, tualeh siam itanna dingin kaihthoh in a om hi.
Tuajiakin ginna jiak a siamtansak a om in, I Toupa Jesu Krist jiakin Pasian tawh kilem in i om uhi.
Amah jiak mah in hih i dinkipna hehpihna huang ah ginna a luttheihna ineita uhi, tualeh Pasian thupina a kinem in kipak in zong i om uhi.
Tualeh hua guak hilou in, gimthuakna in kuhkalna a hungtun chih thei in gimthuakna ah zong ikipak uhi.
Tualeh kuhkalna in theihchianna a hungtun a, theihchianna in kinepna a hungtun hi.
Tualeh kinepna in a zahlaksak kei a, hua Khasiangthou ikiang ua ahung piak in Pasian itna i lungtang ua asundim tak jiak in.
Ajiak ihatlouh laiin, a huntak in Krist pen Pasian ngaihsakloute dingin ahung sita hi.
Midik tang a sih mi a ut khawl kei ding a. Hinanleh mihoih tang a sih mi khenkhat in a ngap maithei hi.
Hinanleh mikhialte ihihlai a Krist itang a ahung sihna ah Pasian in ahung itna a langsakta hi!
Huaban ah, a sisan a siamtansak a i om nungin amah jiakin Pasian thangpaihna panin hundam in i omta uhi!
Ajiak pen melma ihihlai a bawn a Tapa sihna jiak a Pasian tawh kilem a i om tak uleh, kilem a i om zoh nung un ahinna jiakin hundam in i omsem ding uhi!
Tua guak zong hilou in, hinanleh tu a tatna imuhna I Toupa uh Jesu Krist jiakin Pasian kiang ah zong ikipak uhi.
Tuajiakin, mi khat jiakin leitung ah khialhna ahung lut a, khialhna jiakin sihna a hunglut mahbang in mi jousiah ana khialh khittak jiakin sihna in mi jousiah ajelsuakta hi.
Ajiak dan omma in khialhna leitung ah a om khinta a, hinanleh dan omlouh laiin khialhna pen khialhna a sim ahi kei hi.
Hinanleh adam a kipan a Mosi tanpha in adam khialhna bang a sil bawlkhial loute tungah sihna in vai ahawm hi.
Adam pen ahung paidingpa etsakna ahi.

Hinanleh sil thawnpiak pen gitlouhna tawh kibang ahi kei hi. Ajiak mikhat gitlouh jiak a bawn mi tampi asih ua ahihleh, Pasian hehpihna leh, mi khat Jesu Krist hehpihna jiak a silthawnpiak pen mi tampi tung ah piak in a om jawsem ngei ding hi.

Tualeh sil thawnpiak pen mikhat khialh jiak a sil hung om tawh a kibang kei hi. Ajiak ahihleh siamlouh tansakna vaihawmna pen mikhat “khialhna” jiakin ahung om a, hinanleh silthawnpiak pen gilou tampite jiakin “Siamtansakna!” dingin ahung om hi.
Ajiak pen mikhat khialh jiak a sihna in hua mikhat jiak mah a thuneitak a vai ahawm leh, hehpihna thupitak leh silthawnpiak mute`n mikhat Jesu Krist jiakin hinna ah vai a hawm jawsem ding uhi.

Tuajiakin mikhat gitlouh jiak a siamlouh tansakna vaihawmna mi jousiah tung ah ahung om a, tuachimah bangin mikhat diktatna silbawl jiakin hinna muhna dingin siam tansakna silthawnpiak pen mi jousiah tung ah ahung om hi.
Ajiak mikhat thumanlouh jiak a mi tampi mikhial a bawl ahih bang un, mikhat thuman jiakin mi tampi midiktat hihsak ahi ding uhi.
Tualeh gitlouhna atamsem na dingin dan ahung om behlap nalai a, hinanleh khialhna apunna ah hehpihna zong apung jawsem hi.
Khialhna in sihna a vai ahawm mahbang in, hehpihna in diktatna jiak a tangtawn hinna tunna ding khop a I Toupa uh Jesu Krist jiakin vai ahawm hi.
Ahihleh bang igen tading ua le? Hehpihna a khansemna dingin khialhna ah i omjing ding uh adiam?
Omjing lou e! Eite khialhna lam a sisate bang chi`n khialhna lam ah ihing thei nalai lai diai?
Ahihleh eite Jesu Krist a baptis a om jousiahte asihna ah baptis in i om uh ahi chih theilou na hi umaw?
Tuajiakin a Pa thupina in misi lak a kipan Krist akaihthoh bang a eite zong hinna thak a ihintheihna dingin asihna ah baptisma in amah tawh vuiin i om uhi.
Ajiak asihna kibakpih a amah tawh ina kizoptak uleh athohkikna kibakpih in zong ikizop ding uhi.
Hih ithei uhi, khialhna pumpi hih mangthang a a omtheihna dingin, tu a kipat a khialhna sila a i om nawnlouhna dingin i mihing lui uh amah tawh kilhden in a omta hi, chih.
Ajiak kuapeuh sitasa pen khialhna a pat in a suakta ta hi.
Tualeh Krist tawh isihtak a ahihleh, amah tawh hing zong ihing ding uhi, chih igingta uhi.
Krist tuh misi lak a kipat kaithoh in aom a, a sinawn kei ding chih theiin, sihna in atung ah thu anei nawn kei hi.
Asihna pen khialhna lam thu ah khatvei si ahi a, hinanleh ahin ahihleh, Pasian lam ah ahing ahi.
Tuachimah bangin nou zong khialhna lam thu ah sisa in kingai unla, hinanleh Pasian lam thu ah I Toupa Jesu Krist jiakin hing in kingai un.
Tuajiakin, duhgawlna thu mang ding in na pumpi sithei uah khialhna vaihawmsak kei un.

Na pumpi hiangte uh zong diktatlouhna vanzak dingin khialhna kiangah piaphal kei un, ahihhang in misi lak a kipan a hingkik bangin Pasian kiangah kipia unla, na pumpi hiangte uh zong diktatna vanzak dingin Pasian kiangah piaphaljaw un.
Ajiak khialhna in natung uah thu aneinawn kei ding hi, ajiak, dan nuaia om na hikei ua, hehpihna nuai a om na hi uhi.
Ahihleh bang chita ding? Dan nuai a om hilou a, hehpihna nuai a om ihih jiak un ikhial ding uh ahi diam? Khiallou ding!
Sihna ding a khialhna sila hi in, diktatna ding a thumanna sila hitaleh, kuakiang peuh ah zong thumang ding a sila a nakipiak nak uleh athu namanpa uh sila na hi uh chih theilou na hi uh maw?
Hinanleh Pasian kiangah kipahthu tung hen! Khialhna sila ana himahle uchin zong, nou hung kipia thugin pen lungtang taktak in na juita uhi.
Tualeh khialhna a kipan suahtaksak a om in, diktatna silate nung hita uhi.

(Na taksa uh hatlouh jiakin mihing dan in ka gen ahi.) Na pumpi hiangte uh siangthou louhna leh gitlouhna hiang a sila ding a na napiak bang un, tu in na pumpi hiangte uh siangthouna dingin diktatna kiangah sila dingin pia un.
Ajiak khialhna sila nahihlai un diktatna lam a pat nana suakta uhi.
Ahihleh tu a nasil jumpihte uah, hualaiin gah bang ahia le naneih uh? Hua silte tawpna lah sihna ahi ngal a!
Hinanleh tuin khialhna a pat suahtaksak a om a, Pasian silate na hung hih nung un sianthouna mukhop in nagah uh nanei ua, tualeh atawpna ah tangtawn hinna tawh.
Ajiak pen khialhna man sihna ahi a, hinanleh Pasian silthawnpiak pen I Toupa Jesu Krist jiakin tangtawn a hinna ahi.
Unaute aw, dan in mi adamsung teng atung ah thu aneihkhum ahi chih theilou nahi uh hiam. Dan thei mite kiang a ka gen ahi.
Ajiak numei pasal nei pen apasal damsung teng dan a apasal a kan in a om hi. Hinanleh apasal asihleh pasal lam thu ah dan a kipan in khahkhiat in a om hi.
Tuachi`n apasal damlai a midang a kitenpih leh pen, angkawmnu a kichi ding hi. Hinanleh apasal asihleh pen hua dan a pat a zalenta a, midang tawh kiteng nanleh angkawmnu a kichi kei ding hi.
Tuajiakin unaute aw, Pasian lam a gah isuah theihna ding a, mi dang, misi lak a kipan a kaihthoh a ompa ngei na kitengpih theihna ding un, Krist pumpi jiakin nou zong dan lam ah si nung hita uhi.
Ajiak taksa a i om laiin dan jiak a khialh utna hung suakkhiate`n i taksa hiangte ah sihna khop gah suang dingin asem taktak uhi.
Hinanleh tuin ahihleh ahung tu pa lah a sikhinta a, dan akipan in khakkhiat in i omta hi, laikhak gelhlui bang phet hilou a, kha thak nna isep theihna dingin.
Ahihleh bang igen tadiai le? Dan pen khialhna adiai? Hilou e! Hinanleh dan jiak a theih hikeileh khialhna kichi theilou ding hing a, “Ajiak dan in engken, chikei leh eng kichi theilou ding ka hi.”
Hinanleh khialhna in thupiak jiakin hun lemtang mu in kasung ah enna chinteng a omsak hi, dan louin pen khialhna asi ahi.
Tu masangin kei dan louin kana hing a, hinanleh thupiak ahung om takin khialhna ahung halhkhia a, kei kasita hi.
Tualeh hinna ding a thupiak pen sihna ding ahung hita chih kung theikhiata hi.
Ajiak khialhna in thupiak jiak a hun lemtang mu in ahung khem a, hua zangin ahung hihlumta hi.
Tuajiakin dan pen asiangthou hi, thupiak zong a siangthou a, adik a, ahoih hi.
Ahihleh silhoih kei ding a sihna hung hita adiai le? Hibaih lou! Hinanleh khialhna pen khialhna a akilat theihna dingin khialhna in silhoih zangin keimah ah sihna ahung siamkhiata hi.
Ajiak dan pen khalam sil ahi chih ithei a, hinanleh kei sami khialhna sila a khuasa ka hi.
Ajiak sil ka bawl pen adan ka thei kei hi, bang jiakin ahia ichihleh sil ka bawl ut pen ka bawl kei a, hinanleh kasil huatlam ka bawl lehbung hi.
Ka bawl utlouh pen ka bawl ngal a ahihleh dan ahoih chia jui ka hita ding hi.
Hinanleh a bawltu pen kei ka hitakei a, khialhna keimah a om bawl ahijaw hi.
Ajiak keimah ah—-chih in ka taksa ah, silhoih mawng mawng atengkei hi chih ka thei hi. Abawl utna pen keimah ah aom a, hinanleh hua ah ahoih bawltheihna ka mukei hi.
Ajiak silhoih ka bawl ut pen ka bawl kei a, hinanleh sil hoihlou ka bawl utlouh pen ka bawl jawsop hi.
Ka utlouh pen ka bawl tak a ahihleh, a bawltu keimah ka hitakei a, khialhna keimah a om bawl ahijaw hi.
Tuachi`n hih dan kungthei ta, silhoih ka bawl ut laiin gitlouhna ka kiang ah ahung om tinten hi.
Ajiak ka lungsim taktak in pen Pasian dan tung ah ka kipak hi.
Hinanleh ka taksa hiangte ah dan tuamkhat a om chih ka thei hi, huapen in ka lungsim dan adou a, tualeh ka taksa hiangte a om khialhna dan kiangah sila in ahung pui chinten hi.
Aw genthei hina tazen ing e! Hih sihna pumpi a pat kua in ahia ahung suahtaksak ding?
I Toupa Jesu Krist jiakin Pasian kiang ah kipahthu ka gen hi.
Tuachi`n kei mahmah in ka lungsim in Pasian dan kasem a, hinanleh ka taksa in khialhna dan asem hi.
Tuajiakin, tuin Krist Jesu a om, taksa dan a omlou a kha dan a omjawte dingin siamlouh tansakna mawng mawng a om takei hi.
Bang jiak ahia ichihleh Krist Jesu a om hinna dan in khialhna leh sihna dan a kipan in ahung suaktasak ta hi.
Ajiak taksa hatlouh jiak a dan in a bawlguallouh Pasian in a Tapa in khialhna taksa gilou lim puain, tualeh khialhna ngaihdamna ding a hungsawl in taksa a khialhna om pen siamlouh a tangsakta hi.
Taksa dan a pailou a kha dan a paijaw eite dan diktatnate hih tangtung a a omtheihna ding in.
Ajiak, taksa dan a omten taksa lam silte a lunggulh ua, hinanleh kha dan a omten khalam silte a lunggulh uhi.
Ajiak, taksa lam lunggulh pen sihna ahi a, hinanleh khalam lunggulh pen hinna leh khamuanna ahi.
Sa lam lunggulh pen Pasian tawh kidouna ahihjiak in, huapen Pasian dan nuai ah a om kei a, omzong a om theilou mawng ahi.
Tuachi`n taksa a omten Pasian a kipaksak theikei uhi.
Hinanleh Pasian kha nou kiang a aom taktak a ahihleh, taksa a om na hikei ua, kha a om na hijaw uhi. Hinanleh mi kuapeuh Krist kha neilou pen amah a ahikei hi.
Tualeh Krist nou a aom leh pumpi pen khialhna jiakin asi ahi, hinanleh kha pen diktatna jiakin ahing ahi.
Hinanleh misi lak a Jesu kaithoupa kha nou mauh a aom leh misi lak a kipan a Krist kaithoupa`n noumah a om kha jiakin na pumpi uh sitheite zong ahingsak ding hi.
Tuajiakin unaute aw, bat inei hi, taksa dan a om ding in taksa dan a hilou in.
Ajiak taksa dan a na om uleh nasi ngeingei ding uhi. Hinanleh pumpi sil bawlte kha a na hihlupjel uleh na hing ding uhi.
Ajiak Pasian kha pui a om jousiahte pen Pasian Tate ahi uhi.
Lau a omkik dingin sila hihna kha mu na hikei hi, hua kha jiakin “Abba Pa!” chi`n i kikou hi.
Pasian kha mahmah in eimah kha tawh Pasian tate ihi chih ahung theisak hi.
Tualeh tate ihihleh gouluahtute ihi uh, akiang a pahtawi a i omtheihna ding a amah ithuakpih taktak leh Pasian gouluahtute Krist luahpihtute ihi uhi.
Ajiak tulai a thuakgimnate pen denchiang a itung a thupina suklat a om ding tawh tehpih tham in ka ngaikei hi.
Silsiam jousiah in kinem mahmah in Pasian tate kilakna ding a ngaklah mahmah uhi.
Silsiam jousiahte pen sil thulimlou thuthu a omsak in a omta uh. Amauh utthu hilou in kinepna nei a amauh omsaktu jiakin ahijaw hi.
Ajiak silsiam jousiah zong siatna sila a pat suahtaksak a om in, Pasian tate noplenna thupi a lutding ahi uhi.
Ajiak silsiam jousiah tutan dongin mau leh nauveina thuak in a om uh chih ithei uhi.
Tualeh amauh guak zong ahi kei a, kha gah nei masa eite zong ta hihna, ipumpi uh tatna muhna ding ngak in, eite tanpha lungsim in imau uhi.
Ajiak kinepna in ahi hundam a i om uh, hinanleh muhtheih gige kinepna pen kinepna ahi kei hi, mi`n amuh gige ah bangding in akinem lailai dia?
Hinanleh imuhlouh ikineppih leh kuhkal takin ingak teitei hi.
Tuachimah bangin kha in ihatlouh nate apanpih jel hi, ajiak bangchi bang a thum ding ihi ua chih ithei kei ua, hinanleh kha in mauna gen-guallouh in ahung ngetsak hi.
Tualeh Pasian deihlam bang a misiangthoute ding a angetsak jiakin amah lungtang entu in kha deihlam bang ahia chih athei hi.
Tualeh Pasian itte, aman aseh bang a asapte dingin, sil jousiahin ahoihna ding un a semkhawm chiat hi chih ithei uhi.
Ajiak a theihkholhte ama tapa bang a om ding in asepkholh a, atate pen unau tampite lak a tamasa pen ahung hihtheihna dingin.
Tualeh asehkholhte pen sam zong asam a, tualeh asapte pen siam atangsak a, tualeh siam atansakte pen apahtawi hi.
Ahihleh hihthute ah bang igen tadiai le? Pasian eilam a apan leh kuan ahia hung douthei ding?
Ama Tapa ngei zong khawilou a, i un ua hung piapa in bangding in sil jousiah athawn in amah tawh hung piakhawm lou ding ahia?
Pasian mitelte kuan ahia ahek ding? Siamtangsaktu Pasian lah ahi ngal a!
Kuan ahia siamlouh tangsak ding? Asi pen Krist ahi ngal a, tuaban ah athou kik jawta a, Pasian jiatlam ah a om a, hung ngetsaktu zong ahi!
Krist itna a kipan kuan ahia hung khen ding? Gimthuakna in maw, lungkhamna in maw, gawtna in ahia, kial in ahia, guaktang in ahia, lauhhuaina in ahia, namsau in ahia hung khen ding?
Laisiangthou a,
“Nang mah jiakin thah in ka om uh;
goh ding belamte bang a sim ka hi uh,”
chia gelh bang in.
Khen baih lou ding, hihte tengteng ah ahung ittu jiakin gualtung tuangte sang a tungtuangjaw ihi uhi!
Ajiak sihna hiam hinna hiam, vantungmite ahiam, lalnate a hiam sil bawltheihnate ahiam, sil hung om dingte ahiam,
sanna hiam, thukna hiam, ahihkeileh silsiam dang mawng mawng in zong I Toupa Jesu Krist a om Pasian itna a kipan ahung khenthei kei ding chih chiantak in ka thei hi.
Krist ah thutak ka gen ahi, Krist ah ka om, ka juau kei, Khasiangthou jiakin ka sia leh pha theihna in ahung theihpih hi
ka lungtang ah haksatna thupitak leh lungkhamna daitheilou kanei hi
ajiak ka unaute aw, taksa lam a ka chipihte tang in keimah Krist kiang a pat bawltuam khop hial in hamsia thuak in omleng kachi hi.
Israelmi ahi ua, ta hihnate, thupinate, thukhunte, danthu piaknate, Pasian nna sepnate leh thuchiamte bang amauh neih ahi a;
pu leh pate amauh ua ahi a, tualeh taksa lam thu ah Krist zong amauh lak a kipan a hung pawt ahi. Amah pen sil jousiah tung a om, tangtawn a pahtawitak Pasian ahi. Amen.
Hinanleh Pasian thu bangmah lou bang in a omta chih ahikei a, ajiak Israel suante aun un Israelmi ahi siang kei uhi.
Abraham suante ahihjiak un zong aun un tate ahisiang tuankei uhi, “Isak ah nasuan aki chi ding,” chih ahijaw hi.
Huapen, taksa tate Pasian tate ahi kei ua, hinanleh thuchiam tate pen Abraham tate a ngaih ahijaw uh chihna ahi.
Ajiak pen thuchiam hihmi ahi, “Tu-hun bang in kung pai ding a, Sarah in tapa anei ding chih.”
Tualeh huaguak ahi kei a, hinanleh Rebekka in zong, mi khat ipu uh Isak lak ah nau apai laiin.
Naupangte zong piang nailou in silhoih leh silsia zong bawl nailou in, tellam thu ah Pasian silguat a dettheihna dingin, silbawljiak hilouin, asamtu deihjiak hijaw in,
a kiangah, “A upajaw in anaujaw nna a sepsak ding,” Pasian in achi hi.
“Jakob ka it a, hinanleh Esau ka hua hi,” chih gelh bang in.
Ahihleh bang igen tadia le, Pasian ah diktatlouhna aom adiai? Om baihbaih lou.
Ajiak aman Mosi kiangah, “Ka khuatuah ut taphot ka khuatuah ding a; tualeh ka lungsiat ut taphot ka lungsiat ding,” chi`n ana genta hi.
Tuachi`n adeihpa jiakin ahikei a, ataipa jiakin zong ahituan kei a, hinanleh akhuatuahtu Pasian jiakin ahijaw hi.
Ajiak Laisiangthou in Pharoah kiangah, “Hihjiak mah in kung tung ding a, nangmah a ka silbawltheihna ka etsak theihna ding leh leitung pumpi a kamin a thantheihna dingin,” achi hi.
Tuajiakin Pasian in a ut taphot a khuatuah a, a ut taphot zong agenhak sak jel hi.
Tuachi`n nang ka kiangah, “Bangding a aman i diklouhna hungkawk ahia? Adeihlam kuan akalh a?” nachi ding hi.
Hilou, hinanleh, aw mihing, nang Pasian dawng vialpa kua na hia? Silsiam in asiamtu kiangah, “Bangding a hichibang a hungsiam nahia achi ding maw?”
Bel khengtu in bel leilom khat a pat belkhat deihhuaitak akheng ding leh, bel khat thulimlou tak a kheng dingin bel leilom tungah thu neilou amaw?
Tualeh hehna bel, mangthang ding a kilawmte tung ah Pasian in a thangpaihna leh a silbawl theihna latsak a ut a, athuakzoh hamham leh bang akhok diai.
Tualeh khuatuahna bel thupina tang ding a tanglai a pat ana guatkholhte tung a a hehpihna hauhdan ahihlat theihna dingin.
Tua khuatuahna belte pen Judate guak a pat kipan hilou in, hinanleh Jentelte lak a pat sapte, eite tanpha ihi uhi.
Hosia laibu a,
“Ka mi hingailoute
‘kamite,’ kachi ding a,
it ngailouhnu zong
‘itnu,’ kachi ding
Tualeh hichi ahung hi a, akiang uah, ‘kamite na hikei uh,’ chih mun ah,
Pasian hing tate chih a sap in aom ding uh,”
anachih bang in.
Tualeh Isaiah in zong Israelte tungtang thu ana tangkoupih a: “Israeltate pen tuipi sehnel bangin tam nanle uh asimawk teng guak hundam in aom ding hi.
Toupa`n tomkhat leitung ah nasep abawl ding jiakin aman hua nasep ajou ding a, tualeh diktatna in atomsak ding hi.”
Tualeh Isaiah mah in, “Mipite Toupa`n chi suangtu ding hung na khawisaklou hileh Sodom khua bangin itum tading a, tualeh Gomorrah bang a bawl in i om tading uhi,” chia ana genkholh bang in.
Ahihleh bang igen tadiai le? Diktatna deihlou Jentelte`n diktatna a phata uhi, ginna jiak a diktatna pen;
hinanleh diktatna dan delh Israelte`n hua diktatna pen aphajou takei uhi.
Bang jiakin ahi? Ginna in adelh kei ua, dan silbawl a muhtheih bang a adelh jiak un ahi, “Ajiak pukna suang ah apukta uhi”
Laisiangthou a; “Ngaiin, Zion ah pukna suang leh,
dalna suangpi kakoih hi.
Kuapeuh amah gingta pen ajahlaksak kei ding hi,”
chia gelh bang in.
Unaute aw, Israelte ding a ka lunggulh pen leh Pasian kiang a ka thumna pen ahihleh, hundam a ahung omtheihna ding uh ahi!
Ajiak pen Pasian lam ah kuhkalna anei uh chih ka theih pih hi, hinanleh theihna dungjuiin pen ahikei uhi.
Ajiak Pasian diktatna theilou in amauh diktatna sukkip sawm in, Pasian diktatna ah aki tuhlut nuam kei uhi.
Ajiak agingta jousiahte a dingin Krist pen diktatna muhna dingin dan suktawpna ahi.
Ajiak Mosi in: “Dan a diktatna juite pen hua diktatna in ahing ding,” chi`n agelh hi.
Hinanleh ginna a diktatna in hichi`n achi hi, “Na lungsim in van ah kua akahtou diai?” (huapen tunglam a pat Krist puikhiat ding chihna ahi.)
“Ahihkeileh leinuai ah kua akumsuk diai?” chiken, (huapen misi lak a pat Krist puikhiat ding chihna ahi) chi in.
Hinanleh bang ahia agen: “Pasian thu in a hungnaih hi, nakam leh na lungtang ah a om hi,” huapen, ginna thu ka gen pen uh ahi.
Na kam a Jesu pen Toupa ahi chia naphuan a, misi lak a kipat Pasian in a kaithou chih na lungtang a nagintat leh hundam in na om ding hi, chih.
Ajiak pen min lungtang in agingta ua, diktatna amujel uh, kam in aphuang ua, hundamna atang jel uhi.
Ajiak Pasian Laisiangthou in, “Kuapeuh amah ginta tuh azahlak kei ding,” achi hi.
Ajiak Judate leh Grikte ki lamdanna bangmah a om kei hi. A un ua tung ah Toupa khat hi a, tualeh amah samjousiahte tung ah hoihna ahau hi.
“Kuapeuh Toupa min lou taphot hundam in aom ding uhi.”
Ahihleh agintaklouh pi uh bangchi`n asamthei ding ua? Tualeh athu ajaklouhpi uh bangchi`n agingta ding ua, tualeh agentu omloupi`n bangchi`n ajathei ding ua?
Tualeh sawl ahihkeileh bangchi`n agenthei ding ua, khamuanna “Tangthupha leh silhoih kipak huai hung tutte keng kilawm hina tazen e!” chia gelh bang in.
Hinanleh tangthupha aun un a ngaikhia kei uhi, ajiak Isaiah in, “Toupa, ka thugen uh kuan ahia agintat?” anachi hi.
Tuachi`n ginna pen jakna jiakin ahung om a, tualeh jakna pen Pasian thu jiakin ahung om hi.
Hinanleh kachi ahi: Amau`n jalou ahi ding uai le? Jatham e!
“Athawm uh leitung pumpi athawn suak a;
athu uh kawlmong tan dongin athangta hi.”
Hinanleh kachi ahi, Israelte`n theilou ahi ding uai? Amasa in Mosi in,
“Nam a gentham louhte zang in
kung thangsiasak ding a;
tualeh nam mawlte zang in
kung hehsak ding hi,”
ana chi hi.
Tualeh Isaiah in, hangsan takin,
“Ahung zongloute kiangah muhkhiat in ka om a;
ahung samloute kiang ah hihlat in ka omta hi,”
achi hi.
Hinanleh Israelte kiangah, “Mi thumangloute leh nialhatte dingin sun nitum in kaban kajak hi,” chi`n agen hi.
Ahihleh Pasian in amite paikhiata ahi diai le? Paikhia baihlou! Ajiak kei zong Israelmi Abraham suan, Benjamin phung a mi ka hi.
Pasian in ami a theihkholhte a paikhia kei hi, Pasian Laisiangthou in Elijah thu agen theilou nahi uh maw. Aman Israelte tungthu Pasian kiangah atut a:
“Toupa, na Jawlneite athat ua, na maitamte a suchim ua, tualeh keimah tang in aka om a, keizong thah ahung sawm uhi,” chi in.
Hinanleh Pasian in adawnna ah bangchi`n agen ei? “Baal lim mai a khupdin ngailou mi sang sagih keimah a dingin ka sitlai hi,” chi`n adawng a.
Tuachimah bangin tulaiin zong hehpihna dungjui a tel amok aom nalai hi.

Tualeh hehpihna jiak ahihtak a ahihleh, nasep jiak ahita kei hi, atuachih keileh hehpihna pen hehpihna ahitakei ding hi. Hinanleh nasep jiak ahihleh pen, hehpihna jiak ahitakei ding, atuachih keileh nasepna zong nasepna ahita kei ding hi.
Ahihleh bangchi ahita diai le? Israelte`n azon uh amuta kei ua, hinanleh telten amu uh, adang tengteng mit tawtsak in a omta uhi.
Tuni mah mah in akiang uah, “Khuaphawklou a omna kha apia a, amuh theihlouhna ding uh mitte leh, ajak theihlouhna ding uh bilte tawh,” chih gelh bang in.
Tualeh David in,
“A dohkante uh amauh a dingin thang leh pial leh;
pukna leh phuba lakna hung hi hen!
amuh theihlouhna ding un amitte uh hung mial henla;
tualeh a ngum uh kunsak jing in,”
achi hi.
Tuachi`n kachi ahi: A kipalpukna uh apukden nang uh ahi diai le? Hilou e! Hinanleh apuk jiakin amauh thangsiatsak na dingin Jentelte kiangah hundamna ahung tungjawta hi.
Tualeh apuk uh bawn leitung hihhauhsakna ahih a, tualeh akiamna uh zong Jentelte hauhsakna ahihleh, abukimna uh bangjahta a hauhsakna ahita diai le!
Nou Jentelte kiangah ka gen ahi: kei Jentelte sawltak ka hihjiak in ka nasepna ka pahtawi hi.
Bang chidan hiamkhat a ka chipihte ka thangsiatsak a, alak ua khenkhatte beek ka hutdam theihkhak leh chi in.
Ajiak amauh paihkhiatna bawn leitung tawh kituahkikna ahihleh, amauh deihkikna pen sihna a pat hinna ahihkeileh bang ahi diai!
Ajiak gah masa asianthou leh alompi zong tuachihmah bangin asiangthou hi. Tualeh azung asianthou leh, abate zong tuachimah bang in asiangthou hi.
Tualeh aba khenkhatte suktan a aom a, nang olive taklou, alak ua phuhlut a na om leh olive sing a hoihna kikoppih nahih jiakin.
Tuachi`n ba dangte tung ah kiliansak ken, hinanleh kiliansak nanlechin azung vaktu nangmah nahi kei a, azung pen nang hung vaktu ahijaw hi.
Tuachi`n nang, “Ahi, phuhlut a ka omtheihna dingin bate suktan a om ahi,” nachi ding hi.
Adik ahi, agintaklouh jiak un ahi suktan a aom uh, tualeh nang na ginna jiakin nading ahi, kisathei kenla, hinanleh laujaw in.
Ajiak Pasian in aba taktakte a khawikei leh, nang zong ahung khawi tuan kei ding hi.
Tuajiakin Pasian hoihdan leh thukhauhdan ngaihtuah in, apukte tung ah a thukhauh ahi, nang lam ah ahoih ahi, ahoihna a na omjing leh, atuachih keileh nang zong satkhiat in na om thou ding hi.
Tualeh amauh zong gingtalou a a omjing kei uleh, phuhlut in a om ding uhi, ajiak Pasian in amauh aphutlut thei hi.
Nang, piandan a olive taklou a pat satkhiat bawn piandan lou tak a olive singhoih a phuhlut a na omleh, hih aba takte pen bangzahta a phuhlut in aom tazen ding uai.
Ajiak unaute aw, na kipilsak louhna ding un, hih thugu`k, Jentelte bukimna a hungtun masiah Israelte tung ah theihsiam louhna bangtan hiam a hungtung tadih ahi, chih natheih louh uh ka deih kei hi.
Tualeh Israelmi jousiah hundam in a om ding uhi. Laisiangthou a,
“Zion a kipan in hundampa ahung pai ding a
Jakob a kipat Pasian ngaihsak louhna a hihmang ding hi.
Ajiak a khialhnate uh ka lakmang tak chiangin
akiang ua ka thukhun ding pen hih ahi,”
chih gelh bang in.
Tangthupha lam ngaihtuah in pen nou jiakin melma ahi ua, hinanleh tel thu lam ngaihtuah in pen pu leh pate jiakin deihtakte ahi uhi.
Ajiak Pasian in a silthawn piak ah leh asapna ah lungsim akhek ngaikei hi.
Ajiak nidanglai in Pasian na gingta kei ua, hinanleh tuin amauh awilouh jiakin zahngaihna na muta uhi.
Tuachimah bangin nou ahung hehpihna jiak a zahngaihna a muhtheihna ding un, tuin hihte`n zong gingtalou ahita uhi.
Ajiak Pasian in ahehpih chiat theihna dingin mijousiah pen thuman louhna nuai ah a khumsiangta hi.
Pasian pilna leh theihna thuk hina lawm lawm e! A vaihawmnate zon guallouh leh alampite muhguallouh hina tazen e!
Ajiak Laisiangthou in hichi`n agen hi,
“Toupa lungsim kuan ahia athei?
ahihkeileh kua ahia a lemguatpihtu a pang?
Ahihkeileh, adit kik ding a zong,
kuan ahia akiang a silpia masa phot?”
Ajiak amah a kipan leh, amah jiak leh, amah ding a sil jousiah om ahi, amah kiangah tangtawn in thupina om hen! Amen.
Tuajiakin unaute aw, Pasian kiang a na pumpi uh kithoihna hing leh, siangthou leh, Pasian pomta`k ding a kilan dingin Pasian zahngaihna jiakin kung ngen hi, huapen na biakna dan ding him uh ahi.
Tualeh hih leitung dan bangin om kei unla, hinanleh Pasian deihlam hoih leh pomtak leh hoihbukim bang ahia chih na theihchian theihna ding un na lungsim uh athak a om in hung lamdang jawta un.

Ajiak pen ka kiang a hung kipia hehpihna jiakin, nalak ua mi kuamah in a kiletsak ding hun val a kiliansaklou in, hinanleh Pasian in michih kiang a ginna apiak hun bang jel a diktak a ngaihtuah jaw dingin kachi ahi.
Pumpi khat ah hiang tampi inei ua, tualeh hiang jousiah nasep a kibaklouh mah bang in.
Eite tampi hinanlei zong Krist ah pumpi khat ihi a, khat leh khat iki hiangtuah chiat uhi.
I kiang a hehpihna hung kipia dungjuiin silthawnpiak tuamtuam inei a, thugen ding ahihleh iginna utoh kituak in igen ding uhi;
nasep ding ahihleh isem ding uh, thuhilh dingin zong hilh hen;
hasottu in zong hasot hen, sil piatu in zong itlouin pia hen, vaihawmtu in zong taima takin hawm hen, mi khuatuahtu in zong kipak takin khuatuah hen.
Itna ahihleh lepchiahna panglou in hi hen, gitlouhna mawng mawng hua unla, hoihna jousiah tu tinten un.
Sanggam ki itna in khat leh khat ki lainat tuah chiat unla, ki zahbawl na lam ah kideihsak tuah chiat un.
Taimak lam ah thadah kei unla, khalam ah phattuam ngai un, Pasian nna sem un.
Kinepna lam ah kipak jingin, gimthuakna lam ah thuak teitei un, thumna lam ah kuhkal jing un.
Misiangthoute taksap awng hu unla, jindou nasiam un.
Ahung gawtte gualjawl unla, gual jawl un, hamsiat kei un.
Kipakte kipahpih unla, kapte kahpih un.
Khat leh khat ngaihtuah kibang in om un. Kingaihtuah sang talua kenla, mineu nou noute tawh kipawl jaw un, kipilsak kei un.
Kua gitlouh gitlouh in thuk kei un, mijousiah mitmuh ah sil kilawm bawl ding sawm un.
Ahihtheih liaileh natung a ki-nga zah zah ah ki-nga in, mijousiah tawh kilem in om in.
Deihtakte, phuba kilatuah kei un, hinanleh hehna Pasian awnjaw un, ajiak hichibang a gelh ahi, “Phulak him him keimah a ahi, keiman kathuk na ding, Toupa`n achi hi.”
Tuajiakin, “Na melma agil akial leh nek ding pia in, adang atak leh dawnding pia in, ajiak tuachibang a nabawl leh alutung ah mei-am na sekhawm ahi ding hi.”
Gitlouh zoh in omkenla, hoihna tawh gilou joujaw in.
Michih atung a vaihawmtute thu thu in om hen, ajiak Pasian thu louin kuamah vaihawm a om kei hi, vaihawmtu a omte Pasian guat ahi.
Tuajiakin kuapeuh vaihawmtu nial pen Pasian silguat kalh ahi. Tualeh akalhtuten amauh tung ah siamlouh tansakna amu ding uhi.
Vaihawmtute pen silhoih bawlte a dingin lauhuai ahi kei ua, hinanleh migiloute a dingin lauhuai ahi uhi. Ahihleh vaihawmtu laulou a om na ut ei? Silhoih bawl in, tuachi`n apahtak nalawh ding hi.
Ajiak amah pen na hoihna ding a Pasian nasemtu ahi. Hinanleh sil gilou na bawl leh lau in, ajiak aman a namsau a mawktawi kei hi, amah pen Pasian nasemtu sil gilou bawlte tung a hehna phuba latu ahi.
Tuajiakin Pasian gawtna laujiak guak hilouin, na sia leh pha theihna jiakin zong vaihawmtute thu thu a na om ding mawng ahi.
Hih jiakin siah zong napia uhi, amauh pen hih silte bawl ding a Pasian nasem ahi uhi.
Tuajiakin mijousiah kiangah atan ding lawm uh pia un, leiman piakna dingpa kiangah leiman, siah piakna dingpa kiangah siah, tualeh amauhte zahtak un.
Ki it tuahna loungal kuamah bangmah bakei un, ajiak midang itpa in dan ahih bukim hi.

Ajiak hih thupiakte`, “Ang na kawmlouh ding ahi, tual na thahlouh ding ahi, na guklouh ding ahi, theihpihtu diklou a napanlouh ding ahi, na englouh ding ahi,” tualeh hihlou thupiak dang mawng mawng aom leh, huate, “Nangmah na ki it bangin na innvengte it in,” chih in a khaikhawm siang hi.
Itna in a innvengte a bawlsia ngaikei a, tuajiakin itna hi dan juihkimna ahi.
Tualeh igintat tunglai sang un i hundamna ni anaijawk taak jiakin ihmutna a pat khanlawh ahun mahmahta hi chih hun omdan ah nathei uhi.
Jan abei dekdekta a, khua vak ding ahi ta, tuajiakin mial nasepte ipaikhia ding ua, vak thuam in iki thuam ding uhi.
Sun a om bangin, hoihtak in i om ding uhi, omdan valseng leh uain kham buai a omlou in, huk leh kingaihhat a om louin, tualeh kihau leh ki thangsiat a omlou in.
Tuasang in Toupa Jesu Krist in kithuam unla, na taksa utna uh tangtung sak dingin bangmah kibawl kei un.
Ginna a hatloumite, aginlahnate kiselpih kei unla, ngai un.
Mi khat in bangkim nethei in aki gingta a, hinanleh mi khat in anteh louhing guak ane hi.
An nete`n aneloute simmawh kei henla, tualeh aneloute`n zong anete gensia kei uhen, ajiak Pasian in amah a kipahpihta hi.
Midang sila gensiatu nang kua na hia? Adin leh apuk apu a ding ahi. Tualeh amah pen dinsak in a om ding hi, ajiak Pasian in amah a dingsakthei hi.
Mi khat in ni khat nidang sangin angai thupijaw tuam a, mi dangin ni tengteng aki bangin angai hi. Michih amauh lungsim chiat ah ki theichian uhen.

Ni tangpa in Pasian zahna in atang a, tualeh ni tangloupa`n Toupa thupina ding a tanglou ahi. Bangkim nepa`n Pasian kiangah kipahthu agen a, Toupa pahtawina dingin ane a, tualeh aneloupa`n zong Pasian kiangah kipahthu gen in anelou ahi.
Ajiak kuamah eimah a ding a hing i om kei ua, tualeh kuamah ei a ding a si zong ihi kei uhi.
Ajiak pen ihin leh Toupa a ding a hing ihi ua, isih un zong Toupa a dingin isi uh ahi.
Ajiak misite leh mihingte Toupa a ahihtheihna dingin Krist asi a athoukik a, tualeh hinsak in a om hi.
Hinanleh nang bangding a na sanggam gensia nahia? Ahihkeileh nang bangding a na sanggam simmoh na hia? I un ua Krist vaihawmna touna mai a dingchiat ding ihi uhi.
Laisiangthou a,
“Keimah ahing tawntung Pasian ka hi, Toupa`n achi hi,
Toupa`n khup tengteng ka maiah akun ding ua,
lei tengteng zong Pasian mai ah a kiphuang ding uh,”
chih gelh bang in.
Tuachi`n i unpi un Pasian kiangah itanchin chiat uh igen ding uhi.
Tuajiakin khat leh khat iki gensia nawn kei ding ua, hinanleh kuapeuh in a sanggam kisuihkhak nang hiam ahihkeileh kipuk nang bangmah bawllouhna ding ngaihtuahjaw hen.
Sil amah a sianglou mawng mawng aom kei chih, Toupa ah ka theichian a, ka taksan mahmah hi, hinanleh banghiam khat sianglou a ngaihsuntu dingin, huapen amah a dingin sianglou ahi.
Hinanleh na annek jiak a na sanggam adahsak leh itna dan in na gamtang kei a ahi. Asih tang a Krist in asihsakpa pen na annek in hihmang ken!
Tuajiakin na hoihna uh pen gilou a gen in omkei hen.
Pasian gam pen nek leh dawn thu ahi ki a, hinanleh diktatnate, kilepnate, tualeh Khasiangthou a kipaknate ahijaw hi.
Ajiak kuapeuh hih silte a Krist nasem tuh Pasian kipahpih leh mihing pahtat in a om jel uhi.
Tuajiakin kilepna ding leh kisuk-halhna ding silte idelh ding uhi.
Na annek in Pasian nasep susia ken, sil tengteng asiangthou ngei ahi, hinanleh asilnek in mi ahihpuk leh anepa dingin silsia ahi.
Na sanggam pukna ding hiam ahihkeileh hehna ding hiam ahihkeileh hatlouhna ding hiam ahihleh sa neklouh, uain dawnlouh, tualeh sil bangmah bawllouh ahoih hi.
Ginna nanei ei? Pasian mai ah nangmah guak in kineih in. Amah hoihsak lam a siamlouh kitangsak lou mi pen ahampha hi!
Hinanleh ginglahmi in anek leh ginna a anek louh jiakin siamlouh tang in a om hi. Sil khat peuh ginna lou a bawl pen khialhna ahi.
Tuachi`n ei ahatten eimah nopna ding bawllou in, ahatloute hatlouhna i thuakpih ding uhi.
Michih in i innvengte khantouhna ding a, ahoihna ding un iki paksak ding uhi.
Ajiak Krist in zong ama kipahna ding angaihtuah kei a, “Hinanleh nang hung sialphoute sialphouna pen ka tung ah atuta hi,” chia gelh bangin.
Ajiak nidanglai a kigelh jousiah Pasian Laisiangthou a, kuhkalnate leh khamuanna jiak a eiten kinepna i neihtheihna ding a, eite kihilhna ding a gelh ahi.
Tuachi`n kuhkalna leh khamuanna Pasian in, Krist Jesu mahbang in khat leh khat lungsim kibang in hung omsak hen,
Pasian I Toupa uh Jesu Krist Pa ngeiin lungsim munkhat pua in leh aw khat suah a na pahtawi theihna ding un.
Tuajiakin, Krist in zong, Pasian thupina ding a ahung kipahpih mahbang in, khat leh khat ki pakta chiat un.
Tuin huate ahi ka gen, pu leh pate kiang a thuchiamte hihkip dingin, Jesu Krist pen Pasian thudik theihsakna dingin teptante sila ahung hita hi,
ahehpihna jiak a Jentelte`n Pasian apahtawi theihna ding un,
“Hihjiakin Jentelte lak ah kung pahtawi ding a,
namin phat in la kasa ding hi,”
chih gelh bang in.
Tualeh,
“Nou Jentelte, kamite tawh kipak un, achi kik a!”
Tualeh,
“Nou Jentelte jousiah, Toupa pahtawi un,
mi tengteng in zong amah phat un!”
achi kik hi.
Tualeh Isaiah in,
“Jessai jungjam a om ding a;
Jentelte tung a vaihawm ding a hung paidingpa,
amah ah Jentelte a kinem ding uhi,”
achi kik hi.
Khasiangthou silbawltheihna jiak a kinepna na hauhtheihna ding un, kinepna Pasian in ginna a kipakna leh khamuanna chinteng in hung hihdim hen.
Tualeh ka unaute aw, noupen pilna in nadim ua, pilna kim neiin naki hasuan tuah thei uh chih keimah mah ngeiin zong ka thei hi.
Hitalehzong unaute aw, Pasian in ahung piak hehpihna jiakin nou hung theihsak kikna tawbang in akal laklak ah hangsantak in kagelh ahi.
Jentelte lak a Krist nasem ka hihtheihna ding leh ka Jentel latte Khasiangthou suksiangthou ahih ua, kipahpih taak a hihtheihna ding un Pasian tangthupha nna kasem hi.
Tuajiakin Pasian lam silte ah Jesu Krist ah ki thupisakna ding kanei hi.
Ajiak Krist in Jentelte thumang sak ding a thu gen leh nna sem a keimah zang a asil bawlte loungal bangmah ka gen ngam kei hi,

chiamtehna thupi taktakte leh sillamdangte in, Pasian Khasiangthou silbawltheihna in. Tuachi`n Jerusalem khua leh akimvel gam a kipan Illirikam gam tanpha in Krist tangthupha kimtak in ka gen jouta hi.
Tualeh midang phuhsa tung a innlam ka hihlouhna dingin, tangthupa pen Krist min kilawhna sa mun a genlou in.
Laisiangthou a,
“Hinanleh a tanchin gen ngailouhnate`n amu ding a,
aja ngai nailoute`n a hungthei ding uh chih gelh bangin,
gen katum jaw hi.”
Hih jiakin na kiang ua hung paiding tamveipi dal in ka omta hi.
Hinanleh tuinjaw hihgam kimvel ah mun kanei takei a, tualeh kum tampi na kiang ua hungpai nuam in zong ka omta hi,
Spain gam a kapai hunhun ah na kiang uah kungpai ding hi; ajiak ka zinna a nou hung muh leh nou tomkhat hung kithuahpih a, hualam ka paina a nung khak uh zong ka kinem hi.
Hinanleh tuin misiangthoute nna sepsak dingin Jerusalem a paiphot ding ka hi hi.
Ajiak, Mesidonia leh Akhaia gammite`n Jerusalem khua a tagahte a ding a dangka tuakkhawm pha asata uhi.
Hih pen amauh utna mah tawh abawl uh ahi, tualeh aleiba uh zong ahi mawng hi. Ajiak Jentelte`n khalam silte a kikoppih uleh, taksa lam silte a amauh a panpih uh ahih ding mawng uh ahi.
Tuajiakin hih ka bawlzoh a, agah zong chiantak a ka muhsak zoh chiangin nou hung tawn in Spain gam ah kapai ding hi.
Tualeh na kiang ua kungpai chiangin Krist tangthupha gualjawlna kim tawh kung paiding chih ka thei hi.
Tuachi`n unaute aw, Pasian kiang a nung thumsakna uah chihtak hung suah dingin Toupa Jesu min leh Khasiangthou itna in kung ngen hi.
Judea gam a gingloute lak a ka suahtak theihna ding leh Jerusalem khua a ding a ka nasepna pen misiangthoute kipakna ding zong ahih theihna dingin,
Pasian deihdan bang a, kipaktak a na kiang ua kung pai a, iki suk-halh khawm theihna ding un.
Lemna Pasian na kiang uah om hen. Amen.
Kenkria khua a saptuam nasemtu, i sanggamnu uh Phoibi na kiang uah kung meltheihsak hi.
Toupa min a misiangthoute bang a na napom ua, na panpih uh a ngaihna teng a na panpih ding un, ajiak aman zong mi tampi ana panpihta a, keimah ngei zong ahung panpihta hi.
Krist Jesu a hung panpihte Prisila leh Akuila chibai hung buksak un;
amau`n ka hinna a dingin a ngawng uh adawh ua. Amauh tung guak ah hilou in, Jentel saptuam jousiahte tungah zong kipahthu ka gen ahi.
Tuachimah bangin a inn ua saptuam kikhawmte zong chibai hung buksak un.
Akhaia gam a Krist a gah masapen, ittak Epaneta chibai hung buksak un.
Na lak ua semgim Mari zong chibai hung buksak un.
Ka chipihte lak a ka thong tangpih, sawltakte lak a zong a minthangtak, Krist a zong keisang a om masajaw Andronika leh Junia chibai hung buksak un.
Toupa a ka ittak Amphliata chibai hung buksak un.
Krist a i naseppih Urbana leh, ka ittak Staki chibai hung buksak un.
Krist a mi ahih kichian Apelle chibai hung buksak un. Aristobala inkuan a mite chibai hung buksak un.
Ka chipih Herodion chibai hung buksak un. Toupa a om Norkissa inkuante chibai hung buksak un.
Toupa a om Triphena leh Triphosa chibai hung buksak un. Toupa nna hahsep mahmah, ittak Persi chibai hung buksak un.
Toupa a telsa Rufa leh anu, keinu zong hi, chibai hung buksak un.
Asinkrita, Phlegon, Hermi, Petroba, Hermas tualeh akiang ua om unaute chibai hung buksak un.
Philologa leh Julia, Neria leh a sanggamnu, tualeh Olimpa leh akiang ua misiangthou omte jousiah chibai hung buksak un.
Kitawpna siangthou in chibai ki buktuah un, Krist a saptuamten chibai a hungbuk uhi.
Tualeh unaute aw: kihilhna dan nou ahung kihilh nasan uh kalh lam a kikhenna leh pukna siamkhiatute chiamteh ding leh kiheisan dingin kung ngen hi!
Ajiak pen huachibang miten I Toupa uh Jesu Krist nna asem kei ua, amauh gilpi nna asemjaw uhi. Tualeh kampha leh kamsiam in mimawlte akhem nak uhi.
Ajiak na thuman dan uh mijousiah lak ah akithang a, tuajiakin natung uah ka kipak hi. Hinanleh silhoih lam a napil ua, sil gilou lam a namawl uh ka deih hi.
Tualeh lemna Pasian in setan pen tomkhat zoh chiangin nakeng nuaiah ahung tuandensak ding hi.
I Toupa Jesu hehpihna na kiang uah om hen.
Ka naseppih Timothi leh ka chipihte Lusia, Jason tualeh Sosipater in chibai ahung buk hi.
Keimah, Tertia, hih laikhak gelhpa in, Toupa min in chibai kung buk hi.
Gaia, keileh saptuam jousiah jintunnapa in chibai ahung buk hi. Khuasung dangka kemtu Erasta leh unaupa Kuarta in chibai ahung buk hi.
I Toupa uh Jesu Krist hehpihna na tung uah om hen. Amen.
Tuin amah ka tangthupha gen bang leh thugu`k kilakna bangbang a, Jesu Krist ki tangkoupihna bang a noute na ginna ua hung dingkipsak theipa, hua thugu`k pen tanglai sawtpi sung phualgu`k a na om.
Hinanleh tu a tangtawn Pasian thupiak dungjui a Jawlneite laibu in, ginna thumanna dingin nam jousiah kiangah theihsak in a omta hi.
Apil Pasian guak kiangah Jesu Krist jiakin tangtawn in thupina om hen. Amen.
Paul, Pasian deihlam a Jesu Krist sawltak hiding a sap leh, i sanggampa uh Sosthene in,
Korin khua a Pasian saptuam omte, Jesu Krist a suksiang, misiangthou hiding a sapte kiangah, gamchin a I Toupa, amauh leh eite Toupa Jesu Krist min lou jousiahte kiangah tawh:
I Pa uh Pasian leh I Toupa uh Jesu Krist a pat, hehpihna leh lemna na kiang uah om hen.
Jesu Krist a Pasian hehpihna na kiang ua hung kipia jiakin natung thu uah Pasian kiangah kipahthu ka gen gige hi.
Sil bangkim ah thugen theihna chinteng leh theihna chinteng ah amah vangin hihhauhsat in na om uhi.
Tuachimah bangin Krist thu theihsakna pen nou mauh ah hihkip ahita hi.
Tuachi`n kha lam silpiak mawng mawng ah na taksapna uh omlou in, I Toupa uh Jesu Krist kilakna ding ngak a omjing na hi uhi.
Aman I Toupa Jesu Krist ni chiang a gensiat bei a na omtheihna ding un atawp dongin zong ahung hihkip ding hi.
Pasian amuanhuai hi, aman a Tapa Jesu Krist I Toupa uh tawh kipawlkhawmna ah ahung samlutta hi.

Tualeh unaute aw, na un ua thu khat nagen ua, tualeh nalak ua kikhenna mawng mawng a om louhna dingin lungsim kikhat leh ngaihtuahna kibang a hoihtak a na kizop jawkna ding un Toupa Jesu Krist minin kung ngen hi.
Ajiak ka unaute aw, nalak uah kiselna aom chih na tungtang thu uh Kloe innkuanpihte genna kaja hi.
Kagen hih ahi, noute tengteng in, “Kei Paul pawl ka hi; kei Apollo pawl ka hi; kei Kifa pawl ka hi; kei Krist pawl ka hi,” na chi uhi.
Krist hawmkhen in a om ei le? Paul nou a dingin kilhdenin a om ei le? Ahihkeileh Paul minin baptisma na tang uai le?
Krispa leh Gaia chihlouh nalak ua khat bek kung baptis louh jiakin Pasian kiang ah kipahthu ka gen hi.
Atuachih keileh, keimah min a ka baptis ahi chi na om kha ding uhi.
Ahi, Stephenate innkuan ka baptis a, huate lou midang ka baptis lam ka theikei hi.
Ajiak Krist in baptis dingin ahung sawl kei a, tangthupha gen ding in ahung sawljaw, pilna a thu genlou in, atuachih keileh Krist kross bangmahlou asuak kha ding.
Ajiak kross thu pen mangthangte dingin motna ahi a, hinanleh ei hundam a omte a dingin jaw Pasian sil bawltheihna ahi.
Ajiak,
“Mipil, pilna ka hihsia ding a
mi pilvang, pilvan theihna ka hihmang ding hi,”
chih gelh bang in.
Mipil khoi ah ahi? Laigelhmi khoi a awm ahia? Hih leitung a selhatmi khoi a awm ahia? Pasian in hih leitung pilna mothuaina suaksak lou amaw!
Ajiak Pasian pilna ah, leitung pilna zang a Pasian atheihlouh nung un, thugen mothuaitak zang a agingtate hundam a om pen Pasian in pha asa hi.
Judate`n chiamtehna a ngen ua, Grikte`n pilna azong uh.
Hinanleh en Krist kilhden a aom thu igen uhi, huapen Judate a dingin kipalpukna, tualeh Grikte a dingin motna ahi;
hinanleh Judate hi`n Grikte hitaleh kuapeuh akisamte a dingin Krist pen Pasian sil bawltheihna leh Pasian pilna ahi.
Ajiak Pasian motna mihing sang in apiljaw a, tualeh Pasian hatlouhna zong mihing sang in ahatjaw hi.
Unaute aw, ahung sapna ngaihtuah dih un, taksa lam a mipil tampite, mihat tampite, milian tampite sap ahihlouh dan uh.
Hinanleh Pasian in mipilte a zahlaksakna dingin leitung sil mothuaite atel jawta a, tualeh leitung a sil hatte azahlaksak na dingin leitung sil hatloute atel jawta hi.
Tualeh leitung silsia leh simmoh huaite Pasian in atel a, sil omte bangmahlou a suahsak theihna dingin, sil omlou tan in atel hi.
Tuachi`n Pasian mai ah kuamah aki liansak theikei ding hi.
Hinanleh nou pen amah vangin Krist Jesu ah na om uhi, amah pen Pasian a pat eia ding a pilna, diktatna, hihsiangthouna tualeh tatkhiatna ding a bawl ahi.
Tuajiakin Laisiangthou a akigelh bangin, “Asuang taphot in Toupa suang hen.”
Tualeh unaute aw, kei na kiang ua Pasian thugu`k gen a kung pailai in thugen siam mahmah leh pilna thupitak tawh hungpai ka hikei hi.
Ajiak ken, Jesu Krist leh amah kilhden a aom thu chih louh nalak uah bangmah dang theih ka sawm kei hi.
Tualeh kei hatlou leh lau leh li`ng kawm in nalak uah ka om a,
ka kam suakte leh ka thugente mihing pilna gensiam thu ahi kei a, hinanleh kha leh asil bawltheihna a hihhat in ahijaw hi.
Tuachia na ginna uh mihing pilna a ki-nga hijaw louin, Pasian silbawl theihna a ki-nga ahihjawkna ding ahi hi.
Hinanleh pichingte lak ah pilna thu zong ka gen jel uhi, ahihhang in hih khang hun pilna thu ahi kei a, hih khang hun vaihawmtu mangthang dingte pilna thu zong ahi kei hi.
Hinanleh kouten Pasian pilna thugu`k i thupina ding a Pasian in leitung om masang a aguatsa pilna kiphual thu ka gen jaw jel uhi.
Huapen hih leitung vaihawmtute in a theikei uh, ajiak nathei hitale uh thupina Toupa pen ana kilhden kei ding uhi.
Hinanleh Laisiangthou a,
“Mit a muh ngailouh, bil a jak ngailouh,
tualeh mihing lungtang a zong lut ngailou,
Pasian in amah itte ding a abawlsak silte pen,”
chia gelh bang in.
Hinanleh Pasian in huate pen ikiang uah ahung theisakta hi, ajiak kha in bangkim azongkhia a, ahi, Pasian thugilte zong.
Mihing thute mihing a om kha loungal in kua ahia athei ding? Tuachimah bangin Pasian thute zong Pasian kha loungal kuamah in a theikei hi.
Tuachi`n Pasian in athawn a a hungpiak silte i theihtheihna dingin, eite in leitung kha hilou in, Pasian a kipan kha pen itang uhi.
Hua silte pen mihing pilna thuhilhna a genlou in, Khasiangthou thuhilh pen genjaw in, khalam thute khamite kiang a hilhchian in i genjaw uhi.
Hinanleh leitungmite in pen khalam thute a sangthei kei uhi, ajiak amauh ngaih in huate pen mothuai ahi a, kha a theih ahihjiak in thei zong a theithei kei uhi.
Hinanleh khamite in pen sil jousiah atheichian jel ua, amah ahihleh kuaman atheichian kei hi.
Ajiak Laisiangthou in,
“Amah thuhilh thei ding a,
kuan ahia Toupa lungsim thei khin?”
hinanleh eite`n Krist lungsim ipua uhi, achi hi.
Tualeh unaute aw, khamite kiang a thu ka gen bangin na kiang uah thu ka gen theikei a, taksamite kiang a gen bang lel in ka gen ahi.
An-gum hilou in nawitui in kungvak a, na nektheih nailouh jiak un, tu-in zong na nethei naikei uhi.
Ajiak nou na taksami nalai uhi, ajiak nalak uah kithangsiatna leh, kinialna leh kipawl khenna a omjing jiakin taksami hinalai in mihing bang a om nalai hilou na hi uh hiam?
Ajiak khat in, “Kei Paul pawl ka hi,” adang in, “Kei apollo pawl ka hi,” achih laisiah taksami hilai hilou na hi uh maw?
Paul kua ahia? Apollo kua ahia? Amauh nou hung gingtasaktu thu nasemmite ahileltak uhi. Tuazong Toupa`n michih apiak bang jel in ahi.
Ken kasuan a, apollo in tui abuak a, hinanleh Pasian in akhangsak hi.
Tuachi`n asuantu zong bangmah ahikei a, atui buaktu zong bangmah ahi kei hi. A khangsaktu Pasian lou ngal.
Tualeh asuantu leh atui buaktu akibang ahi uhi, tualeh michih in asepgim bang jel un nuamman amu ding uhi.
Ajiak ahihleh Pasian tawh semkhawmte ka hi uhi, nou pen Pasian louma nahi ua.
Pasian lam inn na hi uhi.
Pasian hehpihna kei hung kipia dungjui in inn lamtu piltak bangin ken asuangphum kalemta a, midang in atung ah inn alam uhi. Hinanleh michih hua atung a a innlam dan uah pilvang uhen.
Ajiak asuangphum lepsa loungal suangphum dang kuaman alem thei nawnkei uh, huapen Jesu Krist ahi.
Tualeh hih suangphum tung ah mi kuapeuhin kham in hiam, daan dangka in hiam, suangmantam in hiam, sing in hiam, hampa in hiam, buhtu in hiam lam taleh.
Michih nasep ahung kilang ding hi, ajiak pen ani in aphuangkhia ding hi, mei a suklat hiding ahihjiak in; tualeh meiin michih nasep bang chibang ahia chih achiansak ding hi.
Kua nasep ahita in zong huatung a alam pen a omjing leh aman nuamman amu ding hi.
Hinanleh kua nasep ahita in zong akakleh ataan ding a, hinanleh amah pen meikuang paisuak bangin hundam in aom ding hi.
Pasian tempul na hi uh, tualeh nasung uah Pasian kha ateng chih theilou na hi uh maw!
Mi kuapeuhin Pasian tempul asukbuah leh amah Pasian in ahihsia ding, hua tempul nou nahi uhi.
Mi kuamah amah leh amah kikhem kei hen, nalak ua mi kuahiam hih leitung a pil akisak leh ahung pil theihna dingin mimaw hung suak hen.
Ajiak hih leitung pilna pen “Pasian ngaih in motna ahi, ajiak aman mipilte apil lepchiahna uah aman hi.”
Tualeh Laisiangthou ah, “Toupa`n mipilte ngaihtuahna athawn ahi, chih athei hi,” chih gelh ahi.
Tuajiakin kuaman mihing suang kei hen, ajiak sil jousiah nou a ahi hi:
Paul hi in, Apollo hi in. Kifa hi in, leitung hi in, hinna hi in, sihna hi in, sil om nalaite hi in, sil hung om dingte hitaleh zong, sil jousiah nou a ahi hi,
tualeh nou Krist a na hi ua, Krist pen Pasian a ahi hi.
Tuachi`n mi`n kou pen Krist sawltakte leh Pasian thugu`k enkawltute bangin hungthei uhen.
Hih ah enkawltu hihna ah pen mi gin-om hih apoimoh hi.
Hinanleh nou, nung ze-et ua, mihing ngaihtuahna a nung ze-et uh pen kei a dingin sil neunou khat ahi, keimah leh keimah ngei zong kaki ze-et kei hi.
Ajiak keiman bang mah kimawhsakna ding ka theikei hi. Hinanleh ahung enkhiatu Toupa ahi hi.

Tuajiakin ahunma in, Toupa ahung paima in bangmah ze-et kei un. Aman mial a sil kiphualte vak ah ahung puakhia ding a, tualeh lungtang a ngaihtuahte zong ahung kilang ding hi, tuachiang in michih in Pasian phatna atangchiat ding uhi.

Tualeh unaute aw, “Akigelh bang val a kuamah ngaihtuah louh ding chih kou a pat na jiltheihna ding uleh,” nalak ua kuamah in khat suang a khat tung a ki uangsak a na om louhna ding un, hih thute nou jiakin kei leh Apollo etsakna in ka kipia uhi.
Ajiak kuan ahia nang midang a pat ahung tuamsak? Tualeh ahung kipialou bang ahia naneih? Tualeh mi piak nei nahihleh, bangding a akipialou bang a kisathei na hia?
Tuin navahta ua, tuin na hausata uh, kou panglou in kumpipate bangin vai nahawmta uh, kou zong noutawh vai ka hawmtheihna ding un a taktak a vaihawm hile uchin ka ut hi.
Pasian in kou sawltakte pen siding a mohpaih mite bangin a nunung pen a ahung koih hi in ka ngaihtuah hi. Tuajiakin leitung leh, vantungmite leh, mihingte mitmuh a etnop a bawl in ka om uhi.
Koupen Krist jiakin mimaw ka hi ua; hinanleh noupen Krist a mipil na hi uhi! Koupen ka hat kei ua, hinanleh noupen na hat uhi! Noupen na zah-om ua, koupen simmawh in ka om uhi!
Tu hun mahmah in zong kagil kial un ka dangtak ua, saguak in ka om ua; vuak in ka om ua; inn beiin ka om uhi;
tualeh kakhut ua nna semgim in kagim mahmah ua; housiat a ka om un ka gualjawl ua, vuak a ka om un ka thuak teitei uhi;
gensiat a ka om un, kajawl lungdam ua, minsiatsak a ka om un zong ka ngen ngutngut ua, tunitan in zong leitung silnin, silnin jousiah bang a bawlin ka om uhi!
Na jumna ding un hihthute kagelh ahi kei a, hinanleh kata deihtakte bangin kung taihilh ahijaw hi.
Ajiak nou Krist ah hilhtu sangsawm nei nanle uchin pa tampi na neikei uhi.
Tuajiakin ka omdan juitute hiding in kung ngen hi.
Hih ding jiakin Toupa a ka tapa deihtak leh gin-om Timothi na kiang uah kung sawl hi, aman pen gamchin a saptuamte ka hilhjel bangin, Krist a ka omdante nou ahung theikhiasak kik ding hi.
Na kiang ua hung painawnlou ding bangin khenkhat na ki uangsak uhi.
Hinanleh Toupa`n lem asak leh kung paibaih ding hi, tuachi`n ki uangsakte pen a thugen uh hilouin, hinanleh a silbawl theihna uh ka theita ding hi.
Ajiak Pasian gam pen thu ah a om kei a, silbawl theihna ah a omjaw hi.
Bang ahia nadeih uh? Na kiang uah chiang tawiin kung pai diam? Ahihkeileh itna leh lungnemna kha tawh kung pai diam?
Na lak uah kingaih a om chih thuthang a om hi, tuachibang kingaih Jentelte lak a zong om ngailou, mikhat in apa zi akitenpih chih!
Tualeh huachibang sil bawlpa pen nalak ua pat nohkhiat ding a lunggel naneihtak sang un, naki uangsakpih jawsop uhi.
Ajiak keimah taksa a ka omlouh hangin, ka kha in kung om a, huachibang a gamtapa pen nalak ua om bangin atung thu vai kahawm khinta hi.
I Toupa Jesu Krist min in, ka kha leh I Toupa Jesu Krist sil bawltheihna tawh na kikhop khawm chiang un na kiang uah a om hi,
tuachibang mi pen I Toupa Jesu ni chiang a akha hundam a a omtheihna dingin, ataksa sukmangna dingin setan kiangah piakding ka chi ahi.
Na kisaktheihna uh ahoih kei hi! “Tol themnoukhat in tanghou beu apum in ajelsuak jel chih theilou na hi uh maw.”
Tuajiakin tol sohlouh nahih mahbang un, tanghou beuthak na hihtheihna ding un tol luipen paisiang un, ajiak i paikan kut uh Krist pen goh in a omta hi.
Tuajiakin ankuang luini, tol lui tawh hilou in, khansia leh gitlouhna tol soh tawh hilou in, hinanleh gin-omna leh thutak tanghou tol sohlouh tawh iluijaw ding uhi.
Ka laikhak ah kingaihhatte ki thuahpih lou dingin kung gelh hi.

Hih leitung kingaihhat mite tawh hiam, huaiham mite tawh hiam, lepgute tawh hiam, ahihkeileh milim biate tawh hiam kithuahpih mawng mawng louh ding chi ka hikei a, ajiak huachi ding hileh hih leitung a pat na pawtkhiat uh angai ding hi.

Hinanleh tuin kuapeuh unau chih hingal a, kingaihhat hiam, ahihkeileh huaiham hiam, ahihkeileh milim bia hiam, ahihkeileh hangsan hiam, ahikeileh uain khamhat hiam, ahihkeileh lepguk-hat hiam, ahihleh kithuahpih louh dingin na kiang uah kung gelh ahi. Huachibang mi tawh nezong nekhawm lou ding in.
Ajiak pualam mite ken ka ngaihkhok nang bang aom ei? Asung a omte hilou maw nou nangaihtuah jel uh.
Hinanleh pualam a mite Pasian in angaihtuah jel hi. “Tuajiakin nalak ua pat in hua migiloupa notkhia un.”
Na lak uah kuapeuh in thubuai neile uchin, misiangthoute mai a tutlou in midiktatloute maiah na tutngam ding uai le?
Misiangthoute`n leitung vaihawm ding ahi uh chih theilou na hi umaw? Ahoih, tuachia, leitung vai hawmding nahih uleh, sil neupente vaihawm ding a chinlou na hi umaw?
Vantungmite vaihawm ding ihi uh chih theilou na hi uh maw? Tuachi ahihleh hih damsung silte ivaihawm talua tham ding uhi!
Tuachi ahihleh hih damsung silte vaihawm ding naneih un, saptuamte lak a mi simmoh huaipente natousak uai le?
Na jumna ding un hih ka gen ahi, nalak uah mipil khatbek omlou na hi omaw le.
Hinanleh unau in unau dang khat nahek ua, huazong gingloumi maiah ahi nalai hi!
Tuajiakin khat leh khat na kihektuah uh pen nakhialhna lianpi uh ahi. Bangding a kimohsak jawlou na hi ua? Bangding a khem a om jawmai lou na hi ua?
Hilou, noumah in na bawlkhial ua, nakhem uh, huazong na unaute tung ah ahi nabawl uh!
Mi diktatloute`n Pasian gam aluah kei ding chih theilou na hi uh maw? Khem in om kei un, kingaihhatte hiam, milim biate hiam, angkawmte hiam, mihukte hiam, tawkuahukte hiam
gutate hiam, huaihamte hiam, uain khamhatte hiam, mi housiathatte hiam ahihkeileh lepgute hiam in Pasian gam aluah kei ding hi.
Tualeh nalak ua khenkhat huachibang nana hi uh, hinanleh I Toupa Jesu min leh Pasian kha a sopsiangthou na hita uh, siamtansak na hita uhi.
“Sil jousiah bawl kei dingin asiang a,” hinanleh sil jousiah bawl ahoihkim kei hi, sil jousiah bawl kei dingin asiang a, hinanleh bangmah silbawltheihna nuai ah ka omkei ding hi.

“Ante pen gilpi a ding ahi a, tualeh gilte pen ante a ding ahi,” hinanleh anih in Pasian in a hihmang ding hi. Tualeh pumpi pen kingaihna ding ahikei a, hinanleh Toupa a ding ahijaw hi, tualeh Toupa pen pumpi a ding ahijaw hi.
Pasian in Toupa akaithou a, tualeh eite zong a silbawl theihna in ahung kaithou ding hi.
Na pumpi uh Krist hiangte ahi chih theilou na hi umaw? Ahihtakleh Krist hiangte la in kijuakte hiang in ka bawl ding adiam le? Bawl deksuai lou e!
Ahihtakleh kijuakte tawh kizop peuhmah pen pumkhat ahi uh chih theilou na hi umaw? Ajiak aman, “Anih un pumkhat ahita ding uh ahi,” achi hi.
Hinanleh Toupa tawh kizopte pen kha ah amah tawh pumkhat ahi uhi.
Kingaih taisan un, mihing khialhna jousiah pen pumpi pualam ahi; hinanleh kuapeuh angkawmna khialhna bawl in tuh ama pumpi tung ah sil a bawlkhial hi.
Ahihtakleh, na pumpi uh na sung ua om, Pasian a pan a namuh uh, Khasiangthou tempul ahi a, nou mauh a na hikei uh chih theilou na hi uh hiam?
Ajiak man a lei nahi uhi, tuajiakin na pumpi uh leh na kha un Pasian pahtawi un, huate pen Pasian a ahi.
Tuin ka kiang a nung silgelhte uh thu ah, pasal in numei sukkhaklouh ahoih hi.
Hitalehzong, kingaihnate a omlouhna dingin pasal teng in amah zi chiat kineih hen, tualeh numei in zong ama pasal chiat kineih hen.
Pasal in azi kiangah ama tanding hun pia hen, tuachimah bangin numei in zong apasal kiangah pia hen.
Zi in ama pumpi tung ah thu anei kei a, hinanleh apasal in aneijaw hi. Tuachimah bangin pasal in zong a pumpi tung ah thu anei kei a, hinanleh azi in aneijaw hi.

Anngawlna leh thumna a na kipumpiak theihna ding ua, hunkhat sung pha satuak nahihkei ngal uleh akuamah kikham kei un. Tualeh na kidek zohlouh jiak ua setan in ahung khemlouhna dingin hung omkhawm jel un.
Hinanleh hihthu pen thupiak bang a gen hilou in, phalsak thu in ka gen ahijaw hi.
Ajiak mi jousiah kei bang le uh ka deih hi, hinanleh michih in Pasian a pat silpiak tuamchiat inei uhi, khat in hihbang in, adang in huabang in.
Hinanleh zinei nailoute leh meithaite hichin kachi hi, keimah bang in omle uh amauh a dingin ahoih ding hi.
Hinanleh akidekzoh kei ding ua ahihleh kiteng uheh, ajiak huk sang in kiten ahoihjaw hi.
Tualeh kitengsate kiangah thu kapia hi, kei piak hilou in Toupa piak ahijaw: zi in apasal paisan kei hen;
Hinanleh apaisan leh pasal neilou in omjing hen. Ahihkeileh apasal tawh kilem kik uhen, tualeh pasal in zi khulkei hen.
Hinanleh adangte kiangah (Toupa hilou in, ken): ka gen ahi, unau kuapeuhin ginglou zi a aneih a, amahnu akiang a aom nuam jing leh khulkei hen.
Tualeh numei, gingloumi pasal a neiin apasal in akiang a omjing a ut leh khen kei hen.

Ajiak ginglou pasal pen azi jiakin suksiangthou in a om a, tualeh ginglou zi zong apasal jiakin suksiangthou in a om hi. Atuachih keileh na tate uh asiang kei ding hi, hinanleh tuin amauhte asiang uhi.
Hinanleh aginglou pen in akhen leh, khen mai hen. Sanggampa hiam, sanggamnu hiam pen huachibang thu ah ka`n in a om kei hi. Hinanleh Pasian in eite pen kilem dingin a hungsam hi.
Ajiak zi aw, na pasal na hundam ding leh dinglouh bang nathei a? Ahihkeileh pasal aw, nazi na hundam ding leh dinglouh bang chi`n nathei a?
Hinanleh Pasian in michih kiang a a hawmsak taak bangin, tualeh Toupa`n michih asaptak bangin, tuachi`n om hen, tualeh huachibang in ken zong saptuam chin ah ka namdet hi.
Teptansa a asap mi a om ei? Tep tanlou hung hituan kei heh, tep tanlouh a asap mi a om ei? Tep tantuan kei heh.
Pasian thupiak juih chihlouh ngal, teptan bangmah ahikei a, teptanlouh zong bangmah ahituan kei hi.
Michih sap a aomna uah omjing uhen.
Sila nahihlai a sap nahiai? Khawk saken, tualeh suahtaksak theih ding nahihleh hua ngamsuk in.
Ajiak sila hihlai a Toupa a sap tuh Toupa a zalen ahi, tuachimah bangin mi zalen hihlai a sap zong Toupa sila ahi.
Man a leisa nahi ua, mi sila in omkei un.
Unaute aw, michih sap a aom bang chiat in, hua ah Pasian tawh omjing hen.
Tuachiang in nungak siangthoute tungtang ahihleh Toupa thupiak bangmah ka neikei hi. Hilehzong gin-om a om ding a Toupa hehpihna tang ka hih jiakin ka ngaihdan ka gen ding hi.
Tulai haksatna jiakin hih hoih dingin ka ngaihtuah hi, mi aom ngaingai ua a omjing uh ahoih hi, kachi hi.
Zi a hen a om na hiam? Ki sutkhiat sawm ken, zi a henlouh a om na hiam? Zi neih sawm ken.

Hinanleh zi naneih leh zong sil na bawlkhial tuan kei hi, tualeh nungak siangthou in zong pasal nei nanleh sil a bawlkhial tuan kei hi. Hitalehzong tuachibang miten taksa ah gimna athuak ding uhi. Hinanleh ken na thuaklouh uh ka deih hi.
Hinanleh unaute aw, hih ka gen ahi, hun atomta hi, tuachi`n zineite zong zi neilou bang in;
kapte zong kaplou bang in, kipakte zong kipaklou bang in, sil leite zong aneilou bang in;
