tualeh leitung zangte zong azangval lou bang in om hen, ajiak hih leitung omdan pen abeimang jing hi.
Hinanleh ken lungkhamna beia na om uh kung deihsak hi, zi neilou in Toupa akipaksak theihna dingin Toupa lam silte angaihsak nak hi.
Hinanleh zi neiin azi a kipaksak theihna dingin, leitung silte a ngaihsak nak hi;

numei pasal nei leh nungak siangthou zong aki bang kei hi. Ajiak pasal neilou in pen pumpi leh kha lam siangthou tak a a omtheihna dingin Toupa lam silte a ngaihsak hi, hinanleh numei pasal neiin apasal kipaksak theih nang in leitung lam silte a ngaihsak nak hi.

Tualeh hihte nou phattuamna ding a ka gen ahi, nou tung a kham nang a ka gen ahi kei a, hinanleh omdan kilawm hun a na omtheihna ding un leh, Toupa nna buailou a na septheihna ding ua ka gen ahijaw hi.
Hinanleh pasal khat peuhin a tanu a pallaini bei dong a aom sak a a tung a bawlkhial akisakleh pha asak bangin bawl hen. A khial kei hi, koppih neisak hen.
Hitalehzong lungsim dettak pua a, ki tulmohna taktak neilou a, hinanleh mahni utna thununzou a a tanu kepjing a lungtang a tumpa in a bawl hoih hi.
Tuachi`n a tanu koppih neisakpa in a bawlhoih hi, hinanleh koppih neisakloupa in abawlhoih sem hi.
Zi pen a pasal damsung teng dan a hen ahi a, hinanleh Toupa a om mi ahihnak leh a pasal asihleh a deihtaphot a kitenpih thei hi.
Hinanleh kei ngaihdan in ahihleh a om ngaiin om leh nuam asajaw ding hi, tualeh ken zong Pasian kha neiin zong ka ngaihtuah hi.
Tualeh, milimte biakna sil piakte tungtang thu ahihleh.
“Kuapeuh in theihna ineichiat uh,” chih itheichiat uhi. Theihna in mi aki satheisak a, hinanleh itna in mi asiamhoih hi.
Tualeh mi kuapeuh in banghiam thei a a kingaihtuah leh, atheih ding bang a theinailou ahi hi.
Hinanleh mi kuapeuh in Pasian a it leh, hua mipa mahmah theih in aom hi.
Tuajiakin milim biakna kithoihna silte neklam thu ahihleh, leitung ah milim kichi bangmah ahikei a, tualeh khatguak loungal Pasian dang a om kei chih ithei uhi.
Ajiak van ah hiam, leiah hiam pasiante chia minvohte om nanle uh, huachibang “pasian” tampi leh “toupa” tampi a om uhi,
hilehzong eiding in Pasian khat guak, Pa aom a, amah a pan in siljousiah a om a, ei zong amah a om ihi uhi. Tualeh Toupa khat guak Jesu Krist a om a, ei zong amah jiak a om ihi uhi.
Ahihhang in hua theihna pen mijousiah ah a om kei hi, ajiak khenkhat in tutan in milim biakna pen biakna a ngaiin na nejing ua, asia leh pha theihna uh ahatlouh jiakin a hihnin veu uhi.
Hinanleh nek in Pasian pahtat ahung lawhsak ahikei a, ajiak inek jiak un ihoihjaw uh ahituan kei a, nekei leizong isiajaw tuan kei uhi.
Hinanleh pilvang un, atuachih keileh a suahtakna uh bangchi hiam in mihatloute a dingin pukna ahung suak kha ding hi.
Ajiak, nang “theihna neimi,” kuahiam in milim biakna ankuang um a tou hungmu taleh; amah sia leh pha theihna hatloupa pen milim biakna silte neding in hansanlawh talou ding maw?
Tualeh, “na theihna!” jiakin unau hatlou asih tang a Krist in asihsak pen a mangthang ding hi.
Hinanleh tuachia unau tung a na khialh ua, asia leh pha theihna hatlou nasuk liamsak chiang un, Krist tung ah nakhial uh ahi.
Tuajiakin annek in ka unau apuksak leh ka unau a puklouhna dingin sa ka nekik nawn mawng mawng kei ding hi.
Sawltak hilou ka hi maw leh? Zalenlou ka hi maw leh? I Toupa Jesu mulou ka hi maw leh? Nou Toupa a ka nasep hilou nahi uh maw leh?
Midangte a dingin sawltak hikei mahleng zong, nou a dingin ginmoh omlou takin ka hi ahi, ajiak Toupa a ka sawltak hihna chiamtehna noumah nahi uhi.
Kei hung ze-ettute kiang a ka dawnna hih ahi:
Nek nang leh dawn nang ah thu neilou ka hi hiam?
Sawltak dangte leh, Toupa a unaute leh, Kifa bang a unaunu khat kizohpih a, zi a neitheilou ka hi uh hiam?
Ahihkeileh nna seplouhna dingin keileh Barnaba in thu neilou ka hi uh hiam?
Galkapte kua ahia aneihsa seng a galkap a kuanngai? Grep huan bawlngal a agah nelou kua aom ei? Ahihkeileh ganhon khawingal a anawi nelou kua aom ei?
Hih thute mihing ngaihdan guak a gen ka hi hiam? Ahihkeileh danthu in zong huamah genlou amaw?
Ajiak Mosi danbu ah, “Bawngtal in buh achillai in amuk kanken,” chih gelh ahi. Pasian in bawngtalte ding guak ngaihtuah adiai le?
Ahihkeileh aman eite ding jiak mah a agen adiai le? Eite ding jiak a agelh ahi talua hi. Loukaipa`n kinemtak a akaih ding ahi a, tualeh kinemtak a buh veltu in zong akinepna amuh ding ahi.
Kou nou a ding a khalam silte tuh ka hih uleh, na taksa lam silte uh at le ung sil thupi ahi diai le?
Midangte`n natung ua hih thuneihna tang ahih uleh, kou zong tangsem jawlou ding ka hi uh maw?
Hitalehzong hih thuneihna ka zong kei uhi, Krist tangthupha kadal louhna ding un bangkim ka thuakjaw uhi.
Sil siangthou a biakna nasemten tempul a silte ane uh, tualeh maitam a nasemte`n maitam sillatte ah tan anei uh chih theilou na hi uh hiam?
Tuachimah bang a tangthupha gentute pen tangthupha mah a ahin ding uh ahi chi`n Toupa`n thu apia hi.
Hinanleh ken hih silte khatbek ka zangkei hi, tualeh hih silte ka tungah kibawl leh zong ka chikei hi. Ajiak kuahiam in ka kisuanna pen bangmah lou a abawl sang in kei dingin sih ahoihjaw hi!
Ajiak tangthupha gen nanleng zong suan ding bangmah ka neikei hi. Bawllouh theihlouh katung a ki-nga ahihjiak in, tangthupha gen keileng katung agik ding hi!
Ajiak hih sil uttak a bawl ka hihleh nuamman muh ding kanei hi, hinanleh ka utthu lou a bawl ka hihleh tangthupha kepna ka khut a piak ka hi ding hi.
Tualeh ka nuamman bang ahia le? Tangthupha ka gen chiang a tangthupha a ka thuneihna aval a ka zaklouhna ding a Krist tangthupha athawn a pia ka hihtheihna pen ahi.
Mijousiah a pat zalen himah nanleng, mi tamsem kalak theihna dingin mijousiah sila in ka kibawl hi.
Judate ka laktheihna dingin Judate kiangah Judami bangin ka om a, dan nuai a omte ka laklut theihna dingin, dan nuai a omte kiangah dan nuaia om bangin ka om hi, dannuai a omlou hinan leng zong.
Dan neiloute ka laklut theihna dingin, dan neiloute kiangah dan neilou bangin ka om hi, hinanleh Pasian dan nuaia omlou hituanlou in, Krist dan nuai a omjaw in.
Mi hatloute ka laklut theihna dingin, mi hatloute kiangah mi hatlou bangin ka om hi, bang chidan hiam a mi khenkhat bek ka hundam theih nangin mijousiah kiangah sil bangkim in ka kibawl hi.
Noutawh hih ah tan ka neihtheihna dingin tangthupha jiakin hih ka bawl hi.
Kitaidemte aun un atai ua, hinanleh khat guakin nuamman a mujel uhi chih theilou nahi uh hiam? Na gahtheihna ding un tuachimah bangin tai un.
Tualeh kuapeuh lohman muhsawm a kidemna a pangmi in sil jousiah ah a kithunun uhi. Amau`n lallukhu sethei muhna ding a bawl ahi ua, hinanleh en lallukhu setheilou dingin i bawl uh ahi.
Tuajiakin, huachibang in katai a, ajiakbei hilou in. Huihkhua a leltak tumte bang hilou in kapang hi.
Hinanleh ka pumpi ka thunun a, ka thunuai ah ka koih hi, atuachih keileh midangte kiang a tangthupha ka genzoh nungin keimahpi chinglah in ka om kha ding hi.
Tualou zong unaute aw, hihte na theihlouh uh ka deihkei hi, ipu ipate`n aun un meipi nuai ah ana om ua, tualeh aun un tuipi ana kan ua.
A un ua meipi leh tuipi a Mosi kiang a baptis a aom ua.
Tualeh a un ua khalam an kibang anek ua
tualeh aun un khalam dawn ding kibang a dawnchiat uhi. Ajiak amauhte juitu khalam suangpi a a dawnchiat uhi; hua suangpi pen Krist ahi.
Hinanleh alak ua mi tampite tung ah Pasian a lungkim takei a, gamdai ah apumpite uh thehjakin aomta uhi.
Sil gilou alunggulh bang ua i lunggulh louhna ding a hihte pen eite a ding a etsakna ahih ding ahi,
tualeh alak ua mi khenkhat milim biami ahihmah bang un milim biami hikei un. “Mipite pen neding leh dawn dingin atou ua, tualeh kimawl dingin ading jel uh,” chih gelh bang in.
Alak ua mi khenkhatten nulehpa kal thanghuaina a bawljiak un, nikhat in sangsawmnih leh sangthum apuklup lawh bang un eiten huabang mohna i bawlkei ding uhi.
Alak ua khenkhat in Toupa a ze-et ua gul a hihmang a aom bang un, enjaw Krist i ze-et kei ding uhi.
Tualeh alak ua khenkhat aphun ua, hihmangpa hihmang a aom bang un iphunkei ding uhi.
Tuin hihte jousiah etsakna dingin atung uah ana tung hi, tualeh ei leitung huntawp hung tunnate kiangah thuhilhna ding a gelh ahi.
Tuajiakin, ading a kingaihtuahte pilvang hen, atuachih keileh apuk ding hi.

Mihing thuakval natung uah khemna atung ngai kei, hinanleh Pasian a gin-om a, aman na thuakzoh val uh khemna natuah ding uh aphalkei ding, hinanleh nathuak zohna ding un khemna jousiah a na taikhiat theihnang lampi ahung bawlsak jaw ding hi.
Tuajiakin, ittakte aw, milim biak taisan un.
Mipilte bangin thu ka gen ahi, ka thugen ngaihtuah un.
Gualjawlna nou a gual kajawl uh, Krist sisan kipawlkhawm pihna hilou amaw leh: Tanghou kabal kek uh Krist pumpi kipawlkhawm pihna hilou amaw leh?
Ajiak eite tampi hinanlei zong, tanghou beukhat, pumpi khat ihi uhi.
Taksa dan ah Israelte en sin ua, kithoihna sa nete, maitam tawh tan neikhawm hilou ahi uai le.
Ahihleh bang ahia ka gen ding? Milim pen sil banghiam khat ahi a, ahihkeileh milim biakna a sil kilante zong sil banghiam khat ahi chi ka hiai le?
Jentelte kithoihna pen Pasian kiang a kithoihna hilou in, dawite kiangah akithoih uh chi ka hijaw hi. Nou dawite tawh na kipawlkhawm uh kung deihsak kei hi.
Toupa nou leh dawi nou na dawnkhawm thei kei ding uh, Toupa dohkan ah leh dawite dohkan ah na nekhawm thei kei ding uhi.
Ahihkeileh Toupa thangsia ding a hantawk sawm ihi uai leh? Eite amah sang a hatjaw ihi uh hiam?
“Sil jousiah kei dingin asiang a,” hinanleh sil jousiah kei dingin ahoih kim kei hi. Sil jousiah kei dingin asiang a, hinanleh sil jousiahin mi a bawlhoih kei hi.
Mi kuamah in amah guak hoihna ding zongjaw louin, midangte hoihna ding zongjaw hen.
Sa ajuakna mun a kijuak taphot sialehpha theihna jiakin bangmah dongse louin ne un.
Ajiak, “Leitung leh asung a om jousiah Toupa a ahi hi.”
Ginglou mite lak a kua hiam in an neding a ahung chial a, tualeh pai na ut leh namai a kilui taphot sia leh pha theihna jiakin bangmah dongse louin ne in.
Hinanleh mi kuahiam in, “Hih pen milim kiang a kithoina ahi,” chia ahung hilh leh amah ahung hilhpa jiak leh sia leh pha theihna jiakin nekei un, ajiak leitung leh asung a om jousiah Toupa a ahi hi.
Nang mah sia leh pha theihna chi ka hikei a.
Hinanleh midangte sia leh pha theihna chi ka hijaw hi. “Achihleh bang ding a midangte sia leh pha theihna in ka zalenna thunun ahia?
Hinanleh kipak tak a ka nek leh bangding a kipahthu ka genna tung a gensiat a om ka hia?”
Tuajiakin, nane un zong nadawn un zong nabawl taphot uh Pasian thupina ding ngen in bawl un.
Judate hiam, Jentelte hiam ahihkeileh Pasian saptuamte hitaleh a thangpaihna ding un bawl kei un.
Keimah phattuamna ding zonglou a, hinanleh hundam a a omtheihna ding ua mi tampite phattuamna ding a, sil jousiah a michin teng ka kipaksak mahbang in.
Kei Krist omdan latu ka hih mahbang in nou kei omdan latu hi un.
Tualeh unaute aw, sil bangkim a nungtheih ua, dante kunghilh bang jel a nakep jing jiak un kung pahtawi hi.
Hinanleh pasal jousiah lutang Krist ahi, numei lutang pasal ahi, tualeh Krist lutang Pasian ahi chih natheih uh kung deih hi.
Pasal kuapeuh alu khuhsa a thumna nei, ahihkeileh thugen jousiahin alutang a zahbawllou ahi hi.
Hinanleh numei alu khuhlou a thumna nei hiam ahihkeileh thugen hiam jousiahin alutang a zahbawllou ahi hi. Ajiak huachibang a bawlte pen asam kiheu tawh kibang ahi.
Ajiak numei in alu akhuh kei ding leh asam heukiau hen, hinanleh numei ding a sam heu hiam ahihkeileh heukiau ajumhuai leh kikhuh hen.
Pasal pen Pasian lim bang leh a thupina ahihjiak in alu akhuhlouh ding mawng ahi, hinanleh numei ahihleh pasal thupina ahi;
ajiak pasal pen numei a pat a siam ahikei a, hinanleh numei pen pasal a pat siam ahijaw hi.
Pasal pen numei a ding a siam zong ahikei a, hinanleh numei pen pasal a ding a siam ahijaw hi.
Hih jiakin numei in pasal thuneihna chiamtehna in leh, vantungmite jiakin alu akhuh ding ahi.
Hitalehzong Toupa silgel dan ah pasal lou in numei a omthei kei a, numei louin pasal a omthei kei hi.
Ajiak numei pen pasal a pat siam ahihmah bangin pasal zong numei jiak a piang ahi. Hinanleh sil jousiah Pasian a kipan ahi.
Noumah kingaihtuah un, numei in alu khuhlou a Pasian kiang a thumna aneih akilawm ei.
Pasal in samsau aneih leh amah a dingin ajumhuai hi, chih ngaina dan in zong nou hung theisak hilou amaw,
hinanleh numeiin samsau aneihleh amah a dingin athupina ahijaw hi, ajiak asam pen akhuhna ding a piak ahi.
Hinanleh mi kuahiam a selkhahleh huachibang tawndan inei kei uhi, Pasian saptuam pawlten zong anei kei uhi.
Ahihhang in nou hihthu kung hilhna ah kung phatthei kei hi, hoihjawksem nang a kikhawm hilou in, hinanleh siatjawksem nang a na kikhopjel jiak un.
Ajiak amasapen a saptuam a na kikhop chiang un nalak uah kilang khenna a om nak chih kaja hi, tualeh ging zong ka gingta hi.
Ajiak ataktak a kipomte akilat theihna dingin nalak uah ki langkhenna aom ding mawng ahi.
Tuajiakin, munkhat a nung paikhawm chiang un Toupa nitak an nektheihna gual ahi kei hi.
Ajiak nanek chiang un michih midangte masang in noumau nitak an na kinek chiat uh, tuachi`n khenkhat agilkial a, adang in akham uhi.

Bang chidan ahia? Nekna ding leh dawnna ding inn kineihlou nahi uh maw? Ahihkeileh Pasian saptuamte na simmoh un, bangmah neiloute na zahlaksak uh maw? Na kiang uah bang ahia ka gen ding? Kung phat ding a diam? Hih thute ah kung phat kei ding hi!
Ajiak Toupa kiang a ka muh pen nou kung hilhsawn ahi, tuachia Toupa Jesu`n matsak a aom ding jan in tanghou ala a,
tualeh kipahthu agenzoh in, abalkek a, la unla, ne un, “Hih kataksa nou a ding a kipia pen ahi, nung theihjingna ding un hih bawljel un,” achih.
Tuachimah bangin, nitak an anek zoh in nou ala a, “Hih nou ka sisan a thukhunthak ahi, na dawn teng un keimah nung theihjingna ding un hih bawljel un,” achih.
Ajiak hih tanghou nanek ua, hih nou nadawn teng un a hungpai kik masiah Toupa sihna naphuangjak uh ahi hi.
Tuajiakin kuapeuh chinloupi a hih Toupa tanghou ne a anou dawn tuh Toupa taksa leh sisan tung ah siamlouh atang ding hi.
Hinanleh mi amah ki enchianjaw hen, tuachi`n tanghou ne henla nou dawn hen.
Ajiak Toupa taksa in a etsak theiloupi a, kuapeuh netakloupi a ne leh dawntakloupi a dawn in amah siamlouh kitanna dingin ane in adawn ahi.
Hihjiakin nalak ua mi tampi na jawngkhal ua, na china ua, tualeh tampi na sihlohta uhi.
Ajiak eimah leh eimah ki enchian lei vaihawmsak a omlou ding ihi uhi.
Hinanleh vaihawmsak a i om un zong leitung tawh siamlouh tang a i omlouhna ding un Toupa taihilh in i om uhi.
Tuajiakin, unaute aw, neding a na kikhop chiang un, khat leh khat ki ngakkhawm chiat un.
Hinanleh na kikhopna uh vaihawmna na thuaklohna uh ahihlouh nang in mi kuapeuh agil akial leh a inn ah ne hen, tualeh thudangte pen kung paichiang in kalem siang na ding hi.
Tuin unaute aw, khalam silpiak pen
Na theilouh ding uh ka deihkei hi.
Jentelte nahi ua, pui a na om bangjel un, hih milim hamtheiloute lam ah puakmang in na om jel uh chih nathei uhi.
Tuajiakin kuaman Pasian kha a thu gen in, “Jesu pen, hamsia thuak ahi!” achi ngaikei, chih kung theisak hi.
Tuachi`n silpiak tuamtuam a om a, hinanleh kha khat ahi.
Tualeh nasepdan tuamtuam a om a, hinanleh Toupa khat ahi.
Tualeh nna septheihna tuamtuam a om a, hinanleh bangkim a bangkim bawltu Pasian khat a om hi.
Hinanleh phattuampih chiatna dingin kha kilakna miteng kiang a piak ahi.
Ajiak mikhat kiangah kha in pilna apia a, midang kiangah hua kha mah in theihna apia hi.
Midang kiangah hua kha mah in ginna apia a, midang kiangah hua kha mah in sukdam theihna silpiakte apia hi.

Midang kiangah sillamdang bawl theihnate apia a, midang kiangah thu gentheihna apia hi. Midang kiangah khate theihkhen theihna apia a, midang kiangah ham tuamtuam a thu gentheihna apia hi. Midang kiangah ham tuamtuam lehtheihna apia hi.
Hinanleh huate jousiah khakhat mah in michih kiang a adeih bang jel a hawm chiat in asem hi.
Ajiak taksa pumpi khat ahi a, hiang tampi anei hi, hinanleh hiang jousiahte tam mahle uh pumpikhat ahi uhi, tuachimah bangin Krist zong khat ahi.
Ajiak eite Juda hi in Jentelte hitalei, sila hi`n silalou hitalei, i un ua pumpi khat a om dingin khakhat a baptis in i om uhi, tualeh kha khat dawnsak in i om uhi.
Pumpi pen hiangkhat guak ahi kei a, hinanleh hiang tampi ahijaw hi.
Keng in, “Khut ka hihlouh jiakin pumpi ah ka pangkei,” chileh, hih jiakin pumpi ah panglou ahithei diai le.
Tualeh bil in, “Mit ka hihlouh jiakin pumpi ah ka pangkei,” chileh, hih jiakin pumpi a panglou ahi thei diai le.
Pumpi pen apumpi`n mit hitaleh, khuajakna khoiah aom ta diai? Apumpi`n khuajakna hitaleh gimnam theihna khoiah a om ta dia?
Hinanleh Pasian in hiang chinteng pen pha asak bangin pumpi ah akoih hi.
Tualeh aun un hiang khat guak hitaleh pumpi khoiah a om tadia!
Hinanleh tuin hiang tampi hinanleh uh, pumpi khat guak ahi.
Tualeh mit in khut kiangah, “Bangmah in kung poimoh kei!” a chithei kei, lutang in zong keng kiangah, “Bangmah in kung poimoh kei!” a chithei tuan kei hi.
Chithei lou, chihnak sangin, pumpi hiang hatlou a kilangte zong apoimoh mahmah hi;
tualeh pumpi hiang ngaihsak thamlou a ingaihtuahte huate mah izahtak bawljaw ua, tualeh ihiang kilawmloute`n naktak in hoihna aneijaw uhi,
hinanleh ihiang kilawmte`n huachibang apoimoh kei uhi. Hinanleh Pasian in poimoh thamlou hiangte pen zahbawl sem in pumpi alemkhawm hi.
Tuachia pumpi a kikhenna aom louh a, hinanleh hiangte khat leh khat a kingaihsak chiat theihna ding un.
Tualeh hiang khat in athuak leh hiang tengteng in athuakpih jel a, tualeh hiang khat pahtawi a aom leh hiang dang jousiahin a kipahpih jel uhi.
Tuin nou pen Krist pumpi na hi ua, a mimal mal in hiangte na hi uhi.

Tualeh Pasian in khenkhat saptuam ah ahung koih a, amasapen in sawltakte, anihna ah Jawlneite, athumna ah siate, huazoh in sillamdang bawltute, huazoh in sukdamtheihna silpiakte, panpihtheihnate, vaihawm siamnate, ham tuamtuam a hamtheihnate.
Aun un sawltak ahi uai? Aun un Jawlnei ahi uai? Aun un sia ahi uai? Aun un sillamdang bawltheitute ahi uai?
Aun un sukdamtheihna silpiakte anei uai? Aun un hamtheihlouh in thu a genthei uai? Aun un hamtheihlouhte aletthei uai?
Hinanleh silpiak hoihpente lunggulhjaw un, tuachi`n lampi hoihjaw kung musak ding hi.
Mihing hamte leh vantungmite ham in thu gennan leng itna kaneih kei leh dak ging hiam, jam ging hiam ka bang leltak ding hi.
Tualeh thugen theihna silpiak nei in, thugu`k jousiah leh theihna jousiah theisiang nanleng, tualeh mual kisuansak theihna khop ginna nei nanleng, itna ka neih keileh bangmah lou ka hi.
Tualeh ka neih jousiah migentheite vak nang in piasiang in ka pumpi haltum dingin pia-ngam nanleng, itna kaneih kei leh bangmah aphatum kei hi.
Itna in adawhjou a, a migi a, itna in a engsia kei a, itna aki liansak kei a;
itna akilawmlou in agamta kei a, amah ding guak akhual kei a, ahehbaih kei a, sil gilou angaihtuah kei a;
diktatlouhna ah akipak kei a, hinanleh thutak ah akipak hi.
Sil jousiah puakdan asiam a, sil jousiah agingta a, sil jousiah alam en a, sil jousiah athuak paisuak hi.

Itna bangchik mah in alohsam ngai kei ding. Hinanleh thugen theihnate om nanleh zong a hungbei ding a, ham theihlouhte om nanleh ahung tawp ding a, theihnate om nanleh a hungbei ding hi, bangmahlou ahung suak ding hi.
Akimlou in ithei ua, akimlou in igen uhi.
Hinanleh abukim a hungtun chiangin akimlou pen sukbei ahita ding hi.
Ka naupan laiin, naupang ham in ka ham a, naupang theih in kathei a, naupang ngaihtuah in ka ngaihtuah hi; hinanleh kungpichin tak in naupang silte ka koihkhiata hi.
Ajiak tuin limlang ah chianglou tak in imu ua, hinanleh huahun chiangin kimaituah in i muta ding hi. Tuin akimlou in ka thei a, hinanleh huahun chiangin kei hung kitheih bangin ka theita ding hi.
Tualeh tuin ginna tawh, kinepna tawh, itna, hihteng thum a omkhawm uhi, hinanleh hihteng lak a lianpen tuh itna ahi.
Itna delhjui jel unla, khalam silpiakte lunggulh un, adiak in thu gentheihna lunggulh un.
Ajiak hamtheihlouh a ham in mi kiang a thugen hilou in, Pasian kiang a gen ahijaw hi, kuamah in a thugen atheihlouh jiakin, hinanleh kha a thugu`k gen ahi.
Hinanleh thugentu in mihing kiangah siamhoihna thute, hasotna thute, tualeh khamuanna thute agen hi.
Hamtheihlouh a thugen in amah guak a kibawlhoih a, hinanleh thugenmi in saptuam asiam hoih hi.

Na un ua hamtheihlouh a na ham uh kung deihsak a, hinanleh thu na gentheih uh kung deihsakjaw sem hi. ajiak saptuam siamhoih nang a alehkhiat kei ngal uleh hamtheihlouh a ham sang in thugenmi ahoihjaw hi.

Hinanleh tuin unaute aw, hamtheihlouh a ham in na kiang uah hungpai taleng, kilakna in hiam, theihna in hiam, thugentheihna in hiam, ahihkeileh thuhilhna in hiam in na kiang uah genkei leng, bang in kung hih phatuam dia?
Sil hinna neilou gingthei, theile hiam, ahihkeileh kaihging ngei zong omjia neia agin kei leh bang kimut a, bang kitum chih bang achi ki theihtheih diai?
Ajiak pengkul mumal beiin kimutleh, kua ahia galdou a kisa ding?
Tuachimah bang a nou zong ham theihbaihlam a nagen kei uleh, bang kigen ahia chih bang achi kitheih dia, ajiak huihkhua a ham na hi giap ding uhi!
Leitung ah ham chi tuamtuam om ahi maithei, hinanleh omjia neilou khat bek a om kei hi.
Tuajiakin, hua ham in agen ka theih kei leh hua thugenpa dingin kei pen gamdangmi ka hi a, tualeh kei a dingin agenpa zong gamdangmi ahi ding hi.
Tuachimah bangin khalam silpiakte a na phattuam ngaih bang un, saptuamte siamhoihna ding a nung khantheihna ding uh zong un.
Tuajiakin, hamtheihlouh a ham in alehdok theihna dingin thum hen.
Ajiak hamtheihlouh in thum leng, kakha injaw ka thum a, hinanleh ka theihna aphatuam kei hi.
Ahihleh bangchi`n ka bawl tadiai? Kha in thumna ka nei ding a, theihna in zong ka thum ding hi. Kha in la kasa ding a, theihna in zong la kasa ding hi.
Atuachih keileh, kha a na gualjawl chiangin mimawlpa in na kipak thugen ah na thugen theiloupi in bangchi`n “Amen” achi thei dia?
Nang kipahthu nagen hoihngel a, hinanleh midangte asiamhoih tuan kei hi.
Noute jousiah sangin hamtheihlouh a thu ka gen tamjawk jiakin Pasian kiangah kipahthu ka gen hi.
Hinanleh saptuam lak ah pen hamtheihlouh a thu singkhat ka gen sang in, ka thugen a midangte ka hilhtheihna dingin ka theihna in thu tengnga ka gen jaw ding hi.
Unaute aw, theihsiamna lam ah naupang kei unla, gitlouhna lam ah naupang un, theihsiamna lam ah piching un.
Dan laibu ah,
“Hamdang mite leh gamdang mite muk leh
kam in hih mite kiangah thu ka gen ding a,
huachi`n zong ka thu a ngaikhia tuan kei ding uhi,
Toupa`n achi,”
chih gelh bang in.
Tuajiakin hamtheilouh pen gingtute ding hilou in, hinanleh gingloute dingin chiamtehna ahi, hinanleh thugen theihna gingloute a ahi kei a, hinanleh gingtute ding ahijaw hi.
Tuajiakin, saptuam pumpi mun khat a na kikhopna uah mijousiah hamtheihlouh in ham tale uchin, tualeh huasan ah athei nailou leh gingloumi hungpai taleh, nou mimaw hungchi talou ding uh maw?
Hinanleh mijousiah in thu gen tale uchin, gingloumi hiam ahihkeileh atheilou mi khat huasan ah hungpaileh, agitlouh dan na un un theihsak in a omta ding a, na un ua awimoh ahung hita ding hi,
tualeh a lungtang a thugukte hihlat in a om ding a, tualeh khupbok a puk in Pasian abia ding a, nalak uah Pasian a om taktak hi! chih agen ding hi.

Bang chihding ahi tadiam unaute aw? Nung kikhop chiang un michih in phatna la bang, thuhilhna bang, hamtheihlouh bang, kilakna bang, ham lehna bang nanei chiat uh, sil jousiah bawlhoihna dingin hihen.
Mi kuapeuh in hamtheihlouh a thu agen leh, nih in hiam, ahihkeileh atamtawp in thum in gen hen, huazong kikhel jel in hi hen, tualeh mikhat in let khia hen.
Tualeh alettu ding aom kei leh saptuam kikhopna ah hamlou in om mai hen, amah leh Pasian kiangah kigen hen.
Jawlneite nih hiam thum hiam in gen uhenla, adangte`n agen uh ngaihtuah uhen.
Hinanleh akiang a tou midang kiang a banghiam ahung kilakleh, amasapen dai hen.
Ajiak mijousiah in atheih a, mijousiah khamuang a a omtheihna dingin na un un khat khat in nagen thei uhi.
Tualeh thugentute kha pen thugentute thuthu in aom uhi,
Pasian, buaina Pasian ahikei a.
Hinanleh misiangthoute saptuam jousiah a ahih mah bangin khamuanna Pasian ahijaw hi.
Na numeite uh saptuam kikhopna ah dai uhen, ajiak amauh a dingin thugen phal ahi kei hi, hinanleh dan laibu in zong agen bangin thumanna nuai ah omjaw uhen.
Tualeh banghiam theihnuam aneih uleh innlam ah apasalte uh dong uhen, ajiak saptuam kikhopna a numei thugen pen ajumhuai ahi.
Ahihleh Pasian thu nou kiang a hung kipankhia ahi maw leh? Ahihkeileh noukiang guak a hungtung ahi maw leh?
Mi kuapeuh in thugentu hiam, ahihkeileh khami hiam a akingaihtuah leh na kiang ua ka thugelhte Toupa thupiak ahi chih thei un.
Hinanleh mi kuapeuh atheilou a om leh amah pen theilou in om mai hen.
Tuajiakin, unaute aw, thugen lunggulh unla, hamtheihlouh a ham kham kei un.
Sil jousiah hoihtak leh kituak tak a bawl hi hen.
Huate lou zong unaute aw, na kiang ua ka tangthupha gen, pom zong napom uh, tualeh huamah a nadinna uh kung theisak kik hi.
Na kiang ua ka thugen na pomdet uleh huamah ah hundam in na om ding ua, atuachih keileh, na ginna uh mokna asuak ding hi.
Ajiak amasapen in ken zong ka muh pen nou kung hilhsawn hi, chih Pasian laisiangthou dungjui in Krist in ikhialhnate jiakin asi a;
tualeh vuiin a om a, Laisiangthou dunguiin nithumni in athoukikta hi.
Tualeh Kifa kiangah akilak a, tuazoh in sawm leh nihte kiang ah.
Tuanung in unau ja nga sang a tamjaw kiangah khatvei thu in a kilak a, alak ua tamjawte tutan in adam nalai ua, hinanleh khenkhatte a ihmuta uhi.
Tuanung in Jakob kiangah a kilak a, tuachi`n sawltakte tengteng kiang ah.
Tuachi`n a nunung pen in ahunlou bang a piang kei kiangah a kilak hi.
Ajiak sawltakte lak a neupen ka hi a, saptuamte ka bawl gentheih jiakin sawltak chihtak zong ka hikei hi.

Hinanleh Pasian hehpihna jiakin ka hihhih ding ka hita hi, tualeh ahehpihna hung piak athawn in a omkei a, hinanleh amauhte teng sang in ka semgim jaw hi, hinanleh kei sep hilou in Pasian hehpihna ka kiang a om in asemjaw hi.
Tuajiakin, kei hi in, amauh hitaleh, tuachi`n ka gen ua, tuachi`n nou na gingta uhi.
Tuin Krist misi lak a pat athoukik chih igen ngal leh bangchidan a nalak ua khenkhat in misi thohkikna a omkei chi na hi ua?
Atuachihleh misite thohkikna a om keileh Krist zong a thoukik kei ding hi;
tualeh Krist a thohkik keileh ka thugen uh zong athawn ahi ding a, na ginna uh zong athawn ahi ding hi.

Ahi, Pasian in Krist akaithou hi chia, Pasian theihpihtu hi a thu ka gen jiak un, kou Pasian theihpihtu diklou bangin ka omta uhi, hinanleh misi thohkikna omlou takpi ahihleh, amah zong a kaithou kei ding hi.
Ajiak misite athohkik kei uleh Krist zong kaihthoh in a omkei ding hi.
Tualeh Krist kaithoh a aom kei leh, na ginna uh zong athawn ahi ding a, na khialhna uah na om nalai ding uhi.
Tuachi`n Krist a ihmute zong a mangthang ahita ding uhi.
Tu damsung guak a ding a Krist a kinepna ineih uleh, mi tengteng lak a mi hehpihhuai pen ihi ding uhi.
Hinanleh tuin Krist pen misi lak a pat kaihthoh in a omta a, ihmute lak a gah masapen a hunghita hi.
Mihing khat jiak a sihna ahung om jiakin, mihing khat jiak mah in misi thohkikna zong ahung om hi.
Ajiak, Adam a mi tengteng asih mahbang un, Krist ah mi tengteng suk hing in aom ding uhi.
Hinanleh michih amauh hun chiat ah, Krist gah masapen ahi a, tuazoh chiangin ahung paikikna ah Krist ate ahi ding hi.
Tuachi`n atawp a hungtung ding, huahun chiangin vaihawmna jousiah leh thuneihna jousiah leh silbawltheihna jousiah sumang in Pasian Pa kiang ah a kumpi gam a piata ding hi.
Ajiak a melmate jousiah akeng nuaia akoih masiah aman vai ahawm ding hi.
Melma nunung sukmang a om ding pen ahihleh sihna ahi.
Ajiak Pasian in sil jousiah akeng nuai ah akoihta hi. Hinanleh, sil jousiah a thunuai ah akoihta achih in, a thunuai a sil jousiah koihsakpa Pasian a huamkha kei, chih akilang hi.
Tualeh sil jousiah a thunuai a aom chiangin, Tapa ngei zong sil jousiah a thunuai a koihpa nuai ah a kituhlutta ding hi.
Atuachih keileh, misite a ding a baptisma atansak uh bangding ata diam? Misite thoukik mawng mawng lou ding ahih uleh, bangding a misite a ding a baptisma atansak uh ahia?
Tualeh bangding a eite zong dakkal teng a lau a omjing ihi ua?
Jesu Krist i Toupa a kung suanna sial in niteng in ka si ahi!
Mihing tatdan bang a Ephesa a gamsate kihaupih ka hihleh kei dingin bang aphatuam dia, misi thoukik lou ahihleh? Ne in i dawn ding uh, jing chiang a si ding ihi.
Khem in om kei un, “Lawigilou in omdan hoih asusia veu hi.”
Diktatna lam ah halh unla, khial kei un, ajiak khenkhat in Pasian theihna a neikei uhi, hih na jumna ding ua ka gen ahi.
Hinanleh mi kuahiam in, “Misite bangchi`n kaihthoh ahi ding ua? Bangchi bang a pumpi nei in ahung pawt ding ua?” achi ding uhi.
Nang mimaw! Na khaichi tuh zong asih phot keileh apoukei hi.
Tualeh natuh in akung hung om ding natuh kei a, gehu hi`n khaichi tuamtuam hitaleh zong atang mah ahi natuh.
Hinanleh Pasian in khaichi jousiah kiangah pha asak bang jelin akung apia hi.
Taksa jousiah taksa kibang ahikei a, hinanleh mihing taksa atuam ahi a, gamsate taksa atuam a, ngasate taksa atuam a, tualeh vasate taksa atuam hi.
Vanlam pumpi zong a om a, leilam pumpi zong a om, hinanleh vanlam pumpi thupina atuam a, leilam pumpi thupina atuam hi.
Ni in thupina tuam khat anei a, kha in thupina tuam anei, tualeh aksi leh aksi zong athupina uh atuamchiat hi.
Tuachimah bangin misi thohkikna zong ahi. Muatthei a tuh in a om a, muattheilou a kaihthoh in a om.
Thulimlou tak a tuh in a om a, thupitak a kaihthoh in a om hi, hatlou a tuh in a om a, sil bawltheitak a kaihthoh in a om hi.
Salam pumpi nei a tuh in a om a, khalam pumpi nei a kaihthoh in a om, salam pumpi a om a, khalam pumpi zong a om hi.
Tualeh, “Mi masa, Adam pen, hinna nei mihing a siam ahi hi”; chia gelh bang in, hinanleh Adam nunung pen ahihleh hinna piatu kha ahi hi.
Ahihhang in khalam a om masa kei a, salam a om masajaw hi, tuakhit in khalam ahung om hi.
Mihing masa leivui a siam, leimi ahi a, mihing nihna pen van a kipan Toupa ahi.
Lei a siam mite pen lei a kisiampa bang ahi ua, vanlam mite ahihleh van a mite bang ahi uhi.
Tualeh lei a kisiam mel ipuak bang un vanmi mel zong ipua ding uhi.
Tuin unaute aw, taksa leh sisan in Pasian gam aluah thei kei a, muatthei in zong muattheih louhna aluahthei kei, chih ka gen ahi.
Ngai un, thugu`k kung hilh ding hi, i un un i ihmu khin kei ding ua, hinanleh i un un hihlamdang in i omsiang ding uhi.
Thakhat in, mitphiatkal louin, pengkul nunung pen dingin, pengkul ahung ging ding a, tualeh misite pen muattheilou a kaihthoh in a om ding ua, eite zong hihlam dangin a i om ta ding uhi.
Ajiak hih muatthei in muattheih louhna asilh ding a, tualeh sithei in sihtheih louhna asilh ding hi.
Tuachia hih muatthei in muattheih louhna asilh a, tualeh hih sithei in sihtheih louhna asilh hun chiangin, zohna in sihna a valhjouta, chia kigelh ahung tangtung ta ding hi.
“Aw sihna, nagu khoiah, om ta?
Aw hankhuk, nazohna, khoiah omta?”
Sihna gu lah khialhna ahi ngal a, tualeh khialhna thuneihna dan ahi.
Hinanleh i Toupa Jesu Krist jiak a gualzohna hung piapa Pasian kiang ah kipahthu om hen.
Tuajiakin, ka ittak unaute aw, dettak in, hihling guallouh in, Toupa nasep kuhkaltak in sem gige in om un, nasep gimna uh Toupa ah athawn kei ding chih nathei uhi.
Tuin, misiangthoute a ding thohlawm thu pen, Galatia gam a saptuamte thu kapiak bang in nou zong bawl un.
Kungpai chiang a thohlawm donna aom nawnlouhna ding in, ni sagihni nimasa pen in Pasian in agualjawl bang jel in michih in na koihkholh chiat un.
Tualeh kungpai chiangin, pha nasak penpen uh, na itna silpiak uh vapia dingin na laikhak utawh Jerusalem ah kasawl ding hi.
Hinanleh kei zong kapai aphatmoh leh, keitoh jawk in apai ding hi.
Mesidonia gam totsuak sawm ka hihman in, Mesidonia gam ka totsuak khit chiangin na kiang uah kungpai ding hi.
Tualeh kapai nang khat peuh a nou nung khak theihna ding un na kiang uah tomkhat, ahihkeileh phalbi sungteng katam maithei hi.
Ajiak jinkawm a lampi a hung muh malam ka utkei a, hinanleh Toupa`n lem asak leh na kiang ua sawtdeuh tam ka kinem hi.
Hinanleh pentikos dongin Ephesa khua ah katam ding hi.
Ajiak kot lianpi leh phatuamtak kei dingin aki hong a, doudaltu zong tampi a om uhi.
Tualeh Timothi a hungpai leh laulou a na kiang ua a omtheih nang ngaihtuah un, ajiak kei bangin aman zong Toupa nna asem hi.
Tuajiakin, kuaman simmoh kei uhen, hinanleh ka kiang a ahung paitheih nang in hoihtak in khajaw un, ajiak unaute tawh ka kiang a a hungpai uh ka kinem hi.
Unaupa Apollo thu ahihleh unaute tawh na kiang ua hungpai dingin ka ngen a, hinanleh tu leh tu a hungpai ding a utkei a, hinanleh hun lemtang aneih chiangin ahung pai ding hi.
Kiveng unla, ginna ah dingkip un, hangsan unla, hattak in om un.
Na silbawl jousiah uh itna a bawl hihen.
Unaute aw, Stephena leh a innkuan pihte Akhaia gam a Pasian thu a gah masa pen ahi ua, misiangthoute nna sepsak dingin akipia uh chih nathei uhi,
huachibangte kiangah leh michih koutawh hua nna semgimte kiangah ki tuhlut ding in kung ngen hi.
Stephena leh Forchunata leh Akhaika ahung pai uh ka kipak hi, ajiak nou omlouh awng ahu uhi.
Ajiak amau`n nou leh kei kha ahung hihhalhsak uhi. Tuajiakin huachibang mite theisiam un.
Asia gam a saptuamte`n chibai a hungbuk uhi, Prisila leh Akuila in a inn ua saptuam kikhawmte tawh Toupa ah chibai hoihtak a hungbuk uhi.
Unaute jousiahin chibai a hungbuk uhi.
Kitawp siangthou in khat leh khat chibai kibuk tuah un.
Keimah Paul in keima khut ngei a chibai kung bukna ahi.
Mi kuapeuh in Toupa Jesu a it kei leh hamsia thuak in om hen! (anathema)
I Toupa, hung pai! (Maran-atha)
I Toupa hehpihna na kiang uah om hen.
Krist Jesu a kung itna na kiang uah om hen. Amen.
Paul, Pasian deihlam a Jesu Krist sawltak leh, i naupa uh Timothi in—-
Korin khua a om Pasian saptuamte leh, Akhaia gam pumpi a misiangthoute jousiah kiang ah:
Pasian I Pa uh leh I Toupa Jesu Krist kiang a kipan hehpihna leh khamuanna na kiang uah om hen.
Pasian I Toupa uh Jesu Krist Pa, zahngaihna Pa leh khamuanna jousiah Pasian pahtawi in om hen!
Pasian in kou ahung khamuanna huamah tawh kou zong haksatna khatpeuh a omte ka khamuan theihna ding un, aman ka thuakgimna jousiah uah ahung khamuan jel hi.
Ajiak Krist thuakgimnate ka tung ua adimlet bang in, Krist jiak a ka kihehnepna uh zong adimlet hi.

Tuin thuakgimna a ka om un hiam, ahihkeileh lungmuan a ka om un hiam in zong, hihpen nou hehnepna ding leh hundamna ding ahi a, huapen thuakgimna ka thuak bang uh na thuakzohna ding uh ahi. Ahihkeileh, khamuan a ka om un zong hihpen nou a ding a hehnepna ding leh hundam a na omna ding uh ahi.
Tualeh nou gimthuakna tangtute nahih bang un, hehnepna tangtute na hi uh chih theiin kung kineppihna uh adet hi.
Ajiak unaute aw, Asia gam a thuakgimna ka tung ua hungtung pen na theihlouh uh ka deihkei uhi, tuachia hin zong kinem jou nawnlou khop in nasiatak a thuakzoh guallouh a bawlsiat in ka om uhi.
Ahi, sihna thupukna muta in ka ki ngaihsun ua, hinanleh koumah kimuang jawlou a misite kaithoupa Pasian ka muang jawkna ding uh ahi.
Aman sihna mulkimhuai lak a pat ahung hunkhiata a, tualeh ahung hunjing a, tualeh ahung hun nalai ding hi chi`n amah ah ka kinem uhi,
mi tampi a pat a silpiak ka muh jiak ua mi tampi`n kou a ding a kipahthu agen theihna ding un, nou zong kou a dingin thumna in nung na panpih uhi.

Ajiak kou kasuan uh ahihleh hih ahi, ka sia leh pha theihna uh hung theihpih, siangthouna leh Pasian dikna nei in, taksa pilna a hilou in, Pasian hehpihna a hijaw in, leitung ah, adiak in noulam kung nga uhi.
Ajiak, na sim ua, thei zong natheih uh, tualou ngal na kiang uah thudang bangmah ka gelhkei uhi, tualeh atawp dong a na theihjing uh ka kinem uhi.
Toupa Jesu ni chiang a nou ka kisuanpihte nung hihding uh bang a, kou zong nou kisuanpihte kung hih ding uh chih theihna kichian nung neih bang un.
Tualeh hih gintatna neiin, phattuamna anihveina naneih theihna ding un, na kiang uah hungpai masak katum hi.
Tualeh nou hung tawn malam in Mesidonia gam a paisuak in, tualeh Mesidonia gam a pat na kiang ua hung paikik in, tualeh nou Judea gam lam a kapai nang ah hung panpih le uchin ka chi hi.
Tuajiakin, huachibang a ka ngaihsut laiin, bangmah thek louin ka ngaihtuah maw leh? Ahihkeileh ka lungsim a ka silguatte pen taksa thu bang a, “Ahihleh hi,” tualeh “Ahihkeileh hilou,” chi kadiai leh?
Hinanleh Pasian a thutak bang in, noulam a ka thu uh pen, “Ahi,” chih leh, “Hilou,” chih ahi kei hi.
Ajiak nalak ua kou, keimah ngei leh Sila leh Timothi in athu ka gen uh, Pasian Tapa, Jesu Krist pen, ahihleh “Hilou,” chih ahi kei a, amah pen “Ahi,” chih ahijaw hi.
Ajiak Pasian thuchiam jousiah pen amah ah “Ahi,” chih ahi a. Tualeh koujiak a, Pasian thupina dingin amah ah “Amen,” ahi hi.
Tuin Krist a noutawh hung hihkiptu leh kou sathau hung nuhtu Pasian ahi,
aman chiam zong ahung chiamtehta a, tualeh i lungtang uah khamna kha zong ahung piata hi.
Tuathamlou in, ka hinna theihpihtu dingin Pasian ka sam ahi: Korin khua ah hung painawnlou ding ka hi chih thei un.
Na ginna tung ua thu hung neihkhum hilou in; hinanleh, na kipakna uh panpihtu ka hijaw hi, ajiak ginna in na dingdet uh hi.
Hinanleh tubansiah lungkham kawm a na kiang ua hung paikik nawnlou ding chih keimah thu in katum hi.
Ajiak ken nou hung hih lungkham leng, ka hih lungkhamte chihlouh kuan ahia kei hung kipaksak ding?

Tualeh na kiang uah hihthu mah ahi kung gelh, atuachih keileh kungpai chiang in ka kipakna dingte lak ah lungkhamna kamujaw kha ding hi, ka kipakna pen na un ua na kipakna uh hi dingin kung gintat jiak in.
Ajiak pen buaina leh lungkhamna nasiatak a pat mittui tampi tawh kung gelh ahi, suk lungkham a na om louhna ding ua, hinanleh natung ua itna tamtak kanei hi chih na theihna ding un kagelh jaw hi.
Hinanleh mi kuapeuh in lungkhamna abawl leh, keiguak ahung suk lungkham ahi kei a, (Ka hihtakluat louhna dingin na un un ahung hih lungkhamsak giap ahijaw hi.)
Huachibang mi a dingin pen mi tamjawten apiak uh hih gawtna ahunta hi.
Tuachi`n na ngaihdam ding ua, na khamuan jawk ding uh ahi, atuachih keileh huachibang mi pen alungkham sengseng na in avalhjou kha ding hi.
Tuajiakin amah lam a na itna uh hihkip dingin kung ngen hi.
Hihjiak mah in zong sil bangkim a thu na man uleh na manlouh uh theihna dingin ka gelh ahi.
Sil khatpeuh a mi na ngaihdam uh tuh ken zong ka ngaihdam hi, ajiak sil khatpeuh a ka ngaihdam leh, hih ka ngaihdamna mi pen noujiak in Krist ah ka ngaidamta hi.
Atuachih keileh setan in ei ah hun lemtang amukha ding, ajiak a lungtupte i manghilh kei uhi.
Tuaban ah Troas khua a Krist tangthupha gending a kung pailai in Pasian in kei a dingin kot khat ahung hawnsak a.
Hinanleh ka unaupa Tita ka muhlouh jiakin kakha atawldam theikei a, hinanleh amauhte khakhia in, hua a pat in Mesidonia gam ah kapaita hi.
Tuin Krist a gualzohna hung piajingtu leh, kou zang a munchin a amah theihjingna gimnamtui thehjaktu Pasian kiang ah kipahthu om hen!
Ajiak hundam a omte leh mangthangte lak ah Pasian a ding in Krist gimnamtui ka hi uhi.
Lawikhat kiangah sihna ding a sihna gimnamtui ka hi ua, tualeh adang kiangah hinna ding a hinna gimnamtui ka hi uhi.
Ajiak mi tampi`n Pasian thu a mi khem a dangka jonna a azak bang un kou ka zangkei uhi, tuasangsik in chihtak tak in Pasian a bangin Krist ah Pasian mitmuh in thu ka genjaw uhi.
Koumah leh koumah kigen phat kik ka hi uh maw leh? Ahihkeileh kou midangte bangin na kiang uah, ahihkeileh, nou a pat gen phatna laikhak pawimoh ka hi uh maw leh?
Noupen ka laikhak uh, ka lungtang ua gelh, mi jousiah theih leh sim na hi uhi.
Krist laikhak, kou gelh, laitui agelh hilou a, Pasian hing kha a gelh, suangpek agelh hilou a, taksa lungtang pek a gelh na hi uh chih chiantak a suklat na hi uhi.
Tualeh huachibang muanna Krist jiakin Pasian lam ah ka nei uhi.
Bang ahiam silkhat kou a pat ahi chi dingin kou guakin kachin kei uhi;
aman kou Thukhunthak nna semthei dingin ahung bawl a, laimal a hilou in, hinanleh kha a nasem dingin ahijaw, ajiak laimal in athat a, hinanleh kha in hinna apia hi.
Hinanleh hihbei a om ding thupina a hihthupi a aom jiak a Israeltate`n Mosi maitang tangtak a en theilou khop a sihna nasepna suangpek a sut a gelh bawn athupi leh,
kha nasepna pen bangding a thupijawk dah ding ahia!
Ajiak, siamlouh tansakna nasep bawn athupi leh, diktatna nasep pen nasatak in athupi jaw ding hi!
Ajiak, thupina om masa pen thupina nasajaw in a khupkhel jiakin hihlam thu ah thupina anei nawn kei hi.
Ajiak, sukmang a om bawn athupi leh a omjing pen bangzahta in a thupijaw tazen diai!
Tuajiakin huachibang kinepna kaneih jiak un, hangsan tak a thugen ngamna kanei uhi.
Tualeh avakna kiam hiai hiai atawptan a Israeltate`n a et gige theihlouhna ding ua, amai puan a khuh Mosi bang ka hi kei uhi.
Hinanleh a lungsim uh hihmial in a om a, ajiak tuhun tan in Thukhunlui asim chiang un hua maikhuhna pen hawkkhiat louh in a omjing a, hua maikhuhna pen Krist ah hihbei in a omta hi.
Hinanleh tunitan pha in Mosi laibu asim chiang un a lungtang uah mai khuhna pen a om nalai hi.
Hitalehzong Toupa lam a akihei hun hun chiang un hua maikhuhna lakmang ahita ding hi.
Tualeh, “Toupa pen,” kha ahi a; Toupa kha omna teng ah zalenna a om hi.
Hinanleh eipen i un un, mai khuhlou in, limlang a muh bang in Toupa thupina pen enjing in, huatawh kibang a om dingin Toupa kha in thupina a pat thupina ah ahung hih lamdangta hi.
Tuajiakin, hehpihna ka muh bang ua hih nasepna katan jiak un, ka lungkia kei uhi.

Hinanleh sil jumhuai kiphualte ka tawpsan ta ua, zulhjauna a hilou in, ahihkeileh, Pasian thu mikhemna a zanglou in. Hinanleh thutak hihlatna a zangjaw in, Pasian mitmuh ah michih sia leh pha theihna ka hihtungjaw uhi.
Hinanleh ka tangthupha uh phual a aom leh mangthangte kiangah ahi phual a a om.
Pasian mel bakpih Krist tangthupha thupina vak in amauh asalhvak theihlouhna dingin, huate ah hih leitung pasian in agingta loute lungsim ahihmial sakta hi.
Ajiak kou leh kou ka kigen thang kei ua, hinanleh Krist Jesu hih Toupa ahi chih leh, koupen na sila uh ka hi uh chih ka gen jaw uhi.
Ajiak, Jesu Krist mel a Pasian thupina theihna vak hungpia dingin, miallak a kipan a vak hung vakkhia ding a thupiatu Pasian in ka lungtang uh asalhvakta hi.
Hinanleh sil bawltheihna thupina pen kou a pat hilou a, Pasian a pat ahihjawk theihna dingin hua gou pen leibel ah kakem uhi.
Ka kimkawt uah nehgawp in ka om ua, hilehzong sukguai in ka om naikei uhi, lungkham in ka om ua, hinanleh ka lungkia kei uhi;
gawt in ka om ua, hinanleh taisan in ka om kei uh, satgawp in ka om ua, hinanleh hihsiat in ka om naikei uhi.
Jesu hinna ka pumpi ua hihlat a a omtheihna dingin, bangchiklai peuhin Jesu sihna kapua kawikawi uhi.
Ajiak pen Jesu hinna zong ka pumpi uh sithei a hihlat a a omtheihna dingin, kou ahing nalaite pen bangchiklai peuhin Jesu jiak a si dingin piakkhiat in ka om uhi.
Tuachi`n kou ah sihna in asem a, hinanleh nou ah hinna in asem hi.
“Ka gingta a, tuachi`n ka gen ta hi,” chih gelh bangin. Hua ginna kha mah nei in, kou zong ka gingta ua, tuajiakin ka gen uh ahi.
Ajiak Toupa Jesu kaithou kikpa in, kou zong Jesu tawh ahung kaithou ding a, noutawh amai ah ahung tutding hi, chih ka thei uhi.
Ajiak Pasian thupina ding a mi tampite kipahthu gen jiak a hehpihna akhansem theihna dingin sil jousiah nouding jiak a omsiang ahi.
Tuajiakin ka lungkia kei uh, hinanleh ka pualam mihing uh kiam hiaihiai nanleh, ka sunglam mihing uh niteng a hihhalh in a omjing hi.
Ajiak tomnoukhat sung ka gimthuakna uh jangnoukhat in tangtawn thupina giktak thupi jawsem in ahung bawlsak hi.
Sil muhtheihte enlou in, hinanleh sil muhtheihlouhte ka enjaw uhi, ajiak sil muhtheihte tomnoukhat sung a ding ahi a, hinanleh sil muhtheihlouhte pen tangtawn a ding ahijaw hi.
Ajiak hih puanbuk, ilei inn uh suksiat in om nanleh khut a lam hilou, Pasian lamsa tangtawn inn det van ah inei uh chih ithei uhi.
Ajiak pen van a kipan a i inn ding uh silhsak a om ut mahmah in hihsan ah ithum jing uhi.
Tuachibang a silhsak a i om leh saguak in i om nawn kei ding uhi.
Ajiak ei puanbuk a omte pen puakgik pua in ithum jing uh, silhlou a i omna ding uh hilou in, sithei pen hinna valhzoh a a omtheihna ding a silhsak a i om ut jiak uh ahijaw hi.
Tuin hihbang ding a hung siamtu Pasian ahi a, khamna kha hung piatu zong ahi hi.
Tuajiakin pumpi inn a i om laisiah uh, Toupa kiang a omlou ihi uh chih thei in, bangchiklai peuh in muangtak in i om uhi.
Ajiak muthei a pai hilou in, ginna in ipaijaw uhi.
Muangtak in i om uh, ahi, pumpi a omlou a Toupa kiang a om i utjaw uhi.
Tuajiakin, om in om takeilei zong amah kipahpih lam i hihtheihna ding uh itum uhi.
Ajiak michih in pumpi a asilbawlte asia apha, abawl bangbang a amuhtheihna dingin Krist vaihawmna touna mai ah i un un hihlat in i om ding uhi.
Tuajiakin Toupa lauhuaidan thei in mite kajawl teitei uhi, hinanleh Pasian kiangah hihlat in ka om ua, tualeh na sia leh pha theihna ua hihlat a ka om uh zong ka kinem uhi.
Ajiak na kiang uah hung kigen phat utkik ka hikei a, lungsung lam a hilou a apualam a kisuangte na dawnna ding uh banghiam na neihtheihna ding un, koulam a kisuanna hung bawlsak in ka gen jaw hi.
Ajiak kamot uleh Pasian a dingin ahi a, kapil uleh nou a dingin ahi hi.
Krist itna in ahung sawl teitei hi, ajiak hichi`n ka ngaihtuah uhi, mi jousiah sihtang a mikhat asih leh mi jousiah si ahita hi.
Tualeh ahingte zong amauh a ding a hing hinawnlou in, hinanleh asih tanga si a, tualeh thoukikpa ding a, ahihzokna ding, amah pen mi jousiah a dingin asi hi.
Tuajiakin, tu a pat in taksa lam a, kuamah kathei nawn kei uhi, ahi, taksa dan in Krist nathei mahle ung, tuin kathei nawn kei uhi.
Tuajiakin, mi kuapeuh Krist a aom leh, silsiamthak ahita hi, silluite abeita a, ngaiun, sil jousiah ahung thaksiangta hi.
Tualeh sil jousiah Pasian a kipan ahi a, aman Jesu Krist in amah tawh kilem in a hungbawl a, tualeh ka kiang uah kilepna nasep a hungpia hi.
Tuachi`n Pasian pen Krist a om in, leitung amah tawh kilem in abawl a, akhialhnate uh khialhna a simsaklou in, ka kiang uah kilepna thu ahung kemsakta hi.
Tuajiakin, koupen, Krist palaite ka hi ua, Pasian in kou zang a nou a hungnget bang in, Pasian tawh kilem un, chi`n Krist tang in kung ngen uhi!
Ajiak amah ah Pasian diktatna ihung hihtheihna dingin, khialhna mawng mawng theilou amah pen Pasian in eite jiakin khial in abawlta hi.
Tuachi`n kou amah tawh semkhawmte hi in zong, Pasian hehpihna phattuampih lou a, bangmahlou na suahsak louhna ding un kung ngen uhi.
Ajiak aman:
“Hun kipahhuai ah,
kung ngaikhia a;
hundamna ni ah,
kung panpih hi.”
Ngaiun! tu hun kipahhuai ahi a; tu hundamna ni ahi, achi hi.
Ka nasep uh dem a a omlouhna dingin sil bangmah ah hehna ding ka bawl kei uhi.
Hinanleh Pasian nasemte ka hi uh chih sil jousiah ah ka chiansak ua, thuaktheihna ah, haksatna ah, taksapna ah, lungkhamna ah.
Jepna ah, thong tangna ah, buaina ah, sepgimna ah, ihmutmohna ah, an ngawlna ah.
Siangthouna in, theihna in, thuaktheihna in, lungnemna in, Khasiangthou in, itna diktak in,
thutak thu in, Pasian sil bawltheihna in, jiat leh vei a diktatna galvan in.
Zahbawl leh zahbawl louhna in, gensiatna leh genphatna in, mikhemtute bang in, hitalehzong midiktat hi-ngal in;
theihphaklouh bang in, hitalehzong hoihtak a theih hi-ngal in, si ding bang in ngaiun, ka hing uhi, vuakgawp bang in, thahjaw hilou in;
lungkhamtak bangin, hitalehzong kipak jing ngal in, mijawng bang in, hitalehzong mi tampi hausasak ngal in, bangmah neilou bangin, hitalehzong sil tampi neingal in.
Aw Korinmite! na kiang uah kakam uh ka kak ua, ka lungtang uh ka hong lian uhi.
Kou itna kham a om na hikei ua, na lungsim ua nouma itna in ahung kham na hijaw uhi.
Tualeh kou hung piak bang nung piak theihna ding un, tate kiang a thugen bang in ka gen uhi. Na lungsim uh honglian un, chi in.
Gingloute tawh kituakloupi in hakkol puakhawm kei un. Ajiak diktatna leh diktatlouhna in bang ki thuahkhawm na anei a? Tualeh vak leh mial in bang ki pawlkhawm na anei a?
Tualeh Krist leh Belial in bang kituahna anei ua? Ahihkeileh gingtu leh gingloumi in bang tankhawm anei ua?
Tualeh Pasian tempul leh milimte`n bang kilemna anei ua? Ajiak pen nou Pasian hing tempul na hi uhi!
“Pasian in amau uah ka teng ding a
amau uah kavak ding a;
amauh Pasian ka hi ding a,
tualeh amauh ka mite ahi ding uh,”
Pasian in achi hi.
Tuajiakin,
“Amauh a pat in hung pawtkhia unla
atuam in om un.
Sil sianglou khoih kei un,
tuachi`n kungpom thei ding a.
Na pa uh ka hiding a,
tualeh nou ka tapate ka tanute na hi ding uh,
Toupa hat tungnung in achi hi.”
Tuajiakin unau ittakte aw, hih thuchiamte ineih jiak un, Pasian launa a siangthouna hihbukim in, taksa leh kha bawlhoihna jousiah a pat iki hihsiang ding uhi.
Koulam ah na lungsim uh hong un, kuamah diklou in ka bawl kei ua, kuamah ka hihsia kei ua, kuamah ka khembawl kei uhi.
Nou siamlouh tansakna ding a hih ka gen ahi kei, isihleh sikhawm a, ihinleh hingkhawm dingin ka lungtang uah nateng uh chih tu-ma in kung genta hi.
Noulam ah ka hamngam dan athupi a, nou jiak a ka kisuan dan athupi hi! Lungmuanna in kadim ua, ka thuakgimna jousiah uah ka kipak mahmah uhi.
Ajiak Mesidonia gam ka hungtun nasan un, ka taksa un tawlngakna anei kei a, alang alang ah tokbuai in ka omjaw uhi. A pualam ah kihaunate a om a, asunglam ah launate aom hi.
Hitalehzong pampaih a omte khamuantu Pasian in Tita hung paina in ahung khamuanta hi.

Tualeh amah hungpaina guak hilou in, hinanleh aman nou a khamuanna aneih dan, nou kei nung ngaihdan uh, nung khasiatpih dan uh, kei ding a na phattuamngaih dan uh a hunghilh takin ahung khamuang sakta hi.

Ajiak ken, ka laikhak in nou hung hih lungkhamsak tamahleng zong ka kisik kei hi, na kisik tamah nanleng zong, ajiak hua laikhak mah in nou tomnou khat sung bek hinanleh ahung hih lungkham chih ka thei hi.

Tuin ahihleh ka kipak hi, hihlungkham a na om jiak un hilou in, kisikna ding a na lungkham jiak un ahijaw, ajiak nou koujiak a siatna bangmah natan louhna ding ua Pasian deihlam bang a hihlungkham a om na hi uhi.
Ajiak Pasian deihlam bang a lungkhamna in lungsim khekna leh hundamna lam ah ahung pui a, hua ah kisikna a om kei hi.

Ajiak ngaiun, Pasian deihlam bang a hih na lungkhamna uh ngeiin bangzahta a nou a ding a pilvanna hung bawlsak ata! Noumau ki hihsiangnate, hehnate, launate, lunggulhnate, phattuam ngaihnate, phuba lak utnate, hih silte jousiah ah nasiang uh chih na muchianta uhi.

Tuajiakin, na kiang uah gelh nanleng zong, adiklou bawlpa jiak a gelh ka hikei a, diklou tak a athuakpa jiak a zong kagelh ahi tuan kei a, ka tung ua na phattuamngaih dan uh Pasian mitmuh a na kiang ua hihlat a a omtheihna ding a kagelh ahijaw hi.
Tuajiakin, na khamuanna uah ka khamuangta uhi.
Ahi, Tita kipakna jiakin ka kipak tungtuang uhi, na un ua alungsim na suk-halhsak jiak un!
Ajiak akiang ah banghiam a hung suanna nei taleng zong, kajum kei hi, hinanleh thutak a sil jousiah na kiang ua ka gen bang un, Tita mai a kungsuanna zong thutak ahi mawng hi.
Tualeh nou na un ua na thuman dante uh, lau leh lingkawm a amah na kipahpih dante uh agelkhiat chiangin, alungsung a nou ahung itna alian semsem hi.
Tuajiakin, sil jousiah a natung ua muanna kaneih jiakin ka kipak hi!
Tuate ban ah unaute aw, Mesidonia gam a saptuamte tung a Pasian hehpihna piak a om pen kung theihsak ding hi.
Tuachia haksatna a etkhiatna thupitak a etkhiat a aom ua zong a kipak mahmahna uh leh azawn mahmah na uh asilphalna uh ahung hihdan bang.
Ajiak ahihzoh bang un, ahi, ahihzoh sang ua thupijaw in amau`n phaltak in apia uhi, chih ka theihpih hi.
Hua silpiak sansak dingin leh misiangthoute nna sepna a azauh theihna ding un ka kiang uah ahung ngen ngut ngut uhi.
Tualeh hihpen ka kinep bang ua hilou in! Hinanleh Pasian deihlam in amauh mahmah Toupa kiang leh kou kiangah a kipia masa phot uhi.
Tuachi`n tu masang a apatsa, hua hehpihna pen nalak ua semjou dingin Tita ka kun uhi.
Hinanleh sil bangkim a, ginna ah, thugenna ah, theihna ah, na phattuam ngaihna jousiah uah, tualeh kou nung itna uh na hauhdan bang uh, hih hehpihna ah zong nahauhna ding uh ngaihtuah un.
Thupiak bang in ka gen kei a, midangte phattuam ngaihna in, na itna uh a kitakna etkhiatna in ka gen ahijaw hi.
Ajiak, i Toupa uh Jesu Krist hehpihna pen nathei uhi, a gentheihna jiak a nung hauhsat theihna ding un, amah pen hausa nanleh nou jiakin ajawng in ahung kibawl ahijaw hi.
Tualeh hih ah kung hasot hi, ajiak hihpen nou a dingin ahoih hi, kumkhat masang a bawl pankhin nahita ua, napat khit guak uh hilou in, phattuamngaih zong na ut uhi.
Hinanleh utding a mansa a na om bang un! Na neih bang jel ua tangtunna zong a omtheihna dingin tu in sem tangtungta un.
Ajiak utna lungsim a om phot leh, mi aneihlouh dan dungjui a hilou in, aneihdan dungjui a pomsak ahi.
Ajiak midang gimlou a nou nagim nang uh kachihna ahi kei hi.

Hinanleh tu leh tu a naneihval uh pen amauh taksap awng hukna ahung hih a, amauh neihval zong nou taksap awng hukna ahung hihtheihna dingin kibakgual chiatna dingin kachi ahijaw hi. Tuachi`n kibakgual chiatna ahung om ding hi.
“A khawmtam in aval in aneituan kei a, a khawmtawm in zong, atasam tuan kei,” chih gelh bang in.
Hinanleh natung ua huachibang phattuam ngaihna Tita lungtang a omsaktu Pasian kiangah kipahthu om hen!
Ajiak kou ngetna jiak guak hilou in, hinanleh amah phattuam ngaihna mawng a, ama utthu a na kiang ua hung pai ahi.
Tualeh amah tawh tangthupha lam a ahoihna thu saptuam pawl jousiah a kithang unaupa pen kung sawl uhi.
Tualeh hihguak zong hilou in, hinanleh Toupa thupina ding leh panpih ka utdan uh etsakna-a a-nna kasep uh, hih hehpihna thu a kou tawh jinkhawm jel ding a saptuamte`n atel mawng uh ahi.
Kiphaltak a kipia hih silte ka hawmna uah dembang a ka omlouhna ding un pilvangtak in ka sem uhi.
Toupa mitmuh guak a hilou in, mihing mitmuh ah zong sil kilawm ka ngaihtuah uhi.
Tualeh amauh tawh i unaupa uh kasawl ua, amah pen sil tampi a a phattuamngaih dan ka theichianta ua, hinanleh tu takngel in natung ua taksanna liantak aneih jiakin phatuam angaijaw sem hi.
Tita tungtang thu ahihleh, amah pen noulam thu ah kalawi leh ka naseppih ahi, tualeh i unaute uh ahihleh saptuam pawlte thu puatu leh Krist thupina ahi uhi.
Tuajiakin, amauh pawl leh saptuam pawlte mai ah na itna uh theihchianna leh nou kung suanna uh ensak un.
Tuin misiangthoute ding a nasepna lam thu pen na kiang ua kung gelh angai kei hi.

Ajiak na panpih utnate uh ka thei a, Hua thu ah, “Akhaia gam, kipanpihna kumkhat ahita,” chi`n Mesidonia gam a mite kiangah kung kisuanpih mahmah a. Tualeh na phattuam ngaihna un mi tampite atawkthou hi.
Hilehzong hichilam thu ah nou kung suanna athawn ahih louhna dingin unaute kungsawl hi. Kagen bang a kimansa a na omtheihna ding un.
Atuachih keileh Mesidonia gam a mite ka kiangah hungpai in, nou kiman nailou in hungmu tale uh, kou—-nou kung chi kei—-nou pen hung taksan a kung suanna lam uah ka mualphou kha ding uhi!
Tuajiakin masang a na chiamsa uh silpiak pen itkawm kawm a hilou a, phaltak a piajaw a, mansa diam a na koihna ding un, ahunma a na kiang ua unaute hungpai masa ding a hasot ngaiin ka ngaihtuah hi.
Hinanleh hih ka gen ahi, athehtawm in a attawm ding a, hinanleh athehtam in a attam ding hi.
Michih in a lungtang a atup bang bang in pia hen, it kawm kawm a, ahihkeileh piaklouh theihlouh a ngaia pialou in, ajiak Pasian in kipaktak a piate a it hi.
Tualeh Pasian in hehpihna jousiah natung uah ahung vukthei hi, tuachia nou bangchiklai peuhin silhoih jousiah a bukim a omjing in, nasep hoih jousiah na semthei ding uhi.
Laisiangthou a,
“Athehjak a migentheite kiangah apia a;
adiktatna uh tangtawn in a omjing hi,”
chih gelh bang in.
Tualeh athehpa kiang a khaichi piapa in nanek ding uh tanghou ahung pia a, na khaichi theh uh apungsak a, tualeh na diktatna gah uh zong apungsak hi.
Silphal ding a bangkim a hihhauhsat a om in, hua in koujiak in Pasian kiangah kipahthu genna a omsak hi.
Ajiak hih nasepna in misiangthoute taksap awng ahuksak guak hilou in, Pasian kiang a kipahthu genna tampi a luanglutsak hi.
Hih nasepna a pat Krist tangthupha nuaia na kituhlutna uh leh amauh leh midang jousiah kiang a na silphal dan uh kitak jiakin amau`n Pasian apahtawi uhi.
Tualeh amauh un zong nou a ding a ahung thumsakna in, natung ua Pasian hehpihna thupitak jiakin nou ahung ngai mahmah uhi.
Asil thawnpiak simsenglouh jiakin Pasian kiangah kipahthu om hen!
Tuin nalak ua ki ngiamkhiat tak a om a, na omlouh ua noulam a hahkat keimah Paul in, Krist hoihna leh nunnemna in kung ngen hi.
Hinanleh taksa lam a om hi a kou hung ngaihtuah khenkhatte tung a gumtat ding ahi chia ka ngaihtuah pen, huachi a ka gumtat louhna dingin kung ngen hi.
Ajiak taksa in om nanle ung zong taksa dou in kadou kei uhi.
Ajiak pen ka galdouna uh galvan pen taksa ahi kei a, kulhpi dettak hihchipna ding a Pasian jal a sil bawltheihna pen ahijaw hi.
Suangtuahnate leh Pasian theihna kalh a thupitak a kibawl silsang chintengte paikhia in, ngaihtuahna chinteng Krist thumanna nuaia pui in.
Tualeh na thumanna uh hih bukim ahih chiang a, thumanglou jousiah phuba lading a kimansa a om in.
Nou sil apualam a kilatdan a en nahi uh maw leh? Mi kuapeuh in Krist-a hi-a amah leh amah akitheih a ahihleh, hihpen aman ngaihtuah kik hen, amah Krist a ahih bangin kou zong Krist a ka hi uhi.
Ajiak, nou suksiatna ding hilou in, bawlhoih jawkna ding a Pasian hung piak ka thuneihna uh pen hahsuan in suang nanle ung zong ka jum kei ding uhi.
Laikhak a nou hung hihlau sawm bang a ka kilatlouhna ding in.
Ajiak amau`n, “Alaikhakte agik in, ahat a, hinanleh amun ah ataksa ajawngkhal a, a thugen zong ahawmthawh huai!” achi uhi.
Tuachibang mi in hih ngaihtuah hen, na kiang ua ka omlouh lai ua laikhak a ka om bang un, na kiang ua ka om chiang un zong sil bawl in ka om uhi.

Ajiak kou pen amauh lak ah ka kisimtel ngam kei ua, ahihkeileh amauh tawh zong ka kitehkak ngam kei uhi. Hinanleh amauh pen amauh leh amauh kiteh in, amauh leh amauh kitehkak in lungsim neilou in a om uhi!
Ahihhang in kou ka hih uleh pen kateh hunval un ka ki uangsak kei ding uhi, hinanleh Pasian hung hawmsak nou zong huap ding a tehna tuabang jel in ka uang jaw ding uhi.
Thuneitu in nou kiang a ahihlet louh mah bangin, nou khupkhel in ka ki hihlian kei uhi, ajiak pen Krist tangthupha gen in noukiang tanpha in kungpai uhi.
Ka tehna val uh sil, chih pen midangte sepsa a kisuang ka hi kei ua, hinanleh na ginna uh akhan chiangin leh, ka uapchiang bang jel un noujiak in nakpitak a hihlet in ka om ding uh chih ka kinem uhi.
Tuachi`n nagam kal lam uh tanpha ah tangthupha gen dingin, tualeh ka khut ua ka bawlsa silte thu-a midangte bialsung a kisuanglou ding in.
“Hinanleh akisuang taphot Toupa ah kisuang hen.”
Ajiak amah kiphat pen pahtat in a om ngaikei a, Toupa`n aphat pen hihhoih ahijaw hi.
Neukhat ka mothuai deuhnate ah nung thuaktheih uh ka deih hi. Tualeh thuakzong nung thuakthei uhi!
Ajiak Pasian thangsiatna in natung uah ka thangsia hi, ajiak Krist kiang a nungak siangthou bang a kung piaktheihna dingin, na pasal ding uh khat kung khamsak hi.
Hinanleh gul in ajuaupil a Evi akhem bangin Krist a kitakna leh siangthouna a pat bangchidan hiam khat in na lungsim uh hihsiat in a om kha ding hi.
Ajiak ahung paipen in, ka gen ngailouh uh Jesu dang agen a, na muh ngailouh uh kha dang na muh ua, ahihkeileh napom ngailouh uh tangthupha dang na pom ua ahihleh, a mah pen na ngaisiam uh ahi hi!
Ajiak, “sawltak” lian penpenpa sang a zong themkhat bek a neujaw in zong ka kingaihtuah kei hi!
Hinanleh thugen ah kamsiam lou hinanleng zong theihna lam ah ka huachi kei hi, hinanleh sil bangkim ah nalak uah hihlat in ka om hi.
Na kiang ua Pasian tangthupha athawn a ka gen a, tawisang a na omtheihna ding ua, ka kingiamkhiat in sil bawlkhial ka hi maw leh?
Nou nna kung bawlsak theihna dingin, amauh ua pat thaman la in saptuam pawl dangte aneih uh ka laksak hi.

Tualeh na kiang ua ka omlai a ka taksap in, kuamah kung hihbuai kei hi, ajiak Mesidonia gam a pat hungpai unaute`n ka taksap awng ahung huksak uhi. Tualeh sil bangkim ah nou hihbuailou dingin ka kibawl a, huachi bangin ka kibawl jel ding hi!
Krist thutak keimah a aom jiakin, Akhaia gamsung a hih kasuanna pen kuaman ahung hihtawp kei ding hi.
Bang jiakin? Nou kung itlouh jiakin amaw leh? Pasian in athei hi!
Hinanleh lemtanna deihte lemtanna ka sattan theihna dingin, ka bawl pen ka bawljel ding hi, a kisuanna ua kou bang a ahung om theihlouhna ding un.
Ajiak huachibang mite pen Krist sawltak a kibawl tawm, nasemtu khemhatte, sawltak taklou ahi uhi.
Tualeh, hihpen alamdang kei hi! Ajiak setan zong vak sawltak in ana kibawl tawm hi!
Tuajiakin a nasemtute zong diktatna nasemtute in kibawl le uh huapen sil thupi ahikei hi, atawpna uh pen a nasep bang uh ahi ding hi.
Ka genkik ahi, kuaman mimaw in hung ngaihtuah kei hen, atuachihkei vanglakleh themkhat kei ka kisuan theihna dingin mimaw bangin hung pom un.
Ka thugen pen Toupa bangin ka gen kei a, hih kisaktheihna ah mot huaitak bangin ka gen jaw hi.
Mi tampi taksalam a akisuan uh ka muh jiakin, keizong ka kisuang ding hi.
Ajiak nou mipil na hi ua, mimawte kipahpihtak in na thuakzou jel uhi!
Ajiak mi`n sila in hungbawl le uh zong, hung negam le uh zong, sal in hung man nanle uh zong, amauh leh amauh kiliansak nanle uh zong, namai uh hung beng nanle uh zong, na thuakjou jel uhi.
Hua a dingin ahihleh hatloumah ka hi uhi, keimah kisit in ka gen hi!
Hinanleh midang hangsanna ah mimaw bangin ka gen a, keizong ka hangsan hi.
Hebraimi ahi uh maw? Kei zong ka hi. Israelte ahi uh maw? Kei zong ka hi, Abraham suante ahi uh maw? Kei zong ka hi.
Krist nasemtute ahi uh maw? Mimaw bangin ka gen ahi, kei zong ka hisem hi! Sepgimna bangah atamjawsem in, vuakna bang ah akan aval in, thong tanna ah himun sem in, sihna bang ah tamveipi.
Judate lak ah satna sawmli lak a khat kiam ngavei ka tuak a;
thumvei chiang a jep in ka om a, khatvei suang a den in ka om hi. Thumvei long siatna ka tuak a, jan khat leh sun khat tuipi lai ah tohmang in ka om hi.
Khualjinna ah tamveipi tuitung a lauhuaina ah, suamhatte lak a lauhuaina ah, ka chipihte lak a lauhuaina ah, gamdai a lauhuaina ah, tuipi a lauhuaina ah, unau takloute lak a lauhuaina ah.
Sepgimna leh haksatna ah, tamveipi ihmut louhna ah, gilkialna leh dangtakna ah, tamveipi anngawlna ah, khuadam thuakna leh guaktang a omna ah.
Hih silte chihlouh zong saptuam pawlte ka ngaihtuahna niteng a hung nenjing katung ah a om hi.
Kua hatlouhna ka hatlouhpih aom ei? Kua pukna ka thangpaih pih louh a om ei?
Kisuang ding ka hihleh ka hatlouhna lam silte ka suangjaw ding hi.
Pasian leh i Toupa uh Jesu Krist Pa, tangtawn a pahtawi a om in ka juaulouh athei hi.
Damaska ah kumpipa Areta nuai a gam uktupa in kei hung matsak tum in Damaskate khuapi aveng sak a.
Hinanleh kotta ah bawm in kulhbang ah ahung khaikhia suk ua, tuachi`n akhut a pat ka suakta ta hi.
Kei dingin ki awtsak phatuam kei nanleh, ka mangmuh leh Toupa kilakna kung genlai ding hi.
Kum sawmlehli ahita Krist a om mi khat kathei a (pumpi in ahia aom ka thei kei; pumpi lou in ahia a om ka thei kei—- Pasian in athei hi). Huachibang mi khat pen van thumna ah laktouh in aom a.
Tualeh huachibang mi khat ka thei a ( pumpi in ahia, ahihkeileh pumpilou in ahia aom, ka thei kei, Pasian in athei hi).
Amah paradis a laktouh a aom dan bang, tualeh mihing ding a genseng louh, gen guallouh thute avaja hi.
Huachibang mi pen kasuang ding hi, keimah ka hihleh, ka hatlouhna loungal kasuang kei ding hi.
Ajiak kisuang utnanleng, mimaw ka hi kei ding, thutak gen ka hihjiak in. Hinanleh mi kuahiam in ahung muh bang leh kathu ajak bang sang a ahung ngaih thupi louhna dingin ka kidek ding hi.
Tualeh kilaknate a thupi jiak a ka kingaihsang louhna ding in, setan sawltak a hungtum ding ling khat ka taksa ah ahung kipia hi, atuachih keileh ka kingaisang seng kha ding hi.
Kei a pat apaimang nangin, hih sil jiakin Toupa kiangah thumvei ka ngen a.

Tualeh aman ka kiangah, “Ka hehpihna nang a dingin ahun hi, ajiak ka hatna pen hatlouhna ah hih bukim in a om hi,” achi a. Tuajiakin, Krist sil bawltheihna katung a a omtheihna dingin, kipak takin ka hatlouhnate ka suangjaw hi.
Tuajiakin hatlouhnate ah, salhnate ah, taksapnate ah, vuaknate ah, haksatnate ah, Krist jiakin ka kipak hi, ajiak ka hatlouh huntak chiangin kahat hi.
Ki uangsakna jiakin mimaw ka suakta hi, nou huachilou theilou in nung bawl uhi, ajiak nung pahtawi jawk ding uh ka hi a, “sawltak” lianpenpa ka phaklahna bangmah a om kei hi.
Ataktak a sawltak hihna chiamteh nate ahihleh, kuhkalna chinteng, chiamtehnate, sillamdangte, silbawl thupite in nalak uah bawl ahi.
Ajiak kei mahmah in nou kung sukbuai chihlouh, banglam ah ahia saptuam dangte sang a ngiamjaw a na om uh? Hih bawlkhialhna hung ngaidam un!

Tuin na kiang ua hungpai ding a ka kisakkholhna athumveina ding ahi, kung hihbuai kei ding hi, ajiak na silneih uh jong ka hikei a, nou hung jong ka hijaw hi. Ajiak taten nu leh pa a ding a kholkhawm ding ahi kei a, nu leh pate`n tate a ding a kholkhawm ding ahijaw hi.
Tualeh ken nou a dingin kipaktak in ka jangbei ding a, nakha ua dingin ka jangbei ding hi, nou kei hung itmohsem nanle uchin zong, ken nou kung itjawsem hi.
Hinanleh ahi hi hitaleh, ken nou kung hihbuai kei hi, hinanleh zong lungsim siam a ze-khem a kung mat nahi uhi.
Na kiang ua kung sawlte lak a kuahiam khat zang in nou a pat punna ka bawlkha ei le?

Tita na kiang ua hungpai dingin kana deih ngut a, tualeh amah tawh unaupa khat kung sawl hi. Tita in nou a pat punna a bawlkha maw leh? Kha kibang in ka gamtang kha kei uh maw leh? Kalsuan kibang a pai hilou ka hi uh maw?
Na lak ua kou leh kou kingaihdam tuah ding a hung ngaihtuah nahi uh maw? Krist ah Pasian mai ah thu ka gen uh, hinanleh ittakte aw, sil jousiah nou hoihna dingin ka bawl uh hi.

Ajiak kungpai chiang a nou kung muh ding bang a kung muhlouh khak ding leh kei nung muh ding bang ua nung muhlouh khak ding uh kalau hi. Atuachih keileh kinialnate, kithangsiat nate, hehnate, kilangkhennate, kigensiatnate, kigukhounate, uanghamnate, tualeh buainate ahung om kha ding hi.

Tualeh kung paikik chiangin ka Pasian in nalak uah hung hih mualphou in, tu-masang a nakhialtasa, hinanleh sianlouhna leh kingaihna leh huknate ana bawlte uh a pat kisiklou mi tampite ka kahkhum kha ding hi.
Hihpen na kiang ua kungpai a thumveina ding ahi, “Theihpihtu nih leh thum thu jousiah hihkip in a om ding hi.”

Tuma in kung hilhta hi, anihveina a na kiang ua ka om lai a ka gen bang in, tu in na kiang ua omlou in, tu-ma lam a sil bawlsuahsate leh midang jousiah kiang ah kung ngen ahi, kung paikik leh ka khoi kei ding hi.
Nou, Krist, keimah a thugen pen theihchianna najon jiak un, amah noulam ah ahatmoh kei a, nalak uah silbawl theitak ahijaw hi.

Ajiak hatlouhna jiakin kilhden in om mahleh, Pasian silbawltheihna in ahingjing hi. Ajiak kou zong amah ah hatlou ka hi ua, hinanleh Pasian sil bawltheihna in nou lam ah amah tawh ka hingkhawm ding uhi.
Ginna ah na om na uh hiam chih noumah leh noumah ki enchian unla, noumah mimal ki enkhia un. Nou ah Jesu Krist a om chih noumah ngeiin ki theilou na hi uh maw? Deihlouh nahih kei ngal uleh.
Hinanleh koupen deihlouh ka hikei uh chih nathei ding uh chih ka gingta hi.

Tualeh sil gilou na bawllouhna ding un Pasian kiang ah ka ngen hi, huapen kou it-huai a ka kilattheih nang uh ahi kei a, nou, koupen deihlouh hitamah le ung zong, akilawm jousiah na bawltheihna ding uh ahijaw hi.
Ajiak thutak a ding chihlouh pen, thutak dou ding in bangmah ka bawlthei kei uhi.
Ajiak kou ka hatlouh ua, nou nahat chiang un ka kipak uhi, tualeh na hoih bukimna ding uh zong ka gen uhi.
Tuajiakin bawlsia ding hilou in bawl hoihjaw dingin Toupa hung piak thuneihna dungjui a kung vau louhna dingin, na kiang ua ka om louh laiin hih silte kung gelh hi.
Atawp in unaute aw, ki paktak in om un! Hoih bukim in om unla; khamuangtak in om unla; lungsim munkhat pua unla, kituaktak in om un. Tualeh itna leh khamuanna Pasian na kiang uah aom ding hi.
Kitawp siangthou in khat leh khat chibai kibuk un.
Misiangthoute jousiahin nou chibai ahung buk hi.
Toupa Jesu Krist hehpihna leh, Pasian itna leh Khasiangthou pawlna na tung uah omta hen. Amen.
Paul, mihing a pat hilou, mihing vang a zong hilou, Jesu Krist leh Pa Pasian misi lak a amah kaithoutu vang a hijaw in.
Tualeh ka kiang a om unau jousiahte`n Galatia gam a saptuam jousiahte kiang ah:
Pa, Pasian leh i Toupa Jesu Krist kiang a kipan hehpihna leh khamuanna na kiang uah om hen.
Amah pen Pasian leh i Pa uh deihdan dungjuiin tulai gitlouhna khang hun a kipan a hung suahtaksak theihna dingin i khialhnate ta`ng in a kipiata hi.
Pasian kiangah thupina tangtawn tangtawn in omjingta hen! Amen.
Krist hehpihna a nou hung samtu amah a pat tu kikal a tangthupha dang a na kisuansan uh lamdang kasa hi.
Huapen, “tangthupha dang ahi kei a,” hinanleh nou hung hihbuai in Krist tangthupha a hiloulam a hei ut mi khenkhat a om uhi.
Hinanleh kou hi in, ahihkeileh vantungmite hitaleh tangthupha na kiang ua ka gen uh loungal tangthupha dang mawng mawng na kiang ua hung kigen a om leh hamsiat in om hen!
Tuma a ka gen bang un tuin zong ka genkik ahi, tangthupha na muhpen uh loungal tangthupha dang mi kuapeuhin na kiang ua a hunggen leh hamsiat in om hen!
Ajiak, ken tuin mihing deihsakna ahia ka jon? Ahihkeileh Pasian a! Ahihkeileh! Mihing suklungkim sawm ka maw leh? Mihing suklungkim sawm nalai hileng Krist sawltak ka hikei ding hi.
Hinanleh unaute aw, ka tangthupha genpen mihing lam thu ahi kei chih kung theisak hi.
Ajiak mihing a pat ka muhzong ahi kei a, mihing hilh zong ka hikei hi, hinanleh Jesu Krist kilakna jiak a ka muh ahijaw hi.
Ajiak tu-ma a Judamite biakdan a ka omlai a ka tungtang, bang chibang a Pasian saptuamte theihtawp a bawlgenthei a, tokbuaitu ka hihdan na jata uhi.
Tualeh ka pu leh pate thugin a phattuam ka ngaihdiak jiakin Judate biakdan lam ah zong ka chipihte lak ah ka khan-gual tampi tungah kana leng hi.
Hinanleh kanu gilsung a ka omlai a pat hung na koihtuamtu leh a hehpihna a hung samtu Pasian in.
Jentelte lak a a tangthupha ka gentheihna dingin a Tapa pen keimah kiang a kilaksak hoih asaklai in, taksa leh sisan ka dong kei a,
Jerusalem khua ah kei sang a sawltak himasajawte kiang ah zong ka paitou kei a, hinanleh Arabia gam ah ka paijaw a, tualeh Damaska khua ah kung kilehkik ta hi.
Tuachi`n kum thum nungin Jerusalem khua ah Peter kimuhpih dingin ka paitou a, a kiang ah nisawm leh ni nga ka va om hi.
Hinanleh Toupa sanggampa Jakob chihlouh sawltak dang khatbek ka mukei hi.
Tuin na kiang ua ka thugelhte, en un, Pasian mai ah ka juaukei hi!
Huanung in Suria gam leh Silisia gam ah ka paita hi.
Tualeh Juda gam a Krist a om saptuamte meltheihlouh in ka om nalai hi.
Hinanleh, “Tuma a ei hung bawlgenthei pa`n khatvei laia a suksiat taak ginna pen tuin a tangkoupihta hi!” chih thu guak aja uhi.
Tualeh amau`n keimah jiakin Pasian aphatta uhi.
Tuachi`n kumsawm leh kumli nungin Barnaba tawh Jerusalem ah ka paitou kik a, Tita zong ka zohpih uhi.

Tualeh kilakna dungjuiin ka paitou a, Jentelte kiang a ka tangthupha genpen a kiang uah ka hilh a, hinanleh mi zah om deuhte atuam in ka hilh a, atuachih keileh bangchidan hiam in athawn a tai ka hikha ding hi.
Hitalehzong ka kiang a om Tita pen Grikmi ahihhang in tep tansak teitei in a om kei a,
tualeh huapen sila ahung tansak theihna ding ua, Krist Jesu a i zalenna enkhia ding a, aguk a hunglut unau takloute jiakin ahi.
Hinanleh tangthupha thutak pen na kiang ua a omjing theihna dingin dakkal khatsung maimai zong a thunuai ua kipialut naisailou ka hi uhi.
Hinanleh mi zah-om deuh a ka gente lak ah pen bang chibang ahita un zong kei dingin akhawk kei, mi zah om a ka gente`n bangmah ahung gensak tuankei uhi.
Hinanleh gensak naksang in, teptante tangthupha Peter kianga kepsak a aom bangin teptanloute tangthupha ka kiang a kepsak in a om chih a thei uhi.
Ajiak teptante sawltak hi ding a Peter kiang a nasemtu mah in, Jentelte sawltak hiding in keimah ah sil thupitak in abawl hi.

Tualeh khuam bang hial a om Jakob, Kifa leh Johan in ka kiang a hehpihna hung kipia atheihtak un kou Jentelte kiang a pai a, amauh teptante kiang a pai ding in kei leh Barnaba kipawl khawmna khut jiatlam ahung pia uhi.
Migentheite ka theihjing uh adeih ua, huapen ken zong ka bawlsawm mawng ahi.
Hinanleh Antiok khua a Peter a hungpai takin, demna a om jiakin a maitang ah ka na salh hi.
Ajiak aman Jakob kiang a pat mi kuate hiam ahung paima un Jentelte kiang ah an a nejel a. Hinanleh amauh a hungpaitak un teptante a laujiak in a tawp kik a, atuam omta hi.
Tualeh Judami dangte zong amah tawh alepchiah ua; tuachi`n Barnaba nasan zong alepchiah na uah puimang in a omta hi.

Hinanleh tangthupha thutak bang a ginhuaitak bangin a omkei uh chih ka muh tak in, Peter kiangah, a un ua amai uah, “Nang, Judami hi chin a, Judate om bang a omlou a, Jentelte om bang a na om ngal leh bangding a Jentelte Judami ombang a omsak sawm na hia?” ka chi hi.
“Eipen Jentel mikhialte i hikei ua,” Judami mawng a piang i hi uhi.

Dan silte bawljiak in mi siamtansak in a om kei a, hinanleh Jesu Krist gintatna liuliau in siamtang in a om uh chih ithei uhi. En zong dan silbawl jiak hilou a, Krist ginna jiak a siamtang a i omtheihna dingin Jesu Krist pen i gingta uhi, ajiak dan silte bawljiak in kuamah siamtang in a om kei ding hi.
Hinanleh Krist a siamtang a omsawm kawm pi a eimah ngei zong mikhialte i nahihleh, tuajiak in Krist khialhna nasemtu ahi diai leh? Hibaih baihlou!
Keimah in ka silbawlsiatte bawlpha kik taleng, dan bawtsiatu ka hi chih ka kitheisak giap ahi ding hi.
Ajiak pen Pasian lam a ka hintheih nangin, dan jiakin dan lam ah ka sita hi.

Krist tawh kilhden in ka omta hi, hinanleh ka hing hi. Keimah hing hinawnlou in, Krist keimah a hing ahijaw hi; tualeh tu a taksa a ka hinna pen, ahung it a ka tang a kipiapa Pasian Tapa ginna a hing ka hi.
Pasian hehpihna pen bangmah lou in ka koih kei, ajiak dan jiak a siamtanna om ahihleh Krist amawkna a si ahi ding hi.
Galatia mimawte aw! Na lak ua, na mitmuh ngei ua Jesu Krist pen kilhden a a om chiantak a hilhchian a omta, hua thutak juilou ding a kuan hung bummaw na hita ua!
Na lak ua kipan hih ka thei nuam hi, dan silte na bawljiak un amawleh kha na muh uh, ahihkeileh na ngaihkhiat ua na gintat jiak un?
Hichi lawm lawm a maw na hi uh maw? Kha a pankhinta in, taksa in hihbukim ding na hi uh hiam?
Sil huazahpi amawkna a thuak na hi uh maw? A mawkna bang na hitaleh!
Tuajiakin, na kiang ua kha hung piatu leh, nalak ua sillamdang bawltu in dan silte jiakin ahiam abawl ahihkeileh na ngaihkhiat jiak ua na gintat jiak uh maw?
“Abraham in Pasian agingta a, huapen a diktatna a simsak ahih mahbang in.”
Tuajiakin ginna a omte, huate mah Abraham tate ahi uhi chih thei un.
Tualeh Laisiangthou in ginna jiakin Pasian in Jentelte siam atangsak ding chih theikholh in, Abraham kiangah, “Nang ah nam jousiah gualjawl in a om ding uh,” chi`n tangthupha a nagenta hi.
Tuachi ahihjiak in; ginna a omte pen migin om Abraham tawh gualjawl khawm in a om uhi.
Ajiak dan silbawlte a om jousiah pen hamsia nuai a om ahi uh. Ajiak hihbang a gelh ahi, “Dan laibu a bawl ding a kigelh jousiah juijing loute pen hamsiat in a om uhi!”
Hinanleh, Pasian mitmuh in kuamah dan a siamtang a om kei ding uh chih akichian hi, “Ajiak midiktat pen ginna in ahing ding,” chih ahi.
Hitaleh zong danpen ginna a piang ahi kei a, hinanleh, huachibang a bawlte pen huate ah ahing ding hi.
Krist pen eite ta`ng in hamsiat in a hung om a, dan hamsiatna a pan ahung tankhiata hi, ajiak hihbang a gelh ahi, “Singdawn a khailup taphot hamsia thuak ahi uhi.”
Tua Abraham tung a gualjawlna pen Jesu Krist jiak a Jentelte tung ah a hung om a, eiten kha chiam pen ginna jiak a i muhtheihna ding uh ahi.
Unaute aw, mihing dan in ka gen ahi; hihpen mihing thukhun hinanleh, sukkip ahihleh kuaman a bawlsia ngaikei a, ahihkeileh abehlap ngaikei uhi.
Tuin, Abraham leh asuante kiangah ahi hih thuchiam ana kipia. aman tampite genna bangin, “nasuante kiangah,” achi kei a, mikhat thu gen bangin, “nasuan kiang ah” a chijaw hi, huapen Krist ahi.
Tualeh hih ka gen ahi, Pasian in Krist a asukkipsa thukhun pen, kum jali leh kum sawmthum nunga hung om bangin thuchiam pen bangmah lou suah dingin a hihmang theikei hi.
Gouluah ding pen danjiak ahihleh, thuchiam jiak ahita kei ding hi, hinanleh Pasian in thuchiam jiakin hih Abraham ana piata hi.
Atuachihleh bangding a dan om ahia? Hihpen chi-suang, a kiang a thuchiam piak a ompa, a hungpai masiah bohsiatnate jiakin behlap in om a, vantung mite zang a palai khut a sukkip ahi.
Tualeh palai pen mikhat guak a ding a palai ahi kei a, hinanleh Pasian khat ahi.
Dan pen Pasian thuchiam kalh ahi diai leh? Hibaih lou! Hinna piathei dan ana ki piata hitaleh siam tansakna pen dan jiakin ana om teitei ding hi.
Hinanleh Jesu Krist ginna jiak a thuchiam pen a gingtate a kipiak theihna ding in; Laisiangthou in mi jousiah khialhna nuaiah a kulhkhumta hi.
Hinanleh ginna ahung tunma in dan a gakkhum in i na om ua, hung kilang ding ginna ah kep in i om uhi.
Tuajiakin danpen ginna jiak a siam i tantheihna ding a Krist kiang a hung puiding, a hunghilhtu ahi hi.
Hinanleh ginna a hungtun nungin, a hunghilhtu nuaiah i om nawn kei uhi.
Ajiak na un un Jesu Krist ginna jiakin Pasian tate na hi uhi.
Ajiak nalak ua Krist a batisma tang jousiah Krist a kivon na hita uhi.
Hua ah Judami, Grikmi a omnawn kei, saltang leh zalen zong a omnawn kei, numei leh pasal chihding zong a omtuan kei, ajiak na unpi un Jesu Krist ah pumkhat na hita uhi.
Tualeh huachia Krist a na hihtak ua ahihleh, Abraham suan, thuchiam dungjuia gouluah dingte na hi uhi.
Tuin hichi`n ka chi hi, gouluahtu ding pen bangkim tung a lamkai hinanleh naupang ahihlai siah sila tawh kilamdanna a neituan kei hi.
Hinanleh apa hun guat atun masang siah in akemtu leh a enkoltute nuai ah a omjaw hi.
Tuachimah bangin ei zong, naupang i hihlai in, leitung silte nuai ah sila in i om uhi.
Hinanleh ahunbi ching a hungtun tak in, Pasian in a Tapa, numei suan in dannuai a piang in ahung sawlkhiata hi,
Ta hihna i tantheihna ding a, dan nuai a omte tankhia ding in.
Tualeh ta na hihjiak un Pasian in a Tapa kha pen, “Abba Pa!” chi a kikou in na lungtang uah ahung sawlkhiata hi.
Tuajiakin sila na hinawn kei ua, hinanleh ta na hijawta uhi, tualeh ta nahih uleh, tuachi`n Krist vang a Pasian gouluahtu na hi uhi.
Tuachi hinanleh, Pasian na theihma un, a pianjia mawng a Pasian hiloute nna nasem uhi.
Hinanleh tuin Pasian na hungtheih nung ua, ahihkeileh Pasian theihmi na hung hih nung ua, bang chidan a sil jawngkhal leh manlouhte sila a lutkik ut a kiheikik na hi ua?
Nite, khate, hunte, na tang nak uhi.
Bangchi hiam a atung ua athawn a ka sepgim khak ding kung lausak hi!
Unaute aw, kung ngen hi, keimah bangin om un. Ajiak kei zong noumah bangin ka om hi. Ka bangmah na hihkhial kei uhi.
Na kiang ua tangthupha ka gen masak pen ahihleh ka taksa hatlouhna pum in ahi chih nathei uhi.
Tualeh ka taksa a nou a ding a etkhiatna ompen na simmawh kei ua, ahihkeileh na nial kei uh, hinanleh Pasian vantungmi bang leh, thamlou in Krist Jesu banghial in nung pom uhi.
Ahihleh vangpha na kisakna uh khoia om ata le? Achihleh bang gualjawlna in ahia na kipak uh? Ajiak hitheileh bawn na mit uh kheikhia in nung piahial ding uh chih theihpihna kungnei hi.
Thutak kung hilh jiak a na melma uh hung suakdok kata maw leh?
Amau`n kilawptak in nou ahung zong ua, hinanleh ahoihlam ahi kei, nou amauh na zontheihna ding ua hung puaseh sawm ahijaw uhi.
Hinanleh, na kiang ua ka om guak hilou in, bangchiklai peuh a ahoihlam zong a omjing ahoih hi.
Ka tanoute aw, noumah a Krist siam piching a aom masiah nausuak nat thuak in, kung thuak kik hi.
Tuin na kiang ua om a ka aw hih lamdang ka ut mahmah hi, ajiak na tung thu uah kung lungkham pih hi!
Hung hilh un, nou dan nuaia om utte, danthu ngaikhialou na hi uh maw?
Ajiak hihbang a gelh ahi, Abraham in tapa nih anei a, khat pen a silanu tawh tualeh adang khat pen ahihleh zalennu tawh.
Hinanleh silanu lak a pen taksa dan a piang ahi a, zalennu lak a pen thuchiam jiak a piak ahi, chih.
Hih thu bang gentehna ahia. Ajiak hih numei nihte thukhun nihte ahi uhi; khat pen sinai mual a pat sal a taang ding a taneinu ahi a, huapen Hagar ahi.
Tualeh Hagar pen Arabia gam a sinai mual ahi, tulai a om Jerusalem, tualeh a tate tawh sal a taangkhawm kigenna ahi.
Hinanleh tunglam Jerusalem ahihleh a zalen a, huapen i un ua nu ahi.
Ajiak hichi`n akigelh hi,
“Aw Nang, taneilou a chingnu!
Kipak in, nang nausuaknat thuaklounu;
ngaihtak in kikou khia in!
Ajiak pasal neinu sangin
a ta`ng a omnu in ta anei tamjaw hi.”
Tuin unaute aw, eite pen Isak bang a thuchiam tate i hi uhi.
