Hinanleh huahun laia taksa dan a piang in kha dan a piang a bawlgenthei a, tuachimah bang in tuin zong ahi hi.
Hitalehzong Laisiangthou in bang a gen a? “Silanu pen a tapa tawh delhmang un; silanu tapa in zalennu tapa tawh gou a luahkhawm kei ding hi,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n unaute aw, silanu tate i hikei a, zalennu tate i hijaw uhi.
Tuajiakin, sila hinawnlou ding a Krist in a hung zalensakna ah dingkip unla, sila hakkol ah ta`ngkik nawn kei un.
Adiktak in! Keimah Paul in na kiang uah ka gen ahi, tep natan uleh Krist nou a dingin bangmah phatuamlou ding ahi.
Tualeh teptante jousiah kiangah, dan jousiah juihding nabat uh ahi, chih kung theisak kik hi.
Nou, dan a siam kitangsak jousiahte, Krist pen nou a dingin a phatuam lou ahita a, hehpihna a pan na pukta uhi.
Ajiak kou, kha jiakin ginna a siamtanna kinepna pen kilawptak in ka ngak uhi.
Ajiak, Jesu Krist ah teptan pen bangmah aphatuam kei a, teptanlouh zong bangmah a phatuam kei hi, hinanleh itna tungtawn a sem ginna a phatuam hi.
Hoihtak in na tai uh, thutak juilou dingin kuan ahia ahung dal?
Hih khemna pen nou hung samtu a pat ahikei hi.
“Tol themnou khat in tanghou beupi ajelsuak hi.”
Nou lungsim dang na ngaihtuah kei ding uh chih Toupa ah kung muang hi, hinanleh nou hung hihbuaitu in, kua hitaleh zong, atung a thutanna athuak ding hi.
Tualeh unaute aw, ken teptan thu gen nalai ka hihleh, bangding a hihgentheih a om nalai ka hia? Atuachi ahihleh kross a kipalpukna pen abei ahita ding hi.
Nou hung hihbuaite ki satkhia maileh ka ut hi!
Ajiak unaute aw, zalen ding a sap na hi ua, na zalenna uh taksa ding a lemtanna in zang kei unla, hinanleh itna in khat leh khat na kisepsak tuah jaw un.
Ajiak, “Nang mah na ki it bangin na innvengte na it ding ahi,” chih thu tengkhat ah danthu jousiah sukbukim in a om hi.
Hinanleh na kihei ua, na kinek tuah uleh na kihihmang louhna ding un pilvang un.
Tuachi`n hih ka gen hi, kha ah om un, tuahileh taksa utna na hihtangtung kei ding uhi.
Ajiak taksa in kha a dou a, kha in taksa a dou hi. Ajiak sil na bawlsawmte uh na bawl theihna ding un, hihte pen a kikalhtuah uhi.
Hinanleh kha lamkaih a na om uleh dan nuai a om na hi kei uhi.
Tualeh taksa silbawlte a kilang hi, huapen hihte ahi, angkawmna, kingaihna, thanghuaina, hukna;
milim biakna, bumna, muhdahna, kihauna, thangsiatna, hehna, mahni angsung khualna, omtuamna;
deihgohna, tualthahna, uainkhamna, gualnop bawlnate, leh huachibang dang dangte ahi. Huachibang bawlte`n Pasian gam aluah kei ding uh, chia masang a kung hilhtak mahbang in, kung mahilh hi.
Kha gahte ahihleh, itna, kipakna, khamuanna, thuakzohna, nunnemna, hoihna, gin omna,
omdan siamna, kidek theihnate ahi. Hihte kalh in dan a omkei hi.
Tualeh Krist a ahi mite`n taksa pen alunggulhna leh aduhgawlna tawh a kilhdenta uhi.
Kha a hing i hihleh, kha mah in i om ding uhi.
Khat leh khat i kikhem kei ding ua, i ki thangpaisak kei ding ua, i ki engsiattuah kei ding uhi.
Unaute aw, mi kuahiam a hihkhialhna a matkhiat a a omleh, nou kha mite ngei zong khemna na tuakkha ding chih ngaihtuah in, huachi bang mi pen nunnemna lungsim tawh dingsak kik un.
Khat leh khat na puakgikte uh kidawn chiat unla, tuachi`n Krist dan hihbukim un.
Ajiak mi kuahiam khat bangmah hiloupi a aki ngaihsang leh, amah leh amah kikhem ahi.
Hinanleh michih in ama nasep ki etchianjaw hen, tuachi`n midang tung hilou in a mahmah tung ah a kipak ding hi.
Ajiak michih in a puakchiat akipuak ding ahi.
Thuhilh a ompa in ahilhtu kiang ah silhoih jousiah piaphal hen.
Khem in om kei un, Pasian pen simmawh gual ahi kei hi, ajiak mi`n atuh khatpeuh, huamah a atding uhi.
Ajiak taksa lam a tuhpan taksa lam a siatna a atding a, hinanleh kha lam a tuhpan kha lam a tangtawn hinna a atding hi.
Tualeh silhoih bawl i chimtak kei ding uh, ajiak i lungkiat keileh ahuntak in i atding uhi.
Tuajiakin, hun lemtang i neih bangjel un mi jousiah kiang ah silhoih i bawl ding uh, adiak in ginna a i innkuanpihte kiangah i bawl ding uhi.
Keima khut mahmah a, na kiang ua ateng lianpipi a laikhak kunggelh en un!
Taksa a kilat-hoih sawmten teptan dingin nou ahung sawl teitei uhi, ajiak bangmah dang hilou in, Krist kross jiak a gimthuakna a thuaklouhna ding un ahi hi.
Ajiak, amauh teptan mawngte`n zong danthu a juituankei uhi, hinanleh na taksa ua kiletsakpih ding a neihtheihna ding un tep tanle uchin chih adeih uh a hiphet hi.
Hinanleh ken, i Toupa Jesu Krist kross chihlouh ngal ka suanlouh ding dan Pasian in a hungkham hi; amah jiakin leitung kei dingin kilhden ahita a, tualeh kei leitung dingin asi ka hita hi.
Ajiak pen Krist Jesu ah siamthakna loungal; teptan, ahihkeileh teptanlouh hitaleh, bangmah aphatuam kei hi.
Tualeh hih danbang a om jousiahte tung ah khamuanna leh kituahna om hen!
Tu-a kipat in kuaman hung tokbuai nawn kei uh hen, ajiak ka taksa ah Toupa Jesu chiamtehna ka pua hi.
Unaute, i Toupa Jesu hehpihna na kha uh kiangah om hen. Amen.
Paul, Pasian deihdan a Jesu Krist sawltak,
Ephesa khua a om misiangthoute leh Jesu Krist a mi gin-omte kiangah:
Pasian i Pa uleh Toupa Jesu kiang a kipan hehpihna leh khamuanna na kiang uah om hen.
Van munte a Krist a khalam gualjawlna a hung gualjawlpa i Toupa Jesu Krist Pa leh Pasian phat in om hen!
Ama mai a siangthou leh dembei a i omtheihna ding a, leitung kisiam masang a, itna a Krist a ahung natel dungjui in.
Ama kipakna leh deihlam bang in, Jesu Krist jiak a amah a ding a ta a bawl dingin ahung na guatkholhta hi.
Ahehpihna thupidan pahtawi dingin, hua hehpihna a a it mahmahpa ah ahung bawlta hi!
Amah ah a sisan jiakin tatkhiatna inei a, ahehpihna hauhdan dungjui a i khialhnate ngaihdamna,
Hua hehpihna ah aman, pilna jousiah leh lam-etna jousiahin ahung vukta hi!
Aman a kipakna bang a amah a bawl atup a lunggel thugu`k i kiang a hungtheisak in.
Hunbi khenna ahung tunkim chiang a amah ngeiin van a sil omte leh, leitung a sil omte a un a Krist a akhopkhawm chiang in.
Ama deihdan thuhilhna bangjel a sil jousiah bawlpa tup bang a guatkholhsa in, amah ah gouluah ding a siam i hi uhi.
Ei Krist na gingta masate, a thupina pahtawina i hihtheihna ding in!
Amah ah nou zong thutak thu na hundamna thu uh na ngaihkhiat ua, na gintat nung un, amah a chiamsa Khasiangthou a chiamteh in na om uhi.
Khasiangthou pen Pasian thupidan pahtawina ding a, gou leisa tatkhiatna hun masang a ding a i gouluah ding uh khamna ahi!
Tuajiakin Toupa Jesu a na ginna uh leh misiangthoute tung a na itna uh ka najak in,
Ka thumna ah na minte uh lou in, noujiak a kipahthu gen ka tawp kei hi
i Toupa uh Jesu Krist Pasian, thupina Pa in amah theihna lam thu ah pilna leh kilakna kha nou a hungpiak theihna ding in.
Na lungsim mitte uh hihvak a ahung om a, asapna kinepna bang, misiangthoute a agoutan ding thupina hauhdan bang,
Tualeh asil bawltheihna hatna nasep dungjui a ei a gingtate lam a asil bawltheihna a thupidan nung theihtheihna ding un.
Misi lak a kipan a kaihthoh lai, tualeh van munte a ajiatlam a atou lai,
Lalnate, sil bawl theihnate, thuneihnate leh, hih leitung guak hilou a, leitung hung tung ding ah zong min kiphuah jousiah tunglam pek a atousak lai a Krist a abawl pen.
Tualeh aman sil jousiah akeng nuaiah a koihta a, amahpen sil jousiah tung a lutang hiding in, saptuam kiang ah apia hi.
Tuapen a pumpi ahi, a bukimna, bangkim jousiah dimsakpa ahi.
Tualeh nou na bawhsiatnate uleh na khialhnate uh jiak a sisa pen ahung hundam a.
Hua-ah, tu masang in hih leitung dan bang in na om ua, huihkhua a thuneitu lal, tu a thumang lou tate sung a nasemjingtu kha dan bang in na vak ua.
Huate lak ah eite zong tu masang in i taksa utna ah, i taksa leh i lungsim utna hih bukim in i om ua. Tualeh midangte bangin piandan mawng a thangpaihna tate i hi uhi.
Hinanleh Pasian, hehpihna haupa in, a itna thupitak a eite ahung it jiak in,
khialhna a si i hihlai un zong Krist tawh ahung hingsakta a. Hehpihna jiak a hundam na hi uhi.
Tualeh Jesu Krist tawh ahung kaithou khawmta a, van munte ah ahung toukhawmsak ta hi.
Tuachi`n hun hungtung dingte ah Jesu Krist jiak a itung a achitna a ahehpihna hauhdan ahung ensak ding hi.
Ginna jiak a hehpihna a hundam na hi uhi, huazong noumau a suak a hikei a, Pasian silthawnpiak ahi.
Nasep jiak ahikei a, atuachih keileh miin a suangkha ding uhi.
Ajiak Pasian in masanglai pek a i omna ding a ana guatkholh, Krist Jesu a nna hoih semding a siam, ama khutsuak i hi uhi.
Tuajiakin, “Nou masang laia Jentel, teptanlou ahung chihte uh,” (taksa khut a tan teptan achihte un.)
Huachihlai a Krist neilou a, Israel khua leh tui tawh kimatlou a, leitung a kinepna bei leh Pasian neilou a na om ua, thuchiam thukhunte lak a mikhual a na om nahih uh theijing un.
Hinanleh tuin pen Krist Jesu ah, nou nidanglai a gamlapi a omte, Krist sisan jiakin suknai in na omta uhi.
Ajiak amah pen i kilemna uh ahi a, i kikal a ki daidanna baang pen hihchim in, nihte pen pumkhat in a bawlta hi.
Biakna silbawlte a thupiak dan omte ki melmaknate pen a taksa a hihmang in, amah ah nihte pen mihing thak khat a siam dingin kilemna a bawlta hi.
Ki melmaknate pen kross a hihlum in, huamah in nihte pen pumpi khat a Pasian tawh a kilepsak theihna ding in.
Tualeh amah hungpai in, nou gamlapi a omte kiangah lemna thu hung gen in, tualeh naitak a omte kiang ah zong ahung gen hi.
Ajiak, amah jiakin eiten kha khat in Pa kiang a luttheihna inei tuakta uhi.
Tuajiakin tuinjaw zin leh gamtuammi na hinawn kei ua, hinanleh misiangthoute tawh tualsung khat leh Pasian innkuante na hijawta uhi.
Tualeh Jesu Krist pen aning a suang poimoh pen hung hi in, sawltakte leh Jawlneite suangphum lepsa tung a lam na hi uhi.
Ama inn lam jousiah kituaktak a leptuak in, Toupa ah tempul siangthou in a khangtou hi.
Amah ah nou zong kha a Pasian tenna ding a lamkhawm na hi uhi.
Hih jiakin kei Paul, nou Jentelte ding a Jesu Krist a thongkia in.
Nou ding a Pasian hehpihna kepna piak kahih na jata ding ua.
Tuachia kilakna thugu`k kiphual ka kiang a ahung theihsak. (Tu-ma a tomnou khat a ka gelh,
huapen na sim chiang un Krist thugu`k kiphual ka theihdan na theisiam ding uhi.)
Huapen tulai a sawltak siangthoute leh Jawlneite kiang a kha a theihsak a aom bangin, nidanglai in mihing tate kiangah theihsak in a om ngaikei hi.
Hua ahi, tangthupha jiakin Krist ah Jentelte pen gouluah pihte, taksa khat a omte, thuchiam tanpihte ahi ding uh.
Asil bawltheihna nasepna a athawn a Pasian hehpihna hung kipia dungjuiin, hua tangthupha nna sem ding a siam ka hi hi.
Jentelte kiang a Krist hauhsak dan zonkhiat guallouh thute gen ing a, kei misiangthoute lak a neupen sanga neijaw kiang ah hih hehpihna pen piak ahi,
tualeh tangtawn a kipahna Jesu Krist mang a siljousiah siamtu atu`ng a pat Pasian a phual a om thugu`k kiphual ki pawlkhawmna pen bang ahia chih mi jousiah musak ding in,
tu-a van munte a lalnate leh thuneihnate kiangah Pasian pilna chinteng saptuamte mang a tua theihsak a aom theihna ding in.
I Toupa uh Jesu Krist a bawl atup, a tangtawn silguat bang ngei in.
amah ginna jiakin eiten amah ah hansanna leh maingal tak a luttheihna inei uhi.
Tuajiakin nou a ding a ka gimthuaknate jiak a lungkia lou dingin kung ngen hi; huapen na thupina uh ahi.
Hih jiakin i Toupa uh Jesu Pa mai ah ka khupdin a,
lei leh van a min jousiah phuah khiatnapa mai ah.
A thupina hauhdan bangjel a akha jiak a mihing sungtawng lam a silbawltheihna a hatsah a ahung omsak theihna ding in,
Krist pen ginna a na lungtang ua a tentheihna dingin, nou itna a thaguinei leh kiptak a om a,
misiangthoute jousiah tawh aletdan, asaudan, asandan tualeh athukdante na theihchian nang uleh.
Krist itna theihphak guallouh nung theih ua, Pasian a bukimna jousiah a sukdim a na omtheihna ding un ahi.
Tuin eimah a semjel sil bawltheihna dungjui a i nget leh, i ngaihtuah sang a sangjaw leh tamjaw a bawltheitu kiangah:
Jesu Krist jiakin saptuam ah tangtawn in, thupina omta hen! Amen.
Tuajiakin, kei, Toupa a thongkia in, sap a na omna utawh kituak a gamta dingin kung ngen hi.
Ki ngaingiamna leh migitna tengteng, thuakzohna tawh itna in na kithuakjou chiat un.
Lemna guia kankhawm a kha a ki pumkhatna pen vom tinten dingin hahpan in pang un.
Sap a na omna pen uh kinepna, munkhat a sap na hih mahbang un pumpi khat leh kha khat.
Toupa khat, ginna khat, baptisma khat;
Pasian khat leh mi jousiah Pa, bangkim tung a om leh bangkim a om, tualeh noute jousiah ah a om hi.
Hinanleh Krist sil thawnpiak tehna bangjel in hehpihna pen i kiang chiat uah piak in i om uhi.
Tuajiakin Laisiangthou in aman,
“Tunglama a kahtouhlai in,
sal a matte sal in apui a;
tualeh mihingte kiangah sil piakte apia hi,”
chi`n agen hi.
Tuin, hih ahi, “a kahtouh chih pen,” amasa in leimun ngiampen ah a kumsuk chihlouh bangdang chihna ahi diai leh?
A kumsuk pen ahihleh sil jousiah a sukbukim theihna ding a van jousiah tunglam pek a kahtoupa mah ahi.
Tualeh aman “khenkhatte sawltak, khenkhatte Jawlnei, khenkhatte tangthupha gentu, khenkhatte Pastor dingin, tualeh khenkhatte thuhilh sia dingin apia hi.”
Ajiak misiangthoute kithuamna ding, nasepna ding leh Krist pumpi bawlhoihna ding in.
Ginna leh Pasian Tapa theihna lam a ki thutuak a, piching a Krist bukimna tehna dungtan i phakchiat masiah un.
Tuachi`n diklouhna khemna bangin, lepchiah pil a mihing khem a om a, thugin huih chinteng a alang alang a mutleng kawikawi naupangte i hi nawn kei ding ua.
Hinanleh itna a thutak gen in, sil jousiah ah amah ah i khangtou thei jawding hi, Krist, amah pen lutang ahih jiak in.
Amah a pat pumpi kituaktak a zopkhawm a om in, guhtuah chinteng in sa hiang dang chinteng nasepna apiakdan dungjui chiat a, pumpi itna a ki bawlhoih in a khangtousak hi.
Tuajiakin hih ka gen ahi, tualeh Toupa ah kung theisak hi, Jentelte alungsim ginatlouh jiak uh pua a aom bang un omnawn mawng mawng kei un
a theihsiamna uh sukmial a om in, asung ua bangmah theih theihlouhna a om jiakin, a lungtang uh atak jiakin Pasian hinna a pat puaseh in a om uhi.
Amau`n theihtheihna mawng mawng aneih nawnlouh jiak un sil sianglou chinteng duhgawltak a bawl ding in hukna ah a ki pialutta uhi.
Hinanleh nou Krist thu huachibang in na jil kei uhi!
Jesu a om, thutak dungjui a amah thu ja a amah thuhilhna a om taktak na hih ua ahihleh.
Na nidanglai omdan ua mihing lui, khemna duhgawlna hoihloute koihkhia unla.
Na lungsim kha uah athak in hung om un,
mihing thak, diktatna leh siangthouna Pasian bang a siam pen silh un.
Tuajiakin, juaugen tawpsan in! Michih in avengte kiang ah thudik genchiat hen, ajiak eite khat leh khat ki hiangtuah chiat i hi uhi.
Heh unla, hinanleh khial kei un, na hehna uh ni in tumpih kei hen.
Setan mun awn kei un.
Guta in gu nawnkei henla, hinanleh tasam kiang a piak ding a neihtheina dingin, a khut a silhoih bawl in semgimjaw hen.
Na kam ua pat thusia pawtkei henla, hinanleh a ngaikhiatute kiang a hehpihna a piaktheihna dingin, bawlhoihna dingin thuhoih pawtjaw hen.
Tualeh Pasian Khasiangthou dahsak kei un, tatnani a ding a amah a chiamteh na hi uhi.
Kha`tnate, thangpaihnate, hehnate, husangnate, kigensiatnate, hihte jousiah nalak uapat koihmang in omta hen, gitlouhna jousiah tawh.
Khat leh khat kingaina tuah chiat unla, lungnem unla, Pasian in Krist a nou ahung ngaihdam bangin, nou zong khat leh khat ki ngaihdam tuah chiat un.
Tuajiakin ta deihtakte bangin Pasian omdan juitute hi un.
Krist in ahung it a, ei a ding a Pasian kiang a silpiak leh kithoihna namtui ding a a kipiak bangin, itna ah om un.
Hinanleh misiangthoute omdan ding a kilawm him in, kingaihnate leh sianglou chiteng huaihamna tawh nalak uah lawhkhak in om kei hen.
Zahmoh thute, thu namanlouh a houlimnate, chiamnuih thute bang zong kilawm lou ahi, huate sangin Pasian kiang ah kipahthu genjaw un.
Ajiak, kingaihhat leh, mi thanghuai leh mi duhgawl in, (duhgawlna pen milim biakna ahi). Krist leh Pasian gam ah goutan mawng mawng a neikei chih nathei uhi.
Mi kuamah in thu ginalou peuhin hungkhem kei uhen, ajiak hih silte jiakin Pasian thangpaihna thumanglou tate tungah atung nak hi.
Tuajiakin, amauhte kipawlpih kei un.
Ajiak nou masanglai in mial na hi ua, hinanleh tunjaw Toupa ah vak na hita ua, vaktate ombang in om un,
Ajiak, khagah ahihleh hoihnate, diktatnate leh thutak ah ahi.
Toupa pomtak bang ahiam chih zongkhia unla,
tualeh mial nasep gah neiloute tawh ki pawlkhawmna neikei unla, hinanleh a diklouhdan theihsakjaw un.
Ajiak aguk a silbawlte agen zong ajumhuai hi.
Hinanleh sil jousiah adiklouh dan theihsak a aom pen vak hihlat ahi, ajiak sil khatpeuh hihlangtu vak ahi hi.
Tuajiakin Laisiangthou in, aman;
“Nang ihmu, khanglou inla,
misi lak a kipan thou in,
tuachi`n Krist in vak a hungpia ding hi,”
achi hi.
Tuachi`n na omdan uah pilvang un, mimawte bang a omlou in, hinanleh mipilte bangin om un.
Nite ahoihlouh jiakin hun lemtang kilei un.
Tuajiakin mawkei unla, Toupa deihlam bang ahia chih thei un.
Tualeh uain kham in om kei unla, hua ah kideklouhna a om hi; hinanleh, kha ah omjaw un.
Phatna late, Biakna late, tualeh khalam late ah noumauh khat leh khat kihoutuah in, Toupa kiangah na lungtang ua ging kilawm leh la sa in om un.
Bangkim tung ah i Toupa Jesu Krist min in Pasian leh i Pa kiang ah kipahthu gen gige un.
Pasian lauhdan siamna ah khat leh khat kituhlut tuah chiat un.
Zite aw, Toupa kiang a bangin noumauh pasalte chiat kiangah kituhlut un.
Ajiak Krist saptuamte lutang ahih a, pumpi hundampa ahih bangin, pasal pen zi lutang ahi.
Tuajiakin saptuamte Krist kianga a kituhlut mahbang in, zite zong sil bangkim ah a pasalte uh kiangah kituhlut uh hen.
Pasalte aw, Krist in saptuamte a it a, a ta`ng ua a kipiak bangin nou zong na zite uh it un.
Amauh tui a sil a, thu a ahihsiang a asawpsiang theihna ding in,
tuachia amauh pen nin banglou, vuailou leh huachibang sil mawng mawng omlou, hinanleh siangthou leh dembei a omjaw a, saptuam thupitak amah akipiak theihna ding in.
Tuajiakin pasalte`n amauh pumpi mahbang in aziite uh a it ding uh ahi. A zi itpa pen amah ki it ahi.
Ajiak kuamah in ama taksa ahua ngai kei. Hinanleh Toupa`n saptuamte abawl mahbang in avak in adeihthoh jaw ding hi;
ajiak eite pen a pumpi hiangte i hi ua, a taksa leh aguhte hiangte i hi uhi.
“Hihjiakin pasal in anu leh apa a nusia ding a, azi atu ding, tuachi`n anih un taksa pumkhat a hung hita ding uhi.”
Hihpen thugu`k kiphual thupitak ahi, hinanleh ken Krist leh saptuam thu ahi ka gen.
Hitalehzong nalak ua kuapeuh in amah a ki it bangin a zi it hen, tualeh zi pen apasal zahtak ding in pilvang hen.
Naupangte aw, Toupa ah na nulehpate uh thu mang un, ajiak hihpen sildik ahi.
“Na nu leh na pa zahtak in,” hih pen thupiak chiamnei masa pen ahi:
“tuachi`n nang a dingin ahoih ding a, leiah zong na damsawt ding hi.”
Tualeh nou pate aw, na tate uh thangpaisak kei unla. Toupa thununna leh thuhilhna ah kemjaw un.
Silate aw, Krist thu na man bang un, lauhdan siam leh kithing pum in; lungsim a chitak in, taksa dan a napute uh thu mang un.
Mihing kipaksak ding a mitmei guak veng hilou a, Krist sila bang a lungtang a Pasian deihlam bawl ding in.
Mihing kiang a hilou in, Toupa kiang a silhoih deih a nasem in.
Michih in, sila hiin zalen hitaleh silhoih abawl taphot uh Toupa kiang a pat huamah amukik ding uh chih thei in bawl hen.
Tualeh nou pute aw, tuachimah bangin akiang uah bawl un, amauh leh nou pu pen van ah a om chih leh, aman mi deihsak tuam aneikei chih thei in, vaubawl kei un.
Atawppen in, ka unaute aw, Toupa ah leh ahatna silbawltheihna ah hattak in om un.
Setan ze-khemna na douzohna ding un Pasian galvan bukim in kithuam un.
Ajiak i doute pen taksa leh sisan ahikei a, mialtung a vaihawmtute leh, van munte a kha gilou omte ahijaw uhi.
Tuajiakin ni hoihloute a na douzohna ding uleh, na bawlzoh siang nung ua zong na dintheihna ding un, Pasian galvan bukim la un!
Tuajiakin, na kawng uh thutak a gak in, diktatna awmphaw gak in,
lemna tangthupha ki sakkholhna pen na keng uah bulh in ding un.
Hihte tengteng tung ah ginna lum la un, hua tawh giloupa thal kuangthei na sumitthei ding uhi.
Tualeh hundamna sik Lukhu leh, kha namsau Pasian thu la un.
Thumna leh ngetna chinteng in bangchiklai peuh in kha a thumjing a om in, hih atawpna lam ah misiangthoute ding in thuak hatna leh ngetsakna tawh pilvang tak in omjing un.
Tualeh kei dingin zong tangthupha thu kiphual theisak ding a hangsan tak a kakam ka kak a, thugen theihna piak a ka omtheihna ding in.
Hua a ding a sik kolbulh palai ka hi hi, hualam pang ka gen ding bang a hangsan tak a ka gentheihna ding in hung thumsak un.
Hinanleh nou zong bang chibang a ka om ka tanchin na theihtheihna ding un, Taikika, Toupa a sanggam ittak leh Pasian nasemtu muanhuai in, bangkim a hunghilh pai ding hi.
Ka tanchin uh na theihna ding uleh, na lungtang uh a khamuan theihna ding chi in amah na kiang ua kungsawl ahi.
Pa Pasian leh i Toupa Jesu Krist kianga kipan khamuanna, tualeh ginna tawh kijui itna unaute kiang ah om hen.
Chih taktak a i Toupa uh Jesu Krist itte jousiah kiang ah hehpihna om hen. Amen.
Paul, leh Timothi, Jesu Krist silaten, Philippi khua a om Jesu Krist a misiangthou jousiahte kiang leh, saptuam upate kiang leh panpihtute kiang ah:
I Pa uh Pasian kiang leh i Toupa uh Jesu Krist kiang a kipan hehpihna leh khamuanna na kiang uah om hen.
Noute kung phokkhiat tengin ka Pasian kiang ah kipahthu ka gen a;
ka thum tengin kipaktak in noute a dingin kung ngetsak gige hi
apatni a pat a tunitan a tangthupha a nung ki pawlpihna uh jiak in.
Amah na sung ua nahoih sep pankhintu in, Jesu Krist ni tanpha in huapen abawl bukim ngei ding chih muanngamna ka nei hi.

Na un ua na tungtang uh thu a ken hichi bang lungsim ka neihpen adik mawng ahi. Ajiak nou ka lungtang ah kung vomjing hi; na un ua ka kolbulhna leh tangthupha venna leh hihkipna thu a hehpihna ka tanpihte na hi uhi.
Ajiak, Jesu Krist lainatna in na un un kung ngai mahmah hi chih Pasian ahung theihpihtu ahi.
Tualeh theihtheihna leh theihkhen theihna tengteng a na itna uh a hungtam semsem ding hih ahi ka nget,
tuachia silhoih mahmahte nung theih ua; Krist ni tan a ataktak leh bawlkhial bei nung hihtheihna ding un.
Pasian thupina ding leh pahtawina ding a Jesu Krist a om diktatna gah a dim in.
Hinanleh unaute aw, ka tung a siltungte pen tangthupha phuanjaksem a a omna ding a hungtung ahi chih natheih uh ka deih hi.
Tuachi`n Innpi vengpawlte jousiah leh a dang tengteng kiangah ka kolbulhnate pen Krist ah ahi chih a kichianta hi.
Tualeh Toupa a unau tamtak in ka kolbulh jiak a ginkipna nei in, Pasian thu laulou a gen ding in a hangsan deuh deuhta uhi.
Khenkhatte`n thangsiatna leh kihauna jiakin Krist a tangkoupih ua, tualeh khenkhatten deihsakna jiakin zong agen uhi.
Pawlkhatte`n ka kolbulh thuakna ki behlapsak sawm in, a taktak hilou in, mahni angsung khualna in, kikalhna dingin Krist a tangkoupih uhi.
Hinanleh pawlkhat in ahihleh tangthupha gum ding a om ka hihdan thei in, itna jiakin a gen uhi.
Achihleh bang akhok a, lam jousiah ah, akhem hi in atak hitaleh Krist pen tangkoupih in a omta himhim ahi. Tualeh hua ah ka kipak ahi, ahi, ka kipak jel ding hi,
Ajiak hih in na thumna uh leh Jesu Krist kha piakna jiakin ka suahtakna ahung suak ngei ding chih ka thei hi.

Ka lam etna bang leh ka kinepna bang dungjuiin bangmah ah hihjum in ka om kei ding a, hinanleh ka hansan jing mahbang in, tuin zong, ka hinna in hiam, ka sihna in hiam, Krist pen ka pumpi ah hangsanna kim in hihlet in ka om ding hi.
Ajiak kei ding in hin Krist ahi a, sih punna ahi.
Hinanleh taksa a hin ka tan hihenla, huapen ka sepgah hitaleh, teljawk ding ka theikei hi.
Ajiak nih tegel kal ah haksatak a phuk in ka om hi. Paimang a Krist kiang a om utna ka nei a, huapen ahoihjaw mahmah hi;
hitalehzong, taksa a om pen nou jiakin apoimohjaw hi.
Tualeh hih ginkipna nei in, na ginna uh khanletna ding leh na ginna ua na kipakna ding un nou tawh ka omjel lai ding hi chih ka thei hi,
na kiang ua kung paikikna jiak a, kei ding a Jesu Krist a na kipahna uh a tamsem theihna ding in.

Na omdan uleh Krist tangthupha kituaksak phot phot un, hung pai a nou kung muh ahiam, ahihkeileh ka omlouh a zong na tanchin uh, kha khat a na dinkip dan uleh, lungsim khat nei a, tangthupha thugin a na hahpan dan uh ka jaktheihna ding in.
Tualeh bangmah ah na melmate uh hihlau in omkei un; huapen amauh a ding a manthaina chiamtehna diktak ahi a, hinanleh nou a ding in pen hundamna, tualeh huapen Pasian a kipan ahi.
Ajiak, Krist jiak a nou amah na gintat uh guak hilou a, amah jiak a thuak zong na thuak ding uh ahi chih piak na hi uhi.
Keimah a hichibang kidouna na muhsa uleh, tu-a keimah a om najak bang uh, nou zong na nei uhi.
Tuajiakin Krist a ki hehnepna bang, ki itna khamuanna bang, kha a ki pawlkhawmna bang, ki lainatna leh ki khuatuahna bang a omleh.
Lungsim kibang a om in, itna kibang nei in, tup kibang leh lungsim munkhat a om in ka kipahna hih bukim un.
Angsung khual a huaihamna hiam ahihkeileh ki thupisakna hiam in, bangmah bawl hikei hen, hinanleh lungsim ngiamtak in michih in amah sangin midang hoihjaw in ngaihsun chiat hen.
Na lak ua mi kuapeuh in ama lunglutna guak enkei henla, midang lunglutna zong en uh hen.
Jesu Krist a zong om hih lungsim nou ah zong om hen:
Amah pen Pasian bang a om in,
Pasian tawh kibang a om pen sil khiatlahhuai in a ngaihtuah kei a.
Hinanleh, amah leh amah ki ngaisanglou in, sila bangin ahung om a,
mihing bang a siam in ahung om hi.
Tualeh mihing lim leh mel bang pua in,
amah hung ki ngiamkhiat a,
sihna tanpha in thu ahung mang a,
kross a sihna tandong in zong.
Tuajiakin Pasian in amah pen thupitak in a tawisangta a
min laklak a min tungnung pen a piata hi.
Tuachia Jesu min a mi jousiah,
van a sil omte, lei a sil omte,
tualeh leinuai a sil omte a khupdin ua,
lei chinteng in Jesu Krist pen Pa Pasian thupina ding a,
Toupa ahi chih a phuantheihna ding un.
Tuajiakin ka itte aw, ka omsung guak hilou in, hinanleh ka omlouh lai a zong thu na manjel mahbang un. Lau leh ling kawm in na hundamna uh semkhia un.
Ajiak ama kipahpih lam silhoih bawl ding a hung utsaktu leh hung semsak ding a bawltu Pasian ahi.
Sil jousiah niallou leh phunlou in bawl un,
khangthak gilou leh genhakte lak a leitung vakte bang a na vaknate uh lak un. Dembei leh bawlsiat neilou Pasian tate nung hihtheihna ding un,
hinna thu tukip in, Krist ni chiang a ken athawn in ka tai kei a, athawn in ka gimkei chia ka kipak theihna ding in.
Ahi, na ginna sillat uleh na nasepna tung ua kei Pasian a ding a dawn ding bangin buakkhiat in om tamah leng zong, ka kipak hi, tualeh na un un kung kipahpih hi.
Huajiak mah in nou zong kipak unla, kei zong hung ki pakpih un.
Hinanleh na tanchin uh ka theih a lungmuang tak a ka omtheihna dingin, Timothi na kiang uah hungsawl pai dingin Toupa Jesu ah ka kilam en hi.
Ajiak ka kiangah huachi bang a gin-om tak a nou hung kem ding mi ka neikei hi.
Ajiak mi jousiahin Jesu Krist silte zonglou in, amauh a ding chiat a zongta uhi.
Hinanleh Toupa in a Pa nna asep bangin, aman tangthupha ah kei ahung seppih chih theihchianna amah ah na nei uhi.
Tuajiakin bang chibang a ka om ding ka theihchian hunhun in amah hung sawlkhiat pai ka kinem hi.
Hinanleh kei mahmah ngei zong hung paipah ding in Toupa ah gintatna ka nei hi.
Hilehzong, ka sanggampa leh, ka naseppih leh, ka galkappih, na kamtai uh leh ka taksapna a hung ki thuahpihtu Epaphrodita na kiang ua hung sawl poimoh kasa hi.
Ajiak na un un a hungngai mahmah a, a damlouh thu na jakjiak un a lungkham mahmah hi.
Ajiak sidektak in a china ngutngei a, hinanleh Pasian in a hehpih a, amah guak hilou in, hinanleh kei zong ahung hehpih hi, kei ding a lungkhamna tung a lungkhamna a omkhawm louhna ding in.
Tuajiakin amah poimohngaih tak in kung sawl hi, amah na muhkik chiang ua na kipak ua, tualeh kei lungkhamna zong adaihdeuh na ding in.
Tuajiakin amah pen Toupa ah kipaktak in na sang un, tualeh hua chibangte na zahbawl un,
ajiak kei ding a nung sepsakna uh kimloute sukkimna ding in Krist nasepna ah aman a hinna zong khawksalou in, ana sidektak hi.
Atawppen in, ka unaute aw, Toupa ah kipak un, kei a dingin angaimah gelh a chimtakhuai kei a, hinanleh nou a dingin ahoihjaw hi.
Uite lak ah kiveng un, sil gilou bawlte lak ah kiveng un, taksa atgawpte lak ah kiveng un.
Ajiak eite kha-a Pasian bia teptante i hi a, tualeh Jesu Krist ah i kipak mahmah a, hinanleh taksa ah pen suanding i neikei uhi.
Taksa lam ah chilei zong suanding ka nei maithei, mi dang kuahiam in taksa lam a suanding neia a kigen leh, ken kanei sem hi.
Nigiat ni a teptan, Israel nam, Benjamin phung, Hebrai lak a Hebrai hidiak, dan theihlam a Pharisai.
Phattuam ngaih lam a saptuamte bawlgentheitu. Danbu-a diktatna lam a gensiatbei ka hi.
Hinanleh, sil kei ding a punna jousiah pen Krist jiakin manna in ka simta hi.

Ahi taktak ngut hi; Jesu Krist ka Toupa theihna hoihtak jiakin sil jousiah manna in kasim ahi. Amah jiakin sil jousiah ka ta`nta a, tualeh Krist ka tantheihna dingin huate tengteng ninneng bangin ka ngai hi.
Tualeh danbu a om bang a keimah diktatna nei hilou a, hinanleh Krist ginna jiak a om, ginna a Pasian a kipan diktatna pen nei a amah a muh a ka omtheihna ding in.
Tuachia amah leh athohkikna ka theihna leh, amah thuakgimna ka kikoppihna bang ka theihtheihna ding in,
bang chidan hiam bek a misi lak a pat thohkikna ka tankhakleh chi in.
Hua tangkhinta ka hikei a, bukim khinta zong ka hikei. Hinanleh Jesu Krist in kei a hungmatna, huamah ka mattheih sam na ding in ka delh ahi.
Unaute aw, keipen mankhinta in ka kingai kei a, hinanleh silkhat ka bawl hi, nunglam a sil omte manghilh in, tualeh mailam a sil omte delh in.
Jesu Krist a Pasian sapna sang nuamman mu dingin phaktawpna ka delh hi.
Tuajiakin, ei apiching deuhdeuh tengin hichibang lungsim i neichiat ding uhi. Tualeh sildang khat a lungsim dang naneih uleh, hihzong Pasian in na kiang uah ahung theisak ding hi.
Hitaleh zong, i phakna chiangchiang ah huadan mahbang in i kalsuan ding uhi.
Unaute aw, ka omdan hungjuite hichiat unla, huachibang a omte etton ding a nung neihte uh chiamteh un.
Ajiak mi tampi a om uh, amau omdan tamveipi kung hilhta hi, tuin zong kappum in kung hilh ahi, amauh pen Krist kross melmate ahi uhi.
Atawpna uh pen siatna ahi a, a pasian uh ahihleh a gilpi uh ahi a, tualeh a thupina uh zong a jumna uh ahi a, leilam silte a ngaihtuah uhi.
Ajiak ei khua leh tui hihna pen van ah ahi a, hua a kipan in i Toupa Jesu Krist hundampa i ngak uhi.
Aman sil jousiah ama thu thua a omsak theihna nasepdan dungjuiin i pumpi thulimlou pen amah pumpi thupitak bangin ahung bawl thaksak ding hi.
Tuajiakin, ka unau ittak leh ngaihtakte aw, ka kipahna leh ka lallukhute! Huachi`n Toupa ah dingkip un, ka ittakte aw.
Toupa ah lungsim khat hi dingin, Euodia kiangah ka ngen a, tualeh Sintike kiangah ka ngen hi.
Tualeh nang, ka sepkhawmpih diktak zong kung ngen ahi, tangthupha a ka seppih numeite leh Klemen zong tualeh hinna laibu a mintuang, ka seppih dangte panpih un.
Toupa ah kipak gige un. Ka chikik ding: kipak un!
Na migitna uh mi jousiah kiang ah theih hi hen. Toupa anai hi.
Bangmahlou ah lunghimoh kei unla, hinanleh sil bangkim ah thumna leh ngetna in kipahthu genna tawh, nasil ngette uh Pasian kiang ah theihsak in om hen.
Tualeh Pasian khamuanna theihphak guallouh in, Jesu Krist jiakin na lungtangte uleh na lungsimte uh ahung vensak ding hi.

Atawppen in unaute aw, sil dik jousiah, sil zah-om jousiah, thudik jousiah, sil siangthou jousiah, silhoih jousiah, sil it-huai jousiah, sil minhoih jousiah, hoihna bang a om a, pahtawina bang a omleh, hih silte ngaihtuah un.
Keimah a na jilsa uh, na tansa uh, na jaksa uh, tualeh na muhsa uh, hua silte bawl un.
Hinanleh tu atawplam a kei nung ngaihtuahna uh ahung ki latkik jel jiakin Toupa ah ka kipak mahmah hi. Nung ngaihsak mahmah ua, hinanleh hun lemtang na mukei ua ahi.
Taksap jiak a hihthu ka gen ding ahikei a, hua ah lungkimtak a omdan ka theikhiata hi.
Tasamtak a omdan ka thei a, tualeh ki ningching tak a omdan zong ka thei hi. Munchin leh sil jousiah ah, gilvah leh kial a omtheihna leh, ki ningching leh tasam a omdan hilh in ka omta hi.
Amah ahung hatsaktu Krist jiakin sil jousiah ka bawlthei hi.
Hitaleh zong ka gentheihna a nung lungkhampih jiak un na bawlhoih uhi.

Tuin nou Philippite`n tangthupha a hung om tu`ng a, Mesidonia gam a pat ka paikhiat laiin, nou chihlouh, saptuam dang kuamah in piak leh lak lam thu ah bangmah in a hung kithuahpih kei uh chih zong nathei uhi.
Ajiak, Thessalonika khua ngei ah zong ka taksap panpihna nung khak kik jel uhi.
Silpiak deih ka hikei a, hinanleh nou a ding a gah punna jong ka hijaw hi.
Sil bangkim ka nei a, ka hau hi, nou a pat hung kikhak silte, gim namtui roma, kithoihna pomtak Pasian lungkimna pen! Epaphrodita khut a pat in ka muta a. Ka kiningching petmah ta hi.
Tualeh ka Pasian in Jesu Krist a thupina a ahauhsatna dungjui in na taksap jousiah uh a hungpia ding hi.
Tuin Pasian leh i Pa uh kiang ah tangtawn tangtawn in thupina omta hen! Amen.
Jesu Krist a misiangthoute jousiah chibai hung na buksak un. Ka kiang a om unaute`n chibai a hungbuk uhi.
Misiangthou jousiahin, hinanleh abiktak in Kaisar innsung miten chibai a hungbuk uhi.
I Toupa Jesu Krist hehpihna na tung uah omta hen. Amen.
Paul, Pasian deihna bang a Jesu Krist sawltak leh i sanggampa uh Timothi in,
Kolossa khua a om, Jesu Krist a misiangthoute leh unau gin-omte kiang ah:
I Pa uh Pasian leh i Toupa uh Jesu Krist a kipan hehpihna leh khamuanna na kiang uah om hen.
Nou a ding a thumjing in, Pasian i Toupa uh Jesu Krist Pa kiang ah kipahthu ka gen uhi.
Jesu Krist a na ginna uh leh, misiangthoute jousiah tung a itna na neih na ua pat in.
Van a nou a ding a kinepna hung kikoihsak jiakin, hua kinepna thu pen tangthupha thutak thu ah tu masang laiin na jata uhi.
Hua tangthupha pen leitung pumpi a gah a akhanjel mahbang in, na jak ua thutak a Pasian hehpihna nung theihni ua pat in nalak ua gah a pungjel in na kiang uah a hung tungta hi.
Epaphra, ka sila tanpih uh deihtak, nou a ding a Krist nasem gin-omtak a pat zong na theihtak mahbang un.
Aman kha a nung itdan uh zong a phuangkhia hi.
Hih jiakin kou zong, hih ka jakni ua pat in, nou a ding a thum leh, pilna leh khalam theihchianna jousiah a amah deihdan theihna a nungdimna ding uh ngetsak ka tawp kei uhi.
Tuachia Toupa ding a kilawm leh sil jousiah a deihhuai a na gamtat ua, nasep hoih jousiah a nunggah ua, tualeh Pasian theihsiamna lam a nung khantouhna ding uleh;
asil bawltheihna thupitak dungjui a kipahna tawh kuhkalna leh thuak-hatna lam a hatna jousiah a hihhat a om in.
Vak a misiangthoute gou tankhawmpih ding a hung bawltu Pa kiang ah kipahthu gen in.
Aman mial sil bawltheihna a pan ahung tankhiata a, Tapa a ittak gam ah ahung lutsakta hi.
Amah ah a sisan jiakin tatkhiatna imu uhi, i khialhnate uh ngaihdamna pen.
Amah pen muhtheihlouh Pasian mel pua a, silsiam jousiah lak a piang masapen ahi.

Ajiak pen amah pansan a sil jousiah siam ahi a, van a omte leh lei a omte, muhtheih leh muhtheihlouh, laltouna hi in lalgam hitaleh, vaihawmnate leh thuneihnate hitaleh zong. Sil jousiah ama siam ahi a, amah ding a siam ahi.
Tualeh amah pen sil jousiah omma in a om a, amah ah sil jousiah a omkhawm hi.
Tualeh amah pumpi, chihpen, saptuam lutang ahi, sil bangkim a hihna mun a tantheihna dingin, bulpi pen misi lak a piang masa pen ahi.
Ajiak amah a bukimna jousiah ompen Pasian deihlam ahi.
Tualeh a kross sisan jiakin lemna bawlkhin in, amah in sil jousiah amah tawh a kilemsak hi; amah mah in lei a sil omte hii`` n van a sil omte hitaleh amah tawh akilemsak hi.
Tualeh nou, nidanglai a ana nasep uh gilou a amah a pat khen a om a, na lungsim ua melma na hi uhi.
Hinanleh tuin aman a taksa pumpi ah a sihna jiakin a hung kilemsakta hi. A mitmuh a siangthou leh gensiatbei leh phawkna ding beia a hung dinsak theihna ding in.

Ginna a na omjing ua, kingakna nei a na kip ua, tualeh tangthupha na jak uh kinepna a pat na ki khinmang kei uleh. Hua tangthupha pen vannuai a silsiam jousiah kiang a tangkou pih ahi a, kei Paul hua thu nasem ding a siam ka hi.
Nou a ding a ka gimthuakna ah tuin ka kipak hi, tualeh Krist gimthuakna ban pen a pumpi jiakin kasa ah ka sunjomjel hi, hua pumpi pen saptuam ahi.
Pasian thu hihbukim ding in, nou a ding a ka kiang a hung kipia Pasian hunbi khenna dungjuiin thu nasemtu ding a siam ka hi,
hua Pasian thu pen tangtawn a akhang akhang a thugu`k kiphual ana hi a, hinanleh tuinjaw a misiangthoute kiang ah hihlat in a omta hi.
Huate kiang ah Pasian in Jentelte lak ah hua thugu`k thupina hauhdan a theisak nuam mawng ahi, hihpen nou a Krist om, thupina kinepna ahi.
Michih Jesu Krist hoih bukim a a kipiak theihna ding ua, michih kiveng ding a hilh a, pilna chinteng a jilsak a, a tanchin ka genpa uh ahi.
Hichibang ding in ken zong, keimah a thupitak a sem, hua nasepna dungjui in hahpan a pang in ka semgim hi.
Ajiak nou leh Laudisia khua a omte leh taksa a kamel munailou jousiahte ding a ka hahbawl dan thei le uchin ka ut hi.
Pasian, Pa leh Krist thugu`k theikhia ding a theihsiamna kichiantak hauhsakna jousiah lam a itna-a khuikhawm a aom ua, a lungtangte uh khamuanga a omtheihna ding in.
Hua Krist ah pilna leh theihna gou jousiah phual in a om hi.
Tualeh kuamah in kamsiam thu a hung khemlouhna ding un, hih ka gen ahi.
Ajiak taksa in na kiang uah omkei nanleng zong, kipaktak in, na hoihdan uleh, Krist a na ginkip dan uh en in, kha in na kiang uah ka om hi.
Tuajiakin Jesu Krist, Toupa pen na pomkip ta`k mahbang un, amah ah om un.
Amah ah jungkha leh lamtouh a om in, ahung kihilhtak mahbang a ginna a kiptak a om in, hua ah kipahthu genna a dim in om un.
Pilvang un, atuachih keileh mi kuahiam in Krist thu bang hilou in, mihing dan leh leitung thubulte bangjaw in, leitung pilna leh khemna in a hungkhem kha ding uhi.
Ajiak amah ah Pasian hihna bukimna jousiah pumpi nei in a om hi,
tualeh nou amah ah na bukimta uhi, amah pen lalna leh thuneihna jousiah lutang ahi.
Amah ah nou zong khut a tan hilou in, taksa khialhna paikhia a Krist teptanna a teptan na hi uhi.
Baptisma ah amah tawh vui na hita ua, huamah ah misi lak a amah kaithoutu Pasian nasep gintat jiakin amah tawh kaihthou na hita uhi.
Tualeh nou, na khialhnate uleh na taksa ua teptan louhna jiak a si na hih ua, na bohsiatna jousiah uh hung ngaidam in, aman Krist tawh ahung hihhing kikta hi;
danthu, ei hungdou leh eitawh kikalh lam a khut a gelh pen a nawtmangta a, tualeh kross dawn ah kilhden in a lamangta hi.
Lalnate leh thuneihnate suahkhia in, kross ah huate jouin, alangtang in etsakna in abawlta hi.
Tuajiakin mi kuamah in, nek thu in hiam, dawn thu in hiam, misiangthou thu in hiam, khathak thu in hiam ahihkeileh khawlni thu in hiam ahita in zong nou hungdem kei uhen.
Huate pen sil hungtung dingte lim ahi a, hinanleh ataktak pen Krist ahi.
Mi kuamah in, a silmuh ngailouhte, a taksa lungsim a thulimlou in, mahni siamthuh ki ngiamkhiat na leh vantungmite biakna zangin na nuamman muh ding uh hung laksak kei hen.
Tualeh, taksa jousiahin ki vakkhangna nei a, ki zopkhawm leh ki kankhawm a nna sem a, tualeh ki khuikhawm a Pasian khanna a a khanletna lutang a tudet kei hi.
Tuajiakin, leitung thubulte a pat Krist tawh si na hihtak uleh, bangding a, leitung a hing bang a dan thupiakte nuai a kituhlut na hi ua,
“Khoihkha ken, chiamken, thamkha ken”? chihte.
Hihte pen jakkawm a mangthang ding ahi a, hihte bawl pen mihing thupiak leh thuhilhna jui ahi.
Hih silte pen utthu a biak leh kingaihngiam leh taksa ngaihsaklou a silbawl ah pilhuai abang na a, hinanleh sa deihlam khamna lam ah bangmah aphatuam kei hi.
Tuachia Krist tawh kaihthoh a om na hihtak uleh, tunglam a Pasian jiatlam a tou Krist omna a sil omte jong un.
Tunglam a sil omte ah na lungsim uh nga unla, leitung a sil omte ah hilou in.
Ajiak, na sita ua, na hinna uh Krist tawh Pasian ah phual ahita hi.
Krist i hinna uh ahung kilak chiangin, tuachi`n nou zong thupitak in na kilang ding uhi!
Tuajiakin na taksa hiang uh lei a omte hihlum un, kingaihnate, nitnate, ki etlahnate, hoihloute, utna giloute, tualeh duhgawlnate, (duhgawlna pen milim biakna ahi).
Hua silte jiakin Pasian thangpaihna thumanglou tate tung ah atung nak hi.
Nou zong tu masangin hua silte a na hinlai un, huate ah na om uhi.
Hinanleh tuinjaw noujong hehnate, thangpaihnate, huatnate, gensiatnate, houlimna thanghuaite, hihte jousiah na kam uapat koihmang un.
Mihing luipen asilbawl tawh na koihkhiata uh chih thei in, khat leh khat kikhemtuah kei un.
Mihing thak in na kivonta ua, huapen theihsiamna nei a, asiamtu batpih a siamthak in a omta hi.
Hua ah Grikmi leh Judami, teptan leh tanlou, melmami leh Skithiami, tualeh saltang leh zalen zong a om tuankei hi; hinanleh Krist pen bangkim ahi a, bangkim ah a om hi.
Tuajiakin, Pasian mitel, misiangthou leh ittakte bangin lainatna lungtangte, chitnate, kingiamkhiatna lungsimte, nunnemnate, tualeh thuak-hatnate in kivon un.
Khat leh khat kithuakjou tuah unla, ki ngaihdam tuah un, khat in khat tung a thubuai bang aneih leh Krist in nou ahung ngaihdam bangin nou zong ki ngaidam un.
Hinanleh hih silte jousiah tung ah itna silhthuah un, huapen bukimna kankhawmna ahi.
Tualeh Pasian khamuanna na lungtang uah vaihawmsak un, huachi bang hi dingin pumpi khat a sap na hi uhi, kipakdan zong thei un.

Krist thu pen pilna jousiahin nou ah tampi in omsak un, phatna la bang, Pasian biakna la bang, tualeh khalam la bang, kijilsak in, ki thuhilhtuah unla, na lungtang ua hehpihna nei in Toupa ah la sa un.
Tualeh na bawljousiah uh, thugen hi in nasep hitaleh, aun in Toupa Jesu min in, amah jiak a Pa Pasian kiang a kipahthu genkawm in bawl un.
Zite aw, Toupa ah a kilawm hun bangjel in na pasalte uh kiang ah kituhlut un.
Pasalte aw, na zite uh it unla, atung uah gilou kei un.
Tate aw, siljousiah ah na nulepate uh thu mang un, ajiak hihpen Toupa kipaksakna ahi.
Pate aw, na tate uh hih thangpai kei un, atuachih keileh a lungkia khading uhi.
Silate aw, sil bangkim ah taksa a na pute uh thu mang un, mitmei veng a mihing kipaksak ding giap hilou in, lungsim a ginomtak in leh Pasian laukawm jaw in.
Tualeh na bawl taphot uh mihingte ding a bawl bang hilou in, Toupa ding bang in lungsim a chihtak tak in bawl un.
Toupa kiang a pat in nuamman ding gou na mu ding uh chih thei in. Ajiak pen Krist Toupa nna sepsak na hi uhi.
Hinanleh sil diklou bawltu in a sildiklou bawlman a mukik ding hi, kideihsak tuamna bangmah a om kei hi.
Pute aw, nou zong van ah pu khat nanei uh chih thei in na silate uh tung ah adik leh akilawm hun bawl un.
Lungluttak in thum jomjel unla, hua ah kipahthu gen kawm in kiveng jing un.
Kolbulh a ka omna pen, Krist thugu`k gen ding a Pasian in kou ding a thugenna kot ahung honsak theihna dingin kou ding in zong hung thumsak un.
Ka gen ding bangtak a ka genkhiat theihna ding in.
Hun lemtang lei in, pualam mite lak ah pilvangtak in om un.
Michih bang chibang a dawnding ahia chih na theihtheihna ding un na ham kamsuak uh chisoh hehpihna jau hi gige hen.
Ka tanchin jousiah pen sanggam ittak Tikika nasemtu gin-om leh Toupa a ka sila hihpih in nou ahung theisak siang ding hi.
Hua ding mah in amah na kiang uah kung sawl ahi, na tanchin uh atheih a, tualeh na lungtang uh a khamuansak theihna ding in.
Onesima, sanggam gin-om leh it omtak, noulak a mi mah tawh, amau`n hihlam sil omdan jousiah ahung theisak ding uhi.
Aristarkha, ka thong tangpih in chibai a hungbuk hi, Marka, Barnaba tupa in zong chibai a hungbuk hi, (amah tungtang ah thupiak na mu uh; na kiang ua a hungpaileh kipaktak in na pom un.)
Tualeh Jesu, Jasta zong achih uh, teptanmi in nou chibai a hungbuk hi. Hihte guak Pasian gam thu lam a ka naseppih ahung khamuantute ahi uhi.
Epaphra, nalak ua mi, Krist sila in nou chibai a hungbuk hi. Pasian deihlam jousiah a hoihkim leh bukim a na dingdet theihna ding un amah pen thumna ah theihtawp suah in apang hi.
Ajiak aman nou a ding leh, Laudisia leh Hirapoli khua a omte ding in phattuam angai mahmah chih kana theihpih hi.
Luka, daktor ittak leh Dema in nou chibai a hungbuk hi.
Laudisia khua a unau omte leh, Nimpha leh a inn a saptuam omte chibai hung buksak in.
Tualeh hih laikhak nalak ua na simzoh chiang un, Laudisia saptuamte lak ah zong na simsak un. Tualeh tuachimah bang in nou zong Laudisia khua a laikhak pen na sim un.
Tualeh Arkippa kiang ah, “Toupa a nasepna na muhpen hihbukim ding in pilvang in,” nachi un.
Keimah Paul in, keimah khut a chibai kungbukna ahi, ka kolbulhte thei gige un! Hehpihna na kiang uah om hen. Amen.
Paul leh, Sila leh, Timothi in,
Pa Pasian leh Toupa Jesu Krist a Thessalonika khua a om saptuamte kiangah:
Pasian i Pa uh leh i Toupa Jesu Krist a pat hehpihna leh khamuanna na kiang uah om hen.
Ka thumna ua na min uh louin, noute tengteng jiakin Pasian kiang ah kipahthu ka genjing uhi.
I Pasian leh Pa mai ah na ginna nasepte uh, itna a nasepgimte uh, tualeh i Toupa Jesu Krist a kinepna jiak a na thuakzohnate uh manghilhlou a theijing in.
Unau ittakte aw, Pasian tel na hih uh thei in.

Ajiak ka tangthupha uh athu guak a na kiang ua hungpai hilou in, sil bawltheihna leh Khasiangthou leh theihchianna thupitak tawh hungtung ahi a. Nou jiakin nalak ua mi bang chibang mi ka hi ua chih natheih bang un.
Tualeh haksatna thuak pum in, Khasiangthou a kipak kawm in thu pen pom in, kou leh Toupa juite na hi uhi.
Tuachi`n Mesidonia leh Akhaia gam a gingtu tengteng ding in etton ding na hita uhi.
Ajiak pen nou a kipan Toupa thu a thangkhiata a, Mesidonia leh Akhaia gam guak ah hilou in, munchin teng ah Pasian lam a na gindan uh athangta hi. Kou bangmah ka gen uh angai nawn kei hi.
Ajiak pen amauh ngeiin nalak ua bang chibang lutna ahia ka muh uh, ka tanchin uleh, Pasian hing leh dik bia ding a milimte a pat Pasian lam na ngatdan uh a hungtheisak uhi.
Tualeh a Tapa misi lak a kipan a akaihthawh thangpaihna hungtung ding lak a hung suaktasakpa Jesu van a pat na ngak ding in.
Ajiak pen unaute aw, nalak ua kung paina uh athawn ahikei chih noumau ngeiin nathei uhi.

Hinanleh hua masang a na theihsa uh mahbang un, Philippi khua a ka thuakgimna uh leh jumhuaitak a bawlgawp a ka omnung un, buai pumpum in zong Pasian tangthupha na kiang ua gen dingin ka Pasian uah ka hangsanjaw sem uhi.
Ajiak, ka thugen uh juau a kipan ahikei a, sianglou a pawt zong ahikei a, tualeh khembawlna in zong ahikei hi.
Tangthupha kepsak a om ding a, Pasian phatsak mi ka hih mahbang un mihing kipaksak ding bang hilou a ka lungtang uh endiktu Pasian kipaksak hijaw in, thu ka genjel ding uh ahijaw hi.
Ajiak bangmah chik in zong kimaitang phatna leh duh-amna thu hiam ka jangngai kei uh chih nathei uh, pahtawina ka jong ngaikei uhi!
Krist sawltakte ka hihjiak un thuneihna zangthei himah nanle ung, mihing tung leh, nou tung leh, midangte tung ah zong pahtawina ka zong ngaikei uhi,
hinanleh nu in a tate a duat bawl bangin nalak uah migitak in ka omjaw uhi.
Tuachi`n, ka deihtakte uh nung hihtak jiak un nou hung ngaina mahmah in Pasian tangthupha guak hilou in, kou hinna tanpha hung piak ka ut uhi.
Ajiak unaute aw, ka sepgim dan uleh ka gimdan uh na theigige uhi, nalak ua kuamah ka sukbuai louhna ding un sun leh jan a sem in Pasian tangthupha nou kung hilh uhi.
Nou gingtute lak a siangthoutak leh, diktak leh, gensiatbei a ka gamtat dan uh ahung theihpihtute na hi uhi, Pasian zong.
Pa in tate tung a abawl bangin, nou hung hasot in, hung khamuan in, tualeh hunghilh in na tung ua ka bawl dan uh nathei uhi.
Ama kumpi gam leh athupina-a nou hung samlutpa Pasianmi ding a chinna nei a na omtheihna ding un.

Hih jiakin Pasian kiang ah tawplou in kipahthu ka gen uhi. Ajiak Pasian thu kou a pat a na jak uh na pom laiun, mihing thu bang a pom hilou in, hinanleh thutak, nou a gingtate a zong thupitak a nasemthei Pasian thu bang in na pomjaw uhi.
Ajiak, unaute aw, Judea gam a Pasian saptuam pawl Krist Jesu a omte juitute na hi ua, amau`n Judate lak a athuak bang un, nou zong na gammite lak ah na thuak uhi.
Hua Judate`n Toupa Jesu leh a Jawlneite uh athat ua, kou zong ahung bawlgenthei ua, tualeh Pasian a lungkimsak kei ua, mijousiah akalh uhi!
Hundam a hihtheihna ding ua Jentelte kiang a thugen a hungkham ua, a khialhnate uh hihdim gige na dingin, hinanleh Pasian thangpaihna pen ahuaisia theitawp in atung uah a tungta hi!
Hinanleh kou pen, unaute aw, tomnou khat sung lungtang lam hilou a, mellam guak kikhen a i om jiakin, kilawptak a namel uh muding in ka hahpan sem uhi!
Tuajiakin, na kiang uah hungpai ka sawm ua, kei Paul ngeiin zong nihveijen hungpai ka sawmta a, hinanleh setan in a hungdal nak hi.
Ajiak, ka kinepna uh hiam, ka kipahna uh hiam, ahihkeileh ka kipahna lallukhu uh bang ahia! A hungpai chiang a i Toupa Jesu Krist mai ah nou mahmah hilou ding na hi uh maw leh?
Ajiak noupen ka suan uh leh ka kipahna na hi uhi.
Tuachi`n ka thuakzoh nawnlouh tak un Athen khua ah kouguak in nutsiat in omle ung hoih kasa ua
tualeh i sanggampa uh Timothi Pasian nasemtu, Krist tangthupha lam a ka seppih uh, nou hung hihkip ding leh na ginna lam ua hung khamuan dingin kung sawl uhi,
hua gimthuaknate jiak a kuamah a kilinglouhna ding in, ajiak hih silte thuak ding mawng a guat i hi uh chih noumah ngeiin nathei uhi.
Ajiak, adiktak in, na kiang ua ka omlai un gimthuakna thuak ding ihi uh chih kung hilhkholhta uhi; huachibang ngeiin a tungta hi, huapen nathei uhi.
Hihjiakin ka thuakzoh nawnlouh tak un, khemtu in nou ahung khem khading, ka sepgimna uh athawn khading chiin na gindan uh thei dingin mi kung sawl hi!

Hinanleh Timothi tuin na kiang ua pat ka kiang uh a hungtun in na ginna uh leh na itna uh, tualeh kou nou kung muh nuam mahmah bang un nou zong kou hung munuam mahmah in nung theijing uh chih tanchin kipahhuaitak ahung puak hi.
Tuajiakin, unaute aw, ka thuakgimna uh ka haksatna jousiah uh na ginna jiak un na tung uah khamuangtak in ka om uhi,
Ajiak tuin ka hingta uh, Toupa a na dinkip phot uleh.
I Pasian uh maiah na tung ua ka kipakna jousiah uh jiakin noulam thu ah Pasian kiangah bang chibang kipahthu ka gen tazen ding uai maw.
Na mel uh kung muhtheihna ding uleh, na ginna lam ua na taksap uh kung hihbukimsak theihna ding un sun leh jan in hah thum in ka thum uhi.
Tuin Pasian ngei leh i Pa un, Toupa Jesu Krist in na kiang lam uah hung paipih hen!
Tualeh noulam a itna ka hauh bang un, Toupa`n nou khat leh khat ki-it tuahna leh mi jousiah na itna uh hung khangsak in, hung hausakta hen.
Tuachi`n i Toupa Jesu Krist, a misiangthoute jousiah tawh a hungpai chiangin Pasian, i Pa uh maiah na lungtangte uh siangthouna lam a dembeiin ahung hihkip thei ding hi.
Tuachi`n unaute aw, atawppen in, na omdan ding uleh Pasian na kipahsak dan ding uh. Ka kiang ua kipan a nalak bang un na hauhsem na ding un. Toupa Jesu min in kung ngen un, kung hasot uhi.
Ajiak pen Toupa Jesu jiakin bang chibang thute ahia kungpiak uh chih nathei uhi.
Ajiak Pasian deihdan, na siangthouna ding uh ahihleh hih ahi, kingaih tawpsan un.
Michih in siangthou leh zahtak tak a abel chiat uh kepdan atheih ding uh ahi.
Pasian theilou Jentelte bang a huk lam a kipia lou in.
Hualam thu ah kuamah aval a gamtang in a unau ze-khem in sil gilou bawlkei hen, Toupa, huachibang sil bawlte jousiah phu latu ahihjiak in, kou zong kung hilhkholh un, kung theisak khinta uhi.
Ajiak pen Pasian in sianglou dingin a hungsam kei a, hinanleh siangthou dingin a hungsam jaw hi.
Tuajiakin kuapeuh hih nial pen mihing nial ahikei a, Pasian, a Khasiangthou hungpiapa nial ahijaw hi.
Hinanleh sanggam ki itna lam thu ah kung gelhsak na ngaikei uhi, ajiak pen ki-it tuah chiat ding in noumah ngei Pasian hilh in na om uhi.
Mesidonia gam pumpi a unau om jousiah tung ah huapen na bawl ngutngei uhi, hinanleh unaute aw, hung khang semsem ding in kung ngen uhi.
Thu kung piak bang ua kamtawm deuh a om sawm a, na nna chiat uh ngaihsak a, tualeh na khut mahmah ua nasep sawm in.
Tuachia pualam mite lam a kilawmtak a na omtheihna ding un leh, bangmah taksap na neihlouhna ding un.
Hinanleh unaute aw, midang kinepna mawng mawng neiloute bang a na lungkham louhna ding un ihmute tungtang na theihlouh uh ka deihkei hi.
Ajiak, Jesu asi a, a thoukik chih i gintat leh, tuachimah bangin Jesu-a ihmute zong Pasian in amah tawh ahung puikhawm ding hi.
Hihpen Toupa thu in na kiang uah ka gen hi, eite Toupa hungpai dong a hing a na omlaite in ihmute i makhelh kei ding hi.
Ajiak pen Toupa mahmah kikou aw tawh, vantungmi tungnung pen aw tawh, tualeh Pasian pengkul ging tawh van a kipat hung kumsuk ding ahi a, tualeh Krist a sisate a thoumasa ding ua;
Tuazoh chiangin ei hing a na omlaite huihkhua ah Toupa tuakding in amauh tawh meipi lak ah laktouh in i om ding a, tuachi`n tangtawn in Toupa kiang ah i omta ding hi.
Tuajiakin, hihthute in khat leh khat ki khamuan tuah chiat un.
Hinanleh unaute aw, ahun leh ni lam thu ah kung gelhsak na ngaikei uhi.
Ajiak nou mahmah in Toupa ni pen jan a guta bangin a hungtung ding hi chih chiantak in nathei uhi.
“Muanna leh bitna,” chia agen laitak un numei nauvei bangin thakhat in manthaina atung uah a hungtung ding a, a suakta mawng mawng kei ding uhi.
Hinanleh unaute aw, nou pen hua ni a guta bang a ahung bingphawn dingin mial ah na omkei uhi.
Na un un vak tate leh sun tate na hi ua, jan a mi i hikei ua, mial a mi zong i hikei uhi.
Tuajiakin midangte bangin i ihmu kei ding uh, kiging in i ngaihsakjaw ding uhi.
Ihmute pen janin ahi a ihmut uh, tualeh uain khamte zong janin ahi a kham uh.
Hinanleh ei sun a miten ginna leh itna awmphaw silh in, hundamna kinepna pen lukhu a khu in i ngaihsakjaw ding uhi.
Ajiak Pasian in thangpaihna tuakding in a hungguat kei a, hinanleh i Toupa Jesu Krist jiakin hundamna ngahdingin a hungguat ahijaw hi,
amah pen i tangin si a, ithoh in zong i ihmut in zong, amah tawh ihinkhawm theih na ding in.
Tuajiakin nana bawljel mahbang un ki khamuan tuah chiat unla, ki hihhattuah chiat un.
Tualeh unaute aw, nalak ua semgimte leh, Toupa a na lamkaite uleh, nou hung hilhtute theijing un.
Tualeh a nasep jiak un amauh thupitak a itna a ngaisang dingin kung ngen uhi. Kituak chiat in om un.
Tuin unaute aw, kung hasot uhi, dan banglou a omte hilh unla, lungkiate khamuan unla, hatloute panpih unla, mi tengteng lak ah thuakjoutak in om un.
Kuamah in kua gitlouh zong gitlouh a thuklou dingin pilvang un, hinanleh noulak hi in mi tengteng lak ah hitaleh ahoih taphot jui un.
Nuam gige un,
tawplou in thum un,
sil bangkim ah kipahthu genjing un. Ajiak noulam thu ah Jesu Krist ah hih pen Pasian deihlam ahi.
Kha sumit kei un;
Pasian thu kigen simmawh kei un.
Sil jousiah enchian unla, ahoihlam taphot tu tinten un
giloulam jousiah a pat kihemkhia un.
Khamuanna Pasian ngeiin napum un hung hih siangthou hen, tualeh nakha uleh, na lungsim uleh na taksa uh i Toupa Jesu Krist hungpai chiang a gensiatbei ding in humbit in om hen.
Nou hungsampa a gin-om bangin, bawl zong a bawl ding hi.
Unaute aw hung thumsak un.
Unaute jousiah tawp siangthou in chibai kibuk un.
Hih laikhak unau siangthoute jousiah kiang ah simsak dingin Toupa min in thu kung pia hi.
I Toupa Jesu Krist hehpihna na kiang uah om hen. Amen.
Paul, Sila leh Timothi in, I Pa uh Pasian leh Toupa Jesu Krist-a
Thessalonika khua a saptuamte kiang ah:
I Pa uh Pasian leh I Toupa Jesu Krist a kipan hehpihna leh khamuanna na kiang uah om hen.
Unaute aw, na ginna uh nasatak a akhanlet a, na un ua na ki-it tuahna uh akhansem jiakin, na tungthu uah bawltuak ahihmah bangin Pasian kiang ah kipahthu genjing ding mawng ahi.
Tuachi`n miin ahung bawl gentheihnate uleh, na thuakgimna jousiah ua na thuakzoh dan uleh na gindan jousiah uh jiakin Pasian saptuam pawlte lak ah kung suang mahmah hi.
Hihpen Pasian gam mi hitak a guat na hihtheihna ding ua Pasian vaihawmna diktak chiamtehna chiantak ahi a, huading mah a zong thuak na hi uhi.
Nou hung hihbuaite gimthuakna a thuk pen Pasian a ding a sil diktat-huai ahi chih thei in,
tualeh nou hihgim a omte pen, Toupa Jesu van a kipan a a vantungmi hattak tawh a hung kilak chiangin, kou tawh khawlna a piakthuk kik a om in,
meikuang ahung kilak chiangin, Pasian theiloute leh I Toupa Jesu Krist tangthupha thu mangloute tung ah phuba la in.
Hihte jousiah Toupa maiah leh asil bawltheihna thupitak a kipan in tangtawn manthaina ah gawt in aom ding uhi,
huani a misiangthoute a hihthupi a om ding leh agingta jousiahte a lamdang sak a om ding a ahung pai chiang in.

Tuajiakin, I Pasian un nou ahung sapna a saptaak him ahung sakna dingin. Tualeh hoih utna jousiah leh ginna nasep jousiah asil bawltheihna tawh ahung bukimsak theihna dingin, nou a dingin zong ka thum gige uhi.
I Pasian uleh Toupa Jesu hehpihna dungjui a, I Toupa uh Jesu min pen nou a, tualeh noumah a hihthupia aom theihna ding in ka thum uhi.
Tuin unaute aw, I Toupa uh Jesu Krist hungpai nang leh, akiang a iva kikhop na ding thu ah, kung ngen uhi,
Toupa ni pen a hungtung khinta chih nakha hiam, thu in hiam, tualeh kou a kipat laikhak in hiam na lungtang uh hihling a ompai a, ahihkeileh buailou ding in.
Kuaman bangmah in hungkhem kei hen. Ajiak puksanna a hungtun masak a, khialhna mipa, mangthang tapa ahung kilak phot keileh huani hung tunglou ding ahi.
Aman Pasian chih a om jousiah leh a kibia jousiah dou a, atung ua om sawm in aki hihthupi ding a. Pasian tempul ah touin Pasian in a ki bawl ding hi.
Na kiang ua ka um laiin hihthute kung hilhta hi chih theilou na hi umaw?
Tualeh tuin amah pen ama huntak a ahung kilat ding, bang in ahia adal ding chih nathei uhi.
Ajiak dan juihlouhna thugu`k in asem panta hi, adaltu lampi a pat lakmang ahih masiah in adal jing ding hi.
Tuachi`n lakmang ahih chiangin migiloupa pen ahung kilang ding a, Toupa Jesu`n amah pen akam a hu in a kangtumsak ding a, ahung kilakna vak in ahihmang ding hi.
Dan botsiapa hung paina pen setan nasep dungjui a sil bawltheihnate, chiamtehnate, sillamdang juautheite,
tualeh mangthangte a dingin diktatlouhna khemna jousiah tawh ahi ding hi. Hundam a a omtheihlouh na ding ua thutak itna apomlouh jiak un.
Tualeh hih jiakin juauthu a gintatna ding un Pasian in diklouhna nasep hattak a kiang uah asawl ding hi.
Thutak gingtalou a, diktatlouhna kipahpih jawte a un ua siamlouh tansak a a omtheihna ding in ahi.

Hinanleh unaute aw, Toupa ittakte, kha hih siangthouna leh thutak gintatna jiak a hundam a om ding a atu`ng a kipat Pasian in nou a hungtel jiak in. Koupen na tungthu uah Pasian kiang a kipahthu genjing ding mawng ka hi uhi.
Huachibang ding in aman I Toupa Jesu Krist thupina tang ding in ka tangthupha un nou a hungsam hi.
Tuajiakin, unaute aw, dingkip unla, thugen in hi in, ka laikhak un hitaleh, thugousiah nou hung kihilhte tukip un.
Tuin I Toupa uh Jesu Krist leh Pasian I Pa uh ngei eite hung it a, hehpihna jiak a tangtawn khamuanna hungpiapan,
na lungtang uh hih khamuang in, thugen leh nasephoih chinteng ah hung hihkipta hen.
Atawppen in unaute aw, Toupa thu noumauh a aom bang a kintak a khang a hihthupi a a omtheihna ding leh,
tualeh mi genhakte leh mi giloute lak a ka bitna ding un hung thumsak un, ajiak pen mi jousiahin ginna a neisiang kei uhi.
Hinanleh Toupa a gin-om a, aman nou ahung hihkip ding a, silgilou lak ah a hungveng ding hi.
Tualeh kung thupiakte uh na bawl ua, na bawljel ding uh chih Toupa ah kung muang uhi.
Tuin Toupa`n na lungtangte uh Pasian itna ah leh Krist ding a thuakzohna ah hung kailut hen.
Hinanleh unaute aw, kou a pat namuh uh thugousiah bang a omlou a, dan banglou a gamtang unaute jousiah lak ah ki hemkhia ding in I Toupa Jesu min in thu kungpia uhi.
Ajiak pen noumah ngeiin nungjuih danding uh nathei uhi, ajiak nalak uah dan banglou in ka gamtang kei uhi.
Kuamah tanghou zong athawn in ka nekei ua, hinanleh nalak ua kuamah kung hihbuai louhna ding un sun leh janin ka semgimjaw uhi.
Thuneihna ka neihlouh jiak uh ahikei a, hinanleh nung juihding ua etton ding ka bawl uh ahijaw hi.
Na kiang ua ka omlai un zong, “Kuapeuh in nna asep nuam keileh nek zong nekdah hen, chih thu kungpia uhi.”
Ajiak nalak ua dan banglou a gamta, nna mawng mawng semlou a, hinanleh mi nasepna va gensiatsak mi khenkhat aom uh chih kaja uhi.
Huachibang mite pen hamtamlou a nna sem kinken ding leh, amauh tanghou kinek dingin Toupa Jesu Krist minin thu pia in ka hasot uhi.
Hinanleh unaute aw, noujaw silhoih bawl chimtak kei un.
Tualeh kuapeuh in hih laikhak a ka thu uh ajuih keileh, huami pen chiamteh unla. Kithuahpih kei un, a jumtheihna dingin.
Hitalehzong melma bangin bawl kei unla, hinanleh unau bangin taihilhjaw un.
Tuin khamuanna Toupa amah mah in bangkim ah, bangchiklai peuh in nou khamuanna hungpia jing hen, Toupa`n na un un hung ompih jingta hen.
Hih ka chibai bukna laikhak pen kei Paul in ka khut ngei a ka gelh ahi, ka laikhak tengah chiamtehna ahi, hichi bang a ka gelhjel ahi.
I Toupa Jesu Krist hehpihna na kiang uah om hen. Amen.
Paul, I hundampa uh Pasian leh, i kinepna uh Toupa Jesu Krist thupiak bang a Jesu Krist sawltak in
Ginna a ka tapa taktak Timothi kiang ah, Pasian I Pa uh leh, I Toupa Jesu Krist kiang a kipan, hehpihna leh, zahngaihna leh, khamuanna omta hen.
Mesidonia gam a ka pai ding kuan a, Ephesa khua a na omgige uh ka deih a, mi khenkhat in kihilhna diklou a hilhlouhna ding leh,
ginna a Pasian ngaihsakna kichilna ompen hilou a, kiselna piangsak tangthu pouh leh tangthu sutsenglouh maimai a ngaihsaklouh na ding ua, hilh ding a kung nget bang un, huachin bawl in.
Tualeh thupiak kipiak jiak ahihleh, lungtang siangthou leh, sia leh pha theihna hoih leh, ginna diktak a itna a kipan ahi.
Mi khenkhatten hihte pialsan in, thu ginalou genna lam ah a kiheimang santa uhi.
A thugen uleh sil ahi a agente uh zong bang ahia chih theichian loupi in, danthu hilhtute hih a ut uhi.
Hinanleh mi`n dan ahibangtak a ajak leh, dan pen ahoih chih ithei uhi.

Hih thei in, hua dan pen mi diktatte ding a bawl ahi kei a, hinanleh thumanglou leh genhakte a ding, Pasian ngaihsaklou leh mikhialte a ding, mi siangloute leh Pasian zahloute a ding, pate thatte leh nute thatte a ding, mihing thatte a ding,
kingaihhatte a ding, pasal leh pasal kipawl thanghuaite a ding, mihing gutute a ding, juauhatte a ding, dikloupi a kichiamte a ding, tualeh thugin tawh kikalh sildang a omleh huate a dingin ahi.
Ka kiang a kepsak a om, pahtawitak Pasian thupitak tangthupha dungjui in.
Tualeh nasemtu a hungkoih a, gin-om a ahung sim jiakin, ahung hitheisaktu Jesu Krist, I Toupa uh ka phat ahi,
tu masang in Pasian gensiatu, bawl gentheitu leh simmohtu na himahleng zong. Hinanleh zahngaihna ka muta hi, ginglou pi a theilou a ka bawl ahihjiak in.
Tualeh I Toupa uh hehpihna pen Krist Jesu a om ginna leh itna in adimlet hi.
Krist Jesu pen mikhialte tan ding in leitung ah a hungpai hi chihthu gintat om leh, pomtak mahmah ahi. Hua mikhialte lak ah kei alianpen ka hi,
ahihhangin, tunung chiang a tangtawn hinna ding a amah hung gingta dingte etton ding in Jesu Krist in a thuakzoh dan keimah a ahihlat masak theihna dingin hih jiakin zahngaihna ka mu hi.
Tuin tangtawn kumpipa sitheilou, muhtheihlouh Pasian pil khat guak kiang ah zahna leh thupina tangtawn tangtawn in omta hen! Amen.
Ka tapa Timothi aw, tu masang a tangthupha na kiang a ka genkholh thute dungjuiin hih thupiakte kung pia hi. Huate a kidouna hoih na doutheihna ding in,
ginna leh sia leh pha theihna hoihpen tukip in, huapen mi khenkhatte in a paikhia ua ginna lam ah longsia bangin a kehgawpta uhi.
Amauh lak ah Haimena leh Aleksander ahi uh, Pasian gensiatlouh ajil theihna ding un amauh pen setan ka piata hi.
Tuajiakin, a masapen in, sil ngetnate, thumnate, thumsaknate tualeh kipahthu gennate mi jousiah bawlsak dingin kung ngen hi;
kumpipate leh thuneihna mun a om jousiah a ding in zong, tuachia Pasian limsak leh zah-omtak a hinkhua kituak leh muanhuaitak a i mantheihna ding un hihbang a thumsak ding ahi.
Hihpen I hundampa uh Pasian mitmuh in ahoih in apomta`k hi,
aman mi jousiah hundam a om ding leh thutak hungthei dingin adeih hi.
Ajiak Pasian khat a om a, tualeh Pasian leh mihing kikal ah palai khat a om hi, mihing Krist Jesu pen,
ahuntak a theihsak a om ding in, amahleh amah mi jousiah tatkhiatna dingin ahung kipiakhia hi,
hua ding a thugentu leh sawltak a guat ka hi, Krist ah thutak ka gen ahi. Ginna leh thutak a Jentelte hilhtu ka hi!
Tuajiakin pasalte`n mun jousiah ah khut siangthou tungtou in, thangpailou leh ginglellou in thum le uh ka deih hi.
Tuachibang mah in numeite pen puansilh kilawm hun leh jumtheihna omtan siam in kijem le uh, sam phekkil hiam, kham hiam, tuikepsuang hiam, ahihkeileh sil mantam a kijemlou in,
hinanleh numei Pasian ngaihsak kichite a hungiap in, silbawl hoih in kijem le uh ka deih hi.
Numeiin thumang tak in dai khinkhian in jil uhen.
Tualeh numei in thu ahilh ka phalkei, tualeh pasal tung a thu aneih zong ka phalkei, hinanleh, dai khinkhian in omjaw uhen.
Ajiakpen Adam siam masak ahi a, tuanung in Evi siam ahi.
Tualeh Adam khem in a omkei a, hinanleh numei khem in aom a, bawhsiatna ah a pukta hi.
Hitaleh zong ginna, itna leh siangthouna nei a mahni kithunun a aomjing uleh nauneihna ah hundam in a om ding uhi.
Kuapeuh saptuam lamkai hih ut in nahoih sep a ut ahi, chih adik hi.
Tuachi`n saptuam lamkai ding pen gensiat bei, zi khat nei, kidekthei, chihtakna lungsim nei, gamtathoih, mi pahtakdan siam, thuhilh siam;
uain kham hatlou, mivuak hatlou, dangka duh-amlou, hinanleh migi, misel hatlou, mi enghatlou;
ama innsung kizentak a kemsiammi, zah omtak a atate kemsiammi, ahih ding ahi.
Ajiak pen miin ama innsung bawn vaihawm dan a theihkeileh, bangchiin Pasian saptuamte a enkol thei dia?
Gingthakmi ahihlouh ding ahi, atuachih keileh aki sathei khading a, setan siamlouh tanna ah apuk khading hi.
Tualou zong, pualam mite genphat ahih ngeingei ding ahi, atuachih keileh gensiat a om in setan thang ah a awk khading hi.
Tuachimah bangin, saptuam upate pen mi zah om, kamtam lou; uain hailou, dangka duh-amlou, ahih ding uh ahi;
sia leh pha theihna siang a ginna thugu`k kemmi ahih ding ahi.
Hinanleh hihte ah etchian in om masa uh henla, tuazoh chiangin gensiat bei ahih uleh saptuam upa nna sem uh hen.
Tuachimah bangin azite uh zong mi zah-om ahih ngeingei ding uh ahi, kamtam lou, kidekthei, sil jousiah a gin-om ahih ding uh ahi.
Saptuam upate pen zi khat nei, a tate leh a innsung uh kizentak a vaihawm siammi hi hen.
Ajiak pen saptuam upa nna hoihtak a semten dinmun hoihtak leh Krist Jesu a om ginna lam a hangsanna thupitak amu uhi.
Tomkhat zoh chiang a na kiang ua hungpai kinem in hihthute na kiang uah kung gelh hi.
Hinanleh kung zekai khak leh, Pasian innkuan sung a bang chibang a gamta ding na hia chih na theihna dingin kung gelh ahi, huapen Pasian hing saptuam, thutak khuam leh kingakna ahi uhi.
Tualeh Pasian ngaihsakna thugu`k pen nial guallouh in athupi ahi:
Pasian pen taksa in ahung kilang a,
Kha in siam atang a,
vantungmiten amu ua, Jentelte kiangah tangkoupih in a om a,
leitung ah gintat in a om a, thupitak a laktouh in a omta hi.
Hun nununglam chiangin mi khenkhatten paimangpihna kha leh dawite thuhilhna ngaihsak in; ginna a tawpsan ding uh chih Kha in chiantak in agen a.
Lepchiahna a juauthu gen in, asia leh pha theihna uh sik-am a bih a om in.
Kiten kham in, tualeh nek dingte, thutak gingta a theite`n kipahthu gen a sanding a Pasian in asiamte nelou dingin thu apia uhi.
Pasian silsiam jousiah pen ahoih hi, kipahthu gen a san ahih photleh bangmah nial ding a om kei hi,
Ajiak Pasian thu leh thumna a hih siangthou ahita hi.
Hih silte unaute na theihsakleh, nang pen Jesu Krist nasemtu hoih, ginna leh thuhilhna hoih tutan a nazop thu-a vakkhang a om na hiding hi.
Hinanleh Pasian zahlouhna thu leh pitekte tangthu deihken la, Pasian ngaihsakna lam ah kithunun in.
Ajiak taksa kithununna ahihleh themkhat guak a phatuam a, hinanleh Pasian ngaihsakna pen, hinna tu-a omjing leh hung omkik ding piak thuchiam aneih jiakin sil jousiah ah aphatuam hi.
Hih pen thu gintat om leh pomtak mahmah ahi.
Ajiak hih huntawp lam ah Pasian hing i muan jiakin i semgim a, ipang teitei uh ahi, amah pen mi jousiah hundampa ahi a, agingtate a ding in ahihdeuh diak hi.
Hih thute pia inla, tualeh hilh in.
Na naupanna kuamah in simmawh kei hen, hinanleh ham kamsuak ah, gamtatdan ah, itna lam thu ah, khalam thu ah, ginna thu ah, siangthouna lam thu ah gingtute etton ding hijaw in.
Kungpai masiah laisim leh, hasot leh thugin hilh ngaihsak in.
Nangmah a om silpiak, genkholhna a piak, upate khut nga a Pasian in nang ahung piak pen nelhsiah ken.
Mi jousiah kiang a na phattuamna a lattheihna ding in hih silte ngaihsun inla, huate ah napum in kipia in.
Nangmah leh na thugin hilh ah pilvang in; hua silte ah omjing in; hih silte na bawljiak in nangmah leh na thu jate na hundam ding hi.
Putekte phawk kenla, hinanleh pa bang in, tangval deuhte sanggam bang in,
pitekte nu bang in, nungakte sanggamnu bang in siangthoutak in hasot in.
Meithaite, meithai taktakte zahbawl in.
Hinanleh meithai kuapeuh in tate hiam, tute hiam aneihleh, amauh innsung ah Pasian ngaihsakdan leh annu leh pate zahdan jil masa uhen; ajiak Pasian muh in huapen ahoih a, tualeh apomtak hi.
Tualeh meithai taktak, amahtang a om in pen Pasian ah kinepna anei a, sun leh jan a ngen in a thum gige hi.
Hinanleh ama nopsakna a hingnu pen adamlai in zong asi ahi.
Tualeh gensiat beia a omtheihna dingin hih thute pia in.
Hinanleh kuapeuh in ama mite a ding, adiak a ama innkuante a ding a ngaihtuahsak keileh ginna ajuausan a, gingloumi sangin a giloujaw ahi.
Meithai kum sawm guk nuailam, mikhat zi na hita pen meithai a simlouh ding ahi.
Silhoih bawl lam a mi pahtawi a om a, tate vakkhang a, mikhualte na jintun a, misiangthoute keng na silsakta, mi gimthuakte na panpihta, silhoih taphot thanuamtak a na bawljou ahihleh.
Hinanleh meithai nungak deuhte pen gelh ken, ajiak Krist deihlouhlam a ahung beveng chiang un pasal neih a ut paipai uhi,
a ginna masa uh apaih jiak un siamlouh tangin a om uhi.
Tualeh huate ban ah, innchin ah avak kawikawi ua, thadah achi`ng uhi, tualeh thadah guak hilou in, gen louhlouh ding gen in, kamtam leh midemhat ahi uhi.
Tuajiakin meithai nungak deuhten pasal nei uhenla, innsung khawsak ngaihtuah uhenla, gensiatna ding lemtang mawng mawng melma musak kei le uh ka deih hi.
Ajiak tu in zong mi khenkhat setan lam ah apial khiata uhi.
Gingtu numei hiam pasal hiam in meithai aneihleh panpih uhen, meithai taktakte apanpih theihna dingin saptuam hihbuai in omkei hen.
Saptuam upa vaihawm hoihte pen alehnih a zahbawl tuak a seh hi uhen, adiak in thu leh thuhilhna lam a semgimte.
Ajiak Laisiangthou in, “Bawngtal in buh achillai-in amuk kan ken,” tualeh “Nasemtu pen thaman mutak ahi,” achi hi.
Saptuam upa ahekna uh pen, theihpihtu nih hiam thum hiam lou in pom ken.
Mikhialte pen midangten zong alau theihna ding un, mijousiah mai ah taihilh in.
Khentuam neia bangmah bawllou a, deihsaktuam neilou a hih thute jui dingin, Pasian leh Toupa Jesu leh vantungmi telte mitmuh ah thu kungpia hi.
Mi kuamah tungah khut nga paipai kenla, midangte khialhna ah zong kikum ken; siangtakin kikoih jing in.
Na gilpi jiakin leh na damlouh jel jiakin tuiguak dawn nawn kenla, hinanleh uain themkhat khat zangjel in.
Mi khenkhat khialhnate pen a malat a, vaihawmna ah atung masa jel hi; hinanleh mi khenkhatte a pen anung uah ajui hi.
Tuachimah bangin khenkhatte silhoih bawl kilang masa aom a, tuachibang loute zong phualtheih ahikei hi.
Pasian min leh thugin gensiat a aom louhna dingin sila hakkol pua jousiahte`n amauh pute bangkim ah zahbawl taak in sim uhen.
Tualeh gingtu mi pu a neite`n unau ahihjiak un simmoh kei uhen; hinanleh gin-om leh deihtakte leh, phattuamna mute ahihjiak un a nna uh sepsak uhen. Hihthute hilh inla hasot in.
Mi kuapeuhin thuhilhna dang ahilh a, thutak I Toupa Jesu Krist thu leh, Pasian ngaihsakna lam thugin hoih a sakkeileh;
amah pen a kisathei ahi a, bangmah theilou ahi. Hinanleh theihnak sangin kinial leh thukalh lam ah a mawjawta hi; huachibang a kipan in thangsiatna, kinialna, dalna, kiginmawhna, hoihloute,
lungsim gilou nei a, thutak neilou minialhatna bang a hungsuak jaw hi. Tuachibang mite pen Pasian ngaihsak punna a ngai mite ahi uh; tuachibang mite a pat kihemkhia in.
Lungkimna tawh Pasian ngaihsak pen punna thupitak ahi.
Ajiak pen leitung ah bangmah i pualut kei a, tualeh bangmah i puakhia kei ding uhi!
Tuachi`n nek ding leh silh ding nei in huate ah i lungkim ding uhi.
Hinanleh hauhsak tumte pen khemna leh tha`ng ah, utna mot-huai leh hihsiathei tampi bang ah a puklut jel ua, huate-in pen siatna leh manthaina ah mi tampite ahihlum jel uhi.
Ajiak dangka ngaihnatna pen gilou chinteng bulpi ahi a, huapen khenkhat in adeihgoh ua, ginna a paimangsan uh, tualeh amauh leh amauh lungkhamna in a kisunle`t uhi.
Hinanleh nang Pasian mipa aw, hih silte taisan inla, diktatna, Pasian ngaihsakna, ginna, itna, thuakzohna, mitgitna hihte delhjui jaw in.
Ginna kidouna hoih dou inla, tangtawn hinna pen tutinten in, hua tang ding a sap zong na hi a, tualeh theihpihtu tamtak mitmuh in gupna hoih na gumta hi.
Sil bangkim hihhingtu Pasian leh Pontia Pilat mai a gupna hoih gumpa Krist Jesu mitmuh in thu kung pia hi.
I Toupa Jesu hung kilat masiah hih thupiak siangthoutak leh gensiatbei a kem dingin.
Hua kilatna pen amah huntak ah phattuak thuneipa guak, kumpipate kumpi leh lengte leng Toupa`n a hunglak ding hi.

Amah bek in sihtheihlouhna anei a, kuama naihtheihlouh va`k anei a, amahpen kuaman a mungaikei a, ahihkeileh muzong a muhtheihlouh uh ahi; amah kiangah tangtawn thupina leh silbawltheihna om hen! Amen.
Tu-khang a mihausate pen ki satheilou ding leh, hauhsakna diklou a muanna ngalou ding a, sil jousiah i kipakna ding a kiningching tak a hung piatu Pasian tung a ngajaw ding in,
silhoih bawl ding in, silbawl hau ding in, sil phal ding in, kihop ut ding in,
tangtawn hinna atukdet theihna ding ua hun hungtun chiang a innkip hoihtak amauh ua ding a khawlkhawm dingin hilh in.
Timothi aw, na kiang a kepsak a ompen kemhoih in, Pasian zahlouhna thugen mawkmawk leh dikloutak a “Pilna,” kichi kikalhna pen nungngatsan in.
Huapen khenkhat in nei akisa ua, ginna lam ah a hihkhialta uhi.
Paul, Jesu Krist a om hinna thuchiam dungjui a Pasian deihna bang a Jesu Krist sawltak in;
ka tapa deihtak Timothi kiang ah:
Pa Pasian leh Krist Jesu I Toupa kiang a kipan a hehpihna leh, zahngaihna leh, tualeh khamuanna om hen.
Sun leh jan a tawplou a ka thumnate a kung theihjing jiakin, kapi leh pute nabawl mahbang in sialehpha theihna siangtak neia a nna ka sepjingpa ka Pasian kiangah kipahthu ka gen ahi.
Kipahna a ka dimtheihna dingin na khituite theijing in, nangmah hung muh ka ut mahmah hi.
Ginna taktak nangmah a ompen ka theigige a, hua ginna pen amasapen in napi Loisi ah aom a, nanu Iunisi ah zong aom a, tualeh nangmah ah zong aom chih chiantakin ka thei hi.
Tuajiakin, ka khutngak jiak a Pasian silpiak nangmah a ompen mutkuang dingin kung theisak kik hi.
Ajiak Pasian in launa kha a hungpia kei a, hinanleh sil bawltheihna leh, itna leh, lungsim siangthouna kha a hungpia jaw hi.
Tuajiakin I Toupa thu theihsakna pen jumpih kenla, kei amah a hen tapa zong hung jumpih ken, hinanleh Pasian sil bawltheihna bangjel a tangthupha jiak a gimthuakna thuakpihtu hijaw in.
Aman i silbawlte dungjui hilou in, ama guat leh hehpihna dungjuiin ahung hundam a, sapna siangthou in ahung samta hi. Hihpen lei kisiam masang a Krist Jesu a ahung piak ahita hi.
Hinanleh ahung hundampa Jesu Krist kilakna jiakin tuin hihhat in a omta hi, aman sihna hihmang in tangthupha jiakin hinna leh sihtheihlouhna pen vak ah a hungtunta hi.
Hua tangthupha pen Jentelte theisak dingin thugentu ding leh, sawltak ding leh thuhilh sia ding a guat ka hi hi,
tualeh hihjiak in ahi hih silte zong ka thuak. Hinanleh zong ka jum kei hi, ajiak ka gintatpa ka thei hi, tualeh akiang a ka kepsak huani a dingin a kembitthei chih chiantak in ka thei hi.
Krist Jesu a om itna neiin, thudikdan ka kiang a na jakte tukip in.
I sung a om Khasiangthou in nang ahung kepsak thutak kemhoih in.
Asia gam a omjousiahte kei a pat a pialmangta uh chih nathei hi, alak uah Phigela leh Hermojini apang uhi.
Toupa`n Onesiphora innkuanpihte kiang ah zahngaihna pia hen, ajiak aman ahung hihhalh jeljel a, ka kolbulh zong a jumpihkei hi,
Rom khua a hungtun in ahung limzon a, ahung mukhia hi.
Huani chiang a Toupa kiang a amuh ding Toupa`n phalsak hen! Tualeh Ephesa khua a sil tampi a ka nna asep jiak hoihtakin nathei hi.
Tuajiakin nang, ka tapa Krist Jesu a om zahngaihna ah hattak in om in;
tualeh theihpihtu tampi lak ah ka kiang a thu naja`kte huate pen mi muanhuai, midangte zong hilhsawnthei dingte kiangah kemsak in.
Tuajiakin Jesu Krist galkap hoihtak bangin gimthuak hung thuakpih in.
Galkap hiding a telpa a kipahsak theihna dingin; galkap kuamah kidoulai in hih damsung khuasaknate in a kihihbuai ngaikei hi.
Tualeh kidemnate ah mi pang nanleh zong dan bang a a bawlkeileh khuksak in aom tuankei hi.
Louneitu semgim in agah tangmasapa ahi ding hi.
Ka thugen ngaihtuah in, Toupa`n nangpen sil jousiah ah theihsiamna a hungpia ding hi.
Jesu Krist, David suan a mi pen, ka tangthupha gen dungjui in misi lak a kipat kaithoh in aom hi chih theijing in,
hua tangthupha jiakin silgilou bawlte bangin hen a om in haksatna ka thuaklawh hi. Hinanleh Pasian thu pen hen in a omkei hi,
Tuajiakin Krist Jesu a om hundamna pen, tangtawn a om thupina tawh a muhtheihna ding un, telte jiakin sil jousiah ka thuak hi.
Hih thugen adik hi:
“Ajiak amah tawh sita ihihleh,
amah tawh i hingkhawm ding a.
I thuakleh,
amah tawh vai i hawmkhawm ding a.
amah i kitheihmoh bawl leh,
aman zong ahung kitheihmoh bawl ding hi.
Eite gin-om keilei zong,
amah a gin-om jing a,
amah leh amah a kitheihmoh bawltheih sam kei hi.”
Thu phatuamlou, a ngaikhiatute a ding a siatna higiap thu a kiniallou dingin hihthute theisak jing inla, Toupa maiah thu pia in.
Thutak thu diktak a khen in, jumna ding neilou nasemtu bang a, Pasian pomta`k hiding a nangmah kipia dingin theihtawp suah in.
Hinanleh Pasian zahta`klouhna thugen mawk mawkte taisan in, ajiak huachibangte`n mite Pasian ngaihsaklouh lam ah apui gamla deuhdeuh uhi.
Tualeh athu un meimasia nek bangin amauh ane ding hi. Alak uah Himenais leh Philetas apang uhi.
Huachibang mite`n thutak apialsan ua, thohkikna aom khinta chi`n mi khenkhatte ginna a sukmangsak hi.
Hinanleh Pasian suangphum kippen ading nalai a, hih chiamtehna anei hi: “Toupa`n amah a hi te athei hi,” tualeh, “Michih Krist min lou taphot in gitlouhna paisan hen,” chih.
Hinanleh inn thupi sung ah kham leh sumsan belte guak aom kei a, sing leh leia bawl bel zong aom hi, khenkhat manphatak a zak ding in, khenkhat manphaloutak a zak ding in.
Tuajiakin mi hua silninte lak pan a aki suksiangleh, apu ding a bel it-huai, siangthou, apu a ding a zaktaak, silhoih jousiah a ding a mansa a om bang ahi ding hi.
Khangnou utnate taisan inla, hinanleh lungtang siangthou a Toupa samte tawh diktatnate, ginnate, itnate, lemnate, delhjaw in.
Hinanleh kihaunate apiangsak veu chih thei in; kiselna mot-huai leh pilhuailoute ah pang ken.
Tualeh Toupa silate pen kisel ding ahikei a, hinanleh mijousiah tung a migitna, thuhilhsiam, thuaktheihna ahijaw ding ahi,
Pasian in thutak atheihna ding un kisi`kna apiak khak leh chiin a kalhtute pen kingiamkhiat tak in a thuhilh ding ahi.
Tuachi`n khua ahung theithei ding ua, amauhte sila ding a man a aut ut a bawlpa setan thang a kipan a suakta thei ding uhi.
Hinanleh hih zong thei in, ni nunung lam ah hun lauhuai taktakte ahung om ding hi.
Ajiak mi amauh ki itte, dangka ngainate, kiliansakte; kisatheite, Pasian gensiate, nu leh pa thu mangloute, kipakna dan theiloute, siangthouloute;
itna neiloute, ngaihdamna neiloute, juau a mi hekte, mahni ki thununloute, mi huhamte, hoihna mawng mawng neiloute;
mi puisia lamkaite, genhakte, kisatheite, Pasian it sang a amauh kipakna itjawte bang a hiding uhi;
Pasian ngaihsak bakna anei ding ua hinanleh a silbawltheihna ataksan kei ding uhi. Huachibang mite a pan ki hemkhia in.
Ajiak huachibang lak ah mi pen innte bang ah lut in a khialhna uh giktak pua numei mawdeuhte sal a man a, duhgawlna chinteng a puimangte ahi uhi,
ziljing napi a thutak theipha ngailoute ahi uhi.
Tualeh Janne leh Jambre in Mosi adou bang un hihte`n zong thutak adou gige uhi. Lungsim siasa mi, ginna lam a Pasian pomlouh mi ahi uhi.
Hinanleh huaval a bawlthei kei ding uhi, ajiak amawldan uh mijousiah kiangah ahung kilang ding hi, Janne leh Jimbre ahung kila`k bang in.
Hinanleh nang ka thugin, ka hindan, ka siltup, ka ginna, ka thuaktheihdan, ka itna, ka kuhkaldan,
Antiok khua leh, Ikonium khua leh, Listra khua a bawlgentheihna ka tuakte na theisiang hi! Hinanleh huate tengteng ah Toupa`n ahung hunkhia hi.
Ahi, mi Krist Jesu a Pasian ngaihsak a omsawm jousiahin bawl gentheihna a thuak ding mah uh ahi;
hinanleh migilou leh mikhemhatte pen mi khem leh khem a om in asiasuak deuhdeuh ding uhi.
Hinanleh nang, kuakiang a pat najil ahia chih theijing in, najilsa leh theihchiansak a na omna silte ah omjing in,
