tualeh nang pen na naupanlai a pat Krist Jesu a ginna jiak a hundamna mukhop a nang hung hilhpilthei Laisiangthou thei na hita hi.
Laisiangthou jousiah Pasian hukhahkhum a piak ahi a, thuhilhna ding, kitaihilhna ding, ki sukdikna ding, tualeh diktatna lam a thuhilhna ding bang in aphatuam hi,
Pasianmi pen na hoih jousiah sem ding a kimtak a kithuam a a bukimtheihna ding in ahi.
Tuajiakin Pasian mai leh a kumpi gam a hungkilak chiang a, mihing leh misite vaihawmsak dingpa Jesu Krist maiah thu kungpia hi
thu gen in, (ahun ah zong ahunlou ah zong), pangjel in thuakjoutak a thuhilh kawm in theichiansak inla, taihilh inla, hasot in.
Ajiak thuhilhna dik a ngaihkhiat nuamlouh uh hun hungtung ding ahi a, abilte uh ajet jiakin amauh deihbang in a kiang uah lamkai a khawm ding uhi.
Tualeh abilte uh thutak a pat a heimang ding ua, tangthu lam nga in a dawhta ding uhi.
Hinanleh nang, sil jousiah ah pilvang inla, gim thuakjou inla, tangthupha genna lam nna sem inla, na nasep hihtangtung in.
Ajiak tuin keipen, dawn ding a lat bangin luikhiat in ka omta a, ka paikhiat hun a tungta hi.
Kidouna hoih ka doukhinta a, ki taidemna ah ka taikhinta hi, ginna ka kemta hi.

Tuinjaw diktatna lallukhu kei ding in koih in a omta, tuapen Toupa, vaihawm diktak in, huani chiangin a hungpia ding hi, tualeh kei kiang guak ah hilou in, kuapeuh amah kilakna itte tengteng kiangah zong a pia ding hi.
Kintak in ka kiangah hungpai teitei in.
Ajiak Dema in tulai leitung a ngaihnat jiakin ahung paisanta a, Thessalonika ah apaita hi; Kresken pen Galatia ah apaita hi, Tita pen Dalmatia gam ah apaita hi.
Luka guak ka kiang ah aom hi. Marka chial inla ka kiang ah hung paipih in, ajiak thu nasepna lam ah keia dingin a phatuam mahmah hi.
Tikika pen Ephesa khua ah ka sawlta hi.
Nungpai chiangin, Troas khua a Karpa kiang a puan-ak tual ka nutsiat pen laibute tawh hung pua in, adiak in savun laibute pen.
Aleksander sumsan siksekpa ka tung ah agilou mahmah hi; Toupa`n anasep bangjel in a thuk ding hi.
Amah a pat nang zong pilvang in, ajiak aman i thute a hahdal mahmah hi.
Ka dikna thu ka gen masak laiin kuaman ahung panpih kei a, mijousiahin ahung taisan siang jawta uhi. A khialhna uh pua in omtuan kei uhen chi`n Pasian kiang ah ka ngen hi!

Hinanleh Toupa`n ahung dinpih a ahung hihhatta hi, tangthupha kigen pen kintak a keijiak a theih a aom a Jentelte jousiahin a jaktheihna ding un. Tualeh humpinelkai kam a pat in suahtatsak in ka omta uhi.
Tualeh Toupa`n migilou chinteng lak a pat in ahung suaktasak ding a, a van gam ah bittak in ahung tutding hi. A kiang ah tangtawn tangtawn in thupina omta hen! Amen.
Prisila leh Akuila, tualeh Onesiphora innkuanpihte chibai hung buksak in.
Erasta pen Korin khua ah a omdenta hi; Trophima ahihleh Mileta khua ah damlou in ka nusiata hi.
Phalbi ma-in hung paisawm teitei in.
Eubulaste, Pudente, Linate, Klaudiate, unau jousiahin chibai a hungbuk uhi.
Toupa Jesu Krist na kha kiangah om hen.
Hehpihna na kiang ah om hen. Amen.
Paul, Pasian sila leh Pasian mitelte ginna dungjui leh
Pasian ngaihsakna bang a thutak theihna lam a Jesu Krist sawltak in,
juautheilou Pasian in hun kipatma pek a achiamsa tangtawn hinna kinepna ah,
hinanleh Pasian I hundampa uh thupiak dungjuia ka kiang a kepsak a om thu tangkoupih jiakin ahuntak ah athu pen suklat in a omta hi.
Ginna munkhat lam thu a ka tapa Tita kiang ah:
Pa Pasian leh Toupa Jesu Krist I hundampa uh kiang a kipan hehpihna, zahngaihna, tualeh hua khamuanna om hen.
Hih jiakin ahi Krit tuikulh gam a ka hung nutsiat, sil bawl zohlouh a omte na bawlzohna ding leh, kung thupiak bang a khuachin a upate na guattheihna ding in:
kuahileh demnabei, zi-khat nei, gin-omtak tatsiatna leh thuzohlouhna neilou tate nei ahihnak uleh.
Ajiak saptuam lamkai pen Pasian dangka kemtu ahihjiak in demnabei ahih ngeingei ding ahi. Mi genhak lou, hehbaih lou, uain khamhat lou, mivuak-hat lou, dangka duh-am lou ahih ding ahi.
Hinanleh mi houpihdan siam, hoihnalam deih, lungsim dik, midiktat, misiangthou, mahni kithunun ahih ding ahi.
Thugin diktak a nialkalhtute a hasottheihna ding leh a diklouhdan uh a theihsak theihna ding in. Amah kihilhna sa bang a thu pen a tukkip jing ding ahi.
Ajiak pen mi thumanglou, thu genmawk mawkte, leh mikhemhatte tampi aom uhi; adiak in amauhte teptanlou lak a mi ahi uhi.
Huate kam pen humsak ding ahi, punna nin deihman in thu ahilhlouh ding uh ahilh ua, mi innkuan sung a tokbuai jel uhi.
Amauh lak a khat, a Jawlnei uh khat in, “Krit gammite pen juau genjingte, gamsa giloute, thadah anhaite ahi uh,” chi`n agen hi.
Hih theihpihna thu adik ahi. Tuajiakin ginna lam a ahung diktheihna ding un hahtak in taihilh in,
Judate tangthu leh thutak nungheisante thupiak a ngaihsak louhna ding un.
Misiangthou a dingin sil jousiah asiangthou hi, hinanleh mibuak leh gingloute a dingin bangmah asiang aom kei hi. A lungsim uleh a sialehpha theihna uh asianglou ahita hi.
Pasian ka thei uh chi in aphuang ua, hinanleh a silbawl un anial uhi. Huat-huaite, thumangloute, tualeh silhoih bawl ding a chingloute ahi uhi.
Hinanleh nang, thugin dik tawh kituak thute genjaw in.
Putekte pen omtan hoih, zahtak-huai, kidekthei, tualeh ginna leh, itna leh, thuaktheihna a diktak hiding in hilh in.
Pitekte zong huachimah bangin siangthouna tawh kituak a gamtang ding leh, dikloutak a mihek-hat leh uain hai hilou a, silhoih hilhtu hiding in hilh in,
tuachia amau`n numei khanglaite pen lungsim diktak nei a apasalte uh itding, atate uh itding,
Pasian thu pen gensiat a aom louhna ding a kiveng a siangthou a aom a, innsung nna sem a hoihtak a aom a, a pasalte uh thu mang a hoihtak a a omtheihna ding a ataihilh theihna ding un hanthawn in.
Tuachimah bangin tangvalte pen lungsim diktak pua ding in hasot un.
Sil jousiah ah silhoih bawlna lam a etton dingin kimusak inla, thugin ah kipumkhatna aom dan, a siangthou dan, atak dan bang ensak in,
thugen diktak gensiat guallouh bang akilat a; langpangtu kuahiam in na tung a sil gilou gen ding neiloua a zahlak theihna ding in.
Silate pen apute uh thu mang ding leh midawnhat lou dingin leh; sil jousiah a akipahna lam ua omgige ding in hasot in,
Pasian I hundampa uh thuhilhna thu pen sil jousiah a ajephoih theihna ding ua, khut ommoh lou a gin-omna hoih jousiah musakjaw ding in.
Ajiak hundamna hungtut Pasian hehpihna pen mi tengteng kiangah ahung kilangta hi,
hua in ahihleh Pasian ngaihsak louhna leh leitung utnate tawpsan a, tu-khang a lungsim siangthou leh, diktattak leh Pasian ngaihsak a om in,
hua kinepna Pasian thupi leh i hundampa uh Jesu Krist kilakna ding thupitak pen ngak in i om ding uh chih a hunghilh hi.
Aman i gitlouhna jousiah ua pat ahung tattheihna dingin leh amah ding a silhoih bawl a phattuamngai leh teltuam hiding a ahung hihsiangthou theihna dingin i taang un a kipiata hi.
Hih thute gen inla; hanthawn inla tualeh thuneitak in vau in. Kuaman nang hung simmoh kei hen.
Amauhte vaihawmtute leh thuneitute kiang a kituhlut ding in, thumang ding in, silhoih taphot bawl ding a kimansa a om ding in.
Mi kuamah gensialou ding in, migi in, mi jousiah kiang a ki ngiamkhiatna ensak dingin hilhpha in.
Ajiak eite ngei zong nidanglai in mimawte, thumangloute, khem a omte, utna leh nopna chituam tuam nabawlte, gilou leh thangsiajing a omte, kihdakhuaite tualeh khat leh khat kimudahte i nahi uhi.
Hinanleh mihing tung a hundampa uh Pasian chitna leh itna ahung kilat nung in,
diktatna eiten ibvawlte uh jiak hilou in, pianthakna silna leh Khasiangthou a siamthakkikna in leh a zahngaihna dungjuiin ahung hundamta hi.
Hua Khasiangthou pen Jesu Krist i hundampa uh jiak in i tung uah kichingtak in ahung sungbuata hi,
a hehpihna a siamtansak a om in, tangtawn kinepna dungjui in gouluahtute ding a siam in i omngei ding uhi.
Kuapeuh Pasian gingtasate`n silhoih bawl ding ngaihtuah jing uhen chih thu pen agin-om ahi, tualeh hihthute pen khauhtak a na genjing ka deih hi.
Hihte pen mihing dingin ahoih a tualeh aphatuam hi.
Hinanleh dokna mot-huaite, khangthusutte, kinialnate leh danthu a kikalhnate pen ki heimangsan in, ajiak huate pen sil phatuamlou leh bangmahlou ahi.
Gindan diklou neimi pen khatvei nihvei nahilhzoh nungin nial in,
huachibang mipen a lampial in a khial a, amah leh amah siamlouh kitangsak ahi chih nathei uhi.
Artema hiam, Tikika hiam na kiang ua kungsawl chiangin Nikopoli khua ah ka kiang ah hungpai teitei sawm in, ajiak huamun ah phalbi sung om ka sawm hi.
Jenas danthu thei leh Apollo a khualjinna ua bangmah a taksap louhna ding un, kintak in sawlkhia in.
Tualeh eima mite zong gahloua a omlouhna ding un apoimohna kin a azak ding silhoih bawl kijilsak in.
Ka kiang a omte jousiahin nang chibai a hungbuk hi. Ginna a ei hung itte chibai nabuk in.
Na kiang uah hehpihna om hen. Amen.
Paul, Jesu Krist a koltang leh, i sanggampa uh Timothi in,
Ka lawm ittak uh leh ka naseppih uh Philemon kiang ah,
tualeh ittak i sanggamnu uh Apphia leh ka galkappih uh Arkippa kiang ah, tualeh na inn a saptuam kikhawmte kiang ah:
I Pa uh Pasian leh i Toupa uh Jesu Krist a kipan hehpihna leh khamuanna na kiang uah om hen.
Ka thumnate ah na min lougige in, ka Pasian kiang ah kipahthu ka gen hi.
Toupa Jesu lam leh misiangthoute jousiah lam a itna leh ginna na neihdan ja in.
Na ginna kikoppihna pen Jesu Krist a nangmah a om silhoih jousiah a theihkimna lam a ahung phattuam theihna ding in.
Ajiak sanggampa aw, na itna ah muanna leh hehnepna thupitak ka nei uhi, nang jiakin misiangthoute lungtang ahalhthakta hi.
Tuajiakin akilawm hun bawl ding a nang thu hungpiak hih Krist ah ki ngap mahmah nanleng zong,
itna jiakin keimah, Paul, putek leh tu a zong Jesu Krist a koltang in kung ngenjaw ahi.
Ka koltanna a ka neihkhiat ka tapa, Onesima, a dingin kung ngen hi.
Amah pen tu-masang in nang a dingin a phatuam kei a, hinanleh tun nang leh kei dingin “a phatuamta” hi.
Amah kung sawlkikta a, tuajiakin, keima lungtang ahi a, kipaktak in napom in.
Amah pen ka tangthupha kolbulhna a nangmah tang a nna hung sepsak dingin ka kiang a omdensak ka ut mahmah a;
hinanleh nang ki panpihsak teitei ka utkei a, na utthu a hih ahihtheih jawkna dingin na thulouin bangmah ka bawlnuam kei hi.
Ajiak hun tomkhat sung nang a hungkhen pen tangtawn a amah na neihjawk na ding zong ahi maithei hi.
Hinanleh tuinjaw sila bang a hilouin sila sang a hoih, unau deihtak bangin kei dingin deihtuam ahi a, nang ding semin houh taksa leh Toupa ah a bangchihih jawsem tadiai!
Tuajiakin na kithuahpih bang a nung ngaihtuahleh, keimah ngei bangin napom in.
Na tung a bawlkhial aneih a, bat bangmah aneihleh zong, keima bat in nakoih in.
Keimah, Paul in, hihpen ka khut ngeia kagelh ahi: keiman ka ditsak ding hi. (Hinanleh keikiang ah bat na neia nang mahmah zong na kiba chia ka genna ahi kei hi.)
Ahi, unaupa, nang a kipan-a kipakna Toupa hung neisak in! Krist ah ka lungtang hung hihhalhsak in.
Na thumanna a kimuang in leh, ka gen sang a thupijaw a na bawl ding gingta in, na kiang ah kung gelh ahi.
Bangteng hileh kei ding in zong tunna ding inn khat hung na ngaihtuahsak in, na thumnate uh jiakin na kiang ua piak a ka om ding ka kigingta hi.
Krist Jesu a ka koltangpih Epaphra in chibai ahung buk hi,
tualeh Marka, Aristarkha, Dema, tualeh Luka, ka naseppihten zong.
I Toupa uh Jesu Krist hehpihna nakha uh kiangah om hen. Amen.
Pasian, nidanglai a pulehpate kiang a lam tuamtuam leh hun tuamtuam a Jawlneite zang a thu nagenpa in,
hih ni nunungte ah a Tapa in i kiang ah thu a genta hi, amahpen sil jousiah luahtu dingin aguat a, leitungte zong amah tungtawn in asiam hi.
Amahpen a thupina vak leh a mihing hihna lim phuangkhia leh, sil jousiah a silbawltheihna thu a tungding dingin, a mahmah in i khialhnate a silsiang zoh in tunglam ah jiatlam ah atouta hi,
vantungmite sang a min ngaihjaw a muhbang ngeiin amauh sang a hoihjaw gouluahtu ding a siam ana hita him ahi.
Ajiak vantungmite lak ah Pasian in kuakiang ah ahia hihthute genkhakna a naneih ngai,
“Nang ka Tapa nahi a;
tu-nin kung neikhiata hi.”
chihleh,
“Amah dingin Pa ka hiding a,
amahpen kei ding in Tapa ahi ding”
Hinanleh, Ta masapen leitung a ahung puilut kik laiin,
“Pasian vantungmite jousiahin amah bia uhen,”
achi hi.
Tualeh vantungmite tungtang thu ah hichiin achi hi,
“ Aman vantungmite pen huih in asiam a,
tualeh ana semtute meikuang in asiam hi,”
chi in.
Hinanleh Tapa tungtang thu ah hihthu agen hi,
“Aw Pasian, na Laltouna, tangtawn tangtawn dongin a om ding hi,
diktatna Lalchiang zong nagam Lalchiang ahi.
Nang diktatna na it a tatkhialhna na hua hi.
tuajiakin Pasian, na Pasian in nangpen
na lawmte sang a tungtuang jaw in
kipakna thau ahung nuhta hi.”
Tualeh nang,
“Toupa, atu`ng in leitung kingakna na phumkhinta,
tualeh vantungte zong na khutsuak ahi.
Amauhte ahung mang ding a, hinanleh nang na omgige hi;
amauh pen aun un puansilh bangin ahung lui ding a.
puan bangin na jial ding a,
a khekta ding uhi.
Hinanleh nang a ngaimah na hi a,
na kumte`n zong beini a neingai kei ding,”
chi in.
Hinanleh vantungmite lak a kuapen kiangah ahia hihthu genkhakna ana neihngai,
“Na melmate na kengkoihna a ka bawl masiah
ka jiatlam ah tou in,”
chih.
Amauhte jousiah hundamna gouluah dingte nna sepsak ding a sawlkhiat nasepna khate hilou uh a hiam?
Tuajiakin i thujaksate uh i ngaipoimoh diak ding uhi, atuachih keileh i tolhmang sak khading uhi.
Ajiak vantungmite zang a thu kigen bawn akip a, tatkhialhna leh thumanlouhna chinteng in a kituahpih nuamman diktattak amuh uleh,
hichituk a thupi hundamna thu ngaihsaklou a i om leh bangchiin ahia i suahtak ding uh?
Pasian in zong chiamtehnate, sillamdangte, lamdang tuamtuamte leh, Khasiangthou silpiakte in, ama deihdan dungjuiin amauh a theihpih hi.
Ajiak aman a tanchin i gen uh, tunung chiang a hung om ding leitung pen, vantungmite nuaiah akoih kei a.
Hinanleh mikhat in khoimun hiam ah:
“Mihing bang ahi hiam hizahta a na ngaihsak;
ahihkeileh mihing Tapa zong bang ahi hiam hizahta a na khuahtuah?
Nang vantungmite sangin amahpen themkhat ngiamjaw in na siam a;
thupina leh zahna na khusak a, na khut nasepte tungah na koihta hi,
siljousiah a thuthu a om ding in akeng nuaiah na koihta hi,”
chi`n ana theisakta hi.
“Sil jousiah a thuthu a om ding a anuai a akoih jiakin”;
anuai a akoihlouh bangmah a omkei hi. Hinanleh tu leh tuin sil jousiah anuai a kikoih in i munai tadih kei uhi.

Hinanleh Jesu pen, Pasian hehpihna jiak a michih a ding a sihna a cheptheihna ding a, sihna a thuakna ding jiakin themkhat vantungmite sang a ngiamjaw a bawla om a, thupina leh zahna khuksak a om in i mujaw uhi.
Ajiak amah a ding a sil jousiah om a amah jiak a bangkim ompa a dingin pen, ta tampite thupina a puilutna a, a hundamna uh bawltu pen gimthuaknate jiak a sukbukim ahih akilawm mawng ahi.
Ajiakpen hihsiangthoutu leh hihsiangthoute pen khat a pat ahi ua, huajiakin aman amauhte pen unaute chih ajumkei hi.
Tuachi`n,
“Ka unaute kiangah na min ka phuangkhia ding a;
kikhawmte lak ah la sa in kung phat ding hi,”
chi in.
Tualeh, “Amah ah ka ginna ka koih ding a,” achi kik hi. Tualeh, “En un keileh Pasian hung piak naupangte,”
achi kik hi.
Tuachi`n, naupangte pen taksa leh sisan tangkhawm ahihjiak un, amahngei in zong huamah bang a hungtang hi, sihna jiak a sihna thuneitu, dawi, a sukmang theihna ding in,
sih laujiak a adamsung teng uh saltang a om jousiahte a suahtatsak theihna ding in.
Ajiak aman vantungmite panpihna a piakei a, hinanleh Abraham suante a panpih jaw hi.

Tuajiakin mi a ding a khialhna thupha tawina ding a, Pasian lam silte a siampi mi khuatuahthei leh gin-omtak ahihtheihna dingin, sil jousiah a a unaute bangbang a bawl a ahung ompen amah a dingin apoimoh him ahi.
Ajiak amahngei in zong khemna tuak a ana thuaktak jiakin, khemna thuakte apanpih thei hi.
Tuajiakin, unau siangthou, vanlam sapna tangte aw, i thugin uh sawltakte leh, siampi Krist Jesu ngaihtuah un.
Pasian innsung mite jousiah lak a Mosi agin-om mahbang in, amahpen aguattu kiangah agin-om hi.
Ajiak inn sang a alamtu pahtawia aom jawk bang ngeiin, amahpen Mosi sang a thupijaw a sim ahita hi.
Ajiak inn jousiah mi kuahiam khat lam ahi a, hinanleh sil jousiah alamtu Pasian ahi.
Tualeh Mosi pen khuanung a thu hung kigen dingte theihsakna dingin, Pasian innsung nasemte jousiah lak ah sila bangin agin-om taktak hi.
Hinanleh, Krist pen, Tapa bangin ama innsung ngeiah agin-om ahi, a tawpdong a i hahkatna uleh i kinepna kipakna uh i tukdet phot uleh a innsung mite ihi uhi.
Tuajiakin, Khasiangthou gen bang in,
“Tunia a aw najak uleh,
gamdai a ze-etni a ahih thangpaih bang un,
na lungtang uh khauhsak kei un,
hualaiin na pulehpate un ahung khem ua, ahung ze-et ua,
tualeh kum sawmli sung ka silbawl a muta uhi.
Tuajiakin, hua suante tungah ka hehta a,
‘tualeh amau`n a lungtang un a ngaihtuah khial gige ua,
ka lampite zong a theikei uh,’
ka chi hi.
Tuachi`n ka thangpaihna in ka kichiam a:
Ka tawldamna ah alutkei ding uh!”
chi in.
Pilvang un, unaute, atuachih keileh Pasian hing a pat paikhia dingin nalak ua mi khattou sungah gitlouhna, lungtang gilou ahung omkha ding hi.
Hinanleh “Tuni,” akichih laiin nitengin khat leh khat ki hasottuah jaw un, atuachih keileh nalak ua mi kuahiam khat khialhna a khemna a hihkhauh in na omkha ding uhi.
Ajiak i ginna kipatna uh a tawpdong a kiptak a i tukkip pouh uleh Krist tanpihtute i hita uhi.
tualeh:
“Tunia, a aw najak uleh,
a hehsak lai uh bangin
na lungtang uh khauhsak kei un,”
chih ahihlai in.
Ajiak khenkhat in ajak hang un a hihthangpai uh, ahita in zong Izipt gam a pat Mosi puikhiatte hilou ahi-uh maw le?
Tuin kuate tungah ahia kum sawmli sung lungkim loua a om? Sil bawlkhialte, gamdaia aluang uh lumte tungah hilou amaw.
Tualeh a gingtaloute kiang loungal kua kiangah ahia, “Tawldamna ah na lutkei ding uh,”
chia a kichiamna?
Tuachi`n gintatlouhna jiakin a lutthei takei uh chih imu uhi.
Tuajiakin, i lau ding uh, atuachih keileh a tawldamna a lutna ding thuchiam omjing napi`n nalak ua mi khattou chinglouin na omkha ding uhi.
Ajiak amau kiang a gen ahih mahbang in; tangthupha pen i kiang a gen ahi a, hinanleh thu a jatute a ginna tawh akizoplouh jiakin, athujakte uh pen amau`n a phattuampih kei uhi.
Ajiak ei a gingtasate pen hua tawldamna ah i lutta uhi,
“Ka tawldamna ah a lutkei ding uh:
‘Ka thangpaihna a ka kichiam mahbang in!’ ”
leitung siamchil a pat nnate siamzohsa hitamahleh, chia agen mahbang in.
Ajiak aman munkhat ah nisagih ni thu hichibang in agen hi, “Tualeh Pasian in nisagih ni in a nasep jousiah a pat a tawldamta hi,” chi in.
Tualeh hihmun ah, “Ka tawldamna ah a lutkei ding uh,” achi kik hi.
Tuajiakin mi khenkhat tawldamna ah alut ding uh thuchiam a omnak lai jiakin leh, nidang a tangthupha gen masaknate a thumanlouh jiak ua alutlouh jiak un.
Hun sawtpi nungin David ah, “Tuni” chi`n bangni ahiam khat a guatkik a:
“Tunia, a aw najak uleh,
na lungtangte uh khauhsak kei un.”
Ajiak Joshua in amaute tawldamna na piakhinta hileh, tuanung in aman nidang thu agen kei ding hi.
Tuajiakin Pasian mite a dingin tawldamna khat aom nalai hi.
Ajiak Pasian in ama nasepte a khawlsan mahbang in ama tawldamna a lutte zong a nasepte uapat a khawlta uhi.
Tuajiakin hua tawldamna a lut ding in hahpan in i pang ding uhi, atuachih keileh mi khattou hua gintatlouhna etsakna bang a om in i puk kha ding hi.

Ajiak Pasian thu pen ahing a, sil a bawlthei a, namsau hiamtuah sangin ahiamjaw a, hinna leh kha, tualeh guhtuah leh chintuiguh khenthei khop in asunthei a, lungtang a ngaihtuahnate leh tupte theikhentu ahi.
Tualeh silsiam khatzong ama mitmuh a kisel bangmah a omkei a, hinanleh akiang a i tanchin i tutna dingpa mitmuh in siljousiah guaktang leh kihongsa ahi.
Tuachiin, vante a paisuak Siampi, thupitak Jesu, Pasian Tapa, ineih jiakin i thugin uh i pomkip ding uh ahi.
Ajiak i hatlouhnate uh hung thuakpih khalou siampi i neikei a, hinanleh eimah bang a lamchinteng a khemna tuaksa, khialjong khiallou nei i hijaw uhi.
Tuajiakin zahngaihna i tantheihna ding un leh taksap hun chiang a panpihna ding a hehpihna leh zahngaihna i muhtheihna ding un, hangsantak in hehpihna laltouna pen inaih ding uhi.
Ajiak siampi mi lak a kiladokte pen khialhnate jiak a silpiakte kithoihnate alatkhawm theihna dingin, Pasian lam silte a mite a ding a pansak ahi uhi.
Aman bangmah theiloute leh lamkhialte tungah hehpihna a neithei hi, ajiak amah ngeizong hatlouhna a tuam in ana omta hi.
Tualeh hihte jiakin mite a ding a alatsak bangin, khialhnate jiakin amah a ding ngeizong alat apoimoh hi.
Tualeh hua pahtawina pen, Aaron asap bang a Pasian in asap louh ngal, mi kuamah in amah a dingin a kilak ngaikei hi.
Tuachimah bangin Krist zong siampi a siam a om ding in amah leh amah a kitawisang kei hi, hinanleh a kiang ah,
“Nang Ka Tapa na hi,
tuni`n kung neikhia hi.”
Aman muntuam khat a,
“Nangpen Melkizedek bang a,
tangtawn siampu na hi,”
chia agen mahbang in.
Aman taksa a aomlai nite in, sihna lak a amah hundamtheipa kiangah nakpitak a kap leh khitui luangkawm in thumna leh ngetna alat nungin, Pasian laudan a siamjiak in ngaihkhiat in a om hi.
Tapa hinanleh zong, a silthuakte lakpan thumandan ajilta hi.
Tualeh sukbukim a hung om in, a thumangte jousiah a dingin tangtawn a hundamna thuneitu a hunghita hi,
Melkizedek omdan bang a siampi in Pasian in a bawlta hi.
Amah tungtang gen ding tampi ka nei ua, na ngaihpeih louh jiak un agenchian zong ahaksa hi.
Ahun lam ngaihtuah injaw heutu hikhinta hile uchin kilawm hi a, Pasian thubulte kuahiam khat in a hunghilh ngaikik na hita uhi. Tualeh an-gum hilou a, nawitui kiphamoh bang na hunghita uhi.
Ajiak nawitui nejousiah naungek ahihjiak un, diktatna thu ah theihna aneikei uhi.
Hinanleh an­-gum pen mi pichingte, a ngaihtuahna uh jang a atheih theihna uh hihjoitate a ding ahi.
Tuajiakin Krist thubulte nusia in pichin lam i manoh ding uhi. Silbawl sisa a pan kisiknate, Pasian lam a ginnate;
baptisma thuginte leh, khut ngakte leh misi thohkikna thu leh tangtawn vaihawmna thute.
Tualeh Pasian in ahung phalsakleh hihte i bawl ding uhi!
Ajiak khatvei hihvak a om a, vanlam silpiak chiamta a, Khasiangthou tansak a om a;
tualeh Pasian thu hoih leh hun hungtung ding a sil bawltheihnate chiamkhinte pen,
apuk ua ahihleh, kisik ding a siamthak gual ahikei uhi! Pasian Tapa amauh a ding a kilhlum kik leh sialphou ahihjiak un.
Ajiak lei atung a ju guahtui na dawnjel in, amauh ding a lou na kikhawhte ding a, anteh louhing nektheih hung suah in Pasian a pat gualjawlna amu uhi.
Hinanleh lingkungte leh loupa pak lingneite asuahkhiat leh pen, deihlouh in a om a, tualeh hamsialawh in a om a; atawpna pen meia hal ahi.
Hinanleh ittakte aw, kou hichibang in gen mahle ung, noupen hih sang a hoihjaw leh hundamna tawh kithuah khawm silte nabawl uh kung gingta uhi.
Ajiak amin a nna nasep uleh na itna uh na suklat uh, misiangthoute nna nasepsak ua, tualeh tua nna nasep jing uh pen manghilh dingin Pasian pen a diktatlou a hikei hi.
Tualeh noute kuapeuhin kinepna theihchianna kim muding in, atawp dong in taimachiat le uchin chih kung deih mahmah uhi.
Ki thadahsak lou a, hinanleh ginna leh thuakzohna jiak a thuchiam gouluahtute omdan entonte na hih uh kung deih hi.
Ajiak Pasian in Abraham kianga a thuchiam laiin, amah sanga lianjaw a a kichiam theihlouh jiakin, amah leh amah a kichiam a
“Gualjawl zong kung gualjawl taktak ding a tualeh pung zong kung pungsak ding hi,” chi in.
Tuachi`n aman dawhjoutak a athuak mualsuah nungin silchiam pen amuta hi.
Ajiak mihingte pen, amau sang a lianjaw in a kichiam veu ua, tualeh thu namdetna ding a kichiamna pen amauh a dingin kinialna jousiah suktawpna ahi.
Huachibang in, Pasian in thuchiam gou luahtu dingte kiangah ngaihtuahna kiptak a kikhekkik theihlouhdan nasatak a ensak nuam in, huapen kichiamna in a hihkipta hi.
Huapen Pasian juauthei ahihlouhna, kikhekkik theilou sil nihte jiak a, eite kihumbitna ding a imai a kinepna kikoih pen tuding a taiten hasotna thupitak i neihna ding un ahi.
Hih kinepna pen, hinna sikkip in inei a, chiantak leh kiptak tualeh puanjak sung a lut ahi.
Hua ah Jesu, Melkizedek omdan bang a tangtawn a siampulal a siam in, eite ding a ma kaiin ana lutta hi.
Hih Melkizedek, Salem kumpipa, Pasian tungnung pen siampu, kumpipate vathat joua hung paikik Abraham nadawnpa in amah pen a gualjawlta a,

amah kiangah Abraham in zong aneih jousiah “Sawm a khat” apia hi. Amin omjia ahihleh, (Amin masa pen in, “Diktatna kumpipa,” tuaban ah, Salem kumpipa chihna ahi a, tuapen “Lemna kumpipa,” chihna ahi.)
Amah pen pa zong neilou, nu zong neilou, khanggui neilou, ompatni neilou, hintawpni neilou, hinanleh Pasian Tapa bang a bawl, tawpni neilou a siampu a omjing ahi.
Tuin chi suangtu Abraham mahmah in zong gal sil laksak a pat silhoihte a pat sawm a khat a piaknapa. Hihpa thupidan ngaihtuah sin ua.
Tualeh Levi suante lak a siampu nasep mutaphot in danthu dungjuiin mite a pat sawm a khat lak ding thu amu ngei uhi, huapen a unaute lak ah ahi, huapen Abraham khal a pat a pawt hinanle uh.
Hinanleh, amau a pat a khanggui laksawn a omloupa`n, Abraham a pat sawm a khat ala a, thuchiamte neipa a gualjawlta hi.
Tualeh aneujawpen alianjaw in a gualjawl hi chih nialguallouh ahi.
Tualeh hihsan ah, mihing sijelte`n sawm a khat a ngah ua; hinanleh huasan ah, amah a hingjing hi chia atanchin theihsak a ompa in a ngah hi.
Levi, (sawm a khat ngahtu in zong,) Abraham kiangah sawm a khat apia hi.
Ajiak Melkizedek in ava lamtuah laiin amahpen apa khal ah aom nalai hi.

Tuajiakin, Levi siampu hihna a bukimna muhtheih hitaleh, ajiakpen hih nuaia mite`n danthu ana mu uhi. Aaron omdan bang a chih hilou a, Melkizedek omdan bang a siampu dang ahung om apoimohna bang ahia?
Ajiak pen siampu hihna ahung kikhektak jiakin, danthu zong ahung kikhek apoimoh sem hi.
Bangjiakin ahia ichihleh a tungtang a hihthu kigenna pen namtuam ahi a, hua nam lak a mi kuamah maitam a nasem a omkei uhi.
Ajiak i Toupa uh pen Judah nam a pat hung piang ahi chih chiantakin alang hi, hua nam thu ah Mosi in siampu tawh kisai thu bangmah a genkei hi.
Tualeh Melkizedek omdan bang a siampu dang ahung om jiakin ka thugen uh a kichian sem hi
Amah pen taksa thupiak danthu bang a hungpai hilouin, hinanleh hintawp neilou sil bawltheihna neia hungpai ahijaw hi.
Ajiak aman, “Nang pen Melkizedek omdan bang a, tangtawn siampu na hi chi`n atheisak hi.”
Thupiak om masapen, hatlouhna leh phattuam louhna jiakin paih in a omta hi.
Ajiak danthu in bangmah a hihbukim kei a; alangkhat ah, kinepna hoihjaw ahung pualut hi, hua tungtawn in eite`n Pasian inaih uh ahi.
Ajiak kichiamna omlou in; amah pen siampu a bawl ahita hi.
Ajiak amauhte pen kichiamna omlou a siampu a siam ahi ua, hinanleh amah pen a kiang ah,
“Toupa a kichiam a,
a lungheikik kei ding,
Nang pen Melkizedek omdan bang a tangtawn a siampu na hi,”
chia genpa kichiamna a siam na hi.
Tuachimah bangin Jesu pen thukhun hoihjaw hihkiptu a siam ahung hita hi.
Amah pen sihna jiak a pandensak theihlouh ahih jiak un, siampu a natam ngut ua.
Hinanleh hihpa tangtawn a omjing ahihjiak in, siampu hihna khektheihlouh anei hi.
Tuajiakin amah a Pasian kiang a hung paite pen amau a ding a ngetsak ding a a hinjing jiakin atawptan in a hundamthei hi.
Ajiak hichibang siampi siangthou, khansialou, ninbang lou, mikhialte lak pan a kituamkoih, tualeh vante sang a sangjaw a siam pen ei a dingin akilawm mawng ahi.

Aman hua siampite lat bangin, nitengin, ama khialhnate jiak a kithoihna lan masa in, huazoh chiangin mite khialhna alat a ngaikei hi. Ajiak aman hihpen amah leh amah a kilat in ngamden dingin khatvei thuin ana jouta hi.
Ajiak dan in mihing hatlouhna neite siampu in asepjel a; hinanleh kichiamna thu, dan nung a hung om in ahihleh, Tapa, tangtawn a ding a hihkim khitsa pen a guatjawta hi.
Tuin i thugente lak a poimoh pen ahihleh hih ahi, vante a thupi pen, Laltouna jiatlam a tou, huachibang siampi i nei uhi.
Mihing phuh hilou, Pasian phuh, mun siangthou leh puanbuk taktak a nasemtu pen.
Ajiak siampi jousiah silpiakte leh kithoihnate lan ding a guat ahi ua, tuajiakin hih siampi in zong banghiam khat lat ding aneih apoimoh hi.
Ajiak leitung a ana om hilehjaw, danthu bang a silpiakte lantu siampute ana om jiak un, siampu in a pangkei ding hi.

Huate in vanlam silte etsakna leh lim nna asemjel ua; Mosi, in puanbuk lam ding a akisak laia, Pasian in ahilh bangin, ajiak aman, “Mualtung a etton ding a hung ki musak dungjuiin sil jousiah bawl ding in pilvang in,”
achi hi.
Hinanleh tuin, thuchiam hoihjawte tung a bulphuh thukhun hoihjawsem palai ahih mahbang in nasepna hoihjaw ana tangta hi.
Ajiak thukhun masapen dem bei, adiklouhna omlou ana hitaleh anihna pen ding mun ngaihtuah lou ding ahi.
Ajiak amauhte demna in aman hihthute agen a:
“Ngaiin Israel innkuante leh,
Judah innkuante tawh,
thukhunthak ka bawl hun ding nite hungtung ding ahita,”
Toupa`n achi hi;
Izipt gam a kipan a apu leh pate uh puikhia ding a,
a khut ua ka tuk nia akiang ua ka thukhun pen bang hilou in.
Ka thukhun a aom gige louh jiak un,
ken zong amauh ka ngaihsak kei hi, Toupa`n achi hi.
Ajiak pen hua nite nung chiang a Israel innkuante kiang a ka thukhun ding pen hih ahi
Toupa`n achi hi:
A lungsim uah ka dan thupiakte ka koih ding a,
a lungtang uah ka gelh ding.
tualeh amauh a dingin a Pasian uh ka hi ding a,
tualeh kei ding in amauh ka mite ahi ding uhi.
Amau kuamah in
‘Toupa theiin,’
chi`n a invengte leh a sanggamte a thuhilh nawn kei ding a.
Ajiak aneupen a pat alianpen tan in,
aun un a hungthei ta ding uhi.
Ajiak a diklouhnate uah ka zahngai ding a,
a khialhnate uleh a gitlouhnate uh zong ka theigige nawn kei ding hi.”
Aman, Thukhunthak, chia agen jiakin a masapen a luisakta hi. Tuachi`n alui ahung upata pen amang ding kuan ahita hi.
Tuachi`n thukhun masapen in zong Pasian nasepna dante leh hih leitung lak a mun siangthou a nanei taktak hi.
Ajiak puanbuk a kibawl a, amasapen ahihleh, meivak koihna leh, dohkan leh, tanghou koihna mun siangthou akichite ahi.
Tualeh puanjak nihna nungah mun siangthou pen kichi puanbuk aom hi.
Huasan ah gimnamtui halna kham bawm leh thukhun singkuang leh, kham tuia luankhum asung a manna omna kham bel leh, Aaron chiangsel leh, thukhun suangpekte omna aom hi.
Tualeh atung ah zahngaihna touna liah in thupina Cherubimte a om uh. Huate tungthu pen tuin akim sipsip in i genthei kei ding uhi.
Tualeh hih silte hichibang a guatkholh ahih chiangin, siampute`n Pasian nna sem ding in puan inn masapen sungah alutjel uhi,
hinanleh dannihna ah siampi guak, kumteng in khatvei, ama khialhna leh mipite khialhna a ding a alat ding sisan tawilou hilou in alutjel hi.
Hih in ahihleh, puanbuk dantan masapen aom laisiah mun siangthou pen a lutna lampi a kilang nailou ahi, chih Khasiangthou in ahung theisak hi.
Huapen tulai hun tehkakna ahi, huasan ah sialehpha theihna lam a abiatu hoih bukimsak theilou silpiakte leh kithoihnate alanjel uhi,
huate pen nekte, dawnte, kisuksiangna tuamtuamte leh, taksalam dante guak ahi.
Hinanleh Krist pen silhoih hung om dingte siampi ding a hungpai in, puanbuk lianjaw leh bukimjaw khut a bawllouh, huapen, silsiam lak a ahikei chihna ahi.
Kelte leh bawngnoute sisan a hilou in, hinanleh amah mah sisan ngeiin, eite a ding a tatkhiatna muin mun siangthou ah ngamden dingin khatveiin ana lutta hi.
Ajiak bawngtalte leh kelte sisan leh bawngla vutvam mi nin tung a theh inbawn taksa asianthousak leh,
Krist, tangtawn kha jiak a gensiat bei a Pasian kiang a kilan sisan in, Pasian hing nna sem ding in, silbawl sisa a pat in na sialehpha theihna uh bangzahta in a sianghthousak tazen diam!
Tualeh hih jiakin amah pen thukhunthak palai ahi a, thukhun masa nuaia tatkhialhnate a pat a tatkhiatna ding a asihtak jiakin, sapten tangtawn a gouluah ding thuchiam pen a tangthei ding uhi.
Ajiak pen thukhun omna peuh ah thukhungtu sihna zong a om ngeingei ding ahi,
ajiak pen mihingte asih nungin thukhun in thu aneipan giap hi, a thukhungtu adamsung teng pen thu mawng mawng a neikei hi.
Tuajiakin thukhun masa ngeizong sisan panglou in sukkip ahikei hi.
Ajiak Mosi in danthu dungjuia kithuhilhna jousiah mi kiang a agenzoh in bawngnoute leh kelnoute sisan pen, tui tawh khausandup tawh, hussop tawh ala a, tualeh laibu leh mipite jousiah atheh a.
“Hihpen Pasian in ahung piak thukhun sisan ahi,” chi in.
Tuachimah bangin aman puanbuk leh nasepna kuang leh nou, vanzak jousiah sisan atheh hi.
Tualeh danthu in siljousiah sisan a hihsiangthou phial in a om a, sisan suahlou in ngaihdamna a omkei hi.
Tuajiakin vanlam a sil omte batpihte pen hihte a hihsiang a aom ding him ahi, hinanleh vanlam sil taktakte pen hihte sang a kithoihna hoihjawte a hihsiangthou a aom ding ahi.
Ajiak Krist pen a taktak etsakna, khut a bawl mun siangthou ah alut kei a, hinanleh tuin Pasian maiah eite tang a kilang dingin van ah a lutjawta hi.
Siampi kumteng a ama sisan hilou tawikawm a mun siangthou a alutjel bangin, amah pen amah leh mah kilan dingin a lutngaikei hi,
huachilou hileh leitung siamchil a pat tamvei a thuakkhinta ding hi. Hinanleh tu huntawp ah amah pen khialhna sukbeina ding a amah kilan tawm dingin khatvei ahung kilangta hi.
Tualeh mihing a dingin khatvei sih seh ahi a, hinanleh hihzoh chiangin vaihawmna a om ding.
Tuachimah bangin Krist zong, mi tampite khialhna puamang ding a khatvei lat in aom a. Amah kilawptak a na ngaktute kiangah khialhna panglou in hundamna mu dingin anihveina ahung kilang kik ding hi.
Danthu pen silhoih hung om dingte lim ahi a. Alim taktak ahihlouh jiakin kumsial a kithoihna alat jelte un ahung naihtute a bukimsak joukei hi.
Atuachilou hileh, alat uh tawptalou ding uh maw, ajiak abiatute pen khatvei hihsiangthou a omte in khial kitheihna a neinawn kei ding uhi.
Hinanleh hua kithoihnate ah kumteng in khialhnate kiphawk khiatna aom hi.
Ajiak pen bawngtalte leh kelte sisan in khialhnate a lamangthei kei hi.
Tuajiakin leitung a a hungpailai in aman:
“Kithoihna leh sillat na deih kei a,
hinanleh pumpi khat nung bawlsak hi;
halmang sillatte leh khialhna sillatte ah,
nang kipakna na neikei, achi hi.
Tuachi`n ken, ‘Ngaiin,
laibu jial ah keima thu gelh ahi,
na deihlam bawl ding in kungpai hi, Pasian aw,’ ”
ka chi hi.
“Masang in kithoihna leh silpiak leh halmang sillatte leh khialhna kithoihna na deihkei a,”
hua ah kipahna zong na neikei hi. Huate pen danthu bang a lat ahi, a chihtak in.
Tuachi`n aman, “Ngaiin, na deihlam bawl ding in kungpai hi, Pasian aw,”
achi hi. Anihna a tunding theihna dingin aman amasapen a lamangta hi.
Hua deihna lam a Jesu Krist pumpi khatvei ngamden ding a lat jiakin hihsiangthou in i omta uhi.
Tualeh siampu tengin niteng a nna sem in, khialhnate lamang theilou kithoihna ngaimah lan jeljel in ading uhi.
Hinanleh Krist in tangtawn a ding a khialhnate ding a kithoihna khat alat nungin, Pasian jiatlam ah a touta hi.
Huanungsiah a melmate akeng ngakna a bawl ahih masiah uh a ngakjingta hi.
Ajiak aman sillat khat in hih siangthousate pen tangtawn a dingin a hihbukimta hi.
Thamlouin Khasiangthou in zong ikiang uah ahung theisak hi, ajiak aman,
“Huanite nung chiang a,
na kiang ua ka thukhun ding pen hih ahi, Toupa`n achi:
a lungtangte uah ka dante ka koih ding a,
tualeh alungsimte uah ka gelh ding hi,”
chia a genkhit nung in.
Tuachi`n aman,
“A khialhnate uleh danlou bangtak a a gamtatnate uh ka theigige nawn kei ding hi,”
achih behlap nalai hi.
Tuachibang ngaihdamna omna phot ah, khialhna a dingin sillat aom nawn kei ding hi.
Tuajiakin unaute, Jesu sisan jiak a mun siangthoupen a lutngamna nei in,
ei a ding a siangthou bik a ahung bawlsak lamthak leh hing ah puanjak (huapen a taksa chihna ahi) kantan in.
Tualeh Pasian innkuanpihte tung a siampi ineih jiak in.
Sialehpha theihna hoihlou a pat i lungtang uh thehsiang a om in, i pumpite uh zong tuisiang a sil a om in, tualeh ginna theihchetna lungtang diktak tawh inaih ding uhi.
I kinepna thuphuan pen uh linglou kei in i tudet ding uhi, ajiak amah thuchiam hungpiatupa a gin-om hi.
Tualeh itna leh silhoih bawlna lam a kitokthou dingin khat leh khat i kingaihtuah ding uhi.
Khenkhatte omdan bang a i kikhopnate uh tawpsan louin, hinanleh khat leh khat kihasot tuah jawin, tualeh ni a hungnai semsem chih na muh mahbang un ki hasottuah sem un.
Ajiak pen thutak theihna ineih nung a utna neia ikhialh teitei uleh, khialhnate ding a kithoihna a om nawn kei hi.
Hinanleh vaihawmna lauhuai kichiantak lam etna banghiam leh doudaltute kangmang ding thangpaihna meiah a omjawta ding hi!
Kuapeuh Mosi dan deihloumite pen theihpihtu nih leh thum thu in zahngaihna beiin asijel uhi.
Pasian Tapa tuanden a, thukhun sisan amah suksiangthouna pen sil nadanmai a sim a, tualeh hehpihna kha thangpaisak pen! Hua sang a bangchituk a gawtna thupijaw ahia thuakleh kilawm a na ngaihtuah uh?
Ajiak pen, “Phulak him him kei lak ding ahi, keiman ka thukding hi.”
Toupa`n achi, chihleh, “Toupa`n amite vai ahawmsak ding,” chia gentu amah ithei uhi.
Pasian hing khutsung a puk pen sil lauhuai mahmah ahi!
Hinanleh nidanglai a, hihvak a na omnung ua, thuakna haksatakte na thuaklai nite uh ngaihtuah kik un,
langkhat ah phawknate leh gimthuaknate thuak in na om ua, langkhat ah ahihleh huachibang a bawl a omte thuakpihtute na hung hi uhi.
Ajiak nou ka kolhbulhna ah nung lainat ua, van ah gou hoihjaw leh omjing ding na neih uh kitheiin, na van uh hung laksakte uzong kipaktak in na thuakjawta uhi.
Tuajiakin, nuamman thupitak muding a na kimuanna uh; paikhia mawng mawng kei un.
Bangjiakin ahia ichihleh, Pasian deihlam na bawlzoh ua, thuchiam pen na muhtheihna ding un, thuakzohna na poimoh uhi.
Ajiak pen
“Tomkhat zoh chiang in,
ahung paidingpa a hungpai ding;
ajekai nawn kei ding hi.
Tuachi`n midiktat ginna in a hing ding a;
hinanleh a nungtolh leh pen,
ka kha in amah ah kipahna a neikei ding hi.”
Hinanleh eite pen mangthang ding a nungtolhte lak a mi i hikei ua, hinanleh hinna humbit ding a gingtate lak a mi i hijaw uhi.
Tualeh ginnna pen sil kinepnate theihchianna, sil muhlouhte aom a theihna ahi.
Ajiakpen hihthu ah upate`n pahtat alawh uhi.
Ginna in leitungte pen Pasian thu a suktuah khawm ahi chih ithei a, tuachi`n sil kimute zong sil kilangte asiam ahikei hi.
Ginna in Abel in Kaina sangin kithoihna hoihjaw Pasian kiangah alan hi. Huajiakin midiktat ahi chih theihsakna alawh a, Pasian in a silpiakte a theihpih a; huajiakin sikhin napi`n, thu agen nalai hi.
Ginna jiakin Enok sihna mulou dingin lakmang in a om a; tualeh Pasian in a lakmang jiakin, muh in aom takei. Lakmanga a omma in Pasian a kipaksak hi chih theihsakna anei hi.
Hinanleh ginna louin amah kipaksaktheih gual ahikei hi, ajiak kuahileh Pasian kiang a hungpai in amah aom chih leh, amah guntuhtak a zongmite kiang a nuamman piatu ahi chih agintat ding ahi.

Ginna in Noah, sil muhnailouhte thu Pasian hilh a na om in. Pasian lauhdan siam in a gamtang a a innkuanpihte hutdamna dingin kuang abawl a. Huatawh leitung siamlouh a tangsakta a ginna jiak a om diktatna gou luahtu ahung hita hi.
Ginna in Abraham in anung chiang a gou ahung tan ding mun a sap a aom laiin a thumang a; tualeh khoilam a pai ding chih zong theilouin, a paikhia hi.
Ginna in gamchiam ah, mi gam a teng bangin ana tengjing a, thuchiam kibanga a gouluahpih ding Isak leh Jakob tawh, puan innte ah, ateng uhi.
Ajiak aman suangphum dettak nei, Pasian lam leh bawl khuapi pen a ngakjing hi.
Ginna in Sarah in zong nau paitheihna anei a, achiamtu pen muanhuai a asehjiak in ateknung in ta anei hi.
Tuajiakin asisa tawbang, mikhat a pat in, van a aksite bang a tam leh, tuipi piau a sehnel bang a simsenglouh ahung suakta hi.
Hihte jousiah ginna neiin sil chiamte tanglou in asita uhi. Hinanleh gamlapi a pat galmuh in apomkip uhi. Leitung ah mikhual leh khualjin ihi uhi chih ana phuangta uhi.
Ajiak hichibang thu genten gamtuam khat azong uh chih chiantakin aphuang uhi.
Tualeh amau`n ahung pawtna uh gam lunggulh taktak le uh pen, kik kikna hunlemtang ana muta tham ding uhi.
Hinanleh tuin, gam hoihjaw deih ana hi ua, huapen, van gam ahi. Huajiakin a Pasian uh Pasian chih a sap a jumnawnkei ua; ajiakpen amauh a dingin khuapi khat guatsa in akoih uhi.
Ginna in Abraham, ze-et a aom in, Isak alan a, thuchiamte tangpa in a tapa tang neihsun alan hi.
“Isak ah na suante akisam ding,” kichipa pen.
Pasian in misi lak a pan in zong amah a kaithouthei hi chia ngaihsun in; hua a kipan in etsakna in amah a mukikta hi.
Ginna in Isak in sil hungtung dingte tawh kisai in Jakob leh Isau a gualjawl hi.
Ginna in Jakob in, Joseph ta tegel a gualjawl a, tualeh a chiangkhut dawn a kingam in Pasian abia hi.
Ginna in Joseph in, a sihkuan in Israel tate pawtkhiat ding thu agen a, tualeh aguhte tungtang ah thu ahilh hi.
Ginna in Mosi apianlai in, naungek melhoihtak ahi chih amuhtak un khathum sung a nulehpa phual in a om a; kumpipa thupiak zong a laukei uhi.
Ginna in Mosi, ahung pichin nung in, Pharaoh tanu tapa chih a om a utkei a.
Tomkhat sung khialhna nopna mansang in Pasianmite tawh gimthuakna a teljawta hi.
Krist kisimmohna pen Izipt gam goute sang a thupijaw a ngaiin, ajiak a nuamman muh ding lam a enjaw hi.
Ginna in aman kumpipa thangpaihna laulouin Izipt gam anusia a, muhtheih louhpa pen muhtheih bang a ngaiin athuak paisuak hi.
Ginna in paikan kut leh sisan thehna a bawl a, tamasa thattu in amauh a khoihkhak louhna ding in.
Ginna in mauh leigaw a pai bangin tuipi san akan ua, Izipt gammite`n zong huabang in bawl a sawm ua, hinanleh tuilak ah atumta uhi.
Ginna in Jeriko kulhbang ni sagih avialh nung un achimta hi.
Ginna in kijuaknu Rahab zong gingloumite tawh amangthang khawm kei hi, aman enkhiatute khamuangtak a ana jintun jiak in.
Tualeh bang ahia ka genbeh lai ding? Gideon thute, Barak thute, Samson thute, Jephthah thute, David thute, Samuel thute leh Jawlneite thu genning chileng hun in ahung daih kei ding hi.
Huate`n kumpi gamte ala ua, diktatna asemkhia ua, thuchiamte atang ua, humpinelkaite kam achihsak ua,
meikuang thahatna a hihmit ua, namsau hiam apel ua, hatlouhna a pan in hatsakin aom ua, kidouna ah a hangsan mahmah ua, agalte uh pangkhawm adelhjak uhi.
Numeite`n a misi uh thoukik amu uhi. Midangte zong gawt in aom ua, thohkikna hoihjaw a muhtheihna ding un, hutkhiatna a deihkei uhi.
Midangte`n nuihjat bawlna leh vuakna athuak nalai ua.
Ahi, tualeh kolbulh leh thong a khum in aom uhi.

Suang a denlup in aom ua, sing-atna a attan in aom ua, khem in aom ua, namsau tawh satlup in aom ua, belam vunte leh kel vunte silhsak in a vakthap ua, gentheitak in, gimthuak in, bawlgentheih in aom uhi.
Huate a dingin leitung omna tak ahikei hi. Gamdaite ah, mualte ah, guamte ah, leikawhawmte ah avak kawikawi uhi.
Tualeh hihte jousiahin a ginna jiak un phatna na ngahkhin nanle uh, silchiam a tangkei uhi,
ajiak eite pangloua amah hihbukim a aomlouh na dingin, Pasian in eite a dingin sil hoihjaw khat ahung piata hi.

Tuajiakin, eite zong theihpihtu meipi thupitak umkimkual a i om uh mahbang in, ahung giksakthei jousiahte leh khialhna baihlamtak a eite hung mantu pen i koihkhia ding ua, imai a kitaidemna om ah kuhkaltak in itai ding uhi.
I ginna uh siamtu leh hihbukimtu Jesu lam en in, aman amai a om kipahna jiakin jumnate zong khawksalou in, kross ah gimna a thuak a! Pasian Laltouna jiatlam ah a touta hi.
Ajiak na lungsim ua nabah ua, na lungkiat louhna ding un, amah tung a mi helte nialkalhna thuakjoupa ngaihsun un.
Khialhna douin sisan pawtjen in na pang naikei uhi.
Tualeh hasotna thu tate hilhbang a na kiang ua kigen na manghilhta uhi.
“Ka tapa, Toupa sawina simmawh kenla,
a taihilh a na om in zong lungkia ken.
Ajiak Toupa`n a itte a sawisa a,
tualeh ta adeih jousiah azepjel hi.”
Sawina nathuak uleh Pasian in a tate bawl a hungbawl ahi; pa sawilouh ta kua aom ngai a?
Hinanleh ta jousiah tan ngaina sawina nathuak kei ua ahihleh, jawlta na hi ua, ta taktaklou na hi uhi.
Huate ban ah zong, eite hung sudiktu taksa a pa inei ua, tualeh amauh i zahtak uhi. Hua sang a khate Pa thuthu a i omjawk ua i hin ding uh hilou amaw!
Ajiak amau`n ni tomnou khat ding a hoih asak bangjel ua ahung sawi uh ahi a, hinanleh aman ahihleh eite phattuamna ding a, ama siangthouna i tantheihna dingin a hungsawi ahi.
Sawina pen akithuak laiin kipak-huai abang kei a khasiat ahuaijaw hi, hitalehzong anung chiangin ahihleh huachia sawi a omte dingin diktatna gah khamuan omtak asuakjel hi.
Tuajiakin khut kaikhiate leh khup jawte hatsak un!
Tualeh na kengte ua dingin lampi tang bawl un, kengbaite guh a kilawilouh na dingin, hinanleh huate hihdamjaw un.
Mi jousiah tawh kituahna leh siangthouna delhjui jel un, huate louin kuaman Toupa a mungaikei ding hi.

Pilvangtak in en un atuachih keileh kuahiam khat Pasian hehpihna a chingjoulou na omkha ding ua; tualeh khaatna jung banghiam hungsel a nou hung hihbuai in, hua in mi tampite hihbuai in aom kha ding hi.
An kamkhat a ta upa hihna juakpa Esau bang a angkawmhattu hiam, ahihkeileh Pasian zahloumi kuahiam a omkha ding.
Ajiak pen hua nunglam in, gualjawlna gou pen luahsawm in, mittui luangpum in kuhkaltak in zongnanleh, kisikna ding hun a muhlouh jiakin deihlouh in a omta hi chih nathei uhi.
Ajiak pen nou mual khoihkhak theih leh meia kang, vomna leh, mialna leh, huihpi leh, guahpi lanna mun,
tualeh pengkul ging leh, thugen gingte omna a hungpai na hikei ua; hua aginzate`n ahihleh akiang uah huathu a kigenkik nawnlouh na dingin a ngen uhi.
Ajiak, “Gamsa nangawn in zong hua mual a khoihkhak leh, suang a denlup ahihkeileh thaltang a kaplup ding ahi,” chih thupiak pen amau`n a thuakjou takei uhi.
Tualeh, hua a asilmuh uh pen alauhhuai mahmah a, Mosi in, “Ka hahlau mahmah a ka kithing hi!” achi hi.
Hinanleh noute pen Zion mual leh Pasian hing khuapi, van Jerusalem, simzohlouh vantungmi hon leh,
khawmpilian leh van a min kigelhta piang masa saptuam kiangah leh, mi jousiah vaihawmtu Pasian kiang leh, midiktat hihbukim a omte khate kiangah leh,
thukhunthak palai, Jesu kiangah leh, Abel a sang a sil hoihjaw ngen sisan thehkawm a hungpai na hijaw uhi.
Thugentu pen na deihlouh khak ding uh pilvang un; ajiak leitung a thugentu a deihlouh ua bawn suaktalou ahih uleh, van a kipan thu hunggentu amah i kiheisan uleh i suakta sem kei ding uhi!
Tuachi`n a aw in lei alingsak a; hinanleh tuin “Khatvei leiguak hilouin van zong kalingsak kik ding chi`n thu achiamta hi.”
Tuin hihthu, “Khatvei ka hihling ding,” chih in sil kilingloute a omden jing theihna dingin, sil kilingte pen silsiam bang a suanmang in a om ding chih a theisak hi.
Tuajiakin, kumpi gam sukling guallouh i ngahjiak un, zahtak leh Pasian lauhdan siamkawm a saantaak taktak a Pasian nna i septheihna ding un hehpihna inei ding uhi;
ajiak i Pasian uh pen kakmanghat mei ahi.
Unau ki itna omsak jing un.
Mikhualte hoihbawl ding manghilh kei un, ajiak huachibang bawl in mi khenkhaten theiloupi`n vantungmite ana zintun uhi.
Thong sung a kan a omte pen amauh tawh kankhawm a om bangin theijing un, tualeh gelgawtna thuakte, nou zong pumpi a om na hih jiak un theijing un.
Mi jousiah lak ah kitenna zahbawl in om henla, tualeh lupna zong hihbuah louhin om hen; hinanleh nu leh pa kal a thangtatte leh angkawmte pen Pasian in vai a hawmsak ding hi.
Na omdan uh deihgohna panglou in hihen, nasil neihsun uh tungah lungkim un; ajiak aman, “Bangmahchik in kung nusiangai kei ding a, tai zong kung taisan ngaikei ding hi,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n hangsan takin,
“Toupa pen a hung panpihtu ahi a;
ka laukei ding hi.
Mihing in bang ahung bawl thei dia?”
ichi ngam uhi.
Na tung ua thuneitute leh na kiang ua Pasian thu gentute theijing un; a omdan ua sil hung omkhiate ngaihtuah unla, a gindan uh jui un.
Jesu Krist pen jani leh tuni leh tangtawn in a ngaingai ahi hi.
Thugin tuamtuamte leh lamdangte puakmang in omkei un; ajiak pen lungtang hehpihna a hihkip tuh ahoih ahi, nek ding a hihkip ding ahikei, huachibang lungkhamten huate ah phattuamna a mutuan kei uhi.
Biak buk nasemtute`n a nektheihlouh na uh maitam inei uhi.
Siampi in khialh thoihna ding a mun siangthoua a sisan a lutpihjel gan luangte ahihleh huan pualam ah a halmangjel uhi.
Tuajiakin Jesu`n zong ama sisan tawh mite khialhna a hihsiangthou theihna dingin kulh kongkhak pualam ah a thuakta hi.
Tuajiakin amah a simmohna uh pua in a kiangah huang pualam ah i paikhia ding uhi.
Ajiak hihsan ah a omjing ding khuapi i neikei ua, hinanleh khuapi hung om ding pen izong uh ahijaw hi.
Tuajiakin, ama vang in, pahtawina kithoihna pen Pasian kiangah tawplou in ilan ding uhi, huapen amin a i kipahna phuankhiatna muk gahte ahi.
Hinanleh silhoih bawl leh silphal pen manghilh kei un, ajiakpen huachibang kithoihnate ah Pasian a kipak mahmah hi.

Na tung ua thuneitute thu mang unla a thuthu un om un. Ajiak pen na tungtang thu uh gendingte bangin na kha uh a hungvensak uhi. Huapen lunggimtak a bawllou a kipaktak a a bawltheihna ding un. Lunggimtak a abawl uh nou a dingin a phatuamkei hi.
Kou a dingin hung thumsak un; ajiakpen sil bangkim ah diktak a gamtat ut in, sialehpha theihna hoihtak ka nei uh chih ka thei hi.
Hinanleh kintak a na kiang ua sawlkik a ka omtheihna dingin, hihpen abiktak in na kiang uah kung ngen hi.
Tuin khamuanna Pasian, i Toupa uh Jesu Krist misi lak a kipan a a kaithoupa, tangtawn a thukhun sisan jal a belampu thupitak in,
Jesu Krist jal a a mitmuh a adeihlam taphot bawl ding in silhoih chinteng ah nou hung hihbukim hen, amah kiangah thupina tangtawn tangtawn in omta hen! Amen.
Tualeh unaute, hasotna thu ngaithei teitei dingin kung ngen hi, ajiakpen thu tomnoukhat in na kiang uah kung gelh hi.
I sanggampa uh Timothi khakkhiat in a omta chih na theita un; a hung paipaileh, amah tawh nou kung mu ding hi.
Nou hung lamkaihte jousiah leh misiangthoute jousiah chibai hung na buksak un. Itali gam a mite`n chibai ahung buk uhi.
Na kiang uah hehpihna om hen. Amen.
Jakob, Pasian leh Jesu Krist sila in, nam sawmlehnih kithehjakte:
Chibai abuk hi.
Ka unaute aw, engbawlna na tuahchiang un, kipakna ngen in ngai un,
na ginna uh etkhiatna in kuhkalna asiam chih thei in.
Hinanleh bangmah tasamlou a chibit leh bukim tak a na omtheihna ding un kuhkalna in semkhia hen.
Na lak ua kuapeuhin pilna a taksapleh, mijousiah kiang a tailou leh itlou a piatu Pasian kiangah, ngen hen, tuachi`n a kiang ah piak ahi ding hi.
Hinanleh ginglahlou keiin, ngen hen. Ajiak ginglahmi pen tuipi kinawk huih mutleng kawikawi bang ahi.
Ajiak, huachibang mi in, Toupa a pat bangmah muh kinem kei hen.
Lungsim thuahneimi pen alampi jousiah akipkei hi.
Hindan ngiam sanggampa pen pahtawia aom jiakin kipak hen,
hinanleh mihausa pen hihngiam a aom jiakin kipak hen, ajiak lou a pak bang a mang ding ahi hi.
Ajiak pen ni in asatna tawh ahung suah chiangin ahaivul a, hua pakpen akia a, ahoihnate amangta hi. Tuachimah bangin mihausa zong, apaina ah amang ding hi.
Khemna thuakjoumi ahampha hi. Ajiak pen etkhiat a aomzoh chiangin Toupa`n amah itte kiang a piak achiam hinna lallukhu amu ding hi.
Mi kuamah in, khem a aom chiangin, “Pasian khem ka hi kichikei hen.” Ajiak Pasian pen gitlouh a khemgual ahikei a, aman zong kuamah a khemngaikei hi.
Hinanleh michih amauh utna a puimang leh hip a aom chiangin, khem in aom ahijaw hi.
Tuachi`n, utna in nou apai chiangin, khialhna ahung piangkhia a, tua khialhna, ahung pichin chiangin, sihna ahung piangkhia hi.
Ka unau ittakte aw, khem in omkei un!
Silpiak hoih leh, silpiak bukim jousiah tunglam a kipan ahi a, vakte Pa kiang a kipan a hungpaisuk ahi, amah ah lamdanna leh kiheina lim aom kei hi.
A silsiamte lak a gahmasa khat i hihtheihna ding un, ama deihna bang a thutak lak ah ahung lakkhiat ihi uhi.
Tuajiakin ka unau ittakte aw! Michih a ngaihkhiat lam ah kin henla, thugen lam ah manlang kei henla, thangpaih lam ah ze-ol hen.
Ajiak mihing thangpaihna in Pasian diktatna asiamkhia kei hi.
Tuajiakin silnin jousiah gitlouhna dimlet jousiah koihkhia unla, tualeh na hinna uh hundamthei phuhlutsa thu pen nunnemtak in pom un.
Hinanleh noumah leh noumah kikhem a thu ngaikhia guak hilou in, thu juitute hijaw un.
Ajiak pen mi kuapeuh thu ngaikhia guak ahih a ajuitu ahihkei leh, amah pen mi limlang a apianpih mai ki en tawh kibang ahi.
Ajiakpen aki en a, apaikhia a, bangchi bang mi ahih aki manghilhpai hi.
Hinanleh kuapeuh zalenna dan bukim en a, tualeh hih juijing a, manghilhhat ngaikhiatu hilou a, hinanleh thu nasemtu hijaw, hua mi pen a nasep ah gualjawl in a om ding hi.
Na lak ua mi kuapeuh sahkhuami ka hi chia kingaihsun a, tualeh alei venghoihlou a, hinanleh ama lungtang kikhemjaw tuh, hih mipa biakna pen apanna bei ahi.
Pasian leh Pa mitmuh a biakna siangthou leh ninbanglou ahihleh hih ahi: tagahte leh meithaite buailai a vaveh leh, leitung buahna banglou a mahni kikep jing ahi.
Ka unaute aw, i Toupa Jesu Krist, thupina Toupa gingta kawm in mi khentuam neikei un.
Ajiak pen na kikhawpna uah kham khutsip bulh puanhoih silh hunglut henla, tualeh mijawng khat zong puannin silh in hunglut taleh,
tualeh puanhoih silhpa na zahbawl ua a kiang ah, “Nang hih munhoih ah touin,” nachi ua, tualeh mijawngpa kiangah, “Nang huatak ah dingin, ahihkeileh, Ka keng koihna ah touin,” nachi uhi,
nalak uah khentuam neia, tualeh ngaihtuahna gilou neia thukhentute na hih uh ensaktute hilou ding na hi uh maw.
Ngaiun, ka unau ittakte aw, Pasian in hih leitung a mijawngte ginna a hausa ding leh amah itte achiam kumpi gam luah ding a atel hilou amaw?
Hinanleh nou mijawngte na simmoh uhi. Mihausate`n nou a hung bawlgenthei ua! Vaihawmna ah ahung kailut kei uh maw?
Amauhte`n na kisapna uh min zah-omtak a gensia kei uh maw?
Laisiangthou dungjuia, “Nangmah na ki it mahbang in na innvengte it in,” chih kumpi dan na hihtangtun taktak uleh na bawlhoih uhi.
Hinanleh khentuam na neih uleh pen, sil na hihkhial ua, tualeh dan in giloutu na hih uh ahung theisak hi.
Ajiak pen mi kuapeuhin dan juikim henla hinanleh munkhat ah kipalpuk taleh aun a khial a sim in aom hi.
Ajiak pen, “Angkawm ken,” chipa`n, “Tualthat ken,” zong achi hi. Tuin angkawm kei nanle chin zong hinanleh tual nathahleh, dan bawtsiatu na hi veve hi.
Tuajiakin zalenna dan a vaihawmsak a om dingte bangin thu gen unla sil bawl un.
Ajiak pen zahngaihna neilou mi pen zahngaihna beia vaihawmsak in a om ding hi; zahngaihna in vaihawmna azou hi.
Ka unaute aw, min ginna ka nei chi henla nasep neikei taleh, bang a phatuam diai? Huachibang ginna in a hundam theidiai leh?
Sanggampa hiam sanggamnu hiam khat guaktang in om henla niteng nek ding tasam taleh.
Tualeh nalak ua khat in, “Khamuangtak in om inla! Lumtak leh vahtak in om in!” chi henla hinanleh a pumpi ding a sil poimoh petuan keileh, bang a phatuam diai?
Tuachimah bangin ginna ngeizong nasep panglou in asi ahi.
Hinanleh mi khenkhat in, “Nang ginna na nei a ken nasep ka nei ahi, na ginna pen na nasep panglouin hung ensak inla, tualeh ken ka ginna ka nasep in kung ensak ding.”
Pasian khat aom chih na gingta maw? Na bawlhoih hi! Dawite`n zong a gingta ua, a kiling hial uhi, achi thei hi.
Hinanleh aw mimaw! Nasep pangloua ginna asi ahi chih nathei nuam ei?
I pu uh Abraham in a tapa Isak maitam tung a alat laiin silbawl jiak a siamtang hilou amaw le?
Ginna in a silbawlte tawh a semkhawm a, tualeh a silbawlte jiakin ginna pen a bukimta hi chih nathei hi.
Tualeh Laisiangthou in, “Abraham in Pasian agingta a, tualeh hihpen a diktatna a sim ahi chih a tangtung a,” tualeh amah pen Pasian lawm chia sap in aomta hi.
Tuachi`n ginna jiak guak hilouin nasep jiak in mi`n siam atang chih na mu uhi.
Tuachimah bangin, kijuaknu Rahab in zong enkhiatute ana jintun a lamtuam a asawlkhiat jiakin silbawl jiak a siamtang hilou ahi maw.
Kha omloua pumpi asi ahihmah bangin, ginna zong nasep panglouin asi ahi.
Ka unaute aw, mi tampi sia in hung pang kei un, sia in siamlouh tanna lianjaw tang ding ihi uh chih ithei ngal ua.
Ajiak pen sil tampi ah iun un i gilou uhi. Mi kuapeuh thugen lam a agitlouh kei leh, hua mi pen piching ahi a, apumpi vengtheimi zong ahi.
Ngaiun, ithu uh ajuih theihna ding un sakolte kam ah sikbah ibah ua, tualeh apumpi uh apum in i kaiheithei uhi.
En un longpite zong: alian mahmah na ua huih hattak mutleng in aom ua, hinanleh ahektu in ahekna neunoukhat tawh autna lamlam ah akiheisak hi.
Huachimah bangin lei zong pumpi hiang neunoukhat ahi a, nasatak in aki uangsak jel hi!
En in meisi neunoukhat in gammang kang nasathei hina e!
Tualeh leipen meikuang ahi. I pumpi lak ah khialhna lawmpi pen lei ahi; tuachi`n leiin pumpi aun in ahihnin a, hinkhua lampi pailehna pen akangsak a, tualeh amah pen gawtmun meidil in akang jel hi.
Ajiak pen sa namkim, vasa namkim, gul namkim, tuipi-a ganhing namkim khawijual theih ahi a, mite`n a khawijual thei uhi.
Hinanleh leipen kuaman a khawijual theikei uhi, gilou omkinken theilou sihna gu a dim ahi.
Hua in Pasian leh Pa tuh iphat ua, tualeh huamah in Pasian batpih a siam mihingte i hamsiatjel uhi.
Kamsung khat mah a kipanin phatna leh hamsiatna apawtkhia jel hi. Ka unaute aw, hih silte pen hichibang ding hilou ahi!
Tuisam khat in anak kibang in tuilim leh tuikha a pawtkhawm sak thei hiam?
Ka unaute aw, theipi kungah, Olive agahthei ngai ei? Grep guiah zong theipi agahthei ngai ei? Tuachimah bangin chikhuk in zong tui-al leh tuitam a pawtkhiasak theikei hi.
Na lak uah kua ahia pil a thu theithei om? Kingiamkhiat tak leh piltak in a silbawl hoihte omdan hoih in ensak hen.
Hinanleh na lungtang ua thangsiatna nasatak leh mahni angkhualna na neih uleh, uangkei unla thudik juausan kei un.
Huachibang pilna pen tunglam a kipan ahikei a, leitung leh, pumpi utna leh, dawia hung kipan ahi.
Ajiak pen thangsiatna leh mahni angsung khualna omna taphot ah buaina leh khialhna chiteng aom nak hi.
Hinanleh tunglam a hung kipan pilna pen amasapen in asiangthou phot a, tuazoh chiangin kilep a ut a, anunnem a, ahounuam a, khuatuahna leh gahhoih in adim a, khentuam aneikei a, alepchiah kei hi.
Tualeh adiktatna gah pen kilepna bawlte a pat a kilepna ah ahi.
Na lak ua kidounate leh kihaunate, khoia kipan a hungpai ahia? Na pumpi hiangte ua kidoujing na taksa utnate ua kipan a hungpai hilou ahi maw?
Na lunggulh ua na neituan kei uhi; tual nathat uhi. Na deihgoh ua na neijou tuankei uh; na kidou ua gal na bawl uhi. Hinanleh na ngetlouh jiak un, na nei kei uhi.
Na ngen ua, na nget diklouh jiak un na neituan kei uh, na nopsakna ding ua nazak sawm jiak un.
Nou angkawmpate leh angkawmnute! Leitung lawm hihna pen Pasian tawh kimelmakna ahi chih theilou na hi uh maw? Tuajiakin kuapeuh leitung lawm hih ut tuh Pasian melma in amah akisiam hi.
“Kha eimah sung a tengin thangsiakhop in ahung deih hi,” chih Laisiangthou in amawk gen hiding a gingta na hi uh hiam?
Hinanleh hehpihna tamsem ahung pia hi; tuajiakin Laisiangthou in, “Pasian in mi kisatheite a doudal a, hinanleh mi kingai-ngiamte kiangah hehpihna apia hi.”
Tuajiakin Pasian kiangah kituhlut un. Dawi doudal un, tuachi`n ahung taimangsan ding hi.
Pasian naih un, tuachi`n aman ahung naih ding hi. Mikhialte, na khutte uh silsiang un! Lungsim mumal neiloute, na lungtangte uh hihsiang un!
Dah un, sun unla, kap un. Na nuihnate uh dahna suak henla, na nuamnate uh dahna suak hen!
Pasian mitmuh in kingaingiam un, tuachi`n aman ahung tawisang ding hi.

Unaute aw, khat leh khat kigensia kei un, mi asanggam gensia tualeh asanggam vaihawmsak pen, dan gensia a dan vaihawm khum ahi; hinanleh dan na gensiat lehjaw, dan juitu na hikei a vaihawmtu na hita hi.
Dan piatu khat aom a aman a hundam thei a a hihsiathei hi. Midang vaihawmsak nang, kua na hia?
Tuin hungpai un, nou, “Tuni hiam jingchiang hiam in hua khuapi ah ipai ding ua huamun ah kumkhat i vatam ding a, lei in i vajuak ua ipung ding uh,” chitute.
Ahiin, jingchiang a bang hung om ding chih na theikei uhi. Na hinna uh bang ahia? Tuimei tomnoukhat hung kilang a mangkikpai bang leltak ahi.
Hua sang in, “Toupa`n pha asakleh i hing ding a, hih ahiam, hua ahiam i bawl ding,” na chi ding uhi.
Hinanleh tuin, na kisaktheihnate uah nuam nasa uh; huachibang nopsakna jousiah pen khialhna ahi.
Huajiakin, miin, silhoih bawl ding thei a bawl tuanlou pen, amah a dingin khialhna ahi.
Nou mihausate, tuin ngaiun! Na tung ua haksatna hungtung dingte jiakin kap unla kikou un.
Na hauhsatnate uh asiagawpta a, napuante uh nget in anejouta hi.

Na khamte uleh na daan dangkate uh a samek siangta hi, huate siatgawpna pen na khialhna uh theihsakna ahi ding a, na taksa uh pen meikak bangin anejou ding hi. Hun nunung lam a dingin gou na kholta uhi.
Ngaiun! Na lou ua buh at kilawhte thaman, amauh khem a na piaklouh uh. Akikou ua! Tualeh a attute kikou aw pen mipite Pasian bil ah alutta hi.
Leitung ah kipaktak leh nuamsatak in na teng ua; gohni a ding bang in na lungtangte uh na thausak uhi.
Midik siamlouh na tangsak ua na thatta uh, tualeh amau`n ahung doudal kei uhi.
Tuajiakin, unaute aw, Toupa hungpai mateng dohjoutak in om un, ngaiun, louneimi in leigah manphatak a ngak a guah masa leh guah nunung amuh masiah dohjoutak in a ngak hi.
Nou zong dohjoutak in om un. Na lungtang uh hihkip un, ajiak Toupa hung painang anaita hi.
Unaute aw, khat leh khat kiphunsan kei un, siamlouh tansak in na om khading uhi. Ngaiun vaihawmtu kongkhakbul ah aom hi.
Ka unaute aw, Toupa min a thugente pen gimthuakna leh dohzohna lam a etton dingin zang un.
Ngaiun, a thuaktute pen ahampha in isep uhi. Job thuaktheih dan naja ua, Toupa`n atawp a abawl dan, Toupa pen zahngaihna leh lainatna a dim ahih zong na mu uhi.

Hinanleh ka unaute aw, sil jousiah sang a athupi pen ahihleh, kichiam kei un, van louin hiam, lei louin hiam, kichiamna dang mawng mawngin kichiam kei un, “Hi” nachih uh hi, “Hilou” nachih uh hilou hisakjaw un, atuachih keileh vaihawmsak in na om kha ding uhi.
Na lak uah haksatna thuak aom hiam? Thum hen. Kipak aom hiam? Phatnala sa hen.
Na lak uah damlou aom hiam? Saptuam upate sam henla amau`n Toupa min a sathau nuh in thum uhen.
Tualeh ginna a thumna in damlou pen ahundam ding a, Toupa`n amah a kaithou ding hi; tualeh khialhna a bawlleh huate pen ngaihdamsak ahi ding hi.
Sukdam a na omtheihna ding un, na khialhnate uh thupha ki tawituah unla, khat leh khat ki thumsak un. Midiktat thumna pen a phatuam mahmah hi.
Elijah pen eimah bang mihing ahi a, aman guah juklouhna dingin lungluttak in athum a, tualeh kumthum leh khaguk leitungah guah julouin a omta hi.
Tualeh athumkik a, van in guah ajusak a leiin agahte ahung piangsakta hi.
Unaute aw, nalak ua mi kuapeuh thutak a kipat namangta henla mikhat in puikik taleh,
amah mikhial a lammanna a kipan kiheisaktu in sihna a pat kha khat ahundam ding a, khialhna tampite a khuhmang ding ahi chih kithei hen.
Peter, Jesu Krist sawltak in,
Pontas gamte, Galatia gamte, Kappadosia gamte, Asia gamte, leh Bithinia gamte, a Pasian thu a khualjin a kikhenjakte kiangah.
Thumang ding leh Jesu Krist sisan thehding a kha hihsiangthou jal a Pa Pasian theihkholhna dungjuia telte kiangah.
Hehpihna leh khamuanna na kiang uah sukpungin omta hen.
Misi lak a kipan a Jesu Krist thohkikna jiak a a khuatuahna thupitak dungjuia kinepna hing tang ding eite hung suangkhia kikpa, Pasian leh i Toupa uh Jesu Krist Pa pen phat in om hen!
Goutan setheilou, tualeh nin banglou, tualeh tultheilou, van a nou a ding a khamsa muding in,
hun nunung chiang a kilang ding hundamna muding a ginna jal a Pasian silbawl theihna a kep na hi uhi.
Hua ah hahpak in na kipak ua, hilehzong tuin apoimohleh engbawlna tuamtuam in lungkham tadih mahle uchin zong,
na ginna diktak uh etkhiatna pen kham meia etkhiat ahihnung a mangthang jel sang a manphajaw, Jesu Krist hung kilakni chiang a pahtawina leh zahbawlna leh thupina a muh a aom theihna ding in.
Mungailoupi in, amah na it ua, tuin amah mukei nanle uchin zong, na gingta ua. Kipahna genguallouh leh thupina a dim in na kipak uhi,
na ginna uh atawpna, nakha uh hundamna pen mu in.
Hih hundamna thu pen, na kiang ua hundamna hung tung ding thu nagenkholh Jawlneite`n akan ua, pilvang tak in asuikhia uhi.
Krist thuakna leh anung a hung jui ding thupina ana matheihsak laiun, Krist Kha amauh sung a om in bangchik hunin ahia, ahihkeileh bangchi bang hun in ahia atheihsak chih zonkhiat tum in.

Van a kipan a Khasiangthou hung kisawlkhia panpih a na kiang ua tangthupha gentute`n amauh a ding guak hilouin hinanleh eite dingin, hua na kiang ua thu kigensawnte nna asem uh chih na kiang uah suklat in a om hi. Hua silte pen vantungmite`n zong et a ut uh hi.
Tuajiakin na lungsim kawng uh gak unla; pilvang un; Jesu Krist hung kilak chiang a hehpihna nou ahung puakding pen atawp dong in lam-en un.
Thumangtakte bangin, na theihlouh lai ua na nidanglai utnate uh bang a omlou in.
Hinanleh nou hung sampa a siangthou bangin nou zong na gamtatdan jousiah uah siangthou un;
Ajiak pen, “Siangthou un, ajiak kei kasiangthou hi,” chih gelh ahi.
Tualeh deihsaktuam neilou a michih a nasep dungjuia vaihawmsaktu pen Pa chia sam nahih uleh, hihsan a na vaihawmlai hun uh lauhdan siam in zang un.
Na pu leh pate uapat tawndan a na muh uh na omdan uh bangmah hilou a pat sil sethei daan dangka leh kham a tat na hikei ua;
hinanleh Belamnou demnabei leh nin banglou sisan bang a Krist sisan manpha a tat na hijaw uh chih nathei uhi.
Amah pen leitung kisiamma pek in guatkholh in aom taktak ngeingut a, hinanleh hih hun nunungte ah nou a dingin suklat in a omta hi.
Amah jiakin misilak a kaithoupa leh thupina piapa Pasian na gingta uhi.
Unaute tung a itna dailou nei ding khop a Kha jiak a thutak juia na kha uh na hihsiangthou tak jiak un, it petmah in lungtang siangthouin khat leh khat ki ittuah un.
Khaichitang setheilak ah hilouin, hinanleh setheilou Pasian thu tangtawn a hing jing leh omjing lak a piangthak na hijaw uhi.
Ajiak pen,
“Taksa jousiah hampa bang ahi a,
tualeh mihing thupina zong hampapak bang ahi.
Hampa pen avul a,
apak zong apulh hi,
hinanleh Toupa thu pen tangtawn in a omjing hi.”
Tualeh hihpen na kiang ua tangthupha manga thu kigenpen ahi hi.
Tuajiakin gitlouhna jousiahte, khemna jousiahte, lepchianate kithangsiatnate tualeh kigensiatnate koihkhia un.
Naungek suakthakte bangin na khantouh theihna ding un Pasian thu nawitui siangthou lunggulh un.
“Toupa pen mihehpih siamtak ahi chih na theihkhak tak ua ahihleh.”
Amah, mite deihlouh, hinanleh Pasian tel leh manpha suangpi hing bang kiang a hung pai in.
Nou zong suanghingte bangin, Jesu Krist jiak a Pasian deihdan khalam kithoihna lan ding a siampu siangthou leh khalam inn a lamtouh na hi uhi.
Tuajiakin Laisiangthou ah zong:
“Ngai un, Zion ah aning a suang poimoh pen,
tualeh manphatak kalem hi;
kuahileh amah gingtate pen azahlak kei ding hi,”
chih gelh ahi.
Tuajiakin nou agingtate dingin, amah mah amanpha ahi; hinanleh agingtaloute ding in,
“Innlamtute suang deihlouh
huami pen aning a suang poimoh pen ahung hita hi.”
Tualeh
“Kipaihna suang leh,
thangpaihna suangpi tawh.”
Ajiak pen a thumanlouh jiak un thu ah a kipalpuk uh, huachibang ding a guatmawng zong ahi uhi.
Hinanleh avakna lamdangtak a lutding a mial a kipan nou hung samkhiapa pahtawina na suklattheihna ding un noupen chitel thupi siampu, nam siangthou, abik a Pasianmite na hi uhi.
Nidanglai in Pasian mite na hikei ua, hinanleh tuin Pasian mite na hita uh; zahngaihna tangloute nahi ua, hinanleh tuin zahngaihna na muta uhi.
Ittakte aw, mikhual leh khualjin bang na hihjiak un kha doudaljing taksa utnate tawpsan dingin kung ngen hi.
Sil gilou bawlte bang a ahung gensiat chiang ua, na nasephoih amuhte uh jiak a veh a na om chiang ua Pasian apahtawi theihna ding un, Jentelte lak ah na gamtatdan uh kilawmtak in om hen.
Toupa jiakin mihing dan bawl jousiah nuaiah kituhlut un, thuneipen kumpipa kiangah hiam,
ahihkeileh sil gilou bawlte leh silhoihbawlte phat ding a amah hungsawl ahihjiak in gam uktute kiangah zong.
Ajiakpen na silhoih bawl ua mimawte motna na sukdaih uh Pasian deihdantak ahi.
Mi zalente bangin, tualeh na zalen na uh pen, gitlouhna kikhumna ding a zanglou in, hinanleh Pasian silate bangin om un.
Mi jousiah zahbawl un, sanggampihte it un, Pasian lau un, kumpipa zahbawl un.
Silate aw, laudan siam in na pute uh kiangah kituhlut un, ahoihte leh a nunnemte kiang guak ah hilou in, lungtang khauhte kiangah zong.
Ajiak pen Pasian lam a sialehpha theihna jiak a, min gimna leh dikloutak a bawlna athuakleh, hihpen pahtat tak ahi.

Bang jiakin ahia ichihleh na diklouhna jiak ua khuttum a suk natuah un kuhkaltak in thuak mah le uchin, pahtat bang ahia nalawh uh? Hinanleh silhoih nabawl un huajiakin nathuak unla kuhkaltak in thuakle uchin, huapen Pasian kipahpih lam ahi.
Huachibang bawl ding a sap nahi ua, ajiak Krist in zong akhap a najuih ding uh, na etton ding uh hung nutsiat in eite tangin a nathuakta hi.
Aman khialhna mawng mawng abawl kei a, tualeh akam ah zong khemna thu apawt kei hi.
Enghou a a omlai in a thukkei a; athuaklai in zong, a vaukei hi; hinanleh diktattak a ngaihtuahpa kiangah akikemsak jawhi.
Eite khialhna lam a si a, hinanleh diktatna lam a i hintheihna dingin aman ama pumpi ah i khialhnate kross dawn ah apua a, amah kivuakna hualte ah sukdam in na omta uhi.
Ajiak belam bangin na na lammangta uh a, hinanleh tuinjaw Belampu leh nakha uh vengtu kiangah na hung kikkikta uhi.
Tuachimah bangin nou zite aw, na pasalte uh kiang chiat ah kituhlut un. Tuachi`n, kuahiam khat in Pasian thu gingtakei nanleh, Pasian thu loua a zite uh gamtatdan a zoh in a omthei ding hi,
lauhdan siamkawm a na gamtatdan siangthou uh a etchiang un.
Na kivonna uh pualam kivonna samphekte leh, kham khi awhte ahihkeileh puansilh a kivonna hilou in.
Lungtang a mihing thugu`k thunuailut leh nunnem puansilh setheilou hijaw hen, huapen Pasian mitmuh in amanpha mahmah hi.
Ajiak pen tuachimah bangin nidanglai a numei siangthou Pasian gingtate zong amau pasalte thuthu a om in ana kivon uhi.
Sarah in Abraham Toupa chia sam a athu aman mahbang in. Lauhman hilou a ahoih a na gamtat uhleh Sarah tanute na hi uhi.

Tuachimah bangin, nou pasalte aw, na thumna uh dal a a omlouhna dingin hinna hehpihna tangkhawm ding na hihjiak un. Numei pen bel kekbaihjaw bang a ngaiin, na zite uh pahtawi kawm in theihna dungjuiin amauhtawh omkhawm un.
Atawppen in, khat leh khat, kilainat tuah in, lungsim munkhat pua unla, sanggam ki it bangin kamsiam unla, lungnem un.
Gitlouhna gitlouhna a thuklou in; housiatna zong housiatna a thuklou in, hinanleh, alehlam ah, gualjawlna tang ding a sap na hi uh chih thei in, vangbuakjaw un.
Ajiak,
“Hinna deih leh
nihoihte mu ut in,
gilou a pan alei venghoih henla,
tualeh amuk zong khemna thu genlou dingin venghoih hen.
Gilou tawpsan henla;
lemna zong henla delhjui hen.
Ajiak Toupa mitpen midiktatte tungah atu a,
tualeh abil zong athumna lam uah adawh hi;
Hinanleh Toupa mit in silgilou bawlte adou nak hi.”
Tualeh silhoih juitute nahih uleh kua in ahia nou poi hung khoih ding?
Hinanleh diktatna jiak a nathuak uleh, na hampha uhi! Ahung vauna uh laukei unla, zong lungkia kei un.

Hinanleh na lungtang uah Toupa Pasian pen a siangthou hi chi`n ngaihsun un. Tualeh nou a om kinepna jiak a hung dong jousiahte nunnemtak leh lauhdan siam a dawng ding in bangchiklai peuh in kiveng gige un,
Krist a na gamtatdan hoih uh dikloutak a hung demte, silgilou bawl bang a ahung gensiatnate, a hung hih minsiatnate, ua a jumtheihna ding un sialehpha theihna hoihtak nei in.
Ajiak hihpen Pasian lemsak ahihleh silgilou bawljiak a thuaksang in, silhoih bawl jiak a thuak ahoihjaw hi.
Ajiak pen Pasian kiang a ahung puitheihna dingin Krist in zong khialhnate jiakin khatvei a thuakta a, midik in midiklou tangin, taksa in hihlup in a om a, hinanleh kha a suk-hing in a om hi,
hua kha in avapai a thongsung aom khate kiangah thu a vagen hi.
Huate`n nidanglai a, Noah damlai a long bawl sungteng, Pasian thuakzohna in a ngaklaiin a thumang kei ua, hua longah mi tawmnou khat, huapen mi giat hinna tuia hundam in aom uhi,
hua lim etsakna in, baptisma in zong. Tuiin taksa nitna koihmang hilou in, hinanleh Pasian lam a sialehpha theihna hoih dawnna suklungkimna hijaw in Jesu Krist thohkikna in ahung hundamta hi,
amahpen van ah apaita a, vantungmite leh, thuneihnate leh, sil bawltheihnate a thunuai a koih in Pasian jiatlam ah a omta hi.
Tuajiakin eite a ding a Jesu Krist in taksa a hung thuaksakta ahihman in, nou zong huachibang lungsim in kithuam un; ajiak pen kuapeuh taksa a thuaksa in khialhna a tawpsanta hi.
Ahun omlaiteng taksa a mihing utnalam bang a hing taloua hinanleh Pasian deihdan a a hinjawkna ding in.
Ajiak huknate, sa utnate, uain hainate, uainmun nopnate, ankuang luinate, tualeh milim biakna kihdakhuaite a i omlaia Jentelte deihlambawlna i tu-masang hinkhuate uh ahunta hi.
Huasan ah amauh nopbawl luatna banga na bawllouh uh lamdang asa ua, nou ahung gensiajel uhi.
Huate`n mihing leh misite vaihawm ding a mansa a ompa kiangah a tanchin uh agen ding uhi.
Taksa a om mihingte bang a vaihawmsak a aom ua, kha a Pasian bang a a hintheihna ding un, hihjiakin akiang uah tangthupha gen in aom hi.
Hinanleh siljousiah tawpna ding pen anaita hi, huajiakin lungsim diktak pua unla thum kawm in pilvang un.
Tualeh sil bangkim tungah, khat leh khat ngainatak in ki ittuah chiat un, ajiak ki it tuahna in khialhna tampi akhuhkhum hi.
Phunchiak louin khat leh khat ki jintun tuah chiat un.
Michih in silpiak na muh bangjel un Pasian hehpihna kemtu hoihtakte bangin, huate in nna kisepsak tuahchiat un.

Kuapeuhin thu agen leh Pasian kam a thupawt bangin gen hen; mi kuapeuhin thu nna asepleh Pasian in hatna a piak bangjel in sem hen, Jesu Krist jal a Pasian pen sil bangkim a pahtawi a a omtheihna ding in. Amah kiangah tangtawn tangtawn in pahtawina leh lalna omta hen. Amen.
Ittakte aw, nou ze-et ding a na tung ua ze-etna hungtung pen sillamdang bang ahia hungtung bangin ngaihtuah kei un.
Hinanleh Krist thuaknate kikoppih na hihjiak un kipak un, tuachi`n athupina ahung kilat chiangin nou zong nakpitak a nuam in na kipak ding uhi.
Krist min jiak a phawk na hih uleh, na hampha uhi, ajiakpen thupina kha leh Pasian kha natung uah aom hi. Amauh lam thu ah amauh pen gensiat ahi a, hinanleh noulam thu ah pahtawiin aom hi.
Hinanleh nalak ua kuamah in tualthat bangin hiam, guta bangin hiam, silgilou bawl bangin hiam ahihkeileh midangte silbawl gensiami ahihjiak in hiam thuakkei hen.
Ahihhang in mi kuapeuhin Kristian ahihjiak a athuakleh, jumkei hen, hinanleh hih tungtang jiakin Pasian pahtawijaw hen.
Ajiak Pasian innkuante lak ah vaihawmna pat hun a hungtungta hi; tualeh eite a pat ahihleh Pasian tangthupha gingtaloute bang ahita diai le?
Tualeh,
“Midiktat bawn hundam ahih hamham leh;
mikhialte khoiah akilang tading ua le?”
Tuajiakin, kuapeuh Pasian lemsak dungjuia thuakten silhoih bawl in akha uh siamtu gin-omtak kiang a bangin a kiang ah kemsak hen.
Na lak ua upate pen kei na upa hihpih uleh Krist thuakna theihpihtu leh, thupina hung kilang ding zong tanpihtu in, kung hasot hi
nalak ua Pasian belam pawl omte vak un, alou theilou ahihjiak hilou in, utthu jaw in, metna nin deihjiak hilou in, lungsim a deih taktak jaw in.
Pasian goutante tung a kithuneisak louin, hinanleh pawlte etton hiding in.
Tualeh belampu lianpen ahungkilat chiangin thupina lallukhu tultheilou na muding uhi.

Tuachimah bangin, nou khanglaite upate nuaiah kituhlut un. Ahi, na un un khat leh khat kithuman tuah chiat unla, kingiamkhiatna in kithuam un, ajiak “Pasian in mi kiliansakte adou a, hinanleh mi kingiamkhiatte hehpihna apia hi.”
Tuajiakin ahuntak a nou ahung pahtawi theihna dingin, Pasian khut hattak nuaiah kingiamkhiat un.
Aman ahung ngaihsak jing jiakin na lungkhamna jousiah uh a tungah nga un.
Pilvang unla, kiveng gige in om un. Ajiak na melmapa uh Dawimangpa humpinelkai humham bangin, nek ding zongin avak kawikawi hi.
Na sanggamte uh leitung a omte tungah huachibang gimthuaknate atung hi chih theiin, amah pen ginna kiptak a om in, dou un.
Hinanleh Krist Jesu mang a tangtawn thupina ding a eite hungsampa, hehpihna Pasian, tomkhat sung nathuak nung un nou ahung hoih bukimsak in, ahung hihkip in, ahung hihhat in, ahung omdetsak ding hi.
Amah kiangah tangtawn tangtawn in pahtawina leh lalna omta hen. Amen.
Sanggampa gin-omtak a ka theih Sila khut in nou hasotna leh, huapen Pasian hehpihna diktak idinna uh ahi chih theisak kawm in na kiang uah tomkimtak in kung gelh ahi.
Nou tawh telkhawm, Babilon aom saptuamte`n, chibai ahung buk uhi; tuachimah bangin ka tapa Marka in zong ahung buk hi.
Itna a kitawp in khat leh khat chibai kibuk un.
Krist ah aom noute jousiah kiangah khamuanna om hen. Amen.
Simon Peter, Jesu Krist sila leh sawltak in,
Pasian leh i hundampa Jesu Krist diktatna jal a ginna manpha itanbang tangte kiang ah:
Pasian leh i Toupa Jesu Krist theihna jiakin na tung uah hehpihna leh khamuanna sukpung in omta hen.
Amah thupina leh hoihna a ei hungsampa theihna jiakin a Pasian silbawltheihna bangin, hinna leh Pasian ngaihsakna lam thu ah sil jousiah ahung pia hi.
Tuajiakin thuchiam manpha leh thupi mahmahte ahung pia hi, tualeh hihte jiak a, utna jiak a leitung a siatna ompen taikhiatsan in, Pasian hinna kikoppihte nung hitheita ding uhi.
Hinanleh hihte jiak mah in, thanop suah unla, na ginna uah hoihna hel unla, na hoihna uah theihna hel unla;
na theihna uah mahni kithununna hel unla, mahni kithununna ah thuak-hatna hel unla, tualeh na thuak-hatna uah Pasian ngaihsakna hel unla;
na Pasian ngaihsakna uah sanggamte itna hel unla, sanggamte itna ah itna hel un.
Ajiak hih silte noua ahih a akhanjel leh, i Toupa theihna lam ah chiing leh gahlou in na omkei ding uhi.
Ajiak kuahileh hih silte tasam pen mittaw ahi a gamlapi a mutheikei a, tualeh a nidanglai khialhnate a pat a silsianga a omna zong a manghilhta hi.
Tuajiakin, unaute aw, nou hung kisapna leh telna chiansak dingin kuhkal un, ajiak pen hihte na bawl uleh na pukngai mawng mawng kei ding uhi.
Tuachi`n Jesu Krist i Toupa leh hundampa kumtawn gam a lutna nou ahung kipia talua thamtham ding hi.
Hih silte jiakin leh hihte theiin, thutak na kiang ua om a na kipna uah hua silte pen hung theisak gige dingin ngaihsaklou in ka om mawng mawng kei ding hi.
Ahi, hih puan inn a ka omsung teng, nou hung theisak in hung tok-halh gige hoih kasa hi.
I Toupa Jesu Krist in ahung etsaktak mahbang in, hih ka puan inn koihmangna a hungtung pai ding chih ka thei hi.
Tuathamlou in, ka sihnung chiang a hih silte na theihjingna ding un pilvang in theihtawp ka suah ding hi.
Ajiak pen i Toupa Jesu Krist sil bawltheihna leh ahung paikikna thu kungtheihsak laiun tangthu piltak a ngaihtuah khia a juite ka hikei ua, hinanleh athupina mit a mute ka hijaw uhi.
Ajiak pen aman Pa Pasian kiang a kipat in pahtawina leh thupina amu a; huachihlai in thupina nasatak a pat in hichibang aw a kiang ah a hungtung a, “Hih ka Tapa ittak, ka kipahna mahmah ahi!”
Tualeh mualsiangthou a akiang a ka omlai un hih aw pen van a kipan a hungpawt, koumah ngeiin zong kaja uhi.
Tualeh genkholhna thu kipjawsem zong inei uhi. Khua ahungvak a na lungtangte ua jingsol aksi ahung suah masiah, munmial a vak om a ngaihsak bang ua na hih uleh na bawlhoih ding uhi.
Laisiangthou a genkholhna thu himhim kuaman ama thu a alehkhiat ding ahikei, chih theimasa un.
Ajiak pen genkholhna thu himhim mihing deihdan a pawt ahikei a, Pasian misiangthouten Khasiangthou phut ahih bangjel un anagen uh ahijaw hi.

Hinanleh mi lak ah Jawlnei takloute zong ana om ua, tuachimah bangin nalak uah sia takloute zong ahung om ding uh a, amauhte`n amauhte leipa Toupa hilhial kitheihmoh bawl in mi hihsiathei gindan diklou aguk in ahung pualut ding uhi. Amauhte tungah thakhat in siatna atungsak ding uhi.
Tualeh mi tampite`n, siatna lampi ahung jui ding ua, amauh jiakin lamdik pen gensiat ahi ding hi.
Tualeh deihgoh mahmah nate jiakin juauthu in amauh punna dingin ahung zang ding uhi. Nidanglai a na tung ua a vaihawmna akhawl kei ding a, tualeh asiatna uh zong akhawl kei ding hi!
Ajiak vantungmiten sil ahihkhial laiun Pasian in akhawi keia, hinanleh gawtmun ah apaia vaihawmsak a om ding in mialna khaute in akanjaw hi.
Tualeh amah ngaihsaklou leitung tungah tuichim tungsak in, nidanglai leitung a khawikei a, hinanleh diktatna thugenpa, Noah, midang sagih tawh a hundamta hi.
Sodom leh Gomorrah khuapite pen vut a suaksak a siatna tang ding in a mohpaih a Pasian ngaihsaklou hung om dingte etsakna dingin abawlta hi.
Tualeh migiloute omdan thanghuaite thuakgimsak a om Lot midik pen, a hunkhiata hi.
Hua midikpa pen, akiang ua a omlai in, amit in amu a, abil in aja a, danlou bangtak a a silbawlte un a lungsim diktat pen ahihna mahmah hi.
Tuachi`n Toupa`n amah ngaihsak mite pen khemna a pat hutkhiatdan athei a, tualeh midiktatloute pen vaihawmni chiang a dingin gawt kawmkawm a sitdan athei hi,
tualeh abik in utna thanghuai lam a sa dan bang a om leh, vaihawmna simmohte ahi uhi. Mot hansan leh genhak ahi ua, thupina ngahte agensiat unzong a laukei uhi.
Vantungmi hat leh silbawltheiten bawn Toupa maiah a tungthu uh gensak in a gensia-ngam kei uhi.
