Hinanleh, hih ganhing gilou, ngaihtuahna neilou mat a hihmang dingte bang a a theihsiamlouh uh silte agensia ua. Tuachi`n amauh siatna ah a beimang siang ding uhi,
tualeh sunlaia ankuang lui buaia nuamsa mi ahihjiak un diktatlouhna man amu ding uhi. Na kiang a ankuang alui un thanghuaina gensiatna ahi uhi!
Angkawmna mit a dim, khialhna tawpsan theihlouhte anei uhi. Mi kiploute a khempuk ua, enhatna lungsim apua ua, hamsiathuak tate ahi uhi!
Lamdik ataisan ua a vakmang ua, diktatlouhna thaman ngainapa Beor tapa Balaam lampi ajuita uhi
hinanleh amah pen agitlouh jiakin taihilh in aom a; sabiltung hamtheilou mi ham a ahung ham in Jawlnei motna a khamta hi.
Huate pen tuikul tui omlou, huih mutleng kawikawi meilum bang ahi uhi; amau a dingin mialna thuk penpen tangtawn a sit ahi.
Ajiak pen thuginalou chiakjen a gen in, gilou a omte a pat a suaktajoute pen taksa utna ah hukna in akhempuk nak uhi.
Amauh siatna sila hihpum in, mite suahtatna thu achiam jel uhi; mi zoh a a omna huamah in amauh sila in asiamjel uhi.
Ajiak pen, Toupa leh hundampa Jesu Krist theihna jiak a leitung thanghuainate a nutsiatsan nung ua, huamah a ata`nkik ua zoh a aom uleh, amau a dingin aomdan nunung uh pen apatna sangin asiajaw hi.
Ajiak diktatna lampi theihnung a, thupiak siangthou akiang ua kepsak a om pen nungngatsan sang in, diktatna lampi theilou ana hile uh amauh dingin ahoihjaw ding hi.
Ajiak pen,
“Ui ama luakmah ah a kikkik a,”
tualeh,
“Vokpi kisilsiangsa buannawi a kisil ding a kik,”
chih thupil diktak mah bangin amauh tungah ahung omta hi.
Ittakte aw, tua, na kiang ua ka gelh, hih laikhak nihna ahi; hua tegel ah theihkhiatthak kikna in na lungsim siangtak uh ka tokthou hi.
Jawlnei siangthoute`n ana genmasak uh thute, tualeh kou Toupa leh hundampa sawltakte thupiak ngaihsak jing a na omna ding un.
Hih thei masa un, ni nunung lam ah simmoh hatte, amauh utna bang a gamta ahung om ding ua
tualeh, “A hung paikik nang thuchiam khoiah ahia aom? Sil siamchil a kipat sil bangkim pilehpute ihmutnia kipat aom ngaingai bangin aomjel!” achi ding uhi.
Ajiak hihte a kitheimoh bawl jel uhi, Pasian thu in nidanglai in vante ahung om a leizong tuilak a pat leh tuilak ah ana om hi,
hua-ah hualaia leitung ompen tuiin atum a amangta hi.
Hinanleh tu-a om vante leh lei pen hua thu jiak mah in Pasian ngaihsaklou mite vaihawmna leh manthatna ni a ding a koihhoih in, meia gawt ding a kholkhawm in a omta hi.
Hinanleh ittakte aw, hih silkhat manghilh kei un, Toupa ngaih in nikhat pen kum sangkhat bang ahi a, tualeh kum sangkhat zong nikhat bang ahi.
Mi khenkhatte`n jekai asak bang un Toupa pen a thuchiam lam ah a jekai kei hi, hinanleh kuamah manthat deihlou a, mi jousiah kisik ding deih in, eimah lam ah a dawhjou ahijaw hi.

Hinanleh Toupa ni pen jan a guta bangin a hungtung ding hi, huani chiangin vante pen ngaihtak a ging in amang ding a, tualeh silbulte pen meisa a haitui ahi ding a, leizong asung a nasem omte tawh halmang in aom ding hi.
Tuajiakin hih silte jousiah pen beimang ding ahihjiak in, omdan siangthou leh Pasian ngaihsakna lam ah mi bang chibang hiding nahi ua le,
Pasianni hungtung ding kinem leh kilawp in, huani in vante pen hung kang in amang ding a, tualeh silbulte zong meisa a haituiin a omta ding hi.
Hitalehzong en, a thuchiam dungjuiin, asung a diktatna omna, vanthak leh leithak i kineppih ahi.
Tuajiakin, ittakte aw, hih silte lam-en in, nin banglou leh dembei a, khamuang tak a ana om a muh na hihtheihna ding un kuhkal un.
Tualeh i Toupa dohzohna pen hundamna in sim un. I sanggampa ittak Paul in akiang a piak pilna dungjuia na kiang ua agelh bang in.

A laikhakte jousiah ah hih silte tungtang agenphial hi. Hua ah thu theihsiam haksate aom a, huate pen mi pillou leh mi kiploute`n Laisiangthou mundang alakkhial bang un lakhial in amauh siatna dingin azang nak uhi.
Tuajiakin nou, ittakte aw, nou hua thute na theihkholh jiak un pilvang un, atuachih keileh migiloute khialhna puimang a om in na kipna ua pan in napuk kha ding uhi.
Hinanleh i Toupa leh hundampa Jesu Krist hehpihna leh theihna ah hung khanglian un. Amah kiangah tu leh tangtawn in thupina omta hen! Amen.
Achil a pat a om, ka jaksa uh, ka mit ua ka muhsa uh, ka-etsa uh, tualeh ka khut ua ka khoihsa uh hua hinna thu pen.
Hua hinna thu pen a kilangta a, huapen ka muta ua, ka theihpih uh, tualeh hua tangtawn hinna Pa kiang a om, ka kiang ua suklat a om pen na kiang uah kung hilh uhi.
Hua ka muhsa uleh ka jaksa uh pen na kiang uah kung hilh uhi nou zong nung kipawlkhawmpih theihna ding un; tualeh a taktak koute kipawlkhawmna pen Pa tawh tualeh Tapa Jesu Krist tawh ahi.
Tualeh na kipakna uh a bukim theihna dingin hih thute na kiang uah kung gelh uh ahi.
Hih pen akiang a pat a ka jak uh tualeh na kiang ua kung hilhsawn uh thupuak ahi, Pasian pen vak ahi a, amah ah mialna mawng mawng aom kei hi.
Amah tawh ka kipawlkhawm ichih ua miallak a ivak leh, juaugen ihi ua tualeh thutak zong ijuikei uhi.
Hinanleh amah vak a aom mah bang a ei zong vak a i om leh, khat leh khat kipawlkhawmna inei a, tualeh a Tapa Jesu Krist sisan in khialhna jousiah a pat ahung silsiang hi.
Khialhna ka neikei ichih uleh, eimah leh eimah kikhem ihi ua, tualeh thutak eiah aom kei hi.
I khialhnate i phuankhiat nak leh pen, i khialhnate ngaidam ding leh diktatlouhna jousiah a pat hung silsiang dingin amah pen agin om a, adiktat hi.
Ka khialkhakei ichihleh pen amah juaugen isuah ua, tualeh athu zong eimah ah aom kei hi.
Ka tanoute aw, na khialhlouhna ding un hih thute na kiang uah kung gelh hi. Tualeh mi kuahiam khat akhialhtak leh, Pa kiang a hung gensaktu Jesu Krist midiktat inei uhi;
tualeh amah pen ikhialhnate ding a thupha tawina ahi, eite khialhna guak hilouin hinanleh leitung pumpi thupha tawina zong ahi.
Tuin athupiakte ijuih a ahihleh, hih in amah ithei chih ithei hi.
Kuapeuh amah ka thei chingal a, a thupiakte juilou pen, mijuau ahi, tualeh thutak amah ah a omkei hi.
Hinanleh kuapeuh athu jui taphot pen, amah ah Pasian itna bukim taktak ahi. Hih in amah ah i om chih ithei hi:
Amah ah ka om gige hi, chitu in amah zong ama om bang a aom ngeingei ding ahi.
Unaute aw, thupiak thak na kiang uah kunggelh ahikei a, hinanleh thupiak lui achil a pat a naneih uh kung gelh ahijaw hi; thupiak lui pen achil a pat a najak uh ahi.
Thupiak thak khat na kiang uah kung gelh kik hi huapen amah leh nou ah diktakin aom hi, ajiak pen mialna abeita a tualeh vak diktak ahung tangta hi.
Kuahileh, vak ah ka om chia, a unau mudah pen tutan in mial ah aom nalai hi.
Kuahileh a unau it pen vak ah a omjing a, amah ah kipalpuk theihnang mawng mawng a om kei hi.
Hinanleh kuahileh a unau muhdah pen mial ah aom a, tualeh mial ah avak hi, mial in amit atawtsak jiak in a paina lam zong a theikei hi.
Ka tanoute aw, amin jiak a na khialhnate uh ngaihdam ahihtak jiakin, na kiang uah ka gelh ahi.

Pate aw, achil a pat a om amah natheih jiak un, na kiang uah ka gelh ahi. Khanglaite aw, giloupa na zohtak jiak un, na kiang uah ka gelh ahi. Tanoute aw, pate natheih jiak un, na kiang uah ka gelh ahi.
Pate aw, achil a pat a om amah natheih jiak un, na kiang uah ka gelh ahi. Khanglaite aw, nahat ua, Pasian thu nou ah a omjing a, tualeh giloupa na zohtak jiak un na kiang uah ka gelh ahi.
Leitung itkei unla, leitung a sil omte zong itkei un. Mi kuapeuhin leitung a it leh Pa itna amah ah a omkei hi.
Ajiak leitung a sil om jousiah sa utnate, mit utnate, tualeh damsung kisaktheih nate pen Pasian a kipan ahikei a hinanleh leitung a kipan ahijaw hi.
Tualeh leitung pen a utna tawh apaimang a, hinanleh Pasian deihlam bawlte pen tangtawn in a omjing hi.
Tanoute aw, hih hun nunung ahita hi! Krist doudalpa ahung pai ding chih najak bang un, tuin zong Krist doudal tampi a omta hi. Hih jiakin hun nunung ahita chih ithei uhi.

Amauhte ilak ua pat apawtkhia ua, hinanleh eilak a mi ahikei uhi; ajiak pen eilak a mi na hitale uh, eilak ah omgige ding hi uh a. Hinanleh aun un eilak a mi a hikei uh chih kilatna dingin a paikhia uh ahi.
Hinanleh nou misiangthoupa a pat thaunuh natang ua, sil jousiah nathei uhi.
Thutak na theihlouh jiak un na kiang uah ka gelh ahikei a, hinanleh na theihjiak un leh thutak a pat juau mawng mawng apawt ngailouh jiakin ka gelh ahi.
Jesu pen Krist ahi chih nial mi val a mijuau kua aom diai? Pa leh Tapa nial pen Krist doudal ahi.
Kuapeuh Tapa nial in Pa a neikei a, hinanleh mi kuahileh Tapa pom taphot in Pa zong anei hi.
Tuajiakin achil a pat a najak uh pen noumah ah omsak jing un, hua achil a najak uh noumah a a omjing leh nou zong Tapa leh Pa ah na omjing ding uhi.
Tualeh hihmi ahi silchiam aman piak ding a ahung chiam pen, Tangtawn Hinna pen.
Nou hung khem sawmte tungthu ahihileh kung gelh ahi.

Hinanleh, amah a pat thaunuhna natan uh nou ah a omjing a, kuamah hunghilh na poimoh kei uhi. Hinanleh hua thaunuhna mah in siljousiah nou ahung hilh mahbang in, thutak ahi a tualeh juau ahikei a, huain nou ahung hilh bangbang in na om ding uhi.
Tualeh tuin, ta ittakte aw, amah ah om gige un, amah hung kilat chiang a kimuanna i neihtheihna ding leh a hungpai chiang a i jumlouhna ding un.
Amah midiktat ahi chih natheih uleh, michih diktatna bawl taphot pen amah a piang ahi chih nathei uhi.
Ngaiun, bang chibang itna a tazen a Pa in eite a hung piak! Pasian tate chih a i om; tualeh huami ahi i hihnatak uh. Tuajiakin leitung in amah a theihlouh jiakin eite zong a hungthei kei hi.

Ittakte aw, tuin Pasian tate ihi a; tualeh bang chibang in ahia i om ding chih akilang nai tadih kei hi. Hinanleh amah ahung kilak chiangin, amah bangin i om ding uh chih pen ithei uhi, amah pen aom bangbang a mu ding ihihjiak un.
Tualeh michih amah a hih kinepna nei jousiah amah asiangthou bangin aki hihsiangthou jel hi.
Kuapeuh khialhna bawl in dan zong a botsia hi; ajiak khialhna pen dan bohsiatna ahi.
Tualeh amah pen i khialhnate uh lamang ding a hungpai ahi chih nathei uhi, tualeh amah ah khialhna mawng mawng aom kei hi.
Kuapeuh amah a omjing in khialhna a bawlngai kei; kuapeuh khialhna bawl in amah amukei a, thei zong a theikei hi.
Ka tanoute aw, kuamah khem in omkei un. Diktatna bawltu pen midiktat ahi, amah adiktat bang in.
Khialhna bawl mi pen Dawi a kipan ahi; ajiak pen achil a kipat in dawiin khialhna abawl jing hi. Pasian Tapa hung kilatna jiak pen, dawi silbawlte hihsia ding in ahi.
Kuapeuh Pasian a piang in khialhna a bawlngai kei, ajiak pen achi amah mah ah aom hi; tualeh Pasian a piang ahihjiak in khialhna a bawlthei kei hi.
Hihsan ah Pasian tate leh dawi tate akithei thei hi: mi kuapeuh diktatna bawllou pen Pasian a kipan ahikei a, a sanggam itlou zong Pasian a kipan ahikei hi.
Ajiak achil a pat thukhah na jak uh pen hihmi ahi, khat leh khat iki ittuah ding uh, chih.
Giloupa a pan a sanggam thatpa Kaina bang a omlou in, tualeh bangjiak in ahia amah athah tajang? Ama silbawlte ahoih kei a anaupa adiktat jiakin ahi.
Ka unaute aw, leitung in nou ahung muhdah leh lamdang sakei un.
Unaute i it jiakin sihna a pat hinna ah i lutta hi chih ithei uhi. Mi kuahileh a sanggampa itlou pen sihna ah a omjing nalai hi.
Mi kuapeuh a sanggampa mudah pen tualthat ahi, tualeh tualthat kuamah tangtawn hinna nei aom kei chih nathei uhi.
Hihmi ah itna i theithei uhi, aman ei a ding a ahinna a piakkhiat jiakin, tualeh en zong unaute ding a ihinna ipiak ding uh ahi.
Hinanleh mi kuapeuhin leitung sil hau henla a sanggam tasam in mu in amah lainat tuankei leh, bangchiin Pasian itna amah ah a omthei dia?
Ka tanoute aw, athu guak in i it kei ding ua kam guak in zong i it kei ding uh, hinanleh silbawl leh thutak in hijaw hen.
Tualeh hihmi-ah thutak a pat ihi uh chih ithei a, tualeh ama maiah i lungtang uh i muangsak thei ding uhi.
Ajiak pen i lungtang un siamlouh ahung tangsak leh; Pasian pen i lungtangte sang un alianjaw a, siljousiah athei hi.
Ittakte aw, i lungtang un siamlouh ahung tansak keileh, Pasian lam ah muanngamna inei uhi.
Tualeh a thupiakte ijuih a amitmuh a sil kipahhuaite ibawl jiak un, inget taphot amah a pat imu uhi.
Tualeh a thupiakte pen hih ahi, eiten a Tapa Jesu Krist igintat a, tualeh a thupiak bang a khat leh khat iki ittuah ding uh ahi, chih.
Tualeh mi kuahileh a thupiakte jui tuh Pasian ah a om a, Pasian zong amah ah aom hi. Tualeh huami-ah Pasian pen eimah ah a omjing hi chih kha a hungpiak na ah ithei uhi.
Ittakte aw, kha jousiah gingta kei un, hinanleh khate pen Pasian a pan ahihleh hihlouh enchianjaw un; ajiak pen Jawlnei taklou leitung ah tampi a pawtkhiata hi.
Hihmi-ah Pasian kha nathei ding uhi: Jesu Krist taksa ngeiin a hungpai chih na phuangkhia taphot Pasian a pan ahi.

Tualeh Jesu Krist taksa ngeiin a hungpai chih na phuangkhialou kha taphot Pasian a kipan ahikei hi. Hihpen Krist doudalpa kha, hungpai ding ahi chih na jak uh pen ahi; tuin zong leitung ah a omkhinta hi.
Tanoute aw, noupen Pasian a kipan na hi ua, huate na jouta uhi; ajiak amah nou a ompa pen leitung a ompa sangin alianjaw hi.
Amauh pen leitung a kipan ahi ua; tuajiakin leitung sil thute agen uhi, tualeh leitung in athu uh a ngaikhiajel hi.
Eipen Pasian a kipan ihi uhi. Kuahileh Pasian thei taphot in i thu a ngaikhiajel a, kuahileh Pasian a kipan hilouin i thu a ngaikhia kei hi. Hih a pat in kha dik leh diklou ithei uhi.
Ittakte aw, khat leh khat iki ittuah ding uh ahi, ajiak itna Pasian a kipan ahi; tualeh michih itna nei taphot Pasian a piang ahi a Pasian athei hi.
Itna neilou mi in Pasian a theikei hi, ajiak pen Pasian itna ahi.
Hihmi-ah Pasian in eite ahung itna a kilangta: amah jal a ihintheihna ding a Pasian in a Tapa tangkhat neihsun leitung a ahung sawl jiak in.
Hih ah itna a om, Pasian i it chih ahikei a, hinanleh aman eite ahung it a, i khialhnate thupha tawina dingin a Tapa ahung sawl chih ahijaw hi.
Ittakte aw, Pasian in hichituk a ahung itleh, ei zong khat leh khat iki ittuah ding uh ahi.
Kuaman Pasian a mungaikei hi; eite khat leh khat iki ittuahleh, Pasian eiah a omjing a, a itna zong eimah ah abukim hi.
Aman a kha a hungpiak tak jiakin hihmi-ah eite amah ah i om a, amah ei ah a om chih ithei uhi.
Tualeh Pa in Tapa pen leitung hundampa dingin asawl chih imuta ua, tualeh itheisakta uhi.
Mi kuapeuh Jesu Pasian Tapa ahi chia phuangkhia taphot tuh Pasian amah ah aom a, amah zong Pasian ah aom hi.
Tualeh i tung a Pasian in itna a neihpen i thei ua ging zong i gingta uhi.
Pasian itna ahi a, kuahileh itna a om tuh Pasian ah aom a, Pasian zong amah ah a om hi.
Hihmi-ah i tung a itna a bukimta hi: vaihawmni chiang a hangsanna i neihtheihna ding in, amah om bang a eite zong i omjiak un.
Itna ah launa a omkei a, itna bukim in launa a delhmangjaw hi; ajiakpen launa in thuakgimna anei hi, ajiak launa neimi pen itna ah a bukim nailou ahi.
Aman ei ahung it masak jiak in; en zong amah i it uh ahi.
Mi`n Pasian ka it, chin a sanggam huataleh, amah mijuau ahi; ajiak amuh gekguk a sanggam bawn a itkeileh, amuhlouh Pasian bangchin a it thei dia.
Tualeh amah a pat hih thupiak inei uhi: mi kuahileh Pasian it in a sanggam zong a it ding ahi, chih.
Mi kuapeuh Jesu pen Krist ahi chih gingta pen Pasian a piang ahi, tualeh kuapeuh apiangsakpa it in apiansak zong a it hi.
Hihmi-in Pasian tate i it uh chih ithei, Pasian i it a a thupiakte ijuih chiang in.
Ajiak Pasian i itna uh pen, a thupiakte ijuihna uh ahi. Tualeh a thupiakte ahaksa kei hi,
Pasian a piang taphot in leitung ajou hi. Tualeh hihmi ahi leitung tung a gualzohna, iginna uh.
Jesu Pasian Tapa ahi chih gingtami loungal kua ahia leitung tung a gualjou?
Hih ahi tui leh sisan a hungpaipa, Jesu Krist, tuiguak a hilou in, tui leh sisan in ahijaw. Tualeh theihpihtu pen Kha ahi, Kha pen thutak ahih jiak in.
Ajiak pen van ah theihpihtu thum a om hi: Pa, Thu, tualeh Khasiangthou, tualeh hih thumte pen khat ahi.
Tualeh leitungah theihpihtu thum a om hi: Kha, tui tualeh sisan, hih thumte pen khat in a kituak uhi.
Mihing theihpihna bawn ipom uleh, Pasian theihpihna athupijaw hi; ajiak a Tapa tungthu a atheihsakna Pasian theihpihna pen hih ahi.
Kuahileh Pasian Tapa gingta in amah ah theihpihtu anei hi. Pasian gingtalou mi in pen amah mijuau asuah hi Pasian in a Tapa a hungpiak thu atheihsak agintatlouh jiak in.
Tualeh thudik theihsakna thu pen hih ahi: Pasian in tangtawn hinna ahung piata a, tualeh hih hinna pen a Tapa ah aom hi.
Kuahileh Tapa neiin hinna anei hi; kuahileh Pasian Tapa neilou in hinna anei kei hi.
Tangtawn hinna na neita uh chih na theihna ding un nou Pasian Tapa min gingtate kiangah hih thute ka gelh ahi, tualeh Pasian Tapa na gintat jing theihna ding un.
Tuin amah a i kimuanna uh ahihleh hih ahi, sil khatpeuh ama deihdan a i ngetleh, ahung ngaikhia jel hi.
Tualeh i nget taphot uh ahung ngaihkhiatsak chih i theih-uleh, a kiang a i silnget uh i muta chih i thei uhi.

Mi khatpeuhin a sanggam sihna khop hilou khialhna bawl a amuhleh, a ngetsak ding a, tuachi`n aman sihna khop hilou khialhna bawlte dingin hinna apia ding hi. Sihna khop khialhna aom a; huami dingin athumsak ding ka chi a hikei hi.
Diktatlouhna jousiah khialhna ahi a, tualeh sihna khop hilou khialhna zong aom hi.
Kuapeuh Pasian a piang tuh a khial ngaikei chih ithei uhi, hinanleh kuahileh Pasian a piangpa pen amah akikem a, migiloupan akhoihkhakei hi.
Eite pen Pasian a ihi ua, tualeh leitung pumpi pen giloupa thuthu in aom chih ithei uhi.

Tualeh Pasian Tapa a hungpai a amah midiktak ahih i theihtheihna ding un theihsiamna ahung piata chih ithei uhi; tualeh eite pen amah midiktak, a Tapa Jesu Krist ah i om uhi. Amah pen Pasian leh tangtawn hinna ahi.
Tate aw, milim a pat kihemkhia un. Amen.
Upa in—-
Numei tel leh atate, thutak a ka itte kiangah, hinanleh thutak theijousiahin zong,
ei a om tualeh tangtawn a zong i kiang a om ding thutak jiak in.
Pa Pasian leh Toupa Jesu Krist, Pa Tapa, a kipan hehpihna, zahngaihna, khamuanna pen thutak leh itna in na kiang uah om hen.
Pa kiang a kipan a thupiak i muh bang a, na tate uh khenkhat thutak a om ka muh jiakin ka kipak mahmah hi.
Tualeh tuin, numei hoih, thupiak thak gelh bang pen hilouin, achil a kipat ineih uh gelhjaw in, khat leh khat ki ittuah dingin kung ngen hi.
Hihmi ahi itna, a thupiak bang a i om uh; thupiak pen hihmi ahi, achil a kipan a najak bang ua—-huamah a na om ding uh ahi.
Bangjiakin ahia ichihleh, Jesu Krist taksa in a hungpai hi chih gumlou khemtu tampi leitung ah ahung pawtta uhi, huachibang mite pen khemtu leh Krist doudaltu ahi!
I sepkhiatsate mansuah lou a nuamman akim a i muhtheih jawkna ding un noumah leh noumah kiveng un.
Mi kuapeuh dan botsia leh, Jesu Krist thugin a omgige lou in Pasian a neikei hi, kuahileh Krist thugin dan a omgige mi in Pa leh Tapa anih in a neikhawm hi.
Mi khatpeuh hih thugin kenglou a na kiang ua hungpai aom leh na inn uah tungsak kei unla, “Kampha in zong houpih kei un.”
Ajiak pen kampha a khatu in amah gitlouhna a kikoppih hi.
Na kiang uah thu tampi hung gelh ding ka neih hangin, laipuan leh laitui a gelh ka utkei a; hinanleh hungpaia i kipahna uh a kimtheihna dingin, kimaituah a hunggen ka kinemjaw hi.
Tel a om na sanggamnu taten chibai ahung buk uhi. Amen.
Upa in—-
Ka it mahmah Gaia, thutak a ka it kiangah.
Ka ittak, na kha a khantouhjel bang a sil jousiah a na khantouh ding leh na damtheihna dingin ka thumjel hi.
Ajiak pen unaute hungpai a thutak a na omdan bang a nangmah a thutak om ahung theihsak tak un ka kipak mahmah hi.
Ka tate thutak ah aom chih kajak kan a kipahna lianjaw ka neikei hi.
Ka ittak, unaute tung leh mikhualte tung a nabawl taphot gin-omtak in na bawljel in.
Huate`n ahihleh na itna saptuamte maiah a phuangta uhi. A khualjinna ua Pasianmi bangtak a na makaihjel leh na bawlhoih hi.
Ama min a pawtkhia ahihjiak un Jentelte kiang a bangmah a lakei uhi.
Tuajiakin thutak a semkhawmte ihihtheihna dingin huachibang mi pen ingaih ding ahi.
Saptuamte kiangah kagelh a; hinanleh alak ua tungtuan utpa Diotrephes in, kou ahung kipahpih kei hi.

Tuajiakin kungpaileh pen, a silbawlte leh: Ka tung ua thugilou gen a a kamtam dan ka phuangjak ding hi! Tualeh hua a zong lungkimlou in amah mah in a unaute ana vaitunnuam kei a, tualeh a tungsaknuamte zong a kham a, saptuam sung a pat a notkhia hi!
Ka ittak, sil gilou chingkenla hinanleh silhoih chingjaw in. Silhoih bawl mi pen Pasian a kipan ahi; hinanleh silgilou bawl mi in Pasian a mukei hi.
Demetria in mi jousiah a pat leh, thutak a pat pahtat alawh a. Tualeh kou zong ka theihpih ua, tualeh ka theihpihna uh pen adik ahi chih nathei uhi.
Gelh ding tampi kanei a, hinanleh laipuan leh laituiin na kiang uah ka gelh kei ding hi;
hinanleh sawtlou nung chiangin kung muding a, kimaituah in thu igen ding chih ka kinem hi.
Khamuanna natung uah om hen.
I lawmten chibai ahung buk uhi. I lawmte minlawh chiat in, chibai hung na buksak in.
Juda, Jesu Krist sila leh Jakob sanggam in,
Pa Pasian sianthousak, Jesu Krist a ding a kep-hoih leh sapte kiangah:
Zahngaihna, khamuanna leh itna na kiang uah sukpung in omta hen.
Ka ittakte aw, i hundamna thutangpi na kiang ua gelh ding ka hahngaihsut lai in, khatvei misiangthoute kipiasa ginna thu a na hahkat ding uh deihna tilkhouhna thu gelh ding kei dingin a poimoh hi.

Ajiak masanglai pek a hih siamlouhna tang ding a guatsa, Pasian ngaihsaklou leh i Pa Pasian hehpihna thu pen hukna suaksak a, tualeh Toupa Pasian khat guak om leh i Toupa uh Jesu Krist, gingtalou agu`k a hunglut mi kuate hiam aom uhi.
Hinanleh hih khatvei na theitamah nanle uchin, kung theisakkik ding hi, tuapen Toupa`n, amite Izipt gam a pat a hutkhiat zoh nung a, agingtaloute a hihmangthang hi, chih.
Tualeh vantungmite atanvou uh hoihtak a kemlou a, hinanleh atenna mun uh nusia pen tangtawn a gakna sikkol bulh in mialnuai ah nithupi vaihawmni a dingin a koihhoihta hi.
Sodom leh Gomorrah tualeh akim a khuapi omte, tuachimah bang a, kingaihna a kipumpiak leh, taksa tuamdangna delhte pen tangtawn gawtna thuak a ettawn ding a taklat a aom bang un.
Huachimah bangin hih mang manten zong taksa ahihnin ua, thuneihna anial ua, thupinate agensia veu uhi.
Hilehzong Michael vantungmi tungnung pen in Mosi luang thu ah dawi tawh kihau a a kinial laiun, gensia in a mohpaih ngam kei a, “Toupa`n hungtai heh!” a chijaw hi.
Hinanleh huate in sil a theihlouhte uh a gensia ua, tualeh ngaihtuahna neilou gamsate bang a, pianken theihtheihna a atheih uh, hua silte ah amauh leh amauh aki hihsia uhi.
Atung uh agik hi! Ajiak pen Kaina lampi ajui ua, duhgawlna in Balaam khialhna ah lawptak in atai ua, tualeh Korah helna ah a mangthangta uhi.

Hihte ahi uh na itna ankuang hoihlousaktute, noutawh an anek chiang ua launa dan theilou, amauh guak kivakte ahi uh. Amauh pen tuipailou meilum huih in apuakkawi lehlehte, phavang a sing gahlou, nihvei sisa, ajung tawh bawhkhiatte ahi uhi.
Amauh leh amauh jumnang kipuakdok tawm, tuipi kinawk vonvon, aksi leng kawikawi, tangtawn a mialna vom ngingngeng a ding a koihhoihte ahi uhi.
Tuin Enok, Adam a pat sagihnapa in zong, hihte tungthu ana genkholh hi. En in, “Toupa a misiangthou sangsawm tawh a hungpai hi

mi jousiah tung a vaihawm ding leh, alak ua Pasian ngaihsaklou a nna asep uh Pasian ngaihsak louhna nna jousiah leh, Pasian ngaihsaklou mikhialten atung a a hamsiatna jousiah jiak a Pasian ngaihsaklou jousiah siamlouh tangsak ding in!” chi in.
Hihte pen phunhatte leh nial hatte; amauh sa utna a gamtangte ahi uh; akam un ki-uangsakna thu thupi taktak agen ua, punna deihman a mi pahtawi chi`ngmi ahi uhi.
Hinanleh nou, ittakte aw, noujaw i Toupa Jesu Krist sawltakte jang a masanglai a thu kigente theigige un;
“Hun nunung chiangin Pasian ngaihsak louhna lam a amauh sa utna bang a om, simmohhatte ahung om ding uh,” chia ahung hilhte uh.
Hichibang mite pen pawltuam bawlhat mi, taksa utna a kinga mi, kha neiloute ahi uhi.
Hinanleh nou, ittakte aw, noupen na ginna siangthou uh tungah kilamtou in; Khasiangthou ah thum un,
tangtawn hinna a hung puilut ding i Toupa Jesu Krist zahngaihna pen ngakjingin Pasian itna ah noumah kikemsak un.
Tualeh khenkhat kituamkoihte lainat unla;
hinanleh khenkhatte meikuang a pat kaidok in; a taksa thanghuai uh banna puansilh tanpha kihdak in laukawm in hundam un.
Tuin na puklouhna ding ua nou hung vengbitthei leh, a thupina maia nasatak a nuamsa a mohsakna beia nou hung koihtheipa
i hundampa uh Pasian pil amah guak kiangah, thupinate, pahtawinate, vaihawmnate, leh sil bawltheihnate, tu leh tangtawn in omjingta hen! Amen.
Jesu Krist kilakna, Pasian in akiang a sil hungtung pai ngeingei dingte a silate a theihsak ding a apiak pen; aman huapen a sila Johan kiangah vantungmi sawl in chiamtehna in a theisakta hi,
tualeh aman Pasian thu leh Jesu Krist theihpihna thu leh a silmuh jousiah a theisakta hi.
Hih genkholhna thute simleh ngaikhiate leh, asung a thu kigelh jui mipen ahampha hi; ahun anaitak jiak in.
Johan in Asia gam a om saptuam sagihte kiangah:
Amah a omjing leh a omsa leh hung paidingpa a pat leh, a laltouna mai a om Kha sagihte a pat,
tualeh theihpihtu gin-om, misi lak a piang masa, leh leia kumpipate vaihawmtu Jesu Krist a kipan,
Hehpihna leh khamuanna na kiang uah om hen. Amah ei hung it a i khialhna a pat ama sisan mahmah a hung silsiangtu leh,
Pasian a Pa kiang a lalte leh siampute a hungsiamtu kiangah, thupina leh thuneihna tangtawn tangtawn in omjingta hen! Amen.
En in! meipi tawh a hungpai hi;
mit jousiahin amah amu ding hi,
amah su`ntute mahmah in zong;
tualeh leitung a nam jousiah amah jiakin akap ding uhi. Huachi hihen! Amen.
“Kei Alpha leh Omega, Abul leh Atawp ka hi,” Toupa, omjing leh omsa leh hungpai ding pa, hat tungnung in, achi hi.
Kei, Johan, na sanggampa uleh Jesu Krist a gimthuakna leh kumpi gam leh thuakzohna a natanpih uh, Pasian thu leh Jesu Krist thu theihpihna jiakin Patmos kichi tuikulh gam ah ka om a.
Toupa ni in kha in ka om a, tualeh ka nunglam ah pengkul gingbang aw ngaihtak kaja hi.

Kei, Alpha leh Omega, Amasapen leh Anunungpen ka hi, tualeh, “Na silmuhte laibu ah gelh inla, Asia gam a om saptuam sagihte kiangah khak in: Ephesa khua ah, Smarna khua ah, Pergamos khua ah, Thiatira khua ah, Sardi khua ah, Philadelphia khua ah, tualeh Laudisia khua ah,” chi in.
Tuachi`n hua ahung houpih aw pen muh tum in ka kihei a, tualeh ka kiheileh kham a kibawl meivak tunna sagih kamu a,
tualeh hua meivak tunna sagihte laiah Mihing Tapa tawh kibang, mi khat a kengphang dong a puansilh, a awm kham kawnggak a kigak ka mu hi.
Alu leh asam samul bangin akang a, vuk bangin angou a, tualeh amit pen meikuang bang ahi;
a kengphang pen dangka san taak tak meia halsan bang ahi a, tualeh a aw pen tui tampi luang gingbang ahi.
Aman akhut jiatlam ah aksi sagih atawi a, akam a pat in namsau alangnih a hiamtuah apawt a, tualeh amel pen ni hahsat a asat laitak bang ahi.
Tualeh amah ka muhtakin, asi bangin a kengbul ah ka pukta hi. Hinanleh aman a khut jiatlam ka tungah nga in, ka kiangah, “Lauken! kei amasapen leh anunung pen ka hi.
Kei a hingjingpa ka hi. Tualeh kasi a, tualeh ngaiin, tangtawn in ka hing ahi. Amen. Tualeh misikhua leh sihna chabi kanei hi.
Na silmuhsate leh, sil omlaite leh tunung a sil hung om dingte gelh in.

Ka khut jiatlam a aksi sagih na muhte leh, kham meivak sagih na muhte thugu`k ahihleh, aksi sagihte pen saptuam sagihte vantungmite ahi uh: tualeh meivak tunna sagih na muhte ahihleh saptuam sagihte ahi uhi, achi hi.
“Ephesa khua a saptuam vantungmi kiangah hichin gelh in:
“Akhut jiatlam a aksi sagih tawipa, kham meivak sagih lak a vak kawikawipa in hih thute agen hi.
Na nasep, na sepgimnate, na thuakzohnate, tualeh migiloute na thuaktheihlouh dante. Tualeh hiloupia sawltak ka hi uh chite na theihkhiat a, mijuau ahihdan uh na matkhiat leh.
Tualeh na thuakjou a, na dohzou a, tualeh kamin jiak a na gimdan leh na gimlouhdan ka thei hi.
Hitalehzong demna khat kungnei hi, na itna masa na nutsiattak jiak in.

Tuajiakin na pukna laitak theigige inla; kisik inla, tualeh nasep masakpen bawlkik in. Atuachih keileh, kintak in na kiangah kungpai ding a na kisik keileh na meivak tunna pen amun a kipan ka suan ding hi.
Hinanleh hihthu ah na hoih hi: Nikolaitan pawlte nasep na huatna ah, huapen ken zong ka hua hi.
“Kuahileh bilnei jousiahin saptuamte kiang a kha thugen ja hen!
“A gualjoupa kiangah Pasian paradis laijang a om hinna sing a pat nek ding ka pia ding hi.
“Tualeh Smarna khua saptuam vantungmi kiangah hichin gelh in:
“Amasa pen leh anunung pen, si-a hingkikpa in hihthu agen hi.
Na nasepte leh gimthuaknate leh na jawndan, hinanleh na hausa hi ka thei hi. Tualeh Judami hiloupia ka hi chi, setan kikhopna inn hingal, huate gensiatna ka thei hi!

Nung thuak ding silte lauken. Ngaiin, etkhiat a na omtheihna ding un dawiin nalak ua khenkhatte thong ah ahung khum ding a, nisawm sung gimthuakna na nei ding uh. Hinanleh sihtanpha in gin-om un, tuachi`n hinna lallukhu kung pia ding hi.
“Kuahileh, bilnei jousiahin, saptuamte kiang a kha thugen ja hen!
“A gualjoupa pen sihnihna a natsak in a omkei ding hi.
“Tualeh Pergamos khua a saptuam vantungmi kiangah hichin gelh in:
“Amah namsau alangnih a tat-hiam tuak neipan hihthu agen hi:

Na nasep leh na tenna mun, setan touna ngeizong khoisan ahia chih ka thei hi. Tualeh kamin na pomkip a, tualeh ka martal gin-om Antipa, setan tenna nalak ua thah a aomlai in zong nung ginna na tukip hi.

Hinanleh demna sil themkhat kung nei hi: ajiak pen Balaam thugin juite hua-ah na ompih a, aman Israeltate maia pukna bawl ding leh, milim biakna sa ne ding leh angkawmna khialhna bawl ding in Balak a thuhilh hi.
Huachimah bangin Nikolaitan pawlte thugin jui mi khenkhat zong nanei a, huapen ka hua hi.
Kisiik in! Atuachih keileh, kintak in na kiang ah kungpai ding a ka kam a pawt namsau in amauh ka dou ding hi.
“Kuahileh bilnei jousiahin saptuamte kiang a kha thugen ja hen!
“A gualjoupa kiangah manna kiphualgu anek ding ka pia ding a, suangkang khat, hua suangtung a minthak atangtu loungal kuaman a theihlouh kigelh ka pia ding hi.
“Tualeh Thiatira khua a saptuam vantungmi kiangah hichin gelh in:
“Pasian Tapa meikuang bang mitnei a, dangka san tawhbang keng neipa in hihthu agen hi.
Na nasepte, na itnate, na nasepnate, na ginnate, tualeh na dohzohnate ka thei hi. Tualeh na silbawl a masapen sang in a nunung pen a thupijaw hi.

Hitalehzong demna sil themkhat kung nei hi: hua numei Jezebel na phal jiakin, aman amah leh amah Jawlnei ka hi kichi in ka silate angkawmna khialhna bawl ding leh milim biakna sa ne ding in ahilh a a khemgawp hi.
Amahnu pen a angkawmna a pat kisik dingin hun ka pia a, hinanleh a kisik kei hi.
Ngaiin, amahnu pen damlouhna lupna ah ka pai ding a, tualeh a angkawmpihte pen gimthuakna thupi ah ka puilut ding hi, a silbawl uh a kisik kei uleh.
A tate sihna in ka that ding hi. Tualeh saptuam jousiahin keipen lungsim gil leh lungtang jongpa ka hi chih athei ding uh, tualeh na-un un na nasep dungjui un kung pia ding hi.
“Tuin nang leh Thiatira khua a om, hih thugin neilou leh, agen uh bang a ‘setan thuthukte theilou,’ mi dang jousiah kiangah ka gen ahi. Tunggikna dang mawng mawng natung uah ka koihkei ding hi.
Hinanleh hua na neihsa uh kungpai masiah tukip un.
Tualeh agualjoupa leh atawp dong a ka nna sempa kiangah, namte tung a thuneihna ka pia ding hi;
ken zong ka Pa a kipat ka muh bang ngeiin, aman zong atung uah bel khengpan bel ahal a akek bangin sikchiang in vai ahawm ding hi,
tualeh amah pen jingsol aksi ka pia ding hi.
“Kuahileh bilnei jousiahin saptuamte kiang a kha thugen ja hen!
“Tualeh Sardis saptuam vantungmi kiangah hichi`n gelh in:
“Pasian kha sagih leh aksi sagih neipa in hihthute agen hi. Na nasep ka thei hi; hing min napua a, hinanleh asi na hi!
Kiveng inla, tualeh sil omnalai siding a kisate hatsak in, ajiak pen na nasep Pasian maiah a bukim in ka thei kei hi.

Tuajiakin na muhdan leh na jakdan theigige inla; tukip in, tualeh kisik in. Huachia na kiveng kei leh guta bangin na kiang ah kungpai ding a, tualeh bangchik hun a na kiang kungtun ding na theikei ding hi.
Sardis khua ah a puante uh ninsaklou min tawmnou khat nanei a; tualeh amauhte pen kei tawh, puankang silh in aleng ding uh, chitna aneih jiak un.
Kuahileh agualjoupa pen puankang silhsak ahi ding a, tualeh amin uh pen hinna laibu a pat ka thaimang kei ding; ka Pa mai leh a vantungmite mai ah kagum ding hi.
“Kuahileh bilnei jousiahin saptuamte kiang a kha thugen ja hen! chi in.
“Tualeh Philadelphia khua a vantungmi kiangah hichin gelh in:
“Amah siangthou leh dik, amah David chabi neipa, ahon chiang a kuaman a khaktheihlouh, a khak chiang a kuaman a hontheihlouhpa in hih thute agen hi.
Na nasep ka thei hi, en in, na maiah kuaman a khaktheihlouh, kong kihong ka koih hi. Ajiak pen thahatna neunou khat nanei a, tualeh kamin na kitheihmoh bawl ngaikei hi.
Ngaiin! Setan kikhopna inn a mi Judami hilou pia ka hi chia juau gente, ngaiin huate kungpia a, amauhte pen hungpaiin na kengbul ah kung biasak ding hi. Nang kung it chih atheihna ding un.
Ka kuhkalna thu na kepjiak in, leitung a teng mite etkhiat ding a leitung pumpi a hungtung ding ze-etna hun a kipan in ken zong kung vengbit ding hi.
Ngaiin, kintakin kungpai hi, kuaman na lallukhu ahung laksak louhna dingin na silneihsa pen tukip in.

Kuahileh agualjoupa pen, ka Pasian tempul ah khuam-in ka pangsak ding a; tualeh a pawtkhia ngai nawn mawng mawng kei ding hi. Tualeh atung ah ka Pasian min leh, ka Pasian khuapi thak Jerusalem, ka Pasian a kipan a van a pat a hung kumsuk min ka gelh ding a, atung ah kamin thak ka gelh ding hi.
“Kuahileh bilnei jousiahin saptuamte kiang a kha thugen ja hen!
“Tualeh Laudisia saptuam vantungmi kiangah hichin gelh in:
“Amen, theihpihtu gin-om leh diktat, Pasian silsiam bul in hihthute agen hi.
“Na nasep ka thei hi; lum lah lumlou, votlah votlou in na om hi. Na vot hiam na sat hiam a na om ka deih hi!
Tuachia, lum pelhpulh a, sat lah salou vot lah votlou a na om jiakin, ka kam a pat kung siakhia ding hi!
Ajiak pen nangman, Ka hausa a, hauhsatna ka neita, bangmah ka tasam nawnkei, nachi a, tualeh migenthei, haksa-thuakmi, mijawng, mittaw leh guaktang na hihlam na kithei kei hi.

Nung hauhsat theihna dingin kham meia halchim leh na guaktang jumhuaina a kilaklouhna dingin nasilh ding puankang leh, na muhtheihna ding a namit na nuh ding mitna lou ka kiang a pat lei dingin kung deihsak hi.
Ka it mahmahte pen katai a, ka soisa hi. Tuajiakin, thathou inla, kisik in.
Ngaiin! kotbulah dingin, ka kiu hi; mi khatpeuhin ka aw ajak a kot ahon leh, amah kiangah ka lut ding a amah tawh nitak an kane ding a, tualeh aman zong keitoh ane ding hi.
A gualjoupa pen ka kiangah ka laltouna ah ka tousak ding a, kei zong ka gualzoh a ka Pa tawh a laltouna a ka tou mahbang in.
“Kuahileh bilnei jousiahin saptuamte kiang a kha thugen ja hen!”
Hih silte zoh in ka en a, tualeh ngaiin, van ah kong honsa khat a om hi.
Tualeh aw ka jak masak pen, pengkul gingbang in kei hung houpih ahi a, “Hihlam ah hung paitou in, tunung a sil om dingte kung musak ding,” achi hi.
Thakhat in keipen kha in ka omta a, tualeh ngaiin, van ah laltouna khat akitung a, hua laltouna tungah mikhat atou hi.
Tualeh hua a tou-pa pen jasper leh sardia suang bangin a kilang a, tualeh hua laltouna kimkot ah sakhituihup, emerald suang bang a kilang aom hi.
Laltouna kimkot ah touna sawmnih leh li a om a, tualeh touna tungah upa sawmnih leh li puankang silh a tou kamu a, amau`n alu uah kham lukhu akhu uhi.
Tualeh hua laltouna a pat in tunphete, van gingte, tualeh awte ahung suak a, hua laltouna maiah mei meivak sagih akuang a, huate pen Pasian kha sagihte ahi uhi.
Laltouna maiah kristal suang toh kibang, limlang tuipi a om hi.
Tualeh laltouna lailak leh kimkual ah a mailam leh a nunglam mit a dim ganhing li aom a.
Ganhing masapen ahihleh humpinelkai bang ahi a, ganhing nihna pen ahihleh bawngnou bang ahi a, ganhing thumna pen in ahihleh mihing melbang apua a, tualeh ganhing lina pen muvanlai lenglai bang ahi.
Hua ganhing li, kha gukchiat neite pen akimkual leh asunglam ua mit a dim ahi ua, tualeh amau`n sun leh jan in tawlngalou in:
“Siangthou, siangthou, siangthou,
Toupa Pasian bangkim bawlthei,
omsa leh omjing leh hung om ding,”
achi uhi.
Hua ganhing lite`n laltouna tung a tou-pa tangtawn a hingjingpa kiangah thupina leh zahna pia a kipahthu agentak un,
upa sawmnih leh lite pen laltouna tung a tou-pa maiah khupbok in tangtawn tangtawn a hingjingpa abia ua; tualeh hua laltouna maiah a lallukhute uh koihkhia in,
“Aw Toupa nang pen,
thupinate, zahnate, leh thuneihna tangtaak na hi,
ajiak nangman sil jousiah nabawl a,
tualeh nangma deihna bang a siam ahi uh,”
achi uhi.
Tualeh amah laltouna tung a tou-pa jiatlam ah asunglam leh a nunglam a kigelh chiamtehna sagih a kichiamteh laibujial khat kamu hi.
Tuachi`n vantungmi khat aw ngaihtak a kikou a, “Kua ahia laibujial pen hong a hua chiamtehna omte phel ding a taak?” chi kamu hi.
Tualeh van ah hin leiah hileh, tualouin leinuaiah hitaleh hua laibujial hongthei leh atung enthei mi kuamah aom takei hi.
Tuachi`n hua laibujial hong ding leh sim ding hiam ahihkeileh atung entaak mi kuamah ka muhlouh jiakin hahkah in ka kapta hi.
Hinanleh upate lak a khat in ka kiangah, “Kap ken. Ngaiin! Judah nam a humpinelkai, David jung in, hua laibujial pen, hong ding leh hua chiamtehna sagihte phel ding in ajouta hi,” achi hi.

Tualeh ka etleh, ngaiin, laltouna leh ganhinglite laiah leh upate laiah thahsa hileh kilawm Belamnou, kii sagih leh mit sagih nei ding kamu a. Huate pen Pasian kha sagih leitung pumpi a sawlkhiatte ahi uhi.
Tuachi`n amah a hungpai a laltouna tung a tou-pa khut jiatlam a pat in laibujial pen alata a.
Tualeh laibujial pen alaktak in, ganhing lite leh upa sawmnih leh lite pen Belamnou maiah akhupbok ua, kaihging leh gimnamtui a dim kham belhbu atawi chiat ua, huapen misiangthoute thumna ahi.
Tualeh amau`n lathak khat asa ua:
“Nang pen laibujial la a,
hua chiamtehna pheltaak na hi,
ajiak pen thah in na om a,
chichin hamchin, michin leh namchin a pat mite na sisan in Pasian a dingin nungtanta hi.
Tualeh i Pasian kiangah lalte leh siampute in nung bawlta hi,
tualeh leitung ah vai ahawm ding uhi,”
chi in.
Tuachia ka etleh, laltouna leh ganhing lite leh upate kimkot ah vantungmite aw tampi kaja a! Atamdan uh pen sangsawm mun sangsawm leh asang asang a tampi ahi uh,
tualeh,
“Thah a om Belamnou pen
thuneihnate, hauhsatnate, pilnate, thahatnate
zahnate, thupinate leh gualjawlnate tangtaak ahi!”
Tualeh van a om, leia om, leinuaia om leh, tuipi sung a om ganhing jousiahin:
“Laltouna tung a tou-pa leh Belamnou kiangah,
gualjawlnate, zahnate, thupinate leh thuneihnate,
tangtawn tangtawn in omjingta hen!”
achih uh kaja hi.
Tuachi`n ganhing lite`n, “Amen!” achi ua. Tualeh upa sawmnih leh liten khupbok in amah tangtawn tangtawn a hingjingpa pen abiata uhi.
Tuin Belamnou in chiamtehna sagihte lak a khat aphel kamu a, tualeh aw vanpi ging banghial in ganhing lite lak a khat in, “Hungpai in!” En in achih kaja a.
Ka etleh, ngaiin, sakolkang khat kamu a. Atung a tuangpa in thal atawi a; tualeh a kiang ah lallukhu khat a kipia a amah pen gualjou leh gualjoujel dingin a kuankhiata hi.
Chiamtehna nihna aphel zoh in, ganhing nihna in, “Hungpai inla hung en in!” achih kaja hi.

Tualeh sakol dang, mei bang a san khat ahung pawtkhia a; atung a tuangpa kiangah leitung a lemna laksak theihna leh, mite khat leh khat kithahtuah theihna ding uh thuneihna kipia a; tualeh a kiang ah namsau liantak piak ahi.
Tualeh chiamtehna thumna aphelzoh in, ganhing thumna in, “Hungpai in,” hung en in! achih kaja a, tuachia ka etleh, ngaiin, sakol vom khat kamu a. Atung a tuangpa in a khut in tehna a tawi a.
Tualeh ganhing lite laia pat in aw khat in, “Makhai khat in gehu tehna khat, makhai khat in barli buh tehna thum, tualeh sathau leh uain pen hihsia ken!” achih kaja hi.
Tualeh chiamtehna lina aphelzoh in, ganhing lina in, “Hungpai inla hung en in!” achih kaja a.

Tuachia ka etleh, ngaiin, sakol daang khat kamu a. Atung a tuangpa min ahihleh sihna ahi, tualeh misikhua in amah ajui a. Tualeh amauh kiangah namsau tawh, kial tawh, sihna tawh, tualeh leitung a gamsate that dingin amauh leitung sehli suah sehkhat piak ahi.
Tualeh chiamtehna ngana aphelzoh in, maitam nuaiah Pasian thu jiak leh a theihpihna apom jiak ua thah a omte kha kamu hi.
Tualeh amauh aw ngaihtak in a kikoukhia ua, “Aw Toupa, siangthou leh dik, bangtan ahia leitung a tengte tung a vaihawmlou leh ka sisan phuba uh lalou a na om ding?” achi uhi.
Tuachi`n amauhte puankang a kipiachiat a, a sila hihpihte uleh a unaute uh amauh mahbang a thah a om dingte ahung kim masiah uh, tomkhat na khawl tadih ding a akiang ua hilh ahi uhi.
Tualeh chiamtehna gukna aphelzoh in, ka en a, ngaiin, jin nasatak in akiling a; tualeh ni pen samul la-ip bangin ahung vomta a, tualeh kha pen sisan bangin ahung omta hi.
Tualeh van aksite pen theikung huihpi hattak in amut a agah puamte apulh bangin leiah akia hi.
Tuachi`n van pen laibujial kijialbei bangin amangta a, tualeh mual leh tuikulh gam jousiah a omna ua kipan in suanmang in a omta uhi.
Tualeh leitung a lengte, miliante, mihausate, galkap liante, mihatte, silate leh zalente mi jousiah pen lei kawhawm leh mual a suangpite ah a kibuta uhi.
Mualte leh suangpite kiangah, “Hung netkhum unla amah laltouna tung a tou-pa maia pat leh Belamnou thangpaihna a pat hungphual un!
Ajiak a thangpaihna ni thupi hungtung ahita, kua ahia dingjou ding?” achi uhi.
Tualeh hih silte nungin vantungmi li leitung ah hi-in, tuipi tungah hi-in, singkung bangmah in amut ling ngailouhna leitung huih lite tawia lei ningli a ding kamu hi.

Tuachi`n vantungmi dang suahlam a pat a hungkipan, Pasian hing chiamtehna nei khat kamu a. Tualeh aman akiang ua leitung leh tuipi suksiatna ding kipia vantungmi lite kiangah aw ngaihtak in a kikou a.
“I Pasian silate atal ua i chiamteh zoh masiah leitung hi-in tuipi leh singte hileh, hihsiakei un,” chi in.
Tualeh chiamteh a omte phazah kaja a, Israeltate nam jousiah a pat nuaikhat leh sangsawmli leh sangli a chiamteh ahi uhi.
Judah nam a pat sangsawm leh sangnih, Reuben nam a pat sangsawm leh sangnih, Gad nam a pat sangsawm leh sangnih,
Asher nam a pat sangsawm leh sangnih, Naptali nam a pat sangsawm leh sangnih, Manasseh nam a pat sangsawm leh sangnih,
Simeon nam a pat sangsawm leh sangnih, Levi nam a pat sangsawm leh sangnih, Issakar nam a pat sangsawm leh sangnih,
Jebulun nam a pat sangsawm leh sangnih, Joseph nam a pat sangsawm leh sangnih, Benjamin nam a pat sangsawm leh sangnih.
Hih silte nung a ka etleh, ngaiin, mipi nasatak kuamah simzohlouh! Namchin, phungchin michih leh hamchin a pat puankang silh a, tualeh tumnah tawia laltouna leh Belamnou maia ding kamu hi.
Tualeh amau aw ngaihtak in a kikou ua, “Hundamna pen laltouna tung a tou i Pasian uleh Belamnou a ahi!” chi in.
Tualeh vantungmi jousiah laltouna kimkual ah upate leh ganhing lite kimkual ah ading ua, tualeh laltouna mai ah khupbok in amai uh tawh tual si-in,
tuachi`n, “Amen! gualjawlnate, thupinate, pilnate kipahthu gennate leh sil bawltheihnate i Pasian kiangah tangtawn tangtawn in omjingta hen! Amen!” chi in Pasian abia uhi.
Tuachi`n upate lak a khat in ahung houpih a, ka kiangah, “Hih puankang a kijemte kuate ahi ua, tualeh khoia kipat a hungpai ahi ua?” a hungchi a.
Tualeh ken a kiangah, “Pu aw, nang nathei hi,” kachi hi.
Tuachi`n aman ka kiangah, “Hihte pen gimthuakna nasatak a pat hung pawtkhiate ahi ua. Tualeh apuante uh Belamnou sisan a sawp in a kangsakta uhi.
Tuajiakin amauh pen Pasian laltouna maiah om in, sun leh jan in a tempul ah a nna asem uhi. Tualeh amah laltouna tung a tou-pa pen alak uah ateng ding hi.
Agil uh akialngai nawn kei ding a, adang uh atakngai nawn kei ding; tualeh nisa in amauh akangngai nawn kei ding a, ni asatna in zong ahihgim nawn kei ding hi,
ajiak Belamnou laltouna lai a ompa pen a belamchingpa uh ahi ding a, tualeh amau hinna tuikhuk ah apaipih ding a. Tualeh Pasian in amit ua pat khitui jousiah a nawtsiang sak ding hi,” chi in.
Tualeh aman chaimtehna sagihna aphelzoh in, dakkal lang sung ding bang vantung asip dingdeng hi.
Tualeh vantungmi sagih Pasian mai a ding kamu a, akiang uah pengkul sagih piak ahita uhi.

Tuachi`n vantungmi dang khat a hungpai a gimnamtui halna kham bawm tawiin maitam bul ah ading hi. Tualeh a kiang ah laltouna mai a kham maitam tung a misiangthoute thumna tawh alatkhawm dingin gimnamtui tampi piak ahi hi.
Tualeh gimnamtui khu pen misiangthoute thumna tawh kijawk in vantungmi khut a pat in Pasian maiah ajamtouta hi.
Tuachi`n vantungmi in gimnamtui halna ala a maitam meiin a thundim a leitung ah a paikhiata hi; tualeh huasan ah awte, vanpi gingte, tunphete leh jinlingte ahung omta hi.
Tuachi`n vantungmi sagih pengkul sagih neiten mut ding in a kisata uhi.
Vantungmi khatna in amut a. Gial leh mei, sisan tawh kihal ahung omta a, huate leitung ah paihkhiat in aom a. Singkung sehthum suah sehkhat akangtum a, tualeh hampa hing jousiah a kangtumta hi.
Tuachi`n vantungmi nihna in amut a. Mei a kang, mual lianpi hileh kilawm, tuipi ah paih in aom a. Tualeh tuipi sehthum suah sehkhat sisan ahung suakta hi,
tualeh tuipi a om hinna nei ganhingte pen sehthum suah sehkhat asita ua, tualeh longpi zong sehthum suah sehkhat asiata hi.
Tuachi`n vantungmi athumna in amut a. Tualeh aksi lianpi khat meisel bang a kuang, van a pat in ahung kiasuk a, luidungte sehthum suah sehkhat leh tuinakte tungah atu a.
(Hua aksi min pen “Gamsai” ahi.) Tualeh tuipi sehthum suah sehkhat gamsai ahung suakta a, tualeh hua tui khatsak ahihjiak in mi tampi asita hi.

Tuachi`n vantungmi alina in amut a. Ni sehthum suah sehkhat, kha sehthum suah sehkhat, aksi sehthum suah sehkhat suksiat in a omta a, tuachi`n sehthum suah sehkhat mialsak a aom ta`k mahbang in, sun pen sehthum suah sehkhat vaklouin a om a; jan zong huachimah bang in.
Tualeh ka etleh, vantungmi khat vanlaijawl a leng a aw ngaihtak a, vantungmi thum in amut ding, hua pengkul gin hung om nalai dingte jiak in, “Leia omte tung agik, agik, agik hi!” Achih kaja hi.
Tuachi`n vantungmi ngana in amut a. Aksi khat van a pat a leia kiasuk kamu a, tualeh a kiang ah kuakhuk tawbei chabi piak in a om hi.
Tualeh aman kuakhuk tawbei pen a hong a, tualeh hua kuakhuk a pat in haltuina mei nasatak khu bangin meikhu ahung pawtkhia a, tualeh hua kuakhuk a meikhu jiakin ni leh vanlaijawl ahung mialta hi.
Tuachi`n hua meikhu lak a pat in kauphe leitung ah ahung pawtkhia a, lei a mom-aite hatna bang hatna akiang uah piak ahi uhi.
Amauh pen a taltang ua Pasian chiamtehna neiloute guak chihlouh leia hampa hiam silhing hiam, ahihkeileh singkung mawng mawng susialou ding a thupiak ahi uhi.
Tualeh amauh pen huate that ding a hatna piak ahikei ua, hinanleh kha nga sung bawlgenthei ding a piak ahi uhi. Tualeh abawl gentheihna uh pen mom-ai in mi apeh chiang a anat bang ahi.
Huani chiangin mi`n sihna ajong ding ua hinanleh amukei ding uhi, sih a utding ua hinanleh sihna in amauh a taimangsan ding hi.
Kauphe mel pen gal kuan ding a mansa a om sakolte bang ahi uh. A lutung uah kham tawh kibang lallukhu hileh kilawm aom a; amaite uh mihing mai abang hi.
Amau`n numei sam bang sam anei ua, tualeh aha uh humpinelkai ha bang ahi.
Tualeh amau`n sik awmphaw bang awmphaw anei ua, akhajap gin uh galdou ding a kuan sakolleng tampi ging bang ahi.
Amau`n mom-ai bangin mei anei ua, ameiah gu aom a, tualeh agu hatdan pen mihingte kha nga sung ahihna thei hi.
Tualeh amau`n kuakhuk tawbei vantungmi pen kumpipa in anei ua; Amin Hebrai hamin Abaddon ahi a, Grik hamin Appolion ahi, (“Hihsiapa chihna ahi”).
Tunggikna khat abeita. Tunggikna nih hungpai ding a omlai hi.
Tuachi`n vantungmi gukna in amut a. Tualeh Pasian maia om kham maitam ki lite a pat aw kaja a.
Pengkul nei vantungmi kiangah, “Euphrate luipi lian a vantungmi li hen a omte sut in!” chi in.
Tuachi`n adakkal leh, ani leh, akha leh, akum, huntak a mihing sehthum suah sehkhat that ding a mansa a kikoih vantungmi lite khah in a omta hi.
Tualeh hua sakol tungtuang galkap mite tamdan maktaduai zanih ahi uh: aphakzah uh kigen kaja hi.

Tualeh hichibang in mangmuhna in: sakolte leh atung a tuang mei bang a san engdup leh kaat bang a eng awmphaw neite kamu a. Tualeh hua sakolte lutang pen humpinelkai lutang bang ahi a, tualeh akamsung ua pat in mei leh meikhu leh kat apawtkhia hi.
Hih gawtna thumte akam ua pat a hung pawtkhia mei leh meikhu leh kaat in mihingte sehthum suah sehkhat thah in a omta hi.
Ajiak ahatnate uh pen akam uh leh ameidawn ua om ahi a. Amei uh pen gul tawh kibang ahi a, lutang anei ua; huate a mi a suknat uh ahi.

Hinanleh hih gawtnate-a silou midangte pen dawite leh mu lah mutheilou, ja lah jatheilou, pai lah paitheilou, kham milimte, daan, sumsan, suang leh sing milimte a biaklouhna ding ua a khut ua a silbawlte uh tawpsan dingin a kisik tuankei uhi.
Tualeh a tualthahna uleh, a mibumna uleh, a angkawmna uleh, a guktatna uapan a kisik tuankei uhi.
Tualeh vantungmi hat dang khat meilum a kituam, van a kipan a hung kumsuk kamu a, tualeh alu ah sakhituihup a om a; amai pen ni bang ahi a, tualeh akeng pen meikhuam bang ahi.
Akhut ah laibujial neukhat phensa atawi a. Akeng jiatlam tuipi tungah a nga a, akeng veilam leitung ah a nga hi,
tualeh amah pen, humpinelkai hawk bangin a kikou a. A kikouzoh in van ging sagihten a aw uh asuahta uhi.
Van ging sagihten a aw uh asuah tak un, gelh dingin ka kisata a, tualeh van akipan aw khat in ka kiangah, “Van ging sagihte sil gen imchip inla, gelh ken!” chi in kaja hi.
Vantungmi tuipi tung leh lei tung a ding ka muh in akhut vanlam ah a tungtou a
tualeh tangtawn tangtawn a hingjingpa, van leh asung a sil omte, lei leh asung a sil omte, tuipi leh asung a sil omte min in ka kichiam a, “Zekaina om nawnlou ding in!
Hinanleh vantungmi sagihte aw ginlai nite a amut ding kuan chiangin, Pasian thugu`k kiphual pen a sila Jawlneite kiang a anagensa bangin zohsiang ahita ding hi,” chi in.
Tuachi`n van a kipan aw kajak in, “Pai inla, Tuipi tung leh lei tung a ding vantungmi khut a laibujial neu phensa om pen vala in,” ahung chikik a.

Tuachi`n vantungmi kiangah ka vapai a akiang ah, laibujial neupen hungpia in, kava chi a; tualeh aman ka kiangah, “La inla, nekhin siangin; hih in nagil akhasak ding a, hinanleh na kam ah khuaiju bangin akhum ding hi,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n vantungmi khut a pat in laibujial neupen kala a, ka nesiang a, tualeh hih pen ka kam ah khuaiju bangin akhum a, hinanleh kanekzoh in kagil pen akhata hi.
Tualeh aman ka kiangah, “Mi tampite leh, nam tampite leh, ham tampite leh, kumpipate maiah Pasian thu nagen sawn ngeingei ding ahi,” ahung chi hi.
Tuachi`n pumpeng chiang tehna bang khat ahung kipia a, tualeh vantungmi ading a, ka kiangah, “Thou inla Pasian tempul leh maitam leh asung a biatute teh in.
Hinanleh huangsung tempul pualam tehken; nusia in, ajiak huapen Jentelte kiang a piak ahita hi, tualeh khuapi siangthou pen amau`n kha sawmli leh nih a tuanden ding uhi.
Tualeh ka theihpihtu nihte kiangah silbawltheihna ka pia ding a, amau`n la-ip silh in ni sangkhat leh zanih leh sawmguk sung thu agen ding uhi,” achi hi.
Hihte pen Olive sing nihte leh leitung Pasian maia ding meivak tunna nihte ahi uhi.
Tualeh mi khatpeuhin amauh ahihnatleh, akam uapat mei hung pawtkhia in a melmate uh a kangmang a; tualeh mi khatpeuhin amauh ahihnatleh, huachimah bang a thah in aom ding hi.

Hihte`n a thugen hunsung ua guah juklouhna dingin van khaktheihna sil bawltheihna anei ua. Tualeh tui sisan suaksak theihna leh, a ut dandan ua leitung gawtna chinteng a gawttheihna, silbawltheihna anei uhi.
Tualeh atheihpihna thugen uh azoh chiang un, kuakhuk tawbei a pat hung pawtkhia gamsa in adou ding a. Ajou ding, tualeh athat ding hi,
tualeh aluang uh pen kha lam a Sodom leh Izipt kichi, i Toupa uh zong kilhden a om na khuapi thupitak kongjing ah alum ding hi.
Tuachi`n mipite leh, phungchin leh, hamchin leh, namchin a miten nithum leh akim aluang uh a en ding ua, aluang uh hankhuk a vuiding aphal kei ding uhi.
Tualeh leitung a tengte a kipak ding ua gualnop a bawl ding ua. Tualeh silpiakte a kikhaktuah ding uhi, ajiak pen hih Jawlnei nihten leitung a tengte ana bawlgenthei mahmah uhi.
Tuin nithum leh akim zoh in, Pasian a kipan hinna kha asung uah alut a, akeng un ading uhi, tualeh amauh mute tungah launa thupitak a tungta hi.
Tualeh amau`n van a kipan a aw ngaihtak in, “Hihlam ah hungpaitou un!” Akiang ua achih aja ua, tualeh amauh meilum lak ah van ah akahtouta ua a melmate un amauh amu uhi.
Huahun laitak mah in jin nasatak in aling a, tualeh hua jinling ah mi sangsagih thah in a om hi. Avalteng pen alau mahmah ua van Pasian kiangah thupina apiata uhi.
Tunggikna nihna abeita a. Ngaiin, tunggikna thumna ahung paipah ding hi!

Tuachi`n vantungmi sagihna in a pengkul amut a, van ah aw ngaihtak aging a, “Hih leitung kumpi gamte pen i Toupa uleh Krist kumpi gam ahung hita, amah pen tangtawn tangtawn in kumpi in atou ding hi!” chi in.
Tualeh Pasian maia a laltouna ua tou upa sawmnih leh lite pen khupbok in Pasian abia ua,
amau`n:
“Na kiang ah kipahthu kunggen uhi, aw Toupa Pasian hattungnung, omjing leh, omsa leh, hung om ding!
Ajiak nangman na thahatna thupitak na lata a
tualeh vai nahawmta hi!
Namte aheh ua,
tualeh na thangpaihna a hungtungta,
tualeh misite vaihawmsakna ding leh,
na silate,Jawlneite leh
misiangthoute leh, na min laute,
milian leh mineu kiang a,
nuamman piakna ding hun leh,
leitung susiate na suksiatna ding hun pen a hungtungta hi!”
chi in.
Tuachi`n van ah Pasian tempul akihongta a, a tempul sung a thukhun bawm ahung kimu a; tualeh tunphe bang, awging bang, van ging bang, jinling bang, tualeh gialkia thupitak bang ahung omta hi.
Tualeh van ah chiamtehna thupitak khat ahung kilang a. Numei khat ni a kithuam, akengnuai ah khapi, tualeh a lutung ah lallukhu aksi sawmlehnih ahung om a.
Tuachi`n amahnu pen naupai ahi a, nauvei leh nau suakkhia ding natna in akapta hi.
Tualeh chiamtehna dang van ah ahung kilang kik a. Ngaiin, mei bang a san gulpi, lutang sagih leh kisawm nei, alutung a manglukhu sagih khu ahung om hi.
Amei in van a aksi sehthum suah sehkhat akai a leiah apaikhiata a. Tualeh anau asuahkhiat phetleh ana valhjoupai dingin gulpi pen numei nausuak dingnu maiah ading hi.
Amahnu in ta pasal, namjousiah tung a sikchiang a vaihawmtu ding khat ahung neikhiata a. Tualeh ata pen kipelkhia in Pasian leh a laltouna ah laktouh in a omta hi.
Tuachi`n numeinu pen ni sangkhat leh zanih leh sawmguk avaaktheihna ding un gamdaiah Pasian in abawlsa mun ah a taimangta hi.
Tualeh van ah kidouna aom a, Michael leh a vantungmite`n gulpi adou ua. Tualeh gulpi leh a vantungmiten zong adou uhi;
hinanleh a joutakei ua, amun uh zong van ah muh in a omnawn takei hi.

Tuachi`n gulpi lian pen paihkhiat in a omta a, hua gulpitek pen Dawi leh setan zong a kichi hi, leitung pumpi khemtu, amah pen leitung ah paihkhiat in a omta a, a vantungmite zong amah tawh paihkhiat in a om uhi.

Tuachi`n van ah aw ngaihtak khat in, “Tuinjaw i Pasian uh hutdamna leh! Thahatna leh! Kumpi gam leh Krist thuneihna a hungtungta hi! Ajiak pen i unaute uh hektu pen paihkhiat in a omta hi, aman asun ajan in i Pasian maiah amau ahek hi.
Tualeh amau`n Belamnou sisan jiak leh atheihpihna thu uh jiakin amah pen ajouta ua, tualeh sihtanpha in ahinna uh a itkei uhi.

Tuajiakin nou van leh asung a tengte kipak un! Hinanleh leitung leh tuipi a tengte tung agik hi! Ajiak pen hun tomnoukhat aneita chih a theihjiak in, dawipen heh mahmah in, na kiang uah ahung paisukta hi.”
Tuin gulpi in leitung a paihkhiat ahi chih atheihtak in hua numei ta pasal neinu pen agawtta hi.
Hinanleh numeinu pen gulpi mai a kipan hunkhat leh, hunte leh, hun kimkhat khawia a omna ding mun a alenlut theihna dingin, muvanlai liantak kha piak ahi a.
Tuachi`n gulpi in numeinu tui a tawhmangsak theihna dingin, anung ah tuikhanglian banghial in akam a pat tui a siakhia hi.
Hinanleh leiin numeinu apanpih a; leiin akam akak a hua gulpi in akam a pat a siatkhiat tuikhanglian pen a valhbeita hi.
Tualeh gulpi pen numeinu tungah aheh mahmah a, a chikhak omsun Pasian thupiak juite leh, Jesu Krist theihpihna pomtute douding in a kuanta hi.
Tuachi`n gulpi pen tuipi piau sehnel tungah a dingta hi.
Tuachi`n tuipi sehnel tungah ka ding a, tuipi-a kipanin gamsa khat lu sagih leh kisawm nei; a kite tung a lallukhu sawm nei, tualeh a lutungte a Pasian gensiatna min nei hung pawtkhia ka muta hi.

Tualeh hua ka gamsa muh pen gialbem tawh kibang ahi a, akeng vompi keng abang a, akam pen humpinelkai kam bang ahi. Tualeh amah pen gulpi in a silbawltheihna leh atouna leh thuneihna thupitak apia hi.
Tualeh a lutangte lak a khat pen sihpih ding khop hial a liam hileh kilawm in kamu a, tualeh sihna khop hial a aliamna pen ahung damta a, leitung pumpi in hua gamsa pen lamdang sa in ajuita uhi.
Tuachi`n gamsa kiang a thuneihna pia gulpi pen abiata ua, tualeh amau`n, “Gamsa tawh kibang kua aom a? Amah tawh kidoungam kua ahia aom?” chi`n gamsa pen abia uhi.
Tualeh amah pen sil thupitakte genna ding leh Pasian gensiatna ding kam a kiang ah piak ahi a, kha sawmli leh nih sung thuneihna piak ahita hi.
Tuachi`n aman Pasian gensiatna leh, amin leh atenna inn leh van a tengte gensiatna in akam akakta hi.
Akiang ah misiangthoute tawh kidou ding leh amauh zoh ding thupiak ahita a. Tualeh phungchin leh, namchin leh, hamchin tung a thuneihna piak ahita hi.
Tualeh leitung a teng jousiah leitung kisiamchil a pat a gohsa Belamnou hinna laibu a amin uh ki gelhkhalouten amah abia ding uhi.
“Mi khatpeuhin bil aneihleh ja hen!
Mi kuahileh sal a puiluttu, sal in atang ding a; mi kuahileh namsau a that tuh, namsau a thah in aom ding hi. Hihsan ah misiangthoute dohzohna leh ginna a kilang hi.”
Tuachi`n gamsa dang leitung a kipan a hung pawtkhia khat ka mu a; tualeh belam bang ki nih anei a, gulpi bangin thu agen a.
Tualeh aman gamsa masapen thuneihna jousiah amaiah ajang a, leitung leh asung a tengte gamsa masapen sihna khop hial a liam hungdamkik pen a biasakta hi.
Aman mihingte mitmuh in van a pat leitung ah meibang samkhia hial in, chiamtehna thupi taktakte abawl a.

Tualeh hua gamsa mitmuh a sillamdang nna bawltheihna akiang a piak a omte zang in, leitung a omte kiangah, namsau a satna maliam neia hing nalai hua gamsa lim nabawl ding uh ahi, chin leitung a tengte a khemta hi.
Tualeh gamsa lim a hamtheihna ding leh gamsa lim bialou jousiah a thahtheihna ding a gamsa lim kiang a hunakna piaktheihna silbawltheihna aman anei hi.
Aman mijousiah, aneu leh alian, hausa leh jawng, saltang leh tanglou hitaleh, akhut jiatlam uah ahihkeileh atal uah chiamtehna aneisak chiat a,
tualeh chiamtehna hiam, gamsa min hiam, ahihkeileh amin nambar neite chihlouh mi kuamah in leizong a leithei kei ding ua, juak zong a juaktheih kei ding uhi.
Hihsan ah pilna akilang hi: Kuapeuh theihsiamna neiin gamsa nambar pen sim hen, ajiak pen hihpen mihing nambar ahi. Ama nambar pen 666 ahi.
Tuachi`n ka en a, ngaiin, Belamnou Zion mual a ding leh; atal ua a Pa uh min kigelh chiat nuaikhat leh sangsawmli leh sangli kamu hi.
Tualeh van a pat aw khat, tui tampi luang ging leh van ging ngaihtak bang kaja a, tualeh kaihging tumte kaihging tumging bang kaja hi.
Amau`n laltouna mai leh ganhing lite mai leh upate maiah lathak hileh kilawm asa ua. Leitung a pat a tatkhiat hua nuaikhat leh sangsawmli leh sanglite chihlouh hua la kuaman ajilthei kei uhi.

Hihte pen numeia kisubuah loute ahi uh, nungak siangthou bang ahihjiak un; hihte pen apaina teng a Belamnou juitute ahi uhi. Hihte pen Pasian leh Belamnou ding a gah masapen hi ding a mite lak a kipan a tatkhiat ahi uhi.
Tualeh akam uah juauthu aom kei a; Pasian laltouna maiah gensiat beiin aom uhi.
Tuachi`n vantungmi dang khat leitung a teng namchin, phungchin, hamchin leh hamchin kiang a tangkoupih ding tangtawn tangthupha neia vanlaijawl a leng kamu a.
Aw ngaihtak a kikouin, “Pasian lau unla, a kiang ah thupina pia un! Ajiak pen a vaihawmna a hungtungta hi. Tualeh amah pen van leh lei leh tuipi leh tuinakte siamtu pen bia un!” achi hi.
Tualeh vantungmi dang, anihna in ajui a, “Hua khuapi thupitak Babilon tuh achimta hi, achimta hi! A angkawmhat thangpaihna uain nam jousiah adawnsak jiakin!” chi in.
Tuachi`n vantungmi, athumna in, amauh a jui a, “Mi khatpeuhin gamsa leh alim abiak a, ataltang hiam, akhut hiam a a chiamtehna aneihleh
Pasian thangpaihna uain, ahehna nou kisung dimlet pen adawn ding a, tualeh vantungmi siangthou mai leh Belamnou maiah mei leh kat a gawt in aom ding hi, chi in.
Tualeh a gawtna uh meikhu pen tangtawn tangtawn in a jamtou a. Gamsa leh alim biate leh akhut a chiamtehna nei jousiahten sun hiin jan hitaleh khawl tawldamna amukei ding uhi.”
Hihsan ah, Pasian thupiak juite leh Jesu gingta misiangthoute thuakzohna akilang hi.
Tuachi`n van akipan aw khat in ka kiangah, “Gelh in: Tu-a pat misi Toupa a site pen ahampha uhi!”
“Ahi, kha in! Asep gimnate uh khawlsan a, asilbawlte un hungjui ding ahihjiak in, achi hi,” chih kaja hi.
Tuachi`n ka en a, ngaiin, meilum kang leh, hua meilum tung a Mihing Tapa hileh kilawm, a lutung a kham lallukhu khu a, akhut a kawite hiam tawi kamu a.

Tualeh vantungmi dang khat tempul a pat a hung pawtkhia, aw ngaihtak a kikou in meilum tung a tou-pa kiangah, “Na kawite jang inla at in, nang dingin a at hun tungta hi, ajiak pen leitung buhte akuaita hi!” achi hi.
Tuachi`n hua meilum tung a tou-pan akawite leitung ah a jangkhiata a, leibuhte at in aomta hi.
Tuachi`n vantungmi dang khat van a tempul a kipat in ahung pawtkhia a, aman zong kawite hiam khat atawi hi.

Tualeh meitung a thunei vantungmi dang khat, maitam a pat in ahung pawt a. Aw ngaihtak a kikouin kawite hiam neipa kiangah, “Na kawite hiam jang inla lei grepgah bomte khawm in, ajiak pen grepte aminsiangta hi!” achi hi.
Tuachi`n vantungmi in a kawite leitung ah ajangta a lei grepte akhawm a, tualeh huate Pasian thangpaihna uain hekna ah apailutta hi.
Tualeh uain hekna pen khuapi pualam ah keng a totchil in a omta a, tualeh uain hekna a kipat sisan pen sakol kamkaih tanpha in farlong sangkhat leh zaguk sung ahung luangkhiata hi.
Tuachi`n van ah, chiamtehna thupi leh lamdang. Vantungmi dang sagih gawtna sagih nei kamu a, huate ah Pasian thangpaihna bukimta ahihjiak in, gawtna nunung ahita uhi.
Tualeh meitawh kihel tuipi limlang hileh kilawm leh gamsa tung leh alim tung a gualjoute, achiamtehna leh amin nambar tung a gualzohna tangte. Pasian kaihging tum a tuipi limlang tung a ding kamu hi.
Tualeh amau`n Pasian sila Mosi leh Belamnou la asa ua:
“Na silbawlte a thupi in a lamdang hi,
Toupa Pasian hattungnung!
Na lampite adik in atak hi,
Aw Nang misiangthoute kumpipa!
Kuan ahia nang hung laulou in?
Aw Toupa na min a pahtawi louh ngam ding uh?
Ajiak nangguak siangthou na hi.
Ajiak nam jousiah a hungpai ding ua
namai ah ahung bia ding uhi,
ajiak na vaihawmna dikte suklat in a omta hi.”
Hih silte zoh in ka etleh, ngaiin, van ah theihpihna tempul biakbuk pen aki hong a.
Tualeh vantungmi sagihte gawtna sagihte tawiin puan siangthou leh vam a kithuam in, tualeh a om uh kham kawnggak a gak in Pasian tempul a pat ahung pawtkhia ua.
Tuachi`n ganhing lite lak a khat in hua vantungmi sagihte kiangah, tangtawn tangtawn a hingjing Pasian thangpaihna a dim kham belhbu sagih a piata hi.
Tualeh tempul pen Pasian thupina leh a silbawltheihna a kipan meikhu in adimta a, tualeh hua vantungmi sagihte gawtna sagih pen a kizoh masiah in tempul sung ah kuamah alutthei takei uhi.
Tuachi`n tempul sung a pat in aw ngaihtak khat in vantungmi sagihte kiangah, “Pai unla Pasian thangpaihna belhbute leitung ah va buakhia un!” achih kaja hi.
Tuachi`n akhatna pen apai a a belhbu leitung ah a buakhia a. Tualeh gamsa chiamtehna nei leh alim biate tungah buahna leh meima huaisia hahnat a na ahung suakta hi.
Tuachi`n vantungmi anihna in a belhbu tuipi tungah a buakhia a. Tualeh hihpen misi sisan bangin ahung omta a, tualeh tuipi sung a om hinna nei jousiah asita uhi.
Tuachi`n vantungmi thumna in a belhbu luidungte leh tuinakte ah asungbua a, tualeh huate sisan ahung suakta hi.
Tualeh tuite tung a thunei vantungmi in, “Aw Toupa, hih silte a vai nahawm jiakin, Nang omjing leh omkhin leh hung om dingpa na diktat hi!
Ajiak pen amau`n misiangthoute leh Jawlneite sisan anasuah ua, tualeh nang a dawn ding un amau sisan na piata hi. Dawntaak mawng ahihjiak un!” achih kaja hi.
Tualeh maitam a kipat adang khat in, Ahi, “Toupa Pasian hattungnung, na vaihawmte atak in adiktat hi!” achih kaja hi.
Tuachi`n vantungmi alina in a belhbu Ni tungah asungbua a, tualeh amah kiangah mite meia haikak theihna silbawltheihna piak ahi.
Tualeh mite pen mei samah mah a haikak in aom ua, tualeh hih hiite a gawtna tung a thuneipa Pasian min agensia ua, tualeh amah kiang a thupina pia ding in a kisik nuamkei uhi.
Tuachi`n vantungmi angana in a belhbu gamsa laltouna tungah asungbua a, tualeh a kumpi lalgam pen mialna in a pumdimta a; tualeh amau`n na asak jiak un alei uh a themthem in apetkiamta uhi,
anatnate uh leh a meimate uh jiakin van Pasian agensia ua, asilbawlte uh akisik tuankei uhi.
Tuachi`n vantungmi gukna in a belhbu Euphrate luipi ah a sungbua a, tualeh suahlam kumpipate a ding lampi bawl ahihtheihna dingin atuipen a kangsiangta hi.
Tualeh ukeng tawh kibang khanin thum gulpi kam a kipan leh, Jawlnei taklou kam a kipan a hungpawt kamu a.
Amauh pen hattungnung Pasian nithupi a kidouna a kaikhawm ding a leitung kumpi leh leitung pumpi paikhia, sillamdang bawl dawite kha ahi uhi.
“Ngaiin! Guta bangin kungpai hi! Kigingjing leh puan silhsa a om tuh a hampha hi, atuachih keileh guaktang in avak ding a ajumhuaina a mukha ding uhi!”
Tualeh amau`n amauhte mun khat, Hebrai ham a Armageddon kichi ah apuikhawmta uhi.
Tuachi`n vantungmi sagihna in a belhbu huihkhua ah asungbua a, tualeh van a tempul a pat leh, laltouna a kipanin aw ngaihtak ahung suakkhiata a, “Bawlzoh ahita!” achi hi.
Tualeh awte, sil gingte, vanpi gingte leh tunphete ahung om ua. Tualeh jin nasatak aling a, huachibang jinling nasia leh thupi leitung a mihing om a kipat a omkha naikei hi!
Tualeh khuapi thupi pen sehthum in kikhen a, tualeh namte khuapite pen achimta hi. Tualeh a thangpaihna nou pen akiang a piak dingin Babilon khuapi thupi tuh Pasian maiah theihkhiat in ahung omta hi.
Tuachi`n tuikulh gam jousiah a taimangta a, mualte zong muh in aom nawn takei hi.
Tualeh gial thupitak atang khat talent khat a gik van a pat in mite tungah akia a, tualeh miten hua gial a gawtna jiakin Pasian agensia uhi, ajiak pen hua gawtna pen ahuaisia mahmah hi.
Tuachi`n belhbu sagih tawi vantungmi sagihte lak a khat hungpaiin ahung houpih a ka kiangah, “Hungpaiin, tui tampi tung a tou kijuaknu thupitak tung a vaihawmna kung ensak ding.
Leitung a kumpipate`n amahnu a angkawmpih ua, tualeh a angkawm hatna uain in leitung a tengte dawnkhamsak in a om uhi,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n aman keipen kha in gamdaiah ahung puamangta hi. Tualeh numei khat Pasian gensiatna min a pumdim, lutang sagih leh kisawm nei gamsa sandup tung a tou kamu a.
Hua numeinu pen puan sandup leh sandaang in akijem a, kham leh suangmantam leh, tuikepsuang in akijem a, a angkawm hatna kihdak om leh buahna a dim kham nou pen akhut in atawi hi.
Tualeh a taltang ah min khat, Thuguk kiphual: “Babilon thupi, kijuakte leitung a kihdak huaite nu,” chi`n a kigelh hi.
Hua numeinu pen misiangthoute sisan leh Jesu martarte sisan dawnkham in kamu a.
Tualeh amahnu ka muhtak in ken lamdang kasa a tualeh chijat-huai kasa mahmah hi.
Hinanleh vantungmi in ka kiangah, “Bang ding a lamdang sa nahia? Hua numei leh atuanna lutang sagih leh kisawm nei gamsa thugu`k kung hilh ding hi.

Hua na gamsa muh pen a omkhin a, aom kei a, tualeh kuakhuk tawbei a pat ahung pawtkhia ding a manthaina ah apai ding hi. Tualeh leitung siamchil a pat leitung a teng hinna laibu a amin uh kigelhlouten hua gamsa omkhin leh omnawnlou leh hung om ding pen amuh chiang un lamdang asa mahmah ding uhi.
“Hihsan ah pilna lungsim aom hi. Lutang sagihte pen, numeinu touna mual sagihte ahi uhi:
kumpi sagih aom a, ngate apu`kta a, khat a om a, tualeh adang ahung omnai kei hi; tualeh a hungpai chiangin tomnoukhat sung aom ding hi.
Hua gamsa omkhin leh omlou pen amah mah zong agiatna ahi a, tualeh sagihte lak a ahi a, tualeh manthaina ah apai hi.
“Hua kisawm namuhte pen kumpi lalgam neinailoute ahi uhi, hinanleh amau`n gamsa tawh dakkal khat sung kumpipate bang a thuneihna anei uhi.
Hihte lungsim khat in a om ua, tualeh gamsa kiangah a thuneihna uleh ahatna uh apia ding uhi.

Hihte`n Belamnou a kidoupih ding ua, tualeh Belamnou in amauh ajou ding hi, ajiak amah pen toupate Toupa leh kumpite Kumpipa ahi, tualeh amah tawh omte pen sapte, telte, tualeh gin-omte ahi uhi,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n aman ka kiangah, Kijuaknu touna na tui muhte pen, mite leh, mipite leh namte leh, hamte ahi uhi.
Tualeh gamsa tung a kisawm namuhte, hihte`n kijuaknu ahua ding ua; hihsia leh saguak in abawl ding ua; asa ane ding ua tualeh meiin ahalmang ding uhi.

Ajiak pen Pasian thute suktangtung a aom masiah amah deihlam a bawltheihna ding uleh, lungsim khat aneihna ding uleh, alalgam uh gamsa kiang a a piaktheihna ding un Pasian in a lungtang uah akoihta hi.
Tualeh, “Hua na numei muhnu pen hua khuapi thupi leitung a kumpipate tung a vaihawmtu pen ahi,” achi hi.
Hih silte zoh in vantungmi dang khat silbawltheihna thupitak neia van a pat hung kumsuk kamu a, tualeh athupina in leitung ataan vaak a.
Tualeh amah aw ngaihtak in hahkou in akikou a: “Babilon thupi achimta hi! Achimta hi! Dawite tenna leh, kha buah chinteng kulh, vasa sianglou leh, kihdak om chinteng bawm ahung hita hi.
Ajiak nam jousiahin a angkawm hatna thangpaihna uain adawnta ua. Tualeh leitung a kumpipate`n amah a angkawmpih ua, amah noptatseng jiakin leitung a summet bawlte ahausa gawpta uhi,” achi hi.
Tualeh van a pat aw dang khat kaja a,
“Ka mite a khialhna a na jauhlouhna ding un leh!
amahnu tawh agawtna na tankhawm louhna ding un;
amah a pat hung pawtkhia un!
Ajiak a khialhnate van atungta a,
tualeh a gitlouhnate Pasian in atheigige hi.
Aman ahung piak bangbang in amah pia unla;
asilbawl bang jelin alehnih in thuk un.
ahalna nou ah amah dingin
alehnih in halsak un.
A kithupisakna zah leh a noptatna zahzah in,
amah bawlgim un.
Ajiak aman a lungtang in,
‘Kumpinu in katou a!
meithai ka hikei a,
ka lungkham ngaikei ding, achi hi.
Tuajiakin nikhat thu in amah gawtna
sihna leh kialna leh su`nna ahung tung ding a.
amahnu pen huaisiatak in meiin akangtum ding hi,
ajiak pen amah tung a vaihawmtu Toupa Pasian pen ahat ahi,”
achi hi.
Leitung a kumpipate, amah na angkawmpih a amah tawh nuamtak a na omten, amahnu kakna meikhu amuh chiang un akah ding uhi.
Amahnu kibawlgim jiak a lau a gamla pia dingin, “Tajang aw! Tajang aw! Babilon khuapi thupi, khuapi hat! Dakkal khat sung a natung a vaihawmna a hungtunta`k a maw!” achi ding uhi.
Tualeh leitung a summet bawlte`n amahnu kah in asu`n ding uh, ajiak mi kuamah in asummet bawlna uh alei nawnlouh ding jiak in;

asummet bawlnate-uh pen kham leh dangka-eng, suangmantamte, tuikepsuangte, puan malngatte, puan sandupte, puan nemte, puan sandaangte, saiha a kibawl bel chituam tuamte, sing mantampente, daante, sikte leh suangkaang bel chituam tuamte;
tualeh singthakte, sil namtuite, sathau namtuite, begawte, uainte, annelte, gehute, gante tualeh mite hinnate bang ahi.
“Silgah na lunggulhte`n nang ahung nusiata ua, sil limtuak leh hoih jousiahin nang ahung paimangsanta hi, hihte pen na mungai nawnkei ding hi!”
Hih silte a summet bawl amahnu jiak a hung hausate pen amahnu ki bawlgimna laujiakin gamlapi a dingin. Kap in asu`n ding ua,
tualeh, “Tajang aw! Tajang aw khuapi thupi! Puan malngat leh, puan sandup leh puan sandaang, kham leh suangmantam leh tuikepsuang a kijempi!
Dakkal khat sung maimai in hihbang a hauhsatna thupi bangmahlou ahung suakta`k mai!”
chi in.
Tualeh longpu jousiah leh long a tuangte jousiah leh long mite leh tuipi tung a summet bawl jousiahte gamlapi ah ading ua,
akakna meikhu amuh un a kikoukhia ua, “Hih khuapi thupi bang khoiah aom a!”
achi uhi.

Amau`n a lutung ua leivui kitheh in a kikoukhia ua, kap leh mau pum in, “Tajang aw! tajang aw! Amah manphat jiak a tuipi a long neite hihhauhsat a omna khuapi thupi! Dakkal khat sungin suksiat ahung hita hi!”
Nang van leh sawltak siangthoute leh Jawlneite! Amahnu tung ah nuam un! Ajiak Pasian in amahnu tungah na phuba uh ahung laksakta hi!

Tuachi`n vantungmi hattak khat in buhgawina suang liantak hileh kilawm suang lian khat ala a tuipi ah apailut a, “Hichibang a nasatak in Babilon khuapi thupi pen paihkhiat in aom ding a, muhkik in a omngai nawn kei ding hi.

Kaihging tumte, lasiamte, theile mutte, leh pengkul mutte a pan ging kilawm nasung ah a kijangai nawn kei ding hi! Khutsiammi, banglampeuh a khutsiam mawng mawng nasung ah aki munawnkei ding a; tualeh buhgawina gin mawng mawng zong jaak in aom ngainawn kei ding hi!

Meivak vaak zong nasung ah ataang nawn kei ding a; mou leh mouneitu aw zong akijangai nawnkei ding. Ajiak na summet bawlte hih leitung miliante ahi ua, na bumsiamna-a nam jousiah khem a aom ta`k jiak in!”
Tualeh amahnu sungah Jawlneite leh, misiangthoute leh, leitung a thah a omjousiahte sisan muh in a omta hi, achi hi.
Hih silte nungin van ah mi tampitak aw kaja a, “Halleluijah Hundamna leh thupina leh zah-omna leh thuneihna pen Toupa i Pasian uh a ahi!
Ajiak pen a vaihawmna athutak in adik hi! Ajiak aman kijuaknu thupitak a-angkawm hat jiak a leitung hihthanghuai nu pen vai ahawmkhum a. Tualeh asilate phuba pen atung ah a laksakta hi.”
Amau`n, “Halleluijah! achi kik ua. Amahnu halna meikhu tangtawn tangtawn in ajamtouta h!”
Tualeh upa sawmnih leh lite leh ganhing lite pen khupbok in, “Amen! Halleluijah!” chi in laltouna tung a tou-pa Pasian abiata uhi.
Tuachi`n laltouna a pat aw khat ahung gingkhia a, “Nou a silate jousiah leh, nou amah lau, aneu alian in i Pasian pahtawi un!”
Tualeh mi tampite awging bang, tui tampite luan-ging bang, vanpi ging thupitak bangin kaja a. “Halleluijah! Toupa Pasian sil jousiah neipa in vai a hawm hi!
Kipak in i nuam ding uh tualeh akiang ah pahtawina ipia ding uhi. Ajiak pen Belamnou zineih hun a hungtungta a, azi zong kisakhinsa in a omta hi.”
Tualeh amahnu puan malngat leh puannem a kijep ding phal ahi a. (Hua puan malngat pen misiangthoute diktatna ahi,) chi in.
Tuachi`n aman ka kiangah, “Gelh in: Belamnou ankuang umding a sapte ahampha uhi.” Tualeh aman ka kiangah, “Hihte pen Pasian thugen diktakte ahi,” achi hi.
Tualeh amah bia-in akengbul ah ka khupbok a, hinanleh aman ka kiangah, “En in, huate bawlken! Kei pen na sila tanpih leh Jesu theihpihna thu nei na-unaute lak a khat ka hi. Pasian bia in!”
Ajiak pen Jesu theihpihna pen thu genkholhhna kha ahi, achi hi.
Tuachi`n van kihong kamu a, tualeh ngaiin, sakol ka`ng khat leh atung a tuangpa gin-om leh thutak kichi kamu a. Aman a diktatna in vai ahawm a, tualeh gal abawl hi.
Amitte pen meikuang bang ahi a, a lutung ah lallukhu tampi aom hi; tualeh amah loungal kuaman atheih theihlouh min anei hi.
Aman sisan a kidiah puan asilh a, amin pen “Pasian thu” a kichi hi.
Tualeh van a om galkap hon in, puan malngat, vaam leh siangthou a kivon in, sakol kang tung a tuang in amah ajui uhi.

Tualeh namte athahtheih na`ngin akam a pat namsau hiamtak apawt hi. Tualeh aman amauhte sikchiang in vai ahawmkhum ding a; hattungnung Pasian lauhhuaina leh thangpaihna uain hekna pen a tuanchil tading hi.
Tualeh aman apuantung leh amalpi tung ah, “Kumpite Kumpi toupate Toupa chia kigelh min anei hi.”
Tuachi`n vantungmi khat Ni sung a ding ka mu a, tualeh amah aw ngaihtak a kikou in, vanlaijawl a leng vasate kiangah: “Hungpai unla, Pasian ankuang luina thupitak ah hung kikhawm khawm un!
Kumpipate sa, galkap sapte sa, mihatte sa, sakolte sa, leh atung a tuangte sa, tualeh mi jousiah zalen leh saltaang, aneu leh aliante sa, nanek theihna ding un!” achi hi.
Tualeh hua gamsa leitung kumpipate leh a galkap honte uh, hua sakol tung a tuangpa leh a galkapte tawh kidou ding a a kikhop khawm uh kamu hi.

Tuachi`n gamsa pen mat in a omta a, tualeh Jawlnei taklou gamsa chiamtehna neite leh, alim biate akhemna a amai a sillamding bawltu zong amah tawh matkhawm in a omta hi. (Hih tegel pen kaat a kang meidil ah ahingtang san a pailut in a omta uhi.)
Tualeh avalteng pen sakol tung a tuangpa namsau, akam a hungpawtkhia pen in thah in aomta ua, tualeh amauh sa in tungleng vasa jousiah agilvahta uhi.
Tuachi`n vantungmi khat van a kipan a hung kumsuk, akhut a kuakhuk tawbei chabi leh sikkhau lianpi tawi kamu hi.
Aman hua gulpi, gulpitek, dawi leh setan pen aman a, kum sangkhat sung dingin amah akanta hi.
Tualeh kum sangkhat achin masiah a namte akhemkik louhna dingin, kuakhuk tawbei ah apailut a, a khakkhum a, asindetta hi. Hinanleh hih silte zoh chiangin amah pen tomkhat khahkhiat ahi ding hi.

Tualeh laltounate leh atung a toute kamu a, akiang uah vaihawmna piak ahi ua. Tuachi`n Jesu thu theihpihna leh Pasian thu jiak a alu uh tan a om gamsa leh alim biangailou a, atal uh hiam, akhut uh hiam a zong chiamtehna neingailoute khate kamu hi. Amauhte ahung hing ua, Krist tawh kum sangkhat vai ahawmta uhi.
(Hinanleh misidangte pen kum sangkhat abei masiah ahingkik kei ding uhi.) Hih pen thohkikna masa ahi.
Thohkikna masa a pangte a hampha uhi, a siangthou uhi. Huate tungah sihnihna in thu aneikei a, hinanleh amauh pen Pasian leh Krist siampute ahi ding ua, amah tawh kum sangkhat vai ahawm ding uhi.
Tualeh kum sangkhat abeichiang in, setan pen khum a aomna a pan khahkhiat in aom ding a,
tualeh leitung lite a om namte leh, Gog leh Magog, khem a kidouna a puikhawm dingin apaikhia ding hi. A tamdan uh pen tuipi a sehnel bang ahi.
Amauh pen leitung vailam khaksuak in apaitou ua, misiangthoute giahphual khuapi deih-om pen a kualkhumta uhi. Tualeh Pasian a hung kipan van a panin mei ahung kiasuk a, amauh a kangmangta hi.
Amauh khemtu dawi pen gamsa leh Jawlnei taklou omna mei leh kaat dil ah paihlut in a omta a, tangtawn tangtawn in thuakgimsak in aom ding uhi.
Tualeh laltouna kaang thupitak leh atung a toupa; amai a pat lei leh van taimangnapa kamu a, amauh a dingin mun mawng mawng muh in aom takei hi.

Tualeh misite alian aneu Pasian mai a ding kamu a. Tualeh laibute akihong a, tualeh laibu dang hinna laibu zong akihong hi. Tualeh misite pen hua laibu a akigelh bangin anasep uh dungjui un vaihawmsak in a omta uhi.
Tuipi in asung a misi omte ahung pawtkhiasakta a, tualeh sihna leh misikhua in asung a misi omte ahung puakhiata ua, tualeh amauh asilbawlte uh dungjui a vaihawmsak in a omta uhi.
Tuachi`n sihna leh misikhua pen meidil ah paihlut in a omta uhi. (Huapen sihnihna ahi.)
Tualeh kuapeuh hinna laibu a kigelh amuhlouh jousiah meidil ah paihlut in a omta uhi.
Tualeh ken vanthak leh leithak kamu a. Ajiak van masa leh lei masa apaimangta a, tuipi zong a omnawn kei hi.
Tuachi`n kei Johan in khuapi siangthou, Jerusalem thak pen, mou apasal a ding a kijem bang a bawlzohsa-a Pasian a kipan a van a pat a hung kumsuk kamu hi.

Tualeh van a pat in aw ngaihtak khat in, “Ngaiin, Pasian biakbuk mihingte lak ah a omta hi! Amah pen alak uah ateng ding a; amauh pen amite ahi ding ua, Pasian amah mah akiang uah aom ding a, tualeh a Pasian uh ahi ding hi.

Tualeh Pasian in amit ua pat khitui jousiah a siaksiangsak ding hi. Sihna a omnawn kei ding a; lungkhamna leh kahna leh natna zong a omnawn kei ding hi, ajiak sil masa tengteng a paimangta hi,” achih kaja hi.
Tualeh laltouna tung a tou-pa in, “Ngaiin, sil jousiah ka siamthakta hi!” achi hi. Tualeh aman ka kiangah, “Gelh in, ajiak hih thute adik in agin-om ahi,” achi hi.
Tuachi`n aman ka kiangah, “Hih bawlkhit ahita! Kei Alpha leh Omega, abul leh atawp ka hi. Dangtak jousiah kiangah hinna tui luikhuk a om amawknan ka pia ding hi.
Kuahileh agualjoutu in sil jousiah aluah ding a: Tualeh a Pasian ka hi ding a, amah zong ka tapa ahi ding hi.
Hinanleh meipuahte, gingtaloute, kihdak omte, tualthatte, nu leh pa kal a thangtatte, bumsiamte, milim biate leh juau hatte jousiah tanding pen mei leh kaat a kang meidil ahi a, huapen sihnihna ahi.”
Tuachi`n gawtna nunung sagihte a dim belhbu sagih nei vantungmi sagihte lak a khat ka kiangah hungpai in ahung houpih a, “Hungpaiin, Mou, Belamnou zi kung ensak ding hi,” achi a.
Tualeh aman Kha in mualsang leh liantak khat tungah ahung paipihta a, tualeh hua khuapi thupitak, Jerusalem siangthou, Pasian a kipan a van a pat a hung kumsuk ahung ensak hi.
Pasian thupina nei a avaak pen suangmantam pen bang, jasper suang bang ahi a, kristal suang bang a siang ahi.

Tualeh aman kulhbang thupitak leh sangtak zong anei a. Kong sawmlehnih anei a, tualeh hua kong sawmlehnihte ah vantungmi sawmlehnih aom hi, tualeh hua kongte tungah min kigelh a om a, huate pen Israel nam sawmlehnihte min ahi.
Suahlam ah kongpi thum, mallam ah kongpi thum: simlam ah kongpi thum tumlam ah kongpi thum aom hi.
