Tualeh kulhbang in nuaiphah sawmlehnih anei a, tualeh huate tungah Belamnou sawltak sawmlehnihte min atuang hi.
Tualeh amah kei hunghoupihpa`n khuapi a kotte leh akulhbang tehna dingin tehna kham pumpeng chiang atawi hi.
Tualeh hih khuapi in ningli anei a, adunglam pen availam chia ahi a. Tualeh aman hua pumpeng chiangin hua khuapi pen ateh a: farlong sangsawm leh sangnih; adunglam leh availam leh asandan akibang hi.
Tuachi`n aman kulhbang ateh a, mihing tehna a teh in, (huapen vantungmi tehna ahi a) “tong jakhat leh tong sawmli leh li ahi.”
Kulhbang pen jasper suang a kibawl ahi a, akhuapi pen kham siang a kibawl limlang siang bang ahi.
Tualeh kulhbang nuaiphah pen suangmantam chiteng a kijem ahi. Nuaiphah masapen tuh jasper suang ahi a, anihna saphire suang ahi a, athumna kalsidonia suang ahi a, alina emerald suang ahi a,

a ngana sardonik suang ahi a, a gukna sardia suang ahi a, a sagihna krisolit suang ahi a, a giatna beril suang ahi a, a kuana topaz suang ahi a, a sawmna krisoprase suang ahi a, a sawm leh khatna jasinth suang ahi a, a sawm leh nihna amethist suang ahi.
A kot sawm le nihte pen tuikepsuang sawm leh nihte ahia, akotteng pen tuikepsuang khatchiat a bawl ahi a. Tualeh khuapi lamlian pen limlang etpailet theih bang kham siang set a kibawl ahi.
Hinanleh huasan ah tempul kamu kei a, ajiak pen Toupa Pasian hattungnung leh Belamnou pen a tempul uh ahimai hi.
Hua khuapi in Ni apoimoh kei a, kha zong apoimoh kei hi. Pasian thupina in hih pen ataanvak a, Belamnou pen ameivak ahimai hi.
Tualeh hundam a om namte pen hua va`k ah ava`k ding ua, tualeh leitung kumpipate`n athupina uh leh azah omna uh apualut ding uhi.
A kotte pen sun in a kikhak ngaikei ding hi; ajiak pen huamun ah jan aom ngaikei ding hi.
Tualeh amau`n huasung ah namte thupina leh zah-omna ahung pualut ding uhi.
Hinanleh huasung ah bangchik mah in silsianglou, ahihkeileh kihdakhuai leh juaubawl mawng mawng alutkei ding a. Hinanleh Belamnou laibu a min kigelhte guak alut ding uhi.
Tualeh aman Hinna tui lui chimtak, kristal suang bang a siang, Pasian leh Belamnou laltouna a pat a hung luangkhia ahung ensak a
kongjing laijang leh luiningtuak ah agah chituam tuam sawm leh nih nei, tualeh khateng a gah hinna singkung a om a, tualeh hua singgah pen namte sukdamna ding ahi.
Tualeh huasan ah hamsia mawng mawng a om nawnkei ding a.
Hinanleh Pasian leh Belamnou laltouna a omjawta ding hi, tualeh a silate`n a nna a sem ding uhi.
Amau`n amah a mu ding ua, amin pen atal uah atuang ding hi.
Huasan ah jan a om nawn kei ding a, meivak leh nivak zong a ngainawn kei ding uhi, ajiak Toupa Pasian in amauh a salhvak ding a, tualeh mau`n tangtawn tangtawn in vai ahawmta ding uhi.
Tuachi`n aman ka kiangah, “Hih thute agin-om in adik ahi, tualeh Jawlnei siangthou Toupa Pasian in sil hung ompai dingte a silate musak dingin a vantungmi asawlta hi.”
“Ngaiin! Kung paipah ding hi! Hih laibu a genkholhna juitaphot ahampha uhi!”
Tualeh kei, Johan in, hih silte ka mu a, kaja hi. Tualeh kaja`k a ka muhtak in, hih silte hung musaktu vantungmi kengbul ah bia dingin ka pukta hi.
Tuachi`n aman ka kiangah, “En in hihbang na bawlthei kei ding hi! Keipen nang leh na unau Jawlneite leh hih laibu a thu kigente juite na sila tanpih ka hi; Pasian bia in!” achi hi.
Tualeh aman ka kiangah, “Hih laibu a genkholhna thute khakkhum ken, ajiak ahun atung ding ahita hi.
Kuahileh midiklou pen diklou in omden hen, kuahileh abuah pen abuah in omden hen, kuahileh midiktat pen diktatjing hen, kuahileh a siangthou pen siangthou jing hen.”
Tualeh, “Ngaiin! Kung paipah ding hi! Tualeh michih a nasep bangbang ua piak ding ka nuamman ka kiangah a om hi.
Kei Alpha leh Omega, apatna leh atawp amasapen leh anunung pen ka hi.”
Hinna singkung a tan aneihtheihna ding uleh kot a khuapi sung a aluttheihna ding ua hih thupiak bawlte pen ahampha uhi.
Hinanleh apualam ah uite, bumhatte, nu leh pa kal a thangtatte, tualthatte, milim biate, tualeh kuapeuh juau ngaina leh bawlte a om uhi.
“Kei Jesu in Saptuamte ding a hih thute na kiang ua hungtheisak dingin ka vantungmi kungsawl hi. Kei David jungjam leh a suan; tualeh Jingsol aksi taang pen ka hi,” achi hi.
Tualeh tua Kha leh tua Mou in, “Hungpai in!” achi uhi.
Tualeh aja taphot in, “Hungpai in!” chi uhen.
Tualeh Kuapeuh a dangtak tuh hungpai hen. Tualeh a ut taphot in hinna tui amawkna in la hen.
Ajiak kuapeuh hih genkholhna laibu a thute ja taphot kiangah ka theisak ahi: mi kuapeuh in hih thute abehlap leh, Pasian in hi laibua kigelh gawtnate atung ah abehlap ding hi.
Tualeh mi kuapeuh in hih genkholhna laibu thute a pat alakmang leh hinna laibu leh khuapi siangthou, tualeh hih laibu a kigelh silte a pat atan ding pen Pasian in a lakmangsak ding hi.
Hih thute theisaktu in, “Pellou in! Kung paipah ding!” achi hi.
Amen. Hungpai in Toupa Jesu aw!
I Toupa Jesu Krist hehpihna na kiang uah omta hen. Amen.
